============================
VEEC 6 - HAK ABWM VWEEQ YJDOGK
vi Z.C. Jepwdon
============================

HAK EHAKJ SDODXHKJ 

Dh pbx okbjdon sdqodnah boq hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj pbx 
xdhhdon bweok do adx emmdgk, jkbqdon b weon skse habh 
pbx xwdyydon hajetna adx vjbdo pdhaeth wkbldon hak 
xwdnahkxh hjbgk em skbodon vkadoq. Ak pbx pbdhdon mej 
b gbww mjes hak Yjkxdqkoh em b mbj qdxhboh getohji, boq 
vkhpkko peoqkjdon pako hak pjkhgakq sbo petwq 
hkwkyaeok, boq hjidon he xtyyjkxx toywkbxboh 
sksejdkx em pabh abq vkko b lkji weon, hdjdon, boq 
qdmmdgtwh pkkc, hakjk pbx oeh stga xybgk do adx akbq 
mej boihadon kwxk. Hak sejk ak bhhksyhkq he megtx eo 
hak yjdoh eo hak ybnk vkmejk ads, hak sejk gwkbjwi hak 
Yjdsk Sdodxhkj getwq xkk hak nwebhdon mbgk em eok em 
adx yewdhdgbw eyyeokohx. Hadx ybjhdgtwbj eyyeokoh abq 
byykbjkq eo hak okpx habh lkji qbi, oeh eowi he 
kotskjbhk bww hak hkjjdvwk hadonx habh abq abyykokq 
do hak wbxh pkkc (bx haetna boieok okkqkq jksdoqdon) 
vth bwxe he kuywbdo pai kbga boq klkji eok em haks 
pbx hak nelkjoskoh’x mbtwh. 

Hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj’x ytwxk ftdgckokq bh hak lkji 
haetnah em hakxk bggtxbhdeox, mej haki pkjk okdhakj 
mbdj oej hjtk. Aep eo kbjha pbx adx nelkjoskoh 

xtyyexkq he ablk xheyykq habh vjdqnk gewwbyxdon? Dh 
pbx ethjbnketx mej boiveqi he xtnnkxh habh haki pkjk 
oeh xykoqdon koetna eo vjdqnkx. Hak vjdqnk pbx 
mkpkj habo hko ikbjx ewq, boq hak vkxh kuykjhx pkjk bh 
b wexx he kuywbdo pai dh abq xobyykq gwkbowi do hpe, 
xkoqdon b qerko gbjx dohe hak pbhkji qkyhax em hak 
jdlkj vkwep. Boq aep qbjk boieok xtnnkxh habh dh pbx 
wbgc em yewdgksko habh abq jkxtwhkq do haexk hpe lkji 
obxhi boq pkww-ytvwdgdrkq stjqkjx? Ej habh hak 
nelkjoskoh xaetwq ablk xeskaep mejkxkko hak mjkbc 
atjjdgbok do hak Pkxh Getohji habh abq gbtxkq xe 
stga qbsbnk he veha ykeywk boq yjeykjhi? Boq pbx 
dh adx mbtwh habh eok em adx Ztodej Sdodxhkjx, Akjvkjh 
Gaejwki, abq gaexko hadx pkkc he bgh xe ykgtwdbjwi 
habh ak pbx oep nedon he vk xykoqdon b weh sejk hdsk 
pdha adx mbsdwi? 

“B njds seeq abx njdyykq hak getohji,” hak eyyeokoh 
abq geogwtqkq, vbjkwi geogkbwdon adx epo vjebq njdo. 

Boq tomejhtobhkwi, hadx pbx ykjmkghwi hjtk. Hak Yjdsk 
Sdodxhkj mkwh dh adsxkwm; ykeywk jkbwwi qdq xkks sejk 
sdxkjbvwk habo txtbw. Klko hak pkbhakj pbx qdxsbw; 
bww hadx gadwwi sdxh do hak sdqqwk em Ztwi. ... Dh pbxo’h 
jdnah, dh pbxo’h oejsbw. ... 

Ak htjokq elkj hak xkgeoq ybnk em hak skse, xbp 
aep stga weonkj dh pkoh eo, boq nblk dh ty bx b vbq 
zev. Xhjkhgadon adx bjsx bvelk adx akbq ak weeckq 
bjetoq adx emmdgk setjomtwwi. Dh pbx b aboqxesk 
jees, pdha b mdok sbjvwk mdjkywbgk mbgdon hak weon xbxa 
pdoqepx, mdjswi gwexkq bnbdoxh hak toxkbxeobvwk 
gadww. Pdha b xwdnah xadlkj, hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj neh ty 
boq selkq elkj he hak pdoqep, weecdon eth bh hak hado 
sdxh habh pbx yjkxxdon dhxkwm bnbdoxh hak nwbxx. Dh pbx 
hako, bx ak xheeq pdha adx vbgc he hak jees, habh ak 
akbjq b xemh getna vkadoq ads. 

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Abwm Vweeq Yjdogk - Z.C. Jepwdon 

Ak mjerk, oexk he oexk pdha adx epo xgbjkq-weecdon 
jkmwkghdeo do hak qbjc nwbxx. Ak cokp habh getna. Ak 
abq akbjq dh vkmejk. Ak htjokq lkji xwepwi he mbgk hak 
ksyhi jees. 

“Akwwe?” ak xbdq, hjidon he xetoq vjblkj habo ak mkwh. 

Mej b vjdkm seskoh ak bwwepkq adsxkwm hak dsyexxdvwk 
aeyk habh oeveqi petwq boxpkj ads. Aepklkj, b 
ledgk jkxyeoqkq bh eogk, b gjdxy, qkgdxdlk ledgk habh 
xetoqkq bx haetna dh pkjk jkbqdon b yjkybjkq 
xhbhkskoh. Dh pbx gesdon — bx hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj 
abq coepo bh hak mdjxh getna — mjes hak mjenwdck wdhhwk 
sbo pkbjdon b weon xdwlkj pdn pae pbx qkydghkq do b 
xsbww, qdjhi edw ybdohdon do hak mbj gejokj em hak jees. 

“He hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj em Stnnwkx. Tjnkoh pk skkh. 
Cdoqwi jkxyeoq dsskqdbhkwi. Xdogkjkwi, Mtqnk.” 

Hak sbo do hak ybdohdon weeckq doftdjdonwi bh hak 
Yjdsk Sdodxhkj. 

“Kj,” xbdq hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj, “wdxhko. ... Dh’x oeh b lkji 
neeq hdsk mej sk. ... D’s pbdhdon mej b hkwkyaeok gbww, 
iet xkk . . . mjes hak Yjkxdqkoh em — ” 

“Habh gbo vk jkbjjbonkq,” xbdq hak yejhjbdh bh eogk. 
Hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj’x akbjh xboc. Ak abq vkko bmjbdq 
em habh. 

“Vth D jkbwwi pbx jbhakj aeydon he xykbc — ” 

“Pk xabww bjjbonk mej hak Yjkxdqkoh he mejnkh he gbww. 

Ak pdww hkwkyaeok hesejjep odnah doxhkbq,” xbdq hak 
wdhhwk sbo. “Cdoqwi jkxyeoq dsskqdbhkwi he Sj. 

Mtqnk.” 

“D ... ea ... lkji pkww,” xbdq hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj pkbcwi. 
“Ikx, D’ww xkk Mtqnk.” 

Ak atjjdkq vbgc he adx qkxc, xhjbdnahkodon adx hdk bx 
ak pkoh. Ak abq vbjkwi jkxtskq adx xkbh, boq 
bjjbonkq adx mbgk dohe pabh ak aeykq pbx b jkwbukq 
boq tombrkq kuyjkxxdeo, pako vjdnah njkko mwbskx 
vtjxh dohe wdmk do hak ksyhi njbhk vkokbha adx sbjvwk 
sbohkwydkgk. Ak pbhgakq, hjidon oeh he vkhjbi b mwdgckj 
em xtjyjdxk ej bwbjs, bx b yejhwi sbo byykbjkq pdhado 
hak mwbskx, xydoodon bx mbxh bx b hey. Xkgeoqx wbhkj, 
ak abq gwdsvkq eth eohe b jbhakj mdok bohdftk jtn, 
vjtxadon bxa mjes hak xwkklkx em adx weon ydo-xhjdykq 
gwebc, b wdsk-njkko vepwkj abh do adx aboq. 

“Ba ... Yjdsk Sdodxhkj,” xbdq Gejokwdtx Mtqnk, xhjdqdon 
mejpbjq pdha adx aboq ethxhjkhgakq. “Neeq he xkk iet 
bnbdo.” 

Hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj getwq oeh aeokxhwi jkhtjo hadx 
gesywdskoh, xe xbdq oehadon bh bww. Ak pbx oeh 
jksehkwi ywkbxkq he xkk Mtqnk, paexk eggbxdeobw 
byykbjbogkx, bybjh mjes vkdon qepojdnah bwbjsdon do 
haksxkwlkx, nkokjbwwi skboh habh ak pbx bveth he 
akbj xesk lkji vbq okpx. Mtjhakjsejk, Mtqnk pbx 
weecdon qdxhdoghwi gbjkpejo. Ak pbx hadookj, vbwqkj, 
boq njbikj, boq adx mbgk abq b gjtsywkq weec. Hak 
Yjdsk Sdodxhkj abq xkko habh cdoq em weec do 
yewdhdgdbox vkmejk, boq dh oklkj veqkq pkww. 

“Aep gbo D akwy iet?” ak xbdq, xabcdon Mtqnk’x aboq 
lkji vjdkmwi boq nkxhtjdon hepbjq hak abjqkxh em hak 
gabdjx do mjeoh em hak qkxc. 

“Qdmmdgtwh he coep pakjk he vkndo,” sthhkjkq Mtqnk, 
ytwwdon ty hak gabdj, xdhhdon qepo, boq ywbgdon adx 
njkko vepwkj tyeo adx cokkx. “Pabh b pkkc, pabh b 
pkkc ...” 

“Abq b vbq eok hee, ablk iet?” bxckq hak Yjdsk 
Sdodxhkj xhdmmwi, aeydon he geolki vi hadx habh ak abq 

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Abwm Vweeq Yjdogk - Z.C. Jepwdon 

ftdhk koetna eo adx ywbhk bwjkbqi pdhaeth boi kuhjb 
akwydonx mjes Mtqnk. 

“Ikx, em getjxk,” xbdq Mtqnk, jtvvdon adx kikx pkbjdwi 
boq weecdon sejexkwi bh hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj. “D’lk vkko 
abldon hak xbsk pkkc iet ablk, Yjdsk Sdodxhkj. Hak 
Vjegcqbwk Vjdqnk ... hak Veokx boq Lbogk stjqkjx ... 
oeh he skohdeo hak jtgctx do hak Pkxh Getohji ...” 

“Iet — kj — ietj — D skbo he xbi, xesk em ietj 
ykeywk pkjk — pkjk dolewlkq do haexk — haexk hadonx, 
pkjk haki?” 

Mtqnk mdukq hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj pdha b jbhakj xhkjo 
weec. “Em getjxk haki pkjk,” ak xbdq. “Xtjkwi iet’lk 
jkbwdrkq pabh’x nedon eo?” 

“D ...” akxdhbhkq hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj. 

Dh pbx yjkgdxkwi hadx xejh em vkabldej habh sbqk ads 
qdxwdck Mtqnk’x ldxdhx xe stga. Ak pbx, bmhkj bww, hak 
Yjdsk Sdodxhkj boq qdq oeh byyjkgdbhk vkdon sbqk he 
mkkw wdck bo dnoejboh xgaeewvei. Vth em getjxk, dh abq 
vkko wdck hadx mjes adx lkji mdjxh skkhdon pdha Mtqnk 
eo adx lkji mdjxh klkodon bx Yjdsk Sdodxhkj. Ak 
jksksvkjkq dh bx haetna dh pkjk ikxhkjqbi boq cokp 
dh petwq abtoh ads tohdw adx qidon qbi. 

Ak abq vkko xhboqdon bweok do hadx lkji emmdgk, 
xblejdon hak hjdtsya habh pbx adx bmhkj xe sboi 
ikbjx em qjkbsdon boq xgaksdon, pako ak abq akbjq 
b getna vkadoq ads, ztxh wdck heodnah, boq htjokq he 
mdoq habh tnwi wdhhwk yejhjbdh hbwcdon he ads, 
booetogdon habh hak Sdodxhkj em Sbndg pbx bveth he 
bjjdlk boq dohjeqtgk adsxkwm. 

Obhtjbwwi, ak abq haetnah habh hak weon gbsybdno boq 
hak xhjbdo em hak kwkghdeo abq gbtxkq ads he ne sbq. 
Ak abq vkko thhkjwi hkjjdmdkq he mdoq b yejhjbdh hbwcdon 

he ads, haetna hadx abq vkko oehadon he aep ak mkwh 
pako b xkwm-yjegwbdskq pdrbjq abq vetogkq eth em hak 
mdjkywbgk boq xabcko adx aboq. Ak abq jksbdokq 
xykkgawkxx hajetnaeth Mtqnk’x cdoqwi kuywbobhdeo 
habh hakjk pkjk pdhgakx boq pdrbjqx xhdww wdldon do 
xkgjkh bww elkj hak pejwq boq adx jkbxxtjbogkx habh ak 
pbx oeh he vehakj adx akbq bveth haks bx hak 
Sdodxhji em Sbndg heec jkxyeoxdvdwdhi mej hak paewk 
Pdrbjqdon gesstodhi boq yjklkohkq hak oeo-sbndgbw 
yeytwbhdeo mjes nkhhdon pdoq em haks. Dh pbx, xbdq 
Mtqnk, b qdmmdgtwh zev habh kogesybxxkq klkjihadon 
mjes jkntwbhdeox eo jkxyeoxdvwk txk em vjeesxhdgcx he 
ckkydon hak qjbneo yeytwbhdeo toqkj geohjew (hak 
Yjdsk Sdodxhkj jksksvkjkq gwthgadon hak qkxc mej 
xtyyejh bh hadx yedoh). Mtqnk abq hako ybhhkq hak 
xaetwqkj em hak xhdww-qtsvxhjtgc Yjdsk Sdodxhkj do b 
mbhakjwi xejh em pbi. 

“Oeh he pejji,” ak abq xbdq, “dh’x eqqx-eo iet’ww oklkj 
xkk sk bnbdo. D’ww eowi vehakj iet dm hakjk’x xeskhadon 
jkbwwi xkjdetx nedon eo etj koq, xeskhadon habh’x 
wdckwi he bmmkgh hak Stnnwkx — hak oeo-sbndgbw 
yeytwbhdeo, D xaetwq xbi. Ehakjpdxk, dh’x wdlk boq wkh 
wdlk. Boq D stxh xbi, iet’jk hbcdon dh b weh vkhhkj habo 
ietj yjkqkgkxxej. Ak hjdkq he hajep sk eth hak 
pdoqep, haetnah D pbx b aebu ywbookq vi hak 
eyyexdhdeo.” 

Bh hadx, hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj abq metoq adx ledgk bh wbxh. 
“Iet’jk — iet’jk oeh b aebu, hako?” 

Dh abq vkko adx wbxh, qkxykjbhk aeyk. 

“Oe,” xbdq Mtqnk nkohwi. “Oe, D’s bmjbdq D’s oeh. Weec.” 

Boq ak abq htjokq hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj’x hkbgty dohe b 
nkjvdw. 

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Abwm Vweeq Yjdogk - Z.C. Jepwdon 

“Vth,” xbdq hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj vjkbhawkxxwi, pbhgadon 
adx hkbgty gakpdon eo hak gejokj em adx okuh xykkga, 
“vth pai — pai abx oeveqi hewq sk — ?” 

“Hak Sdodxhkj em Sbndg eowi jklkbwx ads- ej akjxkwm he 
hak Stnnwk Yjdsk Sdodxhkj em hak qbi,” xbdq Mtqnk, 
yecdon adx pboq vbgc doxdqk adx zbgckh. “Pk mdoq dh 
hak vkxh pbi he sbdohbdo xkgjkgi.” 

“Vth hako,” vwkbhkq hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj, “pai abxo’h b 
mejskj Yjdsk Sdodxhkj pbjokq sk — ?” 

Bh hadx, Mtqnk abq bghtbwwi wbtnakq. 

“Si qkbj Yjdsk Sdodxhkj, bjk iet klkj nedon he hkww 
boiveqi?” 

Xhdww gaejhwdon, Mtqnk abq hajepo xesk yepqkj dohe 
hak mdjkywbgk, xhkyykq dohe hak kskjbwq mwbskx, boq 
lbodxakq pdha b paeexadon xetoq. Hak Yjdsk 
Sdodxhkj abq xheeq hakjk, ftdhk sehdeowkxx, boq 
jkbwdrkq habh ak petwq oklkj, bx weon bx ak wdlkq, qbjk 
skohdeo hadx kogetohkj he b wdldon xetw, mej pae do hak 
pdqk pejwq petwq vkwdklk ads? 

Hak xaegc abq hbcko b wdhhwk padwk he pkbj emm. Mej b 
hdsk, ak abq hjdkq he geoldogk adsxkwm habh Mtqnk abq 
doqkkq vkko b abwwtgdobhdeo vjetnah eo vi wbgc em 
xwkky qtjdon adx njtkwdon kwkghdeo gbsybdno. Do b lbdo 
bhhksyh he jdq adsxkwm em bww jksdoqkjx em hadx 
togesmejhbvwk kogetohkj, ak abq ndlko hak nkjvdw he 
adx qkwdnahkq odkgk boq doxhjtghkq adx yjdlbhk 
xkgjkhbji he hbck qepo hak yejhjbdh em hak tnwi wdhhwk 
sbo pae abq booetogkq Mtqnk’x bjjdlbw. He hak 
Yjdsk Sdodxhkj’x qdxsbi, aepklkj, hak yejhjbdh abq 
yjelkq dsyexxdvwk he jkselk. Pako xklkjbw 
gbjykohkjx, b vtdwqkj ej hpe, bo bjh adxhejdbo, boq hak 
Gabogkwwej em hak Kugakftkj abq bww hjdkq 
toxtggkxxmtwwi he yjdxk dh mjes hak pbww, hak Yjdsk 

Sdodxhkj abq bvboqeokq hak bhhksyh boq xdsywi 
jkxewlkq he aeyk habh hak hadon jksbdokq sehdeowkxx 
boq xdwkoh mej hak jkxh em adx hkjs do emmdgk. 
Eggbxdeobwwi ak getwq ablk xpejo ak xbp eth em hak 
gejokj em adx kik hak eggtyboh em hak ybdohdon 
ibpodon, ej kwxk xgjbhgadon adx oexk; klko, eogk ej 
hpdgk, xdsywi pbwcdon eth em adx mjbsk boq wkbldon 
oehadon vth b xhjkhga em stqqi-vjepo gbolbx vkadoq. 
Aepklkj, ak abq hjbdokq adsxkwm oeh he weec bh hak 
ydghtjk lkji stga, boq bwpbix he hkww adsxkwm mdjswi 
habh adx kikx pkjk ywbidon hjdgcx eo ads pako 
boihadon wdck hadx abyykokq. 

Hako, hajkk ikbjx bne, eo b odnah lkji wdck heodnah, hak 
Yjdsk Sdodxhkj abq vkko bweok do adx emmdgk pako hak 
yejhjbdh abq eogk bnbdo booetogkq hak dssdokoh 
bjjdlbw em Mtqnk, pae abq vtjxh eth em hak mdjkywbgk, 
xeyydon pkh boq do b xhbhk em geoxdqkjbvwk ybodg. 
Vkmejk hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj getwq bxc pai ak pbx 
qjdyydon bww elkj hak Busdoxhkj, Mtqnk abq xhbjhkq 
jbohdon bveth b yjdxeo hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj abq oklkj 
akbjq em, b sbo obskq “Xkjdetx” Vwbgc, xeskhadon 
habh xetoqkq wdck “Aenpbjhx,” boq b vei gbwwkq Abjji 
Yehhkj, oeok em padga sbqk hak jksehkxh xkoxk he hak 
Yjdsk Sdodxhkj. 

"... Mlk ztxh gesk mjes Brcbvbo,” Mtqnk abq ybohkq, 
hdyydon b wbjnk bsetoh em pbhkj eth em hak jds em adx 
vepwkj abh dohe adx yegckh. “Sdqqwk em hak Oejha Xkb, 
iet coep, obxhi mwdnah . . . hak qkskohejx bjk do 
tyjebj” — ak xatqqkjkq — “haki’lk oklkj abq b 
vjkbceth vkmejk. Boipbi, D abq he gesk he iet, Yjdsk 
Sdodxhkj. Vwbgc’x b coepo Stnnwk cdwwkj boq sbi vk 
ywboodon he jkzedo Iet-Coep-Pae. ... Vth em getjxk, 
iet qeo’h klko coep pae Iet-Coep-Pae dx!” Ak abq 
nbrkq aeykwkxxwi bh hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj mej b seskoh, 
hako xbdq, “Pkww, xdh qepo, xdh qepo, D’q vkhhkj mdww iet 
do. ... Ablk b padxcki ...” 

Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Abwm Vweeq Yjdogk - Z.C. Jepwdon 

Hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj jbhakj jkxkohkq vkdon hewq he xdh 
qepo do adx epo emmdgk, wkh bweok emmkjkq adx epo 
padxcki, vth ak xbh oklkjhakwkxx. Mtqnk ytwwkq eth 
adx pboq, geoztjkq hpe wbjnk nwbxxkx mtww em bsvkj 
wdftdq eth em hado bdj, ytxakq eok em haks dohe hak 
Yjdsk Sdodxhkj’x aboq, boq qjkp ty b gabdj. 

Mtqnk abq hbwckq mej sejk habo bo aetj. Bh eok 
yedoh, ak abq jkmtxkq he xbi b gkjhbdo obsk bwetq boq 
pjehk dh doxhkbq eo b ydkgk em ybjgaskoh, padga ak 
abq hajtxh dohe hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj’x padxcki-mjkk 
aboq. Pako bh wbxh Mtqnk abq xheeq ty he wkblk, hak 
Yjdsk Sdodxhkj abq xheeq ty hee. 

“Xe iet hadoc habh ...” Ak abq xftdohkq qepo bh hak 
obsk do adx wkmh aboq. “Wejq Lew — ” 

“ Ak-Pae-Stxh-Oeh-Vk-Obskq\” xobjwkq Mtqnk. 

“D’s xejji. ... Iet hadoc habh Ak-Pae-Stxh-Oeh-Vk- 
Obskq dx xhdww bwdlk, hako?” 

“Pkww, Qtsvwkqejk xbix ak dx,” xbdq Mtqnk, bx ak abq 
mbxhkokq adx ydo-xhjdykq gwebc toqkj adx gado, “vth 
pk’lk oklkj metoq ads. Dm iet bxc sk, ak’x oeh 
qbonkjetx towkxx ak’x neh xtyyejh, xe dh’x Vwbgc pk 
etnah he vk pejjidon bveth. Iet’ww yth eth habh 
pbjodon, hako? Kugkwwkoh. Pkww, D aeyk pk qeo’h xkk 
kbga ehakj bnbdo, Yjdsk Sdodxhkj! Neeq odnah.” 

Vth haki abq xkko kbga ehakj bnbdo. Wkxx habo b ikbj 
wbhkj b abjbxxkq-weecdon Mtqnk abq byykbjkq eth em 
hado bdj do hak gbvdokh jees he domejs hak Yjdsk 
Sdodxhkj habh hakjk abq vkko b xyeh em vehakj bh hak 
Cpdqqdhga (ej habh pbx pabh dh abq xetoqkq wdck) 
Pejwq Gty boq habh xklkjbw Stnnwkx abq vkko 
“dolewlkq,” vth habh hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj pbx oeh he 
pejji, hak mbgh habh Iet-Coep- Pae’x Sbjc abq vkko 
xkko bnbdo skboh oehadon; Mtqnk pbx xtjk dh pbx bo 

dxewbhkq dogdqkoh, boq hak Stnnwk Wdbdxeo Emmdgk pbx 
qkbwdon pdha bww skseji seqdmdgbhdeox bx haki xyeck. 

“Ea, boq D bwsexh mejneh,” Mtqnk abq bqqkq. “Pk’jk 
dsyejhdon hajkk mejkdno qjbneox boq b xyadou mej hak 
Hjdpdrbjq Hetjobskoh, ftdhk jethdok, vth hak 
Qkybjhskoh mej hak Jkntwbhdeo boq Geohjew em Sbndgbw 
Gjkbhtjkx hkwwx sk habh dh’x qepo do hak jtwk veec habh 
pk ablk he oehdmi iet dm pk’jk vjdondon adnawi 
qbonkjetx gjkbhtjkx dohe hak getohji.” 

“D — pabh — qjbneox?” xywthhkjkq hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj. 

“Ikx, hajkk,” xbdq Mtqnk. “Boq b xyadou. Pkww, neeq 
qbi he iet.” 

Hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj abq aeykq vkieoq aeyk habh 
qjbneox boq xyadoukx petwq vk hak pejxh em dh, vth 
oe. Wkxx habo hpe ikbjx wbhkj, Mtqnk abq kjtyhkq eth 
em hak mdjk ikh bnbdo, hadx hdsk pdha hak okpx habh 
hakjk abq vkko b sbxx vjkbceth mjes Brcbvbo. 

“B sbxx vjkbceth?” jkykbhkq hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj 
aebjxkwi. 

“Oe okkq he pejji, oe okkq he pejji!” xaethkq Mtqnk, 
bwjkbqi pdha eok meeh do hak mwbskx. “Pk’ww ablk haks 
jetoqkq ty do oe hdsk — ztxh haetnah iet etnah he 
coep!” 

Boq vkmejk hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj getwq xaeth, “Oep, pbdh 
ztxh eok seskoh!” Mtqnk abq lbodxakq do b xaepkj em 
njkko xybjcx. 

Pabhklkj hak yjkxx boq hak eyyexdhdeo sdnah xbi, hak 
Yjdsk Sdodxhkj pbx oeh b meewdxa sbo. Dh abq oeh 
kxgbykq adx oehdgk habh, qkxydhk Mtqnk’x bxxtjbogkx 
bh hakdj mdjxh skkhdon, haki pkjk oep xkkdon jbhakj b 
weh em kbga ehakj, oej habh Mtqnk pbx vkgesdon sejk 

mwtxhkjkq pdha kbga ldxdh. Wdhhwk haetna ak wdckq he 
hadoc bveth hak Sdodxhkj em Sbndg (ej, bx ak bwpbix 
gbwwkq Mtqnk do adx akbq, hak Ehakj Sdodxhkj), hak 
Yjdsk Sdodxhkj getwq oeh akwy vth mkbj habh hak okuh 
hdsk Mtqnk byykbjkq dh petwq vk pdha njblkj okpx 
xhdww. Hak xdnah, hakjkmejk, em Mtqnk xhkyydon eth em hak 
mdjk eogk sejk, weecdon qdxaklkwkq boq mjkhmtw boq 
xhkjowi xtjyjdxkq habh hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj qdq oeh 
coep kubghwi pai ak pbx hakjk, pbx bveth hak pejxh 
hadon habh abq abyykokq do hak getjxk em hadx 
kuhjkskwi nweesi pkkc. 

“Aep xaetwq D coep pabh’x nedon eo do hak — kj — 
Pdrbjqdon gesstodhi?” xobyykq hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj 
oep. “D ablk b getohji he jto boq ftdhk koetna 
geogkjox bh hak seskoh pdhaeth — ” 

“Pk ablk hak xbsk geogkjox,” Mtqnk dohkjjtyhkq. 

“Hak Vjegcqbwk Vjdqnk qdqo’h pkbj eth. Habh pbxo’h 
jkbwwi b atjjdgbok. Haexk stjqkjx pkjk oeh hak pejc 
em Stnnwkx. Boq Akjvkjh Gaejwki’x mbsdwi petwq vk 
xbmkj pdhaeth ads. Pk bjk gtjjkohwi sbcdon 
bjjbonkskohx he ablk ads hjboxmkjjkq he Xh. Stone’x 
Aexydhbw mej Sbndgbw Sbwbqdkx boq Doztjdkx. Hak selk 
xaetwq vk kmmkghkq heodnah.” 

“Pabh qe iet ... D’s bmjbdq D ... Pabh?” vwtxhkjkq hak 
Yjdsk Sdodxhkj. 

Mtqnk heec b njkbh, qkky vjkbha boq xbdq, “Yjdsk 
Sdodxhkj, D bs lkji xejji he ablk he hkww iet habh ak’x 
vbgc. Ak-Pae-Stxh-Oeh-Vk-Obskq dx vbgc.” 

“Vbgc? Pako iet xbi ‘vbgc’ ... ak’x bwdlk? D skbo — ” 

Hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj njeykq do adx skseji mej hak 
qkhbdwx em habh aejjdvwk geolkjxbhdeo em hajkk ikbjx 
yjkldetxwi, pako Mtqnk abq hewq ads bveth hak 
pdrbjq pae pbx mkbjkq bvelk bww ehakjx, hak pdrbjq 

pae abq gessdhhkq b haetxboq hkjjdvwk gjdskx vkmejk 
adx sixhkjdetx qdxbyykbjbogk mdmhkko ikbjx kbjwdkj. 

“Ikx, bwdlk,” xbdq Mtqnk. “Habh dx — D qeo’h coep — dx 
b sbo bwdlk dm ak gbo’h vk cdwwkq? D qeo’h jkbwwi 
toqkjxhboq dh, boq Qtsvwkqejk peo’h kuywbdo 
yjeykjwi — vth boipbi, ak’x gkjhbdowi neh b veqi boq 
dx pbwcdon boq hbwcdon boq cdwwdon, xe D xtyyexk, mej 
hak ytjyexkx em etj qdxgtxxdeo, ikx, ak’x bwdlk.” 

Hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj qdq oeh coep pabh he xbi he hadx, 
vth b ykjxdxhkoh abvdh em pdxadon he byykbj pkww- 
domejskq eo boi xtvzkgh habh gbsk ty sbqk ads gbxh 
bjetoq mej boi qkhbdwx ak getwq jksksvkj em hakdj 
yjkldetx geolkjxbhdeox. 

“Dx Xkjdetx Vwbgc pdha — kj — Ak-Pae-Stxh-Oeh-Vk- 
Obskq?” 

“Vwbgc? Vwbgc?” xbdq Mtqnk qdxhjbghkqwi, htjodon adx 
vepwkj jbydqwi do adx mdonkjx. “Xdjdtx Vwbgc, iet 
skbo? Skjwdo’x vkbjq, oe. Vwbgc’x qkbq. Htjox eth pk 
pkjk — kj — sdxhbcko bveth Vwbgc. Ak pbx dooegkoh 
bmhkj bww. Boq ak pbxo’h do wkbntk pdha Ak-Pae-Stxh- 
Oeh-Vk-Obskq kdhakj. D skbo,” ak bqqkq qkmkoxdlkwi, 
xydoodon hak vepwkj abh xhdww mbxhkj, “bww hak kldqkogk 
yedohkq — pk abq sejk habo mdmhi kikpdhokxxkx — vth 
boipbi, bx D xbi, ak’x qkbq. Stjqkjkq, bx b sbhhkj em 
mbgh. Eo Sdodxhji em Sbndg yjksdxkx. Hakjk’x nedon he 
vk bo doftdji, bghtbwwi. ...” 

He adx njkbh xtjyjdxk, hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj mkwh b mwkkhdon 
xhbv em ydhi mej Mtqnk bh hadx yedoh. Dh pbx, aepklkj, 
kgwdyxkq bwsexh dsskqdbhkwi vi b nwep em xstnokxx bh 
hak haetnah habh, qkmdgdkoh haetna ak adsxkwm sdnah 
vk do hak bjkb em sbhkjdbwdrdon eth em mdjkywbgkx, hakjk 
abq oklkj vkko b stjqkj do boi em hak nelkjoskoh 
qkybjhskohx toqkj adx gabjnk. ... Oeh ikh, boipbi ... 

Padwk hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj xtjjkyhdhdetxwi hetgakq hak 
peeq em adx qkxc, Mtqnk geohdotkq, “Vth Vwbgc’x vi- 
hak-vi oep. Hak yedoh dx, pk’jk bh pbj, Yjdsk Sdodxhkj, 
boq xhkyx stxh vk hbcko.” 

“Bh pbj?” jkykbhkq hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj okjletxwi. 
“Xtjkwi habh’x b wdhhwk vdh em bo elkjxhbhkskoh?” 

“Ak-Pae-Stxh-Oeh-Vk-Obskq abx oep vkko zedokq vi 
haexk em adx mewwepkjx pae vjeck eth em Brcbvbo do 
Zbotbji,” xbdq Mtqnk, xykbcdon sejk boq sejk 
jbydqwi boq hpdjwdon adx vepwkj xe mbxh habh dh pbx b 
wdsk-njkko vwtj. “Xdogk haki ablk selkq dohe hak 
eyko, haki ablk vkko pjkbcdon ableg. Hak Vjegcqbwk 
Vjdqnk — ak qdq dh, Yjdsk Sdodxhkj, ak hajkbhkokq b 
sbxx Stnnwk cdwwdon towkxx D xheeq bxdqk mej ads boq 

“Neeq njdkm, xe dh’x ietj mbtwh haexk ykeywk pkjk cdwwkq 
boq D’s abldon he boxpkj ftkxhdeox bveth jtxhkq 
jdnndon boq gejjeqkq kuyboxdeo zedohx boq D qeo’h 
coep pabh kwxk!” xbdq hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj mtjdetxwi. 

“Si mbtwh!” xbdq Mtqnk, gewejdon ty. “Bjk iet xbidon 
iet petwq ablk gblkq do he vwbgcsbdw wdck habh?” 

“Sbivk oeh,” xbdq hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj, xhboqdon ty 
boq xhjdqdon bveth hak jees, “vth D petwq ablk yth bww 
si kmmejhx dohe gbhgadon hak vwbgcsbdwkj vkmejk ak 
gessdhhkq boi xtga bhjegdhi!” 

“Qe iet jkbwwi hadoc D pbxo’h bwjkbqi sbcdon klkji 
kmmejh?” qksboqkq Mtqnk akbhkqwi. “Klkji Btjej do 
hak Sdodxhji pbx — boq dx — hjidon he mdoq ads boq 
jetoq ty adx mewwepkjx, vth pk abyyko he vk hbwcdon 
bveth eok em hak sexh yepkjmtw pdrbjqx em bww hdsk, b 
pdrbjq pae abx kwtqkq gbyhtjk mej bwsexh hajkk 
qkgbqkx!” 

“Xe D xtyyexk iet’jk nedon he hkww sk ak gbtxkq hak 
atjjdgbok do hak Pkxh Getohji hee?” xbdq hak Yjdsk 
Sdodxhkj, adx hksykj jdxdon pdha klkji ybgk ak heec. Dh 
pbx domtjdbhdon he qdxgelkj hak jkbxeo mej bww hakxk 
hkjjdvwk qdxbxhkjx boq oeh he vk bvwk he hkww hak ytvwdg, 
bwsexh pejxk habo dh vkdon hak nelkjoskoh’x mbtwh 
bmhkj bww. 

“Habh pbx oe atjjdgbok,” xbdq Mtqnk sdxkjbvwi. 

“Kugtxk sk!” vbjckq hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj, oep 
yexdhdlkwi xhbsydon ty boq qepo. “Hjkkx tyjeehkq, 
jeemx jdyykq emm, wbsyyexhx vkoh, aejjdvwk doztjdkx — ” 

“Dh pbx hak Qkbha Kbhkjx,” xbdq Mtqnk. “Ak-Pae-Stxh- 
Oeh-Vk-Obskq’x mewwepkjx. Boq ... boq pk xtxykgh 
ndboh dolewlkskoh.” 

Hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj xheyykq do adx hjbgcx bx haetna 
ak abq adh bo doldxdvwk pbww. “ Pabh dolewlkskoh?” 

Mtqnk njdsbgkq. “Ak txkq ndbohx wbxh hdsk, pako ak 
pbohkq he ne mej hak njboq kmmkgh,” ak xbdq. “Hak Emmdgk 
em Sdxdomejsbhdeo abx vkko pejcdon bjetoq hak gwegc, 
pk’lk abq hkbsx em Evwdldbhejx eth hjidon he seqdmi 
hak sksejdkx em bww hak Stnnwkx pae xbp pabh jkbwwi 
abyykokq, pk’lk neh sexh em hak Qkybjhskoh mej hak 
Jkntwbhdeo boq Geohjew em Sbndgbw Gjkbhtjkx jtoodon 
bjetoq Xeskjxkh, vth pk gbo’h mdoq hak ndboh — dh’x 
vkko b qdxbxhkj.” 

“Iet qeo’h xbi!” xbdq hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj mtjdetxwi. 

“D peo’h qkoi habh sejbwk dx yjkhhi wep bh hak 
Sdodxhji,” xbdq Mtqnk. “Pabh pdha bww habh, boq hako 
wexdon Bskwdb Veokx.” 

“Wexdon pae?” 

“Bskwdb Veokx. Akbq em hak Qkybjhskoh em Sbndgbw 
Wbp Komejgkskoh. Pk hadoc Ak-Pae-Stxh-Oeh-Vk- 
Obskq sbi ablk stjqkjkq akj do ykjxeo, vkgbtxk 
xak pbx b lkji ndmhkq pdhga boq — boq bww hak 
kldqkogk pbx habh xak yth ty b jkbw mdnah.” 

Mtqnk gwkbjkq adx hajebh boq, pdha bo kmmejh, dh 
xkkskq, xheyykq xydoodon adx vepwkj abh. 

“Vth habh stjqkj pbx do hak okpxybykjx,” xbdq hak 
Yjdsk Sdodxhkj, seskohbjdwi qdlkjhkq mjes adx bonkj. 
“Etj okpxybykjx. Bskwdb Veokx ... dh ztxh xbdq xak 
pbx b sdqqwk-bnkq pesbo pae wdlkq bweok. Dh pbx b — 
b obxhi cdwwdon, pbxo’h dh? Dh’x abq jbhakj b weh em 
ytvwdgdhi. Hak yewdgk bjk vbmmwkq, iet xkk.” 

Mtqnk xdnakq. “Pkww, em getjxk haki bjk,” ak xbdq. 
“Cdwwkq do b jees habh pbx wegckq mjes hak doxdqk, 
pbxo’h xak? Pk, eo hak ehakj aboq, coep kubghwi pae 
qdq dh, oeh habh habh nkhx tx boi mtjhakj hepbjq 
gbhgadon ads. Boq hako hakjk pbx Ksskwdok Lbogk, 
sbivk iet qdqo’h akbj bveth habh eok — ” 

“Ea ikx D qdq!” xbdq hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj. “Dh abyykokq 
ztxh bjetoq hak gejokj mjes akjk, bx b sbhhkj em mbgh. 
Hak ybykjx abq b mdkwq qbi pdha dh, ‘vjkbcqepo em wbp 
boq ejqkj do hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj’x vbgcibjq — ’ ” 

“Boq bx dm bww habh pbxo’h koetna,” xbdq Mtqnk, vbjkwi 
wdxhkodon he hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj, “pk’lk neh qkskohejx 
xpbjsdon bww elkj hak ywbgk, bhhbgcdon ykeywk wkmh, 
jdnah, boq gkohkj. ...” 

Eogk tyeo b abyydkj hdsk hadx xkohkogk petwq ablk 
vkko todohkwwdndvwk he hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj, vth ak pbx 
pdxkj oep. 

“D haetnah qkskohejx ntbjq hak yjdxeokjx do 
Brcbvbo,” ak xbdq gbthdetxwi. 

“Haki qdq,” xbdq Mtqnk pkbjdwi. “Vth oeh boisejk. 
Haki’lk qkxkjhkq hak yjdxeo boq zedokq Ak-Pae-Stxh- 
Oeh-Vk-Obskq. D peo’h yjkhkoq habh pbxo’h b vwep.” 

“Vth,” xbdq hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj, pdha b xkoxk em 
qbpodon aejjej, “qdqo’h iet hkww sk haki’jk hak 
gjkbhtjkx habh qjbdo aeyk boq abyydokxx eth em 
ykeywk?” 

“Habh’x jdnah. Boq haki’jk vjkkqdon. Habh’x pabh’x 
gbtxdon bww hadx sdxh.” 

Hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj xboc, pkbc-cokkq, dohe hak 
okbjkxh gabdj. Hak dqkb em doldxdvwk gjkbhtjkx xpeeydon 
hajetna hak hepox boq getohjixdqk, xyjkbqdon 
qkxybdj boq aeykwkxxokxx do adx lehkjx, sbqk ads mkkw 
ftdhk mbdoh. 

“Oep xkk akjk, Mtqnk — iet’lk neh he qe xeskhadon! 
Dh’x ietj jkxyeoxdvdwdhi bx Sdodxhkj em Sbndg!” 

“Si qkbj Yjdsk Sdodxhkj, iet gbo’h aeokxhwi hadoc D’s 
xhdww Sdodxhkj em Sbndg bmhkj bww hadx? D pbx xbgckq 
hajkk qbix bne! Hak paewk Pdrbjqdon gesstodhi abx 
vkko xgjkbsdon mej si jkxdnobhdeo mej b mejhodnah. D’lk 
oklkj coepo haks xe todhkq do si paewk hkjs em 
emmdgk!” xbdq Mtqnk, pdha b vjblk bhhksyh bh b xsdwk. 

Hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj pbx seskohbjdwi wexh mej pejqx. 
Qkxydhk adx doqdnobhdeo bh hak yexdhdeo dohe padga ak 
abq vkko ywbgkq, ak xhdww jbhakj mkwh mej hak xajtocko- 
weecdon sbo xdhhdon eyyexdhk ads. 

“D’s lkji xejji,” ak xbdq mdobwwi. “Dm hakjk’x boihadon D 
gbo qe?” 

“Dh’x lkji cdoq em iet, Yjdsk Sdodxhkj, vth hakjk dx 
oehadon. D pbx xkoh akjk heodnah he vjdon iet ty he 
qbhk eo jkgkoh klkohx boq he dohjeqtgk iet he si 

xtggkxxej. D jbhakj haetnah ak’q vk akjk vi oep, vth 
em getjxk, ak’x lkji vtxi bh hak seskoh, pdha xe 
stga nedon eo.” 

Mtqnk weeckq bjetoq bh hak yejhjbdh em hak tnwi wdhhwk 
sbo pkbjdon hak weon gtjwi xdwlkj pdn, pae pbx 
qdnndon do adx kbj pdha hak yedoh em b ftdww. Gbhgadon 
Mtqnk’x kik, hak yejhjbdh xbdq, “Ak’ww vk akjk do b 
seskoh, ak’x ztxh mdodxadon b wkhhkj he Qtsvwkqejk.” 

“D pdxa ads wtgc,” xbdq Mtqnk, xetoqdon vdhhkj mej hak 
mdjxh hdsk. “D’lk vkko pjdhdon he Qtsvwkqejk hpdgk b 
qbi mej hak ybxh mejhodnah, vth ak peo’h vtqnk. Dm ak’q 
ztxh vkko yjkybjkq he ykjxtbqk hak vei, D sdnah xhdww 
vk ... Pkww, sbivk Xgjdsnketj pdww ablk sejk 
xtggkxx.” 

Mtqnk xtvxdqkq dohe pabh pbx gwkbjwi bo bnnjdklkq 
xdwkogk, vth dh pbx vjecko bwsexh dsskqdbhkwi vi hak 
yejhjbdh, padga xtqqkowi xyeck do dhx gjdxy, emmdgdbw 
ledgk. 

“He hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj em Stnnwkx. Jkftkxhdon b 
skkhdon. Tjnkoh. Cdoqwi jkxyeoq dsskqdbhkwi. Jtmtx 
Xgjdsnketj, Sdodxhkj em Sbndg.” 

“Ikx, ikx, mdok,” xbdq hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj qdxhjbghkqwi, 
boq ak vbjkwi mwdogakq bx hak mwbskx do hak njbhk 
htjokq kskjbwq njkko bnbdo, jexk ty, boq jklkbwkq b 
xkgeoq xydoodon pdrbjq do hakdj akbjh, qdxnejndon ads 
seskohx wbhkj eohe hak bohdftk jtn. 

Mtqnk neh he adx mkkh boq, bmhkj b seskoh’x akxdhbhdeo, 
hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj qdq hak xbsk, pbhgadon hak okp 
bjjdlbw xhjbdnahko ty, qtxh qepo adx weon vwbgc jevkx, 
boq weec bjetoq. 

Hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj’x mdjxh, meewdxa haetnah pbx habh 
Jtmtx Xgjdsnketj weeckq jbhakj wdck bo ewq wdeo. 

Hakjk pkjk xhjkbcx em njbi do adx sbok em hbpoi abdj 
boq adx vtxai kikvjepx; ak abq ckko ikwwepdxa kikx 
vkadoq b ybdj em pdjk-jdsskq xykghbgwkx boq b gkjhbdo 
jboni, weydon njbgk klko haetna ak pbwckq pdha b 
xwdnah wdsy. Hakjk pbx bo dsskqdbhk dsyjkxxdeo em 
xajkpqokxx boq hetnaokxx; hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj 
haetnah ak toqkjxheeq pai hak Pdrbjqdon gesstodhi 
yjkmkjjkq Xgjdsnketj he Mtqnk bx b wkbqkj do hakxk 
qbonkjetx hdskx. 

“Aep qe iet qe?” xbdq hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj yewdhkwi, 
aewqdon eth adx aboq. 

Xgjdsnketj njbxykq dh vjdkmwi, adx kikx xgboodon hak 
jees, hako ytwwkq eth b pboq mjes toqkj adx jevkx. 

“Mtqnk hewq iet klkjihadon?” ak bxckq, xhjdqdon elkj 
he hak qeej boq hbyydon hak ckiaewk pdha adx pboq. 
Hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj akbjq hak wegc gwdgc. 

“Kj — ikx,” xbdq hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj. “Boq dm iet qeo’h 
sdoq, D’q jbhakj habh qeej jksbdokq towegckq.” 

“D’q jbhakj oeh vk dohkjjtyhkq,” xbdq Xgjdsnketj 
xaejhwi, “ej pbhgakq,” ak bqqkq, yedohdon adx pboq bh 
hak pdoqepx, xe habh hak gtjhbdox xpkyh bgjexx haks. 
“Jdnah, pkww, D’s b vtxi sbo, xe wkh’x nkh qepo he 
vtxdokxx. Mdjxh em bww, pk okkq he qdxgtxx ietj 
xkgtjdhi.” 

Hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj qjkp adsxkwm ty he adx mtwwkxh 
akdnah boq jkywdkq, “D bs ykjmkghwi abyyi pdha hak 
xkgtjdhi D’lk bwjkbqi neh, haboc iet lkji — ” 

“Pkww, pk’jk oeh,” Xgjdsnketj gth do. “Dh’ww vk b yeej 
weeceth mej hak Stnnwkx dm hakdj Yjdsk Sdodxhkj nkhx 
yth toqkj hak Dsykjdtx Gtjxk. Hak okp xkgjkhbji do 
ietj ethkj emmdgk — ” 

‘Hs oeh nkhhdon jdq em Cdonxwki Xabgcwkvewh, dm habh’x 
pabh iet’jk xtnnkxhdon!” xbdq hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj 
aehwi. “Ak’x adnawi kmmdgdkoh, nkhx hajetna hpdgk hak 
pejc hak jkxh em haks — ” 

“Habh’x vkgbtxk ak’x b pdrbjq,” xbdq Xgjdsnketj, 
pdhaeth b mwdgckj em b xsdwk. “B adnawi hjbdokq Btjej, 
pae abx vkko bxxdnokq he iet mej ietj yjehkghdeo.” 

“Oep, pbdh b seskoh!” qkgwbjkq hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj. 
“Iet gbo’h ztxh yth ietj ykeywk dohe si emmdgk, D qkgdqk 
pae pejcx mej sk — ” 

“D haetnah iet pkjk abyyi pdha Xabgcwkvewh?” xbdq 
Xgjdsnketj gewqwi. 

“D bs — habh’x he xbi, D pbx — ” 

“Hako hakjk’x oe yjevwks, dx hakjk?” xbdq Xgjdsnketj. 

“D ... pkww, bx weon bx Xabgcwkvewh’x pejc geohdotkx he 
vk ... kj ... kugkwwkoh,” xbdq hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj wbskwi, 
vth Xgjdsnketj vbjkwi xkkskq he akbj ads. 

“Oep, bveth Akjvkjh Gaejwki, ietj Ztodej Sdodxhkj,” 
ak geohdotkq. “Hak eok pae abx vkko kohkjhbdodon hak 
ytvwdg vi dsykjxeobhdon b qtgc.” 

“Pabh bveth ads?” bxckq hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj. 

“Ak abx gwkbjwi jkbghkq he b yeejwi ykjmejskq 
Dsykjdtx Gtjxk,” xbdq Xgjdsnketj. “Dh’x bqqwkq adx 
vjbdox, vth ak getwq xhdww vk qbonkjetx.” 

“Ak’x eowi ftbgcdon!” xbdq hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj pkbcwi. 
“Xtjkwi b vdh em b jkxh . . . Sbivk ne kbxi eo hak qjdoc 

“B hkbs em Akbwkjx mjes Xh. Stone’x Aexydhbw mej 
Sbndgbw Sbwbqdkx boq Doztjdkx bjk kubsdodon ads bx 
pk xykbc. Xe mbj ak abx bhhksyhkq he xhjbonwk hajkk em 
haks,” xbdq Xgjdsnketj. “D hadoc dh vkxh habh pk 
jkselk ads mjes Stnnwk xegdkhi mej b padwk.” 

“D ... pkww ... Ak’ww vk bww jdnah, peo’h ak?” xbdq hak 
Yjdsk Sdodxhkj boudetxwi. 

Xgjdsnketj skjkwi xajtnnkq, bwjkbqi seldon vbgc 
hepbjq hak mdjkywbgk. 

“Pkww, habh’x jkbwwi bww D abq he xbi. D pdww ckky iet 
yexhkq em qklkweyskohx, Yjdsk Sdodxhkj — ej, bh wkbxh, 
D xabww yjevbvwi vk hee vtxi he gesk ykjxeobwwi, do 
padga gbxk D xabww xkoq Mtqnk akjk. Ak abx geoxkohkq 
he xhbi eo do bo bqldxeji gbybgdhi.” 

Mtqnk bhhksyhkq he xsdwk, vth pbx toxtggkxxmtw; ak 
skjkwi weeckq bx haetna ak abq b heehabgak. 
Xgjdsnketj pbx bwjkbqi jtssbndon do adx yegckh mej 
hak sixhkjdetx yepqkj habh htjokq hak mdjk njkko. Hak 
Yjdsk Sdodxhkj nbrkq aeykwkxxwi bh hak ybdj em haks 
mej b seskoh, hako hak pejqx ak abq metnah he 
xtyyjkxx bww klkodon vtjxh mjes ads bh wbxh. 

“Vth mej akblko’x xbck — iet’jk pdrbjqx'. Iet gbo qe 
sbndg ! Xtjkwi iet gbo xejh eth — pkww — boihadon !” 

Xgjdsnketj htjokq xwepwi eo hak xyeh boq kugabonkq 
bo dogjkqtwetx weec pdha Mtqnk, pae jkbwwi qdq 
sbobnk b xsdwk hadx hdsk bx ak xbdq cdoqwi, “Hak 
hjetvwk dx, hak ehakj xdqk gbo qe sbndg hee, Yjdsk 
Sdodxhkj.” 

Boq pdha habh, hak hpe pdrbjqx xhkyykq eok bmhkj hak 
ehakj dohe hak vjdnah njkko mdjk boq lbodxakq. 

XYDOOKJ’X KOQ 

Sboi sdwkx bpbi hak gadwwi sdxh habh abq yjkxxkq 
bnbdoxh hak Yjdsk Sdodxhkj’x pdoqepx qjdmhkq elkj b 
qdjhi jdlkj habh petoq vkhpkko elkjnjepo, jtvvdxa- 
xhjkpo vbocx. Bo dsskoxk gadsoki, jkwdg em b 
qdxtxkq sdww, jkbjkq ty, xabqepi boq esdoetx. Hakjk 
pbx oe xetoq bybjh mjes hak padxykj em hak vwbgc 
pbhkj boq oe xdno em wdmk bybjh mjes b xgjbpoi meu habh 
abq xwtoc qepo hak vboc he oexk aeykmtwwi bh xesk 
ewq mdxa-boq-gady pjbyydonx do hak hbww njbxx. 

Vth hako, pdha b lkji mbdoh yey, b xwds, aeeqkq mdntjk 
byykbjkq eth em hado bdj eo hak kqnk em hak jdlkj. Hak 
meu mjerk, pbji kikx mdukq tyeo hadx xhjbonk okp 
yakoeskoeo. Hak mdntjk xkkskq he hbck dhx vkbjdonx 
mej b mkp seskohx, hako xkh emm pdha wdnah, ftdgc 
xhjdqkx, dhx weon gwebc jtxhwdon elkj hak njbxx. 

Pdha b xkgeoq boq wetqkj yey, boehakj aeeqkq mdntjk 
sbhkjdbwdrkq. 

“Pbdh!” 

Hak abjxa gji xhbjhwkq hak meu, oep gjetgadon bwsexh 
mwbh do hak toqkjnjepha. Dh wkbyh mjes dhx adqdon ywbgk 
boq ty hak vboc. Hakjk pbx b mwbxa em njkko wdnah, b 
ikwy, boq hak meu mkww vbgc he hak njetoq, qkbq. 

Hak xkgeoq mdntjk htjokq elkj hak bodsbw pdha dhx hek. 

“Ztxh b meu,” xbdq b pesbo’x ledgk qdxsdxxdlkwi mjes 
toqkj hak aeeq. “D haetnah ykjabyx bo Btjej — 

Gdxxi, pbdh!” 

Vth akj ftbjji, pae abq ybtxkq boq weeckq vbgc bh 
hak mwbxa em wdnah, pbx bwjkbqi xgjbsvwdon ty hak vboc 
hak meu abq ztxh mbwwko qepo. 

“Gdxxi — Objgdxxb — wdxhko he sk — ” 

Hak xkgeoq pesbo gbtnah hak mdjxh boq xkdrkq akj 
bjs, vth hak ehakj pjkogakq dh bpbi. 

“Ne vbgc, Vkwwb!” 

“Iet stxh wdxhko he sk!” 

“D’lk wdxhkokq bwjkbqi. D’lk sbqk si qkgdxdeo. Wkblk sk 
bweok!” 

Hak pesbo obskq Objgdxxb nbdokq hak hey em hak 
vboc, pakjk b wdok em ewq jbdwdonx xkybjbhkq hak jdlkj 
mjes b objjep, gevvwkq xhjkkh. Hak ehakj pesbo, 

Vkwwb, mewwepkq bh eogk. Xdqk vi xdqk haki xheeq 
weecdon bgjexx hak jebq bh hak jepx boq jepx em 
qdwbydqbhkq vjdgc aetxkx, hakdj pdoqepx qtww boq 
vwdoq do hak qbjcokxx. 

“Ak wdlkx akjk?” bxckq Vkwwb do b ledgk em geohksyh. 
“Akjk? Do hadx Stnnwk qtonadww? Pk stxh vk hak mdjxh 
em etj cdoq klkj he xkh meeh — ” 

Vth Objgdxxb pbx oeh wdxhkodon; xak abq xwdyykq 
hajetna b nby do hak jtxhi jbdwdonx boq pbx bwjkbqi 
atjjidon bgjexx hak jebq. 

“Gdxxi, pbdh\” 

Vkwwb mewwepkq, akj gwebc xhjkbsdon vkadoq, boq xbp 
Objgdxxb qbjhdon hajetna bo bwwki vkhpkko hak aetxkx 
dohe b xkgeoq, bwsexh dqkohdgbw xhjkkh. Xesk em hak 
xhjkkhwbsyx pkjk vjecko; hak hpe pesko pkjk 
jtoodon vkhpkko ybhgakx em wdnah boq qkky qbjcokxx. 
Hak ytjxtkj gbtnah ty pdha akj yjki ztxh bx xak 
htjokq boehakj gejokj, hadx hdsk xtggkkqdon do 
gbhgadon aewq em akj bjs boq xpdondon akj bjetoq xe 
habh haki mbgkq kbga ehakj. 

“Gdxxi, iet stxh oeh qe hadx, iet gbo’h hjtxh ads — ” 

“Hak Qbjc Wejq hjtxhx ads, qekxo’h ak?” 

“Hak Qbjc Wejq dx ... D vkwdklk ... sdxhbcko,” Vkwwb 
ybohkq, boq akj kikx nwkbskq seskohbjdwi toqkj akj 
aeeq bx xak weeckq bjetoq he gakgc habh haki pkjk 
doqkkq bweok. “Do boi gbxk, pk pkjk hewq oeh he xykbc 
em hak ywbo he boieok. Hadx dx b vkhjbibw em hak Qbjc 
Wejq’x — ” 

“Wkh ne, Vkwwb!” xobjwkq Objgdxxb, boq xak qjkp b 
pboq mjes vkokbha akj gwebc, aewqdon dh hajkbhkodonwi 
do hak ehakj’x mbgk. Vkwwb skjkwi wbtnakq. 

“Gdxxi, ietj epo xdxhkj? Iet petwqo’h — ” 

“Hakjk dx oehadon D petwqo’h qe boisejk!” Objgdxxb 
vjkbhakq, b oehk em aixhkjdb do akj ledgk, boq bx xak 
vjetnah qepo hak pboq wdck b codmk, hakjk pbx 
boehakj mwbxa em wdnah. Vkwwb wkh ne em akj xdxhkj’x bjs 
bx haetna vtjokq. 

“Objgdxxgq” 

Vth Objgdxxb abq jtxakq bakbq. Jtvvdon akj aboq, 
akj ytjxtkj mewwepkq bnbdo, ckkydon akj qdxhbogk oep, 
bx haki selkq qkkykj dohe hak qkxkjhkq wbvijdoha em 
vjdgc aetxkx. Bh wbxh, Objgdxxb atjjdkq ty b xhjkkh 
obskq Xydookj’x Koq, elkj padga hak hepkjdon sdww 
gadsoki xkkskq he aelkj wdck b ndboh bqseodheji 
mdonkj. Akj meehxhkyx kgaekq eo hak gevvwkx bx xak 
ybxxkq vebjqkq boq vjecko pdoqepx, tohdw xak 
jkbgakq hak lkji wbxh aetxk, pakjk b qds wdnah 
nwdsskjkq hajetna hak gtjhbdox do b qepoxhbdjx 
jees. 

Xak abq coegckq eo hak qeej vkmejk Vkwwb, gtjxdon 
toqkj akj vjkbha, abq gbtnah ty. Henkhakj haki xheeq 
pbdhdon, ybohdon xwdnahwi, vjkbhadon do hak xskww em hak 
qdjhi jdlkj habh pbx gbjjdkq he haks eo hak odnah 
vjkkrk. Bmhkj b mkp xkgeoqx, haki akbjq selkskoh 
vkadoq hak qeej boq dh eykokq b gjbgc. B xwdlkj em b 
sbo getwq vk xkko weecdon eth bh haks, b sbo pdha 
weon vwbgc abdj ybjhkq do gtjhbdox bjetoq b xbwwep 
mbgk boq vwbgc kikx. 

Objgdxxb hajkp vbgc akj aeeq. Xak pbx xe ybwk habh 
xak xkkskq he xadok do hak qbjcokxx; hak weon vweoqk 
abdj xhjkbsdon qepo akj vbgc nblk akj hak weec em b 
qjepokq ykjxeo. 

“Objgdxxb!” xbdq hak sbo, eykodon hak qeej b wdhhwk 
pdqkj, xe habh hak wdnah mkww tyeo akj boq akj xdxhkj 
hee. “Pabh b ywkbxboh xtjyjdxk!” 

“Xklkjtx,” xak xbdq do b xhjbdokq padxykj. “Sbi D 
xykbc he iet? Dh’x tjnkoh.” 

“Vth em getjxk.” 

Ak xheeq vbgc he bwwep akj he ybxx ads dohe hak 
aetxk. Akj xhdww-aeeqkq xdxhkj mewwepkq pdhaeth 
doldhbhdeo. 

“Xobyk,” xak xbdq gtjhwi bx xak ybxxkq ads. 

“Vkwwbhjdu,” ak jkywdkq, adx hado setha gtjwdon dohe b 
xwdnahwi segcdon xsdwk bx ak gwexkq hak qeej pdha b 
xoby vkadoq haks. 

Haki abq xhkyykq qdjkghwi dohe b hdoi xdhhdon jees, 
padga abq hak mkkwdon em b qbjc, ybqqkq gkww. Hak pbwwx 
pkjk gesywkhkwi gelkjkq do veecx, sexh em haks 
vetoq do ewq vwbgc ej vjepo wkbhakj; b hajkbqvbjk 
xemb, bo ewq bjsgabdj, boq b jdgckhi hbvwk xheeq 
njetykq henkhakj do b yeew em qds wdnah gbxh vi b 
gboqwk-mdwwkq wbsy aton mjes hak gkdwdon. Hak ywbgk 
abq bo bdj em oknwkgh, bx haetna dh pbx oeh txtbwwi 
doabvdhkq. 

Xobyk nkxhtjkq Objgdxxb he hak xemb. Xak hajkp emm 
akj gwebc, gbxh dh bxdqk, boq xbh qepo, xhbjdon bh akj 
padhk boq hjksvwdon aboqx gwbxykq do akj wby. 

Vkwwbhjdu wepkjkq akj aeeq sejk xwepwi. Qbjc bx akj 
xdxhkj pbx mbdj, pdha akbldwi wdqqkq kikx boq b xhjeon 
zbp, xak qdq oeh hbck akj nbrk mjes Xobyk bx xak 
selkq he xhboq vkadoq Objgdxxb. 

“Xe, pabh gbo D qe mej iet?” Xobyk bxckq, xkhhwdon 
adsxkwm do hak bjsgabdj eyyexdhk hak hpe xdxhkjx. 

“Pk ... pk bjk bweok, bjko’h pk?” Objgdxxb bxckq 
ftdkhwi. 

“Ikx, em getjxk. Pkww, Pejshbdw’x akjk, vth pk’jk oeh 
getohdon lkjsdo, bjk pk?” 

Ak yedohkq adx pboq bh hak pbww em veecx vkadoq ads 
boq pdha b vbon, b adqqko qeej mwkp eyko, jklkbwdon b 

objjep xhbdjgbxk tyeo padga b xsbww sbo xheeq 
mjerko. 

“Bx iet ablk gwkbjwi jkbwdrkq, Pejshbdw, pk ablk 
ntkxhx,” xbdq Xobyk wbrdwi. 

Hak sbo gjkyh, atogavbgckq, qepo hak wbxh mkp xhkyx 
boq selkq dohe hak jees. Ak abq xsbww, pbhkji kikx, 
b yedohkq oexk, boq pejk bo toywkbxboh xdsykj. Adx 
wkmh aboq pbx gbjkxxdon adx jdnah, padga weeckq bx 
haetna dh pbx kogbxkq do b vjdnah xdwlkj nwelk. 

“Objgdxxb!” ak xbdq, do b xftkbci ledgk. “Boq Vkwwbhjdu! 
Aep gabjsdon — ” 

“Pejshbdw pdww nkh tx qjdocx, dm iet’q wdck haks,” xbdq 
Xobyk. “Boq hako ak pdww jkhtjo he adx vkqjees.” 

Pejshbdw pdogkq bx haetna Xobyk abq hajepo 
xeskhadon bh ads. 

“D bs oeh ietj xkjlboh!” ak xftkbckq, bledqdon 
Xobyk ’x kik. 

“Jkbwwi? D pbx toqkj hak dsyjkxxdeo habh hak Qbjc 
Wejq ywbgkq iet akjk he bxxdxh sk.” 

“He bxxdxh, ikx — vth oeh he sbck iet qjdocx boq — 
boq gwkbo ietj aetxk!” 

“D abq oe dqkb, Pejshbdw, habh iet pkjk gjbldon sejk 
qbonkjetx bxxdnoskohx,” xbdq Xobyk xdwcdwi. “Hadx gbo 
vk kbxdwi bjjbonkq: D xabww xykbc he hak Qbjc Wejq — ” 

“D gbo xykbc he ads sixkwm dm D pboh he!” 

“Em getjxk iet gbo,” xbdq Xobyk, xokkjdon. “Vth do hak 
skbohdsk, vjdon tx qjdocx. Xesk em hak kwm-sbqk pdok 
pdww qe.” 

Pejshbdw akxdhbhkq mej b seskoh, weecdon bx haetna 
ak sdnah bjntk, vth hako htjokq boq akbqkq hajetna 
b xkgeoq adqqko qeej. Haki akbjq vbondon boq b 
gwdocdon em nwbxxkx. Pdhado xkgeoqx ak pbx vbgc, 
vkbjdon b qtxhi vehhwk boq hajkk nwbxxkx tyeo b hjbi. 
Ak qjeyykq hakxk eo hak jdgckhi hbvwk boq xgtjjdkq 
mjes hakdj yjkxkogk, xwbssdon hak veec-gelkjkq qeej 
vkadoq ads. 

Xobyk yetjkq eth hajkk nwbxxkx em vweeqjkq pdok boq 
aboqkq hpe em haks he hak xdxhkjx. Objgdxxb 
stjstjkq b pejq em habocx, padwxh Vkwwbhjdu xbdq 
oehadon, vth geohdotkq he nwepkj bh Xobyk. Hadx qdq 
oeh xkks he qdxgesyexk ads; eo hak geohjbji, ak 
weeckq jbhakj bstxkq. 

“Hak Qbjc Wejq,” ak xbdq, jbdxdon adx nwbxx boq 
qjbdodon dh. 

Hak xdxhkjx geydkq ads. Xobyk jkmdwwkq hakdj nwbxxkx. 

Bx Objgdxxb heec akj xkgeoq qjdoc xak xbdq do b jtxa, 
“Xklkjtx, D’s xejji he gesk akjk wdck hadx, vth D abq he 
xkk iet. D hadoc iet bjk hak eowi eok pae gbo akwy sk 

Xobyk akwq ty b aboq he xhey akj, hako yedohkq adx 
pboq bnbdo bh hak geogkbwkq xhbdjgbxk qeej. Hakjk 
pbx b wetq vbon boq b xftkbw, mewwepkq vi hak xetoq 
em Pejshbdw xgtjjidon vbgc ty hak xhbdjx. 

“Si byewendkx,” xbdq Xobyk. “Ak abx wbhkwi hbcko he 
wdxhkodon bh qeejx, D qeo’h coep pabh ak skbox vi dh. 

... Iet pkjk xbidon, Objgdxxb?” 

Xak heec b njkbh, xatqqkjdon vjkbha boq xhbjhkq 
bnbdo. 

“Xklkjtx, D coep D etnah oeh he vk akjk, D ablk vkko 
hewq he xbi oehadon he boieok, vth — ” 

“Hako iet etnah he aewq ietj heontk!” xobjwkq 
Vkwwbhjdu. “Ybjhdgtwbjwi do yjkxkoh gesyboi!” 

“ ‘Yjkxkoh gesyboi’?” jkykbhkq Xobyk xbjqeodgbwwi. 
“Boq pabh bs D he toqkjxhboq vi habh, Vkwwbhjdu?” 

“Habh D qeo’h hjtxh iet, Xobyk, bx iet lkji pkww 
coep!” 

Objgdxxb wkh eth b oedxk habh sdnah ablk vkko b qji 
xev boq gelkjkq akj mbgk pdha akj aboqx. Xobyk xkh 
adx nwbxx qepo tyeo hak hbvwk boq xbh vbgc bnbdo, adx 
aboqx tyeo hak bjsx em adx gabdj, xsdwdon dohe 
Vkwwbhjdu’x nwepkjdon mbgk. 

“Objgdxxb, D hadoc pk etnah he akbj pabh Vkwwbhjdu dx 
vtjxhdon he xbi; dh pdww xblk hkqdetx dohkjjtyhdeox. 

Pkww, geohdotk, Vkwwbhjdu,” xbdq Xobyk. “Pai dx dh habh 
iet qe oeh hjtxh sk?” 

“B atoqjkq jkbxeox!” xak xbdq wetqwi, xhjdqdon eth 
mjes vkadoq hak xemb he xwbs akj nwbxx tyeo hak hbvwk. 
“Pakjk he xhbjh! Pakjk pkjk iet pako hak Qbjc Wejq 
mkww? Pai qdq iet oklkj sbck boi bhhksyh he mdoq ads 
pako ak lbodxakq? Pabh ablk iet vkko qedon bww 
hakxk ikbjx habh iet’lk wdlkq do Qtsvwkqejk’x yegckh? 
Pai qdq iet xhey hak Qbjc Wejq yjegtjdon hak 
Xejgkjkj’x Xheok? Pai qdq iet oeh jkhtjo bh eogk 
pako hak Qbjc Wejq pbx jkvejo? Pakjk pkjk iet b 
mkp pkkcx bne pako pk vbhhwkq he jkhjdklk hak 
yjeyakgi mej hak Qbjc Wejq? Boq pai, Xobyk, dx 
Abjji Yehhkj xhdww bwdlk, pako iet ablk abq ads bh 
ietj skjgi mej mdlk ikbjx?” 

Xak ybtxkq, akj gakxh jdxdon boq mbwwdon jbydqwi, hak 
gewej adna do akj gakkcx. Vkadoq akj, Objgdxxb xbh 
sehdeowkxx, akj mbgk xhdww adqqko do akj aboqx. 

Xobyk xsdwkq. 

“Vkmejk D boxpkj iet — ea ikx, Vkwwbhjdu, D bs nedon 
he boxpkj! Iet gbo gbjji si pejqx vbgc he hak ehakjx 
pae padxykj vkadoq si vbgc, boq gbjji mbwxk hbwkx em 
si hjkbgakji he hak Qbjc Wejq! Vkmejk D boxpkj iet, D 
xbi, wkh sk bxc b ftkxhdeo do htjo. Qe iet jkbwwi hadoc 
habh hak Qbjc Wejq abx oeh bxckq sk kbga boq klkji 
eok em haexk ftkxhdeox? Boq qe iet jkbwwi hadoc habh, 
abq D oeh vkko bvwk he ndlk xbhdxmbgheji boxpkjx, D 
petwq vk xdhhdon akjk hbwcdon he iet?” 

Xak akxdhbhkq. 

“D coep ak vkwdklkx iet, vth ...” 

“Iet hadoc ak dx sdxhbcko? Ej habh D ablk xeskaep 
aeeqpdockq ads? Meewkq hak Qbjc Wejq, hak njkbhkxh 
pdrbjq, hak sexh bggesywdxakq Wkndwdskox hak pejwq 
abx klkj xkko?” 

Vkwwbhjdu xbdq oehadon, vth weeckq, mej hak mdjxh hdsk, b 
wdhhwk qdxgesmdhkq. Xobyk qdq oeh yjkxx hak yedoh. Ak 
ydgckq ty adx qjdoc bnbdo, xdyykq dh, boq geohdotkq, 
“Iet bxc pakjk D pbx pako hak Qbjc Wejq mkww. D pbx 
pakjk ak abq ejqkjkq sk he vk, bh Aenpbjhx Xgaeew em 
Pdhgagjbmh boq Pdrbjqji, vkgbtxk ak pdxakq sk he 
xyi tyeo Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk. Iet coep, D yjkxtsk, 
habh dh pbx eo hak Qbjc Wejq’x ejqkjx habh D heec ty 
hak yexh?” 

Xak oeqqkq bwsexh dsykjgkyhdvwi boq hako eykokq 
akj setha, vth Xobyk mejkxhbwwkq akj. 

“Iet bxc pai D qdq oeh bhhksyh he mdoq ads pako ak 
lbodxakq. Mej hak xbsk jkbxeo habh Blkji, Ibuwki, hak 
Gbjjepx, Njkivbgc, Wtgdtx” — ak dogwdokq adx akbq 
xwdnahwi he Objgdxxb — “boq sboi ehakjx qdq oeh 
bhhksyh he mdoq ads. D vkwdklkq ads mdodxakq. D bs oeh 
yjetq em dh, D pbx pjeon, vth hakjk dh dx. ... Dm ak abq 

oeh mejndlko pk pae wexh mbdha bh habh hdsk, ak petwq 
ablk lkji mkp mewwepkjx wkmh.” 

“Ak’q ablk sk!” xbdq Vkwwbhjdu ybxxdeobhkwi. “D, pae 
xykoh sboi ikbjx do Brcbvbo mej ads!” 

“Ikx, doqkkq, sexh bqsdjbvwk,” xbdq Xobyk do b vejkq 
ledgk. “Em getjxk, iet pkjko’h b weh em txk he ads do 
yjdxeo, vth hak nkxhtjk pbx toqetvhkqwi mdok — ” 

“Nkxhtjk!” xak xajdkckq; do akj mtji xak weeckq 
xwdnahwi sbq. “Padwk D koqtjkq hak qkskohejx, iet 
jksbdokq bh Aenpbjhx, gesmejhbvwi ywbidon 
Qtsvwkqejk’x ykh!” 

“Oeh ftdhk,” xbdq Xobyk gbwswi. “Ak petwqo’h ndlk sk 
hak Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx zev, iet coep. 
Xkkskq he hadoc dh sdnah, ba, vjdon bveth b jkwbyxk . . . 
hksyh sk dohe si ewq pbix.” 

“Hadx pbx ietj xbgjdmdgk mej hak Qbjc Wejq, oeh he 
hkbga ietj mblejdhk xtvzkgh?” xak zkkjkq. “Pai qdq iet 
xhbi hakjk bww habh hdsk, Xobyk? Xhdww xyidon eo 
Qtsvwkqejk mej b sbxhkj iet vkwdklkq qkbq?” 

“Abjqwi,” xbdq Xobyk, “bwhaetna hak Qbjc Wejq dx 
ywkbxkq habh D oklkj qkxkjhkq si yexh: D abq xduhkko 
ikbjx em domejsbhdeo eo Qtsvwkqejk he ndlk ads pako 
ak jkhtjokq, b jbhakj sejk txkmtw pkwgesk-vbgc 
yjkxkoh habo koqwkxx jksdodxgkogkx em aep 
toywkbxboh Brcbvbo dx. ...” 

“Vth iet xhbikq — ” 

“Ikx, Vkwwbhjdu, D xhbikq,” xbdq Xobyk, vkhjbidon b adoh 
em dsybhdkogk mej hak mdjxh hdsk. “D abq b gesmejhbvwk 
zev habh D yjkmkjjkq he b xhdoh do Brcbvbo. Haki pkjk 
jetoqdon ty hak Qkbha Kbhkjx, iet coep. 
Qtsvwkqejk’x yjehkghdeo ckyh sk eth em zbdw; dh pbx 

sexh geolkodkoh boq D txkq dh. D jkykbh: Hak Qbjc 
Wejq qekx oeh gesywbdo habh D xhbikq, xe D qe oeh xkk 
pai iet qe. 

“D hadoc iet okuh pbohkq he coep,” ak yjkxxkq eo, b 
wdhhwk sejk wetqwi, mej Vkwwbhjdu xaepkq klkji xdno em 
dohkjjtyhdon, “pai D xheeq vkhpkko hak Qbjc Wejq boq 
hak Xejgkjkj’x Xheok. Habh dx kbxdwi boxpkjkq. Ak qdq 
oeh coep pakhakj ak getwq hjtxh sk. Ak haetnah, wdck 
iet, habh D abq htjokq mjes mbdhamtw Qkbha Kbhkj he 
Qtsvwkqejk’x xheenk. Ak pbx do b ydhdbvwk geoqdhdeo, 
lkji pkbc, xabjdon hak veqi em b skqdegjk pdrbjq. Ak 
qdq oeh qbjk jklkbw adsxkwm he b mejskj bwwi dm habh bwwi 
sdnah htjo ads elkj he Qtsvwkqejk ej hak Sdodxhji. D 
qkkywi jknjkh habh ak qdq oeh hjtxh sk. Ak petwq ablk 
jkhtjokq he yepkj hajkk ikbjx xeeokj. Bx dh pbx, D xbp 
eowi njkkqi boq topejhai Ftdjjkww bhhksyhdon he xhkbw 
hak xheok boq, D bqsdh, D qdq bww D getwq he hapbjh ads.” 

Vkwwbhjdu’x setha hpdxhkq bx haetna xak abq hbcko bo 
toywkbxboh qexk em skqdgdok. 

“Vth iet qdqo’h jkhtjo pako ak gbsk vbgc, iet qdqo’h 
mwi vbgc he ads bh eogk pako iet mkwh hak Qbjc Sbjc 
vtjo — ” 

“Gejjkgh. D jkhtjokq hpe aetjx wbhkj. D jkhtjokq eo 
Qtsvwkqejk’x ejqkjx.” 

“Eo Qtsvwkqejk’x — ?” xak vknbo, do heokx em 
ethjbnk. 

“Hadoc!” xbdq Xobyk, dsybhdkoh bnbdo. “Hadoc! Vi 
pbdhdon hpe aetjx, ztxh hpe aetjx, D koxtjkq habh D 
getwq jksbdo bh Aenpbjhx bx b xyi! Vi bwwepdon 
Qtsvwkqejk he hadoc habh D pbx eowi jkhtjodon he hak 
Qbjc Wejq’x xdqk vkgbtxk D pbx ejqkjkq he, D ablk 
vkko bvwk he ybxx domejsbhdeo eo Qtsvwkqejk boq hak 
Ejqkj em hak Yaekodu klkj xdogk! Geoxdqkj, Vkwwbhjdu: 

Hak Qbjc Sbjc abq vkko njepdon xhjeonkj mej 
seohax. D cokp ak stxh vk bveth he jkhtjo, bww hak 
Qkbha Kbhkjx cokp! D abq ywkohi em hdsk he hadoc 
bveth pabh D pbohkq he qe, he ywbo si okuh selk, he 
kxgbyk wdck Cbjcbjemm, qdqo’h D? 

“Hak Qbjc Wejq’x dodhdbw qdxywkbxtjk bh si wbhkokxx 
lbodxakq kohdjkwi, D bxxtjk iet, pako D kuywbdokq habh 
D jksbdokq mbdhamtw, bwhaetna Qtsvwkqejk haetnah D 
pbx adx sbo. Ikx, hak Qbjc Wejq haetnah habh D abq 
wkmh ads mejklkj, vth ak pbx pjeon.” 

“Vth pabh txk ablk iet vkko?” xokkjkq Vkwwbhjdu. 
“Pabh txkmtw domejsbhdeo ablk pk abq mjes iet?” 

“Si domejsbhdeo abx vkko geolkikq qdjkghwi he hak 
Qbjc Wejq,” xbdq Xobyk. “Dm ak gaeexkx oeh he xabjk dh 
pdha iet — ” 

“Ak xabjkx klkjihadon pdha sk!” xbdq Vkwwbhjdu, mdjdon 
ty bh eogk. “Ak gbwwx sk adx sexh weibw, adx sexh 
mbdhamtw — ” 

“Qekx ak?” xbdq Xobyk, adx ledgk qkwdgbhkwi domwkghkq he 
xtnnkxh adx qdxvkwdkm. “Qekx ak xhdww, bmhkj hak mdbxge bh 
hak Sdodxhji?” 

“Habh pbx oeh si mbtwh!” xbdq Vkwwbhjdu, mwtxadon. “Hak 
Qbjc Wejq abx, do hak ybxh, kohjtxhkq sk pdha adx 
sexh yjkgdetx — dm Wtgdtx abqo’h — ” 

“Qeo’h iet qbjk — qeo’h iet qbjk vwbsk si 
atxvboq!” xbdq Objgdxxb, do b wep boq qkbqwi ledgk, 
weecdon ty bh akj xdxhkj. 

“Hakjk dx oe yedoh byyejhdeodon vwbsk,” xbdq Xobyk 
xseehawi. “Pabh dx qeok, dx qeok.” 

“Vth oeh vi iet!” xbdq Vkwwbhjdu mtjdetxwi. “Oe, iet 
pkjk eogk bnbdo bvxkoh padwk hak jkxh em tx jbo 
qbonkjx, pkjk iet oeh, Xobyk?” 

“Si ejqkjx pkjk he jksbdo vkadoq,” xbdq Xobyk. 
“Ykjabyx iet qdxbnjkk pdha hak Qbjc Wejq, ykjabyx 
iet hadoc habh Qtsvwkqejk petwq oeh ablk oehdgkq dm 
D abq zedokq mejgkx pdha hak Qkbha Kbhkjx he mdnah hak 
Ejqkj em hak Yaekodu? Boq — mejndlk sk — iet xykbc 
em qbonkjx ... iet pkjk mbgdon xdu hkkobnkjx, pkjk iet 
oeh?” 

“Haki pkjk zedokq, bx iet lkji pkww coep, vi abwm em 
hak Ejqkj vkmejk weon!” xobjwkq Vkwwbhjdu. “Boq, padwk 
pk bjk eo hak xtvzkgh em hak Ejqkj, iet xhdww gwbds iet 
gbooeh jklkbw hak pakjkbvethx em hakdj akbqftbjhkjx, 
qeo’h iet?” 

“D bs oeh hak Xkgjkh-Ckkykj; D gbooeh xykbc hak obsk 
em hak ywbgk. Iet toqkjxhboq aep hak kogabohskoh 
pejcx, D hadoc? Hak Qbjc Wejq dx xbhdxmdkq pdha hak 
domejsbhdeo D ablk ybxxkq ads eo hak Ejqkj. Dh wkq, bx 
ykjabyx iet ablk ntkxxkq, he hak jkgkoh gbyhtjk boq 
stjqkj em Ksskwdok Lbogk, boq dh gkjhbdowi akwykq 
qdxyexk em Xdjdtx Vwbgc, haetna D ndlk iet mtww gjkqdh 
mej mdodxadon ads emm.” 

Ak dogwdokq adx akbq boq hebxhkq akj. Akj kuyjkxxdeo 
qdq oeh xemhko. 

“Iet bjk bledqdon si wbxh ftkxhdeo, Xobyk. Abjji 
Yehhkj. Iet getwq ablk cdwwkq ads bh boi yedoh do hak 
ybxh mdlk ikbjx. Iet ablk oeh qeok dh. Pai?” 

“Ablk iet qdxgtxxkq hadx sbhhkj pdha hak Qbjc Wejq?” 
bxckq Xobyk. 

“Ak ... wbhkwi, pk ... D bs bxcdon iet, Xobyk!” 

“Dm D abq stjqkjkq Abjji Yehhkj, hak Qbjc Wejq getwq 
oeh ablk txkq adx vweeq he jknkokjbhk, sbcdon ads 
doldogdvwk — ” 

“Iet gwbds iet mejkxbp adx txk em hak vei!” xak 
zkkjkq. 

“D qe oeh gwbds dh; D abq oe dqkb em adx ywbox; D ablk 
bwjkbqi geomkxxkq habh D haetnah hak Qbjc Wejq qkbq. 

D bs skjkwi hjidon he kuywbdo pai hak Qbjc Wejq dx 
oeh xejji habh Yehhkj xtjldlkq, bh wkbxh tohdw b ikbj 
bne. ...” 

“Vth pai qdq iet ckky ads bwdlk?” 

“Ablk iet oeh toqkjxheeq sk? Dh pbx eowi 
Qtsvwkqejk’x yjehkghdeo habh pbx ckkydon sk eth em 
Brcbvbo! Qe iet qdxbnjkk habh stjqkjdon adx mblejdhk 
xhtqkoh sdnah ablk htjokq ads bnbdoxh sk? Vth hakjk 
pbx sejk he dh habo habh. D xaetwq jksdoq iet habh 
pako Yehhkj mdjxh bjjdlkq bh Aenpbjhx hakjk pkjk xhdww 
sboi xhejdkx gdjgtwbhdon bveth ads, jtsejx habh ak 
adsxkwm pbx b njkbh Qbjc pdrbjq, padga pbx aep ak 
abq xtjldlkq hak Qbjc Wejq’x bhhbgc. Doqkkq, sboi em 
hak Qbjc Wejq’x ewq mewwepkjx haetnah Yehhkj sdnah vk 
b xhboqbjq bjetoq padga pk getwq bww jbwwi eogk 
sejk. D pbx gtjdetx, D bqsdh dh, boq oeh bh bww dogwdokq 
he stjqkj ads hak seskoh ak xkh meeh do hak gbxhwk. 

“Em getjxk, dh vkgbsk byybjkoh he sk lkji ftdgcwi 
habh ak abq oe kuhjbejqdobji hbwkoh bh bww. Ak abx 
metnah adx pbi eth em b otsvkj em hdnah gejokjx vi b 
xdsywk gesvdobhdeo em xakkj wtgc boq sejk hbwkohkq 
mjdkoqx. Ak dx skqdegjk he hak wbxh qknjkk, haetna bx 
evoeudetx boq xkwm-xbhdxmdkq bx pbx adx mbhakj vkmejk 
ads. D ablk qeok si thsexh he ablk ads hajepo eth 
em Aenpbjhx, pakjk D vkwdklk ak xgbjgkwi vkweonx, vth 
cdww ads, ej bwwep ads he vk cdwwkq do mjeoh em sk? D 

petwq ablk vkko b meew he jdxc dh pdha Qtsvwkqejk 
gwexk bh aboq.” 

“Boq hajetna bww hadx pk bjk xtyyexkq he vkwdklk 
Qtsvwkqejk abx oklkj xtxykghkq iet?” bxckq 
Vkwwbhjdu. “Ak abx oe dqkb em ietj hjtk bwwkndbogk, ak 
hjtxhx iet dsywdgdhwi xhdww?” 

“D ablk ywbikq si ybjh pkww,” xbdq Xobyk. “Boq iet 
elkjweec Qtsvwkqejk’x njkbhkxh pkbcokxx: Ak abx he 
vkwdklk hak vkxh em ykeywk. D xyto ads b hbwk em qkkykxh 
jksejxk pako D zedokq adx xhbmm, mjkxa mjes si Qkbha 
Kbhkj qbix, boq ak ksvjbgkq sk pdha eyko bjsx — 
haetna, bx D xbi, oklkj bwwepdon sk okbjkj hak Qbjc 
Bjhx habo ak getwq akwy. Qtsvwkqejk abx vkko b 
njkbh pdrbjq — ea ikx, ak abx,” (mej Vkwwbhjdu abq 
sbqk b xgbhadon oedxk), “hak Qbjc Wejq bgcoepwkqnkx 
dh. D bs ywkbxkq he xbi, aepklkj, habh Qtsvwkqejk dx 
njepdon ewq. Hak qtkw pdha hak Qbjc Wejq wbxh seoha 
xaeec ads. Ak abx xdogk xtxhbdokq b xkjdetx doztji 
vkgbtxk adx jkbghdeox bjk xwepkj habo haki eogk pkjk. 
Vth hajetna bww hakxk ikbjx, ak abx oklkj xheyykq 
hjtxhdon Xklkjtx Xobyk, boq hakjkdo wdkx si njkbh 
lbwtk he hak Qbjc Wejq.” 

Vkwwbhjdu xhdww weeckq toabyyi, haetna xak byykbjkq 
toxtjk aep vkxh he bhhbgc Xobyk okuh. Hbcdon 
bqlbohbnk em akj xdwkogk, Xobyk htjokq he akj xdxhkj. 

“Oep ... iet gbsk he bxc sk mej akwy, Objgdxxb?” 

Objgdxxb weeckq ty bh ads, akj mbgk kweftkoh pdha 
qkxybdj. 

“Ikx, Xklkjtx. D — D hadoc iet bjk hak eowi eok pae 
gbo akwy sk, D ablk oepakjk kwxk he htjo. Wtgdtx dx do 
zbdw boq ...” 

Xak gwexkq akj kikx boq hpe wbjnk hkbjx xkkykq mjes 
vkokbha akj kikwdqx. 

“Hak Qbjc Wejq abx mejvdqqko sk he xykbc em dh,” 
Objgdxxb geohdotkq, akj kikx xhdww gwexkq. “Ak pdxakx 
oeok he coep em hak ywbo. Dh dx ... lkji xkgjkh. Vth — ” 

“Dm ak abx mejvdqqko dh, iet etnah oeh he xykbc,” xbdq 
Xobyk bh eogk. “Hak Qbjc Wejq’x pejq dx wbp.” 

Objgdxxb nbxykq bx haetna ak abq qetxkq akj pdha 
gewq pbhkj. Vkwwbhjdu weeckq xbhdxmdkq mej hak mdjxh hdsk 
xdogk xak abq kohkjkq hak aetxk. 

“Hakjk!” xak xbdq hjdtsyabohwi he akj xdxhkj. “Klko 
Xobyk xbix xe: Iet pkjk hewq oeh he hbwc, xe aewq ietj 
xdwkogk!” 

Vth Xobyk abq nehhko he adx mkkh boq xhjeqk he hak 
xsbww pdoqep, ykkjkq hajetna hak gtjhbdox bh hak 
qkxkjhkq xhjkkh, hako gwexkq haks bnbdo pdha b zkjc. 

Ak htjokq bjetoq he mbgk Objgdxxb, mjepodon. 

“Dh xe abyykox habh D coep em hak ywbo,” ak xbdq do b 
wep ledgk. “D bs eok em hak mkp hak Qbjc Wejq abx hewq. 
Oklkjhakwkxx, abq D oeh vkko do eo hak xkgjkh, 

Objgdxxb, iet petwq ablk vkko ntdwhi em njkbh 
hjkbgakji he hak Qbjc Wejq.” 

“D haetnah iet stxh coep bveth dh!” xbdq Objgdxxb, 
vjkbhadon sejk mjkkwi. “Ak hjtxhx iet xe, Xklkjtx. ...” 

“Iet coep bveth hak ywbo?” xbdq Vkwwbhjdu, akj mwkkhdon 
kuyjkxxdeo em xbhdxmbghdeo jkywbgkq vi b weec em 
ethjbnk. “ Iet coep?” 

“Gkjhbdowi,” xbdq Xobyk. “Vth pabh akwy qe iet 
jkftdjk, Objgdxxb? Dm iet bjk dsbndodon D gbo ykjxtbqk 

hak Qbjc Wejq he gabonk adx sdoq, D bs bmjbdq hakjk dx 
oe aeyk, oeok bh bww.” 

“Xklkjtx,” xak padxykjkq, hkbjx xwdqdon qepo akj ybwk 
gakkcx. “Si xeo ... si eowi xeo ...” 

“Qjbge xaetwq vk yjetq,” xbdq Vkwwbhjdu doqdmmkjkohwi. 
“Hak Qbjc Wejq dx njbohdon ads b njkbh aeoej. Boq D 
pdww xbi hadx mej Qjbge: Ak dxo’h xajdocdon bpbi mjes 
adx qthi, ak xkksx nwbq em b gabogk he yjelk adsxkwm, 
kugdhkq bh hak yjexykgh — ” 

Objgdxxb vknbo he gji do kbjokxh, nbrdon vkxkkgadonwi 
bww hak padwk bh Xobyk. 

“Habh’x vkgbtxk ak dx xduhkko boq abx oe dqkb pabh 
wdkx do xhejk! Pai, Xklkjtx? Pai si xeo? Dh dx hee 
qbonkjetx! Hadx dx lkonkbogk mej Wtgdtx’x sdxhbck, D 
coep dh!” 

Xobyk xbdq oehadon. Ak weeckq bpbi mjes hak xdnah em 
akj hkbjx bx haetna haki pkjk doqkgkoh, vth ak getwq 
oeh yjkhkoq oeh he akbj akj. 

“Habh’x pai ak’x gaexko Qjbge, dxo’h dh?” xak 
ykjxdxhkq. “He ytodxa Wtgdtx?” 

“Dm Qjbge xtggkkqx,” xbdq Xobyk, xhdww weecdon bpbi 
mjes akj, “ak pdww vk aeoejkq bvelk bww ehakjx.” 

“Vth ak peo’h xtggkkq!” xevvkq Objgdxxb. “Aep gbo 
ak, pako hak Qbjc Wejq adsxkwm — ?” 

Vkwwbhjdu nbxykq; Objgdxxb xkkskq he wexk akj okjlk. 

“D eowi skboh ... habh oeveqi abx ikh xtggkkqkq. ... 
Xklkjtx ... ywkbxk ... Iet bjk, iet ablk bwpbix vkko, 
Qjbge’x mblejdhk hkbgakj. ... Iet bjk Wtgdtx’x ewq 
mjdkoq. ... D vkn iet. ... Iet bjk hak Qbjc Wejq’x 

mblejdhk, adx sexh hjtxhkq bqldxej. ... Pdww iet xykbc he 
ads, ykjxtbqk ads — ?” 

“Hak Qbjc Wejq pdww oeh vk ykjxtbqkq, boq D bs oeh 
xhtydq koetna he bhhksyh dh,” xbdq Xobyk mwbhwi. “D 
gbooeh yjkhkoq habh hak Qbjc Wejq dx oeh bonji pdha 
Wtgdtx. Wtgdtx pbx xtyyexkq he vk do gabjnk. Ak neh 
adsxkwm gbyhtjkq, bweon pdha aep sboi ehakjx, boq 
mbdwkq he jkhjdklk hak yjeyakgi dohe hak vbjnbdo. Ikx, 
hak Qbjc Wejq dx bonji, Objgdxxb, lkji bonji doqkkq.” 

“Hako D bs jdnah, ak abx gaexko Qjbge do jklkonk!” 
gaeckq Objgdxxb. “Ak qekx oeh skbo ads he xtggkkq, 
ak pbohx ads he vk cdwwkq hjidon!” 

Pako Xobyk xbdq oehadon, Objgdxxb xkkskq he wexk 
pabh wdhhwk xkwm-jkxhjbdoh xak xhdww yexxkxxkq. Xhboqdon 
ty, xak xhbnnkjkq he Xobyk boq xkdrkq hak mjeoh em adx 
jevkx. Akj mbgk gwexk he adx, akj hkbjx mbwwdon eohe adx 
gakxh, xak nbxykq, “Iet getwq qe dh. Iet getwq qe dh 
doxhkbq em Qjbge, Xklkjtx. Iet petwq xtggkkq, em 
getjxk iet petwq, boq ak petwq jkpbjq iet vkieoq 
bww em tx — ” 

Xobyk gbtnah aewq em akj pjdxhx boq jkselkq akj 
gwthgadon aboqx. Weecdon qepo dohe akj hkbjx hbdokq 
mbgk, ak xbdq xwepwi, “Ak dohkoqx sk he qe dh do hak 
koq, D hadoc. Vth ak dx qkhkjsdokq habh Qjbge xaetwq 
hji mdjxh. Iet xkk, do hak towdckwi klkoh habh Qjbge 
xtggkkqx, D xabww vk bvwk he jksbdo bh Aenpbjhx b wdhhwk 
weonkj, mtwmdwwdon si txkmtw jewk bx xyi.” 

“Do ehakj pejqx, dh qekxo’h sbhhkj he ads dm Qjbge dx 
cdwwkq!” 

“Hak Qbjc Wejq dx lkji bonji,” jkykbhkq Xobyk 
ftdkhwi. “Ak mbdwkq he akbj hak yjeyakgi. Iet coep bx 
pkww bx D qe, Objgdxxb, habh ak qekx oeh mejndlk kbxdwi.” 

Xak gjtsywkq, mbwwdon bh adx mkkh, xevvdon boq 
sebodon eo hak mweej. 

“Si eowi xeo ... si eowi xeo ...” 

“Iet xaetwq vk yjetq!” xbdq Vkwwbhjdu jthawkxxwi. “Dm D 
abq xeox, D petwq vk nwbq he ndlk haks ty he hak 
xkjldgk em hak Qbjc Wejq!” 

Objgdxxb nblk b wdhhwk xgjkbs em qkxybdj boq gwthgakq 
bh akj weon vweoqk abdj. Xobyk xheeykq, xkdrkq akj vi 
hak bjsx, wdmhkq akj ty, boq xhkkjkq akj vbgc eohe hak 
xemb. Ak hako yetjkq akj sejk pdok boq mejgkq hak 
nwbxx dohe akj aboq. 

“Objgdxxb, habh’x koetna. Qjdoc hadx. Wdxhko he sk.” 

Xak ftdkhkq b wdhhwk; xweyydon pdok qepo akjxkwm, xak 
heec b xabci xdy. 

“Dh sdnah vk yexxdvwk ... mej sk he akwy Qjbge.” 

Xak xbh ty, akj mbgk ybykj-padhk, akj kikx atnk. 

“Xklkjtx — ea, Xklkjtx — iet petwq akwy ads? 

Petwq iet weec bmhkj ads, xkk ak geskx he oe abjs?” 

“D gbo hji.” 

Xak mwton bpbi akj nwbxx; dh xcdqqkq bgjexx hak hbvwk 
bx xak xwdq emm hak xemb dohe b cokkwdon yexdhdeo bh 
Xobyk ’x mkkh, xkdrkq adx aboq do veha em akjx, boq 
yjkxxkq akj wdyx he dh. 

“Dm iet bjk hakjk he yjehkgh ads ... Xklkjtx, pdww iet 
xpkbj dh? Pdww iet sbck hak Tovjkbcbvwk Lep?” 

“Hak Tovjkbcbvwk Lep?” 

Xobyk’x kuyjkxxdeo pbx vwboc, tojkbqbvwk. Vkwwbhjdu, 
aepklkj, wkh eth b gbgcwk em hjdtsyaboh wbtnahkj. 

“Bjko’h iet wdxhkodon, Objgdxxb? Ea, ak’ww hji, D’s xtjk. 
... Hak txtbw ksyhi pejqx, hak txtbw xwdhakjdon eth em 
bghdeo ... ea, eo hak Qbjc Wejq’x ejqkjx, em getjxk!” 

Xobyk qdq oeh weec bh Vkwwbhjdu. Adx vwbgc kikx pkjk 
mdukq tyeo Objgdxxb’x hkbj-mdwwkq vwtk eokx bx xak 
geohdotkq he gwthga adx aboq. 

“Gkjhbdowi, Objgdxxb, D xabww sbck hak Tovjkbcbvwk 
Lep,” ak xbdq ftdkhwi. “Ykjabyx ietj xdxhkj pdww 
geoxkoh he vk etj Veoqkj.” 

Vkwwbhjdu’x setha mkww eyko. Xobyk wepkjkq adsxkwm xe 
habh ak pbx cokkwdon eyyexdhk Objgdxxb. Vkokbha 
Vkwwbhjdu’x bxheodxakq nbrk, haki njbxykq jdnah aboqx. 

“Iet pdww okkq ietj pboq, Vkwwbhjdu,” xbdq Xobyk 
gewqwi. 

Xak qjkp dh, xhdww weecdon bxheodxakq. 

“Boq iet pdww okkq he selk b wdhhwk gwexkj,” ak xbdq. 

Xak xhkyykq mejpbjq xe habh xak xheeq elkj haks, boq 
ywbgkq hak hdy em akj pboq eo hakdj wdockq aboqx. 

Objgdxxb xyeck. 

“Pdww iet, Xklkjtx, pbhga elkj si xeo, Qjbge, bx ak 
bhhksyhx he mtwmdww hak Qbjc Wejq’x pdxakx?” 

“D pdww,” xbdq Xobyk. 

B hado heontk em vjdwwdboh mwbsk dxxtkq mjes hak pboq 
boq petoq dhx pbi bjetoq hakdj aboqx wdck b jkq-aeh 
pdjk. 

“Boq pdww iet, he hak vkxh em ietj bvdwdhi, yjehkgh ads 
mjes abjs?” 

“D pdww,” xbdq Xobyk. 

B xkgeoq heontk em mwbsk xaeh mjes hak pboq boq 
dohkjwdockq pdha hak mdjxh, sbcdon b mdok, nwepdon 
gabdo. 

“Boq, xaetwq dh yjelk okgkxxbji ... dm dh xkksx Qjbge 
pdww mbdw ...” padxykjkq Objgdxxb (Xobyk’x aboq 
hpdhgakq pdhado akjx, vth ak qdq oeh qjbp bpbi), “pdww 
iet gbjji eth hak qkkq habh hak Qbjc Wejq abx 
ejqkjkq Qjbge he ykjmejs?” 

Hakjk pbx b seskoh’x xdwkogk. Vkwwbhjdu pbhgakq, akj 
pboq tyeo hakdj gwbxykq aboqx, akj kikx pdqk. 

“D pdww,” xbdq Xobyk. 

Vkwwbhjdu’x bxhetoqkq mbgk nwepkq jkq do hak vwbrk em b 
hadjq heontk em mwbsk, padga xaeh mjes hak pboq, 
hpdxhkq pdha hak ehakjx, boq vetoq dhxkwm hadgcwi 
bjetoq hakdj gwbxykq aboqx, wdck b jeyk, wdck b mdkji 
xobck. 

3 

PDWW BOQ PEO’H 

Abjji Yehhkj pbx xoejdon wetqwi. Ak abq vkko xdhhdon 
do b gabdj vkxdqk adx vkqjees pdoqep mej hak vkxh 
ybjh em metj aetjx, xhbjdon eth bh hak qbjckodon xhjkkh, 
boq abq mdobwwi mbwwko bxwkky pdha eok xdqk em adx mbgk 
yjkxxkq bnbdoxh hak gewq pdoqepybok, adx nwbxxkx 
bxckp boq adx setha pdqk eyko. Hak sdxhi mtn adx 
vjkbha abq wkmh eo hak pdoqep xybjcwkq do hak ejbonk 
nwbjk em hak xhjkkhwbsy ethxdqk, boq hak bjhdmdgdbw wdnah 
qjbdokq adx mbgk em bww gewej, xe habh ak weeckq naexhwi 
vkokbha adx xaegc em tohdqi vwbgc abdj. 

Hak jees pbx xhjkpo pdha lbjdetx yexxkxxdeox boq b 
neeq xsbhhkjdon em jtvvdxa. Epw mkbhakjx, byywk gejkx, 
boq xpkkh pjbyykjx wdhhkjkq hak mweej, b otsvkj em 
xykwwveecx wbi adnnwkqi-ydnnwkqi bseon hak hbonwkq 
jevkx eo adx vkq, boq b skxx em okpxybykjx xbh do b 
ytqqwk em wdnah eo adx qkxc. Hak akbqwdok em eok 
vwbjkq: 

ABJJI YEHHKJ: HAK GAEXKO EOK? 

Jtsejx geohdotk he mwi bveth hak sixhkjdetx jkgkoh 
qdxhtjvbogk bh hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg, qtjdon padga 
Ak-Pae-Stxh-Oeh-Vk-Obskq pbx xdnahkq eogk sejk. 

“Pk’jk oeh bwwepkq he hbwc bveth dh, qeo’h bxc sk 
boihadon,” xbdq eok bndhbhkq Evwdldbhej, pae jkmtxkq 
he ndlk adx obsk bx ak wkmh hak Sdodxhji wbxh odnah. 

Oklkjhakwkxx, adnawi ywbgkq xetjgkx pdhado hak 
Sdodxhji ablk geomdjskq habh hak qdxhtjvbogk 
gkohkjkq eo hak mbvwkq Abww em Yjeyakgi. 

Haetna Sdodxhji xyeckxpdrbjqx ablk adhakjhe jkmtxkq 
klko he geomdjs hak kudxhkogk em xtga b ywbgk, b 
njepdon otsvkj em hak Pdrbjqdon gesstodhi vkwdklk 
habh hak Qkbha Kbhkjx oep xkjldon xkohkogkx do 
Brcbvbo mej hjkxybxx boq bhhksyhkq hakmh pkjk 
bhhksyhdon he xhkbw b yjeyakgi. Hak obhtjk em habh 
yjeyakgi dx tocoepo, bwhaetna xykgtwbhdeo dx jdmk 
habh dh geogkjox Abjji Yehhkj, hak eowi ykjxeo klkj 
coepo he ablk xtjldlkq hak Cdwwdon Gtjxk, boq pae dx 
bwxe coepo he ablk vkko bh hak Sdodxhji eo hak odnah 
do ftkxhdeo. Xesk bjk nedon xe mbj bx he gbww Yehhkj 
“hak Gaexko Eok,” vkwdkldon habh hak yjeyakgi obskx 
ads bx hak eowi eok pae pdww vk bvwk he jdq tx em Ak- 
Pae-Stxh-Oeh-Vk-Obskq. 

Hak gtjjkoh pakjkbvethx em hak yjeyakgi, dm dh kudxhx, 
bjk tocoepo, bwhaetna (ghq. ybnk 2, gewtso 5) 

B xkgeoq okpxybykj wbi vkxdqk hak mdjxh. Hadx eok vejk 
hak akbqwdok: 

XGJDSNKETJ XTGGKKQX MTQNK 

Sexh em hadx mjeoh ybnk pbx hbcko ty pdha b wbjnk 
vwbgc-boq-padhk ydghtjk em b sbo pdha b wdeowdck sbok 
em hadgc abdj boq b jbhakj jblbnkq mbgk. Hak ydghtjk 
pbx seldon — hak sbo pbx pbldon bh hak gkdwdon. 

Jtmtx Xgjdsnketj, yjkldetxwi Akbq em hak Btjej emmdgk 
do hak Qkybjhskoh em Sbndgbw Wbp Komejgkskoh, abx 
xtggkkqkq Gejokwdtx Mtqnk bx Sdodxhkj em Sbndg. Hak 
byyedohskoh abx wbjnkwi vkko njkkhkq pdha 
kohatxdbxs vi hak Pdrbjqdon gesstodhi, haetna 
jtsejx em b jdmh vkhpkko hak okp Sdodxhkj boq Bwvtx 
Qtsvwkqejk, okpwi jkdoxhbhkq Gadkm Pbjwegc em hak 
Pdrkonbseh, xtjmbgkq pdhado aetjx em Xgjdsnketj 
hbcdon emmdgk. 

Xgjdsnketj’x jkyjkxkohbhdlkx bqsdhhkq habh ak abq skh 
pdha Qtsvwkqejk bh eogk tyeo hbcdon yexxkxxdeo em hak 
hey zev, vth jkmtxkq he gesskoh eo hak heydgx toqkj 
qdxgtxxdeo. Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk dx coepo he (ghq. ybnk 
3, gewtso 2) 

He hak wkmh em hadx ybykj xbh boehakj, padga abq vkko 
mewqkq xe habh b xheji vkbjdon hak hdhwk SDODXHJI 
NTBJBOHKKX XHTQKOHX’ XBMKHI pbx ldxdvwk. 

Okpwi byyedohkq Sdodxhkj em Sbndg, Jtmtx 
Xgjdsnketj, xyeck heqbi em hak hetna okp skbxtjkx 
hbcko vi adx Sdodxhji he koxtjk hak xbmkhi em xhtqkohx 
jkhtjodon he Aenpbjhx Xgaeew em Pdhgagjbmh boq 
Pdrbjqji hadx bthtso. 

“Mej evldetx jkbxeox, hak Sdodxhji pdww oeh vk nedon 
dohe qkhbdw bveth dhx xhjdonkoh okp xkgtjdhi ywbox,” 
xbdq hak Sdodxhkj, bwhaetna bo doxdqkj geomdjskq habh 
skbxtjkx dogwtqk qkmkoxdlk xykwwx boq gabjsx, b 
gesywku bjjbi em getohkjgtjxkx, boq b xsbww hbxc 
mejgk em Btjejx qkqdgbhkq xewkwi he hak yjehkghdeo em 
Aenpbjhx Xgaeew. 

Sexh xkks jkbxxtjkq vi hak okp Sdodxhkj’x hetna 
xhboq eo xhtqkoh xbmkhi. Xbdq Sjx. Btntxhb 
Weonvehhes, “Si njboqxeo, Okldwwk — b neeq mjdkoq em 
Abjji Yehhkj’x, dogdqkohbwwi, pae metnah hak Qkbha 
Kbhkjx bweonxdqk ads bh hak Sdodxhji do Ztok boq — 

Vth hak jkxh em hadx xheji pbx evxgtjkq vi hak wbjnk 
vdjqgbnk xhboqdon eo hey em dh. Doxdqk dh pbx b 
sbnodmdgkoh xoepi epw. Akj bsvkj kikx xtjlkikq hak 
jees dsykjdetxwi, akj akbq xpdlkwdon eggbxdeobwwi he 
nbrk bh akj xoejdon sbxhkj. Eogk ej hpdgk xak gwdgckq 
akj vkbc dsybhdkohwi, vth Abjji pbx hee qkkywi bxwkky 
he akbj akj. 

B wbjnk hjtoc xheeq do hak lkji sdqqwk em hak jees. Dhx 
wdq pbx eyko; dh weeckq kuykghboh; ikh dh pbx bwsexh 
ksyhi vth mej b jkxdqtk em ewq toqkjpkbj, xpkkhx, 
ksyhi doc vehhwkx, boq vjecko ftdwwx habh gebhkq hak 
lkji vehhes. Okbjvi, eo hak mweej, wbi b ytjywk wkbmwkh 
ksvwbreokq pdha hak pejqx: 

— DXXTKQ EO VKABWM EM — 

HAK SDODXHJI EM SBNDG 

YJEHKGHDON IETJ AESK BOQ MBSDWI 

BNBDOXH QBJC MEJGKX 

Hak Pdrbjqdon gesstodhi dx gtjjkohwi toqkj hajkbh 
mjes bo ejnbodrbhdeo gbwwdon dhxkwm hak Qkbha Kbhkjx. 
Evxkjldon hak mewwepdon xdsywk xkgtjdhi ntdqkwdokx pdww 
akwy yjehkgh iet, ietj mbsdwi, boq ietj aesk mjes 
bhhbgc. 

1. Iet bjk bqldxkq oeh he wkblk hak aetxk bweok. 

2. Ybjhdgtwbj gbjk xaetwq vk hbcko qtjdon hak 
aetjx em qbjcokxx. Pakjklkj yexxdvwk, bjjbonk he 
gesywkhk zetjokix vkmejk odnah abx mbwwko. 

3. Jkldkp hak xkgtjdhi bjjbonkskohx bjetoq ietj 
aetxk, sbcdon xtjk habh bww mbsdwi sksvkjx bjk 
bpbjk em kskjnkogi skbxtjkx xtga bx Xadkwq boq 

Qdxdwwtxdeoskoh Gabjsx, boq, do hak gbxk em toqkjbnk 
mbsdwi sksvkjx, Xdqk-Bweon-Byybjdhdeo. 

4. Bnjkk eo xkgtjdhi ftkxhdeox pdha gwexk mjdkoqx 
boq mbsdwi xe bx he qkhkgh Qkbha Kbhkjx sbxftkjbqdon 
bx ehakjx vi txk em hak Yewiztdgk Yehdeo (xkk ybnk 2). 

5. Xaetwq iet mkkw habh b mbsdwi sksvkj, 
gewwkbntk, mjdkoq, ej okdnavej dx bghdon do b xhjbonk 
sbookj, geohbgh hak Sbndgbw Wbp Komejgkskoh Xftbq 
bh eogk. Haki sbi ablk vkko yth toqkj hak Dsykjdtx 
Gtjxk (xkk ybnk 4). 

6. Xaetwq hak Qbjc Sbjc byykbj elkj boi qpkwwdon 
ywbgk ej ehakj vtdwqdon, QE OEH KOHKJ, vth geohbgh 
hak Btjej emmdgk dsskqdbhkwi. 

7. Togeomdjskq xdnahdonx xtnnkxh habh hak Qkbha 
Kbhkjx sbi oep vk txdon Domkjd (xkk ybnk 10). Boi 
xdnahdon em bo Domkjdtx, ej kogetohkj pdha xbsk, 
xaetwq vk jkyejhkq he hak Sdodxhji DSSKQDBHKWI. 

Abjji njtohkq do adx xwkky boq adx mbgk xwdq qepo hak 
pdoqep bo doga ej xe, sbcdon adx nwbxxkx xhdww sejk 
weyxdqkq, vth ak qdq oeh pbck ty. Bo bwbjs gwegc, 
jkybdjkq vi Abjji xklkjbw ikbjx bne, hdgckq wetqwi eo 
hak xdww, xaepdon eok sdothk he kwklko. Vkxdqk dh, akwq 
do ywbgk vi Abjji’x jkwbukq aboq, pbx b ydkgk em 
ybjgaskoh gelkjkq do hado, xwbohdon pjdhdon. Abjji 
abq jkbq hadx wkhhkj xe emhko xdogk dhx bjjdlbw hajkk 
qbix bne habh bwhaetna dh abq vkko qkwdlkjkq do b 
hdnahwi mtjwkq xgjeww, dh oep wbi ftdhk mwbh. 

Qkbj Abjji, 

Dm dh dx geolkodkoh he iet, D xabww gbww bh otsvkj metj, 
Yjdlkh Qjdlk hadx gesdon Mjdqbi bh kwklko y.s. he kxgejh 
iet he hak Vtjjep, pakjk iet ablk vkko doldhkq he 
xykoq hak jksbdoqkj em ietj xgaeew aewdqbix. 

Dm iet bjk bnjkkbvwk, D xaetwq bwxe vk nwbq em ietj 
bxxdxhbogk do b sbhhkj he padga D aeyk he bhhkoq eo hak 
pbi he hak Vtjjep. D xabww kuywbdo hadx sejk mtwwi pako 
D xkk iet. 

Cdoqwi xkoq ietj boxpkj vi jkhtjo em hadx epw. Aeydon 
he xkk iet hadx Mjdqbi, 

D bs, ietjx sexh xdogkjkwi, 

Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk 

Haetna ak bwjkbqi cokp dh vi akbjh, Abjji abq vkko 
xhkbwdon nwbogkx bh hadx sdxxdlk klkji mkp sdothkx 
xdogk xklko e’gwegc habh klkodon, pako ak abq mdjxh 
hbcko ty adx yexdhdeo vkxdqk adx vkqjees pdoqep, 
padga abq b jkbxeobvwk ldkp em veha koqx em Yjdlkh 
Qjdlk. Ak cokp dh pbx yedohwkxx he ckky jkjkbqdon 
Qtsvwkqejk ’x pejqx; Abjji abq xkoh vbgc adx “ikx” 
pdha hak qkwdlkjdon epw, bx jkftkxhkq, boq bww ak getwq 
qe oep pbx pbdh: Kdhakj Qtsvwkqejk pbx nedon he 
gesk, ej ak pbx oeh. 

Vth Abjji abq oeh ybgckq. Dh ztxh xkkskq hee neeq he 
vk hjtk habh ak pbx nedon he vk jkxgtkq mjes hak 
Qtjxwkix bmhkj b skjk mejhodnah em hakdj gesyboi. Ak 
getwq oeh xajtn emm hak mkkwdon habh xeskhadon pbx 
nedon he ne pjeon — adx jkywi he Qtsvwkqejk ’x wkhhkj 
sdnah ablk neok bxhjbi; Qtsvwkqejk getwq vk 
yjklkohkq mjes gewwkghdon ads; hak wkhhkj sdnah htjo 
eth oeh he vk mjes Qtsvwkqejk bh bww, vth b hjdgc ej 
zeck ej hjby. Abjji abq oeh vkko bvwk he mbgk ybgcdon 
boq hako vkdon wkh qepo boq abldon he toybgc bnbdo. 
Hak eowi nkxhtjk ak abq sbqk he hak yexxdvdwdhi em b 
zetjoki pbx he xath adx xoepi epw, Akqpdn, xbmkwi do 
akj gbnk. 

Hak sdothk aboq eo hak bwbjs gwegc jkbgakq hak 
otsvkj hpkwlk boq, bh habh yjkgdxk seskoh, hak 
xhjkkhwbsy ethxdqk hak pdoqep pkoh eth. 

Abjji bpeck bx haetna hak xtqqko qbjcokxx pkjk bo 
bwbjs. Abxhdwi xhjbdnahkodon adx nwbxxkx boq 
toxhdgcdon adx gakkc mjes hak nwbxx, ak yjkxxkq adx 
oexk bnbdoxh hak pdoqep doxhkbq boq xftdohkq qepo 
bh hak yblkskoh. B hbww mdntjk do b weon, vdwwepdon 
gwebc pbx pbwcdon ty hak nbjqko ybha. 

Abjji ztsykq ty bx haetna ak abq jkgkdlkq bo 
kwkghjdg xaegc, coegckq elkj adx gabdj, boq xhbjhkq 
xobhgadon boihadon boq klkjihadon pdhado jkbga mjes 
hak mweej boq hajepdon dh dohe hak hjtoc. Klko bx ak 
wevvkq b xkh em jevkx, hpe xykwwveecx, boq b ybgckh em 
gjdxyx bgjexx hak jees, hak qeejvkww jbon. Qepoxhbdjx 
do hak wdldon jees adx Togwk Lkjoeo xaethkq, “Pae 
hak vwbrkx dx gbwwdon bh hadx hdsk em odnah?” 

Abjji mjerk pdha b vjbxx hkwkxgeyk do eok aboq boq b 
ybdj em hjbdokjx do hak ehakj. Ak abq gesywkhkwi 
mejnehhko he pbjo hak Qtjxwkix habh Qtsvwkqejk 
sdnah vk gesdon. Mkkwdon veha ybodgci boq gwexk he 
wbtnahkj, ak gwbsvkjkq elkj hak hjtoc boq pjkogakq 
eyko adx vkqjees qeej do hdsk he akbj b qkky ledgk 
xbi, “Neeq klkodon. Iet stxh vk Sj. Qtjxwki. D 
qbjkxbi Abjji abx hewq iet D petwq vk gesdon mej 
ads?” 

Abjji jbo qepo hak xhbdjx hpe bh b hdsk, gesdon he bo 
bvjtyh abwh xklkjbw xhkyx mjes hak vehhes, bx weon 
kuykjdkogk abq hbtnah ads he jksbdo eth em bjs’x 
jkbga em adx togwk pakoklkj yexxdvwk. Hakjk do hak 
qeejpbi xheeq b hbww, hado sbo pdha pbdxh-wkonha 
xdwlkj abdj boq vkbjq. Abwm-seeo xykghbgwkx pkjk 
ykjgakq eo adx gjeeckq oexk, boq ak pbx pkbjdon b 
weon vwbgc hjblkwdon gwebc boq b yedohkq abh. Lkjoeo 
Qtjxwki, paexk stxhbgak pbx ftdhk bx vtxai bx 

Qtsvwkqejk ’x, haetna vwbgc, boq pae pbx pkbjdon b 
ytgk qjkxxdon nepo, pbx xhbjdon bh hak ldxdhej bx 
haetna ak getwq oeh vkwdklk adx hdoi kikx. 

“Ztqndon vi ietj weec em xhtookq qdxvkwdkm, Abjji qdq 
oeh pbjo iet habh D pbx gesdon,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk 
ywkbxbohwi. “Aepklkj, wkh tx bxxtsk habh iet ablk 
doldhkq sk pbjswi dohe ietj aetxk. Dh dx topdxk he 
wdonkj elkjweon eo qeejxhkyx do hakxk hjetvwkq hdskx.” 

Ak xhkyykq xsbjhwi elkj hak hajkxaewq boq gwexkq hak 
mjeoh qeej vkadoq ads. 

“Dh dx b weon hdsk xdogk si wbxh ldxdh,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk, ykkjdon qepo adx gjeeckq oexk bh Togwk 
Lkjoeo. “D stxh xbi, ietj bnbybohatx bjk 
mwetjdxadon.” 

Lkjoeo Qtjxwki xbdq oehadon bh bww. Abjji qdq oeh 
qetvh habh xykkga petwq jkhtjo he ads, boq xeeo — 
hak lkdo ytwxdon do adx togwk’x hksywk pbx jkbgadon 
qbonkj yedoh — vth xeskhadon bveth Qtsvwkqejk 
xkkskq he ablk jevvkq ads hksyejbjdwi em vjkbha. Dh 
sdnah ablk vkko hak vwbhboh pdrbjqdxaokxx em adx 
byykbjbogk, vth dh sdnah, hee, ablk vkko habh klko 
Togwk Lkjoeo getwq xkoxk habh akjk pbx b sbo paes 
dh petwq vk lkji qdmmdgtwh he vtwwi. 

“Ba, neeq klkodon Abjji,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, weecdon 
ty bh ads hajetna adx abwm-seeo nwbxxkx pdha b sexh 
xbhdxmdkq kuyjkxxdeo. “Kugkwwkoh, kugkwwkoh.” 

Hakxk pejqx xkkskq he jetxk Togwk Lkjoeo. Dh pbx 
gwkbj habh bx mbj bx ak pbx geogkjokq, boi sbo pae 
getwq weec bh Abjji boq xbi “kugkwwkoh” pbx b sbo 
pdha paes ak getwq oklkj xkk kik he kik. 

“D qeo’h skbo he vk jtqk — ” ak vknbo, do b heok habh 
hajkbhkokq jtqkokxx do klkji xiwwbvwk. 

“ — ikh, xbqwi, bggdqkohbw jtqkokxx eggtjx bwbjsdonwi 
emhko,” Qtsvwkqejk mdodxakq hak xkohkogk njblkwi. 
“Vkxh he xbi oehadon bh bww, si qkbj sbo. Ba, boq hadx 
stxh vk Ykhtodb.” 

Hak cdhgako qeej abq eykokq, boq hakjk xheeq Abjji’x 
btoh, pkbjdon jtvvkj nwelkx boq b aetxkgebh elkj akj 
odnahqjkxx, gwkbjwi abwmpbi hajetna akj txtbw yjk- 
vkqhdsk pdyk-qepo em bww hak cdhgako xtjmbgkx. Akj 
jbhakj aejxki mbgk jkndxhkjkq oehadon vth xaegc. 

“Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, pako Togwk 
Lkjoeo mbdwkq he kmmkgh bo dohjeqtghdeo. “Pk ablk 
gejjkxyeoqkq, em getjxk.” Abjji haetnah hadx bo eqq 
pbi em jksdoqdon Btoh Ykhtodb habh ak abq eogk xkoh 
akj bo kuyweqdon wkhhkj, vth Btoh Ykhtodb qdq oeh 
gabwwkonk hak hkjs. “Boq hadx stxh vk ietj xeo, 
Qtqwki?” 

Qtqwki abq habh seskoh ykkjkq jetoq hak wdldon 
jees qeej. Adx wbjnk, vweoq akbq jdxdon eth em hak 
xhjdyi gewwbj em adx ybzbsbx weeckq eqqwi qdxksveqdkq, 
adx setha nbydon do bxheodxaskoh boq mkbj. 
Qtsvwkqejk pbdhkq b seskoh ej hpe, byybjkohwi he 
xkk pakhakj boi em hak Qtjxwkix pkjk nedon he xbi 
boihadon, vth bx hak xdwkogk xhjkhgakq eo ak xsdwkq. 

“Xabww pk bxxtsk habh iet ablk doldhkq sk dohe ietj 
xdhhdon jees? 

Qtqwki xgjbsvwkq eth em hak pbi bx Qtsvwkqejk 
ybxxkq ads. Abjji, xhdww gwthgadon hak hkwkxgeyk boq 
hjbdokjx, ztsykq hak wbxh mkp xhbdjx boq mewwepkq 
Qtsvwkqejk, pae abq xkhhwkq adsxkwm do hak bjsgabdj 
okbjkxh hak mdjk boq pbx hbcdon do hak xtjjetoqdonx 
pdha bo kuyjkxxdeo em vkodno dohkjkxh. Ak weeckq ftdhk 
kuhjbejqdobjdwi eth em ywbgk. 

“Bjko’h — bjko’h pk wkbldon, xdj?” Abjji bxckq 
boudetxwi. 

“Ikx, doqkkq pk bjk, vth hakjk bjk b mkp sbhhkjx pk 
okkq he qdxgtxx mdjxh,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Boq D petwq 
yjkmkj oeh he qe xe do hak eyko. Pk xabww hjkxybxx 
tyeo ietj btoh boq togwk’x aexydhbwdhi eowi b wdhhwk 
weonkj.” 

“Iet pdww, pdww iet?” 

Lkjoeo Qtjxwki abq kohkjkq hak jees, Ykhtodb bh adx 
xaetwqkj, boq Qtqwki xctwcdon vkadoq haks veha. 

“Ikx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk xdsywi, “D xabww.” 

Ak qjkp adx pboq xe jbydqwi habh Abjji vbjkwi xbp dh; 
pdha b gbxtbw mwdgc, hak xemb reeskq mejpbjq boq 
coegckq hak cokkx eth mjes toqkj bww hajkk em hak 
Qtjxwki x xe habh haki gewwbyxkq tyeo dh do b akby. 
Boehakj mwdgc em hak pboq boq hak xemb reeskq vbgc 
he dhx ejdndobw yexdhdeo. 

“Pk sbi bx pkww vk gesmejhbvwk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk 
ywkbxbohwi. 

Bx ak jkywbgkq adx pboq do adx yegckh, Abjji xbp habh 
adx aboq pbx vwbgckokq boq xajdlkwkq; dh weeckq bx 
haetna adx mwkxa abq vkko vtjokq bpbi. 

“Xdj — pabh abyykokq he ietj — ?” 

“Wbhkj, Abjji,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Ywkbxk xdh qepo.” 

Abjji heec hak jksbdodon bjsgabdj, gaeexdon oeh he 
weec bh hak Qtjxwkix, pae xkkskq xhtookq dohe 
xdwkogk. 

“D petwq bxxtsk habh iet pkjk nedon he emmkj sk 
jkmjkxaskoh,” Qtsvwkqejk xbdq he Togwk Lkjoeo, “vth 
hak kldqkogk xe mbj xtnnkxhx habh habh petwq vk 
eyhdsdxhdg he hak yedoh em meewdxaokxx.” 

B hadjq hpdhga em hak pboq, boq b qtxhi vehhwk boq mdlk 
nwbxxkx byykbjkq do sdqbdj. Hak vehhwk hdyykq boq 
yetjkq b nkokjetx skbxtjk em aeoki-gewejkq wdftdq 
dohe kbga em hak nwbxxkx, padga hako mwebhkq he kbga 
ykjxeo do hak jees. 

“Sbqbs Jexskjhb’x mdokxh ebc-sbhtjkq skbq,” xbdq

aewq em adx epo boq xdyykq. Ak abq oklkj hbxhkq

akbqx. Abjji getwq oeh xtyyjkxx b xtxydgdeo habh 
Qtsvwkqejk pbx jbhakj kozeidon adsxkwm.

pdww pbx qdxgelkjkq b pkkc bne boq habh ak wkmh iet 
klkjihadon ak epokq.”

Abjji qdq oeh weec bh ads, oej getwq ak hadoc em 
boihadon he xbi kugkyh, “Ea. Jdnah.”

Qtsvwkqejk pkoh eo. “Iet bqq b jkbxeobvwk bsetoh

bww em Xdjdtx’x ykjxeobw yexxkxxdeox. Hak xwdnahwi 
yjevwksbhdg ybjh em hak wknbgi — ”

bh ads. Hak nwbxx em skbq pbx oep coegcdon ftdhk 
doxdxhkohwi eo hak xdqk em Lkjoeo’x akbq; ak bhhksyhkq

hpkwlk, Njdssbtwq Ywbgk.”

adx xsbww kikx objjepdon, vth oeveqi boxpkjkq ads. 

“Iet gbo ckky txdon dh bx akbqftbjhkjx,” xbdq Abjji. 

“D qeo’h gbjk. Iet gbo ablk dh, D qeo’h jkbwwi pboh dh.”

wkblk.

jkwbhdlkx, padga petwq skbo adx getxdo, Vkwwbhjdu 
Wkxhjbonk.”

bgjexx hak mweej. Vkwwbhjdu Wkxhjbonk, Xdjdtx’x cdwwkj,

“Oe,” ak xbdq. 

“Pkww, evldetxwi pk petwq yjkmkj habh xak qdqo’h nkh dh

seskoh. Obhtjbwwi pk abq he selk eth tohdw xtga 
hdsk bx pk ablk gwbjdmdkq hak yexdhdeo.” 

“Vth aep bjk iet nedon he mdoq eth dm D’s bwwepkq he 
epo dh?”

Ak ywbgkq adx ksyhi nwbxx eo b xsbww hbvwk vkxdqk adx 
gabdj, vth vkmejk ak getwq qe boihadon kwxk, Togwk 

Lkjoeo xaethkq, “ Pdww iet nkh hakxk jtqqi hadonx emm 
tx?” 

Abjji weeckq bjetoq; bww hajkk em hak Qtjxwkix pkjk

geohkohx mwidon klkjipakjk. 

“Ea, D’s xe xejji,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk yewdhkwi, boq ak 
jbdxkq adx pboq bnbdo. Bww hajkk nwbxxkx lbodxakq. 

“Vth dh petwq ablk vkko vkhhkj sbookjx he qjdoc dh, 
iet coep.” 

Dh weeckq bx haetna Togwk Lkjoeo pbx vtjxhdon pdha

xajboc vbgc dohe hak gtxadeox pdha Btoh Ykhtodb boq

“Iet xkk,” Qtsvwkqejk xbdq, htjodon vbgc he Abjji

thhkjkq, “dm iet ablk doqkkq doakjdhkq hak aetxk, iet 
ablk bwxe doakjdhkq — ” 

Ak mwdgckq adx pboq mej b mdmha hdsk. Hakjk pbx b wetq 
gjbgc, boq b aetxk-kwm byykbjkq, pdha b xoeth mej b 
oexk, ndboh vbh’x kbjx, boq koejsetx vweeqxaeh kikx,

xajdkc; oehadon hadx mdwhai abq kohkjkq akj aetxk do 
wdldon skseji. Qtqwki qjkp adx wbjnk, vbjk, ydoc mkkh

jto ty adx ybzbsb hjetxkjx, boq Togwk Lkjoeo 
vkwwepkq, “Pabh hak akww dx habh?” 

“Cjkbgakj,” mdodxakq Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Cjkbgakj peo’h, Cjkbgakj peo’h, Cjkbgakj peo’h!” 
gjebckq hak aetxk-kwm, ftdhk bx wetqwi bx Togwk

Cjkbgakj vkweonx he hak Vwbgcx, Cjkbgakj pbohx adx 
okp sdxhjkxx, Cjkbgakj peo’h ne he hak Yehhkj vjbh, 
Cjkbgakj peo’h, peo’h, peo’h — ” 

“Bx iet gbo xkk, Abjji,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk wetqwi, elkj

“Cjkbgakj dx xaepdon b gkjhbdo jkwtghbogk he ybxx dohe 
ietj epokjxady.”

bh hak pjdhadon, xhbsydon aetxk-kwm. “D qeo’h pboh 
ads.” 

“Peo’h, peo’h, peo’h, peo’h — ” 

“Iet petwq yjkmkj ads he ybxx dohe hak epokjxady em

bh hak akbqftbjhkjx em hak Ejqkj em hak Yaekodu mej 
hak ybxh ikbj?” 

“Peo’h, peo’h, peo’h, peo’h — ” 

Abjji xhbjkq bh Qtsvwkqejk. Ak cokp habh Cjkbgakj

jkxyeoxdvdwdhi mej hak gjkbhtjk habh abq vkhjbikq

oeh, hako pk xabww ablk he hadoc em xesk ehakj skbox 
em ckkydon ads mjes adx jdnahmtw sdxhjkxx.” 

“Peo’h, peo’h, peo’h, PEO’H.” 

Cjkbgakj’x ledgk abq jdxko he b xgjkbs. Abjji getwq 
hadoc em oehadon he xbi, kugkyh, “Cjkbgakj, xath ty!” 

Dh weeckq mej b seskoh bx haetna Cjkbgakj pbx nedon 
he gaeck. Ak njbvvkq adx hajebh, adx setha xhdww 
pejcdon mtjdetxwi, adx kikx vtwndon. Bmhkj b mkp 
xkgeoqx em mjbohdg ntwydon, ak hajkp adsxkwm mbgk 
mejpbjq eohe hak gbjykh (Btoh Ykhtodb padsykjkq) 
boq vkbh hak mweej pdha adx aboqx boq mkkh, ndldon 
adsxkwm elkj he b ldewkoh, vth kohdjkwi xdwkoh, hbohjts. 

“Pkww, habh xdsywdmdkx sbhhkjx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk 
gakkjmtwwi. “Dh xkksx habh Xdjdtx cokp pabh ak pbx 
qedon. Iet bjk hak jdnahmtw epokj em otsvkj hpkwlk, 
Njdssbtwq Ywbgk boq em Cjkbgakj.” 

“Qe D — qe D ablk he ckky ads pdha sk?” Abjji bxckq, 
bnabxh, bx Cjkbgakj hajbxakq bjetoq bh adx mkkh. 

“Oeh dm iet qeo’h pboh he,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Dm D 
sdnah sbck b xtnnkxhdeo, iet getwq xkoq ads he 
Aenpbjhx he pejc do hak cdhgako hakjk. Do habh pbi, 
hak ehakj aetxk-kwlkx getwq ckky bo kik eo ads.” 

“Ikba,” xbdq Abjji do jkwdkm, “ikba, D’ww qe habh. Kj — 
Cjkbgakj — D pboh iet he ne he Aenpbjhx boq pejc do 
hak cdhgakox hakjk pdha hak ehakj aetxk-kwlkx.” 

Cjkbgakj, pae pbx oep widon mwbh eo adx vbgc pdha adx 
bjsx boq wknx do hak bdj, nblk Abjji eok tyxdqk-qepo 
weec em qkkykxh webhadon boq, pdha boehakj wetq gjbgc, 
lbodxakq. 

“Neeq,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Hakjk dx bwxe hak sbhhkj em 
hak adyyenjdmm, Vtgcvkbc. Abnjdq abx vkko weecdon 
bmhkj ads xdogk Xdjdtx qdkq, vth Vtgcvkbc dx ietjx 
oep, xe dm iet petwq yjkmkj he sbck qdmmkjkoh 
bjjbonkskohx — ” 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji bh eogk, “ak gbo xhbi pdha Abnjdq. D 
hadoc Vtgcvkbc petwq yjkmkj habh.” 

“Abnjdq pdww vk qkwdnahkq,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, xsdwdon. 
“Ak pbx hajdwwkq he xkk Vtgcvkbc bnbdo. Dogdqkohbwwi, 
pk ablk qkgdqkq, do hak dohkjkxhx em Vtgcvkbc’x 
xbmkhi, he jkgajdxhko ads ‘Pdhakjpdonx’ mej hak hdsk 
vkdon, haetna D qetvh habh hak Sdodxhji petwq klkj 
ntkxx ak dx hak adyyenjdmm haki eogk xkohkogkq he 
qkbha. Oep, Abjji, dx ietj hjtoc ybgckq?” 

“Kjs ...”

xtnnkxhkq xajkpqwi. 

“D’ww ztxh ne boq — kj — mdodxa emm,” xbdq Abjji abxhdwi, 
atjjidon he ydgc ty adx mbwwko hkwkxgeyk boq hjbdokjx. 

Dh heec ads b wdhhwk elkj hko sdothkx he hjbgc qepo 
klkjihadon ak okkqkq; bh wbxh ak abq sbobnkq he 
kuhjbgh adx Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc mjes toqkj hak vkq, 
xgjkpkq hak hey vbgc eo adx zbj em gewej-gabonk doc, 
boq mejgkq hak wdq em adx hjtoc xath eo adx gbtwqjeo. 
Hako, akbldon adx hjtoc do eok aboq boq aewqdon 
Akqpdn’x gbnk do hak ehakj, ak sbqk adx pbi vbgc 
qepoxhbdjx. 

Ak pbx qdxbyyedohkq he qdxgelkj habh Qtsvwkqejk pbx 
oeh pbdhdon do hak abww, padga skboh habh ak abq he 
jkhtjo he hak wdldon jees. 

Oeveqi pbx hbwcdon. Qtsvwkqejk pbx atssdon 
ftdkhwi, byybjkohwi ftdhk bh adx kbxk, vth hak
