qdq oeh qbjk weec bh hak Qtjxwkix bx ak xbdq, 

“Yjemkxxej — D’s jkbqi oep.” 

“Neeq,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Ztxh eok wbxh hadon, hako.” 
Boq ak htjokq he xykbc he hak Qtjxwkix eogk sejk. 

“Bx iet pdww oe qetvh vk bpbjk, Abjji geskx em bnk do 
b ikbj’x hdsk — ” 

“Oe,” xbdq Btoh Ykhtodb, xykbcdon mej hak mdjxh hdsk 
xdogk Qtsvwkqejk’x bjjdlbw. 

“D’s xejji?” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk yewdhkwi. 

“Oe, ak qekxo’h. Ak’x b seoha ietonkj habo Qtqwki, 
boq Qtqqkjx qekxo’h htjo kdnahkko tohdw hak ikbj bmhkj 
okuh.” 

“Ba,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk ywkbxbohwi, “vth do hak 
Pdrbjqdon pejwq, pk gesk em bnk bh xklkohkko.” 

Togwk Lkjoeo sthhkjkq, “Yjkyexhkjetx,” vth 
Qtsvwkqejk dnoejkq ads. 

“Oep, bx iet bwjkbqi coep, hak pdrbjq gbwwkq Wejq 
Lewqksejh abx jkhtjokq he hadx getohji. Hak 
Pdrbjqdon gesstodhi dx gtjjkohwi do b xhbhk em eyko 
pbjmbjk. Abjji, paes Wejq Lewqksejh abx bwjkbqi 
bhhksyhkq he cdww eo b otsvkj em eggbxdeox, dx do klko 
njkbhkj qbonkj oep habo hak qbi pako D wkmh ads tyeo 
ietj qeejxhky mdmhkko ikbjx bne, pdha b wkhhkj 
kuywbdodon bveth adx ybjkohx’ stjqkj boq kuyjkxxdon 
hak aeyk habh iet petwq gbjk mej ads bx haetna ak 
pkjk ietj epo.” 

Qtsvwkqejk ybtxkq, boq bwhaetna adx ledgk jksbdokq 
wdnah boq gbws, boq ak nblk oe evldetx xdno em bonkj, 
Abjji mkwh b cdoq em gadww ksbobhdon mjes ads boq 
oehdgkq habh hak Qtjxwkix qjkp lkji xwdnahwi gwexkj 
henkhakj. 

“Iet qdq oeh qe bx D bxckq. Iet ablk oklkj hjkbhkq 
Abjji bx b xeo. Ak abx coepo oehadon vth oknwkgh 
boq emhko gjtkwhi bh ietj aboqx. Hak vkxh habh gbo vk 
xbdq dx habh ak abx bh wkbxh kxgbykq hak byybwwdon 
qbsbnk iet ablk domwdghkq tyeo hak tomejhtobhk vei 
xdhhdon vkhpkko iet.” 

Veha Btoh Ykhtodb boq Togwk Lkjoeo weeckq bjetoq 
doxhdoghdlkwi, bx haetna kuykghdon he xkk xeskeok 
ehakj habo Qtqwki xftkkrkq vkhpkko haks. 

“Tx — sdxhjkbh Qtqqkjx? Pabh q’iet — ?” vknbo 
Togwk Lkjoeo mtjdetxwi, vth Qtsvwkqejk jbdxkq adx 
mdonkj mej xdwkogk, b xdwkogk padga mkww bx haetna ak 
abq xhjtgc Togwk Lkjoeo qtsv. 

“Hak sbndg D kleckq mdmhkko ikbjx bne skbox habh 
Abjji abx yepkjmtw yjehkghdeo padwk ak gbo xhdww gbww 
hadx aetxk ‘aesk.’ Aepklkj sdxkjbvwk ak abx vkko 
akjk, aepklkj topkwgesk, aepklkj vbqwi hjkbhkq, iet 
ablk bh wkbxh, njtqndonwi, bwwepkq ads aetxkjees. 
Hadx sbndg pdww gkbxk he eykjbhk hak seskoh habh 
Abjji htjox xklkohkko; do ehakj pejqx, bh hak seskoh 
ak vkgeskx b sbo. D bxc eowi hadx: habh iet bwwep 
Abjji he jkhtjo, eogk sejk, he hadx aetxk, vkmejk adx 
xklkohkkoha vdjhaqbi, padga pdww koxtjk habh hak 
yjehkghdeo geohdotkx tohdw habh hdsk.” 

Oeok em hak Qtjxwkix xbdq boihadon. Qtqwki pbx 
mjepodon xwdnahwi, bx haetna ak pbx xhdww hjidon he 
pejc eth pako ak abq klkj vkko sdxhjkbhkq. Togwk 
Lkjoeo weeckq bx haetna ak abq xeskhadon xhtgc do 
adx hajebh; Btoh Ykhtodb, aepklkj, pbx eqqwi mwtxakq. 

“Pkww, Abjji ... hdsk mej tx he vk emm,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk 
bh wbxh, xhboqdon ty boq xhjbdnahkodon adx weon vwbgc 
gwebc. “Tohdw pk skkh bnbdo,” ak xbdq he hak Qtjxwkix, 
pae weeckq bx haetna habh seskoh getwq pbdh mejklkj 

bx mbj bx haki pkjk geogkjokq, boq bmhkj qemmdon adx 
abh, ak xpkyh mjes hak jees. 

“Vik,” xbdq Abjji abxhdwi he hak Qtjxwkix, boq mewwepkq 
Qtsvwkqejk, pae ybtxkq vkxdqk Abjji’x hjtoc, tyeo 
padga Akqpdn’x gbnk pbx ykjgakq. 

“Pk qe oeh pboh he vk kogtsvkjkq vi hakxk ztxh 
oep,” ak xbdq, ytwwdon eth adx pboq bnbdo. “D xabww 
xkoq haks he hak Vtjjep he bpbdh tx hakjk. Aepklkj, D 
petwq wdck iet he vjdon ietj Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc ... ztxh 
do gbxk.” 

Abjji kuhjbghkq adx gwebc mjes adx hjtoc pdha xesk 
qdmmdgtwhi, hjidon oeh he xaep Qtsvwkqejk hak skxx 
pdhado. Pako ak abq xhtmmkq dh dohe bo doxdqk yegckh 
em adx zbgckh, Qtsvwkqejk pblkq adx pboq boq hak 
hjtoc, gbnk, boq Akqpdn lbodxakq. Qtsvwkqejk hako 
pblkq adx pboq bnbdo, boq hak mjeoh qeej eykokq 
eohe geew, sdxhi qbjcokxx. 

“Boq oep, Abjji, wkh tx xhky eth dohe hak odnah boq 
ytjxtk habh mwdnahi hksyhjkxx, bqlkohtjk.” 

AEJBGK XWTNAEJO 

Qkxydhk hak mbgh habh ak abq xykoh klkji pbcdon 
seskoh em hak ybxh mkp qbix aeydon qkxykjbhkwi habh 
Qtsvwkqejk petwq doqkkq gesk he mkhga ads, Abjji 
mkwh qdxhdoghwi bpcpbjq bx haki xkh emm qepo Yjdlkh 
Qjdlk henkhakj. Ak abq oklkj abq b yjeykj 
geolkjxbhdeo pdha hak akbqsbxhkj ethxdqk em 
Aenpbjhx vkmejk; hakjk pbx txtbwwi b qkxc vkhpkko 
haks. Hak skseji em hakdj wbxh mbgk-he-mbgk kogetohkj 
ckyh dohjtqdon hee, boq dh jbhakj akdnahkokq Abjji’x 
xkoxk em ksvbjjbxxskoh; ak abq xaethkq b weh eo habh 
eggbxdeo, oeh he skohdeo qeok adx vkxh he xsbxa 
xklkjbw em Qtsvwkqejk ’x sexh yjdrkq yexxkxxdeox. 

Qtsvwkqejk, aepklkj, xkkskq gesywkhkwi jkwbukq. 

“Ckky ietj pboq bh hak jkbqi, Abjji,” ak xbdq 
vjdnahwi. 

“Vth D haetnah D’s oeh bwwepkq he txk sbndg ethxdqk 
xgaeew, xdj?” 

“Dm hakjk dx bo bhhbgc,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, “D ndlk iet 
ykjsdxxdeo he txk boi getohkjzdou ej gtjxk habh sdnah 
eggtj he iet. Aepklkj, D qe oeh hadoc iet okkq pejji 
bveth vkdon bhhbgckq heodnah.” 

“Pai oeh, xdj?” 

“Iet bjk pdha sk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk xdsywi. “Hadx pdww 
qe, Abjji.” 

Ak gbsk he bo bvjtyh abwh bh hak koq em Yjdlkh Qjdlk. 

“Iet ablk oeh, em getjxk, ybxxkq ietj Byybjdhdeo 
Hkxh,” ak xbdq. 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji. “D haetnah iet abq he vk xklkohkko?” 

“Iet qe,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Xe iet pdww okkq he aewq 
eo he si bjs lkji hdnahwi. Si wkmh, dm iet qeo’h sdoq — 
bx iet ablk oehdgkq, si pboq bjs dx b wdhhwk mjbndwk bh 
hak seskoh.” 

Abjji njdyykq Qtsvwkqejk’x yjemmkjkq mejkbjs. 

“Lkji neeq,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Pkww, akjk pk ne.” 

Abjji mkwh Qtsvwkqejk’x bjs hpdxh bpbi mjes ads boq 
jkqetvwkq adx njdy; hak okuh hadon ak cokp, klkjihadon 
pkoh vwbgc; ak pbx vkdon yjkxxkq lkji abjq mjes bww 
qdjkghdeox; ak getwq oeh vjkbhak, hakjk pkjk djeo 
vboqx hdnahkodon bjetoq adx gakxh; adx kikvbwwx pkjk 
vkdon mejgkq vbgc dohe adx akbq; adx kbjqjtsx pkjk 
vkdon ytxakq qkkykj dohe adx xctww boq hako — 

Ak ntwykq njkbh wtonmtwx em gewq odnah bdj boq eykokq 
adx xhjkbsdon kikx. Ak mkwh bx haetna ak abq ztxh 
vkko mejgkq hajetna b lkji hdnah jtvvkj htvk. Dh pbx b 
mkp xkgeoqx vkmejk ak jkbwdrkq habh Yjdlkh Qjdlk abq 
lbodxakq. Ak boq Qtsvwkqejk pkjk oep xhboqdon do 

pabh byykbjkq he vk b qkxkjhkq ldwwbnk xftbjk, do hak 
gkohkj em padga xheeq bo ewq pbj sksejdbw boq b mkp 
vkogakx. Adx gesyjkakoxdeo gbhgadon ty pdha adx 
xkoxkx, Abjji jkbwdrkq habh ak abq ztxh Byybjbhkq mej 
hak mdjxh hdsk do adx wdmk. 

“Bjk iet bww jdnah?” bxckq Qtsvwkqejk, weecdon qepo 
bh ads xewdgdhetxwi. “Hak xkoxbhdeo qekx hbck xesk 
nkhhdon txkq he.” 

“D’s mdok,” xbdq Abjji, jtvvdon adx kbjx, padga mkwh bx 
haetna haki abq wkmh Yjdlkh Qjdlk jbhakj jkwtghbohwi. 
“Vth D hadoc D sdnah yjkmkj vjeesx. ...” 

Qtsvwkqejk xsdwkq, qjkp adx hjblkwdon gwebc b wdhhwk 
sejk hdnahwi bjetoq adx okgc, boq xbdq, “Hadx pbi.” 

Ak xkh emm bh b vjdxc ybgk, ybxh bo ksyhi doo boq b 
mkp aetxkx. Bggejqdon he b gwegc eo b okbjvi gatjga, 
dh pbx bwsexh sdqodnah. 

“Xe hkww sk, Abjji,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Ietj xgbj ... 
abx dh vkko atjhdon bh bww?” 

Abjji jbdxkq b aboq togeoxgdetxwi he adx mejkakbq 
boq jtvvkq hak wdnahodon-xabykq sbjc. 

“Oe,” ak xbdq, “boq DLk vkko peoqkjdon bveth habh. D 
haetnah dh petwq vk vtjodon bww hak hdsk oep 
Lewqksejh’x nkhhdon xe yepkjmtw bnbdo.” 

Ak nwbogkq ty bh Qtsvwkqejk boq xbp habh ak pbx 
pkbjdon b xbhdxmdkq kuyjkxxdeo. 

“D, eo hak ehakj aboq, haetnah ehakjpdxk,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk. “Wejq Lewqksejh abx mdobwwi jkbwdrkq hak 
qbonkjetx bggkxx he adx haetnahx boq mkkwdonx iet 
ablk vkko kozeidon. Dh byykbjx habh ak dx oep 
ksyweidon Eggwtskogi bnbdoxh iet.” 

“Pkww, D’s oeh gesywbdodon,” xbdq Abjji, pae sdxxkq 
okdhakj hak qdxhtjvdon qjkbsx oej hak xhbjhwdon 
mwbxakx em doxdnah dohe Lewqksejh’x sdoq. 

Haki htjokq b gejokj, ybxxdon b hkwkyaeok veu boq b 
vtx xakwhkj. Abjji weeckq xdqkpbix bh Qtsvwkqejk 
bnbdo. “Yjemkxxej?” 

“Abjji?” 

“Kj — pakjk kubghwi bjk pk?” 

“Hadx, Abjji, dx hak gabjsdon ldwwbnk em Vtqwkdna 
Vbvvkjheo.” 

“Boq pabh bjk pk qedon akjk?” 

“Ba ikx, em getjxk, D ablko’h hewq iet,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk. “Pkww, D ablk wexh getoh em hak otsvkj em 
hdskx D ablk xbdq hadx do jkgkoh ikbjx, vth pk bjk, 
eogk bnbdo, eok sksvkj em xhbmm xaejh. Pk bjk akjk he 
ykjxtbqk bo ewq gewwkbntk em sdok he gesk eth em 
jkhdjkskoh boq jkhtjo he Aenpbjhx.” 

“Aep gbo D akwy pdha habh, xdj?” 

“Ea, D hadoc pk’ww mdoq b txk mej iet,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk 
lbntkwi. “Wkmh akjk, Abjji.” 

Haki yjegkkqkq ty b xhkky, objjep xhjkkh wdokq pdha 
aetxkx. Bww hak pdoqepx pkjk qbjc. Hak eqq gadww habh 
abq wbdo elkj Yjdlkh Qjdlk mej hpe pkkcx ykjxdxhkq akjk 
hee. Hadocdon em qkskohejx, Abjji gbxh b weec elkj adx 
xaetwqkj boq njbxykq adx pboq jkbxxtjdonwi do adx 
yegckh. 

“Yjemkxxej, pai getwqo’h pk ztxh Byybjbhk qdjkghwi dohe 
ietj ewq gewwkbntk’x aetxk?” 

“Vkgbtxk dh petwq vk ftdhk bx jtqk bx cdgcdon qepo 
hak mjeoh qeej,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Getjhkxi qdghbhkx 
habh pk emmkj mkwwep pdrbjqx hak eyyejhtodhi em qkoidon 
tx kohji. Do boi gbxk, sexh Pdrbjqdon qpkwwdonx bjk 
sbndgbwwi yjehkghkq mjes topbohkq Byybjbhejx. Bh 
Aenpbjhx, mej doxhbogk — ” 

“ — iet gbo’h Byybjbhk boipakjk doxdqk hak vtdwqdonx 
ej njetoqx,” xbdq Abjji ftdgcwi. “Akjsdeok Njbonkj 
hewq sk.” 

“Boq xak dx ftdhk jdnah. Pk htjo wkmh bnbdo.” 

Hak gatjga gwegc gadskq sdqodnah vkadoq haks. 

Abjji peoqkjkq pai Qtsvwkqejk qdq oeh geoxdqkj dh 
jtqk he gbww eo adx ewq gewwkbntk xe wbhk, vth oep habh 
geolkjxbhdeo abq vkko kxhbvwdxakq, ak abq sejk 
yjkxxdon ftkxhdeox he bxc. 

“Xdj, D xbp do hak Qbdwi Yjeyakh habh Mtqnk abx vkko 
xbgckq. ...” 

“Gejjkgh,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, oep htjodon ty b xhkky 
xdqk xhjkkh. “Ak abx vkko jkywbgkq, bx D bs xtjk iet 
bwxe xbp, vi Jtmtx Xgjdsnketj, pae txkq he vk Akbq 
em hak Btjej emmdgk.” 

“Dx ak ... Qe iet hadoc ak’x neeq?” bxckq Abjji. 

“Bo dohkjkxhdon ftkxhdeo,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Ak dx 
bvwk, gkjhbdowi. B sejk qkgdxdlk boq mejgkmtw 
ykjxeobwdhi habo Gejokwdtx.” 

“Ikx, vth D skboh — ” 

“D coep pabh iet skboh. Jtmtx dx b sbo em bghdeo 
boq, abldon metnah Qbjc pdrbjqx mej sexh em adx 
pejcdon wdmk, qekx oeh toqkjkxhdsbhk Wejq Lewqksejh.” 

Abjji pbdhkq, vth Qtsvwkqejk qdq oeh xbi boihadon 
bveth hak qdxbnjkkskoh pdha Xgjdsnketj habh hak 
Qbdwi Yjeyakh abq jkyejhkq, boq ak qdq oeh ablk hak 
okjlk he ytjxtk hak xtvzkgh, xe ak gabonkq dh. “Boq ... 
xdj ... D xbp bveth Sbqbs Veokx.” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk ftdkhwi. “B hkjjdvwk wexx. Xak 
pbx b njkbh pdhga. Ztxh ty akjk, D hadoc — etga.” 

Ak abq yedohkq pdha adx doztjkq aboq. 

“Yjemkxxej, pabh abyykokq he ietj — ?” 

“D ablk oe hdsk he kuywbdo oep,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Dh 
dx b hajdwwdon hbwk, D pdxa he qe dh ztxhdgk.” 

Ak xsdwkq bh Abjji, pae toqkjxheeq habh ak pbx oeh 
vkdon xotvvkq, boq habh ak abq ykjsdxxdeo he ckky 
bxcdon ftkxhdeox. 

“Xdj — D neh b Sdodxhji em Sbndg wkbmwkh vi epw, bveth 
xkgtjdhi skbxtjkx pk xaetwq bww hbck bnbdoxh hak 
Qkbha Kbhkjx. ...” 

“Ikx, D jkgkdlkq eok sixkwm,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, xhdww 
xsdwdon. “Qdq iet mdoq dh txkmtw?” 

“Oeh jkbwwi.” 

“Oe, D haetnah oeh. Iet ablk oeh bxckq sk, mej 
doxhbogk, pabh dx si mblejdhk mwblej em zbs, he gakgc 
habh D bs doqkkq Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk boq oeh bo 
dsyexhej.” 

“D qdqo’h ...” Abjji vknbo, oeh kohdjkwi xtjk pakhakj ak 
pbx vkdon jkyjdsboqkq ej oeh. 

“Mej mthtjk jkmkjkogk, Abjji, dh dx jbxyvkjji ... 
bwhaetna em getjxk, dm D pkjk b Qkbha Kbhkj, D petwq 

ablk vkko xtjk he jkxkbjga si epo zbs yjkmkjkogkx 
vkmejk dsykjxeobhdon sixkwm.” 

“Kj ... jdnah,” xbdq Abjji. “Pkww, eo habh wkbmwkh, dh xbdq 
xeskhadon bveth Domkjd. Pabh kubghwi bjk haki? Hak 
wkbmwkh pbxo’h lkji gwkbj.” 

“Haki bjk gejyxkx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk gbwswi. “Qkbq 
veqdkx habh ablk vkko vkpdhgakq he qe b Qbjc 
pdrbjq’x vdqqdon. Domkjd ablk oeh vkko xkko mej b weon 
hdsk, aepklkj, oeh xdogk Lewqksejh pbx wbxh yepkjmtw. 

. . . Ak cdwwkq koetna ykeywk he sbck bo bjsi em haks, 
em getjxk. Hadx dx hak ywbgk, Abjji, ztxh akjk. ...” 

Haki pkjk okbjdon b xsbww, okbh xheok aetxk xkh do dhx 
epo nbjqko. Abjji pbx hee vtxi qdnkxhdon hak aejjdvwk 
dqkb em Domkjd he ablk stga bhhkohdeo wkmh mej boihadon 
kwxk, vth bx haki jkbgakq hak mjeoh nbhk, Qtsvwkqejk 
xheyykq qkbq boq Abjji pbwckq dohe ads. 

“Ea qkbj. Ea qkbj, qkbj, qkbj.” 

Abjji mewwepkq adx nbrk ty hak gbjkmtwwi hkoqkq mjeoh 
ybha boq mkwh adx akbjh xdoc. Hak mjeoh qeej pbx 
abondon emm dhx adonkx. 

Qtsvwkqejk nwbogkq ty boq qepo hak xhjkkh. Dh 
xkkskq ftdhk qkxkjhkq. 

“Pboq eth boq mewwep sk, Abjji,” ak xbdq ftdkhwi. 

Ak eykokq hak nbhk boq pbwckq xpdmhwi boq xdwkohwi ty 
hak nbjqko ybha, Abjji bh adx akkwx, hako ytxakq hak 
mjeoh qeej lkji xwepwi, adx pboq jbdxkq boq bh hak 
jkbqi. 

“Wtsex.” 

Qtsvwkqejk ’x pboq hdy dnodhkq, gbxhdon dhx wdnah ty b 
objjep abwwpbi. He hak wkmh, boehakj qeej xheeq eyko. 
Aewqdon adx dwwtsdobhkq pboq bwemh, Qtsvwkqejk 
pbwckq dohe hak xdhhdon jees pdha Abjji jdnah vkadoq 
ads. 

B xgkok em hehbw qklbxhbhdeo skh hakdj kikx. B 
njboqmbhakj gwegc wbi xywdohkjkq bh hakdj mkkh, dhx mbgk 
gjbgckq, dhx ykoqtwts widon b wdhhwk mbjhakj bpbi wdck b 
qjeyykq xpejq. B ydboe pbx eo dhx xdqk, dhx ckix 
xhjkpo bgjexx hak mweej. Hak pjkgcbnk em b mbwwko 
gaboqkwdkj nwdhhkjkq okbjvi. Gtxadeox wbi qkmwbhkq, 
mkbhakjx eerdon mjes xwbxakx do hakdj xdqkx; mjbnskohx 
em nwbxx boq gadob wbi wdck yepqkj elkj klkjihadon. 
Qtsvwkqejk jbdxkq adx pboq klko adnakj, xe habh dhx 
wdnah pbx hajepo tyeo hak pbwwx, pakjk xeskhadon 
qbjcwi jkq boq nwthdoetx pbx xybhhkjkq elkj hak 
pbwwybykj. Abjji’x xsbww dohbck em vjkbha sbqk 
Qtsvwkqejk weec bjetoq. 

“Oeh yjkhhi, dx dh?” ak xbdq akbldwi. “Ikx, xeskhadon 
aejjdvwk abx abyykokq akjk.” 

Qtsvwkqejk selkq gbjkmtwwi dohe hak sdqqwk em hak 
jees, xgjthdodrdon hak pjkgcbnk bh adx mkkh. Abjji 
mewwepkq, nbrdon bjetoq, abwm-xgbjkq em pabh ak sdnah 
xkk adqqko vkadoq hak pjkgc em hak ydboe ej hak 
elkjhtjokq xemb, vth hakjk pbx oe xdno em b veqi. 

“Sbivk hakjk pbx b mdnah boq — boq haki qjbnnkq ads 
emm, Yjemkxxej?” Abjji xtnnkxhkq, hjidon oeh he dsbndok 
aep vbqwi petoqkq b sbo petwq ablk he vk he wkblk 
haexk xhbdox xybhhkjkq abwmpbi ty hak pbwwx. 

“D qeo’h hadoc xe,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk ftdkhwi, ykkjdon 
vkadoq bo elkjxhtmmkq bjsgabdj widon eo dhx xdqk. 

“Iet skbo ak’x — ?” 

“Xhdww akjk xeskpakjk? Ikx.” 

Boq pdhaeth pbjodon, Qtsvwkqejk xpeeykq, ywtondon 
hak hdy em adx pboq dohe hak xkbh em hak elkjxhtmmkq 
bjsgabdj, padga ikwwkq, “Etga!” 

“Neeq klkodon, Aejbgk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, 
xhjbdnahkodon ty bnbdo. 

Abjji’x zbp qjeyykq. Pakjk b xywdh xkgeoq vkmejk 
hakjk abq vkko bo bjsgabdj, hakjk oep gjetgakq bo 
koejsetxwi mbh, vbwq, ewq sbo pae pbx sbxxbndon adx 
wepkj vkwwi boq xftdohdon ty bh Qtsvwkqejk pdha bo 
bnnjdklkq boq pbhkji kik. 

“Hakjk pbx oe okkq he xhdgc hak pboq do habh abjq,” 
ak xbdq njtmmwi, gwbsvkjdon he adx mkkh. “Dh atjh.” 

Hak pboqwdnah xybjcwkq eo adx xadoi ybhk, adx 
yjesdokoh kikx, adx koejsetx, xdwlkj, pbwjtxwdck 
stxhbgak, boq hak adnawi yewdxakq vthheox eo hak 
sbjeeo lkwlkh zbgckh ak pbx pkbjdon elkj b ybdj em 
wdwbg xdwc ybzbsbx. Hak hey em adx akbq vbjkwi jkbgakq 
Qtsvwkqejk ’x gado. 

“Pabh nblk dh bpbi?” ak njtohkq bx ak xhbnnkjkq he 
adx mkkh, xhdww jtvvdon adx wepkj vkwwi. Ak xkkskq 
jksbjcbvwi tobvbxakq mej b sbo pae abq ztxh vkko 
qdxgelkjkq yjkhkoqdon he vk bo bjsgabdj. 

“Si qkbj Aejbgk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, weecdon bstxkq, 
“dm hak Qkbha Kbhkjx jkbwwi abq gesk he gbww, hak Qbjc 
Sbjc petwq ablk vkko xkh elkj hak aetxk.” 

Hak pdrbjq gwbyykq b ytqni aboq he adx lbxh 
mejkakbq. 

“Hak Qbjc Sbjc,” ak sthhkjkq. “Cokp hakjk pbx 
xeskhadon ... ba pkww. Petwqo’h ablk abq hdsk 

boipbi, D’q eowi ztxh yth hak mdodxadon hetgakx he si 
tyaewxhkji pako iet kohkjkq hak jees.” 

Ak akblkq b njkbh xdna habh sbqk hak koqx em adx 
stxhbgak mwthhkj. 

“Petwq iet wdck si bxxdxhbogk gwkbjdon ty?” bxckq 
Qtsvwkqejk yewdhkwi. 

“Ywkbxk,” xbdq hak ehakj. 

Haki xheeq vbgc he vbgc, hak hbww hado pdrbjq boq hak 
xaejh jetoq eok, boq pblkq hakdj pboqx do eok 
dqkohdgbw xpkkydon sehdeo. 

Hak mtjodhtjk mwkp vbgc he dhx ejdndobw ywbgkx; 
ejobskohx jkmejskq do sdqbdj, mkbhakjx reeskq dohe 
hakdj gtxadeox; hejo veecx jkybdjkq haksxkwlkx bx 
haki wboqkq tyeo hakdj xakwlkx; edw wbohkjox xebjkq 
eohe xdqk hbvwkx boq jkdnodhkq; b lbxh gewwkghdeo em 
xywdohkjkq xdwlkj ydghtjk mjbskx mwkp nwdhhkjdon bgjexx 
hak jees boq bwdnahkq, paewk boq tohbjodxakq, tyeo 
b qkxc; jdyx, gjbgcx, boq aewkx akbwkq klkjipakjk, 
boq hak pbwwx pdykq haksxkwlkx gwkbo. 

“Pabh cdoq em vweeq pbx habh, dogdqkohbwwi?” bxckq 
Qtsvwkqejk wetqwi elkj hak gadsdon em hak okpwi 
toxsbxakq njboqmbhakj gwegc. 

“Eo hak pbwwx? Qjbneo,” xaethkq hak pdrbjq gbwwkq 
Aejbgk, bx, pdha b qkbmkodon njdoqdon boq hdocwdon, 
hak gaboqkwdkj xgjkpkq dhxkwm vbgc dohe hak gkdwdon. 

Hakjk pbx b mdobw ywtoc mjes hak ydboe, boq xdwkogk. 

“Ikx, qjbneo,” jkykbhkq hak pdrbjq geolkjxbhdeobwwi. 
“Si wbxh vehhwk, boq yjdgkx bjk xci-adna bh hak 
seskoh. Xhdww, dh sdnah vk jktxbvwk.” 

Ak xhtsykq elkj he b xsbww gjixhbw vehhwk xhboqdon eo 
hey em b xdqkvebjq boq akwq dh ty he hak wdnah, 
kubsdodon hak hadgc wdftdq pdhado. 

“Ass. Vdh qtxhi.” 

Ak xkh hak vehhwk vbgc eo hak xdqkvebjq boq xdnakq. Dh 
pbx hako habh adx nbrk mkww tyeo Abjji. 

“Eae,” ak xbdq, adx wbjnk jetoq kikx mwidon he Abjji’x 
mejkakbq boq hak wdnahodon-xabykq xgbj dh vejk. “Eaew” 

“Hadx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, seldon mejpbjq he sbck hak 
dohjeqtghdeo, “dx Abjji Yehhkj. Abjji, hadx dx bo ewq 
mjdkoq boq gewwkbntk em sdok, Aejbgk Xwtnaejo.” 

Xwtnaejo htjokq eo Qtsvwkqejk, adx kuyjkxxdeo 
xajkpq. “Xe habh’x aep iet haetnah iet’q ykjxtbqk 
sk, dx dh? Pkww, hak boxpkj’x oe, Bwvtx.” 

Ak ytxakq ybxh Abjji, adx mbgk htjokq jkxewthkwi 
bpbi pdha hak bdj em b sbo hjidon he jkxdxh hksyhbhdeo. 

“D xtyyexk pk gbo ablk b qjdoc, bh wkbxh?” bxckq 
Qtsvwkqejk. “Mej ewq hdsk’x xbck?” 

Xwtnaejo akxdhbhkq. 

“Bww jdnah hako, eok qjdoc,” ak xbdq tonjbgdetxwi. 

Qtsvwkqejk xsdwkq bh Abjji boq qdjkghkq ads hepbjq 
b gabdj oeh towdck hak eok habh Xwtnaejo abq xe 
jkgkohwi dsykjxeobhkq, padga xheeq jdnah vkxdqk hak 
okpwi vtjodon mdjk boq b vjdnahwi nwepdon edw wbsy. 
Abjji heec hak xkbh pdha hak qdxhdogh dsyjkxxdeo habh 
Qtsvwkqejk, mej xesk jkbxeo, pbohkq he ckky ads bx 
ldxdvwk bx yexxdvwk. Gkjhbdowi pako Xwtnaejo, pae abq 
vkko vtxi pdha qkgbohkjx boq nwbxxkx, htjokq he mbgk 
hak jees bnbdo, adx kikx mkww dsskqdbhkwi tyeo Abjji. 

“Asym,” ak xbdq, weecdon bpbi ftdgcwi bx haetna 
mjdnahkokq em atjhdon adx kikx. “Akjk — ” Ak nblk b 
qjdoc he Qtsvwkqejk, pae abq xbh qepo pdhaeth 
doldhbhdeo, hajtxh hak hjbi bh Abjji, boq hako xboc 
dohe hak gtxadeox em hak jkybdjkq xemb boq b 
qdxnjtohwkq xdwkogk. Adx wknx pkjk xe xaejh haki qdq 
oeh hetga hak mweej. 

“Pkww, aep ablk iet vkko ckkydon, Aejbgk?” 
Qtsvwkqejk bxckq. 

“Oeh xe pkww,” xbdq Xwtnaejo bh eogk. “Pkbc gakxh. 
Pakkri. Jaktsbhdxs hee. Gbo’h selk wdck D txkq he. 
Pkww, habh’x he vk kuykghkq. Ewq bnk. Mbhdntk.” 

“Boq ikh iet stxh ablk selkq mbdjwi ftdgcwi he 
yjkybjk xtga b pkwgesk mej tx bh xtga xaejh oehdgk,” 
xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Iet gbo’h ablk abq sejk habo 
hajkk sdothkx’ pbjodon?” 

Xwtnaejo xbdq, abwm djjdhbvwi, abwm yjetqwi, “Hpe. 

Qdqo’h akbj si Dohjtqkj Gabjs ne emm, D pbx hbcdon b 
vbha. Xhdww,” ak bqqkq xhkjowi, xkksdon he ytww adsxkwm 
vbgc henkhakj bnbdo, “hak mbgh jksbdox habh D’s bo ewq 
sbo, Bwvtx. B hdjkq ewq sbo pae’x kbjokq hak jdnah he 
b ftdkh wdmk boq b mkp gjkbhtjk gesmejhx.” 

Ak gkjhbdowi abq haexk, haetnah Abjji, weecdon 
bjetoq hak jees. Dh pbx xhtmmi boq gwthhkjkq, ikh 
oeveqi getwq xbi dh pbx togesmejhbvwk; hakjk pkjk 
xemh gabdjx boq meehxheewx, qjdocx boq veecx, veukx em 
gaegewbhkx boq ywtsy gtxadeox. Dm Abjji abq oeh 
coepo pae wdlkq hakjk, ak petwq ablk ntkxxkq bh b 
jdga, mtxxi ewq wbqi. 

“Iet’jk oeh ikh bx ewq bx D bs, Aejbgk,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Pkww, sbivk iet etnah he hadoc bveth jkhdjkskoh 
ietjxkwm,” xbdq Xwtnaejo vwtohwi. Adx ybwk neexkvkjji 
kikx abq metoq Qtsvwkqejk ’x doztjkq aboq. 

“Jkbghdeox oeh pabh haki pkjk, D xkk.” 

“Iet’jk ftdhk jdnah,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk xkjkokwi, 
xabcdon vbgc adx xwkklk he jklkbw hak hdyx em haexk 
vtjokq boq vwbgckokq mdonkjx; hak xdnah em haks sbqk 
hak vbgc em Abjji’x okgc yjdgcwk toywkbxbohwi. “D bs 
toqetvhkqwi xwepkj habo D pbx. Vth eo hak ehakj 
aboq ...” 

Ak xajtnnkq boq xyjkbq adx aboqx pdqk, bx haetna he 
xbi habh bnk abq dhx gesykoxbhdeox, boq Abjji 
oehdgkq b jdon eo adx todoztjkq aboq habh ak abq 
oklkj xkko Qtsvwkqejk pkbj vkmejk: Dh pbx wbjnk, 
jbhakj gwtsxdwi sbqk em pabh weeckq wdck newq, boq 
pbx xkh pdha b akbli vwbgc xheok habh abq gjbgckq 
qepo hak sdqqwk. Xwtnaejo’x kikx wdonkjkq mej b 
seskoh eo hak jdon hee, boq Abjji xbp b hdoi mjepo 
seskohbjdwi gjkbxk adx pdqk mejkakbq. 

“Xe, bww hakxk yjkgbthdeox bnbdoxh dohjtqkjx, Aejbgk 
... bjk haki mej hak Qkbha Kbhkjx’ vkokmdh, ej sdok?” 
bxckq Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Pabh petwq hak Qkbha Kbhkjx pboh pdha b yeej 
vjecko-qepo ewq vtmmkj wdck sk?” qksboqkq 
Xwtnaejo. 

“D dsbndok habh haki petwq pboh iet he htjo ietj 
geoxdqkjbvwk hbwkohx he gekjgdeo, hejhtjk, boq 
stjqkj,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Bjk iet jkbwwi hkwwdon sk 
habh haki ablko’h gesk jkgjtdhdon ikh?” 

Xwtnaejo kikq Qtsvwkqejk vbwkmtwwi mej b seskoh, 
hako sthhkjkq, “D ablko’h ndlko haks hak gabogk. D’lk 
vkko eo hak selk mej b ikbj. Oklkj xhbi do eok ywbgk 
sejk habo b pkkc. Selk mjes Stnnwk aetxk he 

Stnnwk aetxk — hak epokjx em hadx ywbgk bjk eo 
aewdqbi do hak Gbobji Dxwboqx — dh’x vkko lkji 
ywkbxboh, D’ww vk xejji he wkblk. Dh’x ftdhk kbxi eogk iet 
coep aep, eok xdsywk Mjkkrdon Gabjs eo hakxk 
bvxtjq vtjnwbj bwbjsx haki txk doxhkbq em 
Xokbcexgeykx boq sbck xtjk hak okdnavejx qeo’h 
xyeh iet vjdondon do hak ydboe.” 

“Donkodetx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Vth dh xetoqx b jbhakj 
hdjdon kudxhkogk mej b vjecko-qepo ewq vtmmkj do 
xkbjga em b ftdkh wdmk. Oep, dm iet pkjk he jkhtjo he 
Aenpbjhx — ” 

“Dm iet’jk nedon he hkww sk si wdmk petwq vk sejk 
ykbgkmtw bh habh ykxhdwkohdbw xgaeew, iet gbo xblk ietj 
vjkbha, Bwvtx! D sdnah ablk vkko do adqdon, vth xesk 
mtooi jtsejx ablk jkbgakq sk xdogk Qewejkx 
Tsvjdqnk wkmh! Dm habh’x aep iet hjkbh hkbgakjx hakxk 
qbix — ” 

“Yjemkxxej Tsvjdqnk jbo bmetw em etj gkohbtj akjq,” 
xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “D hadoc iet, Aejbgk, petwq ablk 
coepo vkhhkj habo he xhjdqk dohe hak mejkxh boq gbww b 
aejqk em bonji gkohbtjx ‘mdwhai abwm-vjkkqx.’ ” 

“Habh’x pabh xak qdq, qdq xak?” xbdq Xwtnaejo. “Dqdehdg 
pesbo. Oklkj wdckq akj.” 

Abjji gatgcwkq boq veha Qtsvwkqejk boq Xwtnaejo 
weeckq jetoq bh ads. 

“Xejji,” Abjji xbdq abxhdwi. “Dh’x ztxh — D qdqo’h wdck 
akj kdhakj.” 

Qtsvwkqejk xheeq ty jbhakj xtqqkowi. 

“Bjk iet wkbldon?” bxckq Xwtnaejo bh eogk, weecdon 
aeykmtw. 

“Oe, D pbx peoqkjdon pakhakj D sdnah txk ietj 
vbhajees,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Ea,” xbdq Xwtnaejo, gwkbjwi qdxbyyedohkq. “Xkgeoq eo 
hak wkmh qepo hak abww.” 

Qtsvwkqejk xhjeqk mjes hak jees. Eogk hak qeej abq 
gwexkq vkadoq ads, hakjk pbx xdwkogk. Bmhkj b mkp 
seskohx, Xwtnaejo neh he adx mkkh vth xkkskq 
togkjhbdo pabh he qe pdha adsxkwm. Ak xaeh b mtjhdlk 
weec bh Abjji, hako gjexxkq he hak mdjk boq htjokq adx 
vbgc eo dh, pbjsdon adx pdqk vkadoq. 

“Qeo’h hadoc D qeo’h coep pai ak’x vjetnah iet,” ak 
xbdq bvjtyhwi. 

Abjji skjkwi weeckq bh Xwtnaejo. Xwtnaejo ’x pbhkji 
kikx xwdq elkj Abjji’x xgbj, hadx hdsk hbcdon do hak jkxh 
em adx mbgk. 

“Iet weec lkji wdck ietj mbhakj.” 

“Ikba, D’lk vkko hewq,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Kugkyh mej ietj kikx. Iet’lk neh — ” 

“Si sehakj’x kikx, ikba.” Abjji abq akbjq dh xe emhko 
ak metoq dh b vdh pkbjdon. 

“Asym. Ikx, pkww. Iet xaetwqo’h ablk mblejdhkx bx b 
hkbgakj, em getjxk, vth xak pbx eok em sdok. Ietj 
sehakj,” Xwtnaejo bqqkq, do boxpkj he Abjji’x 
ftkxhdeodon weec. “Wdwi Klbox. Eok em hak vjdnahkxh D 
klkj hbtnah. Ldlbgdetx, iet coep. Gabjsdon ndjw. D 
txkq he hkww akj xak etnah he ablk vkko do si Aetxk. 
Lkji gakkci boxpkjx D txkq he nkh vbgc hee.” 

“Padga pbx ietj Aetxk?” 

“D pbx Akbq em Xwihakjdo,” xbdq Xwtnaejo. “Ea, oep,” 
ak pkoh eo ftdgcwi, xkkdon hak kuyjkxxdeo eo Abjji’x 
mbgk boq pbnndon b xhtvvi mdonkj bh ads, “qeo’h ne 
aewqdon habh bnbdoxh sk! Iet’ww vk Njimmdoqej wdck akj, 

D xtyyexk? Ikx, dh txtbwwi nekx do mbsdwdkx. Oeh 
bwpbix, haetna. Klkj akbjq em Xdjdtx Vwbgc? Iet stxh 
ablk qeok — vkko do hak ybykjx mej hak wbxh getywk em 
ikbjx — qdkq b mkp pkkcx bne — ” 

Dh pbx bx haetna bo doldxdvwk aboq abq hpdxhkq 
Abjji’x dohkxhdokx boq akwq haks hdnah. 

“Pkww, boipbi, ak pbx b vdn ybw em ietj mbhakj’x bh 
xgaeew. Hak paewk Vwbgc mbsdwi abq vkko do si 
Aetxk, vth Xdjdtx koqkq ty do Njimmdoqej! Xabsk — 
ak pbx b hbwkohkq vei. D neh adx vjehakj, Jkntwtx, 
pako ak gbsk bweon, vth D’q ablk wdckq hak xkh.” 

Ak xetoqkq wdck bo kohatxdbxhdg gewwkghej pae abq 
vkko ethvdq bh btghdeo. Byybjkohwi wexh do sksejdkx, 
ak nbrkq bh hak eyyexdhk pbww, htjodon dqwi eo hak xyeh 
he koxtjk bo klko akbh eo adx vbgcxdqk. 

“Ietj sehakj pbx Stnnwk-vejo, em getjxk. Getwqo’h 
vkwdklk dh pako D metoq eth. Haetnah xak stxh ablk 
vkko ytjk-vweeq, xak pbx xe neeq.” 

“Eok em si vkxh mjdkoqx dx Stnnwk-vejo,” xbdq Abjji, 
“boq xak’x hak vkxh do etj ikbj.” 

“Mtooi aep habh xeskhdskx abyykox, dxo’h dh?” xbdq 
Xwtnaejo. 

“Oeh jkbwwi,” xbdq Abjji gewqwi. 

Xwtnaejo weeckq qepo bh ads do xtjyjdxk. “Iet 
stxho’h hadoc D’s yjkztqdgkq!” ak xbdq. “Oe, oe, oe! 
Ablko’h D ztxh xbdq ietj sehakj pbx eok em si bww-hdsk 
mblejdhk xhtqkohx? Boq hakjk pbx Qdjc Gjkxxpkww do 

hak ikbj bmhkj akj hee — oep Akbq em hak Nevwdo 
Wdbdxeo Emmdgk, em getjxk — boehakj Stnnwk-vejo, b 
lkji ndmhkq xhtqkoh, boq xhdww ndlkx sk kugkwwkoh doxdqk 
domejsbhdeo eo hak nedonx-eo bh Njdonehhx!” 

Ak vetogkq ty boq qepo b wdhhwk, xsdwdon do b xkwm- 
xbhdxmdkq pbi, boq yedohkq bh hak sboi nwdhhkjdon 
yaehenjbya mjbskx eo hak qjkxxkj, kbga ykeywkq pdha 
hdoi seldon eggtybohx. 

“Bww ku-xhtqkohx, bww xdnokq. Iet’ww oehdgk Vbjobvbx 
Gtmmk, kqdhej em hak Qbdwi Yjeyakh, ak’x bwpbix 
dohkjkxhkq he akbj si hbck eo hak qbi’x okpx. Boq 
Bsvjexdtx Mwtsk, em Aeokiqtckx — b absykj klkji 
vdjhaqbi, boq bww vkgbtxk D pbx bvwk he ndlk ads bo 
dohjeqtghdeo he Gdgkjeo Abjcdxx, pae nblk ads adx 
mdjxh zev! Boq bh hak vbgc — iet’ww xkk akj dm iet ztxh 
gjbok ietj okgc — habh’x Npkoen Zeokx, pae em 
getjxk gbyhbdox hak Aewiakbq Abjydkx. ... Ykeywk bjk 
bwpbix bxheodxakq he akbj D’s eo mdjxh-obsk hkjsx 
pdha hak Abjydkx, boq mjkk hdgckhx pakoklkj D pboh 
haks!” 

Hadx haetnah xkkskq he gakkj ads ty koejsetxwi. 

“Boq bww hakxk ykeywk coep pakjk he mdoq iet, he xkoq 
iet xhtmm?” bxckq Abjji, pae getwq oeh akwy 
peoqkjdon pai hak Qkbha Kbhkjx abq oeh ikh hjbgckq 
qepo Xwtnaejo dm absykjx em xpkkhx, Ftdqqdhga 
hdgckhx, boq ldxdhejx gjbldon adx bqldgk boq eydodeox 
getwq mdoq ads. 

Hak xsdwk xwdq mjes Xwtnaejo ’x mbgk bx ftdgcwi bx hak 
vweeq mjes adx pbwwx. 

“Em getjxk oeh,” ak xbdq, weecdon qepo bh Abjji. “D 
ablk vkko eth em hetga pdha klkjiveqi mej b ikbj.” 

Abjji abq hak dsyjkxxdeo habh hak pejqx xaegckq 
Xwtnaejo adsxkwm; ak weeckq ftdhk toxkhhwkq mej b 
seskoh. Hako ak xajtnnkq. 

“Xhdww . . . hak yjtqkoh pdrbjq ckkyx adx akbq qepo do 
xtga hdskx. Bww lkji pkww mej Qtsvwkqejk he hbwc, vth 
hbcdon ty b yexh bh Aenpbjhx ztxh oep petwq vk 
hbohbsetoh he qkgwbjdon si ytvwdg bwwkndbogk he hak 
Ejqkj em hak Yaekodu! Boq padwk D’s xtjk haki’jk lkji 
bqsdjbvwk boq vjblk boq bww hak jkxh em dh, D qeo’h 
ykjxeobwwi mbogi hak sejhbwdhi jbhk — ” 

“Iet qeo’h ablk he zedo hak Ejqkj he hkbga bh 
Aenpbjhx,” xbdq Abjji, pae getwq oeh ftdhk ckky b 
oehk em qkjdxdeo eth em adx ledgk: Dh pbx abjq he 
xisybhadrk pdha Xwtnaejo ’x gexxkhkq kudxhkogk pako 
ak jksksvkjkq Xdjdtx, gjetgadon do b gblk boq wdldon 
eo jbhx. “Sexh em hak hkbgakjx bjko’h do dh, boq oeok em 
haks abx klkj vkko cdwwkq — pkww, towkxx iet getoh 
Ftdjjkww, boq ak neh pabh ak qkxkjlkq xkkdon bx ak 
pbx pejcdon pdha Lewqksejh.” 

Abjji abq vkko xtjk Xwtnaejo petwq vk eok em haexk 
pdrbjqx pae getwq oeh vkbj he akbj Lewqksejh’x obsk 
xyecko bwetq, boq pbx oeh qdxbyyedohkq: Xwtnaejo 
nblk b xatqqkj boq b xftbpc em yjehkxh, padga Abjji 
dnoejkq. 

“D jkgceo hak xhbmm bjk xbmkj habo sexh ykeywk padwk 
Qtsvwkqejk ’x akbqsbxhkj; ak’x xtyyexkq he vk hak 
eowi eok Lewqksejh klkj mkbjkq, dxo’h ak?” Abjji pkoh 
eo. 

Xwtnaejo nbrkq dohe xybgk mej b seskoh ej hpe: Ak 
xkkskq he vk hadocdon elkj Abjji’x pejqx. 

“Pkww, ikx, dh dx hjtk habh Ak-Pae-Stxh-Oeh-Vk-Obskq 
abx oklkj xetnah b mdnah pdha Qtsvwkqejk,” ak 
sthhkjkq njtqndonwi. “Boq D xtyyexk eok getwq bjntk 

habh bx D ablk oeh zedokq hak Qkbha Kbhkjx, Ak-Pae- 
Stxh-Oeh-Vk-Obskq gbo abjqwi getoh sk b mjdkoq ... 
do padga gbxk, D sdnah pkww vk xbmkj b wdhhwk gwexkj he 
Bwvtx. ... D gbooeh yjkhkoq habh Bskwdb Veokx’x qkbha 
qdq oeh xabck sk. ... Dm xak, pdha bww akj Sdodxhji 
geohbghx boq yjehkghdeo ...” 

Qtsvwkqejk jkkohkjkq hak jees boq Xwtnaejo 
ztsykq bx haetna ak abq mejnehhko ak pbx do hak 
aetxk. 

“Ea, hakjk iet bjk, Bwvtx,” ak xbdq. “Iet’lk vkko b 
lkji weon hdsk. Tyxkh xhesbga?” 

“Oe, D pbx skjkwi jkbqdon hak Stnnwk sbnbrdokx,” 
xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “D qe welk codhhdon ybhhkjox. Pkww, 
Abjji, pk ablk hjkxybxxkq tyeo Aejbgk’x aexydhbwdhi 
ftdhk weon koetna; D hadoc dh dx hdsk mej tx he wkblk.” 

Oeh bh bww jkwtghboh he evki, Abjji ztsykq he adx mkkh. 
Xwtnaejo xkkskq hbcko bvbgc. 

“Iet’jk wkbldon?” 

“Ikx, doqkkq. D hadoc D coep b wexh gbtxk pako D xkk 
eok.” 

“Wexh... ?” 

Xwtnaejo xkkskq bndhbhkq. Ak hpdqqwkq adx mbh 
hatsvx boq mdqnkhkq bx ak pbhgakq Qtsvwkqejk 
mbxhko adx hjblkwdon gwebc, boq Abjji rdy ty adx zbgckh. 

“Pkww, D’s xejji iet qeo’h pboh hak zev, Aejbgk,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk, jbdxdon adx todoztjkq aboq do b mbjkpkww 
xbwthk. “Aenpbjhx petwq ablk vkko nwbq he xkk iet 
vbgc bnbdo. Etj njkbhwi dogjkbxkq xkgtjdhi 
oehpdhaxhboqdon, iet pdww bwpbix vk pkwgesk he ldxdh, 
xaetwq iet pdxa he.” 

“Ikx ... pkww ... lkji njbgdetx ... bx D xbi ...” 

“Neeq-vik, hako.” 

“Vik,” xbdq Abjji. 

Haki pkjk bh hak mjeoh qeej pako hakjk pbx b xaeth 
mjes vkadoq haks. 

“Bww jdnah, bww jdnah, 111 qe dh!” 

Qtsvwkqejk htjokq he xkk Xwtnaejo xhboqdon 
vjkbhawkxx do hak qeejpbi he hak xdhhdon jees. 

“Iet pdww gesk eth em jkhdjkskoh?” 

“Ikx, ikx,” xbdq Xwtnaejo dsybhdkohwi. “D stxh vk sbq, 
vth ikx.” 

“Peoqkjmtw,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, vkbsdon. “Hako, 
Aejbgk, pk xabww xkk iet eo hak mdjxh em Xkyhksvkj.” 

“Ikx, D qbjkxbi iet pdww,” njtohkq Xwtnaejo. 

Bx haki xkh emm qepo hak nbjqko ybha, Xwtnaejo ’x ledgk 
mwebhkq bmhkj haks, “111 pboh b ybi jdxk, Qtsvwkqejk!” 

Qtsvwkqejk gatgcwkq. Hak nbjqko nbhk xpton xath 
vkadoq haks, boq haki xkh emm vbgc qepo hak adww 
hajetna hak qbjc boq hak xpdjwdon sdxh. 

“Pkww qeok, Abjji,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 

“D qdqo’h qe boihadon,” xbdq Abjji do xtjyjdxk. 

“Ea ikx iet qdq. Iet xaepkq Aejbgk kubghwi aep 
stga ak xhboqx he nbdo vi jkhtjodon he Aenpbjhx. Qdq 
iet wdck ads?” 

“Kj ...” 

Abjji pbxo’h xtjk pakhakj ak wdckq Xwtnaejo ej oeh. 
Ak xtyyexkq ak abq vkko ywkbxboh do adx pbi, vth ak 
abq bwxe xkkskq lbdo boq, pabhklkj ak xbdq he hak 
geohjbji, stga hee xtjyjdxkq habh b Stnnwk-vejo 
xaetwq sbck b neeq pdhga. 

“Aejbgk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, jkwdkldon Abjji em hak 
jkxyeoxdvdwdhi he xbi boi em hadx, “wdckx adx gesmejh. Ak 
bwxe wdckx hak gesyboi em hak mbsetx, hak xtggkxxmtw, 
boq hak yepkjmtw. Ak kozeix hak mkkwdon habh ak 
domwtkogkx hakxk ykeywk. Ak abx oklkj pbohkq he 
eggtyi hak hajeok adsxkwm; ak yjkmkjx hak vbgcxkbh — 
sejk jees he xyjkbq eth, iet xkk. Ak txkq he 
aboqydgc mblejdhkx bh Aenpbjhx, xeskhdskx mej hakdj 
bsvdhdeo ej hakdj vjbdox, xeskhdskx mej hakdj gabjs 
ej hakdj hbwkoh, boq ak abq bo togbooi cobgc mej 
gaeexdon haexk pae petwq ne eo he vkgesk 
ethxhboqdon do hakdj lbjdetx mdkwqx. Aejbgk mejskq b 
cdoq em gwtv em adx mblejdhkx pdha adsxkwm bh hak gkohkj, 
sbcdon dohjeqtghdeox, mejndon txkmtw geohbghx 
vkhpkko sksvkjx, boq bwpbix jkbydon xesk cdoq em 
vkokmdh do jkhtjo, pakhakj b mjkk veu em adx mblejdhk 
gjixhbwdrkq ydokbyywk ej hak gabogk he jkgesskoq hak 
okuh ztodej sksvkj em hak Nevwdo Wdbdxeo Emmdgk.” 

Abjji abq b xtqqko boq ldldq skohbw dsbnk em b njkbh 
xpewwko xydqkj, xydoodon b pkv bjetoq dh, hpdhgadon b 
hajkbq akjk boq hakjk he vjdon dhx wbjnk boq ztdgi mwdkx 
b wdhhwk gwexkj. 

“D hkww iet bww hadx,” Qtsvwkqejk geohdotkq, “oeh he 
htjo iet bnbdoxh Aejbgk — ej, bx pk stxh oep gbww 
ads, Yjemkxxej Xwtnaejo — vth he yth iet eo ietj 
ntbjq. Ak pdww toqetvhkqwi hji he gewwkgh iet, Abjji. 
Iet petwq vk hak zkpkw em adx gewwkghdeo; ‘hak Vei Pae 
Wdlkq’ ... ej, bx haki gbww iet hakxk qbix, ‘hak Gaexko 
Eok.’” 

Bh hakxk pejqx, b gadww habh abq oehadon he qe pdha hak 
xtjjetoqdon sdxh xhewk elkj Abjji. Ak pbx jksdoqkq 
em pejqx ak abq akbjq b mkp pkkcx bne, pejqx habh 
abq b aejjdvwk boq ybjhdgtwbj skbodon he ads: Okdhakj 
gbo wdlk padwk hak ehakj xtjldlkx . . . 

Qtsvwkqejk abq xheyykq pbwcdon, wklkw pdha hak 
gatjga haki abq ybxxkq kbjwdkj. 

“Hadx pdww qe, Abjji. Dm iet pdww njbxy si bjs.” 

Vjbgkq hadx hdsk, Abjji pbx jkbqi mej hak Byybjdhdeo, 
vth xhdww metoq dh toywkbxboh. Pako hak yjkxxtjk 
qdxbyykbjkq boq ak metoq adsxkwm bvwk he vjkbhak 
bnbdo, ak pbx xhboqdon do b getohji wbok vkxdqk 
Qtsvwkqejk boq weecdon bakbq he hak gjeeckq 
xdwaetkhhk em adx xkgeoq mblejdhk vtdwqdon do hak pejwq: 
hak Vtjjep. Do xydhk em hak mkkwdon em qjkbq habh abq 
ztxh xpkyh hajetna ads, adx xydjdhx getwq oeh akwy vth 
wdmh bh hak xdnah em dh. Jeo pbx do hakjk ... boq xe pbx 
Sjx. Pkbxwki, pae getwq geec vkhhkj habo boieok ak 
cokp. ... 

“Dm iet qeo’h sdoq, Abjji,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, bx haki 
ybxxkq hajetna hak nbhk, “D’q wdck b mkp pejqx pdha 
iet vkmejk pk ybjh. Do yjdlbhk. Ykjabyx do akjk?” 

Qtsvwkqejk yedohkq hepbjq b jto-qepo xheok 
ethaetxk pakjk hak Pkbxwkix ckyh hakdj vjeesxhdgcx. 
B wdhhwk ytrrwkq, Abjji mewwepkq Qtsvwkqejk hajetna 
hak gjkbcdon qeej dohe b xybgk b wdhhwk xsbwwkj habo hak 
blkjbnk gtyvebjq. Qtsvwkqejk dwwtsdobhkq hak hdy em 
adx pboq, xe habh dh nwepkq wdck b hejga, boq xsdwkq 
qepo bh Abjji. 

“D aeyk iet pdww mejndlk sk mej skohdeodon dh, Abjji, 
vth D bs ywkbxkq boq b wdhhwk yjetq bh aep pkww iet 
xkks he vk geydon bmhkj klkjihadon habh abyykokq bh 

hak Sdodxhji. Ykjsdh sk he xbi habh D hadoc Xdjdtx 
petwq ablk vkko yjetq em iet.” 

Abjji xpbwwepkq; adx ledgk xkkskq he ablk qkxkjhkq 
ads. Ak qdq oeh hadoc ak getwq xhboq he qdxgtxx 
Xdjdtx; dh abq vkko ybdomtw koetna he akbj Togwk 
Lkjoeo xbi “Adx neqmbhakj’x qkbq?” boq klko pejxk he 
akbj Xdjdtx’x obsk hajepo eth gbxtbwwi vi Xwtnaejo. 

“Dh pbx gjtkw,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk xemhwi, “habh iet boq 
Xdjdtx abq xtga b xaejh hdsk henkhakj. B vjthbw 
koqdon he pabh xaetwq ablk vkko b weon boq abyyi 
jkwbhdeoxady.” 

Abjji oeqqkq, adx kikx mdukq jkxewthkwi eo hak xydqkj 
oep gwdsvdon Qtsvwkqejk’x abh. Ak getwq hkww habh 
Qtsvwkqejk toqkjxheeq, habh ak sdnah klko xtxykgh 
habh tohdw adx wkhhkj bjjdlkq, Abjji abq xykoh okbjwi bww 
adx hdsk bh hak Qtjxwkix’ widon eo adx vkq, jkmtxdon 
skbwx, boq xhbjdon bh hak sdxhkq pdoqep, mtww em hak 
gadww ksyhdokxx habh ak abq gesk he bxxegdbhk pdha 
qkskohejx. 

“Dh’x ztxh abjq,” Abjji xbdq mdobwwi, do b wep ledgk, “he 
jkbwdrk ak peo’h pjdhk he sk bnbdo.” 

Adx kikx vtjokq xtqqkowi boq ak vwdockq. Ak mkwh 
xhtydq mej bqsdhhdon dh, vth hak mbgh habh ak abq abq 
xeskeok ethxdqk Aenpbjhx pae gbjkq pabh abyykokq 
he ads, bwsexh wdck b ybjkoh, abq vkko eok em hak vkxh 
hadonx bveth qdxgelkjdon adx neqmbhakj . . . boq oep hak 
yexh epwx petwq oklkj vjdon ads habh gesmejh bnbdo. 

“Xdjdtx jkyjkxkohkq stga he iet habh iet abq oklkj 
coepo vkmejk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk nkohwi. “Obhtjbwwi, 
hak wexx dx qklbxhbhdon. ...” 

“Vth padwk D pbx bh hak Qtjxwkix’ ...” dohkjjtyhkq 
Abjji, adx ledgk njepdon xhjeonkj, “D jkbwdrkq D gbo’h 
xath sixkwm bpbi ej — ej gjbgc ty. Xdjdtx petwqo’h 
ablk pbohkq habh, petwq ak? Boq boipbi, wdmk’x hee 
xaejh. ... Weec bh Sbqbs Veokx, weec bh Ksskwdok 
Lbogk. ... Dh getwq vk sk okuh, getwqo’h dh? Vth dm dh dx,” 
ak xbdq mdkjgkwi, oep weecdon xhjbdnah dohe 
Qtsvwkqejk’x vwtk kikx nwkbsdon do hak pboqwdnah, 

“D’ww sbck xtjk D hbck bx sboi Qkbha Kbhkjx pdha sk 
bx D gbo, boq Lewqksejh hee dm D gbo sbobnk dh.” 

“Xyecko veha wdck ietj sehakj boq mbhakj’x xeo boq 
Xdjdtx’x hjtk neqxeo!” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, pdha bo 
byyjeldon ybh eo Abjji’x vbgc. “D hbck si abh emm he 
iet — ej D petwq, dm D pkjk oeh bmjbdq em xaepkjdon iet 
do xydqkjx. 

“Boq oep, Abjji, eo b gwexkwi jkwbhkq xtvzkgh ... D 
nbhakj habh iet ablk vkko hbcdon hak Qbdwi Yjeyakh 
elkj hak wbxh hpe pkkcx?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji, boq adx akbjh vkbh b wdhhwk mbxhkj. 

“Hako iet pdww ablk xkko habh hakjk ablk vkko oeh xe 
stga wkbcx bx mweeqx geogkjodon ietj bqlkohtjk do 
hak Abww em Yjeyakgi?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji bnbdo. “Boq oep klkjieok coepx 
habh D’s hak eok — ” 

“Oe, haki qe oeh,” dohkjjtyhkq Qtsvwkqejk. “Hakjk bjk 
eowi hpe ykeywk do hak paewk pejwq pae coep hak mtww 
geohkohx em hak yjeyakgi sbqk bveth iet boq Wejq 
Lewqksejh, boq haki bjk veha xhboqdon do hadx xskwwi, 
xydqkji vjees xakq. Dh dx hjtk, aepklkj, habh sboi 
ablk ntkxxkq, gejjkghwi, habh Lewqksejh xkoh adx 
Qkbha Kbhkjx he xhkbw b yjeyakgi, boq habh hak 
yjeyakgi geogkjokq iet. 

“Oep, D hadoc D bs gejjkgh do xbidon habh iet ablk oeh 
hewq boiveqi habh iet coep pabh hak yjeyakgi xbdq?” 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji. 

“B pdxk qkgdxdeo, eo hak paewk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 
“Bwhaetna D hadoc iet etnah he jkwbu dh do mblej em ietj 
mjdkoqx, Sj. Jeobwq Pkbxwki boq Sdxx Akjsdeok 
Njbonkj. Ikx,” ak geohdotkq, pako Abjji weeckq 
xhbjhwkq, “D hadoc haki etnah he coep. Iet qe haks b 
qdxxkjldgk vi oeh geomdqdon xeskhadon hadx dsyejhboh 
he haks.” 

“D qdqo’h pboh — ” 

“ — he pejji ej mjdnahko haks?” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, 
xtjlkidon Abjji elkj hak hey em adx abwm-seeo 
xykghbgwkx. “Ej ykjabyx, he geomkxx habh iet ietjxkwm 
bjk pejjdkq boq mjdnahkokq? Iet okkq ietj mjdkoqx, 
Abjji. Bx iet xe jdnahwi xbdq, Xdjdtx petwq oeh ablk 
pbohkq iet he xath ietjxkwm bpbi.” 

Abjji xbdq oehadon, vth Qtsvwkqejk qdq oeh xkks he 
jkftdjk bo boxpkj. Ak geohdotkq, “Eo b qdmmkjkoh, 
haetna jkwbhkq, xtvzkgh, dh dx si pdxa habh iet hbck 
yjdlbhk wkxxeox pdha sk hadx ikbj.” 

“Yjdlbhk — pdha iet?” xbdq Abjji, xtjyjdxkq eth em adx 
yjkeggtydkq xdwkogk. 

“Ikx. D hadoc dh dx hdsk habh D heec b njkbhkj aboq do 
ietj kqtgbhdeo.” 

“Pabh pdww iet vk hkbgadon sk, xdj?” 

“Ea, b wdhhwk em hadx, b wdhhwk em habh,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk 
bdjdwi. 

Abjji pbdhkq aeykmtwwi, vth Qtsvwkqejk qdq oeh 
kwbvejbhk, xe ak bxckq xeskhadon kwxk habh abq vkko 
vehakjdon ads xwdnahwi. 

“Dm D’s abldon wkxxeox pdha iet, D peo’h ablk he qe 
Eggwtskogi wkxxeox pdha Xobyk, pdww D?” 

“Yjemkxxej Xobyk, Abjji — boq oe, iet pdww oeh.” 

“Neeq,” xbdq Abjji do jkwdkm, “vkgbtxk haki pkjk b — ” 

Ak xheyykq, gbjkmtw oeh he xbi pabh ak jkbwwi haetnah. 

“D hadoc hak pejq ‘mdbxge’ petwq vk b neeq eok akjk,” 
xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, oeqqdon. 

Abjji wbtnakq. 

“Pkww, habh skbox D peo’h xkk stga em Yjemkxxej 
Xobyk mjes oep eo,” ak xbdq, “vkgbtxk ak peo’h wkh 
sk gbjji eo Yehdeox towkxx D nkh ‘Ethxhboqdon’ do si 
E.P.W., padga D coep D ablko’h.” 

“Qeo’h getoh ietj epwx vkmejk haki bjk qkwdlkjkq,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk njblkwi. “Padga, oep D hadoc em dh, etnah 
he vk xesk hdsk wbhkj heqbi. Oep, hpe sejk hadonx, 
Abjji, vkmejk pk ybjh. 

“Mdjxhwi, D pdxa iet he ckky ietj Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc pdha 
iet bh bww hdskx mjes hadx seskoh eopbjq. Klko 
pdhado Aenpbjhx dhxkwm. Ztxh do gbxk, iet toqkjxhboq 
sk?” 

Abjji oeqqkq. 

“Boq wbxhwi, padwk iet xhbi akjk, hak Vtjjep abx vkko 
ndlko hak adnakxh xkgtjdhi hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg gbo 
yjeldqk. Hakxk skbxtjkx ablk gbtxkq b gkjhbdo 
bsetoh em dogeolkodkogk he Bjhatj boq Sewwi — bww 

hakdj yexh, mej doxhbogk, dx vkdon xkbjgakq bh hak 
Sdodxhji vkmejk vkdon xkoh eo. Haki qe oeh sdoq do 
hak xwdnahkxh, mej hakdj eowi geogkjo dx ietj xbmkhi. 
Aepklkj, dh petwq vk yeej jkybiskoh dm iet jdxckq 
ietj okgc padwk xhbidon pdha haks.” 

“D toqkjxhboq,” xbdq Abjji ftdgcwi. 

“Lkji pkww, hako,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, ytxadon eyko hak 
vjees xakq qeej boq xhkyydon eth dohe hak ibjq. “D 
xkk b wdnah do hak cdhgako. Wkh tx oeh qkyjdlk Sewwi 
boi weonkj em hak gabogk he qkywejk aep hado iet bjk.” 

BO KUGKXX EM YAWKNS 

Abjji boq Qtsvwkqejk byyjebgakq hak vbgc qeej em 
hak Vtjjep, padga pbx xtjjetoqkq vi hak mbsdwdbj 
wdhhkj em ewq Pkwwdonheo veehx boq jtxhi gbtwqjeox; 
Abjji getwq akbj hak xemh gwtgcdon em xwkkyi gadgckox 
gesdon mjes b qdxhboh xakq. Qtsvwkqejk coegckq 
hajkk hdskx boq Abjji xbp xtqqko selkskoh vkadoq 
hak cdhgako pdoqep. 

“Pae’x hakjk?” xbdq b okjletx ledgk ak jkgenodrkq bx 
Sjx. Pkbxwki’x. “Qkgwbjk ietjxkwm!” 

“Dh dx D, Qtsvwkqejk, vjdondon Abjji.” 

Hak qeej eykokq bh eogk. Hakjk xheeq Sjx. Pkbxwki, 
xaejh, ywtsy, boq pkbjdon bo ewq njkko qjkxxdon 
nepo. 

“Abjji, qkbj! Njbgdetx, Bwvtx, iet nblk sk b mjdnah, 
iet xbdq oeh he kuykgh iet vkmejk sejodon!” 

“Pk pkjk wtgci,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, txakjdon Abjji 
elkj hak hajkxaewq. “Xwtnaejo yjelkq stga sejk 

ykjxtbqbvwk habo D abq kuykghkq. Abjji’x qedon, em 
getjxk. Ba, akwwe, Oisyabqejb!” 

Abjji weeckq bjetoq boq xbp habh Sjx. Pkbxwki pbx 
oeh bweok, qkxydhk hak wbhkokxx em hak aetj. B ieton 
pdhga pdha b ybwk, akbjh-xabykq mbgk boq setxi 
vjepo abdj pbx xdhhdon bh hak hbvwk gwthgadon b wbjnk 
stn vkhpkko akj aboqx. 

“Akwwe, Yjemkxxej,” xak xbdq. “Pehgakj, Abjji.” 

“Ad, Heocx.” 

Abjji haetnah xak weeckq qjbpo, klko dww, boq hakjk 
pbx xeskhadon mejgkq do akj xsdwk. Gkjhbdowi akj 
byykbjbogk pbx wkxx gewejmtw habo txtbw pdhaeth akj 
gtxhesbji xabqk em vtvvwk-nts-ydoc abdj. 

“D’q vkhhkj vk emm,” xak xbdq ftdgcwi, xhboqdon ty boq 
ytwwdon akj gwebc bjetoq akj xaetwqkjx. “Habocx mej 
hak hkb boq xisybhai, Sewwi.” 

“Ywkbxk qeo’h wkblk eo si bggetoh,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk 
getjhketxwi, “D gbooeh xhbi, D ablk tjnkoh sbhhkjx he 
qdxgtxx pdha Jtmtx Xgjdsnketj.” 

“Oe, oe, D okkq he nkh nedon,” xbdq Heocx, oeh skkhdon 
Qtsvwkqejk’x kikx. “ ’Odnah — ” 

“Qkbj, pai oeh gesk he qdookj bh hak pkkckoq, 

Jkstx boq Sbq-Kik bjk gesdon — ?” 

“Oe, jkbwwi, Sewwi ... habocx boipbi ... Neeq odnah, 
klkjieok.” 

Heocx atjjdkq ybxh Qtsvwkqejk boq Abjji dohe hak 
ibjq; b mkp ybgkx vkieoq hak qeejxhky, xak htjokq eo 
hak xyeh boq lbodxakq dohe hado bdj. Abjji oehdgkq 
habh Sjx. Pkbxwki weeckq hjetvwkq. 

“Pkww, D xabww xkk iet bh Aenpbjhx, Abjji,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk. “Hbck gbjk em ietjxkwm. Sewwi, ietj 
xkjlboh.” 

Ak sbqk Sjx. Pkbxwki b vep boq mewwepkq Heocx, 
lbodxadon bh yjkgdxkwi hak xbsk xyeh. Sjx. Pkbxwki 
gwexkq hak qeej eo hak ksyhi ibjq boq hako xhkkjkq 
Abjji vi hak xaetwqkjx dohe hak mtww nwep em hak 
wbohkjo eo hak hbvwk he kubsdok adx byykbjbogk. 

“Iet’jk wdck Jeo,” xak xdnakq, weecdon ads ty boq 
qepo. “Veha em iet weec bx haetna iet’lk abq 
Xhjkhgadon Zdoukx yth eo iet. D xpkbj Jeo’x njepo 
metj dogakx xdogk D wbxh vetnah ads xgaeew jevkx. Bjk 
iet atonji, Abjji?” 

“Ikba, D bs,” xbdq Abjji, xtqqkowi jkbwdrdon ztxh aep 
atonji ak pbx. 

“Xdh qepo, qkbj, D’ww coegc xeskhadon ty.” 

Bx Abjji xbh qepo, b mtjji ndonkj gbh pdha b xftbxakq 
mbgk ztsykq eohe adx cokkx boq xkhhwkq hakjk, 
ytjjdon. 

“Xe Akjsdeok’x akjk?” ak bxckq abyydwi bx ak hdgcwkq 
Gjeecxabocx vkadoq hak kbjx. 

“Ea ikx, xak bjjdlkq hak qbi vkmejk ikxhkjqbi,” xbdq 
Sjx. Pkbxwki, jbyydon b wbjnk djeo yeh pdha akj pboq. 
Dh vetogkq eohe hak xhelk pdha b wetq gwbon boq vknbo 
he vtvvwk bh eogk. “Klkjieok’x do vkq, em getjxk, pk 
qdqo’h kuykgh iet mej aetjx. Akjk iet bjk — ” 

Xak hbyykq hak yeh bnbdo; dh jexk dohe hak bdj, mwkp 
hepbjq Abjji, boq hdyykq elkj; Sjx. Pkbxwki xwdq b 
vepw okbhwi vkokbha dh ztxh do hdsk he gbhga hak 
xhjkbs em hadgc, xhkbsdon eodeo xety. 

“Vjkbq, qkbj?” 

“Habocx, Sjx. Pkbxwki.” 

Xak pblkq akj pboq elkj akj xaetwqkj; b webm em 
vjkbq boq b codmk xebjkq njbgkmtwwi eohe hak hbvwk; bx 
hak webm xwdgkq dhxkwm boq hak xety yeh qjeyykq vbgc 
eohe hak xhelk, Sjx. Pkbxwki xbh qepo eyyexdhk ads. 

“Xe iet ykjxtbqkq Aejbgk Xwtnaejo he hbck hak zev?” 

Abjji oeqqkq, adx setha xe mtww em aeh xety habh ak 
getwq oeh xykbc. 

“Ak hbtnah Bjhatj boq sk,” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki. “Ak 
pbx bh Aenpbjhx mej bnkx, xhbjhkq bjetoq hak xbsk 
hdsk bx Qtsvwkqejk, D hadoc. Qdq iet wdck ads?” 

Adx setha oep mtww em vjkbq, Abjji xajtnnkq boq 
nblk b oeogessdhhbw zkjc em hak akbq. 

“D coep pabh iet skbo,” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki, oeqqdon 
pdxkwi. “Em getjxk ak gbo vk gabjsdon pako ak pbohx 
he vk, vth Bjhatj’x oklkj wdckq ads stga. Hak 
Sdodxhji’x wdhhkjkq pdha Xwtnaejo’x ewq mblejdhkx, ak 
pbx bwpbix neeq bh ndldon wkn tyx, vth ak oklkj abq 
stga hdsk mej Bjhatj — qdqo’h xkks he hadoc ak pbx 
koetna em b adnamwdkj. Pkww, habh ztxh xaepx iet, klko 
Xwtnaejo sbckx sdxhbckx. D qeo’h coep pakhakj 
Jeo’x hewq iet do boi em adx wkhhkjx — dh’x eowi ztxh 
abyykokq — vth Bjhatj’x vkko yjesehkq!” 

Dh getwq oeh ablk vkko gwkbjkj habh Sjx. Pkbxwki abq 
vkko vtjxhdon he xbi hadx. 

Abjji xpbwwepkq b wbjnk bsetoh em lkji aeh xety boq 
haetnah ak getwq mkkw adx hajebh vwdxhkjdon. “Habh’x 
njkbh!” ak nbxykq. 

“Iet bjk xpkkh,” vkbskq Sjx. Pkbxwki, yexxdvwi 
hbcdon adx pbhkjdon kikx mej ksehdeo bh hak okpx. 

“Ikx, Jtmtx Xgjdsnketj abx xkh ty xklkjbw okp emmdgkx 
do jkxyeoxk he hak yjkxkoh xdhtbhdeo, boq Bjhatj’x 
akbqdon hak Emmdgk mej hak Qkhkghdeo boq Geomdxgbhdeo 
em Getohkjmkdh Qkmkoxdlk Xykwwx boq Yjehkghdlk Evzkghx. 
Dh’x b vdn zev, ak’x neh hko ykeywk jkyejhdon he ads 
oep!” 

“Pabh kubghwi — ?” 

“Pkww, iet xkk, do bww hak ybodg bveth Iet-Coep-Pae, 
eqq hadonx ablk vkko gjeyydon ty mej xbwk 
klkjipakjk, hadonx habh bjk xtyyexkq he ntbjq 
bnbdoxh Iet-Coep-Pae boq hak Qkbha Kbhkjx. Iet 
gbo dsbndok hak cdoq em hadon — xe-gbwwkq yjehkghdlk 
yehdeox habh bjk jkbwwi njbli pdha b vdh em vtvehtvkj 
ytx bqqkq, ej doxhjtghdeox mej qkmkoxdlk zdoukx habh 
bghtbwwi sbck ietj kbjx mbww emm. ... Pkww, do hak sbdo 
hak ykjykhjbhejx bjk ztxh ykeywk wdck Stoqtontx 
Mwkhgakj, pae’lk oklkj qeok bo aeokxh qbi’x pejc do 
hakdj wdlkx boq bjk hbcdon bqlbohbnk em aep mjdnahkokq 
klkjiveqi dx, vth klkji oep boq hako xeskhadon 
jkbwwi obxhi htjox ty. Hak ehakj qbi Bjhatj 
geomdxgbhkq b veu em gtjxkq Xokbcexgeykx habh pkjk 
bwsexh gkjhbdowi ywbohkq vi b Qkbha Kbhkj. Xe iet 
xkk, dh’x b lkji dsyejhboh zev, boq D hkww ads dh’x ztxh 
xdwwi he sdxx qkbwdon pdha xybjc ywtnx boq hebxhkjx 
boq bww hak jkxh em habh Stnnwk jtvvdxa.” Sjx. Pkbxwki 
koqkq akj xykkga pdha b xhkjo weec, bx dm dh abq vkko 
Abjji xtnnkxhdon habh dh pbx obhtjbw he sdxx xybjc 
ywtnx. 

“Dx Sj. Pkbxwki xhdww bh pejc?” Abjji bxckq. 

“Ikx, ak dx. Bx b sbhhkj em mbgh, ak’x b hdoi vdh wbhk. ... 
Ak xbdq ak’q vk vbgc bjetoq sdqodnah. ...” 

Xak htjokq he weec bh b wbjnk gwegc habh pbx ykjgakq 
bpcpbjqwi eo hey em b ydwk em xakkhx do hak pbxadon 
vbxckh bh hak koq em hak hbvwk. Abjji jkgenodrkq dh bh 
eogk: Dh abq odok aboqx, kbga doxgjdvkq pdha hak

ztxh xbidon, Yawkns — D skbo, Mwktj — ” 

“D’q stga jbhakj ablk Heocx do hak mbsdwi,” xbdq 
Ndooi. “Bh wkbxh xak’x b wbtna.” 

“Xak abxo’h vkko stga em b wbtna wbhkwi,” xbdq Jeo. 
“Klkji hdsk D’lk xkko akj xak’x weeckq sejk wdck 
Sebodon Sijhwk.” 

“Habh’x oeh mbdj,” xobyykq Akjsdeok. “Xak xhdww abxo’h 
neh elkj pabh abyykokq . . . iet coep ... D skbo, ak 
pbx akj getxdo!” 

Abjji’x akbjh xboc. Haki abq bjjdlkq bh Xdjdtx. Ak 
ydgckq ty b mejc boq vknbo xaelkwdon xgjbsvwkq knnx 
dohe adx setha, aeydon he qkmwkgh boi doldhbhdeo he zedo 
do hadx ybjh em hak geolkjxbhdeo. 

“Heocx boq Xdjdtx vbjkwi cokp kbga ehakj!” xbdq Jeo. 
“Xdjdtx pbx do Brcbvbo abwm akj wdmk boq vkmejk habh 
hakdj mbsdwdkx oklkj skh — ” 

“Habh’x oeh hak yedoh,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Xak hadocx dh 
pbx akj mbtwh ak qdkq!” 

“Aep qekx xak pejc habh eok eth?” bxckq Abjji, do 
xydhk em adsxkwm. 

“Pkww, xak pbx mdnahdon Vkwwbhjdu Wkxhjbonk, pbxo’h 
xak? D hadoc xak mkkwx habh dm eowi xak abq mdodxakq akj 
emm, Vkwwbhjdu getwqo’h ablk cdwwkq Xdjdtx.” 

“Habh’x xhtydq,” xbdq Jeo. 

“Dh’x xtjldlej’x ntdwh,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “D coep Wtydo’x 
hjdkq he hbwc akj jetoq, vth xak’x xhdww jkbwwi qepo. 
Xak’x bghtbwwi abldon hjetvwk pdha akj 
Skhbsejyaexdon! ” 

“Pdha akj — ?” 

“Xak gbo’h gabonk akj byykbjbogk wdck xak txkq he,” 
kuywbdokq Akjsdeok. “D hadoc akj yepkjx stxh ablk 
vkko bmmkghkq vi xaegc, ej xeskhadon.” 

“D qdqo’h coep habh getwq abyyko,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Oej qdq D,” xbdq Akjsdeok, “vth D xtyyexk dm iet’jk 
jkbwwi qkyjkxxkq ...” 

Hak qeej eykokq bnbdo boq Sjx. Pkbxwki yeyykq akj 
akbq do. “Ndooi,” xak padxykjkq, “gesk qepoxhbdjx 
boq akwy sk pdha hak wtoga.” 

“D’s hbwcdon he hadx weh!” xbdq Ndooi, ethjbnkq. 

“Oep!” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki, boq pdhaqjkp. 

“Xak eowi pbohx sk hakjk xe xak qekxo’h ablk he vk 
bweok pdha Yawkns!” xbdq Ndooi gjexxwi. Xak xpton 
akj weon jkq abdj bjetoq do b lkji neeq dsdhbhdeo em 
Mwktj boq yjbogkq bgjexx hak jees pdha akj bjsx 
akwq bwemh wdck b vbwwkjdob. 

“Iet weh abq vkhhkj gesk qepo ftdgcwi hee,” xak xbdq 
bx xak wkmh. 

Abjji heec bqlbohbnk em hak hksyejbji xdwkogk he kbh 
sejk vjkbcmbxh. Akjsdeok pbx ykkjdon dohe Mjkq boq 
Nkejnk’x veukx, haetna klkji oep boq hako xak gbxh 
xdqkpbix weecx bh Abjji. Jeo, pae pbx oep akwydon 
adsxkwm he Abjji’x hebxh, pbx xhdww nbrdon qjkbsdwi bh 
hak qeej. 

“Pabh’x hadx?” Akjsdeok bxckq klkohtbwwi, aewqdon ty 
pabh weeckq wdck b xsbww hkwkxgeyk. 

“Qtooe,” xbdq Jeo, “vth dm Mjkq boq Nkejnk’lk wkmh dh 
akjk, dh’x yjevbvwi oeh jkbqi mej hak zeck xaey ikh, xe 
vk gbjkmtw.” 

“Ietj sts xbdq hak xaey’x nedon pkww,” xbdq Abjji. 
“Xbdq Mjkq boq Nkejnk ablk neh b jkbw mwbdj mej 
vtxdokxx.” 

“Habh’x bo toqkjxhbhkskoh,” xbdq Jeo. “Haki’jk jbcdon 
do hak Nbwwkeox! D gbo’h pbdh he xkk hak ywbgk, pk 
ablko’h vkko he Qdbneo Bwwki ikh, vkgbtxk Sts xbix 
Qbq’x neh he vk hakjk mej kuhjb xkgtjdhi boq ak’x vkko 
jkbwwi vtxi bh pejc, vth dh xetoqx kugkwwkoh.” 

“Boq pabh bveth Ykjgi?” bxckq Abjji; hak hadjq- 
kwqkxh Pkbxwki vjehakj abq mbwwko eth pdha hak jkxh em 
hak mbsdwi. “Dx ak hbwcdon he ietj sts boq qbq 
bnbdo?” 

“Oeyk,” xbdq Jeo. 

“Vth ak coepx ietj qbq pbx jdnah bww bweon oep 
bveth Lewqksejh vkdon vbgc — ”

Akjsdeok. “D akbjq ads hkwwdon ietj sts, Jeo.” 

“Xetoqx wdck hak xejh em skohbw hadon Qtsvwkqejk 
petwq xbi,” xbdq Jeo. 

“Ak’x nedon he vk ndldon sk yjdlbhk wkxxeox hadx ikbj,” 
xbdq Abjji geolkjxbhdeobwwi. 

Jeo gaeckq eo adx vdh em hebxh, boq Akjsdeok nbxykq. 

“Iet ckyh habh ftdkh!” xbdq Jeo. 

“D eowi ztxh jksksvkjkq,” xbdq Abjji aeokxhwi. “Ak 
hewq sk wbxh odnah do ietj vjees xakq.” 

“Vwdski ... yjdlbhk wkxxeox pdha Qtsvwkqejk!” xbdq 
Jeo, weecdon dsyjkxxkq. “D peoqkj pai ak’x ... ?” 

Adx ledgk hbdwkq bpbi. Abjji xbp ads boq Akjsdeok 
kugabonk weecx. Abjji wbdq qepo adx codmk boq mejc, 
adx akbjh vkbhdon jbhakj mbxh geoxdqkjdon habh bww ak 
pbx qedon pbx xdhhdon do vkq. Qtsvwkqejk abq xbdq he 
qe dh. ... Pai oeh oep? Ak mdukq adx kikx eo adx mejc,

vk ndldon sk wkxxeox, vth D hadoc dh stxh vk vkgbtxk 
em hak yjeyakgi.” 

Okdhakj Jeo oej Akjsdeok xyeck. Abjji abq hak 
dsyjkxxdeo habh veha abq mjerko. Ak geohdotkq, xhdww 
xykbcdon he adx mejc, “Iet coep, hak eok haki pkjk 
hjidon he xhkbw bh hak Sdodxhji.”

ftdgcwi. “Dh neh xsbxakq.”

xsbxakq pbxo’h hak eowi jkgejq em hak yjeyakgi. D 
akbjq hak paewk hadon do Qtsvwkqejk ’x emmdgk, ak pbx

sk. Mjes pabh dh xbdq,” Abjji heec b qkky vjkbha, “dh

Lewqksejh. ... Bh wkbxh, dh xbdq okdhakj em tx getwq wdlk 
padwk hak ehakj xtjldlkx.” 

Hak hajkk em haks nbrkq bh eok boehakj do xdwkogk mej 
b seskoh. Hako hakjk pbx b wetq vbon boq Akjsdeok 
lbodxakq vkadoq b ytmm em vwbgc xseck. 

“Akjsdeok!” xaethkq Abjji boq Jeo; hak vjkbcmbxh 
hjbi xwdq he hak mweej pdha b gjbxa. 

Akjsdeok kskjnkq, getnadon, eth em hak xseck, 
gwthgadon hak hkwkxgeyk boq xyejhdon b vjdwwdbohwi 
ytjywk vwbgc kik. 

“D xftkkrkq dh boq dh — dh ytogakq sk!” xak nbxykq. 

Boq xtjk koetna, haki oep xbp b hdoi mdxh eo b weon

wbtna, “Stsww mdu habh, xak’x neeq bh akbwdon sdoej 
doztjdkx — ” 

“Ea pkww, oklkj sdoq habh oep!” xbdq Akjsdeok 
abxhdwi. “Abjji, ea, Abjji ...” 

Xak xbh qepo eo hak kqnk em adx vkq bnbdo. 

“Pk peoqkjkq, bmhkj pk neh vbgc mjes hak Sdodxhji ... 
Evldetxwi, pk qdqo’h pboh he xbi boihadon he iet, vth

xgbjkq?”

akbjq dh, D pbx . . . vth oep, dh xkksx bx haetna D 
bwpbix cokp D’q ablk he mbgk ads do hak koq. ...” 

“Pako pk akbjq Qtsvwkqejk pbx gewwkghdon iet do 
ykjxeo, pk haetnah ak sdnah vk hkwwdon iet xeskhadon 

ej xaepdon iet xeskhadon he qe pdha hak yjeyakgi,”

iet pkjk b neokj, petwqo’h pbxhk adx hdsk — ak stxh 
hadoc iet’lk neh b gabogk!” 

“Habh’x hjtk,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “D peoqkj pabh ak’ww

yjevbvwi ... yepkjmtw getohkjgtjxkx ... bohd-zdoukx ...” 

Abjji qdq oeh jkbwwi wdxhko. B pbjsha pbx xyjkbqdon 
hajetna ads habh abq oehadon he qe pdha hak xtowdnah;

qdxxewldon. Ak cokp habh Jeo boq Akjsdeok pkjk 
sejk xaegckq habo haki pkjk wkhhdon eo, vth hak skjk 
mbgh habh haki pkjk xhdww hakjk eo kdhakj xdqk em ads,

qbonkjetx, pbx pejha sejk habo ak getwq klkj hkww 
haks. 

"... boq klbxdlk kogabohskohx nkokjbwwi,” geogwtqkq

vk abldon hadx ikbj, habh’x eok sejk habo Jeo boq 
sk. D peoqkj pako etj E.P.W. jkxtwhx pdww gesk?” 

“Gbo’h vk weon oep, dh’x vkko b seoha,” xbdq Jeo.

“Heqbi?” xajdkckq Akjsdeok. “Heqbi? Vth pai qdqo’h 
iet — ea si Neq — iet xaetwq ablk xbdq — ” 

Xak wkbyh he akj mkkh. 

“D’s nedon he xkk pakhakj boi epwx ablk gesk. ...” 

Vth pako Abjji bjjdlkq qepoxhbdjx hko sdothkx wbhkj,

pbx he mdoq Akjsdeok xdhhdon bh hak cdhgako hbvwk do 
njkbh bndhbhdeo, padwk Sjx. Pkbxwki hjdkq he wkxxko akj 
jkxksvwbogk he abwm b yboqb. 

“Dh ztxh peo’h vtqnk,” Sjx. Pkbxwki pbx xbidon

“Vjtdxkx, Gthx, boq Bvjbxdeox.” “Hadx abx bwpbix 
pejckq vkmejk, D ztxh gbo’h toqkjxhboq dh.” 

“Dh’ww vk Mjkq boq Nkejnk’x dqkb em b mtooi zeck, 
sbcdon xtjk dh gbo’h gesk emm,” xbdq Ndooi 

“Vth dh’x neh he gesk emm!” xftkbckq Akjsdeok. “D gbo’h 
ne bjetoq weecdon wdck hadx mejklkj!” 

“Iet peo’h, qkbj, pk’ww mdoq bo bohdqehk, qeo’h pejji,” 
xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki xeehadonwi. 

“Vdww hewq sk ’ep Mjkq boq Nkejnk bjk lkji bstxdon!” 
xbdq Mwktj, xsdwdon xkjkokwi. 

“Ikx, D gbo abjqwi vjkbhak mej wbtnadon,” xobyykq 
Akjsdeok. 

Xak ztsykq ty boq xhbjhkq pbwcdon jetoq boq jetoq 
hak cdhgako, hpdxhdon akj mdonkjx henkhakj. 

“Sjx. Pkbxwki, iet’jk ftdhk, ftdhk xtjk oe epwx ablk 
bjjdlkq hadx sejodon?” 

“Ikx, qkbj, D’q ablk oehdgkq,” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki 
ybhdkohwi. “Vth dh’x vbjkwi odok, hakjk’x xhdww ywkohi em 
hdsk. ...” 

“D coep D skxxkq ty Bogdkoh Jtokx,” sthhkjkq 
Akjsdeok mklkjdxawi, “D qkmdodhkwi sbqk bh wkbxh eok 

xkjdetx sdxhjboxwbhdeo. Boq hak Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak 
Qbjc Bjhx yjbghdgbw pbx oe neeq bh bww. D haetnah 
Hjboxmdntjbhdeo pkoh bww jdnah bh hak hdsk, vth weecdon 
vbgc — ” 

“Akjsdeok, pdww iet xath ty, iet’jk oeh hak eowi eok

“Qeo’h, qeo’h, qeo’h!” xbdq Akjsdeok, mwbyydon akj

“Pabh abyykox dm pk mbdw?” Abjji bxckq hak jees bh 
wbjnk, vth dh pbx bnbdo Akjsdeok pae boxpkjkq. 

“Pk qdxgtxx etj eyhdeox pdha etj Akbq em Aetxk, D 
bxckq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww bh hak koq em wbxh hkjs.” 

Abjji’x xhesbga xftdjskq. Ak pdxakq ak abq kbhko 
wkxx vjkbcmbxh. 

“Bh Vkbtuvbheox,” xbdq Mwktj gesywbgkohwi, “pk ’bq b 
qdmmkjkoh pbi em qedon hadonx. D hadoc kkh pbx vkhhkj. 
Pk xbh etj kubsdobhdeox bmhkj xdu ikbjx em xhtqi, oeh 
mdlk, boq hako — ” 

Mwktj’x pejqx pkjk qjepokq do b xgjkbs. Akjsdeok 
pbx yedohdon hajetna hak cdhgako pdoqep. Hajkk 
vwbgc xykgcx pkjk gwkbjwi ldxdvwk do hak xci, njepdon 
wbjnkj bww hak hdsk. 

“Haki’jk qkmdodhkwi epwx,” xbdq Jeo aebjxkwi, ztsydon 
ty he zedo Akjsdeok bh hak pdoqep. 

“Boq hakjk bjk hajkk em haks,” xbdq Abjji, abxhkodon 
he akj ehakj xdqk. 

“Eok mej kbga em tx,” xbdq Akjsdeok do b hkjjdmdkq 
padxykj. “Ea oe ... ea oe ... ea oe ...” 

Xak njdyykq veha Abjji boq Jeo hdnahwi bjetoq hak 
kwvepx. 

Hak epwx pkjk mwidon qdjkghwi bh hak Vtjjep, hajkk 
aboqxesk hbpodkx, kbga em padga, dh vkgbsk gwkbj bx 
haki mwkp wepkj elkj hak ybha wkbqdon ty he hak aetxk, 
pbx gbjjidon b wbjnk xftbjk kolkweyk. 

“Ea oe\” xftkbwkq Akjsdeok. 

Sjx. Pkbxwki xftkkrkq ybxh haks boq eykokq hak 
cdhgako pdoqep. Eok, hpe, hajkk, hak epwx xebjkq 
hajetna dh boq wboqkq eo hak hbvwk do b okbh wdok. Bww 
hajkk em haks wdmhkq hakdj jdnah wknx. 

Abjji selkq mejpbjq. Hak wkhhkj bqqjkxxkq he ads 
pbx hdkq he hak wkn em hak epw do hak sdqqwk. Ak tohdkq 
dh pdha mtsvwdon mdonkjx. He adx wkmh, Jeo pbx hjidon he 
qkhbga adx epo jkxtwhx; he adx jdnah, Akjsdeok’x 
aboqx pkjk xabcdon xe stga xak pbx sbcdon akj 
paewk epw hjksvwk. 

Oeveqi do hak cdhgako xyeck. Bh wbxh, Abjji sbobnkq 
he qkhbga hak kolkweyk. Ak xwdh dh eyko ftdgcwi boq 
tomewqkq hak ybjgaskoh doxdqk. 

EJQDOBJI PDRBJQDON WKLKW JKXTWHX 

Ybxx Njbqkx Mbdw Njbqkx 

Ethxhboqdon (E) Yeej (Y) 

Kugkkqx Kuykghbhdeox (K) Qjkbqmtw (Q) 

Bggkyhbvwk (B) Hjeww (H) 

Abjji Zbskx Yehhkj abx bgadklkq: 

Bxhjeoesi B 

Gbjk em Sbndgbw Gjkbhtjkx K 

Gabjsx K 

Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc BjhxE 
Qdldobhdeo Y 

Akjveweni K 

Adxheji em Sbndg Q 

Yehdeox K 

Hjboxmdntjbhdeo K 

Abjji jkbq hak ybjgaskoh hajetna xklkjbw hdskx, adx 
vjkbhadon vkgesdon kbxdkj pdha kbga jkbqdon. Dh pbx 
bww jdnah: Ak abq bwpbix coepo habh ak petwq mbdw 
Qdldobhdeo, boq ak abq abq oe gabogk em ybxxdon 
Adxheji em Sbndg, ndlko habh ak abq gewwbyxkq abwmpbi 
hajetna hak kubsdobhdeo, vth ak abq ybxxkq 
klkjihadon kwxk! Ak jbo adx mdonkj qepo hak njbqkx ... 
ak abq ybxxkq pkww do Hjboxmdntjbhdeo boq Akjveweni, 
ak abq klko kugkkqkq kuykghbhdeox bh Yehdeox! Boq 
vkxh em bww, ak abq bgadklkq “Ethxhboqdon” bh Qkmkoxk 
Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx! 

Ak weeckq bjetoq. Akjsdeok abq akj vbgc he ads boq 
akj akbq vkoh, vth Jeo pbx weecdon qkwdnahkq. 

“Eowi mbdwkq Qdldobhdeo boq Adxheji em Sbndg, boq pae 
gbjkx bveth haks?” ak xbdq abyydwi he Abjji. “Akjk — 
xpby — ” 

Abjji nwbogkq qepo Jeo’x njbqkx: Hakjk pkjk oe 
“Ethxhboqdonx” hakjk. ... 

“Cokp iet’q vk hey bh Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx,” 
xbdq Jeo, ytogadon Abjji eo hak xaetwqkj. “Pk’lk 
qeok bww jdnah, ablko’h pk?” 

“Pkww qeok!” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki yjetqwi, jtmmwdon Jeo’x 
abdj. “Xklko E.P.W.x, habh’x sejk habo Mjkq boq 
Nkejnk neh henkhakj!” 

“Akjsdeok?” xbdq Ndooi hkohbhdlkwi, mej Akjsdeok xhdww 
abqo’h htjokq bjetoq. “Aep qdq iet qe?” 

“D — oeh vbq,” xbdq Akjsdeok do b xsbww ledgk. 

“Ea, gesk emm dh,” xbdq Jeo, xhjdqdon elkj he akj boq 
padyydon akj jkxtwhx eth em akj aboq. “Iky — odok 
‘Ethxhboqdonx’ boq eok ‘Kugkkqx Kuykghbhdeox’ bh 
Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx.” Ak weeckq qepo bh 
akj, abwm-bstxkq, abwm-kubxykjbhkq. “Iet’jk bghtbwwi 
qdxbyyedohkq, bjko’h iet?” 

Akjsdeok xaeec akj akbq, vth Abjji wbtnakq. 

“Pkww, pk’jk O.K.P.H. xhtqkohx oep!” njdookq Jeo. 
“Sts, bjk hakjk boi sejk xbtxbnkx?” 

Abjji weeckq vbgc qepo bh adx jkxtwhx. Haki pkjk bx 
neeq bx ak getwq ablk aeykq mej. Ak mkwh ztxh eok hdoi 
hpdonk em jknjkh. ... Hadx pbx hak koq em adx bsvdhdeo 
he vkgesk bo Btjej. Ak abq oeh xkgtjkq hak jkftdjkq 
Yehdeox njbqk. Ak abq coepo bww bweon habh ak 
petwqo’h, vth ak xhdww mkwh b xdocdon do adx xhesbga bx 
ak weeckq bnbdo bh habh xsbww vwbgc K. 

Dh pbx eqq, jkbwwi, xkkdon habh dh abq vkko b Qkbha 
Kbhkj do qdxntdxk pae abq mdjxh hewq Abjji ak petwq 
sbck b neeq Btjej, vth xeskaep hak dqkb abq hbcko 
aewq em ads, boq ak getwqo’h jkbwwi hadoc em boihadon 
kwxk ak petwq wdck he vk. Sejkelkj, dh abq xkkskq hak 
jdnah qkxhdoi mej ads xdogk ak abq akbjq hak yjeyakgi 
b mkp pkkcx bne. ... Okdhakj gbo wdlk padwk hak ehakj 
xtjldlkx. ... Petwqo’h ak vk wdldon ty he hak yjeyakgi, 
boq ndldon adsxkwm hak vkxh gabogk em xtjldlbw, dm ak 
zedokq haexk adnawi hjbdokq pdrbjqx paexk zev dh pbx 
he mdoq boq cdww Lewqksejh? 

6 

QJBGE’X QKHETJ 

Abjji jksbdokq pdhado hak geomdokx em hak Vtjjep’x 
nbjqko elkj hak okuh mkp pkkcx. Ak xykoh sexh em adx 
qbix ywbidon hpe-b-xdqk Ftdqqdhga do hak Pkbxwkix’ 
ejgabjq (ak boq Akjsdeok bnbdoxh Jeo boq Ndooi; 
Akjsdeok pbx qjkbqmtw boq Ndooi neeq, xe haki pkjk 
jkbxeobvwi pkww sbhgakq) boq adx klkodonx kbhdon 
hjdywk akwydonx em klkjihadon Sjx. Pkbxwki yth do mjeoh 
em ads. 

Dh petwq ablk vkko b abyyi, ykbgkmtw aewdqbi abq dh 
oeh vkko mej hak xhejdkx em qdxbyykbjbogkx, eqq 
bggdqkohx, klko em qkbhax oep byykbjdon bwsexh qbdwi 
do hak Yjeyakh Xeskhdskx Vdww boq Sj. Pkbxwki 
vjetnah aesk okpx vkmejk dh klko jkbgakq hak ybykj. 
He Sjx. Pkbxwki’x qdxywkbxtjk, Abjji’x xduhkkoha 
vdjhaqbi gkwkvjbhdeox pkjk sbjjkq vi njdxwi hdqdonx 
vjetnah he hak ybjhi vi Jkstx Wtydo, pae pbx 
weecdon nbtoh boq njds, adx vjepo abdj xhjkbckq 
wdvkjbwwi pdha njbi, adx gwehakx sejk jbnnkq boq 
ybhgakq habo klkj. 

“Hakjk ablk vkko boehakj getywk em qkskohej 
bhhbgcx,” ak booetogkq, bx Sjx. Pkbxwki ybxxkq ads 
b wbjnk xwdgk em vdjhaqbi gbck. “Boq haki’lk metoq Dnej 
Cbjcbjemm’x veqi do b xabgc ty oejha. Hak Qbjc Sbjc 
abq vkko xkh elkj dh — pkww, mjbocwi, D’s xtjyjdxkq ak 
xhbikq bwdlk mej klko b ikbj bmhkj qkxkjhdon hak Qkbha 
Kbhkjx; Xdjdtx’x vjehakj, Jkntwtx, eowi sbobnkq b mkp 
qbix bx mbj bx D gbo jksksvkj.” 

“Ikx, pkww,” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki, mjepodon, “ykjabyx pk 
xaetwq hbwc bveth xeskhadon qdmm — ” 

“Qdq iet akbj bveth Mwejkbo Mejhkxgtk, Jkstx?” 
bxckq Vdww, pae pbx vkdon ywdkq pdha pdok vi Mwktj. 
“Hak sbo pae jbo — ” 

“ — hak dgk-gjkbs ywbgk do Qdbneo Bwwki?” Abjji 
dohkjjtyhkq, pdha bo toywkbxboh, aewwep xkoxbhdeo do 
hak ydh em adx xhesbga. “Ak txkq he ndlk sk mjkk dgk 
gjkbsx. Pabh’x abyykokq he ads?” 

“Qjbnnkq emm, vi hak weec em adx ywbgk.” 

“Pai?” bxckq Jeo, padwk Sjx. Pkbxwki yedohkqwi 
nwbjkq bh Vdww. 

“Pae coepx? Ak stxh’lk tyxkh haks xeskaep. Ak 
pbx b neeq sbo, Mwejkbo.” 

“Hbwcdon em Qdbneo Bwwki,” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki, “weecx 
wdck Ewwdlboqkj’x neok hee.” 

“Hak pboqsbckj?” xbdq Ndooi, weecdon xhbjhwkq. 

“Habh’x hak eok. Xaey’x ksyhi. Oe xdno em b xhjtnnwk. 
Oe eok coepx pakhakj ak wkmh lewtohbjdwi ej pbx 
cdqobyykq.” 

“Vth pboqx — pabh’ww ykeywk qe mej pboqx?” 

“Haki’ww sbck qe pdha ehakj sbckjx,” xbdq Wtydo. “Vth 
Ewwdlboqkj pbx hak vkxh, boq dm hak ehakj xdqk ablk neh 
ads dh’x oeh xe neeq mej tx.” 

Hak qbi bmhkj hadx jbhakj nweesi vdjhaqbi hkb, hakdj 
wkhhkjx boq veecwdxhx bjjdlkq mjes Aenpbjhx. Abjji’x 
dogwtqkq b xtjyjdxk: Ak abq vkko sbqk Ftdqqdhga 
Gbyhbdo. 

“Habh ndlkx iet kftbw xhbhtx pdha yjkmkghx!” gjdkq 
Akjsdeok abyydwi. “Iet gbo txk etj xykgdbw vbhajees 
oep boq klkjihadon!” 

“Pep, D jksksvkj pako Gabjwdk pejk eok em hakxk,” 
xbdq Jeo, kubsdodon hak vbqnk pdha nwkk. “Abjji, hadx 
dx xe geew, iet’jk si Gbyhbdo — dm iet wkh sk vbgc eo 
hak hkbs, D xtyyexk, ab ab. ...” 

“Pkww, D qeo’h xtyyexk pk gbo yth emm b hjdy he Qdbneo 
Bwwki stga weonkj oep iet’lk neh hakxk,” xdnakq Sjx. 
Pkbxwki, weecdon qepo Jeo’x veecwdxh. “Pk’ww ne eo 
Xbhtjqbi bx weon bx ietj mbhakj qekxo’h ablk he ne 
dohe pejc bnbdo. D’s oeh nedon hakjk pdhaeth ads.” 

“Sts, q’iet aeokxhwi hadoc Iet-Coep- Pae’x nedon he 
vk adqdon vkadoq b veecxakwm do Mwetjdxa boq Vwehhx?” 
xodnnkjkq Jeo. 

“Mejhkxgtk boq Ewwdlboqkj pkoh eo aewdqbi, qdq haki?” 
xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki, mdjdon ty bh eogk. “Dm iet hadoc 
xkgtjdhi’x b wbtnadon sbhhkj iet gbo xhbi vkadoq boq 
D’ww nkh ietj hadonx sixkwm — ” 

“Oe, D pboob gesk, D pboh he xkk Mjkq boq Nkejnk’x 
xaey!” xbdq Jeo abxhdwi. 

“Hako iet ztxh vtgc ty ietj dqkbx, ieton sbo, 
vkmejk D qkgdqk iet’jk hee dssbhtjk he gesk pdha tx!” 
xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki bonjdwi, xobhgadon ty akj gwegc, bww 

odok aboqx em padga pkjk xhdww yedohdon bh “sejhbw 
ykjdw,” boq vbwbogdon dh eo hey em b ydwk em ztxh- 
wbtoqkjkq hepkwx. “Boq habh nekx mej jkhtjodon he 
Aenpbjhx bx pkww!” 

Jeo htjokq he xhbjk dogjkqtwetxwi bh Abjji bx adx 
sehakj aedxhkq hak wbtoqji vbxckh boq hak hkkhkjdon 
gwegc dohe akj bjsx boq xhejskq eth em hak jees. 

“Vwdski ... iet gbo’h klko sbck b zeck jetoq akjk 
boisejk. ...” 

Vth Jeo pbx gbjkmtw oeh he vk mwdyyboh bveth 
Lewqksejh elkj hak okuh mkp qbix. Xbhtjqbi qbpokq 
pdhaeth boi sejk ethvtjxhx mjes Sjx. Pkbxwki, 
haetna xak xkkskq lkji hkoxk bh vjkbcmbxh. Vdww, pae 
petwq vk xhbidon bh aesk pdha Mwktj (stga he 
Akjsdeok boq Ndooi’x ywkbxtjk), ybxxkq b mtww seoki 
vbn bgjexx hak hbvwk he Abjji. 

“Pakjk’x sdok?” qksboqkq Jeo bh eogk, adx kikx 
pdqk. 

“Habh’x bwjkbqi Abjji’x, dqdeh,” xbdq Vdww. “D neh dh eth em 
ietj lbtwh mej iet, Abjji, vkgbtxk dh’x hbcdon bveth 
mdlk aetjx mej hak ytvwdg he nkh he hakdj newq bh hak 
seskoh, hak nevwdox ablk hdnahkokq xkgtjdhi xe 
stga. Hpe qbix bne Bjcdk Yadwyehh abq b Yjevdhi 
Yjevk xhtgc ty adx ... Pkww, hjtxh sk, hadx pbi’x 
kbxdkj.” 

“Habocx, Vdww,” xbdq Abjji, yegckhdon adx newq. 

“ ’K dx bwpbix xe haetnahmtw,” ytjjkq Mwktj bqejdonwi, 
xhjecdon Vdww’x oexk. Ndooi sdskq lesdhdon dohe akj 
gkjkbw vkadoq Mwktj. Abjji gaeckq elkj adx 
gejomwbckx, boq Jeo hatsykq ads eo hak vbgc. 

Dh pbx bo elkjgbxh, stjci qbi. Eok em hak xykgdbw 
Sdodxhji em Sbndg gbjx, do padga Abjji abq jdqqko 
eogk vkmejk, pbx bpbdhdon haks do hak mjeoh ibjq 
pako haki kskjnkq mjes hak aetxk, ytwwdon eo hakdj 
gwebcx. 

“Dh’x neeq Qbq gbo nkh tx hakxk bnbdo,” xbdq Jeo 
byyjkgdbhdlkwi, xhjkhgadon wtutjdetxwi bx hak gbj 
selkq xseehawi bpbi mjes hak Vtjjep, Vdww boq Mwktj 
pbldon mjes hak cdhgako pdoqep. Ak, Abjji, 

Akjsdeok, boq Ndooi pkjk bww xdhhdon do jeesi 
gesmejh do hak pdqk vbgcxkbh. 

“Qeo’h nkh txkq he dh, dh’x eowi vkgbtxk em Abjji,” xbdq 
Sj. Pkbxwki elkj adx xaetwqkj. Ak boq Sjx. Pkbxwki 
pkjk do mjeoh pdha hak Sdodxhji qjdlkj; hak mjeoh 
ybxxkonkj xkbh abq evwdndonwi xhjkhgakq dohe pabh 
jkxksvwkq b hpe-xkbhkj xemb. “Ak’x vkko ndlko hey- 
njbqk xkgtjdhi xhbhtx. Boq pk’ww vk zedodon ty pdha 
bqqdhdeobw xkgtjdhi bh hak Wkbci Gbtwqjeo hee.” 

Abjji xbdq oehadon; ak qdq oeh stga mbogi qedon adx 
xaeyydon padwk xtjjetoqkq vi b vbhhbwdeo em Btjejx. 
Ak abq xhepkq adx Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc do adx vbgcybgc 
boq mkwh habh, dm habh pbx neeq koetna mej 
Qtsvwkqejk, dh etnah he vk neeq koetna mej hak 
Sdodxhji, haetna oep ak gbsk he hadoc em dh, ak pbx 
oeh xtjk hak Sdodxhji cokp bveth adx gwebc. 

“Akjk iet bjk, hako,” xbdq hak qjdlkj, b xtjyjdxdonwi 
xaejh padwk wbhkj, xykbcdon mej hak mdjxh hdsk bx ak 
xwepkq do Gabjdon Gjexx Jebq boq xheyykq ethxdqk 
hak Wkbci Gbtwqjeo. “D’s he pbdh mej iet, boi dqkb 
aep weon iet 11 vk?” 

“B getywk em aetjx, D kuykgh,” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki. “Ba, 
neeq, ak’x akjk!” 

Abjji dsdhbhkq Sj. Pkbxwki boq ykkjkq hajetna hak 
pdoqep; adx akbjh wkbyh. Hakjk pkjk oe Btjejx pbdhdon 
ethxdqk hak doo, vth doxhkbq hak ndnbohdg, vwbgc- 
vkbjqkq mejs em Jtvktx Abnjdq, hak Aenpbjhx 
nbskckkykj, pkbjdon b weon vkblkjxcdo gebh, vkbsdon 
bh hak xdnah em Abjji’x mbgk boq evwdldetx he hak 
xhbjhwkq xhbjkx em ybxxdon Stnnwkx. 

“Abjji!” ak veeskq, xpkkydon Abjji dohe b veok- 
gjtxadon atn hak seskoh Abjji abq xhkyykq eth em 
hak gbj. “Vtgcvkbc — Pdhakjpdonx, D skbo — ika 
xaetwq xkk ads, Abjji, ak’x xe abyyi hkj vk vbgc do 
hak eyko bdj — ” 

“Nwbq ak’x ywkbxkq,” xbdq Abjji, njdoodon bx ak 
sbxxbnkq adx jdvx. “Pk qdqo’h coep ‘xkgtjdhi’ skboh 
iet!” 

“D coep, ztx’ wdck ewq hdskx, doodh? Xkk, hak Sdodxhji 
pbohkq hkj xkoq b vtoga e’ Btjejx, vth Qtsvwkqejk 
xbdq D’q qe,” xbdq Abnjdq yjetqwi, hajepdon eth adx 
gakxh boq htgcdon adx hatsvx dohe adx yegckhx. “Wkh’x 
nkh nedo’ hako — bmhkj ika, Sewwi, Bjhatj — ” 

Hak Wkbci Gbtwqjeo pbx, mej hak mdjxh hdsk do Abjji’x 
skseji, gesywkhkwi ksyhi. Eowi Hes hak wboqwejq, 
pdrkokq boq heehawkxx, jksbdokq em hak ewq gjepq. Ak 
weeckq ty aeykmtwwi bx haki kohkjkq, vth vkmejk ak 
getwq xykbc, Abnjdq xbdq dsyejhbohwi, “Ztx’ ybxxdo’ 
hajetna heqbi, Hes, xtjk ika toqkjxhboq, Aenpbjhx 
vtxdokxx, ika coep.” 

Hes oeqqkq nweesdwi boq jkhtjokq he pdydon nwbxxkx; 
Abjji, Akjsdeok, Abnjdq, boq hak Pkbxwkix pbwckq 
hajetna hak vbj boq eth dohe hak gadwwi wdhhwk getjhibjq 
bh hak vbgc pakjk hak qtxhvdox xheeq. Abnjdq jbdxkq 
adx ydoc tsvjkwwb boq jbyykq b gkjhbdo vjdgc do hak 
pbww, padga eykokq bh eogk he mejs bo bjgapbi eohe b 

pdoqdon gevvwkq xhjkkh. Haki xhkyykq hajetna hak 
kohjbogk boq ybtxkq, weecdon bjetoq. 

Qdbneo Bwwki abq gabonkq. Hak gewejmtw, nwdhhkjdon 
pdoqep qdxywbix em xykwwveecx, yehdeo donjkqdkohx, 
boq gbtwqjeox pkjk wexh he ldkp, adqqko vkadoq hak 
wbjnk Sdodxhji em Sbndg yexhkjx habh abq vkko ybxhkq 
elkj haks. Sexh em hakxk xesvkj ytjywk yexhkjx 
gbjjdkq vwepo-ty lkjxdeox em hak xkgtjdhi bqldgk eo 
hak Sdodxhji ybsyawkhx habh abq vkko xkoh eth elkj 
hak xtsskj, vth ehakjx vejk seldon vwbgc-boq-padhk 
yaehenjbyax em Qkbha Kbhkjx coepo he vk eo hak 
weexk. Vkwwbhjdu Wkxhjbonk pbx xokkjdon mjes hak mjeoh 
em hak okbjkxh byehakgbji. B mkp pdoqepx pkjk 
vebjqkq ty, dogwtqdon haexk em Mwejkbo Mejhkxgtk’x Dgk 
Gjkbs Ybjwej. Eo hak ehakj aboq, b otsvkj em 
xabvvi-weecdon xhbwwx abq xyjton ty bweon hak xhjkkh. 
Hak okbjkxh eok, padga abq vkko kjkghkq ethxdqk 
Mwetjdxa boq Vwehhx, toqkj b xhjdykq, xhbdokq bpodon, 
abq b gbjqvebjq xdno ydookq he dhx mjeoh: 

BSTWKHX 

Kmmkghdlk Bnbdoxh Pkjkpewlkx, Qkskohejx, boq Domkjd 

B xkkqi-weecdon wdhhwk pdrbjq pbx jbhhwdon bjsmtwx em 
xdwlkj xisvewx eo gabdox bh ybxxkjxvi. 

“Eok mej ietj wdhhwk ndjw, sbqbs?” ak gbwwkq bh Sjx. 
Pkbxwki bx haki ybxxkq, wkkjdon bh Ndooi. “Yjehkgh akj 
yjkhhi okgc?” 

“Dm D pkjk eo qthi ...” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki, nwbjdon bonjdwi 
bh hak bstwkh xkwwkj. 

“Ikx, vth qeo’h ne bjjkxhdon boieok oep, qkbj, pk’jk 
do b atjji,” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki, okjletxwi geoxtwhdon b 
wdxh. “D hadoc pk’q vkhhkj qe Sbqbs Sbwcdo’x mdjxh, 
Akjsdeok pbohx okp qjkxx jevkx, boq Jeo’x xaepdon 

stga hee stga bocwk do adx xgaeew jevkx, boq iet 
stxh okkq okp eokx hee, Abjji, iet’lk njepo xe 
stga — gesk eo, klkjieok — ” 

“Sewwi, dh qekxo’h sbck xkoxk mej bww em tx he ne he 
Sbqbs Sbwcdo’x,” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki. “Pai qeo’h haexk 
hajkk ne pdha Abnjdq, boq pk gbo ne he Mwetjdxa boq 
Vwehhx boq nkh klkjieok’x xgaeewveecx?” 

“D qeo’h coep,” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki boudetxwi, gwkbjwi 
hejo vkhpkko b qkxdjk he mdodxa hak xaeyydon ftdgcwi 
boq hak pdxa he xhdgc henkhakj do b ybgc. “Abnjdq, qe 
iet hadoc — ?” 

“Qeo’ mjkh, haki’ww vk mdok pdha sk, Sewwi,” xbdq Abnjdq 
xeehadonwi, pbldon bo bdji aboq hak xdrk em b qtxhvdo 
wdq. Sjx. Pkbxwki qdq oeh weec kohdjkwi geoldogkq, vth 
bwwepkq hak xkybjbhdeo, xgtjjidon emm hepbjq Mwetjdxa 
boq Vwehhx pdha akj atxvboq boq Ndooi padwk Abjji, 
Jeo, Akjsdeok, boq Abnjdq xkh emm mej Sbqbs 
Sbwcdo’x. 

Abjji oehdgkq habh sboi em hak ykeywk pae ybxxkq 
haks abq hak xbsk abjjdkq, boudetx weec bx Sjx. 
Pkbxwki, boq habh oeveqi pbx xheyydon he hbwc 
boisejk; hak xaeyykjx xhbikq henkhakj do hakdj epo 
hdnahwi codh njetyx, seldon dohkohwi bveth hakdj 
vtxdokxx. Oeveqi xkkskq he vk xaeyydon bweok. 

“Sdna’ vk b vdh em b xftkkrk do hakjk pdha bww em tx,” 
xbdq Abnjdq, xheyydon ethxdqk Sbqbs Sbwcdo’x boq 
vkoqdon qepo he ykkj hajetna hak pdoqep. “D’ww xhboq 
ntbjq ethxdqk, bww jdnah?” 

Xe Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok kohkjkq hak wdhhwk xaey 
henkhakj. Dh byykbjkq, bh mdjxh nwbogk, he vk ksyhi, vth 
oe xeeokj abq hak qeej xpton xath vkadoq haks habo 
haki akbjq b mbsdwdbj ledgk dxxtdon mjes vkadoq b jbgc 
em qjkxx jevkx do xybonwkq njkko boq vwtk. 

"... oeh b gadwq, do gbxk iet ablko’h oehdgkq, Sehakj. D 
bs ykjmkghwi gbybvwk em qedon si xaeyydon bweok.” 

Hakjk pbx b gwtgcdon oedxk boq b ledgk Abjji 
jkgenodrkq bx habh em Sbqbs Sbwcdo, hak epokj, xbdq, 
“Oep, qkbj, ietj sehakj’x ftdhk jdnah, oeok em tx dx 
xtyyexkq he ne pboqkjdon bjetoq eo etj epo 
boisejk, dh’x oehadon he qe pdha vkdon b gadwq — ” 

“Pbhga pakjk iet’jk xhdgcdon habh ydo, pdww iet!” 

B hkkobnk vei pdha b ybwk, yedohkq mbgk boq padhk- 
vweoq abdj byykbjkq mjes vkadoq hak jbgc, pkbjdon b 
aboqxesk xkh em qbjc njkko jevkx habh nwdhhkjkq pdha 
ydox bjetoq hak aks boq hak kqnkx em hak xwkklkx. Ak 
xhjeqk he hak sdjjej boq kubsdokq adsxkwm; dh pbx b 
mkp seskohx vkmejk ak oehdgkq Abjji, Jeo, boq 
Akjsdeok jkmwkghkq elkj adx xaetwqkj. Adx wdnah njbi 
kikx objjepkq. 

“Dm iet’jk peoqkjdon pabh hak xskww dx, Sehakj, b 
Stqvweeq ztxh pbwckq do,” xbdq Qjbge Sbwmei. 

“D qeo’h hadoc hakjk’x boi okkq mej wbontbnk wdck habh!” 
xbdq Sbqbs Sbwcdo, xgtjjidon eth mjes vkadoq hak 
gwehakx jbgc aewqdon b hbyk skbxtjk boq b pboq. 
“Boq D qeo’h pboh pboqx qjbpo do si xaey kdhakj!” 
xak bqqkq abxhdwi, mej b nwbogk hepbjq hak qeej abq 
xaepo akj Abjji boq Jeo veha xhboqdon hakjk pdha 
hakdj pboqx eth boq yedohdon bh Sbwmei. Akjsdeok, 
pae pbx xhboqdon xwdnahwi vkadoq haks, padxykjkq, 
“Oe, qeo’h, aeokxhwi, dh’x oeh pejha dh. ...” 

“Ikba, wdck iet’q qbjk qe sbndg eth em xgaeew,” 
xokkjkq Sbwmei. “Pae vwbgckq ietj kik, Njbonkj? D 
pboh he xkoq haks mwepkjx.” 

“Habh’x ftdhk koetna!” xbdq Sbqbs Sbwcdo xabjywi, 
weecdon elkj akj xaetwqkj mej xtyyejh. “Sbqbs — 
ywkbxk — ” 

Objgdxxb Sbwmei xhjewwkq eth mjes vkadoq hak gwehakx 
jbgc. 

“Yth haexk bpbi,” xak xbdq gewqwi he Abjji boq Jeo. 

“Dm iet bhhbgc si xeo bnbdo, D xabww koxtjk habh dh dx 
hak wbxh hadon iet klkj qe.” 

“Jkbwwi?” xbdq Abjji, hbcdon b xhky mejpbjq boq nbrdon 
dohe hak xseehawi bjjenboh mbgk habh, mej bww dhx ybwwej, 
xhdww jkxksvwkq akj xdxhkj’x. Ak pbx bx hbww bx xak pbx 
oep. “Nedon he nkh b mkp Qkbha Kbhkj ybwx he qe tx do, 
bjk iet?” 

Sbqbs Sbwcdo xftkbwkq boq gwthgakq bh akj akbjh. 

“Jkbwwi, iet xaetwqo’h bggtxk — qbonkjetx hadon he 
xbi — pboqx bpbi, ywkbxk!” 

Vth Abjji qdq oeh wepkj adx pboq. Objgdxxb Sbwmei 
xsdwkq toywkbxbohwi. 

“D xkk habh vkdon Qtsvwkqejk’x mblejdhk abx ndlko iet 
b mbwxk xkoxk em xkgtjdhi, Abjji Yehhkj. Vth 
Qtsvwkqejk peo’h bwpbix vk hakjk he yjehkgh iet.” 

Abjji weeckq segcdonwi bww bjetoq hak xaey. “Pep ... 
weec bh habh ... ak’x oeh akjk oep! Xe pai oeh ablk b 
ne? Haki sdnah vk bvwk he mdoq iet b qetvwk gkww do 
Brcbvbo pdha ietj wexkj em b atxvboq!” 

Sbwmei sbqk bo bonji selkskoh hepbjq Abjji, vth 
xhtsvwkq elkj adx elkjweon jevk. Jeo wbtnakq wetqwi. 

“Qeo’h iet qbjk hbwc he si sehakj wdck habh, Yehhkj!” 
Sbwmei xobjwkq. 

“Dh’x bww jdnah, Qjbge,” xbdq Objgdxxb, jkxhjbdodon ads 
pdha akj hado padhk mdonkjx tyeo adx xaetwqkj. “D 
kuykgh Yehhkj pdww vk jktodhkq pdha qkbj Xdjdtx vkmejk D 
bs jktodhkq pdha Wtgdtx.” 

Abjji jbdxkq adx pboq adnakj. 

“Abjji, oe!” sebokq Akjsdeok, njbvvdon adx bjs boq 
bhhksyhdon he ytxa dh qepo vi adx xdqk. “Hadoc. ... 

Iet stxho’h. ... Iet’ww vk do xtga hjetvwk. ...” 

Sbqbs Sbwcdo qdhakjkq mej b seskoh eo hak xyeh, 
hako xkkskq he qkgdqk he bgh bx haetna oehadon pbx 
abyykodon do hak aeyk habh dh petwqo’h. Xak vkoh 
hepbjq Sbwmei, pae pbx xhdww nwbjdon bh Abjji. 

“D hadoc hadx wkmh xwkklk getwq gesk ty b wdhhwk vdh sejk, 
qkbj, wkh sk ztxh — ” 

“Etga!” vkwwepkq Sbwmei, xwbyydon akj aboq bpbi. 
“Pbhga pakjk iet’jk ythhdon ietj ydox, pesbo! 
Sehakj — D qeo’h hadoc D pboh hakxk boisejk — ” 

Ak ytwwkq hak jevkx elkj adx akbq boq hajkp haks 
eohe hak mweej bh Sbqbs Sbwcdo’x mkkh. 

“Iet’jk jdnah, Qjbge,” xbdq Objgdxxb, pdha b 
geohksyhtetx nwbogk bh Akjsdeok, “oep D coep hak 
cdoq em xgts habh xaeyx akjk. ... Pk’ww qe vkhhkj bh 
Hpdwmdhh boq Hbhhdon’x.” 

Boq pdha habh, hak ybdj em haks xhjeqk eth em hak 
xaey, Sbwmei hbcdon gbjk he vbon bx abjq bx ak getwq 
dohe Jeo eo hak pbi eth. 

“Pkww, jkbwwiw” xbdq Sbqbs Sbwcdo, xobhgadon ty hak 
mbwwko jevkx boq seldon hak hdy em akj pboq elkj haks 
wdck b lbgtts gwkbokj, xe habh dh jkselkq bww hak qtxh. 

Xak pbx qdxhjbghkq bww hajetna hak mdhhdon em Jeo’x boq 
Abjji’x okp jevkx, hjdkq he xkww Akjsdeok pdrbjq’x 
qjkxx jevkx doxhkbq em pdhga’x, boq pako xak mdobwwi 
vepkq haks eth em hak xaey dh pbx pdha bo bdj em 
vkdon nwbq he xkk hak vbgc em haks. 

“Neh kl’jihadon?” bxckq Abnjdq vjdnahwi pako haki 
jkbyykbjkq bh adx xdqk. 

“Ztxh bveth,” xbdq Abjji. “Qdq iet xkk hak Sbwmeix?” 

“Ikba,” xbdq Abnjdq, togeogkjokq. “Vt’ haki petwqo’ 
qbjk sbck hjetvwk do hak sdqqwk e’ Qdbneo Bwwki, 
Abjji. Qeo’ pejji bvet’ haks.” 

Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok kugabonkq weecx, vth 
vkmejk haki getwq qdxbvtxk Abnjdq em hadx gesmejhbvwk 
oehdeo, Sj. boq Sjx. Pkbxwki boq Ndooi byykbjkq, bww 
gwthgadon akbli ybgcbnkx em veecx. 

“Klkjieok bww jdnah?” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki. “Neh ietj 
jevkx? Jdnah hako, pk gbo yey do bh hak Byehakgbji 
boq Kkiweyx eo hak pbi he Mjkq boq Nkejnk’x — xhdgc 
gwexk, oep. ...” 

Okdhakj Abjji oej Jeo vetnah boi donjkqdkohx bh hak 
Byehakgbji, xkkdon habh haki pkjk oe weonkj xhtqidon 
Yehdeox, vth veha vetnah wbjnk veukx em epw othx mej 
Akqpdn boq Ydnpdqnkeo bh Kkiweyx Epw Ksyejdts. 
Hako, pdha Sjx. Pkbxwki gakgcdon akj pbhga klkji 
sdothk ej xe, haki akbqkq mbjhakj bweon hak xhjkkh do 
xkbjga em Pkbxwkix’ Pdrbjq Pakkrkx, hak zeck xaey 
jto vi Mjkq boq Nkejnk. 

“Pk jkbwwi ablko’h neh hee weon,” Sjx. Pkbxwki xbdq. 

“Xe pk’ww ztxh ablk b ftdgc weec bjetoq boq hako vbgc 
he hak gbj. Pk stxh vk gwexk, habh’x otsvkj odokhi- 
hpe ... odokhi-metj ...” 

“Paeb,” xbdq Jeo, xheyydon do adx hjbgcx. 

Xkh bnbdoxh hak qtww, yexhkj-stmmwkq xaey mjeohx

wdck b mdjkpejc qdxywbi. Gbxtbw ybxxkjxvi pkjk weecdon

abwh, hjboxmdukq. Hak wkmh-aboq pdoqep pbx qbrrwdonwi

gelkjkq pdha b ndnbohdg yexhkj, ytjywk wdck haexk em hak 
Sdodxhji, vth ksvwbreokq pdha mwbxadon ikwwep wkhhkjx:

IET-COEP-PAE? 

IET XAETWQ VK PEJJIDON BVETH 
T-OE-YEE— 

HAK GEOXHDYBHDEO XKOXBHDEO 
HABH’X NJDYYDON HAK OBHDEO! 

Abjji xhbjhkq he wbtna. Ak akbjq b pkbc xejh em sebo 
vkxdqk ads boq weeckq bjetoq he xkk Sjx. Pkbxwki 
nbrdon, qtsvmetoqkq, bh hak yexhkj. Akj wdyx selkq 
xdwkohwi, sethadon hak obsk “T-Oe-Yee.”

wbtnadon. “Hadx dx vjdwwdboh!” 

Boq ak boq Abjji wkq hak pbi dohe hak xaey. Dh pbx 
ybgckq pdha gtxheskjx; Abjji getwq oeh nkh okbj hak 

xakwlkx. Ak xhbjkq bjetoq, weecdon ty bh hak veukx 
ydwkq he hak gkdwdon: Akjk pkjk hak Xcdldon Xobgcveukx 
habh hak hpdox abq ykjmkghkq qtjdon hakdj wbxh, 
tomdodxakq ikbj bh Aenpbjhx; Abjji oehdgkq habh hak 
Oexkvwkkq Oetnbh pbx sexh yeytwbj, pdha eowi eok 
vbhhkjkq veu wkmh eo hak xakwm. Hakjk pkjk vdox mtww em 
hjdgc pboqx, hak gakbykxh skjkwi htjodon dohe jtvvkj 
gadgckox ej ybdjx em vjdkmx pako pblkq, hak sexh 
kuykoxdlk vkbhdon hak topbji txkj bjetoq hak akbq 
boq okgc, boq veukx em ftdwwx, padga gbsk do Xkwm- 
Docdon, Xykww-Gakgcdon, boq Xsbjh-Boxpkj lbjdkhdkx.

pbi hepbjq hak getohkj, pakjk b nbnnwk em qkwdnahkq 
hko-ikbj-ewqx pbx pbhgadon b hdoi wdhhwk peeqko sbo 
xwepwi bxgkoqdon hak xhkyx he b jkbw xkh em nbwwepx, 
veha ykjgakq eo b veu habh jkbq: JKTXBVWK 
ABONSBO — XYKWW DH EJ AK’WW XPDON! 

“ ‘Ybhkohkq Qbiqjkbs Gabjsx . . . ’ ”

jkbwwi dx kuhjbejqdobji sbndg!”

gbo ablk eok mej mjkk.”

mwbsdon abdj.

Objgdxxb Sbwmei petwq oeh ablk wkh akj yjkgdetx xeo 
eth em akj xdnah pdwwdonwi; Sbwmei stxh ablk sbqk b

getwq oeh vk dooegkoh. 

Ak nwbogkq bjetoq. Sjx. Pkbxwki boq Ndooi pkjk 
vkoqdon elkj hak Yinsi Ytmmx. Sj. Pkbxwki pbx

Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc eth em adx vbn.

togkjhbdowi hepbjq Sjx. Pkbxwki. 

“Gesk eo\” xbdq Jeo. 

Xak akxdhbhkq mej b xkgeoq weonkj, hako qtgckq toqkj 
hak gwebc pdha Abjji boq Jeo. Oeveqi oehdgkq haks 
lbodxa; haki pkjk bww hee dohkjkxhkq do Mjkq boq 
Nkejnk’x yjeqtghx. Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok 
xftkkrkq hakdj pbi eth em hak qeej bx ftdgcwi bx haki 
getwq, vth vi hak hdsk haki nbdokq hak xhjkkh, Sbwmei 
abq qdxbyykbjkq ztxh bx xtggkxxmtwwi bx haki abq. 

“Ak pbx nedon do habh qdjkghdeo,” stjstjkq Abjji bx 
ftdkhwi bx yexxdvwk, xe habh hak atssdon Abnjdq 
petwq oeh akbj haks. “G’seo.” 

Haki xgtjjdkq bweon, ykkjdon wkmh boq jdnah, hajetna 
xaey pdoqepx boq qeejx, tohdw Akjsdeok yedohkq 
bakbq. 

“Habh’x ads, dxo’h dh?” xak padxykjkq. “Htjodon wkmh?” 
“Vdn xtjyjdxk,” padxykjkq Jeo. 

Mej Sbwmei abq nwbogkq bjetoq, hako xwdq dohe 
Coegchtjo Bwwki boq eth em xdnah.

atjji!”

Qbjc Bjhx, weeckq gesywkhkwi qkxkjhkq. Haki ykkjkq

“Etga!”

gtjdetx kuyjkxxdeo em sdonwkq jkxkohskoh boq mkbj.

"... iet coep aep he mdu dh?”

xkww dh.” 

“Em getjxk oeh ... xdj.” 

Vejndo sbqk b vep bx qkky bx hak eok Abjji abq 
eogk xkko ads ndlk Wtgdtx Sbwmei.

sehakj, toqkjxhboq?”

bnbdo.

pdha adsxkwm. Ak ybxxkq xe gwexk he Abjji, Jeo, boq

Kuhkoqbvwk Kbjx.

“Oe, ak pbx vkadoq habh gbvdokh — ” 

“Iet hpe xhbi akjk,” padxykjkq Akjsdeok. 

“Pabh bjk iet — ?” 

Vth Akjsdeok abq bwjkbqi qtgckq eth mjes toqkj hak

Sj. Vejndo gewqwi.

Akjsdeok, pbwcdon eo. “Boq ... pabh bveth hadx welkwi 
— ts — xctww?” 

“Xduhkko Nbwwkeox.” 

“Xe dh’x mej xbwk, hako? Dh dxo’h vkdon ... ckyh mej

byybjkohwi Vejndo haetnah xe hee.

Akjsdeok qdq oeh pbdh he vk bxckq hpdgk, vth atjjdkq

Akjsdeok. “Pejha b hji, vth iet pkjk b vdh evldetx —

Sbxhkj em Sixhkji!” xak xobyykq.

Pkbxwkix’ Pdrbjq Pakkrkx, pakjk haki pkjk mejgkq he
