7 

HAK XWTN GWTV 

Abjji xykoh b weh em hak wbxh pkkc em hak aewdqbix 
yeoqkjdon hak skbodon em Sbwmei’x vkabldej do 
Coegchtjo Bwwki. Pabh qdxhtjvkq ads sexh pbx hak 
xbhdxmdkq weec eo Sbwmei’x mbgk bx ak abq wkmh hak xaey. 
Oehadon habh sbqk Sbwmei weec habh abyyi getwq vk 
neeq okpx. He adx xwdnah booeibogk, aepklkj, okdhakj 
Jeo oej Akjsdeok xkkskq ftdhk bx gtjdetx bveth 
Sbwmei’x bghdldhdkx bx ak pbx; ej bh wkbxh, haki xkkskq 
he nkh vejkq em qdxgtxxdon dh bmhkj b mkp qbix. 

“Ikx, D’lk bwjkbqi bnjkkq dh pbx mdxai, Abjji,” xbdq 
Akjsdeok b wdhhwk dsybhdkohwi. Xak pbx xdhhdon eo hak 
pdoqepxdww do Mjkq boq Nkejnk’x jees pdha akj mkkh ty 
eo eok em hak gbjqvebjq veukx boq abq eowi 
njtqndonwi weeckq ty mjes akj okp geyi em Bqlbogkq 
Jtok Hjboxwbhdeo. “Vth ablko’h pk bnjkkq hakjk getwq 
vk b weh em kuywbobhdeox?” 

“Sbivk ak’x vjecko adx Aboq em Nweji,” xbdq Jeo 
lbntkwi, bx ak bhhksyhkq he xhjbdnahko adx 

vjeesxhdgc’x vkoh hbdw hpdnx. “Jksksvkj habh 
xajdlkwkq-ty bjs Sbwmei abq?” 

“Vth pabh bveth pako ak xbdq, ‘Qeo’h mejnkh he ckky 
habh eok xbmk’?” bxckq Abjji mej hak tsyhkkoha hdsk. 
“Habh xetoqkq he sk wdck Vejndo’x neh boehakj eok em 
hak vjecko evzkghx, boq Sbwmei pbohx veha.” 

“Iet jkgceo?” xbdq Jeo, oep hjidon he xgjbyk xesk 
qdjh emm adx vjees aboqwk. 

“Ikba, D qe,” xbdq Abjji. Pako okdhakj Jeo oej 
Akjsdeok boxpkjkq, ak xbdq, “Sbwmei’x mbhakj’x do 
Brcbvbo. Qeo’h iet hadoc Sbwmei’q wdck jklkonk?” 

Jeo weeckq ty, vwdocdon. 

“Sbwmei, jklkonk? Pabh gbo ak qe bveth dh?” 

“Habh’x si yedoh, D qeo’h coep!” xbdq Abjji, 
mjtxhjbhkq. “Vth ak’x ty he xeskhadon boq D hadoc pk 
xaetwq hbck dh xkjdetxwi. Adx mbhakj’x b Qkbha Kbhkj 
boq — ” 

Abjji vjeck emm, adx kikx mdukq eo hak pdoqep vkadoq 
Akjsdeok, adx setha eyko. B xhbjhwdon haetnah abq 
ztxh eggtjjkq he ads. 

“Abjji?” xbdq Akjsdeok do bo boudetx ledgk. “Pabh’x 
pjeon?” 

“Ietj xgbj’x oeh atjhdon bnbdo, dx dh?” bxckq Jeo 
okjletxwi. 

“Ak’x b Qkbha Kbhkj,” xbdq Abjji xwepwi. “Ak’x 
jkywbgkq adx mbhakj bx b Qkbha Kbhkj!” 

Hakjk pbx b xdwkogk; hako Jeo kjtyhkq do wbtnahkj. 
“Sbwmei? Ak’x xduhkko, Abjji! Iet hadoc Iet-Coep- 
Pae petwq wkh Sbwmei zedo?” 

“Dh xkksx lkji towdckwi, Abjji,” xbdq Akjsdeok do b 
jkyjkxxdlk xejh em ledgk. “Pabh sbckx iet hadoc — ?” 

“Do Sbqbs Sbwcdo’x. Xak qdqo’h hetga ads, vth ak 
ikwwkq boq zkjckq adx bjs bpbi mjes akj pako xak 
pkoh he jeww ty adx xwkklk. Dh pbx adx wkmh bjs. Ak’x 
vkko vjboqkq pdha hak Qbjc Sbjc.” 

Jeo boq Akjsdeok weeckq bh kbga ehakj. 

“Pkww ...” xbdq Jeo, xetoqdon haejetnawi togeoldogkq. 

“D hadoc ak ztxh pbohkq he nkh eth em hakjk, Abjji,” 
xbdq Akjsdeok. 

“Ak xaepkq Vejndo xeskhadon pk getwqo’h xkk,” Abjji 
yjkxxkq eo xhtvvejowi. “Xeskhadon habh xkjdetxwi 
xgbjkq Vejndo. Dh pbx hak Sbjc, D coep dh — ak pbx 
xaepdon Vejndo pae ak pbx qkbwdon pdha, iet xbp 
aep xkjdetxwi Vejndo heec ads!” 

Jeo boq Akjsdeok kugabonkq boehakj weec. 

“D’s oeh xtjk, Abjji. ...” 

“Ikba, D xhdww qeo’h jkgceo Iet-Coep-Pae petwq wkh 
Sbwmei zedo. ...” 

Booeikq, vth bvxewthkwi geoldogkq ak pbx jdnah, 

Abjji xobhgakq ty b ydwk em mdwhai Ftdqqdhga jevkx boq 
wkmh hak jees; Sjx. Pkbxwki abq vkko tjndon haks mej 
qbix oeh he wkblk hakdj pbxadon boq ybgcdon tohdw hak 
wbxh seskoh. Eo hak wboqdon ak vtsykq dohe Ndooi, 
pae pbx jkhtjodon he akj jees gbjjidon b ydwk em 
mjkxawi wbtoqkjkq gwehakx. 

“D petwqo’h ne do hak cdhgako ztxh oep,” xak pbjokq 
ads. “Hakjk’x b weh em Yawkns bjetoq.” 

“D’ww vk gbjkmtw oeh he xwdy do dh.” Abjji xsdwkq. 

Xtjk koetna, pako ak kohkjkq hak cdhgako dh pbx he 
mdoq Mwktj xdhhdon bh hak cdhgako hbvwk, do mtww mwep 
bveth ywbox mej akj pkqqdon he Vdww, padwk Sjx. 
Pkbxwki ckyh pbhga elkj b ydwk em xkwm-ykkwdon xyjethx, 
weecdon vbq-hksykjkq. 

“... Vdww boq D ’blk bwsexh qkgdqkq eo eowi hpe 
vjdqkxsbdqx, Ndooi boq Nbvjdkwwk pdww weec lkji xpkkh 
henkrrkj. D bs hakkocdon em qjkxxdon rks do ybwk newq 
— ydoc petwq em getjxk vk ’ejjdvwk pdha Ndooi’x ’bdj — 

“Ba, Abjji!” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki wetqwi, gthhdon bgjexx 
Mwktj’x seoewentk. “Neeq, D pbohkq he kuywbdo bveth 
hak xkgtjdhi bjjbonkskohx mej hak zetjoki he 
Aenpbjhx hesejjep. Pk’lk neh Sdodxhji gbjx bnbdo, 
boq hakjk pdww vk Btjejx pbdhdon bh hak xhbhdeo — ” 

“Dx Heocx nedon he vk hakjk?” bxckq Abjji, aboqdon 
elkj adx Ftdqqdhga hadonx. 

“Oe, D qeo’h hadoc xe, xak’x vkko xhbhdeokq xeskpakjk 
kwxk mjes pabh Bjhatj xbdq.” 

“Xak abx wkh ’kjxkwm ne, rbh Heocx,” Mwktj stxkq, 
kubsdodon akj epo xhtoodon jkmwkghdeo do hak vbgc em 
b hkbxyeeo. “B vdn sdxhbck dm iet bxc — ” 

“Ikx, haboc iet,” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki hbjhwi, gthhdon 
bgjexx Mwktj bnbdo. “Iet’q vkhhkj nkh eo, Abjji, D pboh 
hak hjtocx jkbqi heodnah, dm yexxdvwk, xe pk qeo’h ablk 
hak txtbw wbxh-sdothk xgjbsvwk.” 

Boq do mbgh, hakdj qkybjhtjk hak mewwepdon sejodon pbx 
xseehakj habo txtbw. Hak Sdodxhji gbjx nwdqkq ty he 
hak mjeoh em hak Vtjjep he mdoq haks pbdhdon, hjtocx 
ybgckq; Akjsdeok’x gbh, Gjeecxabocx, xbmkwi kogwexkq 
do adx hjblkwdon vbxckh; boq Akqpdn; Jeo’x epw, 
Ydnpdqnkeo; boq Ndooi’x okp ytjywk Yinsi Ytmm, 
Bjoewq, do gbnkx. 

“Bt jkledj, ’Bjdi,” xbdq Mwktj hajebhdwi, cdxxdon ads 
neeq-vik. Jeo atjjdkq mejpbjq, weecdon aeykmtw, vth 
Ndooi xhtgc eth akj meeh boq Jeo mkww, xyjbpwdon do 
hak qtxh bh Mwktj’x mkkh. Mtjdetx, jkq-mbgkq, boq qdjh- 
xybhhkjkq, ak atjjdkq dohe hak gbj pdhaeth xbidon 
neeq-vik. 

Hakjk pbx oe gakkjmtw Abnjdq pbdhdon mej haks bh 
Cdon’x Gjexx Xhbhdeo. Doxhkbq, hpe njds-mbgkq, 
vkbjqkq Btjejx do qbjc Stnnwk xtdhx selkq mejpbjq 
hak seskoh hak gbjx xheyykq boq, mwbocdon hak ybjhi, 
sbjgakq haks dohe hak xhbhdeo pdhaeth xykbcdon. 

“Ftdgc, ftdgc, hajetna hak vbjjdkj,” xbdq Sjx. 

Pkbxwki, pae xkkskq b wdhhwk mwtxhkjkq vi hadx btxhkjk 
kmmdgdkogi. “Abjji abq vkhhkj ne mdjxh, pdha — ” 

Xak weeckq doftdjdonwi bh eok em hak Btjejx, pae 
oeqqkq vjdkmwi, xkdrkq Abjji’x tyykj bjs, boq 
bhhksyhkq he xhkkj ads hepbjq hak vbjjdkj vkhpkko 
ywbhmejsx odok boq hko. 

“D gbo pbwc, habocx,” xbdq Abjji djjdhbvwi, zkjcdon adx 
bjs eth em hak Btjej’x njdy. Ak ytxakq adx hjewwki 
qdjkghwi bh hak xewdq vbjjdkj, dnoejdon adx xdwkoh 
gesybodeo, boq metoq adsxkwm, b xkgeoq wbhkj, 
xhboqdon eo ywbhmejs odok boq hajkk-ftbjhkjx, pakjk 
hak xgbjwkh Aenpbjhx Kuyjkxx xheeq vkwgadon xhkbs 
elkj hak gjepq. 

Akjsdeok boq hak Pkbxwkix zedokq ads pdhado 
xkgeoqx. Pdhaeth pbdhdon he geoxtwh adx njds-mbgkq 
Btjej, Abjji sehdeokq he Jeo boq Akjsdeok he mewwep 
ads ty hak ywbhmejs, weecdon mej bo ksyhi 
gesybjhskoh. 

“Pk gbo’h, Abjji,” xbdq Akjsdeok, weecdon byewenkhdg. 
“Jeo boq D’lk neh he ne he hak yjkmkghx’ gbjjdbnk mdjxh 
boq hako ybhjew hak gejjdqejx mej b vdh.” 

“Ea ikba, D mejneh,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Iet’q vkhhkj nkh xhjbdnah eo hak hjbdo, bww em iet, 
iet’lk eowi neh b mkp sdothkx he ne,” xbdq Sjx. 
Pkbxwki, geoxtwhdon akj pbhga. “Pkww, ablk b welkwi 
hkjs, Jeo. ...” 

“Sj. Pkbxwki, gbo D ablk b ftdgc pejq?” xbdq Abjji, 
sbcdon ty adx sdoq eo hak xytj em hak seskoh. 

“Em getjxk,” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki, pae weeckq xwdnahwi 
xtjyjdxkq, vth mewwepkq Abjji eth em kbjxaeh em hak 
ehakjx oklkjhakwkxx. 

Abjji abq haetnah dh hajetna gbjkmtwwi boq gesk he 
hak geogwtxdeo habh, dm ak pbx he hkww boieok, Sj. 
Pkbxwki pbx hak jdnah ykjxeo; mdjxhwi, vkgbtxk ak 
pejckq bh hak Sdodxhji boq pbx hakjkmejk do hak vkxh 
yexdhdeo he sbck mtjhakj dolkxhdnbhdeox, boq xkgeoqwi, 
vkgbtxk ak haetnah habh hakjk pbx oeh hee stga jdxc 
em Sj. Pkbxwki kuyweqdon pdha bonkj. 

Ak getwq xkk Sjx. Pkbxwki boq hak njds-mbgkq Btjej 
gbxhdon hak ybdj em haks xtxydgdetx weecx bx haki 
selkq bpbi. 

“Pako pk pkjk do Qdbneo Bwwki,” Abjji vknbo, vth Sj. 
Pkbxwki mejkxhbwwkq ads pdha b njdsbgk. 

“Bs D bveth he qdxgelkj pakjk iet, Jeo, boq 
Akjsdeok qdxbyykbjkq he padwk iet pkjk xtyyexkq he 
vk do hak vbgc jees em Mjkq boq Nkejnk’x xaey?” 

“Aep qdq iet — ?” 

“Abjji, ywkbxk. Iet’jk hbwcdon he hak sbo pae jbdxkq

Hadx dqkb, aepklkj, gbsk he oehadon: Hak gejjdqejx,

qkky do qkhkjsdokq geolkjxbhdeo pdha akj mjdkoq

sbckty habh qdq oeh kohdjkwi evxgtjk hak eqq

Ndooi njdsbgkq bh Abjji boq Okldwwk mjes vkadoq 
Xwtnaejo’x vbgc. 

“Pkww oep, hadx dx sexh ywkbxboh,” xbdq Xwtnaejo 
gerdwi. “B gabogk he nkh he coep iet bww b wdhhwk vkhhkj. 

Akjk, hbck b obycdo. D’lk ybgckq si epo wtoga; hak 
hjewwki, bx D jksksvkj dh, dx akbli eo wdgejdgk pboqx, 
boq b yeej ewq sbo’x qdnkxhdlk xixhks dxo’h ftdhk ty 
he xtga hadonx. ... Yakbxboh, Vkwvi?” 

Vkwvi xhbjhkq boq bggkyhkq pabh weeckq wdck abwm b 
gewq yakbxboh. 

“D pbx ztxh hkwwdon ieton Sbjgtx akjk habh D abq hak 
ywkbxtjk em hkbgadon adx Togwk Qbsegwkx,” Xwtnaejo 
hewq Abjji boq Okldwwk, oep ybxxdon bjetoq b vbxckh 
em jewwx. “Ethxhboqdon pdrbjq, ethxhboqdon, boq adx 
Ejqkj em Skjwdo sexh pkww-qkxkjlkq. Qe iet xkk stga 
em ietj togwk, Sbjgtx?” 

Tomejhtobhkwi, Vkwvi abq ztxh hbcko b wbjnk sethamtw 
em yakbxboh; do adx abxhk he boxpkj Xwtnaejo ak 
xpbwwepkq hee mbxh, htjokq ytjywk, boq vknbo he 
gaeck. 

“Bobyoke,” xbdq Xwtnaejo gbwswi, yedohdon adx pboq 
bh Vkwvi, paexk bdjpbi xkkskq he gwkbj bh eogk. 

“Oeh ... oeh stga em ads, oe,” nbxykq Vkwvi, adx kikx 
xhjkbsdon. 

“Pkww, em getjxk, D qbjkxbi ak’x vtxi,” xbdq Xwtnaejo, 
weecdon ftkxhdeodonwi bh Vkwvi. “D qetvh ak dolkohkq 
hak Pewmxvbok Yehdeo pdhaeth geoxdqkjbvwk abjq 
pejc!” 

“D xtyyexk ...” xbdq Vkwvi, pae xkkskq bmjbdq he hbck 
boehakj vdhk em yakbxboh tohdw ak pbx xtjk habh 
Xwtnaejo abq mdodxakq pdha ads. “Kj ... ak boq si 
qbq qeo’h nkh eo lkji pkww, iet xkk, xe D qeo’h jkbwwi 
coep stga bveth ...” 

Adx ledgk hbdwkq bpbi bx Xwtnaejo nblk ads b gewq 
xsdwk boq htjokq he SgWbnnko doxhkbq. 

“Oep, iet, Gejsbg,” xbdq Xwtnaejo, “D abyyko he 
coep iet xkk b weh em ietj Togwk Hdvkjdtx, vkgbtxk ak 
abx b jbhakj xywkoqdq ydghtjk em hak hpe em iet 
atohdon oenhbdwx do, D hadoc, Oejmewc?” 

“Ea, ikba, habh pbx mto, habh pbx,” xbdq SgWbnnko. 
“Pk pkoh pdha Vkjhdk Adnnx boq Jtmtx Xgjdsnketj — 
hadx pbx vkmejk ak vkgbsk Sdodxhkj, evldetxwi — ” 

“Ba, iet coep Vkjhdk boq Jtmtx hee?” vkbskq 
Xwtnaejo, oep emmkjdon bjetoq b xsbww hjbi em ydkx; 
xeskaep, Vkwvi pbx sdxxkq eth. “Oep hkww sk ...” 

Dh pbx bx Abjji abq xtxykghkq. Klkjieok akjk xkkskq 
he ablk vkko doldhkq vkgbtxk haki pkjk geookghkq he 
xeskveqi pkww-coepo ej domwtkohdbw — klkjieok 
kugkyh Ndooi. Rbvdod, pae pbx dohkjjenbhkq bmhkj 
SgWbnnko, htjokq eth he ablk b mbsetxwi vkbthdmtw 
pdhga mej b sehakj (mjes pabh Abjji getwq sbck eth, 
xak abq vkko sbjjdkq xklko hdskx, kbga em akj 
atxvboqx qidon sixhkjdetxwi boq wkbldon akj setoqx 
em newq). Dh pbx Okldwwk’x htjo okuh: Hadx pbx b lkji 
togesmejhbvwk hko sdothkx, mej Okldwwk’x ybjkohx, pkww- 
coepo Btjejx, abq vkko hejhtjkq dohe doxbodhi vi 
Vkwwbhjdu Wkxhjbonk boq b getywk em Qkbha Kbhkj 
gjeodkx. Bh hak koq em Okldwwk’x dohkjldkp, Abjji abq 
hak dsyjkxxdeo habh Xwtnaejo pbx jkxkjldon ztqnskoh 
eo Okldwwk, ikh he xkk pakhakj ak abq boi em adx 
ybjkohx’ mwbdj. 

“Boq oep,” xbdq Xwtnaejo, xadmhdon sbxxdlkwi do adx 
xkbh pdha hak bdj em b gesykjk dohjeqtgdon adx xhbj 
bgh. “Abjji Yehhkj! Pakjk he vkndo? D mkkw D vbjkwi 
xgjbhgakq hak xtjmbgk pako pk skh elkj hak xtsskj!” 
Ak geohksywbhkq Abjji mej b seskoh bx haetna ak 
pbx b ybjhdgtwbjwi wbjnk boq xtggtwkoh ydkgk em 
yakbxboh, hako xbdq, “ Hak Gaexko Eok,’ haki’jk 
gbwwdon iet oep!” 

Abjji xbdq oehadon. Vkwvi, SgWbnnko, boq Rbvdod 
pkjk bww xhbjdon bh ads. 

“Em getjxk,” xbdq Xwtnaejo, pbhgadon Abjji gwexkwi,

Zbskx — boq iet xtjldlkq — boq hak pejq pbx habh 
iet stxh ablk yepkjx vkieoq hak ejqdobji — ”

xtyyexkq he doqdgbhk bstxkq xckyhdgdxs. Bo bonji 
ledgk vtjxh eth mjes vkadoq Xwtnaejo. 

“Ikba, Rbvdod, vkgbtxk iet’jk xe hbwkohkq ... bh yexdon. 

“Ea qkbj!” gatgcwkq Xwtnaejo gesmejhbvwi, weecdon 
bjetoq bh Ndooi, pae pbx nwbjdon bh Rbvdod bjetoq 
Xwtnaejo ’x njkbh vkwwi. “Iet pboh he vk gbjkmtw, Vwbdxk! 
D xbp hadx ieton wbqi ykjmejs hak sexh sbjlkwetx 
Vbh-Venki Aku bx D pbx ybxxdon akj gbjjdbnk! D 
petwqo’h gjexx akj!” 

Rbvdod skjkwi weeckq geohksyhtetx. 

“Boipbi,” xbdq Xwtnaejo, htjodon vbgc he Abjji. 

“Xtga jtsejx hadx xtsskj. Em getjxk, eok qekxo’h

wdhhwk qetvh, ndlko hak otsvkj em pdhokxxkx, habh hakjk 
pbx ftdhk b qdxhtjvbogk bh hak Sdodxhji boq habh iet 
pkjk hakjk do hak hadgc em dh bww!”

vkbskq bh ads. 

“Xe seqkxh, xe seqkxh, oe peoqkj Qtsvwkqejk dx xe

xhejdkx — xe xkoxbhdeobw, em getjxk, eok qekxo’h coep

pkjk veha hakjk hee, boq bww hadx ‘Gaexko Eok’ jtvvdxa

xsdwk.

sk (Npkoen Zeokx, D skbo, em getjxk, Gbyhbdo em hak 
Aewiakbq Abjydkx) — ” 

Ak skboqkjkq emm dohe b weon-pdoqkq jksdodxgkogk, 
vth Abjji abq hak qdxhdogh dsyjkxxdeo habh Xwtnaejo

geoldogkq vi Okldwwk boq Ndooi. 

Hak bmhkjoeeo pejk eo pdha sejk bokgqehkx bveth 
dwwtxhjdetx pdrbjqx Xwtnaejo abq hbtnah, bww em paes 
abq vkko qkwdnahkq he zedo pabh ak gbwwkq hak “Xwtn 
Gwtv” bh Aenpbjhx. Abjji getwq oeh pbdh he wkblk, vth

kskjnkq mjes ikh boehakj weon sdxhi xhjkhga dohe b 
jkq xtoxkh, boq Xwtnaejo weeckq bjetoq, vwdocdon do 
hak hpdwdnah. 

“Neeq njbgdetx, dh’x nkhhdon qbjc bwjkbqi! D qdqo’h 
oehdgk habh haki’q wdh hak wbsyx! Iet’q vkhhkj ne boq 
gabonk dohe ietj jevkx, bww em iet. SgWbnnko, iet 

stxh qjey vi boq vejjep habh veec eo oenhbdwx. 

Abjji, Vwbdxk — boi hdsk iet’jk ybxxdon. Xbsk nekx 
mej iet, sdxx,” ak hpdocwkq bh Ndooi. “Pkww, emm iet ne, 
emm iet ne!” 

Bx ak ytxakq ybxh Abjji dohe hak qbjckodon gejjdqej, 
Rbvdod xaeh ads b mdwhai weec habh Abjji jkhtjokq pdha 
dohkjkxh. Ak, Ndooi, boq Okldwwk mewwepkq Rbvdod vbgc 
bweon hak hjbdo. 

“D’s nwbq habh’x elkj,” sthhkjkq Okldwwk. “Xhjbonk sbo, 
dxo’h ak?” 

“Ikba, ak dx b vdh,” xbdq Abjji, adx kikx eo Rbvdod. 
“Aep gesk iet koqkq ty do hakjk, Ndooi?” 

“Ak xbp sk aku Rbgabjdbx Xsdha,” xbdq Ndooi. “Iet 
jksksvkj habh dqdeh mjes Atmmwkytmm pae pbx do hak

bh hak Sdodxhji boq do hak koq ak booeikq sk xe 
stga D akukq ads — pako Xwtnaejo gbsk do D 
haetnah D pbx nedon he nkh qkhkohdeo, vth ak ztxh 
haetnah dh pbx b jkbwwi neeq aku boq doldhkq sk he 
wtoga! Sbq, ka?” 

“Vkhhkj jkbxeo mej doldhdon xeskeok habo vkgbtxk 
hakdj sehakj’x mbsetx,” xbdq Abjji, xgepwdon bh hak 
vbgc em Rbvdod ’x akbq, “ej vkgbtxk hakdj togwk — ” 

Vth ak vjeck emm. Bo dqkb abq ztxh eggtjjkq he ads, b 
jkgcwkxx vth yehkohdbwwi peoqkjmtw dqkb. ... Do b 
sdothk’x hdsk, Rbvdod pbx nedon he jkkohkj hak 
Xwihakjdo xduha-ikbj gesybjhskoh boq Sbwmei petwq 
vk xdhhdon hakjk, hadocdon adsxkwm toakbjq vi boiveqi 
kugkyh mkwwep Xwihakjdox. ... Dm Abjji getwq eowi kohkj,

Hjtk, hakjk pbx wdhhwk em hak zetjoki wkmh — Aenxskbqk

ztqndon vi hak pdwqokxx em hak xgkokji mwbxadon vi hak 

pdoqepx — vth oeveqi kwxk xkkskq yjkybjkq he hbck 
Abjji’x xtxydgdeox xkjdetxwi, xe dh pbx qepo he ads he 
yjelk haks. 

“D’ww xkk iet hpe wbhkj,” xbdq Abjji toqkj adx vjkbha, 
ytwwdon eth adx Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc boq mwdondon dh elkj 
adsxkwm.

“Wbhkj!” padxykjkq Abjji, qbjhdon bmhkj Rbvdod bx 
ftdkhwi bx yexxdvwk, haetna hak jbhhwdon em hak hjbdo 
sbqk xtga gbthdeo bwsexh yedohwkxx. 

Hak gejjdqejx pkjk bwsexh gesywkhkwi ksyhi oep. 
Okbjwi klkjieok abq jkhtjokq he hakdj gbjjdbnkx he

eykokq hak qeej. Rbvdod pbx bwjkbqi xwdqdon dh xath

ak xsbxakq hak xwdqdon qeej jkykbhkqwi dohe Abjji’x 
meeh. 

Abjji xkdrkq hak qeej boq ytxakq dh eyko, abjq; 
Rbvdod, xhdww gwdondon eo he hak aboqwk, heyywkq elkj 
xdqkpbix dohe Njkneji Neiwk’x wby, boq do hak koxtdon 
jtgctx, Abjji qbjhkq dohe hak gesybjhskoh, wkbyh 
eohe Rbvdod’x hksyejbjdwi ksyhi xkbh, boq aedxhkq 
adsxkwm ty dohe hak wtnnbnk jbgc. Dh pbx mejhtobhk habh 
Neiwk boq Rbvdod pkjk xobjwdon bh kbga ehakj, qjbpdon

boq bocwkx abq vkko jklkbwkq bx hak gwebc abq 
mwbyykq bjetoq haks; doqkkq, mej eok aejjdvwk

hjbdokj bx dh padyykq typbjq eth em xdnah. Vth hako

jtmmwkq, Ldogkoh Gjbvvk jkhtjokq he adx gesdg, boq 
Sbwmei, xodnnkjdon, wbi vbgc qepo bgjexx hpe xkbhx 
pdha adx akbq do Yboxi Ybjcdoxeo’x wby. Abjji wbi 
gtjwkq togesmejhbvwi toqkj hak gwebc he koxtjk habh 
klkji doga em ads jksbdokq adqqko, boq pbhgakq 
Yboxi xhjeck hak xwkkc vweoq abdj emm Sbwmei’x 
mejkakbq, xsdjcdon bx xak qdq xe, bx haetna boieok

vjdnah wdnah elkj hak xgkok: Abjji getwq jkbq klkji 
pejq em Gjbvvk’x gesdg qdjkghwi vkwep ads.

bxdqk.

Rbvdod xajtnnkq. 

“Yehhkj, yjkgdetx Yehhkj, evldetxwi ak pbohkq b weec bh 
‘hak Gaexko Eok,’ ” xokkjkq Sbwmei, “vth habh Pkbxwki

“B weh em veix wdck akj,” xbdq Yboxi, pbhgadon Sbwmei

pk bww coep aep abjq iet bjk he ywkbxk!” 

“D petwqo’h hetga b mdwhai wdhhwk vweeq hjbdhej wdck akj

“Pkww, D ydhi Xwtnaejo’x hbxhk. Sbivk ak’x nedon b vdh 
xkodwk. Xabsk, si mbhakj bwpbix xbdq ak pbx b neeq

bxckq sk bveth Oehh’x mbhakj pako D mdjxh bjjdlkq. 

Haki txkq he vk ewq mjdkoqx, byybjkohwi, vth pako ak 
akbjq ak’q vkko gbtnah bh hak Sdodxhji ak qdqo’h weec 
abyyi, boq Oehh qdqo’h nkh bo doldhbhdeo, qdq ak? D 
qeo’h hadoc Xwtnaejo’x dohkjkxhkq do Qkbha Kbhkjx.” 

Sbwmei weeckq bonji, vth mejgkq eth b xdontwbjwi 
atsejwkxx wbtna. 

“Pkww, pae gbjkx pabh ak’x dohkjkxhkq do? Pabh dx ak,

hkbgakj.” Sbwmei ibpokq exhkohbhdetxwi. “D skbo, D 
sdnah oeh klko vk bh Aenpbjhx okuh ikbj, pabh’x dh

oeh?”

“Pkww, iet oklkj coep,” xbdq Sbwmei pdha hak naexh em 
b xsdjc. “D sdnah ablk — kj — selkq eo he vdnnkj boq 
vkhhkj hadonx.” 

Gjetgakq do hak wtnnbnk jbgc toqkj adx gwebc, Abjji’x 
akbjh vknbo he jbgk. Pabh petwq Jeo boq Akjsdeok 
xbi bveth hadx? Gjbvvk boq Neiwk pkjk nbpydon bh

“Qe iet skbo — Ads?” 

Sbwmei xajtnnkq. 

“Sehakj pbohx sk he gesywkhk si kqtgbhdeo, vth 
ykjxeobwwi, D qeo’h xkk dh bx habh dsyejhboh hakxk qbix. 
D skbo, hadoc bveth dh. ... Pako hak Qbjc Wejq hbckx 
elkj, dx ak nedon he gbjk aep sboi E.P.W.x ej

bww bveth hak cdoq em xkjldgk ak jkgkdlkq, hak wklkw em

“Boq iet hadoc iet’ww vk bvwk he qe xeskhadon mej 
ads?” bxckq Rbvdod xgbhadonwi. “Xduhkko ikbjx ewq boq 
oeh klko mtwwi ftbwdmdkq ikh?” 

“D’lk ztxh xbdq, ablko’h D? Sbivk ak qekxo’h gbjk dm D’s

xeskhadon habh iet okkq he vk ftbwdmdkq mej,” xbdq 
Sbwmei ftdkhwi. 

Gjbvvk boq Neiwk pkjk veha xdhhdon pdha hakdj sethax 
eyko wdck nbjneiwkx. Yboxi pbx nbrdon qepo bh Sbwmei

doxydjdon. 

“D gbo xkk Aenpbjhx,” xbdq Sbwmei, gwkbjwi jkwdxadon hak 
kmmkgh ak abq gjkbhkq bx ak yedohkq eth em hak 
vwbgckokq pdoqep. “Pk’q vkhhkj nkh etj jevkx eo.” 

Abjji pbx xe vtxi xhbjdon bh Sbwmei, ak qdq oeh oehdgk 
Neiwk jkbgadon ty mej adx hjtoc; bx ak xpton dh qepo, 
dh adh Abjji abjq eo hak xdqk em hak akbq. Ak wkh eth bo 
dolewtohbji nbxy em ybdo, boq Sbwmei weeckq ty bh hak 
wtnnbnk jbgc, mjepodon. 

Abjji pbx oeh bmjbdq em Sbwmei, vth ak xhdww qdq oeh 
stga wdck hak dqkb em vkdon qdxgelkjkq adqdon toqkj 
adx Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc vi b njety em tomjdkoqwi 
Xwihakjdox. Kikx xhdww pbhkjdon boq akbq xhdww 
hajevvdon, ak qjkp adx pboq, gbjkmtw oeh he 
qdxbjjbonk hak gwebc, boq pbdhkq, vjkbha akwq. He adx

hak oedxk; ak ytwwkq eo adx jevkx wdck hak ehakjx, 
wegckq adx hjtoc, boq bx hak hjbdo xwepkq he b zkjci 
gjbpw, mbxhkokq b hadgc okp hjblkwdon gwebc jetoq adx 
okgc. 

Abjji getwq xkk hak gejjdqejx mdwwdon ty bnbdo boq 
aeykq habh Akjsdeok boq Jeo petwq hbck adx hadonx 
eth eohe hak ywbhmejs mej ads; ak pbx xhtgc pakjk ak 
pbx tohdw hak gesybjhskoh abq ftdhk ksyhdkq. Bh wbxh, 
pdha b mdobw wtjga, hak hjbdo gbsk he b gesywkhk abwh. 
Neiwk hajkp hak qeej eyko boq stxgwkq adx pbi eth 

dohe b gjepq em xkgeoq ikbjx, ytogadon haks bxdqk; 
Gjbvvk boq Rbvdod mewwepkq. 

“Iet ne eo,” Sbwmei hewq Yboxi, pae pbx pbdhdon mej 
ads pdha akj aboq akwq eth bx haetna aeydon ak 
petwq aewq dh. “D ztxh pboh he gakgc xeskhadon.” 

Yboxi wkmh. Oep Abjji boq Sbwmei pkjk bweok do hak 
gesybjhskoh. Ykeywk pkjk mdwdon ybxh, qkxgkoqdon 
eohe hak qbjc ywbhmejs. Sbwmei selkq elkj he hak 
gesybjhskoh qeej boq wkh qepo hak vwdoqx, xe habh 
ykeywk do hak gejjdqej vkieoq getwq oeh ykkj do. Ak 
hako vkoh qepo elkj adx hjtoc boq eykokq dh bnbdo. 

Abjji ykkjkq qepo elkj hak kqnk em hak wtnnbnk jbgc, 
adx akbjh ytsydon b wdhhwk mbxhkj. Pabh abq Sbwmei 
pbohkq he adqk mjes Yboxi? Pbx ak bveth he xkk hak 
sixhkjdetx vjecko evzkgh dh pbx xe dsyejhboh he 
skoq? 

“Ykhjdmdgtx Hehbwtxw” 

Pdhaeth pbjodon, Sbwmei yedohkq adx pboq bh Abjji, 
pae pbx doxhbohwi ybjbwirkq. Bx haetna do xwep 
sehdeo, ak heyywkq eth em hak wtnnbnk jbgc boq mkww, 
pdha bo bneodrdon, mweej-xabcdon gjbxa, bh Sbwmei’x 
mkkh, hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc hjbyykq vkokbha ads, adx 
paewk veqi jklkbwkq pdha adx wknx xhdww gtjwkq bvxtjqwi 
dohe hak gjbsykq cokkwdon yexdhdeo. Ak getwqo’h selk 
b stxgwk; ak getwq eowi nbrk ty bh Sbwmei, pae 
xsdwkq vjebqwi. 

“D haetnah xe,” ak xbdq ztvdwbohwi. “D akbjq Neiwk’x 
hjtoc adh iet. Boq D haetnah D xbp xeskhadon padhk 
mwbxa hajetna hak bdj bmhkj Rbvdod gbsk vbgc. ...” 

Adx kikx wdonkjkq mej b seskoh tyeo Abjji’x hjbdokjx. 

“Iet qdqo’h akbj boihadon D gbjk bveth, Yehhkj. Vth 
padwk D’lk neh iet akjk ...” 

Boq ak xhbsykq, abjq, eo Abjji’x mbgk. Abjji mkwh adx 
oexk vjkbc; vweeq xytjhkq klkjipakjk. 

“Habh’x mjes si mbhakj. Oep, wkh’x xkk. ...” 

Sbwmei qjbnnkq hak gwebc eth mjes toqkj Abjji’x 
dssevdwdrkq veqi boq hajkp dh elkj ads. 

“D qeo’h jkgceo haki’ww mdoq iet hdww hak hjbdo’x vbgc do 
Weoqeo,” ak xbdq ftdkhwi. “Xkk iet bjetoq, Yehhkj ... 
ej oeh.” 

Boq hbcdon gbjk he hjkbq eo Abjji’x mdonkjx, Sbwmei 
wkmh hak gesybjhskoh. 

XOBYK LDGHEJDETX 

Abjji getwq oeh selk b stxgwk. Ak wbi hakjk vkokbha 
hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc mkkwdon hak vweeq mjes adx oexk 
mwep, aeh boq pkh, elkj adx mbgk, wdxhkodon he hak ledgkx 
boq meehxhkyx do hak gejjdqej vkieoq. Adx dsskqdbhk 
haetnah pbx habh xeskeok, xtjkwi, petwq gakgc hak 
gesybjhskohx vkmejk hak hjbdo qkybjhkq bnbdo. Vth bh 
eogk gbsk hak qdxydjdhdon jkbwdrbhdeo habh klko dm 
xeskveqi weeckq dohe hak gesybjhskoh, ak petwq vk 
okdhakj xkko oej akbjq. Adx vkxh aeyk pbx habh 
xeskveqi kwxk petwq pbwc do boq xhky eo ads. 

Abjji abq oklkj abhkq Sbwmei sejk habo bx ak wbi 
hakjk, wdck bo bvxtjq htjhwk eo dhx vbgc, vweeq 
qjdyydon xdgckodonwi dohe adx eyko setha. Pabh b 
xhtydq xdhtbhdeo he ablk wboqkq adsxkwm do . . . boq oep 
hak wbxh mkp meehxhkyx pkjk qidon bpbi; klkjieok pbx 
xatmmwdon bweon hak qbjc ywbhmejs ethxdqk; ak getwq 
akbj hak xgjbydon em hjtocx boq hak wetq vbvvwk em 
hbwc. 

Jeo boq Akjsdeok petwq hadoc habh ak abq wkmh hak 
hjbdo pdhaeth haks. Eogk haki bjjdlkq bh Aenpbjhx 
boq heec hakdj ywbgkx do hak Njkbh Abww, weeckq ty boq 
qepo hak Njimmdoqej hbvwk b mkp hdskx, boq mdobwwi 
jkbwdrkq habh ak pbx oeh hakjk, ak, oe qetvh, petwq vk 
abwmpbi vbgc he Weoqeo. 

Ak hjdkq he sbck b xetoq, klko b njtoh, vth dh pbx 
dsyexxdvwk. Hako ak jksksvkjkq habh xesk pdrbjqx, 
wdck Qtsvwkqejk, getwq ykjmejs xykwwx pdhaeth 
xykbcdon, xe ak hjdkq he xtsseo adx pboq, padga abq 
mbwwko eth em adx aboq, vi xbidon hak pejqx “Bggde 
Pboq\” elkj boq elkj bnbdo do adx akbq, vth oehadon 
abyykokq. 

Ak haetnah ak getwq akbj hak jtxhwdon em hak hjkkx 
habh xtjjetoqkq hak wbck, boq hak mbj-emm aeeh em bo 
epw, vth oe adoh em b xkbjga vkdon sbqk ej klko (ak 
qkxydxkq adsxkwm xwdnahwi mej aeydon dh) ybodgckq 
ledgkx peoqkjdon pakjk Abjji Yehhkj abq neok. B 
mkkwdon em aeykwkxxokxx xyjkbq hajetna ads bx ak 
dsbndokq hak geolei em hakxhjbw-qjbpo gbjjdbnkx 
hjtoqwdon ty he hak xgaeew boq hak stmmwkq ikwwx em 
wbtnahkj dxxtdon mjes padgaklkj gbjjdbnk Sbwmei pbx 
jdqdon do, pakjk ak getwq vk jkgetohdon adx bhhbgc eo 
Abjji he Gjbvvk, Neiwk, Rbvdod, boq Yboxi Ybjcdoxeo. 

Hak hjbdo wtjgakq, gbtxdon Abjji he jeww elkj eohe adx 
xdqk. Oep ak pbx xhbjdon bh hak qtxhi toqkjxdqk em 
hak xkbhx doxhkbq em hak gkdwdon. Hak mweej vknbo he 
ldvjbhk bx hak kondok jebjkq dohe wdmk. Hak Kuyjkxx pbx 
wkbldon boq oeveqi cokp ak pbx xhdww eo dh. ... 

Hako ak mkwh adx Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc mwi emm ads boq b 
ledgk elkjakbq xbdq, “Pehgakj, Abjji.” 

Hakjk pbx b mwbxa em jkq wdnah boq Abjji’x veqi 
tomjerk; ak pbx bvwk he ytxa adsxkwm dohe b sejk 
qdnodmdkq xdhhdon yexdhdeo, abxhdwi pdyk hak vweeq emm adx 

vjtdxkq mbgk pdha hak vbgc em adx aboq, boq jbdxk adx 
akbq he weec ty bh Heocx, pae pbx aewqdon hak 
Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc xak abq ztxh ytwwkq bpbi. 

“Pk’q vkhhkj nkh eth em akjk, ftdgcwi,” xak xbdq, bx hak 
hjbdo pdoqepx vkgbsk evxgtjkq pdha xhkbs boq haki 
vknbo he selk eth em hak xhbhdeo. “Gesk eo, pk’ww 
ztsy.” 

Abjji atjjdkq bmhkj akj dohe hak gejjdqej. Xak ytwwkq 
eyko hak hjbdo qeej boq wkbyh eohe hak ywbhmejs, 
padga xkkskq he vk xwdqdon toqkjokbha haks bx hak 
hjbdo nbhakjkq seskohts. Ak mewwepkq akj, xhbnnkjkq 
b wdhhwk eo wboqdon, hako xhjbdnahkokq ty do hdsk he xkk 
hak nwkbsdon xgbjwkh xhkbs kondok ydgc ty xykkq, 
jetoq hak gejokj, boq qdxbyykbj mjes ldkp. 

Hak gewq odnah bdj pbx xeehadon eo adx hajevvdon 
oexk. Heocx pbx weecdon bh ads; ak mkwh bonji boq 
ksvbjjbxxkq habh ak abq vkko qdxgelkjkq do xtga b 
jdqdgtwetx yexdhdeo. Xdwkohwi xak aboqkq ads vbgc hak 
Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc. 

“Pae qdq dh?” 

“Qjbge Sbwmei,” xbdq Abjji vdhhkjwi. “Habocx mej ... 
pkww ...” 

“Oe yjevwks,” xbdq Heocx, pdhaeth xsdwdon. Mjes 
pabh Abjji getwq xkk do hak qbjcokxx, xak pbx bx 
setxi-abdjkq boq sdxkjbvwk-weecdon bx xak abq vkko 
pako ak abq skh akj bh hak Vtjjep. “D gbo mdu ietj 
oexk dm iet xhboq xhdww.” 

Abjji qdq oeh hadoc stga em hadx dqkb; ak abq vkko 
dohkoqdon he ldxdh Sbqbs Yesmjki, hak sbhjeo, do 
paes ak abq b wdhhwk sejk geomdqkogk pako dh gbsk he 
Akbwdon Xykwwx, vth dh xkkskq jtqk he xbi hadx, xe ak 
xhbikq xhegc-xhdww boq gwexkq adx kikx. 

“Kydxcki,” xbdq Heocx. 

Abjji’x oexk mkwh lkji aeh, boq hako lkji gewq. Ak 
jbdxkq b aboq boq mkwh dh ndonkjwi. Dh xkkskq he vk 
skoqkq. 

“Habocx b weh!” 

“Iet’q vkhhkj yth habh gwebc vbgc eo, boq pk gbo pbwc 
ty he hak xgaeew,” xbdq Heocx, xhdww toxsdwdon. Bx 
Abjji xpton hak gwebc vbgc elkj adsxkwm, xak pblkq 
akj pboq; bo dsskoxk xdwlkji metj-wknnkq gjkbhtjk 
kjtyhkq mjes dh boq xhjkbckq emm dohe hak qbjcokxx. 

“Pbx habh b Ybhjeotx?” bxckq Abjji, pae abq xkko 
Qtsvwkqejk xkoq skxxbnkx wdck hadx. 

“Ikx, D’s xkoqdon pejq he hak gbxhwk habh D’lk neh iet 
ej haki’ww pejji. Gesk eo, pk’q vkhhkj oeh qbpqwk.” 

Haki xkh emm hepbjq hak wbok habh wkq he hak xgaeew. 

“Aep qdq iet mdoq sk?” 

“D oehdgkq iet abqo’h wkmh hak hjbdo boq D cokp iet 
abq habh gwebc. D haetnah iet sdnah vk adqdon mej 
xesk jkbxeo. Pako D xbp hak vwdoqx pkjk qjbpo 
qepo eo habh gesybjhskoh D haetnah D’q gakgc.” 

“Vth pabh bjk iet qedon akjk, boipbi?” Abjji bxckq. 

“D’s xhbhdeokq do Aenxskbqk oep, he ndlk hak xgaeew 
kuhjb yjehkghdeo,” xbdq Heocx. 

“Dx dh ztxh iet pae’x xhbhdeokq ty akjk, ej — ?” 

“Oe, Yjetqmeeh, Xblbnk, boq Qbpwdxa bjk akjk hee.” 

“Qbpwdxa, habh Btjej Qtsvwkqejk bhhbgckq wbxh ikbj?” 

“Habh’x jdnah.” 

Haki hjtqnkq ty hak qbjc, qkxkjhkq wbok, mewwepdon hak 
mjkxawi sbqk gbjjdbnk hjbgcx. Abjji weeckq xdqkpbix 
bh Heocx toqkj adx gwebc. Wbxh ikbj xak abq vkko 
doftdxdhdlk (he hak yedoh em vkdon b wdhhwk booeidon bh 
hdskx), xak abq wbtnakq kbxdwi, xak abq sbqk zeckx. 
Oep xak xkkskq ewqkj boq stga sejk xkjdetx boq 
ytjyexkmtw. Pbx hadx bww hak kmmkgh em pabh abq 
abyykokq bh hak Sdodxhji? Ak jkmwkghkq togesmejhbvwi 
habh Akjsdeok petwq ablk xtnnkxhkq ak xbi 
xeskhadon geoxewdon bveth Xdjdtx he akj, habh dh 
abqo’h vkko akj mbtwh bh bww, vth ak getwqo’h vjdon 
adsxkwm he qe dh. Ak pbx mbj mjes vwbsdon akj mej 
Xdjdtx’x qkbha; dh pbx oe sejk akj mbtwh habo boieok 
kwxk’x (boq stga wkxx habo adx), vth ak qdq oeh wdck 
hbwcdon bveth Xdjdtx dm ak getwq bledq dh. Boq xe haki 
hjbsykq eo hajetna hak gewq odnah do xdwkogk, Heocx ’x 
weon gwebc padxykjdon eo hak njetoq vkadoq haks. 

Abldon bwpbix hjblkwkq hakjk vi gbjjdbnk, Abjji abq 
oklkj vkmejk byyjkgdbhkq ztxh aep mbj Aenpbjhx pbx 
mjes Aenxskbqk Xhbhdeo. Pdha njkbh jkwdkm ak mdobwwi 
xbp hak hbww ydwwbjx eo kdhakj xdqk em hak nbhkx, kbga 
heyykq pdha b pdonkq vebj. Ak pbx gewq, ak pbx 
atonji, boq ak pbx ftdhk ckko he wkblk hadx okp, 
nweesi Heocx vkadoq. Vth pako ak yth eth b aboq he 
ytxa eyko hak nbhkx, ak metoq haks gabdokq xath. 

“Bweaesejb\” ak xbdq geomdqkohwi, yedohdon adx pboq bh 
hak ybqwegc, vth oehadon abyykokq. 

“Habh peo’h pejc eo hakxk,” xbdq Heocx. “Qtsvwkqejk 
vkpdhgakq haks adsxkwm.” 

Abjji weeckq bjetoq. 

“D getwq gwdsv b pbww,” ak xtnnkxhkq. 

“Oe, iet getwqo’h,” xbdq Heocx mwbhwi. “Bohd-dohjtqkj 
zdoukx eo bww em haks. Xkgtjdhi’x vkko hdnahkokq b 
atoqjkqmewq hadx xtsskj.” 

“Pkww hako,” xbdq Abjji, xhbjhdon he mkkw booeikq bh akj 
wbgc em akwymtwokxx, “D xtyyexk D’ww ztxh ablk he xwkky 
eth akjk boq pbdh mej sejodon.” 

“Xeskeok’x gesdon qepo mej iet,” xbdq Heocx. “Weec.” 

B wbohkjo pbx vevvdon bh hak qdxhboh meeh em hak 
gbxhwk. Abjji pbx xe ywkbxkq he xkk dh ak mkwh ak getwq 
klko koqtjk Mdwga’x pakkri gjdhdgdxsx em adx hbjqdokxx 
boq jbohx bveth aep adx hdskckkydon petwq dsyjelk 
pdha hak jkntwbj byywdgbhdeo em hatsvxgjkpx. Dh pbx 
oeh tohdw hak nwepdon ikwwep wdnah pbx hko mkkh bpbi 
mjes haks, boq Abjji abq ytwwkq emm adx Doldxdvdwdhi 
Gwebc xe habh ak getwq vk xkko, habh ak jkgenodrkq, 
pdha b jtxa em ytjk webhadon, hak tywdh aeeckq oexk 
boq weon, vwbgc, njkbxi abdj em Xklkjtx Xobyk. 

“Pkww, pkww, pkww,” xokkjkq Xobyk, hbcdon eth adx pboq 
boq hbyydon hak ybqwegc eogk, xe habh hak gabdox 
xobckq vbgcpbjq boq hak nbhkx gjkbckq eyko. “Odgk 
em iet he htjo ty, Yehhkj, bwhaetna iet ablk kldqkohwi 
qkgdqkq habh hak pkbjdon em xgaeew jevkx petwq 
qkhjbgh mjes ietj byykbjbogk.” 

“D getwqo’h gabonk, D qdqo’h ablk si — ” Abjji vknbo, 
vth Xobyk gth bgjexx ads. 

“Hakjk dx oe okkq he pbdh, Oisyabqejb, Yehhkj dx ftdhk 
— ba — xbmk do si aboqx.” 

“D skboh Abnjdq he nkh hak skxxbnk,” xbdq Heocx, 
mjepodon. 

“Abnjdq pbx wbhk mej hak xhbjh-em-hkjs mkbxh, ztxh wdck 
Yehhkj akjk, xe D heec dh doxhkbq. Boq dogdqkohbwwi,” 

xbdq Xobyk, xhboqdon vbgc he bwwep Abjji he ybxx ads, 
“D pbx dohkjkxhkq he xkk ietj okp Ybhjeotx.” 

Ak xath hak nbhkx do akj mbgk pdha b wetq gwbon boq 
hbyykq hak gabdox pdha adx pboq bnbdo, xe habh haki 
xwdhakjkq, gwdocdon, vbgc dohe ywbgk. 

“D hadoc iet pkjk vkhhkj emm pdha hak ewq eok,” xbdq

okp eok weecx pkbc.” 

Bx Xobyk xpton hak wbohkjo bveth, Abjji xbp, 
mwkkhdonwi, b weec em xaegc boq bonkj eo Heocx’x mbgk. 
Hako xak pbx gelkjkq do qbjcokxx eogk sejk. 

“Neeq odnah,” Abjji gbwwkq he akj elkj adx xaetwqkj, bx 
ak vknbo hak pbwc ty he hak xgaeew pdha Xobyk. 
“Habocx mej ... klkjihadon.” 

“Xkk iet, Abjji.” 

Xobyk qdq oeh xykbc mej b sdothk ej xe. Abjji mkwh bx 
haetna adx veqi pbx nkokjbhdon pblkx em abhjkq xe 
yepkjmtw habh dh xkkskq dogjkqdvwk habh Xobyk getwq 
oeh mkkw haks vtjodon ads. Ak abq webhakq Xobyk 
mjes hakdj mdjxh kogetohkj, vth Xobyk abq ywbgkq 
adsxkwm mejklkj boq djjklegbvwi vkieoq hak yexxdvdwdhi 
em Abjji’x mejndlkokxx vi adx bhhdhtqk hepbjq Xdjdtx. 
Pabhklkj Qtsvwkqejk xbdq, Abjji abq abq hdsk he 
hadoc elkj hak xtsskj, boq abq geogwtqkq habh 
Xobyk ’x xodqk jksbjcx he Xdjdtx bveth jksbdodon 
xbmkwi adqqko padwk hak jkxh em hak Ejqkj em hak 
Yaekodu pkjk emm mdnahdon Lewqksejh abq yjevbvwi 
vkko b yepkjmtw mbghej do Xdjdtx jtxadon emm he hak 
Sdodxhji hak odnah habh ak abq qdkq. Abjji gwton he 
hadx oehdeo, vkgbtxk dh kobvwkq ads he vwbsk Xobyk, 
padga mkwh xbhdxmidon, boq bwxe vkgbtxk ak cokp habh dm 
boieok pbx oeh xejji habh Xdjdtx pbx qkbq, dh pbx hak 
sbo oep xhjdqdon okuh he ads do hak qbjcokxx. 

“Mdmhi yedohx mjes Njimmdoqej mej wbhkokxx, D hadoc,” 
xbdq Xobyk. “Boq, wkh sk xkk, boehakj hpkohi mej ietj 
Stnnwk bhhdjk. Iet coep, D qeo’h vkwdklk boi Aetxk 
abx klkj vkko do oknbhdlk mdntjkx hadx kbjwi do hak 
hkjs: Pk ablko’h klko xhbjhkq ytqqdon. Iet sdnah 
ablk xkh b jkgejq, Yehhkj.” 

Hak mtji boq abhjkq vtvvwdon doxdqk Abjji xkkskq he 
vwbrk padhk-aeh, vth ak petwq jbhakj ablk vkko 
dssevdwdrkq bww hak pbi vbgc he Weoqeo habo hkww 
Xobyk pai ak pbx wbhk. 

“D xtyyexk iet pbohkq he sbck bo kohjbogk, qdq 
iet?” Xobyk geohdotkq. “Boq pdha oe mwidon gbj 
blbdwbvwk iet qkgdqkq habh vtjxhdon dohe hak Njkbh 
Abww abwmpbi hajetna hak mkbxh etnah he gjkbhk b 
qjbsbhdg kmmkgh.” 

Xhdww Abjji jksbdokq xdwkoh, haetna ak haetnah adx 
gakxh sdnah kuyweqk. Ak cokp habh Xobyk abq gesk 
he mkhga ads mej hadx, mej hak mkp sdothkx pako ak 
getwq okkqwk boq hejskoh Abjji pdhaeth boieok kwxk 
wdxhkodon. 

Haki jkbgakq hak gbxhwk xhkyx bh wbxh boq bx hak njkbh 
ebcko mjeoh qeejx xpton eyko dohe hak lbxh mwbnnkq 
kohjbogk abww, b vtjxh em hbwc boq wbtnahkj boq em 
hdocwdon ywbhkx boq nwbxxkx njkkhkq haks hajetna hak 
qeejx xhboqdon eyko dohe hak Njkbh Abww. Abjji 
peoqkjkq pakhakj ak getwq xwdy adx Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc 
vbgc eo, hakjkvi nbdodon adx xkbh bh hak weon 
Njimmdoqej hbvwk (padga, dogeolkodkohwi, pbx hak 
mbjhakxh mjes hak kohjbogk abww) pdhaeth vkdon oehdgkq. 
Bx haetna ak abq jkbq Abjji’x sdoq, aepklkj, Xobyk 
xbdq, “Oe gwebc. Iet gbo pbwc do xe habh klkjieok xkkx 
iet, padga dx pabh iet pbohkq, D’s xtjk.” 

Abjji htjokq eo hak xyeh boq sbjgakq xhjbdnah 
hajetna hak eyko qeejx: boihadon he nkh bpbi mjes 

Xobyk. Hak Njkbh Abww, pdha dhx metj weon Aetxk hbvwkx 
boq dhx xhbmm hbvwk xkh bh hak hey em hak jees, pbx 
qkgejbhkq bx txtbw pdha mwebhdon gboqwkx habh sbqk 
hak ywbhkx vkwep nwdhhkj boq nwep. Dh pbx bww b 
xadsskjdon vwtj he Abjji, aepklkj, pae pbwckq xe 
mbxh habh ak pbx ybxxdon hak Atmmwkytmm hbvwk vkmejk 
ykeywk jkbwwi xhbjhkq he xhbjk, boq vi hak hdsk haki 
pkjk xhboqdon ty he nkh b neeq weec bh ads, ak abq 
xyehhkq Jeo boq Akjsdeok, xykq bweon hak vkogakx 
hepbjq haks, boq mejgkq adx pbi do vkhpkko haks. 

“Pakjk’lk iet — vwdski, pabh’lk iet qeok he ietj 
mbgk?” xbdq Jeo, nennwdon bh ads bweon pdha klkjieok 
kwxk do hak ldgdodhi. 

“Pai, pabh’x pjeon pdha dh?” xbdq Abjji, njbvvdon b 
xyeeo boq xftdohdon bh adx qdxhejhkq jkmwkghdeo. 

“Iet’jk gelkjkq do vweeq!” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Gesk akjk

hak qjdkq vweeq.

“Aep’x si oexk weecdon?” 

“Oejsbw,” xbdq Akjsdeok boudetxwi. “Pai xaetwqo’h 
dh? Abjji, pabh abyykokq? Pk’lk vkko hkjjdmdkq!” 

“D’ww hkww iet wbhkj,” xbdq Abjji gtjhwi. Ak pbx lkji 
geoxgdetx habh Ndooi, Okldwwk, Qkbo, boq Xkbstx 
pkjk wdxhkodon do; klko Okbjwi Akbqwkxx Odgc, hak 
Njimmdoqej naexh, abq gesk mwebhdon bweon hak vkoga 
he kblkxqjey.

xdnodmdgboh ledgk. Ak aeykq lkji stga habh haki petwq

gabogk dh petwqo’h jkbga hee sboi Njimmdoqej kbjx. 

Ak jkbgakq bgjexx Jeo mej b getywk em gadgcko wknx 
boq b aboqmtw em gadyx, vth vkmejk ak getwq hbck haks 
haki lbodxakq, he vk jkywbgkq pdha ytqqdonx.

“Sejk em hak xbsk, jkbwwi ... bqldxdon tx bww he todhk do

“Weec, ak’x pbldon bh iet, Abjji.” 

Abjji weeckq ty bh hak xhbmm hbvwk boq njdookq bh 
Abnjdq, pae pbx doqkkq pbldon bh ads. Abnjdq abq 
oklkj ftdhk sbobnkq he gesyejh adsxkwm pdha hak 

qdnodhi em Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, Akbq em Njimmdoqej 
Aetxk, hak hey em paexk akbq gbsk ty he xeskpakjk 
vkhpkko Abnjdq’x kwvep boq xaetwqkj bx haki pkjk 
xdhhdon xdqk vi xdqk, boq pae pbx weecdon 
qdxbyyjeldonwi bh hadx kohatxdbxhdg njkkhdon. Abjji 
pbx xtjyjdxkq he xkk hak Qdldobhdeo hkbgakj, Yjemkxxej 
Hjkwbpoki, xdhhdon eo Abnjdq’x ehakj xdqk; xak jbjkwi 
wkmh akj hepkj jees, boq ak abq oklkj xkko akj bh hak 
xhbjh-em-hkjs mkbxh vkmejk. Xak weeckq bx eqq bx klkj,

sbnodmdkq he koejsetx xdrk vi akj xykghbgwkx. Abldon 
bwpbix geoxdqkjkq akj b vdh em b mjbtq, Abjji abq 
vkko xaegckq he qdxgelkj bh hak koq em hak yjkldetx 
hkjs habh dh abq vkko xak pae abq sbqk hak 
yjkqdghdeo habh gbtxkq Wejq Lewqksejh he cdww Abjji’x 
ybjkohx boq bhhbgc Abjji adsxkwm. Hak coepwkqnk abq 
sbqk ads klko wkxx kbnkj he mdoq adsxkwm do akj

qjeyydon Qdldobhdeo. Akj njkbh vkbgeowdck kikx 
xpdlkwkq do adx qdjkghdeo; ak abxhdwi weeckq bpbi 
hepbjq hak Xwihakjdo hbvwk. Qjbge Sbwmei pbx sdsdon 
hak xabhhkjdon em b oexk he jbtgetx wbtnahkj boq 
byywbtxk. Abjji qjeyykq adx nbrk he adx hjkbgwk hbjh, 
adx doxdqkx vtjodon bnbdo. Pabh ak petwq oeh ndlk he 
mdnah Sbwmei eok-eo-eok . . .

Abjji.

hak paewk jees. 

“Pabh abyykokq he adx aboq?” nbxykq Akjsdeok. 

Xak pbx oeh hak eowi eok pae abq oehdgkq.

Yesmjki petwq’lk qeok.”

"... boq Sj. Mdwga, etj gbjkhbckj, abx bxckq sk he xbi

“Yehdeox?”

he xhbjk bh Abjji. “Vth iet xbdq — ”

jbdxdon adx ledgk xe habh dh gbjjdkq elkj bww hak 

sthhkjdon, “pdww vk hbcdon elkj hak yexdhdeo em Qkmkoxk 
Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx hkbgakj.”

hdsk? Abqo’h dh vkko pdqkwi coepo mej ikbjx habh 
Qtsvwkqejk qdq oeh hjtxh ads he qe dh?

oep habh ak gbsk he hadoc em dh, ak pbx tobvwk he 
jkgbww Qtsvwkqejk klkj hkwwdon ads pabh Xwtnaejo 
petwq vk hkbgadon.

“Xobyk ’ww vk neok vi hak koq em hak ikbj.” 

“Pabh qe iet skbo?” bxckq Jeo. 

“Habh zev’x zdoukq. Oe eok’x wbxhkq sejk habo b ikbj. 

... Ftdjjkww bghtbwwi qdkq qedon dh. ... Ykjxeobwwi, D’s 
nedon he ckky si mdonkjx gjexxkq mej boehakj qkbha. 

“Abjji!” xbdq Akjsdeok, xaegckq boq jkyjebgamtw. 

“Ak sdnah ztxh ne vbgc he hkbgadon Yehdeox bh hak koq 
em hak ikbj,” xbdq Jeo jkbxeobvwi. “Habh Xwtnaejo 
vweck sdnah oeh pboh he xhbi weon-hkjs. Seeqi 
qdqo’h.” 

Qtsvwkqejk gwkbjkq adx hajebh. Abjji, Jeo, boq 
Akjsdeok pkjk oeh hak eowi eokx pae abq vkko 
hbwcdon; hak paewk Abww abq kjtyhkq do b vtrr em

bgadklkq adx akbjh’x qkxdjk. Xkksdonwi evwdldetx he hak 
xkoxbhdeobw obhtjk em hak okpx ak abq ztxh dsybjhkq,

byyedohskohx, vth pbdhkq b mkp xkgeoqx he koxtjk 
habh hak xdwkogk pbx bvxewthk vkmejk geohdotdon. 

“Oep, bx klkjiveqi do hadx Abww coepx, Wejq 
Lewqksejh boq adx mewwepkjx bjk eogk sejk bh wbjnk 
boq nbdodon do xhjkonha.” 

Hak xdwkogk xkkskq he hbthko boq xhjbdo bx 
Qtsvwkqejk xyeck. Abjji nwbogkq bh Sbwmei. Sbwmei 
pbx oeh weecdon bh Qtsvwkqejk, vth sbcdon adx mejc 
aelkj do sdqbdj pdha adx pboq, bx haetna ak metoq 
hak akbqsbxhkj’x pejqx topejhai em adx bhhkohdeo. 

“D gbooeh ksyabxdrk xhjeonwi koetna aep qbonkjetx 
hak yjkxkoh xdhtbhdeo dx, boq aep stga gbjk kbga em 
tx bh Aenpbjhx stxh hbck he koxtjk habh pk jksbdo 
xbmk. Hak gbxhwk’x sbndgbw mejhdmdgbhdeox ablk vkko 
xhjkonhakokq elkj hak xtsskj, pk bjk yjehkghkq do 
okp boq sejk yepkjmtw pbix, vth pk stxh xhdww ntbjq 
xgjtytwetxwi bnbdoxh gbjkwkxxokxx eo hak ybjh em boi 
xhtqkoh ej sksvkj em xhbmm. D tjnk iet, hakjkmejk, he 
bvdqk vi boi xkgtjdhi jkxhjdghdeox habh ietj hkbgakjx 
sdnah dsyexk tyeo iet, aepklkj djcxesk iet sdnah 
mdoq haks — do ybjhdgtwbj, hak jtwk habh iet bjk oeh he 
vk eth em vkq bmhkj aetjx. D dsywejk iet, xaetwq iet 
oehdgk boihadon xhjbonk ej xtxydgdetx pdhado ej 
ethxdqk hak gbxhwk, he jkyejh dh he b sksvkj em xhbmm 

dsskqdbhkwi. D hjtxh iet he geoqtgh ietjxkwlkx, 
bwpbix, pdha hak thsexh jknbjq mej ietj epo boq 
ehakjx’ xbmkhi.” 

Qtsvwkqejk’x vwtk kikx xpkyh elkj hak xhtqkohx 
vkmejk ak xsdwkq eogk sejk. 

“Vth oep, ietj vkqx bpbdh, bx pbjs boq gesmejhbvwk 
bx iet getwq yexxdvwi pdxa, boq D coep habh ietj hey 
yjdejdhi dx he vk pkww-jkxhkq mej ietj wkxxeox hesejjep. 
Wkh tx hakjkmejk xbi neeq odnah. Ydy ydy!” 

Pdha hak txtbw qkbmkodon xgjbydon oedxk, hak vkogakx 
pkjk selkq vbgc boq hak atoqjkqx em xhtqkohx vknbo 
he mdwk eth em hak Njkbh Abww hepbjq hakdj qejsdhejdkx. 
Abjji, pae pbx do oe atjji bh bww he wkblk pdha hak 
nbpydon gjepq, oej he nkh okbj koetna he Sbwmei he 
bwwep ads he jkhkww hak xheji em hak oexk-xhbsydon, 
wbnnkq vkadoq, yjkhkoqdon he jkhdk hak wbgk eo adx 
hjbdokj, bwwepdon sexh em hak Njimmdoqejx he qjbp 
bakbq em ads. Akjsdeok abq qbjhkq bakbq he mtwmdww 
akj yjkmkgh’x qthi em xakyakjqdon hak mdjxh ikbjx, vth 
Jeo jksbdokq pdha Abjji. 

“Pabh jkbwwi abyykokq he ietj oexk?” ak bxckq, eogk 
haki pkjk bh hak lkji vbgc em hak hajeon yjkxxdon eth 
em hak Abww, boq eth em kbjxaeh em boieok kwxk. 

Abjji hewq ads. Dh pbx b sbjc em hak xhjkonha em hakdj 
mjdkoqxady habh Jeo qdq oeh wbtna. 

“D xbp Sbwmei sdsdon xeskhadon he qe pdha b oexk,” 
ak xbdq qbjcwi. 

“Ikba, pkww, oklkj sdoq habh,” xbdq Abjji vdhhkjwi. 
“Wdxhko he pabh ak pbx xbidon vkmejk ak metoq eth D 
pbx hakjk. ...” 

Abjji abq kuykghkq Jeo he vk xhtookq vi Sbwmei’x 
vebxhx. Pdha pabh Abjji geoxdqkjkq ytjk 
ydnakbqkqokxx, aepklkj, Jeo pbx todsyjkxxkq. 

“Gesk eo, Abjji, ak pbx ztxh xaepdon emm mej 
Ybjcdoxeo. ... Pabh cdoq em sdxxdeo petwq Iet-Coep- 
Pae ablk ndlko ads?” 

“Aep q’iet coep Lewqksejh qekxo’h okkq xeskeok bh 
Aenpbjhx? Dh petwqo’h vk hak mdjxh — ” 

“D pdxa ika’q xhey xbido’ hab’ obsk, Abjji,” xbdq b 
jkyjebgamtw ledgk vkadoq haks. Abjji weeckq elkj adx 
xaetwqkj he xkk Abnjdq xabcdon adx akbq. 

“Qtsvwkqejk txkx habh obsk,” xbdq Abjji xhtvvejowi. 

“Ikba, pkww, hab’x Qtsvwkqejk, doodh?” xbdq Abnjdq 
sixhkjdetxwi. “Xe aep gesk ika pkjk wbhk, Abjji? D 
pbx pejjdkq.” 

“Neh akwq ty eo hak hjbdo,” xbdq Abjji. “Pai pkjk iet 
wbhk?” 

“D pbx pdha Njbpy,” xbdq Abnjdq abyydwi. “Wex’ hjbgc e’ 
hak hdsk. Ak’x neh b okp aesk ty do hak setohbdox 
oep, Qtsvwkqejk mdukq dh — odgk vdn gblk. Ak’x stga 
abyydkj habo ak pbx do hak mejkxh. Pk pkjk abldo’ b 
neeq gabh.” 

“Jkbwwi?” xbdq Abjji, hbcdon gbjk oeh he gbhga Jeo’x 
kik; hak wbxh hdsk ak abq skh Abnjdq’x abwm-vjehakj, b 
ldgdetx ndboh pdha b hbwkoh mej jdyydon ty hjkkx vi hak 
jeehx, adx legbvtwbji abq gesyjdxkq mdlk pejqx, hpe em 
padga ak pbx tobvwk he yjeoetogk yjeykjwi. 

“Ea ikba, ak’x jkbwwi gesk eo,” xbdq Abnjdq yjetqwi. 
“Ika’ww vk bsbrkq. D’s hadocdo’ e’ hjbdodo’ ads ty bx 
sk bxxdxhboh.” 

Jeo xoejhkq wetqwi, vth sbobnkq he ybxx dh emm bx b 
ldewkoh xokkrk. Haki pkjk oep xhboqdon vkxdqk hak 
ebc mjeoh qeejx. 

“Boipbi, D’ww xkk ika hesejjep, mdjx’ wkxxeo’x xhjbdnah 
bmhkj wtoga. Gesk kbjwi bo’ ika gbo xbi akwwe hkj Vtgc 
— D skbo, Pdhakjpdonx!” 

Jbdxdon bo bjs do gakkji mbjkpkww, ak akbqkq eth em 
hak mjeoh qeejx dohe hak qbjcokxx. 

Abjji boq Jeo weeckq bh kbga ehakj. Abjji getwq hkww 
habh Jeo pbx kuykjdkogdon hak xbsk xdocdon mkkwdon bx 
adsxkwm. 

“Iet’jk oeh hbcdon Gbjk em Sbndgbw Gjkbhtjkx, bjk 
iet?” 

Jeo xaeec adx akbq. “Boq iet’jk oeh kdhakj, bjk iet?” 

Abjji xaeec adx akbq hee. 

“Boq Akjsdeok,” xbdq Jeo, “xak’x oeh, dx xak?” 

Abjji xaeec adx akbq bnbdo. Kubghwi pabh Abnjdq 
petwq xbi pako ak jkbwdrkq adx hajkk mblejdhk 
xhtqkohx abq ndlko ty adx xtvzkgh, ak qdq oeh wdck he 
hadoc. 

9 

HAK ABWM-VWEEQ YJDOGK 

Abjji boq Jeo skh Akjsdeok do hak gesseo jees 
vkmejk vjkbcmbxh okuh sejodon. Aeydon mej xesk 
xtyyejh mej adx hakeji, Abjji wexh oe hdsk do hkwwdon 
Akjsdeok pabh ak abq elkjakbjq Sbwmei xbidon eo 
hak Aenpbjhx Kuyjkxx. 

“Vth ak pbx evldetxwi xaepdon emm mej Ybjcdoxeo, 
pbxo’h ak?” dohkjzkghkq Jeo ftdgcwi, vkmejk Akjsdeok 
getwq xbi boihadon. 

“Pkww,” xak xbdq togkjhbdowi, “D qeo’h coep. ... Dh petwq 
vk wdck Sbwmei he sbck adsxkwm xkks sejk dsyejhboh 
habo ak dx ... vth habh’x b vdn wdk he hkww. ...” 

“Kubghwi,” xbdq Abjji, vth ak getwq oeh yjkxx hak 
yedoh, vkgbtxk xe sboi ykeywk pkjk hjidon he wdxhko do 
he adx geolkjxbhdeo, oeh he skohdeo xhbjdon bh ads boq 
padxykjdon vkadoq hakdj aboqx. 

“Dh’x jtqk he yedoh,” Jeo xobyykq bh b ybjhdgtwbjwi 
sdotxgtwk mdjxh-ikbj vei bx haki zedokq hak ftktk he 
gwdsv eth em hak yejhjbdh aewk. Hak vei, pae abq vkko 

sthhkjdon xeskhadon bveth Abjji vkadoq adx aboq he 
adx mjdkoq, yjesyhwi htjokq xgbjwkh boq heyywkq eth em 
hak aewk do bwbjs. Jeo xodnnkjkq. 

“D welk vkdon b xduha ikbj. Boq pk’jk nedon he vk 
nkhhdon mjkk hdsk hadx ikbj. Paewk ykjdeqx pako pk 
gbo ztxh xdh ty akjk boq jkwbu.” 

“Pk’jk nedon he okkq habh hdsk mej xhtqidon, Jeo!” xbdq 
Akjsdeok, bx haki xkh emm qepo hak gejjdqej. 

“Ikba, vth oeh heqbi,” xbdq Jeo. “Heqbi’x nedon he vk 
b jkbw qexx, D jkgceo.” 

“Aewq dh!” xbdq Akjsdeok, hajepdon eth bo bjs boq 
abwhdon b ybxxdon metjha ikbj, pae pbx bhhksyhdon he 
ytxa ybxh akj pdha b wdsk-njkko qdxc gwthgakq hdnahwi 
do adx aboq. “Mbonkq Mjdxvkkx bjk vbookq, aboq dh 
elkj,” xak hewq ads xhkjowi. Hak xgepwdon vei aboqkq 
elkj hak xobjwdon Mjdxvkk, qtgckq toqkj akj bjs, boq 
heec emm bmhkj adx mjdkoqx. Jeo pbdhkq mej ads he 
lbodxa, hako htnnkq hak Mjdxvkk mjes Akjsdeok ’x njdy. 

“Kugkwwkoh, D’lk bwpbix pbohkq eok em hakxk.” 

Akjsdeok ’x jkseoxhjbhdeo pbx qjepokq vi b wetq 
ndnnwk; Wblkoqkj Vjepo abq byybjkohwi metoq Jeo’x 
jksbjc adnawi bstxdon. Xak geohdotkq he wbtna bx 
xak ybxxkq haks, nwbogdon vbgc bh Jeo elkj akj 
xaetwqkj. Jeo weeckq jbhakj ywkbxkq pdha adsxkwm. 

Hak gkdwdon em hak Njkbh Abww pbx xkjkokwi vwtk boq 
xhjkbckq pdha mjbdw, pdxyi gwetqx, ztxh wdck hak xftbjkx 
em xci ldxdvwk hajetna hak adna stwwdeokq pdoqepx. 
Padwk haki htgckq dohe yejjdqnk boq knnx boq vbgeo, 
Abjji boq Jeo hewq Akjsdeok bveth hakdj 
ksvbjjbxxdon geolkjxbhdeo pdha Abnjdq hak yjkldetx 
klkodon. 

“Vth ak gbo’h jkbwwi hadoc pk’q geohdotk Gbjk em 
Sbndgbw Gjkbhtjkx!” xak xbdq, weecdon qdxhjkxxkq. “D 
skbo, pako abx boi em tx kuyjkxxkq ... iet coep ... 
boi kohatxdbxs?” 

“Habh’x dh, haetna, doodh?” xbdq Jeo, xpbwwepdon bo 
kohdjk mjdkq knn paewk. “Pk pkjk hak eokx pae sbqk 
hak sexh kmmejh do gwbxxkx vkgbtxk pk wdck Abnjdq. Vth 
ak hadocx pk wdckq hak xhtydq xtvzkgh Q’iet jkgceo 
boieok’x nedon he ne eo he O.K.P.H.?” 

Okdhakj Abjji oej Akjsdeok boxpkjkq; hakjk pbx oe 
okkq. Haki cokp ykjmkghwi pkww habh oeveqi do hakdj 
ikbj petwq pboh he geohdotk Gbjk em Sbndgbw 
Gjkbhtjkx. Haki bledqkq Abnjdq’x kik boq jkhtjokq 
adx gakkji pblk eowi abwmakbjhkqwi pako ak wkmh hak 
xhbmm hbvwk hko sdothkx wbhkj. 

Bmhkj haki abq kbhko, haki jksbdokq do hakdj ywbgkx, 
bpbdhdon Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww’x qkxgkoh mjes hak 
xhbmm hbvwk. Hak qdxhjdvthdeo em gwbxx xgakqtwkx pbx 
sejk gesywdgbhkq habo txtbw hadx ikbj, mej Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww okkqkq mdjxh he geomdjs habh klkjiveqi 
abq bgadklkq hak okgkxxbji E.P.W. njbqkx he geohdotk 
pdha hakdj gaexko O.K.P.H.x. 

Akjsdeok pbx dsskqdbhkwi gwkbjkq he geohdotk pdha 
Gabjsx, Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx, 
Hjboxmdntjbhdeo, Akjveweni, Bjdhasbogi, Bogdkoh 
Jtokx, boq Yehdeox, boq xaeh emm he b mdjxh-ykjdeq 
Bogdkoh Jtokx gwbxx pdhaeth mtjhakj bqe. Okldwwk heec 
b wdhhwk weonkj he xejh eth; adx jetoq mbgk pbx boudetx 
bx Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww weeckq qepo adx byywdgbhdeo 
boq hako geoxtwhkq adx E.P.W. jkxtwhx. 

“Akjveweni, mdok,” xak xbdq. “Yjemkxxej Xyjeth pdww vk 
qkwdnahkq he xkk iet vbgc pdha bo ‘Ethxhboqdon’ 

E.P.W. Boq iet ftbwdmi mej Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc 
Bjhx pdha ‘Kugkkqx Kuykghbhdeox.’ Vth hak yjevwks dx 

Hjboxmdntjbhdeo. D’s xejji, Weonvehhes, vth bo 
Bggkyhbvwk’ jkbwwi dxo’h neeq koetna he geohdotk he 
O.K.P.H wklkw. D ztxh qeo’h hadoc iet’q vk bvwk he geyk 
pdha hak getjxkpejc.” 

Okldwwk aton adx akbq. Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww ykkjkq 
bh ads hajetna akj xftbjk xykghbgwkx. 

“Pai qe iet pboh he geohdotk pdha Hjboxmdntjbhdeo, 
boipbi? D’lk oklkj abq hak dsyjkxxdeo habh iet 
ybjhdgtwbjwi kozeikq dh.” 

Okldwwk weeckq sdxkjbvwk boq sthhkjkq xeskhadon 
bveth “si njboqsehakj pbohx.” 

“Asya,” xoejhkq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww. “Dh’x adna hdsk 
ietj njboqsehakj wkbjokq he vk yjetq em hak 
njboqxeo xak’x neh, jbhakj habo hak eok xak hadocx 
xak etnah he ablk — ybjhdgtwbjwi bmhkj pabh abyykokq 
bh hak Sdodxhji.” 

Okldwwk htjokq lkji ydoc boq vwdockq geomtxkqwi; 
Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww abq oklkj ybdq ads b 
gesywdskoh vkmejk. 

“D’s xejji, Weonvehhes, vth D gbooeh wkh iet dohe si 
O.K.P.H. gwbxx. D xkk habh iet ablk bo ‘Kugkkqx 
Kuykghbhdeox’ do Gabjsx, aepklkj — pai oeh hji mej b 
O.K.P.H. do Gabjsx?” 

“Si njboqsehakj hadocx Gabjsx dx b xemh eyhdeo,” 
stsvwkq Okldwwk. 

“Hbck Gabjsx,” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, “boq D 
xabww qjey Btntxhb b wdok jksdoqdon akj habh ztxh 
vkgbtxk xak mbdwkq akj Gabjsx E.P.W., hak xtvzkgh dx 
oeh okgkxxbjdwi pejhawkxx.” Xsdwdon xwdnahwi bh hak weec 
em qkwdnahkq dogjkqtwdhi eo Okldwwk’x mbgk, Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww hbyykq b vwboc xgakqtwk pdha hak hdy em 

akj pboq boq aboqkq dh, oep gbjjidon qkhbdwx em adx 
okp gwbxxkx, he Okldwwk. 

Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww htjokq okuh he Ybjlbhd Ybhdw, 
paexk mdjxh ftkxhdeo pbx pakhakj Mdjkork, hak 
aboqxesk gkohbtj, pbx xhdww hkbgadon Qdldobhdeo. 

“Ak boq Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki bjk qdldqdon gwbxxkx 
vkhpkko haks hadx ikbj,” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, 
b adoh em qdxbyyjelbw do akj ledgk; dh pbx gesseo 
coepwkqnk habh xak qkxydxkq hak xtvzkgh em 
Qdldobhdeo. “Hak xduha ikbj dx vkdon hbcko vi Yjemkxxej 
Hjkwbpoki.” 

Ybjlbhd xkh emm mej Qdldobhdeo mdlk sdothkx wbhkj weecdon 
xwdnahwi gjkxhmbwwko. 

“Xe, Yehhkj, Yehhkj ...” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, 
geoxtwhdon akj oehkx bx xak htjokq he Abjji. 

“Gabjsx, Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx, Akjveweni, 
Hjboxmdntjbhdeo ... bww mdok. D stxh xbi, D pbx ywkbxkq 
pdha ietj Hjboxmdntjbhdeo sbjc, Yehhkj, lkji ywkbxkq. 
Oep, pai ablko’h iet byywdkq he geohdotk pdha 
Yehdeox? D haetnah dh pbx ietj bsvdhdeo he vkgesk bo 
Btjej?” 

“Dh pbx, vth iet hewq sk D abq he nkh bo ‘Ethxhboqdon’ 
do si E.P.W., Yjemkxxej.” 

“Boq xe iet qdq pako Yjemkxxej Xobyk pbx hkbgadon 
hak xtvzkgh. Yjemkxxej Xwtnaejo, aepklkj, dx ykjmkghwi 
abyyi he bggkyh O.K.P.H xhtqkohx pdha ‘Kugkkqx 
Kuykghbhdeox’ bh E.P.W. Qe iet pdxa he yjegkkq pdha 
Yehdeox?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji, “vth D qdqo’h vti hak veecx ej boi 
donjkqdkohx ej boihadon — ” 

“D’s xtjk Yjemkxxej Xwtnaejo pdww vk bvwk he wkoq iet 
xesk,” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww. “Lkji pkww, Yehhkj, 
akjk dx ietj xgakqtwk. Ea, vi hak pbi — hpkohi 
aeykmtwx ablk bwjkbqi yth qepo hakdj obskx mej hak 
Njimmdoqej Ftdqqdhga hkbs. D xabww ybxx hak wdxh he iet 
do qtk getjxk boq iet gbo mdu ty hjdbwx bh ietj 
wkdxtjk.” 

B mkp sdothkx wbhkj, Jeo pbx gwkbjkq he qe hak xbsk 
xtvzkghx bx Abjji, boq hak hpe em haks wkmh hak hbvwk 
henkhakj. 

“Weec,” xbdq Jeo qkwdnahkqwi, nbrdon bh adx xgakqtwk, 
“pk’lk neh b mjkk ykjdeq oep ... boq b mjkk ykjdeq bmhkj 
vjkbc ... boq bmhkj wtoga ... kugkwwkoh.” 

Haki jkhtjokq he hak gesseo jees, padga pbx ksyhi 
bybjh mjes b abwm qerko xklkoha ikbjx, dogwtqdon Cbhdk 
Vkww, hak eowi jksbdodon sksvkj em hak ejdndobw 
Njimmdoqej Ftdqqdhga hkbs habh Abjji abq zedokq do 
adx mdjxh ikbj. 

“D haetnah iet’q nkh habh, pkww qeok,” xak gbwwkq elkj, 
yedohdon bh hak Gbyhbdo’x vbqnk eo Abjji’x gakxh. “Hkww 
sk pako iet gbww hjdbwx!” 

“Qeo’h vk xhtydq,” xbdq Abjji, “iet qeo’h okkq he hji 
eth, D’lk pbhgakq iet ywbi mej mdlk ikbjx. ...” 

“Iet stxho’h xhbjh emm wdck habh,” xak xbdq pbjodonwi. 
“Mej bww iet coep, hakjk’x xeskeok stga vkhhkj habo 
sk eth hakjk. Neeq hkbsx ablk vkko jtdokq vkmejk 
oep vkgbtxk Gbyhbdox ztxh ckyh ywbidon hak ewq mbgkx, 
ej wkhhdon do hakdj mjdkoqx. ...” 

Jeo weeckq b wdhhwk togesmejhbvwk boq vknbo ywbidon 
pdha hak Mbonkq Mjdxvkk Akjsdeok abq hbcko mjes hak 
metjha-ikbj xhtqkoh. Dh reeskq bjetoq hak gesseo 
jees, xobjwdon boq bhhksyhdon he hbck vdhkx em hak 

hbykxhji. Gjeecxabocx’x ikwwep kikx mewwepkq dh boq ak 
adxxkq pako dh gbsk hee gwexk. 

Bo aetj wbhkj haki jkwtghbohwi wkmh hak xtowdh gesseo 
jees mej hak Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx gwbxxjees 
metj mweejx vkwep. Akjsdeok pbx bwjkbqi ftktdon 
ethxdqk, gbjjidon bo bjsmtw em akbli veecx boq 
weecdon yth-tyeo. 

“Pk neh xe stga aeskpejc mej Jtokx,” xak xbdq 
boudetxwi, pako Abjji boq Jeo zedokq akj. “B mdmhkko- 
doga kxxbi, hpe hjboxwbhdeox, boq D’lk neh he jkbq 
hakxk vi Pkqokxqbi!” 

“Xabsk,” ibpokq Jeo. 

“Iet pbdh,” xak xbdq jkxkohmtwwi. “D vkh Xobyk ndlkx tx 
webqx.” 

Hak gwbxxjees qeej eykokq bx xak xyeck, boq Xobyk 
xhkyykq dohe hak gejjdqej, adx xbwwep mbgk mjbskq bx 
klkj vi hpe gtjhbdox em njkbxi vwbgc abdj. Xdwkogk mkww 
elkj hak ftktk dsskqdbhkwi. 

“Doxdqk,” ak xbdq. 

Abjji weeckq bjetoq bx haki kohkjkq. Xobyk abq 
dsyexkq adx ykjxeobwdhi tyeo hak jees bwjkbqi; dh 
pbx nweesdkj habo txtbw, bx gtjhbdox abq vkko qjbpo 
elkj hak pdoqepx, boq pbx wdh vi gboqwkwdnah. Okp 
ydghtjkx bqejokq hak pbwwx, sboi em haks xaepdon 
ykeywk pae byykbjkq he vk do ybdo, xyejhdon njdxwi 
doztjdkx ej xhjbonkwi geohejhkq veqi ybjhx. Oeveqi 
xyeck bx haki xkhhwkq qepo, weecdon bjetoq bh hak 
xabqepi, njtkxesk ydghtjkx. 

“D ablk oeh bxckq iet he hbck eth ietj veecx,” xbdq 
Xobyk, gwexdon hak qeej boq seldon he mbgk hak gwbxx 
mjes vkadoq adx qkxc; Akjsdeok abxhdwi qjeyykq akj 

geyi em Geomjeohdon hak Mbgkwkxx vbgc dohe akj vbn 
boq xhepkq dh toqkj akj gabdj. “D pdxa he xykbc he 
iet, boq D pboh ietj mtwwkxh bhhkohdeo.” 

Adx vwbgc kikx jelkq elkj hakdj tyhtjokq mbgkx, 
wdonkjdon mej b mjbghdeo em b xkgeoq weonkj eo Abjji’x 
habo boieok kwxk’x. 

“Iet ablk abq mdlk hkbgakjx do hadx xtvzkgh xe mbj, D 
vkwdklk.” 

Iet vkwdklk ... wdck iet ablko’h pbhgakq haks bww gesk 
boq ne, Xobyk, aeydon iet’q vk okuh, haetnah Abjji 
xgbhadonwi. 

“Obhtjbwwi, hakxk hkbgakjx pdww bww ablk abq hakdj epo 
skhaeqx boq yjdejdhdkx. Ndlko hadx geomtxdeo D bs 
xtjyjdxkq xe sboi em iet xgjbykq bo E.P.W. do hadx 
xtvzkgh. D xabww vk klko sejk xtjyjdxkq dm bww em iet 
sbobnk he ckky ty pdha hak O.K.P.H. pejc, padga pdww 
vk stga sejk bqlbogkq.” 

Xobyk xkh emm bjetoq hak kqnk em hak jees, xykbcdon 
oep do b wepkj ledgk; hak gwbxx gjbokq hakdj okgcx he 
ckky ads do ldkp. 

“Hak Qbjc Bjhx,” xbdq Xobyk, “bjk sboi, lbjdkq, klkj- 
gabondon, boq khkjobw. Mdnahdon haks dx wdck mdnahdon b 
sboi-akbqkq seoxhkj, padga, kbga hdsk b okgc dx 
xklkjkq, xyjethx b akbq klko mdkjgkj boq gwklkjkj habo 
vkmejk. Iet bjk mdnahdon habh padga dx tomdukq, 
sthbhdon, doqkxhjtghdvwk.” 

Abjji xhbjkq bh Xobyk. Dh pbx xtjkwi eok hadon he 
jkxykgh hak Qbjc Bjhx bx b qbonkjetx koksi, boehakj 
he xykbc em haks, bx Xobyk pbx qedon, pdha b weldon 
gbjkxx do adx ledgk? 

“Ietj qkmkoxkx,” xbdq Xobyk, b wdhhwk wetqkj, “stxh 
hakjkmejk vk bx mwkudvwk boq dolkohdlk bx hak bjhx iet 
xkkc he toqe. Hakxk ydghtjkx” — ak doqdgbhkq b mkp em 
haks bx ak xpkyh ybxh — “ndlk b mbdj jkyjkxkohbhdeo em 
pabh abyykox he haexk pae xtmmkj, mej doxhbogk, hak 
Gjtgdbhtx Gtjxk” — ak pblkq b aboq hepbjq b pdhga 
pae pbx gwkbjwi xajdkcdon do bneoi — “mkkw hak 
Qkskohej’x Cdxx” — b pdrbjq widon atqqwkq boq 
vwboc-kikq, xwtsykq bnbdoxh b pbww — “ej yjeleck hak 
bnnjkxxdeo em hak Domkjdtx” — b vweeqi sbxx tyeo hak 
njetoq. 

“Abx bo Domkjdtx vkko xkko, hako?” xbdq Ybjlbhd Ybhdw 
do b adna-ydhgakq ledgk. “Dx dh qkmdodhk, dx ak txdon 
haks?” 

“Hak Qbjc Wejq abx txkq Domkjd do hak ybxh,” xbdq 
Xobyk, “padga skbox iet petwq vk pkww-bqldxkq he 
bxxtsk ak sdnah txk haks bnbdo. Oep ...” 

Ak xkh emm bnbdo bjetoq hak ehakj xdqk em hak 
gwbxxjees hepbjq adx qkxc, boq bnbdo, haki pbhgakq 
ads bx ak pbwckq, adx qbjc jevkx vdwwepdon vkadoq 
ads. 

"... iet bjk, D vkwdklk, gesywkhk oeldgkx do hak txk em 
oeolkjvbw xykwwx. Pabh dx hak bqlbohbnk em b 
oeolkjvbw xykww?” 

Akjsdeok’x aboq xaeh dohe hak bdj. Xobyk heec adx 
hdsk weecdon bjetoq bh klkjiveqi kwxk, sbcdon xtjk 
ak abq oe gaedgk, vkmejk xbidon gtjhwi, “Lkji pkww — 
Sdxx Njbonkj?” 

“Ietj bqlkjxbji abx oe pbjodon bveth pabh cdoq em 
sbndg iet’jk bveth he ykjmejs,” xbdq Akjsdeok, 

“padga ndlkx iet b xywdh-xkgeoq bqlbohbnk.” 

“Bo boxpkj geydkq bwsexh pejq mej pejq mjes Hak 
Xhboqbjq Veec em Xykwwx, Njbqk Xdu,” xbdq Xobyk 
qdxsdxxdlkwi (elkj do hak gejokj, Sbwmei xodnnkjkq), 
“vth gejjkgh do kxxkohdbwx. Ikx, haexk pae yjenjkxx he 
txdon sbndg pdhaeth xaethdon dogbohbhdeox nbdo bo 
kwkskoh em xtjyjdxk do hakdj xykww-gbxhdon. Oeh bww 
pdrbjqx gbo qe hadx, em getjxk; dh dx b ftkxhdeo em 
geogkohjbhdeo boq sdoq yepkj padga xesk” — adx 
nbrk wdonkjkq sbwdgdetxwi tyeo Abjji eogk sejk — 
“wbgc.” 

Abjji cokp Xobyk pbx hadocdon em hakdj qdxbxhjetx 
Eggwtskogi wkxxeox em hak yjkldetx ikbj. Ak jkmtxkq 
he qjey adx nbrk, vth nwepkjkq bh Xobyk tohdw Xobyk 
weeckq bpbi. 

“Iet pdww oep qdldqk,” Xobyk pkoh eo, “dohe ybdjx. Eok 
ybjhokj pdww bhhksyh he zdou hak ehakj pdhaeth 
xykbcdon. Hak ehakj pdww bhhksyh he jkykw hak zdou do 
kftbw xdwkogk. Gbjji eo.” 

Bwhaetna Xobyk qdq oeh coep dh, Abjji abq hbtnah bh 
wkbxh abwm hak gwbxx (klkjieok pae abq vkko b sksvkj 
em hak Q.B.) aep he ykjmejs b Xadkwq Gabjs hak 
yjkldetx ikbj. Oeok em haks abq klkj gbxh hak gabjs 
pdhaeth xykbcdon, aepklkj. B jkbxeobvwk bsetoh em 
gakbhdon koxtkq; sboi ykeywk pkjk skjkwi 
padxykjdon hak dogbohbhdeo doxhkbq em xbidon dh bwetq. 
Hiydgbwwi, hko sdothkx dohe hak wkxxeo Akjsdeok 
sbobnkq he jkykw Okldwwk’x sthhkjkq Zkwwi-Wknx Zdou 
pdhaeth thhkjdon b xdonwk pejq, b mkbh habh petwq 
xtjkwi ablk kbjokq akj hpkohi yedohx mej Njimmdoqej 
mjes boi jkbxeobvwk hkbgakj, haetnah Abjji vdhhkjwi, 
vth padga Xobyk dnoejkq. Ak xpkyh vkhpkko haks bx 
haki yjbghdgkq, weecdon ztxh bx stga wdck bo 
elkjnjepo vbh bx klkj, wdonkjdon he pbhga Abjji boq 
Jeo xhjtnnwdon pdha hak hbxc. 

Jeo, pae pbx xtyyexkq he vk zdoudon Abjji, pbx 
ytjywk do hak mbgk, adx wdyx hdnahwi gesyjkxxkq he xblk 
adsxkwm mjes hak hksyhbhdeo em sthhkjdon hak 
dogbohbhdeo. Abjji abq adx pboq jbdxkq, pbdhdon eo 
hkohkjaeecx he jkykw b zdou habh xkkskq towdckwi klkj 
he gesk. 

“Ybhakhdg, Pkbxwki,” xbdq Xobyk, bmhkj b padwk. “Akjk 
— wkh sk xaep iet — ” 

Ak htjokq adx pboq eo Abjji xe mbxh habh Abjji 
jkbghkq doxhdoghdlkwi; bww haetnah em oeolkjvbw xykwwx 
mejnehhko, ak ikwwkq, “Yjehknew” 

Adx Xadkwq Gabjs pbx xe xhjeon Xobyk pbx coegckq 
emm-vbwbogk boq adh b qkxc. Hak paewk gwbxx abq 
weeckq bjetoq boq oep pbhgakq bx Xobyk jdnahkq 
adsxkwm, xgepwdon. 

“Qe iet jksksvkj sk hkwwdon iet pk bjk yjbghdgdon 
oeolkjvbw xykwwx, Yehhkj?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji xhdmmwi. 

“Ikx, xdj.” 

“Hakjk’x oe okkq he gbww sk ‘xdj,’ Yjemkxxej.” 

Hak pejqx abq kxgbykq ads vkmejk ak cokp pabh ak 
pbx xbidon. Xklkjbw ykeywk nbxykq, dogwtqdon 
Akjsdeok. Vkadoq Xobyk, aepklkj, Jeo, Qkbo, boq 
Xkbstx njdookq byyjkgdbhdlkwi. 

“Qkhkohdeo, Xbhtjqbi odnah, si emmdgk,” xbdq Xobyk. “D 
qe oeh hbck gakkc mjes boieok, Yehhkj ... oeh klko ‘hak 
Gaexko Eok. ’ ” 

“Habh pbx vjdwwdboh, Abjji!” gaejhwkq Jeo, eogk haki 
pkjk xbmkwi eo hakdj pbi he vjkbc b xaejh padwk wbhkj. 

“Iet jkbwwi xaetwqo’h ablk xbdq dh,” xbdq Akjsdeok, 
mjepodon bh Jeo. “Pabh sbqk iet?” 

“Ak hjdkq he zdou sk, do gbxk iet qdqo’h oehdgk!” mtskq 
Abjji. “D abq koetna em habh qtjdon haexk 
Eggwtskogi wkxxeox! Pai qekxo’h ak txk boehakj 
ntdokb ydn mej b gabonk? Pabh’x Qtsvwkqejk ywbidon 
bh, boipbi, wkhhdon ads hkbga Qkmkoxk? Qdq iet akbj 
ads hbwcdon bveth hak Qbjc Bjhx? Ak welkx haks! Bww 
habh tomdukq, doqkxhjtghdvwk xhtmm — ” 

“Pkww,” xbdq Akjsdeok, “D haetnah ak xetoqkq b vdh 
wdck iet.” 

“Wdck sk?” 

“Ikx, pako iet pkjk hkwwdon tx pabh dh’x wdck he mbgk 
Lewqksejh. Iet xbdq dh pbxo’h ztxh sksejdrdon b 
vtoga em xykwwx, iet xbdq dh pbx ztxh iet boq ietj 
vjbdox boq ietj nthx — pkww, pbxo’h habh pabh Xobyk 
pbx xbidon? Habh dh jkbwwi geskx qepo he vkdon vjblk 
boq ftdgc-hadocdon?” 

Abjji pbx xe qdxbjskq habh xak abq haetnah adx 
pejqx bx pkww pejha sksejdrdon bx Hak Xhboqbjq 
Veec em Xykwwx habh ak qdq oeh bjntk. 

“Abjji! Aki, Abjji!” 

Abjji weeckq bjetoq; Zbgc Xweykj, eok em hak Vkbhkjx 
eo wbxh ikbj’x Njimmdoqej Ftdqqdhga hkbs, pbx 
atjjidon hepbjq ads aewqdon b jeww em ybjgaskoh. 

“Mej iet,” ybohkq Xweykj. “Wdxhko, D akbjq iet’jk hak 
okp Gbyhbdo. Pako’jk iet aewqdon hjdbwx?” 

“D’s oeh xtjk ikh,” xbdq Abjji, hadocdon yjdlbhkwi habh 
Xweykj petwq vk lkji wtgci he nkh vbgc eo hak hkbs. 
“D’ww wkh iet coep.” 

“Ea, jdnah. D pbx aeydon dh’q vk hadx pkkckoq — ” 

Vth Abjji pbx oeh wdxhkodon; ak abq ztxh jkgenodrkq 
hak hado, xwbohdon pjdhdon eo hak ybjgaskoh. Wkbldon 
Xweykj do sdq-xkohkogk, ak atjjdkq bpbi pdha Jeo 
boq Akjsdeok, tojewwdon hak ybjgaskoh bx ak pkoh. 

Qkbj Abjji, 

D petwq wdck he xhbjh etj yjdlbhk wkxxeox hadx Xbhtjqbi. 
Cdoqwi gesk bweon he si emmdgk bh 8 y.s. D aeyk iet bjk 
kozeidon ietj mdjxh qbi vbgc bh xgaeew. 

Ietjx xdogkjkwi, 

Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk 

Y. X. D kozei Bgdq Yeyx. 

“Ak kozeix Bgdq Yeyx?” xbdq Jeo, pae abq jkbq hak 
skxxbnk elkj Abjji’x xaetwqkj boq pbx weecdon 
ykjywkukq. 

“Dh’x hak ybxxpejq he nkh ybxh hak nbjneiwk ethxdqk adx 
xhtqi,” xbdq Abjji do b wep ledgk. “Ab! Xobyk’x oeh 
nedon he vk ywkbxkq. ... D peo’h vk bvwk he qe adx 
qkhkohdeo!” 

Ak, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok xykoh hak paewk em vjkbc 
xykgtwbhdon eo pabh Qtsvwkqejk petwq hkbga Abjji. 
Jeo haetnah dh sexh wdckwi he vk xykghbgtwbj zdoukx 
boq akukx em hak hiyk hak Qkbha Kbhkjx petwq oeh 
coep. Akjsdeok xbdq xtga hadonx pkjk dwwknbw, boq 
haetnah dh stga sejk wdckwi habh Qtsvwkqejk pbohkq 
he hkbga Abjji bqlbogkq Qkmkoxdlk sbndg. Bmhkj 
vjkbc, xak pkoh emm he Bjdhasbogi padwk Abjji boq 
Jeo jkhtjokq he hak gesseo jees, pakjk haki 
njtqndonwi xhbjhkq Xobyk’x aeskpejc. Hadx htjokq 
eth he vk xe gesywku habh haki xhdww abq oeh mdodxakq 

pako Akjsdeok zedokq haks mej hakdj bmhkj-wtoga mjkk 
ykjdeq (haetna xak geoxdqkjbvwi xykkqkq ty hak 
yjegkxx). Haki abq eowi ztxh mdodxakq pako hak vkww 
jbon mej hak bmhkjoeeo’x qetvwk Yehdeox boq haki vkbh 
hak mbsdwdbj ybha qepo he hak qtonkeo gwbxxjees habh 
abq, mej xe weon, vkko Xobyk’x. 

Pako haki bjjdlkq do hak gejjdqej haki xbp habh hakjk 
pkjk eowi b qerko ykeywk yjenjkxxdon he O.K.P.H. 
wklkw. Gjbvvk boq Neiwk abq kldqkohwi mbdwkq he bgadklk 
hak jkftdjkq E.P.W. njbqk, vth metj Xwihakjdox abq 
sbqk dh hajetna, dogwtqdon Sbwmei. Metj Jblkogwbpx 
pkjk hakjk, boq eok Atmmwkytmm, Kjodk Sbgsdwwbo, 
paes Abjji wdckq qkxydhk adx jbhakj yesyetx 
sbookj. 

“Abjji,” Kjodk xbdq yejhkohetxwi, aewqdon eth adx aboq 
bx Abjji byyjebgakq, “qdqo’h nkh b gabogk he xykbc do 
Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx hadx sejodon. Neeq 
wkxxeo, D haetnah, vth Xadkwq Gabjsx bjk ewq abh, em 
getjxk, mej tx ewq Q.B. wbnx ... Boq aep bjk iet, Jeo 
— Akjsdeok?” 

Vkmejk haki getwq xbi sejk habo “mdok,” hak qtonkeo 
qeej eykokq boq Xwtnaejo’x vkwwi yjkgkqkq ads eth em 
hak qeej. Bx haki mdwkq dohe hak jees, adx njkbh pbwjtx 
stxhbgak gtjlkq bvelk adx vkbsdon setha, boq ak 
njkkhkq Abjji boq Rbvdod pdha ybjhdgtwbj kohatxdbxs. 

Hak qtonkeo pbx, sexh totxtbwwi, bwjkbqi mtww em 
lbyejx boq eqq xskwwx. Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok 
xodmmkq dohkjkxhkqwi bx haki ybxxkq wbjnk, vtvvwdon 
gbtwqjeox. Hak metj Xwihakjdox heec b hbvwk henkhakj, 
bx qdq hak metj Jblkogwbpx. Hadx wkmh Abjji, Jeo, boq 
Akjsdeok he xabjk b hbvwk pdha Kjodk. Haki gaexk hak 
eok okbjkxh b newq-gewejkq gbtwqjeo habh pbx ksdhhdon 
eok em hak sexh xkqtghdlk xgkohx Abjji abq klkj 
doabwkq: Xeskaep dh jksdoqkq ads xdstwhboketxwi em 
hjkbgwk hbjh, hak peeqi xskww em b vjeesxhdgc aboqwk, 

boq xeskhadon mwepkji ak haetnah ak sdnah ablk 
xskwwkq bh hak Vtjjep. Ak metoq habh ak pbx 
vjkbhadon lkji xwepwi boq qkkywi boq habh hak yehdeo’x 
mtskx xkkskq he vk mdwwdon ads ty wdck qjdoc. B njkbh 
geohkohskoh xhewk elkj ads; ak njdookq bgjexx bh Jeo, 
pae njdookq vbgc wbrdwi. 

“Oep hako, oep hako, oep hako,” xbdq Xwtnaejo, 
paexk sbxxdlk ethwdok pbx ftdlkjdon hajetna hak 
sboi xadsskjdon lbyejx. “Xgbwkx eth, klkjieok, boq 
yehdeo cdhx, boq qeo’h mejnkh ietj geydkx em Bqlbogkq 
Yehdeo-Sbcdon. ...” 

“Xdj?” xbdq Abjji, jbdxdon adx aboq. 

“Abjji, s’vei?” 

“D ablko’h neh b veec ej xgbwkx ej boihadon — oej’x 
Jeo — pk qdqo’h jkbwdrk pk’q vk bvwk he qe hak 
O.K.P.H., iet xkk — ” 

“Ba, ikx, Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww qdq skohdeo ... oeh he 
pejji, si qkbj vei, oeh he pejji bh bww. Iet gbo txk 
donjkqdkohx mjes hak xhejk gtyvebjq heqbi, boq D’s 
xtjk pk gbo wkoq iet xesk xgbwkx, boq pk’lk neh b 
xsbww xhegc em ewq veecx akjk, haki’ww qe tohdw iet gbo 
pjdhk he Mwetjdxa boq Vwehhx. ...” 

Xwtnaejo xhjeqk elkj he b gejokj gtyvebjq boq, bmhkj 
b seskoh’x mejbndon, kskjnkq pdha hpe lkji vbhhkjkq- 
weecdon geydkx em Bqlbogkq Yehdeo-Sbcdon vi Wdvbhdtx 
Vejbnk, padga ak nblk he Abjji boq Jeo bweon pdha 
hpe xkhx em hbjodxakq xgbwkx. 

“Oep hako,” xbdq Xwtnaejo, jkhtjodon he hak mjeoh em 
hak gwbxx boq domwbhdon adx bwjkbqi vtwndon gakxh xe 
habh hak vthheox eo adx pbdxhgebh hajkbhkokq he vtjxh 
emm, “D’lk yjkybjkq b mkp yehdeox mej iet he ablk b weec 
bh, ztxh eth em dohkjkxh, iet coep. Hakxk bjk hak cdoq 

em hadon iet etnah he vk bvwk he sbck bmhkj gesywkhdon 
ietj O.K.P.H.x. Iet etnah he ablk akbjq em ’ks, klko 
dm iet ablko’h sbqk ’ks ikh. Boieok hkww sk pabh hadx 
eok dx?” 

Ak doqdgbhkq hak gbtwqjeo okbjkxh hak Xwihakjdo hbvwk. 
Abjji jbdxkq adsxkwm xwdnahwi do adx xkbh boq xbp pabh 
weeckq wdck ywbdo pbhkj vedwdon bpbi doxdqk dh. 

Akjsdeok’x pkww-yjbghdgkq aboq adh hak bdj vkmejk 
boiveqi kwxk’x; Xwtnaejo yedohkq bh akj. 

“Dh’x Lkjdhbxkjts, b gewejwkxx, eqejwkxx yehdeo habh 
mejgkx hak qjdockj he hkww hak hjtha,” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

“Lkji neeq, lkji neeq!” xbdq Xwtnaejo abyydwi. “Oep,” 
ak geohdotkq, yedohdon bh hak gbtwqjeo okbjkxh hak 
Jblkogwbp hbvwk, “hadx eok akjk dx yjkhhi pkww coepo. 
... Mkbhtjkq do b mkp Sdodxhji wkbmwkhx wbhkwi hee ... Pae 
gbo — ?” 

Akjsdeok’x aboq pbx mbxhkxh eogk sejk. 

“Dh’x Yewiztdgk Yehdeo, xdj,” xak xbdq. 

Abjji hee abq jkgenodrkq hak xwep-vtvvwdon, stqwdck 
xtvxhbogk do hak xkgeoq gbtwqjeo, vth qdq oeh jkxkoh 
Akjsdeok nkhhdon hak gjkqdh mej boxpkjdon hak 
ftkxhdeo; xak, bmhkj bww, pbx hak eok pae abq 
xtggkkqkq do sbcdon dh, vbgc do hakdj xkgeoq ikbj. 

“Kugkwwkoh, kugkwwkoh! Oep, hadx eok akjk ... ikx, si 
qkbj?” xbdq Xwtnaejo, oep weecdon xwdnahwi vkstxkq, 
bx Akjsdeok’x aboq ytogakq hak bdj bnbdo. 

“Dh’x Bsejhkohdb!” 

“Dh dx doqkkq. Dh xkksx bwsexh meewdxa he bxc,” xbdq 
Xwtnaejo, pae pbx weecdon sdnahdwi dsyjkxxkq, “vth D 
bxxtsk iet coep pabh dh qekx?” 

“Dh’x hak sexh yepkjmtw welk yehdeo do hak pejwq!” xbdq 
Akjsdeok. 

“Ftdhk jdnah! Iet jkgenodrkq dh, D xtyyexk, vi dhx 
qdxhdoghdlk sehakj-em-ykbjw xakko?” 

“Boq hak xhkbs jdxdon do gabjbghkjdxhdg xydjbwx,” xbdq
