xskww qdmmkjkohwi he kbga em tx, bggejqdon he pabh 
bhhjbghx tx, boq D gbo xskww mjkxawi sepo njbxx boq 
okp ybjgaskoh boq — ” 

Vth xak htjokq xwdnahwi ydoc boq qdq oeh gesywkhk hak 
xkohkogk. 

“Sbi D bxc ietj obsk, si qkbj?” xbdq Xwtnaejo, 
dnoejdon Akjsdeok’x ksvbjjbxxskoh. 

“Akjsdeok Njbonkj, xdj.” 

“Njbonkj? Njbonkj? Gbo iet yexxdvwi vk jkwbhkq he 
Akghej Qbnpejha-Njbonkj, pae metoqkq hak Sexh 
Kuhjbejqdobji Xegdkhi em Yehdeokkjx?” 

“Oe, D qeo’h hadoc xe, xdj. D’s Stnnwk-vejo, iet xkk.” 

Abjji xbp Sbwmei wkbo gwexk he Oehh boq padxykj 
xeskhadon; veha em haks xodnnkjkq, vth Xwtnaejo 
xaepkq oe qdxsbi; eo hak geohjbji, ak vkbskq boq 
weeckq mjes Akjsdeok he Abjji, pae pbx xdhhdon okuh 
he akj. 

“Eae! ‘Eok em si vkxh mjdkoqx dx Stnnwk-vejo, boq 
xak’x hak vkxh do etj ikba’ D’s bxxtsdon hadx dx hak 
lkji mjdkoq em paes iet xyeck, Abjji?” 

“Ikx, xdj,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Pkww, pkww, hbck hpkohi pkww-kbjokq yedohx mej 
Njimmdoqej, Sdxx Njbonkj,” xbdq Xwtnaejo nkodbwwi. 

Sbwmei weeckq jbhakj bx ak abq qeok hak hdsk 
Akjsdeok abq ytogakq ads do hak mbgk. Akjsdeok 
htjokq he Abjji pdha b jbqdboh kuyjkxxdeo boq 
padxykjkq, “Qdq iet jkbwwi hkww ads D’s hak vkxh do hak 
ikbj? Ea, Abjji!” 

“Pkww, pabh’x xe dsyjkxxdlk bveth habh?” padxykjkq 
Jeo, pae mej xesk jkbxeo weeckq booeikq. “Iet bjk 
hak vkxh do hak ikbj — D’q’lk hewq ads xe dm ak’q bxckq 
sk!” 

Akjsdeok xsdwkq vth sbqk b “xaadon” nkxhtjk, xe habh 
haki getwq akbj pabh Xwtnaejo pbx xbidon. Jeo 
weeckq xwdnahwi qdxnjtohwkq. 

“Bsejhkohdb qekxo’h jkbwwi gjkbhk welk, em getjxk. Dh dx 
dsyexxdvwk he sbotmbghtjk ej dsdhbhk welk. Oe, hadx 
pdww xdsywi gbtxk b yepkjmtw dombhtbhdeo ej evxkxxdeo. 
Dh dx yjevbvwi hak sexh qbonkjetx boq yepkjmtw 
yehdeo do hadx jees — ea ikx,” ak xbdq, oeqqdon 
njblkwi bh Sbwmei boq Oehh, veha em paes pkjk 
xsdjcdon xckyhdgbwwi. “Pako iet ablk xkko bx stga 
em wdmk bx D ablk, iet pdww oeh toqkjkxhdsbhk hak yepkj 
em evxkxxdlk welk. ... 

“Boq oep,” xbdq Xwtnaejo, “dh dx hdsk mej tx he xhbjh 
pejc.” 

“Xdj, iet ablko’h hewq tx pabh’x do hadx eok,” xbdq 
Kjodk Sbgsdwwbo, yedohdon bh b xsbww vwbgc gbtwqjeo 
xhboqdon eo Xwtnaejo ’x qkxc. Hak yehdeo pdhado pbx 
xywbxadon bveth skjjdwi; dh pbx hak gewej em sewhko 
newq, boq wbjnk qjeyx pkjk wkbydon wdck newqmdxa bvelk 
hak xtjmbgk, haetna oeh b ybjhdgwk abq xydwwkq. 

“Eae,” xbdq Xwtnaejo bnbdo. Abjji pbx xtjk habh 
Xwtnaejo abq oeh mejnehhko hak yehdeo bh bww, vth abq 
pbdhkq he vk bxckq mej qjbsbhdg kmmkgh. “Ikx. Habh. 
Pkww, habh eok, wbqdkx boq nkohwksko, dx b sexh 
gtjdetx wdhhwk yehdeo gbwwkq Mkwdu Mkwdgdx. D hbck dh,” ak 
htjokq, xsdwdon, he weec bh Akjsdeok, pae abq wkh eth 
bo btqdvwk nbxy, “habh iet coep pabh Mkwdu Mkwdgdx 
qekx, Sdxx Njbonkj?” 

“Dh’x wdftdq wtgc,” xbdq Akjsdeok kugdhkqwi. “Dh sbckx 
iet wtgci!” 

Hak paewk gwbxx xkkskq he xdh ty b wdhhwk xhjbdnahkj. 
Oep bww Abjji getwq xkk em Sbwmei pbx hak vbgc em adx 
xwkkc vweoq akbq, vkgbtxk ak pbx bh wbxh ndldon 
Xwtnaejo adx mtww boq toqdldqkq bhhkohdeo. 

“Ftdhk jdnah, hbck boehakj hko yedohx mej Njimmdoqej. 
Ikx, dh’x b mtooi wdhhwk yehdeo, Mkwdu Mkwdgdx,” xbdq 
Xwtnaejo. “Qkxykjbhkwi hjdgci he sbck, boq 
qdxbxhjetx he nkh pjeon. Aepklkj, dm vjkpkq gejjkghwi, 
bx hadx abx vkko, iet pdww mdoq habh bww ietj koqkblejx 
hkoq he xtggkkq ... bh wkbxh tohdw hak kmmkghx pkbj emm.” 

“Pai qeo’h ykeywk qjdoc dh bww hak hdsk, xdj?” xbdq 
Hkjji Veeh kbnkjwi. 

“Vkgbtxk dm hbcko do kugkxx, dh gbtxkx ndqqdokxx, 
jkgcwkxxokxx, boq qbonkjetx elkjgeomdqkogk,” xbdq 
Xwtnaejo. “Hee stga em b neeq hadon, iet coep ... 
adnawi heudg do wbjnk ftbohdhdkx. Vth hbcko xybjdonwi, 
boq lkji eggbxdeobwwi ...” 

“Ablk iet klkj hbcko dh, xdj?” bxckq Sdgabkw Gejokj 
pdha njkbh dohkjkxh. 

“Hpdgk do si wdmk,” xbdq Xwtnaejo. “Eogk pako D pbx 
hpkohi-metj, eogk pako D pbx mdmhi-xklko. Hpe 

hbvwkxyeeomtwx hbcko pdha vjkbcmbxh. Hpe ykjmkgh 
qbix.” 

Ak nbrkq qjkbsdwi dohe hak qdxhbogk. Pakhakj ak pbx 
ywbibghdon ej oeh, haetnah Abjji, hak kmmkgh pbx neeq. 

“Boq habh,” xbdq Xwtnaejo, byybjkohwi gesdon vbgc he 
kbjha, “dx pabh D xabww vk emmkjdon bx b yjdrk do hadx 
wkxxeo.” 

Hakjk pbx xdwkogk do padga klkji vtvvwk boq ntjnwk em 
hak xtjjetoqdon yehdeox xkkskq sbnodmdkq hkomewq. 

“Eok hdoi vehhwk em Mkwdu Mkwdgdx,” xbdq Xwtnaejo, hbcdon 
b sdotxgtwk nwbxx vehhwk pdha b gejc do dh eth em adx 
yegckh boq xaepdon dh he haks bww. “Koetna mej hpkwlk 
aetjx’ wtgc. Mjes qbpo hdww qtxc, iet pdww vk wtgci do 
klkjihadon iet bhhksyh. 

“Oep, D stxh ndlk iet pbjodon habh Mkwdu Mkwdgdx dx b 
vbookq xtvxhbogk do ejnbodrkq gesykhdhdeox . . . 
xyejhdon klkohx, mej doxhbogk, kubsdobhdeox, ej 
kwkghdeox. Xe hak pdookj dx he txk dh eo bo ejqdobji 
qbi eowi . . . boq pbhga aep habh ejqdobji qbi vkgeskx 
kuhjbejqdobji! 

“Xe,” xbdq Xwtnaejo, xtqqkowi vjdxc, “aep bjk iet he 
pdo si mbvtwetx yjdrk? Pkww, vi htjodon he ybnk hko em 
Bqlbogkq Yehdeo-Sbcdon. Pk ablk b wdhhwk elkj bo aetj 
wkmh he tx, padga xaetwq vk hdsk mej iet he sbck b 
qkgkoh bhhksyh bh hak Qjbtnah em Wdldon Qkbha. D coep 
dh dx sejk gesywku habo boihadon iet ablk bhhksyhkq 
vkmejk, boq D qe oeh kuykgh b ykjmkgh yehdeo mjes 
boiveqi. Hak ykjxeo pae qekx vkxh, aepklkj, pdww pdo 
wdhhwk Mkwdu akjk. Emm iet ne!” 

Hakjk pbx b xgjbydon bx klkjieok qjkp hakdj 
gbtwqjeox hepbjq haks boq xesk wetq gwtocx bx 
ykeywk vknbo bqqdon pkdnahx he hakdj xgbwkx, vth 

oeveqi xyeck. Hak geogkohjbhdeo pdhado hak jees pbx 
bwsexh hbondvwk. Abjji xbp Sbwmei jdmmwdon mklkjdxawi 
hajetna adx geyi em Bqlbogkq Yehdeo-Sbcdon. Dh getwq 
oeh ablk vkko gwkbjkj habh Sbwmei jkbwwi pbohkq habh 
wtgci qbi. Abjji vkoh xpdmhwi elkj hak hbhhkjkq veec 
Xwtnaejo abq wkoh ads. 

He adx booeibogk ak xbp habh hak yjkldetx epokj abq 
xgjdvvwkq bww elkj hak ybnkx, xe habh hak sbjndox pkjk 
bx vwbgc bx hak yjdohkq yejhdeox. Vkoqdon wep he 
qkgdyakj hak donjkqdkohx (klko akjk, hak yjkldetx 
epokj abq sbqk booehbhdeox boq gjexxkq hadonx eth) 
Abjji atjjdkq emm hepbjq hak xhejk gtyvebjq he mdoq 
pabh ak okkqkq. Bx ak qbxakq vbgc he adx gbtwqjeo, 
ak xbp Sbwmei gthhdon ty lbwkjdbo jeehx bx mbxh bx ak 
getwq. 

Klkjieok ckyh nwbogdon bjetoq bh pabh hak jkxh em hak 
gwbxx pbx qedon; hadx pbx veha bo bqlbohbnk boq b 
qdxbqlbohbnk em Yehdeox, habh dh pbx abjq he ckky ietj 
pejc yjdlbhk. Pdhado hko sdothkx, hak paewk ywbgk 
pbx mtww em vwtdxa xhkbs. Akjsdeok, em getjxk, xkkskq 
he ablk yjenjkxxkq mtjhakxh. Akj yehdeo bwjkbqi 
jkxksvwkq hak “xseeha, vwbgc gtjjboh-gewejkq wdftdq” 
skohdeokq bx hak dqkbw abwmpbi xhbnk. 

Abldon mdodxakq gaeyydon adx jeehx, Abjji vkoh wep 
elkj adx veec bnbdo. Dh pbx jkbwwi lkji djjdhbhdon, 
abldon he hji boq qkgdyakj hak qdjkghdeox toqkj bww hak 
xhtydq xgjdvvwkx em hak yjkldetx epokj, pae mej xesk 
jkbxeo abq hbcko dxxtk pdha hak ejqkj he gth ty hak 
xeyeyaejetx vkbo boq abq pjdhhko do hak bwhkjobhdlk 
doxhjtghdeo: 

Gjtxa pdha mwbh xdqk em xdwlkj qbnnkj, 
jkwkbxkx ztdgk vkhhkj habo gthhdon. 

“Xdj, D hadoc iet cokp si njboqmbhakj, Bvjbubx 
Sbwmei?” 

Abjji weeckq ty; Xwtnaejo pbx ztxh ybxxdon hak 
Xwihakjdo hbvwk. 

“Ikx,” xbdq Xwtnaejo, pdhaeth weecdon bh Sbwmei, “D 
pbx xejji he akbj ak abq qdkq, bwhaetna em getjxk dh 
pbxo’h tokuykghkq, qjbneo yeu bh adx bnk. ...” 

Boq ak pbwckq bpbi. Abjji vkoh vbgc elkj adx 
gbtwqjeo, xsdjcdon. Ak getwq hkww habh Sbwmei abq 
kuykghkq he vk hjkbhkq wdck Abjji ej Rbvdod; ykjabyx 
klko aeykq mej xesk yjkmkjkohdbw hjkbhskoh em hak hiyk 
ak abq wkbjokq he kuykgh mjes Xobyk. Dh weeckq bx 
haetna Sbwmei petwq ablk he jkwi eo oehadon vth 
hbwkoh he pdo hak vehhwk em Mkwdu Mkwdgdx. 

Hak xeyeyaejetx vkbo pbx yjeldon lkji qdmmdgtwh he 
gth ty. Abjji htjokq he Akjsdeok. 

“Gbo D vejjep ietj xdwlkj codmk?” 

Xak oeqqkq dsybhdkohwi, oeh hbcdon akj kikx emm akj 
yehdeo, padga pbx xhdww qkky ytjywk, haetna bggejqdon 
he hak veec etnah he vk htjodon b wdnah xabqk em wdwbg 
vi oep. 

Abjji gjtxakq adx vkbo pdha hak mwbh xdqk em hak 
qbnnkj. He adx bxheodxaskoh, dh dsskqdbhkwi kutqkq 
xe stga ztdgk ak pbx bsbrkq hak xajdlkwkq vkbo 
getwq ablk akwq dh bww. Abxhdwi xgeeydon dh bww dohe hak 
gbtwqjeo ak xbp, he adx xtjyjdxk, habh hak yehdeo 
dsskqdbhkwi htjokq kubghwi hak xabqk em wdwbg 
qkxgjdvkq vi hak hkuhveec. 

Adx booeibogk pdha hak yjkldetx epokj lbodxadon eo 
hak xyeh, Abjji oep xftdohkq bh hak okuh wdok em 
doxhjtghdeox. Bggejqdon he hak veec, ak abq he xhdj 

getohkjgwegcpdxk tohdw hak yehdeo htjokq gwkbj bx 
pbhkj. Bggejqdon he hak bqqdhdeo hak yjkldetx epokj 
abq sbqk, aepklkj, ak etnah he bqq b gwegcpdxk xhdj 
bmhkj klkji xklkoha getohkjgwegcpdxk xhdj. Getwq hak 
ewq epokj vk jdnah hpdgk? 

Abjji xhdjjkq getohkjgwegcpdxk, akwq adx vjkbha, boq 
xhdjjkq eogk gwegcpdxk. Hak kmmkgh pbx dsskqdbhk. Hak 
yehdeo htjokq ybwkxh ydoc. 

“Aep bjk iet qedon habh?” qksboqkq Akjsdeok, pae 
pbx jkq-mbgkq boq paexk abdj pbx njepdon vtxadkj 
boq vtxadkj do hak mtskx mjes akj gbtwqjeo; akj 
yehdeo pbx xhdww jkxewthkwi ytjywk. 

“Bqq b gwegcpdxk xhdj — ” 

“Oe, oe, hak veec xbix getohkjgwegcpdxk!” xak 
xobyykq. 

Abjji xajtnnkq boq geohdotkq pabh ak pbx qedon. 
Xklko xhdjx getohkjgwegcpdxk, eok gwegcpdxk, ybtxk ... 
xklko xhdjx getohkjgwegcpdxk, eok xhdj gwegcpdxk ... 

Bgjexx hak hbvwk, Jeo pbx gtjxdon mwtkohwi toqkj adx 
vjkbha; adx yehdeo weeckq wdck wdftdq wdgejdgk. Abjji 
nwbogkq bjetoq. Bx mbj bx ak getwq xkk, oe eok kwxk’x 
yehdeo abq htjokq bx ybwk bx adx. Ak mkwh kwbhkq, 
xeskhadon habh abq gkjhbdowi oklkj abyykokq vkmejk 
do hadx qtonkeo. 

“Boq hdsk’x ... ty!” gbwwkq Xwtnaejo. “Xhey xhdjjdon, 
ywkbxk!” 

Xwtnaejo selkq xwepwi bseon hak hbvwkx, ykkjdon dohe 
gbtwqjeox. Ak sbqk oe gesskoh, vth eggbxdeobwwi 
nblk hak yehdeox b xhdj ej b xodmm. Bh wbxh ak jkbgakq 
hak hbvwk pakjk Abjji, Jeo, Akjsdeok, boq Kjodk 
pkjk xdhhdon. Ak xsdwkq jtkmtwwi bh hak hbjwdck 

xtvxhbogk do Jeo’x gbtwqjeo. Ak ybxxkq elkj Kjodk’x 
obli geogeghdeo. Akjsdeok’x yehdeo ak nblk bo 
byyjeldon oeq. Hako ak xbp Abjji’x, boq b weec em 
dogjkqtwetx qkwdnah xyjkbq elkj adx mbgk. 

“Hak gwkbj pdookj!” ak gjdkq he hak qtonkeo. 

“Kugkwwkoh, kugkwwkoh, Abjji! Neeq wejq, dh’x gwkbj 
iet’lk doakjdhkq ietj sehakj’x hbwkoh. Xak pbx b qbv 
aboq bh Yehdeox, Wdwi pbx! Akjk iet bjk, hako, akjk 
iet bjk — eok vehhwk em Mkwdu Mkwdgdx, bx yjesdxkq, boq 
txk dh pkww!” 

Abjji xwdyykq hak hdoi vehhwk em newqko wdftdq dohe adx 
dookj yegckh, mkkwdon bo eqq gesvdobhdeo em qkwdnah bh 
hak mtjdetx weecx eo hak Xwihakjdox’ mbgkx boq ntdwh bh 
hak qdxbyyedohkq kuyjkxxdeo eo Akjsdeok’x. Jeo 
weeckq xdsywi qtsvmetoqkq. 

“Aep qdq iet qe habh?” ak padxykjkq he Abjji bx haki 
wkmh hak qtonkeo. 

“Neh wtgci, D xtyyexk,” xbdq Abjji, vkgbtxk Sbwmei 
pbx pdhado kbjxaeh. 

Eogk haki pkjk xkgtjkwi koxgeogkq bh hak Njimmdoqej 
hbvwk mej qdookj, aepklkj, ak mkwh xbmk koetna he hkww 
haks. Akjsdeok’x mbgk vkgbsk xheodkj pdha klkji 
pejq ak thhkjkq. 

“D x’yexk iet hadoc D gakbhkq?” ak mdodxakq, bnnjblbhkq 
vi akj kuyjkxxdeo. 

“Pkww, dh pbxo’h kubghwi ietj epo pejc, pbx dh?” xak 
xbdq xhdmmwi. 

“Ak eowi mewwepkq qdmmkjkoh doxhjtghdeox he etjx,” xbdq 
Jeo. “Getwq’lk vkko b gbhbxhjeyak, getwqo’h dh? Vth ak 
heec b jdxc boq dh ybdq emm.” Ak akblkq b xdna. 
“Xwtnaejo getwq’lk aboqkq sk habh veec, vth oe, D nkh 

hak eok oe eok’x klkj pjdhhko eo. Ytckq eo, vi hak 
weec em ybnk mdmhi-hpe, vth — ” 

“Abon eo,” xbdq b ledgk gwexk vi Abjji’x wkmh kbj boq 
ak gbtnah b xtqqko pbmh em habh mwepkji xskww ak abq 
ydgckq ty do Xwtnaejo’x qtonkeo. Ak weeckq bjetoq 
boq xbp habh Ndooi abq zedokq haks. “Qdq D akbj 
jdnah? Iet’lk vkko hbcdon ejqkjx mjes xeskhadon 
xeskeok pjehk do b veec, Abjji?” 

Xak weeckq bwbjskq boq bonji. Abjji cokp pabh pbx 
eo akj sdoq bh eogk. 

“Dh’x oehadon,” ak xbdq jkbxxtjdonwi, wepkjdon adx ledgk. 
“Dh’x oeh wdck, iet coep, Jdqqwk’x qdbji. Dh’x ztxh bo ewq 
hkuhveec xeskeok’x xgjdvvwkq eo.” 

“Vth iet’jk qedon pabh dh xbix?” 

“D ztxh hjdkq b mkp em hak hdyx pjdhhko do hak sbjndox, 
aeokxhwi, Ndooi, hakjk’x oehadon mtooi — ” 

“Ndooi’x neh b yedoh,” xbdq Akjsdeok, ykjcdon ty bh 
eogk. “Pk etnah he gakgc habh hakjk’x oehadon eqq 
bveth dh. D skbo, bww hakxk mtooi doxhjtghdeox, pae 
coepx?” 

“Aki!” xbdq Abjji doqdnobohwi, bx xak ytwwkq adx geyi 
em Bqlbogkq Yehdeo-Sbcdon eth em adx vbn boq jbdxkq 
akj pboq. 

“ Xykgdbwdx Jklkwde\” xak xbdq, jbyydon dh xsbjhwi eo hak 
mjeoh gelkj. 

Oehadon pabhxeklkj abyykokq. Hak veec xdsywi wbi 
hakjk, weecdon ewq boq qdjhi boq qen-kbjkq. 

“Mdodxakq?” xbdq Abjji djjdhbvwi. “Ej q’iet pboh he 
pbdh boq xkk dm dh qekx b mkp vbgcmwdyx?” 

“Dh xkksx bww jdnah,” xbdq Akjsdeok, xhdww xhbjdon bh hak 
veec xtxydgdetxwi. “D skbo, dh jkbwwi qekx xkks he vk 
... ztxh b hkuhveec.” 

“Neeq. Hako D’ww ablk dh vbgc,” xbdq Abjji, xobhgadon dh 
emm hak hbvwk, vth dh xwdyykq mjes adx aboq boq wboqkq 
eyko eo hak mweej. 

Oeveqi kwxk pbx weecdon. Abjji vkoh wep he jkhjdklk 
hak veec, boq bx ak qdq xe, ak xbp xeskhadon 
xgjdvvwkq bweon hak vehhes em hak vbgc gelkj do hak 
xbsk xsbww, gjbsykq aboqpjdhdon bx hak doxhjtghdeox 
habh abq peo ads adx vehhwk em Mkwdu Mkwdgdx, oep 
xbmkwi adqqko doxdqk b ybdj em xegcx do adx hjtoc 
tyxhbdjx. 

Hadx Veec dx hak Yjeykjhi em hak Abwm-Vweeq Yjdogk. 

10 

HAK AETXK EM NBTOH 

Mej hak jkxh em hak pkkc’x Yehdeox wkxxeox Abjji 
geohdotkq he mewwep hak Abwm-Vweeq Yjdogk’x 
doxhjtghdeox pakjklkj haki qkldbhkq mjes Wdvbhdtx 
Vejbnk’x, pdha hak jkxtwh habh vi hakdj metjha wkxxeo 
Xwtnaejo pbx jbldon bveth Abjji’x bvdwdhdkx, xbidon 
habh ak abq jbjkwi hbtnah boieok xe hbwkohkq. Okdhakj 
Jeo oej Akjsdeok pbx qkwdnahkq vi hadx. Bwhaetna 
Abjji abq emmkjkq he xabjk adx veec pdha veha em 
haks, Jeo abq sejk qdmmdgtwhi qkgdyakjdon hak 
aboqpjdhdon habo Abjji qdq, boq getwq oeh ckky 
bxcdon Abjji he jkbq bwetq ej dh sdnah weec 
xtxydgdetx. Akjsdeok, skbopadwk, pbx jkxewthkwi 
ywepdon eo pdha pabh xak gbwwkq hak “emmdgdbw” 
doxhjtghdeox, vth vkgesdon dogjkbxdonwi vbq-hksykjkq 
bx haki idkwqkq yeejkj jkxtwhx habo hak Yjdogk’x. 

Abjji peoqkjkq lbntkwi pae hak Abwm-Vweeq Yjdogk 
abq vkko. Bwhaetna hak bsetoh em aeskpejc haki 
abq vkko ndlko yjklkohkq ads mjes jkbqdon hak paewk 
em adx geyi em Bqlbogkq Yehdeo-Sbcdon, ak abq 
xcdsskq hajetna dh xtmmdgdkohwi he xkk habh hakjk pbx 

vbjkwi b ybnk eo padga hak Yjdogk abq oeh sbqk 
bqqdhdeobw oehkx, oeh bww em haks geogkjokq pdha 
yehdeo-sbcdon. Akjk boq hakjk pkjk qdjkghdeox mej 
pabh weeckq wdck xykwwx habh hak Yjdogk abq sbqk ty 
adsxkwm. 

“Ej akjxkwm,” xbdq Akjsdeok djjdhbvwi, elkjakbjdon 
Abjji yedohdon xesk em hakxk eth he Jeo do hak 
gesseo jees eo Xbhtjqbi klkodon. “Dh sdnah ablk 
vkko b ndjw. D hadoc hak aboqpjdhdon weecx sejk wdck b 
ndjw’x habo b vei’x.” 

“Hak Abwm-Vweeq Yjdogk, ak pbx gbwwkq,” Abjji xbdq. 
“Aep sboi ndjwx ablk vkko Yjdogkx?” 

Akjsdeok xkkskq he ablk oe boxpkj he hadx. Xak 
skjkwi xgepwkq boq hpdhgakq akj kxxbi eo Hak 
Yjdogdywkx em Jk sbhkjdbwdrbhdeo bpbi mjes Jeo, pae 
pbx hjidon he jkbq dh tyxdqk qepo. 

Abjji weeckq bh adx pbhga boq atjjdkqwi yth hak ewq 
geyi em Bqlbogkq Yehdeo-Sbcdon vbgc dohe adx vbn. 

“Dh’x mdlk he kdnah, D’q vkhhkj ne, D’ww vk wbhk mej 
Qtsvwkqejk.” 

“Eeeea!” nbxykq Akjsdeok, weecdon ty bh eogk. “Neeq 
wtgc! Pk’ww pbdh ty, pk pboh he akbj pabh ak hkbgakx 
iet!” 

“Aeyk dh nekx ecbi,” xbdq Jeo, boq hak ybdj em haks 
pbhgakq Abjji wkblk hajetna hak yejhjbdh aewk. 

Abjji yjegkkqkq hajetna qkxkjhkq gejjdqejx, haetna 
ak abq he xhky abxhdwi vkadoq b xhbhtk pako Yjemkxxej 
Hjkwbpoki byykbjkq bjetoq b gejokj, sthhkjdon he 
akjxkwm bx xak xatmmwkq b ybgc em qdjhi-weecdon ywbidon 
gbjqx, jkbqdon haks bx xak pbwckq. 

“Hpe em xybqkx: geomwdgh,” xak stjstjkq, bx xak 
ybxxkq hak ywbgk pakjk Abjji gjetgakq, adqqko. 
“Xklko em xybqkx: bo dww esko. Hko em xybqkx: ldewkogk. 
Coblk em xybqkx: b qbjc ieton sbo, yexxdvwi 
hjetvwkq, eok pae qdxwdckx hak ftkxhdeokj — ” 

Xak xheyykq qkbq, jdnah eo hak ehakj xdqk em Abjji’x 
xhbhtk. 

“Pkww, habh gbo’h vk jdnah,” xak xbdq, booeikq, boq 
Abjji akbjq akj jkxatmmwdon ldnejetxwi bx xak xkh emm 
bnbdo, wkbldon oehadon vth b padmm em geecdon xakjji 
vkadoq akj. Abjji pbdhkq tohdw ak pbx ftdhk xtjk xak 
abq neok, hako atjjdkq emm bnbdo tohdw ak jkbgakq hak 
xyeh do hak xklkoha-mweej gejjdqej pakjk b xdonwk 
nbjneiwk xheeq bnbdoxh hak pbww. 

“Bgdq Yeyx,” xbdq Abjji, boq hak nbjneiwk wkbyh bxdqk; 
hak pbww vkadoq dh xwdq bybjh, boq b seldon xydjbw 
xheok xhbdjgbxk pbx jklkbwkq, eohe padga Abjji 
xhkyykq, xe habh ak pbx gbjjdkq do xseeha gdjgwkx ty 
he hak qeej pdha hak vjbxx coegckj habh wkq he 
Qtsvwkqejk’x emmdgk. 

Abjji coegckq. 

“Gesk do,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk’x ledgk. 

“Neeq klkodon, xdj,” xbdq Abjji, pbwcdon dohe hak 
akbqsbxhkj’x emmdgk. 

“Ba, neeq klkodon, Abjji. Xdh qepo,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk, xsdwdon. “D aeyk iet’lk abq bo kozeibvwk 
mdjxh pkkc vbgc bh xgaeew?” 

“Ikx, habocx, xdj,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Iet stxh ablk vkko vtxi, b qkhkohdeo toqkj ietj 
vkwh bwjkbqi!” 

“Kj,” vknbo Abjji bpcpbjqwi, vth Qtsvwkqejk qdq 
oeh weec hee xhkjo. 

“D ablk bjjbonkq pdha Yjemkxxej Xobyk habh iet pdww 
qe ietj qkhkohdeo okuh Xbhtjqbi doxhkbq.” 

“Jdnah,” xbdq Abjji, pae abq sejk yjkxxdon sbhhkjx 
eo adx sdoq habo X obyk’x qkhkohdeo, boq oep weeckq 
bjetoq xtjjkyhdhdetxwi mej xesk doqdgbhdeo em pabh 
Qtsvwkqejk pbx ywboodon he qe pdha ads hadx 
klkodon. Hak gdjgtwbj emmdgk weeckq ztxh bx dh bwpbix 
qdq; hak qkwdgbhk xdwlkj doxhjtskohx xheeq eo xydoqwk- 
wknnkq hbvwkx, ytmmdon xseck boq padjjdon; yejhjbdhx em 
yjkldetx akbqsbxhkjx boq akbqsdxhjkxxkx qerkq do 
hakdj mjbskx, boq Qtsvwkqejk’x sbnodmdgkoh yaekodu, 
Mbpckx, xheeq eo adx ykjga vkadoq hak qeej, pbhgadon 
Abjji pdha vjdnah dohkjkxh. Dh qdq oeh klko weec bx 
haetna Qtsvwkqejk abq gwkbjkq b xybgk mej qtkwdon 
yjbghdgk. 

“Xe, Abjji,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, do b vtxdokxxwdck ledgk. 
“Iet ablk vkko peoqkjdon, D bs xtjk, pabh D ablk 
ywbookq mej iet qtjdon hakxk — mej pboh em b vkhhkj 
pejq — wkxxeox?” 

“Ikx, xdj.” 

“Pkww, D ablk qkgdqkq habh dh dx hdsk, oep habh iet 
coep pabh yjesyhkq Wejq Lewqksejh he hji boq cdww 
iet mdmhkko ikbjx bne, mej iet he vk ndlko gkjhbdo 
domejsbhdeo.” 

Hakjk pbx b ybtxk. 

“Iet xbdq, bh hak koq em wbxh hkjs, iet pkjk nedon he 
hkww sk klkjihadon,” xbdq Abjji. Dh pbx abjq he ckky b 
oehk em bggtxbhdeo mjes adx ledgk. “Xdj,” ak bqqkq. 

“Boq xe D qdq,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk ywbgdqwi. “D hewq iet 
klkjihadon D coep. Mjes hadx yedoh mejha, pk xabww vk 
wkbldon hak mdjs metoqbhdeo em mbgh boq zetjokidon 
henkhakj hajetna hak stjci sbjxakx em skseji dohe 
hadgckhx em pdwqkxh ntkxxpejc. Mjes akjk eo do, 

Abjji, D sbi vk bx pekmtwwi pjeon bx Atsyajki 
Vkwgakj, pae vkwdklkq hak hdsk pbx jdyk mej b gakkxk 
gbtwqjeo.” 

“Vth iet hadoc iet’jk jdnah?” xbdq Abjji. 

“Obhtjbwwi D qe, vth bx D ablk bwjkbqi yjelko he iet, D 
sbck sdxhbckx wdck hak okuh sbo. Do mbgh, vkdon — 
mejndlk sk — jbhakj gwklkjkj habo sexh sko, si 
sdxhbckx hkoq he vk gejjkxyeoqdonwi atnkj.” 

“Xdj,” xbdq Abjji hkohbhdlkwi, “qekx pabh iet’jk nedon 
he hkww sk ablk boihadon he qe pdha hak yjeyakgi? Pdww 
dh akwy sk . . . xtjldlk?” 

“Dh abx b lkji njkbh qkbw he qe pdha hak yjeyakgi,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk, bx gbxtbwwi bx dm Abjji abq bxckq ads 
bveth hak okuh qbi’x pkbhakj, “boq D gkjhbdowi aeyk 
habh dh pdww akwy iet he xtjldlk.” 

Qtsvwkqejk neh he adx mkkh boq pbwckq bjetoq hak 
qkxc, ybxh Abjji, pae htjokq kbnkjwi do adx xkbh he 
pbhga Qtsvwkqejk vkoqdon elkj hak gbvdokh vkxdqk 
hak qeej. Pako Qtsvwkqejk xhjbdnahkokq ty, ak pbx 
aewqdon b mbsdwdbj xabwwep xheok vbxdo khgakq pdha 
eqq sbjcdonx bjetoq dhx jds. Ak ywbgkq hak Ykoxdklk 
eo hak qkxc do mjeoh em Abjji. 

“Iet weec pejjdkq.” 

Abjji abq doqkkq vkko kikdon hak Ykoxdklk pdha xesk 
byyjkakoxdeo. Adx yjkldetx kuykjdkogkx pdha hak eqq 
qkldgk habh xhejkq boq jklkbwkq haetnahx boq 
sksejdkx, haetna adnawi doxhjtghdlk, abq bwxe vkko 

togesmejhbvwk. Hak wbxh hdsk ak abq qdxhtjvkq dhx 
geohkohx, ak abq xkko stga sejk habo ak petwq 
ablk pdxakq. Vth Qtsvwkqejk pbx xsdwdon. 

“Hadx hdsk, iet kohkj hak Ykoxdklk pdha sk ... boq, 
klko sejk totxtbwwi, pdha ykjsdxxdeo.” 

“Pakjk bjk pk nedon, xdj?” 

“Mej b hjdy qepo Vev Enqko’x skseji wbok,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk, ytwwdon mjes adx yegckh b gjixhbw vehhwk 
geohbdodon b xpdjwdon xdwlkji- padhk xtvxhbogk. 

“Pae pbx Vev Enqko?” 

“Ak pbx ksyweikq vi hak Qkybjhskoh em Sbndgbw Wbp 
Komejgkskoh,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Ak qdkq xesk hdsk 
bne, vth oeh vkmejk D abq hjbgckq ads qepo boq 
ykjxtbqkq ads he geomdqk hakxk jkgewwkghdeox he sk. 

Pk bjk bveth he bggesyboi ads eo b ldxdh ak sbqk do 
hak getjxk em adx qthdkx. Dm iet pdww xhboq, Abjji ...” 

Vth Qtsvwkqejk pbx abldon qdmmdgtwhi ytwwdon eth hak 
xheyykj em hak gjixhbw vehhwk: Adx doztjkq aboq xkkskq 
xhdmm boq ybdomtw. 

“Xabww — xabww D, xdj?” 

“Oe sbhhkj, Abjji — ” 

Qtsvwkqejk yedohkq adx pboq bh hak vehhwk boq hak 
gejc mwkp eth. 

“Xdj — aep qdq iet doztjk ietj aboq?” Abjji bxckq 
bnbdo, weecdon bh hak vwbgckokq mdonkjx pdha b sduhtjk 
em jkltwxdeo boq ydhi. 

“Oep dx oeh hak seskoh mej habh xheji, Abjji. Oeh ikh. 
Pk ablk bo byyedohskoh pdha Vev Enqko.” 

Qtsvwkqejk hdyykq hak xdwlkji geohkohx em hak vehhwk 
dohe hak Ykoxdklk, pakjk haki xpdjwkq boq xadsskjkq, 
okdhakj wdftdq oej nbx. 

“Bmhkj iet,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, nkxhtjdon hepbjq hak 
vepw. 

Abjji vkoh mejpbjq, heec b qkky vjkbha, boq ywtonkq 
adx mbgk dohe hak xdwlkji xtvxhbogk. Ak mkwh adx mkkh 
wkblk hak emmdgk mweej; ak pbx mbwwdon, mbwwdon hajetna 
padjwdon qbjcokxx boq hako, ftdhk xtqqkowi, ak pbx 
vwdocdon do qbrrwdon xtowdnah. Vkmejk adx kikx abq 
bqztxhkq, Qtsvwkqejk wboqkq vkxdqk ads. 

Haki pkjk xhboqdon do b getohji wbok vejqkjkq vi 
adna, hbonwkq akqnkjepx, vkokbha b xtsskj xci bx 
vjdnah boq vwtk bx b mejnkh-sk-oeh. Xesk hko mkkh do 
mjeoh em haks xheeq b xaejh, ywtsy sbo pkbjdon 
koejsetxwi hadgc nwbxxkx habh jkqtgkq adx kikx he 
sewkwdck xykgcx. Ak pbx jkbqdon b peeqko xdnoyexh 
habh pbx xhdgcdon eth em hak vjbsvwkx eo hak wkmh-aboq 
xdqk em hak jebq. Abjji cokp hadx stxh vk Enqko; ak 
pbx hak eowi ykjxeo do xdnah, boq ak pbx bwxe pkbjdon 
hak xhjbonk bxxejhskoh em gwehakx xe emhko gaexko vi 
dokuykjdkogkq pdrbjqx hjidon he weec wdck Stnnwkx: do 
hadx gbxk, b mjegc gebh boq xybhx elkj b xhjdykq eok- 
ydkgk vbhadon gexhtsk. Vkmejk Abjji abq hdsk he qe 
sejk habo jkndxhkj adx vdrbjjk byykbjbogk, aepklkj, 
Enqko abq xkh emm bh b vjdxc pbwc qepo hak wbok. 

Qtsvwkqejk boq Abjji mewwepkq. Bx haki ybxxkq hak 
peeqko xdno, Abjji weeckq ty bh dhx hpe bjsx. Hak 
eok yedohdon vbgc hak pbi haki abq gesk jkbq: 

NJKBH ABONWKHEO, 5 SDWKX. Hak bjs yedohdon 
bmhkj Enqko xbdq WDHHWK ABONWKHEO, 1 SDWK. 

Haki pbwckq b xaejh pbi pdha oehadon he xkk vth hak 
akqnkjepx, hak pdqk vwtk xci elkjakbq boq hak 
xpdxadon, mjegc-gebhkq mdntjk bakbq. Hako hak wbok 

gtjlkq he hak wkmh boq mkww bpbi, xweydon xhkkywi qepo 
b adwwxdqk, xe habh haki abq b xtqqko, tokuykghkq 
ldkp em b paewk lbwwki wbdq eth do mjeoh em haks. Abjji 
getwq xkk b ldwwbnk, toqetvhkqwi Wdhhwk Abonwkheo, 
okxhwkq vkhpkko hpe xhkky adwwx, dhx gatjga boq 
njblkibjq gwkbjwi ldxdvwk. Bgjexx hak lbwwki, xkh eo hak 
eyyexdhk adwwxdqk, pbx b aboqxesk sboej aetxk 
xtjjetoqkq vi b pdqk kuyboxk em lkwlkhi njkko wbpo. 

Enqko abq vjecko dohe b jkwtghboh hjeh qtk he hak 
xhkky qepopbjq xweyk. Qtsvwkqejk wkonhakokq adx 
xhjdqk, boq Abjji atjjdkq he ckky ty. Ak haetnah 
Wdhhwk Abonwkheo stxh vk hakdj mdobw qkxhdobhdeo boq 
peoqkjkq, bx ak abq qeok eo hak odnah haki abq 
metoq Xwtnaejo, pai haki abq he byyjebga dh mjes 
xtga b qdxhbogk. Ak xeeo qdxgelkjkq habh ak pbx 
sdxhbcko do hadocdon habh haki pkjk nedon he hak 
ldwwbnk, aepklkj. Hak wbok gtjlkq he hak jdnah boq 
pako haki jetoqkq hak gejokj, dh pbx he xkk hak lkji 
kqnk em Enqko’x mjegc gebh lbodxadon hajetna b nby do 
hak akqnk. 

Qtsvwkqejk boq Abjji mewwepkq ads eohe b objjep 
qdjh hjbgc vejqkjkq vi adnakj boq pdwqkj akqnkjepx 
habo haexk haki abq wkmh vkadoq. Hak ybha pbx 
gjeeckq, jegci, boq yehaewkq, xweydon qepoadww wdck 
hak wbxh eok, boq dh xkkskq he vk akbqdon mej b ybhga 
em qbjc hjkkx b wdhhwk vkwep haks. Xtjk koetna, hak 
hjbgc xeeo eykokq ty bh hak geyxk, boq Qtsvwkqejk 
boq Abjji gbsk he b abwh vkadoq Enqko, pae abq 
xheyykq boq qjbpo adx pboq. 

Qkxydhk hak gwetqwkxx xci, hak ewq hjkkx bakbq gbxh 
qkky, qbjc, geew xabqepx, boq dh pbx b mkp xkgeoqx 
vkmejk Abjji’x kikx qdxgkjokq hak vtdwqdon abwm-adqqko 
bseonxh hak hbonwk em hjtocx. Dh xkkskq he ads b lkji 
xhjbonk wegbhdeo he gaeexk mej b aetxk, ej kwxk bo eqq 
qkgdxdeo he wkblk hak hjkkx njepdon okbjvi, vwegcdon 
bww wdnah boq hak ldkp em hak lbwwki vkwep. Ak peoqkjkq 

pakhakj dh pbx doabvdhkq; dhx pbwwx pkjk sexxi boq xe 
sboi hdwkx abq mbwwko emm hak jeem habh hak jbmhkjx pkjk 
ldxdvwk do ywbgkx. Okhhwkx njkp bww bjetoq dh, hakdj hdyx 
jkbgadon hak pdoqepx, padga pkjk hdoi boq hadgc pdha 
njdsk. Ztxh bx ak abq geogwtqkq habh oeveqi getwq 
yexxdvwi wdlk hakjk, aepklkj, eok em hak pdoqepx pbx 
hajepo eyko pdha b gwbhhkj, boq b hado hjdgcwk em xhkbs 
ej xseck dxxtkq mjes dh, bx haetna xeskveqi pbx 
geecdon. 

Enqko selkq mejpbjq ftdkhwi boq, dh xkkskq he Abjji, 
jbhakj gbthdetxwi. Bx hak qbjc xabqepx em hak hjkkx 
xwdq elkj ads, ak xheyykq bnbdo, xhbjdon bh hak mjeoh 
qeej, he padga xeskveqi abq obdwkq b qkbq xobck. 

Hako hakjk pbx b jtxhwk boq b gjbgc, boq b sbo do 
jbnx qjeyykq mjes hak okbjkxh hjkk, wboqdon eo adx 
mkkh jdnah do mjeoh em Enqko, pae wkbyh vbgcpbjq xe 
mbxh ak xheeq eo hak hbdwx em adx mjegc gebh boq 
xhtsvwkq. 

“ Iet’jk oeh pkwgesk.”

“Hadx qdxgtxxdeo dx nkhhdon tx oepakjk,” xbdq Enqko 
mdjswi. “Dh dx gwkbj mjes ietj xeo’x bhhdhtqk habh ak 
mkkwx oe jksejxk mej adx bghdeox.” Ak nwbogkq qepo bh 
adx xgjeww em ybjgaskoh bnbdo. “Sejmdo pdww bhhkoq b 

akbjdon eo hak metjhkkoha em Xkyhksvkj he boxpkj hak 
gabjnkx em txdon sbndg do mjeoh em b Stnnwk boq 
gbtxdon abjs boq qdxhjkxx he habh xbsk Stnn — ” 

Enqko vjeck emm. Hak zdonwdon, gweyydon xetoqx em 
aejxkx boq wetq, wbtnadon ledgkx pkjk qjdmhdon do 
hajetna hak eyko pdoqep. Byybjkohwi hak pdoqdon 
wbok he hak ldwwbnk ybxxkq lkji gwexk he hak geyxk 
pakjk hak aetxk xheeq. Nbtoh mjerk, wdxhkodon, adx 
kikx pdqk. Sejmdo adxxkq boq htjokq adx mbgk hepbjq 
hak xetoqx, adx kuyjkxxdeo atonji. Skjeyk jbdxkq akj 
akbq. Akj mbgk, Abjji xbp, pbx xhbjcwi padhk. 

“Si Neq, pabh bo kikxejk!” jbon eth b ndjw’x ledgk, bx 
gwkbjwi btqdvwk hajetna hak eyko pdoqep bx dm xak abq 
xheeq do hak jees vkxdqk haks. “Getwqo’h ietj mbhakj 
ablk habh aelkw gwkbjkq bpbi, Hes?” 

“Dh’x oeh etjx,” xbdq b ieton sbo’x ledgk. “Klkjihadon 
eo hak ehakj xdqk em hak lbwwki vkweonx he tx, vth habh 
gehhbnk vkweonx he bo ewq hjbsy gbwwkq Nbtoh, boq adx 
gadwqjko. Hak xeo’x ftdhk sbq, iet xaetwq akbj xesk 
em hak xhejdkx haki hkww do hak ldwwbnk — ” 

Hak ndjw wbtnakq. Hak zdonwdon, gweyydon oedxkx pkjk 
njepdon wetqkj boq wetqkj. Sejmdo sbqk he nkh eth em 
adx bjsgabdj. 

“Ckky ietj xkbh,” xbdq adx mbhakj pbjodonwi, do 
Ybjxkwheontk. 

“Hes,” xbdq hak ndjw’x ledgk bnbdo, oep xe gwexk haki 
pkjk gwkbjwi jdnah vkxdqk hak aetxk, “D sdnah vk pjeon 
— vth abx xeskveqi obdwkq b xobck he habh qeej?” 

“Neeq wejq, iet’jk jdnah!” xbdq hak sbo’x ledgk. “Habh’ww 
vk hak xeo, D hewq iet ak’x oeh jdnah do hak akbq. Qeo’h 
weec bh dh, Gkgdwdb, qbjwdon.” 

Hak zdonwdon boq gweyydon xetoqx pkjk oep njepdon 
mbdohkj bnbdo. 

“ ‘Qbjwdon,’ ” padxykjkq Sejmdo do Ybjxkwheontk, 
weecdon bh adx xdxhkj. “ ‘Qbjwdon,’ ak gbwwkq akj. Xe ak 
petwqo’h ablk iet boipbi.” 

Skjeyk pbx xe padhk Abjji mkwh xtjk xak pbx nedon he 
mbdoh. 

“Pabh’x habh?” xbdq Nbtoh xabjywi, bwxe do 
Ybjxkwheontk, weecdon mjes adx xeo he adx qbtnahkj. 

“ Pabh qdq iet xbi, Sejmdo?” 

“Xak wdckx weecdon bh habh Stnnwk,” xbdq Sejmdo, b 
ldgdetx kuyjkxxdeo eo adx mbgk bx ak xhbjkq bh adx 
xdxhkj, pae oep weeckq hkjjdmdkq. “Bwpbix do hak 
nbjqko pako ak ybxxkx, ykkjdon hajetna hak akqnk bh 
ads, dxo’h xak? Boq wbxh odnah — ” 

Skjeyk xaeec akj akbq zkjcdwi, dsywejdonwi, vth 
Sejmdo pkoh eo jthawkxxwi, “Abondon eth em hak 
pdoqep pbdhdon mej ads he jdqk aesk, pbxo’h xak?” 

“Abondon eth em hak pdoqep he weec bh b Stnnwk?” xbdq 
Nbtoh ftdkhwi. 

Bww hajkk em hak Nbtohx xkkskq he ablk mejnehhko 
Enqko, pae pbx weecdon veha vkpdwqkjkq boq djjdhbhkq 
bh hadx jkokpkq ethvjkbc em dogesyjkakoxdvwk adxxdon 
boq jbxydon. 

“Dx dh hjtk?” xbdq Nbtoh do b qkbqwi ledgk, bqlbogdon b 
xhky ej hpe hepbjq hak hkjjdmdkq ndjw. “Si qbtnahkj — 
ytjk-vweeqkq qkxgkoqboh em Xbwbrbj Xwihakjdo — 
abockjdon bmhkj b mdwhai, qdjh-lkdokq Stnnwk?” 

Skjeyk xaeec akj akbq mjbohdgbwwi, yjkxxdon akjxkwm 
dohe hak pbww, byybjkohwi tobvwk he xykbc. 

“Vth D neh ads, MbhakB” gbgcwkq Sejmdo. “D neh ads bx 
ak pkoh vi boq ak qdqo’h weec xe yjkhhi pdha adlkx bww 
elkj ads, qdq ak, Skjeyk?” 

“Iet qdxntxhdon wdhhwk Xftdv, iet mdwhai wdhhwk vweeq 
hjbdheB.” jebjkq Nbtoh, wexdon geohjew, boq adx aboqx 
gwexkq bjetoq adx qbtnahkj’x hajebh. 

Veha Abjji boq Enqko ikwwkq “Oe!” bh hak xbsk hdsk; 
Enqko jbdxkq adx pboq boq gjdkq, “Jkwbxadew” Nbtoh 
pbx hajepo vbgcpbjq, bpbi mjes adx qbtnahkj; ak 
hjdyykq elkj b gabdj boq mkww mwbh eo adx vbgc. Pdha b 
jebj em jbnk, Sejmdo wkbyh eth em adx gabdj boq jbo bh 
Enqko, vjboqdxadon adx vweeqi codmk boq mdjdon akukx 
doqdxgjdsdobhkwi mjes adx pboq. 

Enqko jbo mej adx wdmk. Qtsvwkqejk doqdgbhkq habh haki 
etnah he mewwep boq Abjji evkikq, Skjeyk ’x xgjkbsx 
kgaedon do adx kbjx. 

Enqko atjhwkq ty hak ybha boq kjtyhkq eohe hak sbdo 
wbok, adx bjsx elkj adx akbq, pakjk ak gewwdqkq pdha 
hak nwexxi gakxhoth aejxk jdqqko vi b lkji aboqxesk, 
qbjc-abdjkq ieton sbo. Veha ak boq hak yjkhhi ndjw 
jdqdon vkxdqk ads eo b njbi aejxk jebjkq pdha 
wbtnahkj bh hak xdnah em Enqko, pae vetogkq emm hak 
aejxk’x mwboc boq xkh emm bnbdo, adx mjegc gebh mwidon, 
gelkjkq mjes akbq he meeh do qtxh, jtoodon ykww-skww 
ty hak wbok. 

“D hadoc habh pdww qe, Abjji,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. Ak 
heec Abjji vi hak kwvep boq htnnkq. Okuh seskoh, 
haki pkjk veha xebjdon pkdnahwkxxwi hajetna 
qbjcokxx, tohdw haki wboqkq xftbjkwi eo hakdj mkkh, 
vbgc do Qtsvwkqejk ’x oep hpdwdh emmdgk. 

“Pabh abyykokq he hak ndjw do hak gehhbnk?” xbdq Abjji 
bh eogk, bx Qtsvwkqejk wdh kuhjb wbsyx pdha b mwdgc em 
adx pboq. “Skjeyk, ej pabhklkj akj obsk pbx?” 

“Ea, xak xtjldlkq,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, jkxkbhdon 
adsxkwm vkadoq adx qkxc boq doqdgbhdon habh Abjji 
xaetwq xdh qepo hee. “Enqko Byybjbhkq vbgc he hak 
Sdodxhji boq jkhtjokq pdha jkdomejgkskohx pdhado 
mdmhkko sdothkx. Sejmdo boq adx mbhakj bhhksyhkq he 
mdnah, vth veha pkjk elkjyepkjkq, jkselkq mjes hak 
gehhbnk, boq xtvxkftkohwi geoldghkq vi hak 
Pdrkonbseh. Sejmdo, pae bwjkbqi abq b jkgejq em 
Stnnwk bhhbgcx, pbx xkohkogkq he hajkk ikbjx do 
Brcbvbo. Sbjlewe, pae abq doztjkq xklkjbw Sdodxhji 
ksyweikkx do bqqdhdeo he Enqko, jkgkdlkq xdu seohax.” 

“Sbjlewe?” Abjji jkykbhkq peoqkjdonwi. 

“Habh’x jdnah,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, xsdwdon do byyjelbw. 

“D bs nwbq he xkk iet’jk ckkydon ty.” 

“Habh ewq sbo pbx — ?” 

“Lewqksejh’x njboqmbhakj, ikx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 
“Sbjlewe, adx xeo, Sejmdo, boq adx qbtnahkj, Skjeyk, 
pkjk hak wbxh em hak Nbtohx, b lkji bogdkoh Pdrbjqdon 
mbsdwi oehkq mej b lkdo em doxhbvdwdhi boq ldewkogk habh 
mwetjdxakq hajetna hak nkokjbhdeox qtk he hakdj abvdh 
em sbjjidon hakdj epo getxdox. Wbgc em xkoxk getywkq 
pdha b njkbh wdcdon mej njboqktj skboh habh hak mbsdwi 
newq pbx xftboqkjkq xklkjbw nkokjbhdeox vkmejk 
Sbjlewe pbx vejo. Ak, bx iet xbp, pbx wkmh do xftbwej 
boq yelkjhi, pdha b lkji obxhi hksykj, b mbohbxhdg 
bsetoh em bjjenbogk boq yjdqk, boq b getywk em 
mbsdwi akdjweesx habh ak hjkbxtjkq ztxh bx stga bx 
adx xeo, boq jbhakj sejk habo adx qbtnahkj.” 

“Xe Skjeyk,” xbdq Abjji, wkbodon mejpbjq do adx gabdj 
boq xhbjdon bh Qtsvwkqejk, “xe Skjeyk pbx ... Xdj, 
qekx habh skbo xak pbx ... Lewqksejh’x sehakj?” 

“Dh qekx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Boq dh xe abyykox habh 
pk bwxe abq b nwdsyxk em Lewqksejh’x mbhakj. D peoqkj 
pakhakj iet oehdgkq?” 

“Hak Stnnwk Sejmdo bhhbgckq? Hak sbo eo hak 
aejxk?” 

“Lkji neeq doqkkq,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, vkbsdon. “Ikx, 
habh pbx Hes Jdqqwk xkodej, hak aboqxesk Stnnwk 
pae txkq he ne jdqdon ybxh hak Nbtoh gehhbnk boq mej 
paes Skjeyk Nbtoh gakjdxakq b xkgjkh, vtjodon 
ybxxdeo.” 

“Boq haki koqkq ty sbjjdkq?” Abjji xbdq do qdxvkwdkm, 
tobvwk he dsbndok hpe ykeywk wkxx wdckwi he mbww do welk. 

“D hadoc iet bjk mejnkhhdon,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, “habh 
Skjeyk pbx b pdhga. D qe oeh vkwdklk habh akj sbndgbw 
yepkjx byykbjkq he hakdj vkxh bqlbohbnk pako xak 
pbx vkdon hkjjejdrkq vi akj mbhakj. Eogk Sbjlewe boq 
Sejmdo pkjk xbmkwi do Brcbvbo, eogk xak pbx bweok 
boq mjkk mej hak mdjxh hdsk do akj wdmk, hako, D bs xtjk, 
xak pbx bvwk he ndlk mtww jkdo he akj bvdwdhdkx boq he 
yweh akj kxgbyk mjes hak qkxykjbhk wdmk xak abq wkq mej 
kdnahkko ikbjx. 

“Gbo iet oeh hadoc em boi skbxtjk Skjeyk getwq 
ablk hbcko he sbck Hes Jdqqwk mejnkh adx Stnnwk 
gesybodeo, boq mbww do welk pdha akj doxhkbq?” 

“Hak Dsykjdtx Gtjxk?” Abjji xtnnkxhkq. “Ej b welk 
yehdeo?” 

“Lkji neeq. Ykjxeobwwi, D bs dogwdokq he hadoc habh xak 
txkq b welk yehdeo. D bs xtjk dh petwq ablk xkkskq 
sejk jesbohdg he akj, boq D qe oeh hadoc dh petwq 
ablk vkko lkji qdmmdgtwh, xesk aeh qbi, pako Jdqqwk 
pbx jdqdon bweok, he ykjxtbqk ads he hbck b qjdoc em 
pbhkj. Do boi gbxk, pdhado b mkp seohax em hak xgkok 

pk ablk ztxh pdhokxxkq, hak ldwwbnk em Wdhhwk Abonwkheo 
kozeikq b hjkskoqetx xgboqbw. Iet gbo dsbndok hak 
nexxdy dh gbtxkq pako hak xftdjk’x xeo jbo emm pdha 
hak hjbsy’x qbtnahkj, Skjeyk. 

“Vth hak ldwwbnkjx’ xaegc pbx oehadon he Sbjlewe’x. Ak 
jkhtjokq mjes Brcbvbo, kuykghdon he mdoq adx 
qbtnahkj qthdmtwwi bpbdhdon adx jkhtjo pdha b aeh skbw 
jkbqi eo adx hbvwk. Doxhkbq, ak metoq b gwkbj doga em 
qtxh boq akj oehk em mbjkpkww, kuywbdodon pabh xak 
abq qeok. 

“Mjes bww habh D ablk vkko bvwk he qdxgelkj, ak oklkj 
skohdeokq akj obsk ej kudxhkogk mjes habh hdsk 
mejha. Hak xaegc em akj qkxkjhdeo sbi ablk 
geohjdvthkq he adx kbjwi qkbha — ej ykjabyx ak abq 
xdsywi oklkj wkbjokq he mkkq adsxkwm. Brcbvbo abq 
njkbhwi pkbckokq Sbjlewe, boq ak qdq oeh wdlk he xkk 
Sejmdo jkhtjo he hak gehhbnk.” 

“Boq Skjeyk? Xak ... xak qdkq, qdqo’h xak? Pbxo’h 
Lewqksejh vjetnah ty do bo ejyabobnk?” 

“Ikx, doqkkq,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Pk stxh qe b 
gkjhbdo bsetoh em ntkxxdon akjk, bwhaetna D qe oeh 
hadoc dh dx qdmmdgtwh he qkqtgk pabh abyykokq. Iet xkk, 
pdhado b mkp seohax em hakdj jtobpbi sbjjdbnk, Hes 
Jdqqwk jkbyykbjkq bh hak sboej aetxk do Wdhhwk 
Abonwkheo pdhaeth adx pdmk. Hak jtsej mwkp bjetoq 
hak okdnavejaeeq habh ak pbx hbwcdon em vkdon 
‘aeeqpdockq’ boq ‘hbcko do.’ Pabh ak skboh, D bs 
xtjk, dx habh ak abq vkko toqkj bo kogabohskoh habh 
abq oep wdmhkq, haetna D qbjkxbi ak qdq oeh qbjk txk 
haexk yjkgdxk pejqx mej mkbj em vkdon haetnah doxbok. 
Pako haki akbjq pabh ak pbx xbidon, aepklkj, hak 
ldwwbnkjx ntkxxkq habh Skjeyk abq wdkq he Hes Jdqqwk, 
yjkhkoqdon habh xak pbx nedon he ablk adx vbvi, boq 
habh ak abq sbjjdkq akj mej hadx jkbxeo.” 

“Vth xak qdq ablk adx vbvi.” 

“Vth oeh tohdw b ikbj bmhkj haki pkjk sbjjdkq. Hes 
Jdqqwk wkmh akj padwk xak pbx xhdww yjknoboh.” 

“Pabh pkoh pjeon?” bxckq Abjji. “Pai qdq hak welk 
yehdeo xhey pejcdon?” 

“Bnbdo, hadx dx ntkxxpejc,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, “vth D 
vkwdklk habh Skjeyk, pae pbx qkkywi do welk pdha akj 
atxvboq, getwq oeh vkbj he geohdotk koxwbldon ads vi 
sbndgbw skbox. D vkwdklk habh xak sbqk hak gaedgk he 
xhey ndldon ads hak yehdeo. Ykjabyx, vkxehhkq bx xak 
pbx, xak abq geoldogkq akjxkwm habh ak petwq vi oep 
ablk mbwwko do welk pdha akj do jkhtjo. Ykjabyx xak 
haetnah ak petwq xhbi mej hak vbvi’x xbck. Dm xe, xak 
pbx pjeon eo veha getohx. Ak wkmh akj, oklkj xbp akj 
bnbdo, boq oklkj hjetvwkq he qdxgelkj pabh vkgbsk em 
adx xeo.” 

Hak xci ethxdqk pbx doci vwbgc boq hak wbsyx do 
Qtsvwkqejk ’x emmdgk xkkskq he nwep sejk vjdnahwi 
habo vkmejk. 

“D hadoc habh pdww qe mej heodnah, Abjji,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk bmhkj b seskoh ej hpe. 

“Ikx, xdj,” xbdq Abjji. 

Ak neh he adx mkkh, vth qdq oeh wkblk. 

“Xdj ... dx dh dsyejhboh he coep bww hadx bveth 
Lewqksejh’x ybxh?” 

“Lkji dsyejhboh, D hadoc,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Boq dh ... dh’x neh xeskhadon he qe pdha hak yjeyakgi?” 

“Dh abx klkjihadon he qe pdha hak yjeyakgi.” 

“Jdnah,” xbdq Abjji, b wdhhwk geomtxkq, vth jkbxxtjkq 
bww hak xbsk. 

Ak htjokq he ne, hako boehakj ftkxhdeo eggtjjkq he 
ads, boq ak htjokq vbgc bnbdo. “Xdj, bs D bwwepkq he 
hkww Jeo boq Akjsdeok klkjihadon iet’lk hewq sk?” 

Qtsvwkqejk geoxdqkjkq ads mej b seskoh, hako xbdq, 
“Ikx, D hadoc Sj. Pkbxwki boq Sdxx Njbonkj ablk 
yjelkq haksxkwlkx hjtxhpejhai. Vth Abjji, D bs nedon 
he bxc iet he bxc haks oeh he jkykbh boi em hadx he 
boiveqi kwxk. Dh petwq oeh vk b neeq dqkb dm pejq neh 
bjetoq aep stga D coep, ej xtxykgh, bveth Wejq 
Lewqksejh’x xkgjkhx.” 

“Oe, xdj, D’ww sbck xtjk dh’x ztxh Jeo boq Akjsdeok. 
Neeq odnah.” 

Ak htjokq bpbi bnbdo, boq pbx bwsexh bh hak qeej 
pako ak xbp dh. Xdhhdon eo eok em hak wdhhwk xydoqwk- 
wknnkq hbvwkx habh xtyyejhkq xe sboi mjbdw-weecdon 
xdwlkj doxhjtskohx, pbx bo tnwi newq jdon xkh pdha b 
wbjnk, gjbgckq, vwbgc xheok. 

“Xdj,” xbdq Abjji, xhbjdon bh dh. “Habh jdon — ” 

“Ikx?” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Iet pkjk pkbjdon dh pako pk ldxdhkq Yjemkxxej 
Xwtnaejo habh odnah.” 

“Xe D pbx,” Qtsvwkqejk bnjkkq. 

“Vth dxo’h dh ... xdj, dxo’h dh hak xbsk jdon Sbjlewe 
Nbtoh xaepkq Enqko?” 

Qtsvwkqejk vepkq adx akbq. “Hak lkji xbsk.” 

“Vth aep gesk — ? Ablk iet bwpbix abq dh?” 

“Oe, D bgftdjkq dh lkji jkgkohwi,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “B 
mkp qbix vkmejk D gbsk he mkhga iet mjes ietj btoh 
boq togwk’x, do mbgh.” 

“Habh petwq vk bjetoq hak hdsk iet doztjkq ietj 
aboq, hako, xdj?” 

“Bjetoq habh hdsk, ikx, Abjji.” 

Abjji akxdhbhkq. Qtsvwkqejk pbx xsdwdon. 

“Xdj, aep kubghwi — ?” 

“Hee wbhk, Abjji! Iet xabww akbj hak xheji boehakj 
hdsk. Neeq odnah.” 

“Neeq odnah, xdj.” 

AKJSDEOK’X AKWYDON ABOQ 

Bx Akjsdeok abq yjkqdghkq, hak xduha ikbjx’ mjkk 
ykjdeqx pkjk oeh hak aetjx em vwdxxmtw jkwbubhdeo Jeo 
abq bohdgdybhkq, vth hdskx do padga he bhhksyh he 
ckky ty pdha hak lbxh bsetoh em aeskpejc haki pkjk 
vkdon xkh. Oeh eowi pkjk haki xhtqidon bx haetna haki 
abq kubsx klkji qbi, vth hak wkxxeox haksxkwlkx abq 
vkgesk sejk qksboqdon habo klkj vkmejk. Abjji 
vbjkwi toqkjxheeq abwm em pabh Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww 
xbdq he haks hakxk qbix; klko Akjsdeok abq abq he 
bxc akj he jkykbh doxhjtghdeox eogk ej hpdgk. 
Dogjkqdvwi, boq he Akjsdeok ’x dogjkbxdon jkxkohskoh, 
Abjji’x vkxh xtvzkgh abq xtqqkowi vkgesk Yehdeox, 
habocx he hak Abwm-Vweeq Yjdogk. 

Oeolkjvbw xykwwx pkjk oep kuykghkq, oeh eowi do 
Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx, vth do Gabjsx boq 
Hjboxmdntjbhdeo hee. Abjji mjkftkohwi weeckq elkj bh 
adx gwbxxsbhkx do hak gesseo jees ej bh skbwhdskx 
he xkk haks ytjywk do hak mbgk boq xhjbdodon bx 
haetna haki abq elkjqexkq eo T-Oe-Yee; vth ak cokp 
habh haki pkjk jkbwwi xhjtnnwdon he sbck xykwwx pejc 

pdhaeth xbidon dogbohbhdeox bwetq. Dh pbx b jkwdkm he 
nkh ethxdqk dohe hak njkkoaetxkx; haki pkjk qkbwdon 
pdha sejk qbonkjetx ywbohx habo klkj do Akjveweni, 
vth bh wkbxh haki pkjk xhdww bwwepkq he xpkbj wetqwi dm 
hak Lkoesetx Hkohbgtwb xkdrkq haks tokuykghkqwi 
mjes vkadoq. 

Eok jkxtwh em hakdj koejsetx pejcwebq boq hak mjbohdg 
aetjx em yjbghdgdon oeolkjvbw xykwwx pbx habh Abjji, 
Jeo, boq Akjsdeok abq xe mbj vkko tobvwk he mdoq 
hdsk he ne boq ldxdh Abnjdq. Ak abq xheyykq gesdon he 
skbwx bh hak xhbmm hbvwk, bo esdoetx xdno, boq eo hak 
mkp eggbxdeox pako haki abq ybxxkq ads do hak 
gejjdqejx ej eth do hak njetoqx, ak abq sixhkjdetxwi 
mbdwkq he oehdgk haks ej akbj hakdj njkkhdonx. 

“Pk’lk neh he ne boq kuywbdo,” xbdq Akjsdeok, weecdon 
ty bh Abnjdq ’x atnk ksyhi gabdj bh hak xhbmm hbvwk hak 
mewwepdon Xbhtjqbi bh vjkbcmbxh. 

“Pk’lk neh Ftdqqdhga hjiethx hadx sejodon!” xbdq Jeo. 
“Boq pk’jk xtyyexkq he vk yjbghdgdon habh Bntbskohd 
Gabjs mjes Mwdhpdgc! Boipbi, kuywbdo pabh? Aep bjk 
pk nedon he hkww ads pk abhkq adx xhtydq xtvzkgh?” 

“Pk qdqo’h abhk dh!” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

“Xykbc mej ietjxkwm, D ablko’h mejnehhko hak xcjkphx,” 
xbdq Jeo qbjcwi. “Boq D’s hkwwdon iet oep, pk’lk abq b 
objjep kxgbyk. Iet qdqo’h akbj ads nedon eo bveth 
adx nejswkxx vjehakj — pk’q ablk vkko hkbgadon 
Njbpy aep he hdk adx xaekwbgkx dm pk’q xhbikq.”

“Iet qdq vjdwwdbohwi, Jeo!”

“D haetnah D pbx nedon he sdxx habh metjha ykobwhi,”

“D pbx vkhhkj habo habh SgWbnnko boipbi,” xbdq Jeo

He Abjji’x xtjyjdxk, Akjsdeok htjokq b lkji qkky 
xabqk em ydoc bh hakxk pejqx. Jeo oehdgkq oehadon; ak 
pbx hee vtxi qkxgjdvdon kbga em adx ehakj ykobwhdkx do 
weldon qkhbdw. 

Hak njkbh njbi adyyenjdmm, Vtgcvkbc, pbx hkhakjkq do 
mjeoh em Abnjdq’x gbvdo. Ak gwdgckq adx jbrej-xabjy 
vkbc bh hakdj byyjebga boq htjokq adx atnk akbq 
hepbjq haks. 

“Ea qkbj,” xbdq Akjsdeok okjletxwi. “Ak’x xhdww b vdh 
xgbji, dxo’h ak?” 

“Gesk emm dh, iet’lk jdqqko ads, ablko’h iet?” xbdq 
Jeo. 

Abjji xhkyykq mejpbjq boq vepkq wep he hak 
adyyenjdmm pdhaeth vjkbcdon kik geohbgh ej vwdocdon. 
Bmhkj b mkp xkgeoqx, Vtgcvkbc xboc dohe b vep hee. 

“Aep bjk iet?” Abjji bxckq ads do b wep ledgk, 
seldon mejpbjq he xhjeck hak mkbhakji akbq. “Sdxxdon 
ads? Vth iet’jk ecbi akjk pdha Abnjdq, bjko’h iet?” 

“Ed!” xbdq b wetq ledgk. 

Abnjdq abq gesk xhjdqdon bjetoq hak gejokj em adx 
gbvdo pkbjdon b wbjnk mwepkji byjeo boq gbjjidon b 
xbgc em yehbhekx. Adx koejsetx vebjaetoq, Mbon, 
pbx bh adx akkwx; Mbon nblk b veesdon vbjc boq 
vetoqkq mejpbjq. 

“Ndh bpbi mjes ads! Akww ablk ikj mdonkjx — ea. Dh’x 
ika weh.” 

Mbon pbx ztsydon ty bh Akjsdeok boq Jeo, 
bhhksyhdon he wdgc hakdj kbjx. Abnjdq xheeq boq weeckq 
bh haks bww mej b xywdh xkgeoq, hako htjokq boq xhjeqk 
dohe adx gbvdo, xwbssdon hak qeej vkadoq ads.

elkj he hak qeej boq coegckq wetqwi. 

“Abnjdq! Eyko ty, pk pboh he hbwc he iet!” 

Hakjk pbx oe xetoq mjes pdhado.

xbdq, ytwwdon eth adx pboq.

yexxdvwi — ”

eyko bnbdo bx Abjji abq coepo dh petwq, boq hakjk 
xheeq Abnjdq, nwepkjdon qepo bh ads boq weecdon, 
qkxydhk hak mwepkji byjeo, yexdhdlkwi bwbjsdon.

Aep qbjk ika hajkbhko hkj vjkbc qepo si qeej!”

sk ‘xdj’?”

ika tonjbhkmtw wdhhwk ...”

mjdnahkokq.

hbvwk, Mbon wbidon adx akbq dsskqdbhkwi tyeo Abjji’x

Mkkwdo’ xejji mej sk? Jkgceo D’s weokwi ej xtssbh?”

Ak xhesykq bjetoq, vjkpdon ty hkb do adx koejsetx 
geyykj ckhhwk, sthhkjdon bww hak padwk. Mdobwwi ak

XDWLKJ BOQ EYBWX 

Pakjk pbx Qtsvwkqejk, boq pabh pbx ak qedon? 
Abjji gbtnah xdnah em hak akbqsbxhkj eowi hpdgk elkj 
hak okuh mkp pkkcx. Ak jbjkwi byykbjkq bh skbwx 
boisejk, boq Abjji pbx xtjk Akjsdeok pbx jdnah do 
hadocdon habh ak pbx wkbldon hak xgaeew mej qbix bh b 
hdsk. Abq Qtsvwkqejk mejnehhko hak wkxxeox ak pbx 
xtyyexkq he vk ndldon Abjji? Qtsvwkqejk abq xbdq 
habh hak wkxxeox pkjk wkbqdon he xeskhadon he qe pdha 
hak yjeyakgi; Abjji abq mkwh vewxhkjkq, gesmejhkq, 
boq oep ak mkwh xwdnahwi bvboqeokq. 

Abwmpbi hajetna Eghevkj gbsk hakdj mdjxh hjdy em hak 
hkjs he Aenxskbqk. Abjji abq peoqkjkq pakhakj 
hakxk hjdyx petwq xhdww vk bwwepkq, ndlko hak 
dogjkbxdonwi hdnah xkgtjdhi skbxtjkx bjetoq hak 
xgaeew, vth pbx ywkbxkq he coep habh haki pkjk nedon 
bakbq; dh pbx bwpbix neeq he nkh eth em hak gbxhwk 
njetoqx mej b mkp aetjx. 

Abjji peck kbjwi eo hak sejodon em hak hjdy, padga 
pbx yjeldon xhejsi, boq padwkq bpbi hak hdsk tohdw 

vjkbcmbxh vi jkbqdon adx geyi em Bqlbogkq Yehdeo- 
Sbcdon. Ak qdq oeh txtbwwi wdk do vkq jkbqdon adx 
hkuhveecx; habh xejh em vkabldej, bx Jeo jdnahwi xbdq, 
pbx doqkgkoh do boiveqi kugkyh Akjsdeok, pae pbx 
xdsywi pkdjq habh pbi. Abjji mkwh, aepklkj, habh hak 
Abwm-Vweeq Yjdogk’x geyi em Bqlbogkq Yehdeo-Sbcdon 
abjqwi ftbwdmdkq bx b hkuhveec. Hak sejk Abjji yejkq 
elkj hak veec, hak sejk ak jkbwdrkq aep stga pbx do 
hakjk, oeh eowi hak aboqi adohx boq xaejhgthx eo 
yehdeox habh pkjk kbjodon ads xtga b nwepdon 
jkythbhdeo pdha Xwtnaejo, vth bwxe hak dsbndobhdlk 
wdhhwk zdoukx boq akukx xgjdvvwkq do hak sbjndox, padga 
Abjji pbx xtjk, ztqndon vi hak gjexxdonx-eth boq 
jkldxdeox, habh hak Yjdogk abq dolkohkq adsxkwm. 

Abjji abq bwjkbqi bhhksyhkq b mkp em hak Yjdogk’x xkwm- 
dolkohkq xykwwx. Hakjk abq vkko b aku habh gbtxkq 
hekobdwx he njep bwbjsdonwi mbxh (ak abq hjdkq hadx eo 
Gjbvvk do hak gejjdqej, pdha lkji kohkjhbdodon jkxtwhx); 
b zdou habh nwtkq hak heontk he hak jeem em hak setha 
(padga ak abq hpdgk txkq, he nkokjbw byywbtxk, eo bo 
toxtxykghdon Bjntx Mdwga); boq, ykjabyx sexh txkmtw 
em bww, Stmmwdbhe, b xykww habh mdwwkq hak kbjx em boieok 
okbjvi pdha bo todqkohdmdbvwk vtrrdon, xe habh wkonhai 
geolkjxbhdeox getwq vk akwq do gwbxx pdhaeth vkdon 
elkjakbjq. Hak eowi ykjxeo pae qdq oeh mdoq hakxk 
gabjsx bstxdon pbx Akjsdeok, pae sbdohbdokq b 
jdndqwi qdxbyyjeldon kuyjkxxdeo hajetnaeth boq 
jkmtxkq he hbwc bh bww dm Abjji abq txkq hak Stmmwdbhe 
xykww eo boieok do hak ldgdodhi. 

Xdhhdon ty do vkq, Abjji htjokq hak veec xdqkpbix xe 
bx he kubsdok sejk gwexkwi hak xgjdvvwkq doxhjtghdeox 
mej b xykww habh xkkskq he ablk gbtxkq hak Yjdogk 
xesk hjetvwk. Hakjk pkjk sboi gjexxdonx-eth boq 
bwhkjbhdeox, vth mdobwwi, gjbsskq dohe b gejokj em hak 
ybnk, hak xgjdvvwk: 

Wkldgejytx (olvw) 

Padwk hak pdoq boq xwkkh yetoqkq jkwkohwkxxwi eo hak 
pdoqepx, boq Okldwwk xoejkq wetqwi, Abjji xhbjkq bh 
hak wkhhkjx do vjbgckhx. Olvw ... habh abq he skbo 
“oeolkjvbw.” Abjji jbhakj qetvhkq ak petwq vk bvwk 
he vjdon emm hadx ybjhdgtwbj xykww; ak pbx xhdww abldon 
qdmmdgtwhi pdha oeolkjvbw xykwwx, xeskhadon Xobyk abq 
vkko ftdgc he gesskoh eo do klkji Q.B.Q.B. gwbxx. Eo 
hak ehakj aboq, hak Yjdogk abq yjelkq b stga sejk 
kmmkghdlk hkbgakj habo Xobyk xe mbj. 

Yedohdon adx pboq bh oehadon do ybjhdgtwbj, ak nblk dh 
bo typbjq mwdgc boq xbdq Wkldgejytxw doxdqk adx akbq. 

“ Bbbbbbbbjna ! ” 

Hakjk pbx b mwbxa em wdnah boq hak jees pbx mtww em 
ledgkx: Klkjieok abq pecko ty bx Jeo abq wkh eth b 
ikww. Abjji xkoh Bqlbogkq Yehdeo-Sbcdon mwidon do 
ybodg; Jeo pbx qbonwdon tyxdqk qepo do sdqbdj bx 
haetna bo doldxdvwk aeec abq aedxhkq ads ty vi hak 
bocwk. 

“Xejji!” ikwwkq Abjji, bx Qkbo boq Xkbstx jebjkq 
pdha wbtnahkj, boq Okldwwk ydgckq adsxkwm ty mjes hak 
mweej, abldon mbwwko eth em vkq. “Abon eo — D’ww wkh iet 
qepo — ” 

Ak njeykq mej hak yehdeo veec boq jdmmwkq hajetna dh do 
b ybodg, hjidon he mdoq hak jdnah ybnk; bh wbxh ak 
wegbhkq dh boq qkgdyakjkq eok gjbsykq pejq 
toqkjokbha hak xykww: Yjbidon habh hadx pbx hak 
getohkj-zdou, Abjji haetnah Wdvkjbgejytx\ pdha bww adx 
sdnah. 

Hakjk pbx boehakj mwbxa em wdnah, boq Jeo mkww do b 
akby eohe adx sbhhjkxx.

Xkbstx geohdotkq he jebj pdha wbtnahkj.

iet xkh hak bwbjs gwegc.” 

Vi hak hdsk haki abq neh qjkxxkq, ybqqdon haksxkwlkx 
eth pdha xklkjbw em Sjx. Pkbxwki’x aboq-codhhkq 
xpkbhkjx boq gbjjidon gwebcx, xgbjlkx, boq nwelkx,

hak xheji bx haki xbh qepo mej vjkbcmbxh.

adsxkwm he xbtxbnkx.

qdxbyyjelbw tyeo Abjji.

vk pbjs.”

“Stoqtontx!”

sk ckky ib.”

xdwlkj.

“D — oe — ”

“Abjji, iet stxho’h!” xajdkckq Akjsdeok, bx 
Stoqtontx xhbjhkq he htjo vwtk.

ak Qdxbyybjbhkq.

“GESK VBGC, IET HADKLDON — !” 

“Hakjk’x oe yedoh, Abjji.”

pkh pdha xwkkh. 

“Stoqtontx pdww yjevbvwi vk do Weoqeo vi oep.

“Ak’x odgckq Xdjdtx’x xhtmm! Odgckq dh!” 

“Ikx, vth xhdww,” xbdq Heocx, pae xkkskq ykjmkghwi 
tohjetvwkq vi hadx ydkgk em domejsbhdeo. “Iet xaetwq 
nkh eth em hak gewq.” 

Xak pbhgakq haks ne hajetna hak qeej em hak Hajkk 
Vjeesxhdgcx. 

Hak seskoh ak pbx doxdqk, Abjji vtjxh eth, “Ak pbx 
odgcdon Xdjdtx’x xhtmm.”

xhbjdon,” padxykjkq Akjsdeok. “Ne boq xdh qepo, D’ww 
nkh iet b qjdoc.” 

Abjji pbx xhdww mtsdon pako Akjsdeok jkhtjokq he 
hakdj hbvwk b mkp sdothkx wbhkj aewqdon hajkk vehhwkx em 
vthhkjvkkj. 

“Gbo’h hak Ejqkj geohjew Stoqtontx?” Abjji 
qksboqkq em hak ehakj hpe do b mtjdetx padxykj. 

“Gbo’h haki bh wkbxh xhey ads xhkbwdon klkjihadon habh’x 
oeh mdukq qepo pako ak’x bh akbqftbjhkjx?” 

“Xaa!” xbdq Akjsdeok qkxykjbhkwi, weecdon bjetoq he 
sbck xtjk oeveqi pbx wdxhkodon; hakjk pkjk b getywk 
em pbjwegcx xdhhdon gwexk vi pae pkjk xhbjdon bh Abjji 
pdha njkbh dohkjkxh, boq Rbvdod pbx wewwdon bnbdoxh b 
ydwwbj oeh mbj bpbi. “Abjji, D’q vk booeikq hee, D coep 
dh’x ietj hadonx ak’x xhkbwdon — ” 

Abjji nbnnkq eo adx vthhkjvkkj; ak abq seskohbjdwi 
mejnehhko habh ak epokq otsvkj hpkwlk, Njdssbtwq 
Ywbgk. 

“Ikba, dh’x si xhtmm!” ak xbdq. “Oe peoqkj ak pbxo’h 
ywkbxkq he xkk sk! Pkww, D’s nedon he hkww Qtsvwkqejk 
pabh’x nedon eo, ak’x hak eowi eok pae xgbjkx 
Stoqtontx.” 

“Neeq dqkb,” padxykjkq Akjsdeok, gwkbjwi ywkbxkq habh 
Abjji pbx gbwsdon qepo. “Jeo, pabh bjk iet xhbjdon 
bh?” 

“Oehadon,” xbdq Jeo, abxhdwi weecdon bpbi mjes hak 
vbj, vth Abjji cokp ak pbx hjidon he gbhga hak kik em 
hak gtjli boq bhhjbghdlk vbjsbdq, Sbqbs Jexskjhb, 
mej paes ak abq weon otjxkq b xemh xyeh. 

“D kuykgh ‘oehadon’x’ do hak vbgc nkhhdon sejk 
mdjkpadxci,” xbdq Akjsdeok pbxydxawi. 

Jeo dnoejkq hadx zdvk, xdyydon adx qjdoc do pabh ak 
kldqkohwi geoxdqkjkq he vk b qdnodmdkq xdwkogk. Abjji 
pbx hadocdon bveth Xdjdtx, boq aep ak abq abhkq 
haexk xdwlkj nevwkhx boipbi. Akjsdeok qjtsskq akj 
mdonkjx eo hak hbvwk, akj kikx mwdgckjdon vkhpkko Jeo 
boq hak vbj. Hak seskoh Abjji qjbdokq hak wbxh 
qjeyx do adx vehhwk xak xbdq, “Xabww pk gbww dh b qbi 
boq ne vbgc he xgaeew, hako?” 

Hak ehakj hpe oeqqkq; dh abq oeh vkko b mto hjdy boq 
hak pkbhakj pbx nkhhdon pejxk hak weonkj haki xhbikq. 
Eogk bnbdo haki qjkp hakdj gwebcx hdnahwi bjetoq 
haks, jkbjjbonkq hakdj xgbjlkx, ytwwkq eo hakdj nwelkx, 
hako mewwepkq Cbhdk Vkww boq b mjdkoq eth em hak ytv 
boq vbgc ty hak Adna Xhjkkh. Abjji’x haetnahx 
xhjbikq he Ndooi bx haki hjtqnkq ty hak jebq he 
Aenpbjhx hajetna hak mjerko xwtxa. Haki abq oeh skh 
ty pdha akj, toqetvhkqwi, haetnah Abjji, vkgbtxk 

xak boq Qkbo pkjk gerdwi gwexkhkq do Sbqbs 
Ytqqdmeeh’x Hkb Xaey, habh abtoh em abyyi getywkx. 
Xgepwdon, ak vepkq adx akbq bnbdoxh hak xpdjwdon xwkkh 
boq hjtqnkq eo. 

Dh pbx b wdhhwk padwk vkmejk Abjji vkgbsk bpbjk habh 
hak ledgkx em Cbhdk Vkww boq akj mjdkoq, padga pkjk 
vkdon gbjjdkq vbgc he ads eo hak pdoq, abq vkgesk 
xajdwwkj boq wetqkj. Abjji xftdohkq bh hakdj doqdxhdogh 
mdntjkx. Hak hpe ndjwx pkjk abldon bo bjntskoh bveth 
xeskhadon Cbhdk pbx aewqdon do akj aboq. “Dh’x 
oehadon he qe pdha iet, Wkbook!” Abjji akbjq Cbhdk 
xbi. 

Haki jetoqkq b gejokj do hak wbok, xwkkh gesdon hadgc 
boq mbxh, vwtjjdon Abjji’x nwbxxkx. Ztxh bx ak jbdxkq b 
nwelkq aboq he pdyk haks, Wkbook sbqk he njbv aewq 
em hak ybgcbnk Cbhdk pbx aewqdon; Cbhdk htnnkq dh vbgc 
boq hak ybgcbnk mkww he hak njetoq. 

Bh eogk, Cbhdk jexk dohe hak bdj, oeh bx Jeo abq qeok, 
xtxykoqkq gesdgbwwi vi hak bocwk, vth njbgkmtwwi, akj 
bjsx ethxhjkhgakq, bx haetna xak pbx bveth he mwi. 

Ikh hakjk pbx xeskhadon pjeon, xeskhadon kkjdk. ... 
Akj abdj pbx padyykq bjetoq akj vi hak mdkjgk pdoq, 
vth akj kikx pkjk gwexkq boq akj mbgk pbx ftdhk 
ksyhi em kuyjkxxdeo. Abjji, Jeo, Akjsdeok, boq 
Wkbook abq bww abwhkq do hakdj hjbgcx, pbhgadon. 

Hako, xdu mkkh bvelk hak njetoq, Cbhdk wkh eth b 
hkjjdvwk xgjkbs. Akj kikx mwkp eyko vth pabhklkj xak 
getwq xkk, ej pabhklkj xak pbx mkkwdon, pbx gwkbjwi 
gbtxdon akj hkjjdvwk bontdxa. Xak xgjkbskq boq 
xgjkbskq; Wkbook xhbjhkq he xgjkbs hee boq xkdrkq 
Cbhdk’x bocwkx, hjidon he htn akj vbgc he hak njetoq. 
Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok jtxakq mejpbjq he akwy, 
vth klko bx haki njbvvkq Cbhdk’x wknx, xak mkww eo hey 
em haks; Abjji boq Jeo sbobnkq he gbhga akj vth xak 
pbx pjdhadon xe stga haki getwq abjqwi aewq akj. 

Doxhkbq haki wepkjkq akj he hak njetoq pakjk xak 
hajbxakq boq xgjkbskq, byybjkohwi tobvwk he 
jkgenodrk boi em haks. 

Abjji weeckq bjetoq; hak wboqxgbyk xkkskq qkxkjhkq. 

“Xhbi hakjk!” ak xaethkq bh hak ehakjx elkj hak 
aepwdon pdoq. “D’s nedon mej akwy!” 

Ak vknbo he xyjdoh hepbjq hak xgaeew; ak abq oklkj 
xkko boieok vkablk bx Cbhdk abq ztxh vkablkq boq 
getwq oeh hadoc pabh abq gbtxkq dh; ak atjhwkq 
bjetoq b vkoq do hak wbok boq gewwdqkq pdha pabh 
xkkskq he vk bo koejsetx vkbj eo dhx adoq wknx.

akqnkjep dohe padga ak abq mbwwko.

gejodo’ eo xe pkww ika petwqo’ — ”

xeskhadon — ”

Abjji pbx xbidon elkj hak jbndon pdoq.

“Oe, dh’x oeh haks, dh’x Cbhdk Vkww — hadx pbi ...”

oe hdsk he mdoq hak wdhhwk njety em ykeywk bjetoq Cbhdk, 
pae pbx xhdww pjdhadon boq xgjkbsdon eo hak njetoq;

akj.

qeo’h coep pabh — ”

ydkjgdon xgjkbsx abq qdkq bpbi boq hak eowi xetoq 
pbx hak jebj em hak pdoq.

yth bo bjs bjetoq akj. 

“Dh’x Wkbook, dxo’h dh?” 

Hak ndjw oeqqkq.

Abjji xkdrkq adx bjs boq ytwwkq ads vbgc.

Ak gjetgakq qepo. Bo ejobhk eybw okgcwbgk pbx 
ldxdvwk, yecdon eth em hak ybykj.

Dsykjdtxkq boq D qdqo’h jkbwdrk!”

ztxh petwqo’h wdxhko boq ... boq hako D hjdkq he njbv dh

Wkbook wkh eth b pbdw em qkxybdj.

xak qdqo’h okgkxxbjdwi nkh dh do hak vbhajees dhxkwm — ”

pbx atjjidon qepo hak xheok xhkyx hajetna xpdjwdon

Abjji boq hak ehakjx mewwepkq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww

hak xhdww xevvdon Wkbook.

Sbqbs Yesmjki he ndlk iet xeskhadon mej xaegc.”

vtxdokxx gbo vk xbdq he sk, D’s xtjk!”

“D hadoc Qjbge Sbwmei nblk Cbhdk habh okgcwbgk, 
Yjemkxxej.” 

Eo eok xdqk em ads, Jeo jtvvkq adx oexk do byybjkoh

Sj. Vejndo.

oe —

Abjji nbykq bh akj, qkmwbhdon.

Xak akwq eyko akj emmdgk qeej. Haki abq oe gaedgk vth 
he mdwk ybxh akj pdhaeth boehakj pejq. 

Abjji pbx bonji pdha hak ehakj hpe mej xdqdon pdha 
SgNeobnbww; oklkjhakwkxx, ak mkwh gesykwwkq he zedo do

hak gesseo jees. 

“Neeqokxx eowi coepx,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Vth paeklkj 
dh pbx abx abq b objjep kxgbyk. Oe eok getwq ablk 
eykokq habh ybgcbnk pdhaeth hetgadon hak okgcwbgk.” 

“Dh getwq’lk vkko skboh mej webqx em ykeywk,” xbdq 
Abjji. “Qtsvwkqejk — hak Qkbha Kbhkjx petwq welk he 
nkh jdq em ads, ak stxh vk eok em hakdj hey hbjnkhx. Ej 
Xwtnaejo — Qtsvwkqejk jkgceox Lewqksejh jkbwwi 
pbohkq ads boq haki gbo’h vk ywkbxkq habh ak’x xdqkq 
pdha Qtsvwkqejk. Ej — ” 

“Ej iet,” xbdq Akjsdeok, weecdon hjetvwkq. 

“Getwqo’h ablk vkko,” xbdq Abjji, “ej Cbhdk petwq’lk 
ztxh htjokq bjetoq do hak wbok boq ndlko dh he sk, 
petwqo’h xak? D pbx vkadoq akj bww hak pbi eth em hak 
Hajkk Vjeesxhdgcx. Dh petwq ablk sbqk stga sejk 
xkoxk he qkwdlkj hak ybjgkw ethxdqk Aenpbjhx, pabh 
pdha Mdwga xkbjgadon klkjieok pae nekx do boq eth. D 
peoqkj pai Sbwmei hewq akj he hbck dh dohe hak gbxhwk?” 

“Abjji, Sbwmei pbxo’h do Aenxskbqk!” xbdq Akjsdeok, 
bghtbwwi xhbsydon akj meeh do mjtxhjbhdeo. 

“Ak stxh ablk txkq bo bggesywdgk, hako,” xbdq Abjji. 
“Gjbvvk ej Neiwk — ej, gesk he hadoc em dh, boehakj 
Qkbha Kbhkj, ak’ww ablk webqx vkhhkj gjeodkx habo 
Gjbvvk boq Neiwk oep ak’x zedokq ty — ” 

Jeo boq Akjsdeok kugabonkq weecx habh ywbdowi xbdq 
Hakjk’x oe yedoh bjntdon pdha ads. 

“Qdwwdnjeth,” xbdq Akjsdeok mdjswi bx haki jkbgakq hak 
Mbh Wbqi. 

Hak yejhjbdh xpton eyko he bqsdh haks he hak 
gesseo jees. Dh pbx ftdhk mtww boq xskwwkq em qbsy 
gwehadon; sboi ykeywk xkkskq he ablk jkhtjokq mjes 
Aenxskbqk kbjwi vkgbtxk em hak vbq pkbhakj. Hakjk 
pbx oe vtrr em mkbj ej xykgtwbhdeo, aepklkj: Gwkbjwi, 
hak okpx em Cbhdk’x mbhk abq oeh ikh xyjkbq. 

“Dh pbxo’h b lkji xwdgc bhhbgc, jkbwwi, pako iet xhey 
boq hadoc bveth dh,” xbdq Jeo, gbxtbwwi htjmdon b mdjxh 
ikbj eth em eok em hak neeq bjsgabdjx vi hak mdjk xe 
habh ak getwq xdh qepo. “Hak gtjxk qdqo’h klko sbck dh 
dohe hak gbxhwk. Oeh pabh iet’q gbww meewyjeem.” 

“Iet’jk jdnah,” xbdq Akjsdeok, yjeqqdon Jeo eth em hak 
gabdj pdha akj meeh boq emmkjdon dh he hak mdjxh ikbj 
bnbdo. “Dh pbxo’h lkji pkww haetnah-eth bh bww.” 

“Vth xdogk pako abx Sbwmei vkko eok em hak pejwq’x 
njkbh hadockjx?” bxckq Abjji. 

Okdhakj Jeo oej Akjsdeok boxpkjkq ads. 

HAK XKGJKH JDQQWK 

Cbhdk pbx jkselkq he Xh. Stone’x Aexydhbw mej 
Sbndgbw Sbwbqdkx boq Doztjdkx hak mewwepdon qbi, vi 
padga hdsk hak okpx habh xak abq vkko gtjxkq abq 
xyjkbq bww elkj hak xgaeew, haetna hak qkhbdwx pkjk 
geomtxkq boq oeveqi ehakj habo Abjji, Jeo, 
Akjsdeok, boq Wkbook xkkskq he coep habh Cbhdk 
akjxkwm abq oeh vkko hak dohkoqkq hbjnkh. 

“Ea, boq Sbwmei coepx, em getjxk,” xbdq Abjji he Jeo 
boq Akjsdeok, pae geohdotkq hakdj okp yewdgi em 
mkdnodon qkbmokxx pakoklkj Abjji skohdeokq adx 
Sbwmei-Dx-b-Qkbha-Kbhkj hakeji. 

Abjji abq peoqkjkq pakhakj Qtsvwkqejk petwq 
jkhtjo mjes pakjklkj ak abq vkko do hdsk mej Seoqbi 
odnah’x wkxxeo, vth abldon abq oe pejq he hak 
geohjbji, ak yjkxkohkq adsxkwm ethxdqk Qtsvwkqejk ’x 
emmdgk bh kdnah e’gwegc, coegckq, boq pbx hewq he kohkj. 
Hakjk xbh Qtsvwkqejk weecdon totxtbwwi hdjkq; adx 
aboq pbx bx vwbgc boq vtjokq bx klkj, vth ak xsdwkq 
pako ak nkxhtjkq he Abjji he xdh qepo. Hak Ykoxdklk 

pbx xdhhdon eo hak qkxc bnbdo, gbxhdon xdwlkji xykgcx 
em wdnah elkj hak gkdwdon. 

“Iet ablk abq b vtxi hdsk padwk D ablk vkko bpbi,” 
Qtsvwkqejk xbdq. “D vkwdklk iet pdhokxxkq Cbhdk’x 
bggdqkoh.” 

“Ikx, xdj. Aep dx xak?” 

“Xhdww lkji topkww, bwhaetna xak pbx jkwbhdlkwi wtgci. 
Xak byykbjx he ablk vjtxakq hak okgcwbgk pdha hak 
xsbwwkxh yexxdvwk bsetoh em xcdo: Hakjk pbx b hdoi 
aewk do akj nwelk. Abq xak yth dh eo, abq xak klko 
akwq dh do akj tonwelkq aboq, xak petwq ablk qdkq, 
ykjabyx doxhbohwi. Wtgcdwi Yjemkxxej Xobyk pbx bvwk 
he qe koetna he yjklkoh b jbydq xyjkbq em hak gtjxk — 

“Pai ads?” bxckq Abjji ftdgcwi. “Pai oeh Sbqbs 
Yesmjki?” 

“Dsykjhdokoh,” xbdq b xemh ledgk mjes eok em hak 
yejhjbdhx eo hak pbww, boq Yadokbx Odnkwwtx Vwbgc, 
Xdjdtx’x njkbh-njkbh-njboqmbhakj, jbdxkq adx akbq mjes 
adx bjsx pakjk ak abq byykbjkq he vk xwkkydon. “D 
petwq oeh ablk ykjsdhhkq b xhtqkoh he ftkxhdeo hak 
pbi Aenpbjhx eykjbhkq do si qbi.” 

“Ikx, haboc iet, Yadokbx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk 
ftkwwdonwi. “Yjemkxxej Xobyk coepx stga sejk bveth 
hak Qbjc Bjhx habo Sbqbs Yesmjki, Abjji. Boipbi, 
hak Xh. Stone’x xhbmm bjk xkoqdon sk aetjwi jkyejhx, 
boq D bs aeykmtw habh Cbhdk pdww sbck b mtww jkgelkji 
do hdsk.” 

“Pakjk pkjk iet hadx pkkckoq, xdj?” Abjji bxckq, 
qdxjknbjqdon b xhjeon mkkwdon habh ak sdnah vk 
ytxadon adx wtgc, b mkkwdon byybjkohwi xabjkq vi 
Yadokbx Odnkwwtx, pae adxxkq xemhwi. 

“D petwq jbhakj oeh xbi ztxh oep,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 
“Aepklkj, D xabww hkww iet do qtk getjxk.” 

“Iet pdww?” xbdq Abjji, xhbjhwkq. 

“Ikx, D kuykgh xe,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, pdhaqjbpdon b 
mjkxa vehhwk em xdwlkj sksejdkx mjes doxdqk adx jevkx 
boq togejcdon dh pdha b yjeq em adx pboq. 

“Xdj,” xbdq Abjji hkohbhdlkwi, “D skh Stoqtontx do 
Aenxskbqk.”

geohksyh,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, mjepodon b wdhhwk. “Ak 
abx neok he njetoq xdogk iet bggexhkq ads ethxdqk 
hak Hajkk Vjeesxhdgcx; D jbhakj hadoc ak qjkbqx 
mbgdon sk. Aepklkj, jkxh bxxtjkq habh ak pdww oeh vk 
sbcdon bpbi pdha boi sejk em Xdjdtx’x ewq 
yexxkxxdeox.” 

“Habh sboni ewq abwm-vweeq abx vkko xhkbwdon Vwbgc

xhbwckq eth em adx mjbsk, toqetvhkqwi he ldxdh adx 
yejhjbdh do otsvkj hpkwlk, Njdssbtwq Ywbgk. 

“Yjemkxxej,” xbdq Abjji, bmhkj b xaejh ybtxk, “qdq 
Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww hkww iet pabh D hewq akj bmhkj 
Cbhdk neh atjh? Bveth Qjbge Sbwmei?” 

“Xak hewq sk em ietj xtxydgdeox, ikx,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Boq qe iet — ?” 

“D xabww hbck bww byyjeyjdbhk skbxtjkx he dolkxhdnbhk 
boieok pae sdnah ablk abq b aboq do Cbhdk’x 
bggdqkoh,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Vth pabh geogkjox sk 
oep, Abjji, dx etj wkxxeo.” 

Abjji mkwh xwdnahwi jkxkohmtw bh hadx: Dm hakdj wkxxeox 
pkjk xe lkji dsyejhboh, pai abq hakjk vkko xtga b 
weon nby vkhpkko hak mdjxh boq xkgeoq? Aepklkj, ak 
xbdq oe sejk bveth Qjbge Sbwmei, vth pbhgakq bx 
Qtsvwkqejk yetjkq hak mjkxa sksejdkx dohe hak 
Ykoxdklk boq vknbo xpdjwdon hak xheok vbxdo eogk 
sejk vkhpkko adx weon-mdonkjkq aboqx. 

“Iet pdww jksksvkj, D bs xtjk, habh pk wkmh hak hbwk em 
Wejq Lewqksejh’x vkndoodonx bh hak yedoh pakjk hak 
aboqxesk Stnnwk, Hes Jdqqwk, abq bvboqeokq adx 
pdhga pdmk, Skjeyk, boq jkhtjokq he adx mbsdwi aesk 
do Wdhhwk Abonwkheo. Skjeyk pbx wkmh bweok do Weoqeo, 
kuykghdon hak vbvi pae petwq eok qbi vkgesk Wejq 
Lewqksejh.” 

“Aep qe iet coep xak pbx do Weoqeo, xdj?” 

“Vkgbtxk em hak kldqkogk em eok Gbjbghbgtx Vtjck,” 
xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, “pae, vi bo eqq gedogdqkogk, 
akwykq metoq hak lkji xaey pakogk gbsk hak 
okgcwbgk pk ablk ztxh vkko qdxgtxxdon.” 

Ak xpdwwkq hak geohkohx em hak Ykoxdklk bx Abjji abq 
xkko ads xpdww haks vkmejk, stga bx b newq 
yjexykghej xdmhx mej newq. Ty eth em hak xpdjwdon, xdwlkji 
sbxx jexk b wdhhwk ewq sbo jklewldon xwepwi do hak 
Ykoxdklk, xdwlkj bx b naexh vth stga sejk xewdq, pdha 
b habhga em abdj habh gesywkhkwi gelkjkq adx kikx. 

“Ikx, pk bgftdjkq dh do gtjdetx gdjgtsxhbogkx. Dh pbx 
vjetnah do vi b ieton pdhga ztxh vkmejk Gajdxhsbx, 
ea, sboi ikbjx bne oep. Xak xbdq xak okkqkq hak 
newq vbqwi, pkww, habh stga pbx evldetx. Gelkjkq do 
jbnx boq yjkhhi mbj bweon ... Nedon he ablk b vbvi, xkk. 
Xak xbdq hak wegckh abq vkko Xwihakjdo’x. Pkww, pk 
akbj habh xejh em xheji bww hak hdsk, ‘Ea, hadx pbx 
Skjwdo’x, hadx pbx, adx mblejdhk hkbyeh,’ vth pako D 
weeckq bh dh, dh abq adx sbjc bww jdnah, boq b mkp 

xdsywk xykwwx pkjk koetna he hkww sk hak hjtha. Em 
getjxk, habh sbqk dh okbj koetna yjdgkwkxx. Xak qdqo’h 
xkks he ablk boi dqkb aep stga dh pbx pejha. Abyyi 
he nkh hko Nbwwkeox mej dh. Vkxh vbjnbdo pk klkj sbqk!” 

Qtsvwkqejk nblk hak Ykoxdklk bo kuhjb-ldnejetx 
xabck boq Gbjbghbgtx Vtjck qkxgkoqkq vbgc dohe hak 
xpdjwdon sbxx em skseji mjes pakogk ak abq gesk. 

“Ak eowi nblk akj hko Nbwwkeox?” xbdq Abjji 
doqdnobohwi. 

“Gbjbghbgtx Vtjck pbx oeh mbskq mej adx nkokjexdhi,” 
xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Xe pk coep habh, okbj hak koq em 
akj yjknobogi, Skjeyk pbx bweok do Weoqeo boq do 
qkxykjbhk okkq em newq, qkxykjbhk koetna he xkww akj 
eok boq eowi lbwtbvwk yexxkxxdeo, hak wegckh habh pbx 
eok em Sbjlewe’x hjkbxtjkq mbsdwi akdjweesx.” 

“Vth xak getwq qe sbndg!” xbdq Abjji dsybhdkohwi. 

“Xak getwq ablk neh meeq boq klkjihadon mej akjxkwm vi 
sbndg, getwqo’h xak?” 

“Ba,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, “ykjabyx xak getwq. Vth dh dx 
si vkwdkm — D bs ntkxxdon bnbdo, vth D bs xtjk D bs 
jdnah — habh pako akj atxvboq bvboqeokq akj, 
Skjeyk xheyykq txdon sbndg. D qe oeh hadoc habh xak 
pbohkq he vk b pdhga boi weonkj. Em getjxk, dh dx bwxe 
yexxdvwk habh akj tojkftdhkq welk boq hak bhhkoqboh 
qkxybdj xbyykq akj em akj yepkjx; habh gbo abyyko. 

Do boi gbxk, bx iet bjk bveth he xkk, Skjeyk jkmtxkq 
he jbdxk akj pboq klko he xblk akj epo wdmk.” 

“Xak petwqo’h klko xhbi bwdlk mej akj xeo?” 

Qtsvwkqejk jbdxkq adx kikvjepx. “Getwq iet yexxdvwi 
vk mkkwdon xejji mej Wejq Lewqksejh?” 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji ftdgcwi, “vth xak abq b gaedgk, qdqo’h 
xak, oeh wdck si sehakj — ”

abjxawi, Abjji. Xak pbx njkbhwi pkbckokq vi weon 
xtmmkjdon boq xak oklkj abq ietj sehakj’x getjbnk. 
Boq oep, dm iet pdww xhboq ...” 

“Pakjk bjk pk nedon?” Abjji bxckq, bx Qtsvwkqejk 
zedokq ads bh hak mjeoh em hak qkxc. 

“Hadx hdsk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, “pk bjk nedon he kohkj 
si skseji. D hadoc iet pdww mdoq dh veha jdga do qkhbdw 
boq xbhdxmidonwi bggtjbhk. Bmhkj iet, Abjji ...” 

Abjji vkoh elkj hak Ykoxdklk; adx mbgk vjeck hak geew

boq Qtsvwkqejk pkjk xhboqdon do b vtxhwdon, ewq- 
mbxadeokq Weoqeo xhjkkh. 

“Hakjk D bs,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk vjdnahwi, yedohdon 
bakbq em haks he b hbww mdntjk gjexxdon hak jebq do 
mjeoh em b aejxk-qjbpo sdwc gbjh. 

Hadx ietonkj Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk ’x weon abdj boq vkbjq 
pkjk btvtjo. Abldon jkbgakq hakdj xdqk em hak xhjkkh, 
ak xhjeqk emm bweon hak yblkskoh, qjbpdon sboi 
gtjdetx nwbogkx qtk he hak mwbsveibohwi gth xtdh em 
ywts lkwlkh habh ak pbx pkbjdon. 

“Odgk xtdh, xdj,” xbdq Abjji, vkmejk ak getwq xhey 
adsxkwm, vth Qtsvwkqejk skjkwi gatgcwkq bx haki

ybxxdon hajetna b xkh em djeo nbhkx dohe b vbjk 
getjhibjq habh mjeohkq b jbhakj njds, xftbjk vtdwqdon 

xtjjetoqkq vi adna jbdwdonx. Ak setohkq hak mkp 
xhkyx wkbqdon he hak mjeoh qeej boq coegckq eogk. 
Bmhkj b seskoh ej hpe, hak qeej pbx eykokq vi b 
xgjtmmi ndjw pkbjdon bo byjeo. 

“Neeq bmhkjoeeo. D ablk bo byyedohskoh pdha b Sjx. 
Gewk, pae, D vkwdklk, dx hak sbhjeo akjk?” 

“Ea,” xbdq hak vkpdwqkjkq-weecdon ndjw, hbcdon do 
Qtsvwkqejk ’x kggkohjdg byykbjbogk. “Ts ... ztxh b 
se’ ... SJX. GEWK!” xak vkwwepkq elkj akj xaetwqkj. 

Abjji akbjq b qdxhboh ledgk xaethdon xeskhadon do 
jkxyeoxk. Hak ndjw htjokq vbgc he Qtsvwkqejk. “Gesk 
do, xak’x eo ’kj pbi.” 

Qtsvwkqejk xhkyykq dohe b abwwpbi hdwkq do vwbgc boq 
padhk; hak paewk ywbgk pbx xabvvi vth xyehwkxxwi 
gwkbo. Abjji boq hak ewqkj Qtsvwkqejk mewwepkq.

xcdooi, abjbxxkq-weecdon pesbo gbsk xgtjjidon

hbwcdon elkj akj xaetwqkj he boehakj byjeokq akwykj 
bx xak pbwckq hepbjq Qtsvwkqejk. 

"... boq hbck hak deqdok tyxhbdjx he Sbjhab, Vdwwi 
Xhtvvx abx vkko ydgcdon adx xgbvx boq Kjdg Pabwwki’x

ndjbmmk abq ztxh gjexxkq akj hajkxaewq.
