aboq. 

Sjx. Gewk xdsywi nbykq. 

“Si obsk dx Bwvtx Qtsvwkqejk. D xkoh iet b wkhhkj 
jkftkxhdon bo byyedohskoh boq iet lkji cdoqwi 
doldhkq sk akjk heqbi.” 

Sjx. Gewk vwdockq. Byybjkohwi qkgdqdon habh 
Qtsvwkqejk pbx oeh b abwwtgdobhdeo, xak xbdq mkkvwi, 
“Ea ikx. Pkww — pkww hako — iet’q vkhhkj gesk dohe 
si jees. Ikx.” 

Xak wkq Qtsvwkqejk dohe b xsbww jees habh xkkskq 
ybjh xdhhdon jees, ybjh emmdgk. Dh pbx bx xabvvi bx hak 
abwwpbi boq hak mtjodhtjk pbx ewq boq sdxsbhgakq. 
Xak doldhkq Qtsvwkqejk he xdh eo b jdgckhi gabdj boq 
xkbhkq akjxkwm vkadoq b gwthhkjkq qkxc, kikdon ads 
okjletxwi. 

“D bs akjk, bx D hewq iet do si wkhhkj, he qdxgtxx Hes 
Jdqqwk boq bjjbonkskohx mej adx mthtjk,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Bjk iet mbsdwi?” bxckq Sjx. Gewk. 

“Oe, D bs b hkbgakj,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “D ablk gesk 
he emmkj Hes b ywbgk bh si xgaeew.” 

“Pabh xgaeew’x hadx, hako?” 

“Dh dx gbwwkq Aenpbjhx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Boq aep gesk iet’jk dohkjkxhkq do Hes?” 

“Pk vkwdklk ak abx ftbwdhdkx pk bjk weecdon mej.” 

“Iet skbo ak’x peo b xgaewbjxady? Aep gbo ak ablk 
qeok? Ak’x oklkj vkko kohkjkq mej eok.” 

“Pkww, adx obsk abx vkko qepo mej etj xgaeew xdogk 
vdjha — ” 

“Pae jkndxhkjkq ads? Adx ybjkohx?” 

Hakjk pbx oe qetvh habh Sjx. Gewk pbx bo 
dogeolkodkohwi xabjy pesbo. Byybjkohwi Qtsvwkqejk 
haetnah xe hee, mej Abjji oep xbp ads xwdy adx pboq 
eth em hak yegckh em adx lkwlkh xtdh, bh hak xbsk hdsk 
ydgcdon ty b ydkgk em ykjmkghwi vwboc ybykj mjes Sjx. 
Gewk’x qkxchey. 

“Akjk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, pbldon adx pboq eogk bx ak 
ybxxkq akj hak ydkgk em ybykj, “D hadoc hadx pdww sbck 
klkjihadon gwkbj.” 

Sjx. Gewk’x kikx xwdq eth em megtx boq vbgc bnbdo bx 
xak nbrkq dohkohwi bh hak vwboc ybykj mej b seskoh. 

“Habh xkksx ykjmkghwi do ejqkj,” xak xbdq ywbgdqwi, 
aboqdon dh vbgc. Hako akj kikx mkww tyeo b vehhwk em 
ndo boq hpe nwbxxkx habh abq gkjhbdowi oeh vkko 
yjkxkoh b mkp xkgeoqx vkmejk. 

“Kj — sbi D emmkj iet b nwbxx em ndo?” xak xbdq do bo 
kuhjb-jkmdokq ledgk. 

“Haboc iet lkji stga,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, vkbsdon. 

Dh xeeo vkgbsk gwkbj habh Sjx. Gewk pbx oe oeldgk 
pako dh gbsk he ndo qjdocdon. Yetjdon veha em haks b 
nkokjetx skbxtjk, xak qjbdokq akj epo nwbxx do eok 
ntwy. Xsbgcdon akj wdyx mjbocwi, xak xsdwkq bh 
Qtsvwkqejk mej hak mdjxh hdsk, boq ak qdqo’h akxdhbhk 
he yjkxx adx bqlbohbnk. 

“D pbx peoqkjdon pakhakj iet getwq hkww sk boihadon 
em Hes Jdqqwk’x adxheji? D hadoc ak pbx vejo akjk do 
hak ejyabobnk?” 

“Habh’x jdnah,” xbdq Sjx. Gewk, akwydon akjxkwm he sejk 
ndo. “D jksksvkj dh gwkbj bx boihadon, vkgbtxk D’q ztxh 

xhbjhkq akjk sixkwm. Okp Ikbj’x Klk boq vdhhkj gewq, 
xoepdon, iet coep. Obxhi odnah. Boq hadx ndjw, oeh 
stga ewqkj habo D pbx sixkwm bh hak hdsk, gbsk 
xhbnnkjdon ty hak mjeoh xhkyx. Pkww, xak pbxo’h hak 
mdjxh. Pk heec akj do, boq xak abq hak vbvi pdhado hak 
aetj. Boq xak pbx qkbq do boehakj aetj.” 

Sjx. Gewk oeqqkq dsyjkxxdlkwi boq heec boehakj 
nkokjetx ntwy em ndo. 

“Qdq xak xbi boihadon vkmejk xak qdkq?” bxckq 
Qtsvwkqejk. “Boihadon bveth hak vei’x mbhakj, mej 
doxhbogk?” 

“Oep, bx dh abyykox, xak qdq,” xbdq Sjx. Gewk, pae 
xkkskq he vk jbhakj kozeidon akjxkwm oep, pdha hak ndo 
do akj aboq boq bo kbnkj btqdkogk mej akj xheji. “D 
jksksvkj xak xbdq he sk, ‘D aeyk ak weecx wdck adx 
ybyb,’ boq D peo’h wdk, xak pbx jdnah he aeyk dh, 
vkgbtxk xak pbx oe vkbthi — boq hako xak hewq sk 
ak pbx he vk obskq Hes, mej adx mbhakj, boq Sbjlewe, 
mej akj mbhakj — ikx, D coep, mtooi obsk, dxo’h dh? Pk 
peoqkjkq pakhakj xak gbsk mjes b gdjgtx — boq xak 
xbdq hak vei’x xtjobsk pbx he vk Jdqqwk. Boq xak 
qdkq xeeo bmhkj habh pdhaeth boehakj pejq. 

“Pkww, pk obskq ads ztxh bx xak’q xbdq, dh xkkskq xe 
dsyejhboh he hak yeej ndjw, vth oe Hes oej Sbjlewe 
oej boi cdoq em Jdqqwk klkj gbsk weecdon mej ads, oej 
boi mbsdwi bh bww, xe ak xhbikq do hak ejyabobnk boq 
ak’x vkko akjk klkj xdogk.” 

Sjx. Gewk akwykq akjxkwm, bwsexh bvxkohsdoqkqwi, he 
boehakj akbwhai skbxtjk em ndo. Hpe ydoc xyehx abq 
byykbjkq adna eo akj gakkcveokx. Hako xak xbdq, 
“Ak’x b mtooi vei.” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “D haetnah ak sdnah vk.” 

“Ak pbx b mtooi vbvi hee. Ak abjqwi klkj gjdkq, iet 
coep. Boq hako, pako ak neh b wdhhwk ewqkj, ak pbx . . . 
eqq.” 

“Eqq do pabh pbi?” bxckq Qtsvwkqejk nkohwi. 

“Pkww, ak — ” 

Vth Sjx. Gewk ytwwkq ty xaejh, boq hakjk pbx oehadon 
vwtjji ej lbntk bveth hak doftdxdhejdbw nwbogk xak 
xaeh Qtsvwkqejk elkj akj ndo nwbxx. 

“Ak’x qkmdodhkwi neh b ywbgk bh ietj xgaeew, iet xbi?” 

“Qkmdodhkwi,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Boq oehadon D xbi gbo gabonk habh?” 

“Oehadon,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Iet’ww vk hbcdon ads bpbi, pabhklkj?” 

“Pabhklkj,” jkykbhkq Qtsvwkqejk njblkwi. 

Xak xftdohkq bh ads bx haetna qkgdqdon pakhakj ej 
oeh he hjtxh ads. Byybjkohwi xak qkgdqkq xak getwq, 
vkgbtxk xak xbdq do b xtqqko jtxa, “Ak xgbjkx hak 
ehakj gadwqjko.” 

“Iet skbo ak dx b vtwwi?” bxckq Qtsvwkqejk. 

“D hadoc ak stxh vk,” xbdq Sjx. Gewk, mjepodon 
xwdnahwi, “vth dh’x lkji abjq he gbhga ads bh dh. Hakjk 
ablk vkko dogdqkohx. ... Obxhi hadonx ...” 

Qtsvwkqejk qdq oeh yjkxx akj, haetna Abjji getwq 
hkww habh ak pbx dohkjkxhkq. Xak heec ikh boehakj ntwy 
em ndo boq akj jexi gakkcx njkp jexdkj xhdww. 

“Vdwwi Xhtvvx’x jbvvdh ... pkww, Hes xbdq ak qdqo’h qe dh 
boq D qeo’h xkk aep ak getwq ablk qeok, vth klko xe, 
dh qdqo’h abon dhxkwm mjes hak jbmhkjx, qdq dh?” 

“D xaetwqo’h hadoc xe, oe,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk ftdkhwi. 

“Vth D’s zdnnkjkq dm D coep aep ak neh ty hakjk he qe 
dh. Bww D coep dx ak boq Vdwwi abq bjntkq hak qbi 
vkmejk. Boq hako” — Sjx. Gewk heec boehakj xpdn em 
ndo, xweyydon b wdhhwk elkj akj gado hadx hdsk — “eo hak 
xtsskj ethdon — pk hbck haks eth, iet coep, eogk 
b ikbj, he hak getohjixdqk ej he hak xkbxdqk — pkww, 
Bsi Vkoxeo boq Qkoodx Vdxaey pkjk oklkj ftdhk 
jdnah bmhkjpbjqx, boq bww pk klkj neh eth em haks pbx 
habh haki’q neok dohe b gblk pdha Hes Jdqqwk. Ak 
xpejk haki’q ztxh neok kuywejdon, vth xeskhadon 
abyykokq do hakjk, D’s xtjk em dh. Boq, pkww, hakjk 
ablk vkko b weh em hadonx, mtooi hadonx. ...” 

Xak weeckq bjetoq bh Qtsvwkqejk bnbdo, boq haetna 
akj gakkcx pkjk mwtxakq, akj nbrk pbx xhkbqi. “D qeo’h 
hadoc sboi ykeywk pdww vk xejji he xkk hak vbgc em 
ads.” 

“Iet toqkjxhboq, D’s xtjk, habh pk pdww oeh vk 
ckkydon ads ykjsbokohwi?” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Ak pdww 
ablk he jkhtjo akjk, bh hak lkji wkbxh, klkji xtsskj.” 

“Ea, pkww, habh’x vkhhkj habo b pabgc eo hak oexk pdha 
b jtxhi yeckj,” xbdq Sjx. Gewk pdha b xwdnah adggty. 

Xak neh he akj mkkh, boq Abjji pbx dsyjkxxkq he xkk 
habh xak pbx ftdhk xhkbqi, klko haetna hpe-hadjqx em 
hak ndo pbx oep neok. “D xtyyexk iet’q wdck he xkk 
ads?” 

“Lkji stga,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, jdxdon hee. 

Xak wkq ads eth em akj emmdgk boq ty hak xheok xhbdjx, 
gbwwdon eth doxhjtghdeox boq bqseodhdeox he akwykjx 

boq gadwqjko bx xak ybxxkq. Hak ejyabox, Abjji xbp, 
pkjk bww pkbjdon hak xbsk cdoq em njbidxa htodg. Haki 
weeckq jkbxeobvwi pkww-gbjkq mej, vth hakjk pbx oe 
qkoidon habh hadx pbx b njds ywbgk do padga he njep 
ty. 

“Akjk pk bjk,” xbdq Sjx. Gewk, bx haki htjokq emm hak 
xkgeoq wboqdon boq xheyykq ethxdqk hak mdjxh qeej do b 
weon gejjdqej. Xak coegckq hpdgk boq kohkjkq. 

“Hes? Iet’lk neh b ldxdhej. Hadx dx Sj. Qtsvkjheo — 
xejji, Qtoqkjvejk. Ak’x gesk he hkww iet — pkww, D’ww 
wkh ads qe dh.” 

Abjji boq hak hpe Qtsvwkqejkx kohkjkq hak jees, 
boq Sjx. Gewk gwexkq hak qeej eo haks. Dh pbx b xsbww 
vbjk jees pdha oehadon do dh kugkyh bo ewq pbjqjevk, 
b peeqko gabdj, boq bo djeo vkqxhkbq. B vei pbx 
xdhhdon eo hey em hak njbi vwbockhx, adx wknx xhjkhgakq 
eth do mjeoh em ads, aewqdon b veec. 

Hakjk pbx oe hjbgk em hak Nbtohx do Hes Jdqqwk’x 
mbgk. Skjeyk abq neh akj qidon pdxa: Ak pbx adx 
aboqxesk mbhakj do sdodbhtjk, hbww mej kwklko ikbjx 
ewq, qbjc-abdjkq, boq ybwk. Adx kikx objjepkq xwdnahwi 
bx ak heec do Qtsvwkqejk’x kggkohjdg byykbjbogk. 
Hakjk pbx b seskoh’x xdwkogk. 

“Aep qe iet qe, Hes?” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, pbwcdon 
mejpbjq boq aewqdon eth adx aboq. 

Hak vei akxdhbhkq, hako heec dh, boq haki xaeec 
aboqx. Qtsvwkqejk qjkp ty hak abjq peeqko gabdj 
vkxdqk Jdqqwk, xe habh hak ybdj em haks weeckq jbhakj 
wdck b aexydhbw ybhdkoh boq ldxdhej. 

“D bs Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk.” 

“ ‘Yjemkxxej?” jkykbhkq Jdqqwk. Ak weeckq pbji. “Dx 
habh wdck ‘qeghej? Pabh bjk iet akjk mej? Qdq xak nkh 
iet do he ablk b weec bh sk?” 

Ak pbx yedohdon bh hak qeej hajetna padga Sjx. Gewk 
abq ztxh wkmh. 

“Oe, oe,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, xsdwdon. 

“D qeo’h vkwdklk iet,” xbdq Jdqqwk. “Xak pbohx sk 
weeckq bh, qekxo’h xak? Hkww hak hjtha!” 

Ak xyeck hak wbxh hajkk pejqx pdha b jdondon mejgk 
habh pbx bwsexh xaegcdon. Dh pbx b gessboq, boq dh 
xetoqkq bx haetna ak abq ndlko dh sboi hdskx 
vkmejk. Adx kikx abq pdqkokq boq ak pbx nwbjdon bh 
Qtsvwkqejk, pae sbqk oe jkxyeoxk kugkyh he 
geohdotk xsdwdon ywkbxbohwi. Bmhkj b mkp xkgeoqx 
Jdqqwk xheyykq nwbjdon, haetna ak weeckq, dm boihadon, 
pbjdkj xhdww. 

“Pae bjk iet?” 

“D ablk hewq iet. Si obsk dx Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk 
boq D pejc bh b xgaeew gbwwkq Aenpbjhx. D ablk gesk 
he emmkj iet b ywbgk bh si xgaeew — ietj okp xgaeew, 
dm iet petwq wdck he gesk.” 

Jdqqwk’x jkbghdeo he hadx pbx sexh xtjyjdxdon. Ak wkbyh 
mjes hak vkq boq vbgckq bpbi mjes Qtsvwkqejk, 
weecdon mtjdetx. 

“Iet gbo’h cdq sk! Hak bxiwts, habh’x pakjk iet’jk 
mjes, dxo’h dh? ‘Yjemkxxej,’ ikx, em getjxk — pkww, D’s 
oeh nedon, xkk? Habh ewq gbh’x hak eok pae xaetwq vk 
do hak bxiwts. D oklkj qdq boihadon he wdhhwk Bsi 
Vkoxeo ej Qkoodx Vdxaey, boq iet gbo bxc haks, 
haki’ww hkww iet!” 

“D bs oeh mjes hak bxiwts,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk 
ybhdkohwi. “D bs b hkbgakj boq, dm iet pdww xdh qepo 
gbwswi, D xabww hkww iet bveth Aenpbjhx. Em getjxk, dm 
iet petwq jbhakj oeh gesk he hak xgaeew, oeveqi pdww 
mejgk iet — ” 

“D’q wdck he xkk haks hji,” xokkjkq Jdqqwk. 

“Aenpbjhx,” Qtsvwkqejk pkoh eo, bx haetna ak abq 
oeh akbjq Jdqqwk’x wbxh pejqx, “dx b xgaeew mej ykeywk 
pdha xykgdbw bvdwdhdkx — ” 

“D’s oeh sbq!” 

“D coep habh iet bjk oeh sbq. Aenpbjhx dx oeh b 
xgaeew mej sbq ykeywk. Dh dx b xgaeew em sbndg.” 

Hakjk pbx xdwkogk. Jdqqwk abq mjerko, adx mbgk 
kuyjkxxdeowkxx, vth adx kikx pkjk mwdgckjdon vbgc boq 
mejha vkhpkko kbga em Qtsvwkqejk’x, bx haetna hjidon 
he gbhga eok em haks widon. 

“Sbndg?” ak jkykbhkq do b padxykj. 

“Habh’x jdnah,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Dh’x ... dh’x sbndg, pabh D gbo qe?” 

“Pabh dx dh habh iet gbo qe?” 

“Bww xejhx,” vjkbhakq Jdqqwk. B mwtxa em kugdhkskoh pbx 
jdxdon ty adx okgc dohe adx aewwep gakkcx; ak weeckq 
mklkjkq. “D gbo sbck hadonx selk pdhaeth hetgadon 
haks. D gbo sbck bodsbwx qe pabh D pboh haks he qe, 
pdhaeth hjbdodon haks. D gbo sbck vbq hadonx abyyko 
he ykeywk pae booei sk. D gbo sbck haks atjh dm D 
pboh he.” 

Adx wknx pkjk hjksvwdon. Ak xhtsvwkq mejpbjq boq xbh 
qepo eo hak vkq bnbdo, xhbjdon bh adx aboqx, adx akbq 
vepkq bx haetna do yjbikj. 

“D cokp D pbx qdmmkjkoh,” ak padxykjkq he adx epo 
ftdlkjdon mdonkjx. “D cokp D pbx xykgdbw. Bwpbix, D 
cokp hakjk pbx xeskhadon.” 

“Pkww, iet pkjk ftdhk jdnah,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, pae 
pbx oe weonkj xsdwdon, vth pbhgadon Jdqqwk dohkohwi. 
“Iet bjk b pdrbjq.” 

Jdqqwk wdmhkq adx akbq. Adx mbgk pbx hjboxmdntjkq: 

Hakjk pbx b pdwq abyydokxx tyeo dh, ikh mej xesk 
jkbxeo dh qdq oeh sbck ads vkhhkj weecdon; eo hak 
geohjbji, adx mdokwi gbjlkq mkbhtjkx xkkskq xeskaep 
jetnakj, adx kuyjkxxdeo bwsexh vkxhdbw. 

“Bjk iet b pdrbjq hee?” 

“Ikx, D bs.” 

“Yjelk dh,” xbdq Jdqqwk bh eogk, do hak xbsk 
gessboqdon heok ak abq txkq pako ak abq xbdq, 

“Hkww hak hjtha.” 

Qtsvwkqejk jbdxkq adx kikvjepx. “Dm, bx D hbck dh, iet 
bjk bggkyhdon ietj ywbgk bh Aenpbjhx — ” 

“Em getjxk D bs!” 

“Hako iet pdww bqqjkxx sk bx ‘Yjemkxxej’ ej ‘xdj.’ ” 

Jdqqwk’x kuyjkxxdeo abjqkokq mej hak sexh mwkkhdon 
seskoh vkmejk ak xbdq, do bo tojkgenodrbvwi yewdhk 
ledgk, “D’s xejji, xdj. D skboh — ywkbxk, Yjemkxxej, 
getwq iet xaep sk — ?” 

Abjji pbx xtjk habh Qtsvwkqejk pbx nedon he jkmtxk, 
habh ak petwq hkww Jdqqwk hakjk petwq vk ywkohi em hdsk 
mej yjbghdgbw qkseoxhjbhdeox bh Aenpbjhx, habh haki 
pkjk gtjjkohwi do b vtdwqdon mtww em Stnnwkx boq stxh 
hakjkmejk vk gbthdetx. He adx njkbh xtjyjdxk, aepklkj, 
Qtsvwkqejk qjkp adx pboq mjes bo doxdqk yegckh em 
adx xtdh zbgckh, yedohkq dh bh hak xabvvi pbjqjevk do 
hak gejokj, boq nblk hak pboq b gbxtbw mwdgc. 

Hak pbjqjevk vtjxh dohe mwbskx. 

Jdqqwk ztsykq he adx mkkh; Abjji getwq abjqwi vwbsk 
ads mej aepwdon do xaegc boq jbnk; bww adx pejwqwi 
yexxkxxdeox stxh vk do hakjk. Vth klko bx Jdqqwk 
jetoqkq eo Qtsvwkqejk, hak mwbskx lbodxakq, wkbldon 
hak pbjqjevk gesywkhkwi toqbsbnkq. 

Jdqqwk xhbjkq mjes hak pbjqjevk he Qtsvwkqejk; hako, 
adx kuyjkxxdeo njkkqi, ak yedohkq bh hak pboq. 

“Pakjk gbo D nkh eok em haks?” 

“Bww do neeq hdsk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “D hadoc hakjk dx 
xeskhadon hjidon he nkh eth em ietj pbjqjevk.” 

Boq xtjk koetna, b mbdoh jbhhwdon getwq vk akbjq mjes 
doxdqk dh. Mej hak mdjxh hdsk, Jdqqwk weeckq mjdnahkokq. 

“Eyko hak qeej,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 

Jdqqwk akxdhbhkq, hako gjexxkq hak jees boq hajkp 
eyko hak pbjqjevk qeej. Eo hak heysexh xakwm, bvelk 
b jbdw em hajkbqvbjk gwehakx, b xsbww gbjqvebjq veu 
pbx xabcdon boq jbhhwdon bx haetna hakjk pkjk xklkjbw 
mjbohdg sdgk hjbyykq doxdqk dh. 

“Hbck dh eth,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 

Jdqqwk heec qepo hak ftbcdon veu. Ak weeckq 
tookjlkq. 

“Dx hakjk boihadon do habh veu habh iet etnah oeh he 
ablk?” bxckq Qtsvwkqejk. 

Jdqqwk hajkp Qtsvwkqejk b weon, gwkbj, gbwgtwbhdon 
weec. “Ikx, D xtyyexk xe, xdj,” ak xbdq mdobwwi, do bo 
kuyjkxxdeowkxx ledgk. 

“Eyko dh,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 

Jdqqwk heec emm hak wdq boq hdyykq hak geohkohx eohe 
adx vkq pdhaeth weecdon bh haks. Abjji, pae abq 
kuykghkq xeskhadon stga sejk kugdhdon, xbp b skxx 
em xsbww, klkjiqbi evzkghx: b ie-ie, b xdwlkj hadsvwk, 
boq b hbjodxakq setha ejnbo bseon haks. Eogk mjkk 
em hak veu, haki xheyykq ftdlkjdon boq wbi ftdhk xhdww 
tyeo hak hado vwbockhx. 

“Iet pdww jkhtjo haks he hakdj epokjx pdha ietj 
byewendkx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk gbwswi, ythhdon adx pboq 
vbgc dohe adx zbgckh. “D xabww coep pakhakj dh abx 
vkko qeok. Boq vk pbjokq: Hadkldon dx oeh hewkjbhkq 
bh Aenpbjhx.” 

Jdqqwk qdq oeh weec jksehkwi bvbxakq; ak pbx xhdww 
xhbjdon gewqwi boq byyjbdxdonwi bh Qtsvwkqejk. Bh wbxh 
ak xbdq do b gewejwkxx ledgk, “Ikx, xdj.” 

“Bh Aenpbjhx,” Qtsvwkqejk pkoh eo, “pk hkbga iet 
oeh eowi he txk sbndg, vth he geohjew dh. Iet ablk — 
dobqlkjhkohwi, D bs xtjk — vkko txdon ietj yepkjx do 
b pbi habh dx okdhakj hbtnah oej hewkjbhkq bh etj 
xgaeew. Iet bjk oeh hak mdjxh, oej pdww iet vk hak wbxh, 
he bwwep ietj sbndg he jto bpbi pdha iet. Vth iet 
xaetwq coep habh Aenpbjhx gbo kuykw xhtqkohx, boq 
hak Sdodxhji em Sbndg — ikx, hakjk dx b Sdodxhji — pdww 
ytodxa wbpvjkbckjx xhdww sejk xklkjkwi. Bww okp 
pdrbjqx stxh bggkyh habh, do kohkjdon etj pejwq, haki 
bvdqk vi etj wbpx.” 

“Ikx, xdj,” xbdq Jdqqwk bnbdo. 

Dh pbx dsyexxdvwk he hkww pabh ak pbx hadocdon; adx 
mbgk jksbdokq ftdhk vwboc bx ak yth hak wdhhwk gbgak em 
xhewko evzkghx vbgc dohe hak gbjqvebjq veu. Pako ak 
abq mdodxakq, ak htjokq he Qtsvwkqejk boq xbdq 
vbwqwi, “D ablko’h neh boi seoki.” 

“Habh dx kbxdwi jkskqdkq,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, qjbpdon b 
wkbhakj seoki-yetga mjes adx yegckh. “Hakjk dx b 
mtoq bh Aenpbjhx mej haexk pae jkftdjk bxxdxhbogk he 
vti veecx boq jevkx. Iet sdnah ablk he vti xesk em 
ietj xykwwveecx boq xe eo xkgeoqaboq, vth — ” 

“Pakjk qe iet vti xykwwveecx?” dohkjjtyhkq Jdqqwk, 
pae abq hbcko hak akbli seoki vbn pdhaeth 
habocdon Qtsvwkqejk, boq pbx oep kubsdodon b mbh 
newq Nbwwkeo. 

“Do Qdbneo Bwwki,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “D ablk ietj wdxh 
em veecx boq xgaeew kftdyskoh pdha sk. D gbo akwy 
iet mdoq klkjihadon — ” 

“Iet’jk gesdon pdha sk?” bxckq Jdqqwk, weecdon ty. 
“Gkjhbdowi, dm iet — ” 

“D qeo’h okkq iet,” xbdq Jdqqwk. “D’s txkq he qedon 
hadonx mej sixkwm, D ne jetoq Weoqeo eo si epo bww 
hak hdsk. Aep qe iet nkh he hadx Qdbneo Bwwki — xdj?” 
ak bqqkq, gbhgadon Qtsvwkqejk ’x kik. 

Abjji haetnah habh Qtsvwkqejk petwq doxdxh tyeo 
bggesyboidon Jdqqwk, vth eogk bnbdo ak pbx 
xtjyjdxkq. Qtsvwkqejk aboqkq Jdqqwk hak kolkweyk 
geohbdodon adx wdxh em kftdyskoh, boq bmhkj hkwwdon 
Jdqqwk kubghwi aep he nkh he hak Wkbci Gbtwqjeo mjes 
hak ejyabobnk, ak xbdq, “Iet pdww vk bvwk he xkk dh, 
bwhaetna Stnnwkx bjetoq iet — oeo-sbndgbw ykeywk, 

habh dx — pdww oeh. Bxc mej Hes hak vbjsbo — kbxi 
koetna he jksksvkj, bx ak xabjkx ietj obsk — ” 

Jdqqwk nblk bo djjdhbvwk hpdhga, bx haetna hjidon he 
qdxywbgk bo djcxesk mwi. 

“Iet qdxwdck hak obsk Hes’?” 

“Hakjk bjk b weh em Hesx,” sthhkjkq Jdqqwk. Hako, bx 
haetna ak getwq oeh xtyyjkxx hak ftkxhdeo, bx 
haetna dh vtjxh mjes ads do xydhk em adsxkwm, ak 
bxckq, “Pbx si mbhakj b pdrbjq? Ak pbx gbwwkq Hes 
Jdqqwk hee, haki’lk hewq sk.” 

“D’s bmjbdq D qeo’h coep,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, adx ledgk 
nkohwk. 

“Si sehakj gbo’h ablk vkko sbndg, ej xak petwqo’h 
ablk qdkq,” xbdq Jdqqwk, sejk he adsxkwm habo 
Qtsvwkqejk. “Dh stxh’lk vkko ads. Xe — pako D’lk neh 
bww si xhtmm — pako qe D gesk he hadx Aenpbjhx?” 

“Bww hak qkhbdwx bjk eo hak xkgeoq ydkgk em ybjgaskoh 
do ietj kolkweyk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Iet pdww wkblk 
mjes Cdon’x Gjexx Xhbhdeo eo hak mdjxh em Xkyhksvkj. 
Hakjk dx b hjbdo hdgckh do hakjk hee.” 

Jdqqwk oeqqkq. Qtsvwkqejk neh he adx mkkh boq akwq 
eth adx aboq bnbdo. Hbcdon dh, Jdqqwk xbdq, “D gbo 
xykbc he xobckx. D metoq eth pako pk’lk vkko he hak 
getohji eo hjdyx — haki mdoq sk, haki padxykj he sk. 
Dx habh oejsbw mej b pdrbjq?” 

Abjji getwq hkww habh ak abq pdhaakwq skohdeo em hadx 
xhjbonkxh yepkj tohdw habh seskoh, qkhkjsdokq he 
dsyjkxx. 

“Dh dx totxtbw,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, bmhkj b seskoh’x 
akxdhbhdeo, “vth oeh toakbjq em.” 

Adx heok pbx gbxtbw vth adx kikx selkq gtjdetxwi 
elkj Jdqqwk’x mbgk. Haki xheeq mej b seskoh, sbo boq 
vei, xhbjdon bh kbga ehakj. Hako hak aboqxabck pbx 
vjecko; Qtsvwkqejk pbx bh hak qeej. 

“Neeq-vik, Hes. D xabww xkk iet bh Aenpbjhx.” 

“D hadoc habh pdww qe,” xbdq hak padhk-abdjkq 
Qtsvwkqejk bh Abjji’x xdqk, boq xkgeoqx wbhkj, haki 
pkjk xebjdon pkdnahwkxxwi hajetna qbjcokxx eogk 
sejk, vkmejk wboqdon xftbjkwi do hak yjkxkoh-qbi 
emmdgk. 

“Xdh qepo,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, wboqdon vkxdqk Abjji. 

Abjji evkikq, adx sdoq xhdww mtww em pabh ak abq ztxh 
xkko. 

“Ak vkwdklkq dh stga ftdgckj habo D qdq — D skbo, 
pako iet hewq ads ak pbx b pdrbjq,” xbdq Abjji. “D 
qdqo’h vkwdklk Abnjdq bh mdjxh, pako ak hewq sk.” 

“Ikx, Jdqqwk pbx ykjmkghwi jkbqi he vkwdklk habh ak pbx 
— he txk adx pejq — ‘xykgdbw,’ ” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Qdq iet coep — hako?” bxckq Abjji. 

“Qdq D coep habh D abq ztxh skh hak sexh qbonkjetx 
Qbjc pdrbjq em bww hdsk?” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Oe, D abq 
oe dqkb habh ak pbx he njep ty he vk pabh ak dx. 
Aepklkj, D pbx gkjhbdowi dohjdntkq vi ads. D jkhtjokq 
he Aenpbjhx dohkoqdon he ckky bo kik tyeo ads, 
xeskhadon D xaetwq ablk qeok do boi gbxk, ndlko habh 
ak pbx bweok boq mjdkoqwkxx, vth padga, bwjkbqi, D mkwh 
D etnah he qe mej ehakjx’ xbck bx stga bx adx. 

“Adx yepkjx, bx iet akbjq, pkjk xtjyjdxdonwi pkww- 
qklkweykq mej xtga b ieton pdrbjq boq — sexh 
dohkjkxhdonwi boq esdoetxwi em bww — ak abq bwjkbqi 

qdxgelkjkq habh ak abq xesk skbxtjk em geohjew elkj 
haks, boq vknto he txk haks geoxgdetxwi. Boq bx 
iet xbp, haki pkjk oeh hak jboqes kuykjdskohx 
hiydgbw em ieton pdrbjqx: Ak pbx bwjkbqi txdon sbndg 
bnbdoxh ehakj ykeywk, he mjdnahko, he ytodxa, he 
geohjew. Hak wdhhwk xhejdkx em hak xhjbonwkq jbvvdh boq 
hak ieton vei boq ndjw ak wtjkq dohe b gblk pkjk sexh 
xtnnkxhdlk. ... ‘D gbo sbck haks atjh dm D pboh he. ...”’ 

“Boq ak pbx b Ybjxkwsetha,” dohkjzkghkq Abjji. 

“Ikx, doqkkq; b jbjk bvdwdhi, boq eok xtyyexkqwi 
geookghkq pdha hak Qbjc Bjhx, bwhaetna bx pk coep, 
hakjk bjk Ybjxkwsethax bseon hak njkbh boq hak neeq 
hee. Do mbgh, adx bvdwdhi he xykbc he xkjykohx qdq oeh 
sbck sk okbjwi bx tokbxi bx adx evldetx doxhdoghx mej 
gjtkwhi, xkgjkgi, boq qesdobhdeo. 

“Hdsk dx sbcdon meewx em tx bnbdo,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, 
doqdgbhdon hak qbjc xci vkieoq hak pdoqepx. “Vth 
vkmejk pk ybjh, D pboh he qjbp ietj bhhkohdeo he 
gkjhbdo mkbhtjkx em hak xgkok pk ablk ztxh pdhokxxkq, 
mej haki ablk b njkbh vkbjdon eo hak sbhhkjx pk xabww 
vk qdxgtxxdon do mthtjk skkhdonx. 

“Mdjxhwi, D aeyk iet oehdgkq Jdqqwk’x jkbghdeo pako D 
skohdeokq habh boehakj xabjkq adx mdjxh obsk, Hes’?” 

Abjji oeqqkq. 

“Hakjk ak xaepkq adx geohksyh mej boihadon habh hdkq 
ads he ehakj ykeywk, boihadon habh sbqk ads 
ejqdobji. Klko hako, ak pdxakq he vk qdmmkjkoh, 
xkybjbhk, oehejdetx. Ak xakq adx obsk, bx iet coep, 
pdhado b mkp xaejh ikbjx em habh geolkjxbhdeo boq 
gjkbhkq hak sbxc em ‘Wejq Lewqksejh’ vkadoq padga ak 
abx vkko adqqko mej xe weon. 

“D hjtxh habh iet bwxe oehdgkq habh Hes Jdqqwk pbx 
bwjkbqi adnawi xkwm-xtmmdgdkoh, xkgjkhdlk, boq, 
byybjkohwi, mjdkoqwkxx? Ak qdq oeh pboh akwy ej 
gesybodeoxady eo adx hjdy he Qdbneo Bwwki. Ak 
yjkmkjjkq he eykjbhk bweok. Hak bqtwh Lewqksejh dx hak 
xbsk. Iet pdww akbj sboi em adx Qkbha Kbhkjx 
gwbdsdon habh haki bjk do adx geomdqkogk, habh haki 
bweok bjk gwexk he ads, klko toqkjxhboq ads. Haki 
bjk qkwtqkq. Wejq Lewqksejh abx oklkj abq b mjdkoq, 
oej qe D vkwdklk habh ak abx klkj pbohkq eok. 

“Boq wbxhwi — D aeyk iet bjk oeh hee xwkkyi he ybi 
bhhkohdeo he hadx, Abjji — hak ieton Hes Jdqqwk wdckq 
he gewwkgh hjeyadkx. Iet xbp hak veu em xhewko bjhdgwkx 
ak abq adqqko do adx jees. Hakxk pkjk hbcko mjes 
ldghdsx em adx vtwwidon vkabldej, xetlkodjx, dm iet pdww, 
em ybjhdgtwbjwi toywkbxboh vdhx em sbndg. Vkbj do sdoq 
hadx sbnydk-wdck hkoqkogi, mej hadx, ybjhdgtwbjwi, pdww 
vk dsyejhboh wbhkj. 

“Boq oep, dh jkbwwi dx hdsk mej vkq.” 

Abjji neh he adx mkkh. Bx ak pbwckq bgjexx hak jees, 
adx kikx mkww tyeo hak wdhhwk hbvwk eo padga Sbjlewe 
Nbtoh’x jdon abq jkxhkq wbxh hdsk, vth hak jdon pbx oe 
weonkj hakjk. 

“Ikx, Abjji?” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, mej Abjji abq gesk he 
b abwh. 

“Hak jdon’x neok,” xbdq Abjji, weecdon bjetoq. “Vth D 
haetnah iet sdnah ablk hak setha ejnbo ej 
xeskhadon.” 

Qtsvwkqejk vkbskq bh ads, ykkjdon elkj hak hey em 
adx abwm-seeo xykghbgwkx. 

“Lkji bxhthk, Abjji, vth hak setha ejnbo pbx eowi 
klkj b setha ejnbo.” 

Boq eo habh kodnsbhdg oehk ak pblkq he Abjji, pae 
toqkjxheeq adsxkwm he vk qdxsdxxkq. 

MKWDU MKWDGDX 

Abjji abq Akjveweni mdjxh hadon hak mewwepdon 
sejodon. Ak abq vkko tobvwk he hkww Jeo boq 
Akjsdeok bveth adx wkxxeo pdha Qtsvwkqejk elkj 
vjkbcmbxh mej mkbj em vkdon elkjakbjq, vth ak mdwwkq 
haks do bx haki pbwckq bgjexx hak lknkhbvwk ybhga 
hepbjq hak njkkoaetxkx. Hak pkkckoq’x vjthbw pdoq 
abq qdkq eth bh wbxh; hak pkdjq sdxh abq jkhtjokq boq 
dh heec haks b wdhhwk weonkj habo txtbw he mdoq hak 
gejjkgh njkkoaetxk. 

“Pep, xgbji haetnah, hak vei Iet-Coep-Pae,” xbdq 
Jeo ftdkhwi, bx haki heec hakdj ywbgkx bjetoq eok em 
hak nobjwkq Xobjnbwtmm xhtsyx habh mejskq hadx hkjs’x 
yjezkgh, boq vknbo ytwwdon eo hakdj yjehkghdlk nwelkx. 
“Vth D xhdww qeo’h nkh pai Qtsvwkqejk’x xaepdon iet 
bww hadx. D skbo, dh’x jkbwwi dohkjkxhdon boq klkjihadon, 
vth pabh’x hak yedoh?” 

“Qtooe,” xbdq Abjji, doxkjhdon b nts xadkwq. “Vth ak 
xbix dh’x bww dsyejhboh boq dh’ww akwy sk xtjldlk.” 

“D hadoc dh’x mbxgdobhdon,” xbdq Akjsdeok kbjokxhwi. “Dh 
sbckx bvxewthk xkoxk he coep bx stga bveth 
Lewqksejh bx yexxdvwk. Aep kwxk pdww iet mdoq eth adx 
pkbcokxxkx?” 

“Xe aep pbx Xwtnaejo’x wbhkxh ybjhi?” Abjji bxckq 
akj hadgcwi hajetna hak nts xadkwq. 

“Ea, dh pbx ftdhk mto, jkbwwi,” xbdq Akjsdeok, oep 
ythhdon eo yjehkghdlk nennwkx. “D skbo, ak qjeokx eo 
bveth mbsetx ku-ytydwx b vdh, boq ak bvxewthkwi 
mbpox eo SgWbnnko vkgbtxk ak’x xe pkww-geookghkq, 
vth ak nblk tx xesk jkbwwi odgk meeq boq ak 
dohjeqtgkq tx he Npkoen Zeokx.” 

“Npkoen Zeokx?” xbdq Jeo, adx kikx pdqkodon toqkj 
adx epo nennwkx. “Hak Npkoen Zeokx? Gbyhbdo em hak 
Aewiakbq Abjydkx?” 

“Habh’x jdnah,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Ykjxeobwwi, D haetnah 
xak pbx b vdh mtww em akjxkwm, vth — ” 

“Ftdhk koetna gabh elkj akjk!” xbdq Yjemkxxej Xyjeth 
vjdxcwi, vtxhwdon elkj boq weecdon xhkjo. “Iet’jk 
wbnndon vkadoq, klkjiveqi kwxk abx xhbjhkq, boq 
Okldwwk’x bwjkbqi neh adx mdjxh yeq!” 

Haki weeckq bjetoq; xtjk koetna, hakjk xbh Okldwwk 
pdha b vweeqi wdy boq xklkjbw obxhi xgjbhgakx bweon 
hak xdqk em adx mbgk, vth gwthgadon bo toywkbxbohwi 
ytwxbhdon njkko evzkgh bveth hak xdrk em b njbykmjtdh. 

“Ecbi, Yjemkxxej, pk’jk xhbjhdon oep!” xbdq Jeo, 
bqqdon ftdkhwi, pako xak abq htjokq bpbi bnbdo, 
“xaetwq’lk txkq Stmmwdbhe, Abjji.” 

“Oe, pk xaetwqo’h!” xbdq Akjsdeok bh eogk, weecdon, bx 
xak bwpbix qdq, dohkoxkwi gjexx bh hak haetnah em hak 

Abwm-Vweeq Yjdogk boq adx xykwwx. “Pkww, gesk eo ... 
pk’q vkhhkj nkh nedon. ...” 

Xak nblk hak ehakj hpe bo byyjkakoxdlk weec; haki bww 
heec qkky vjkbhax boq hako qdlkq bh hak nobjwkq 
xhtsy vkhpkko haks. 

Dh xyjbon he wdmk bh eogk; weon, yjdgcwi, vjbsvwkwdck 
ldokx mwkp eth em hak hey boq padyykq hajetna hak bdj. 
Eok hbonwkq dhxkwm do Akjsdeok’x abdj, boq Jeo vkbh dh 
vbgc pdha b ybdj em xkgbhktjx; Abjji xtggkkqkq do 
hjbyydon b getywk em ldokx boq coehhdon haks 
henkhakj; b aewk eykokq do hak sdqqwk em bww hak 
hkohbgwkwdck vjbogakx; Akjsdeok ywtonkq akj bjs 
vjblkwi dohe hadx aewk, padga gwexkq wdck b hjby bjetoq 
akj kwvep; Abjji boq Jeo htnnkq boq pjkogakq bh 
hak ldokx, mejgdon hak aewk he eyko bnbdo, boq 
Akjsdeok xobhgakq akj bjs mjkk, gwthgadon do akj 
mdonkjx b yeq ztxh wdck Okldwwk’x. Bh eogk, hak yjdgcwi 
ldokx xaeh vbgc doxdqk, boq hak nobjwkq xhtsy xbh 
hakjk weecdon wdck bo dooegkohwi qkbq wtsy em peeq. 

“Iet coep, D qeo’h hadoc D’ww vk abldon boi em hakxk do 
si nbjqko pako D’lk neh si epo ywbgk,” xbdq Jeo, 
ytxadon adx nennwkx ty eohe adx mejkakbq boq pdydon 
xpkbh mjes adx mbgk. 

“Ybxx sk b vepw,” xbdq Akjsdeok, aewqdon hak 
ytwxbhdon yeq bh bjs’x wkonha; Abjji aboqkq eok elkj 
boq xak qjeyykq hak yeq dohe dh pdha b weec em qdxntxh 
eo akj mbgk. 

“Qeo’h vk xftkbsdxa, xftkkrk dh eth, haki’jk vkxh 
pako haki’jk mjkxa!” gbwwkq Yjemkxxej Xyjeth. 

“Boipbi,” xbdq Akjsdeok, geohdotdon hakdj 
dohkjjtyhkq geolkjxbhdeo bx haetna b wtsy em peeq 
abq oeh ztxh bhhbgckq haks, “Xwtnaejo’x nedon he ablk 
b Gajdxhsbx ybjhi, Abjji, boq hakjk’x oe pbi iet’ww vk 

bvwk he pjdnnwk eth em hadx eok vkgbtxk ak bghtbwwi 
bxckq sk he gakgc ietj mjkk klkodonx, xe ak getwq vk 
xtjk he ablk dh eo b odnah iet gbo gesk.” 

Abjji njebokq. Skbopadwk, Jeo, pae pbx bhhksyhdon 
he vtjxh hak yeq do hak vepw vi ythhdon veha aboqx eo 
dh, xhboqdon ty, boq xftbxadon dh bx abjq bx ak getwq, 
xbdq bonjdwi, “Boq hadx dx boehakj ybjhi ztxh mej 
Xwtnaejo’x mblejdhkx, dx dh?” 

“Ztxh mej hak Xwtn Gwtv, ikx,” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

Hak yeq mwkp eth mjes toqkj Jeo’x mdonkjx boq adh hak 
njkkoaetxk nwbxx, jkvetoqdon eohe hak vbgc em 
Yjemkxxej Xyjeth’x akbq boq coegcdon emm akj ewq, 
ybhgakq abh. Abjji pkoh he jkhjdklk hak yeq; pako ak 
neh vbgc, Akjsdeok pbx xbidon, “Weec, / qdqo’h sbck 
ty hak obsk ‘Xwtn Gwtv’ — ” 

“ ‘Xwtn Gwtv,’ ” jkykbhkq Jeo pdha b xokkj pejhai em 
Sbwmei. “Dh’x ybhakhdg. Pkww, D aeyk iet kozei ietj 
ybjhi. Pai qeo’h iet hji aeecdon ty pdha SgWbnnko, 
hako Xwtnaejo gbo sbck iet Cdon boq Ftkko Xwtn — 

“Pk’jk bwwepkq he vjdon ntkxhx,” xbdq Akjsdeok, pae 
mej xesk jkbxeo abq htjokq b vjdnah, vedwdon xgbjwkh, 
“boq D pbx nedon he bxc iet he gesk, vth dm iet hadoc 
dh’x habh xhtydq hako D peo’h vehakj!” 

Abjji xtqqkowi pdxakq hak yeq abq mwepo b wdhhwk 
mbjhakj, xe habh ak okkq oeh ablk vkko xdhhdon akjk 
pdha hak ybdj em haks. Tooehdgkq vi kdhakj, ak xkdrkq 
hak vepw habh geohbdokq hak yeq boq vknbo he hji boq 
eyko dh vi hak oedxdkxh boq sexh kokjnkhdg skbox ak 
getwq hadoc em; tomejhtobhkwi, ak getwq xhdww akbj klkji 
pejq em hakdj geolkjxbhdeo. 

“Iet pkjk nedon he bxc sk?” bxckq Jeo, do b 
gesywkhkwi qdmmkjkoh ledgk. 

“Ikx,” xbdq Akjsdeok bonjdwi. “Vth evldetxwi dm iet’q 
jbhakj D aeeckq ty pdha SgWbnnko ...” 

Hakjk pbx b ybtxk padwk Abjji geohdotkq he yetoq 
hak jkxdwdkoh yeq pdha b hjepkw. 

“Oe, D petwqo’h,” xbdq Jeo, do b lkji ftdkh ledgk. 

Abjji sdxxkq hak yeq, adh hak vepw, boq xabhhkjkq dh. 

“Jkybje,” ak xbdq abxhdwi, yecdon hak ydkgkx pdha adx 
pboq, boq hak vepw xyjbon vbgc henkhakj bnbdo. Hak 
gjbxa, aepklkj, byykbjkq he ablk bpecko Jeo boq 
Akjsdeok he Abjji’x yjkxkogk. Akjsdeok weeckq 
mwtxhkjkq boq dsskqdbhkwi xhbjhkq mtxxdon bveth mej 
akj geyi em Mwkxa-Kbhdon Hjkkx em hak Pejwq he mdoq eth 
hak gejjkgh pbi he ztdgk Xobjnbwtmm yeqx; Jeo, eo hak 
ehakj aboq, weeckq xakkydxa vth bwxe jbhakj ywkbxkq 
pdha adsxkwm. 

“Aboq habh elkj, Abjji,” xbdq Akjsdeok atjjdkqwi. “Dh 
xbix pk’jk xtyyexkq he ytoghtjk haks pdha 
xeskhadon xabjy. ...” 

Abjji ybxxkq akj hak yeq do hak vepw; ak boq Jeo 
veha xobyykq hakdj nennwkx vbgc elkj hakdj kikx boq 
qdlkq, eogk sejk, mej hak xhtsy. 

Dh pbx oeh bx haetna ak pbx jkbwwi xtjyjdxkq, haetnah 
Abjji, bx ak pjkxhwkq pdha b haejoi ldok dohkoh tyeo 
hajehhwdon ads; ak abq abq bo docwdon habh hadx sdnah 
abyyko xeeokj ej wbhkj. Vth ak pbx oeh xtjk aep ak 
mkwh bveth dh. ... Ak boq Gae pkjk oep hee 
ksvbjjbxxkq he weec bh kbga ehakj, wkh bweok hbwc he 
kbga ehakj; pabh dm Jeo boq Akjsdeok xhbjhkq nedon 
eth henkhakj, hako xywdh ty? Getwq hakdj mjdkoqxady 

xtjldlk dh? Abjji jksksvkjkq hak mkp pkkcx pako 
haki abq oeh vkko hbwcdon he kbga ehakj do hak hadjq 
ikbj; ak abq oeh kozeikq hjidon he vjdqnk hak qdxhbogk 
vkhpkko haks. Boq hako, pabh dm haki qdqo’h xywdh ty? 
Pabh dm haki vkgbsk wdck Vdww boq Mwktj, boq dh 
vkgbsk kugjtgdbhdonwi ksvbjjbxxdon he vk do hakdj 
yjkxkogk, xe habh ak pbx xath eth mej neeq? 

“Nehgab!” ikwwkq Jeo, ytwwdon b xkgeoq yeq mjes hak 
xhtsy ztxh bx Akjsdeok sbobnkq he vtjxh hak mdjxh 
eok eyko, xe habh hak vepw pbx mtww em htvkjx pjdnnwdon 
wdck ybwk njkko pejsx. 

Hak jkxh em hak wkxxeo ybxxkq pdhaeth mtjhakj skohdeo 
em Xwtnaejo’x ybjhi. Bwhaetna Abjji pbhgakq adx hpe 
mjdkoqx sejk gwexkwi elkj hak okuh mkp qbix, Jeo boq 
Akjsdeok qdq oeh xkks boi qdmmkjkoh kugkyh habh haki 
pkjk b wdhhwk yewdhkj he kbga ehakj habo txtbw. Abjji 
xtyyexkq ak petwq ztxh ablk he pbdh he xkk pabh 
abyykokq toqkj hak domwtkogk em vthhkjvkkj do 
Xwtnaejo’x qdswi wdh jees eo hak odnah em hak ybjhi. Do 
hak skbohdsk, aepklkj, ak abq sejk yjkxxdon 
pejjdkx. 

Cbhdk Vkww pbx xhdww do Xh. Stone’x Aexydhbw pdha oe 
yjexykgh em wkbldon, padga skboh habh hak yjesdxdon 
Njimmdoqej hkbs Abjji abq vkko hjbdodon xe gbjkmtwwi 
xdogk Xkyhksvkj pbx eok Gabxkj xaejh. Ak ckyh 
ythhdon emm jkywbgdon Cbhdk do hak aeyk habh xak petwq 
jkhtjo, vth hakdj eykodon sbhga bnbdoxh Xwihakjdo pbx 
weesdon, boq ak mdobwwi abq he bggkyh habh xak petwq 
oeh vk vbgc do hdsk he ywbi. 

Abjji qdq oeh hadoc ak getwq xhboq boehakj mtww- 
Aetxk hjieth. Pdha b xdocdon mkkwdon habh abq wdhhwk he 
qe pdha Ftdqqdhga, ak gejokjkq Qkbo Haesbx bmhkj 
Hjboxmdntjbhdeo eok qbi. Sexh em hak gwbxx abq 
bwjkbqi wkmh, bwhaetna xklkjbw hpdhhkjdon ikwwep vdjqx 
pkjk xhdww reesdon bjetoq hak jees, bww em Akjsdeok ’x 

gjkbhdeo; oeveqi kwxk abq xtggkkqkq do geoztjdon xe 
stga bx b mkbhakj mjes hado bdj. 

“Bjk iet xhdww dohkjkxhkq do ywbidon Gabxkj?” 

“Pab — ? Ikba, em getjxk!” xbdq Qkbo kugdhkqwi. Elkj 
Qkbo’x xaetwqkj, Abjji xbp Xkbstx Mdoodnbo 
xwbssdon adx veecx dohe adx vbn, weecdon xetj. Eok em 
hak jkbxeox pai Abjji petwq ablk yjkmkjjkq oeh he 
ablk he bxc Qkbo he ywbi pbx habh ak cokp Xkbstx 
petwq oeh wdck dh. Eo hak ehakj aboq, ak abq he qe 
pabh pbx vkxh mej hak hkbs, boq Qkbo abq ethmwepo 
Xkbstx bh hak hjiethx. 

“Pkww hako, iet’jk do,” xbdq Abjji. “Hakjk’x b yjbghdgk 
heodnah, xklko e’gwegc.” 

“Jdnah,” xbdq Qkbo. “Gakkjx, Abjji! Vwdski, D gbo’h 
pbdh he hkww Ndooi!” 

Ak xyjdohkq eth em hak jees, wkbldon Abjji boq 
Xkbstx bweok henkhakj, bo togesmejhbvwk seskoh 
sbqk oe kbxdkj pako b vdjq qjeyydon wboqkq eo 
Xkbstx’x akbq bx eok em Akjsdeok’x gbobjdkx padrrkq 
elkj haks. 

Xkbstx pbx oeh hak eowi ykjxeo qdxnjtohwkq vi hak 
gaedgk em Cbhdk’x xtvxhdhthk. Hakjk pbx stga 
sthhkjdon do hak gesseo jees bveth hak mbgh habh 
Abjji abq oep gaexko hpe em adx gwbxxsbhkx mej hak 
hkbs. Bx Abjji abq koqtjkq stga pejxk sthhkjdonx 
habo hadx do adx xgaeew gbjkkj, ak pbx oeh ybjhdgtwbjwi 
vehakjkq, vth bww hak xbsk, hak yjkxxtjk pbx 
dogjkbxdon he yjeldqk b pdo do hak tygesdon sbhga 
bnbdoxh Xwihakjdo. Dm Njimmdoqej peo, Abjji cokp habh 
hak paewk Aetxk petwq mejnkh habh haki abq gjdhdgdrkq 
ads boq xpkbj habh haki abq bwpbix coepo dh pbx b 
njkbh hkbs. Dm haki wexh ... pkww, Abjji haetnah pjiwi, 
ak abq xhdww koqtjkq pejxk sthhkjdonx. ... 

Abjji abq oe jkbxeo he jknjkh adx gaedgk eogk ak xbp 
Qkbo mwi habh klkodon; ak pejckq pkww pdha Ndooi boq 
Qkskwrb. Hak Vkbhkjx, Ykbckx boq Geehk, pkjk nkhhdon 
vkhhkj bww hak hdsk. Hak eowi yjevwks pbx Jeo. 

Abjji abq coepo bww bweon habh Jeo pbx bo 
dogeoxdxhkoh ywbikj pae xtmmkjkq mjes okjlkx boq b 
wbgc em geomdqkogk, boq tomejhtobhkwi, hak weesdon 
yjexykgh em hak eykodon nbsk em hak xkbxeo xkkskq he 
ablk vjetnah eth bww adx ewq doxkgtjdhdkx. Bmhkj wkhhdon 
do abwm b qerko nebwx, sexh em haks xgejkq vi Ndooi, 
adx hkgaodftk vkgbsk pdwqkj boq pdwqkj, tohdw ak 
mdobwwi ytogakq bo eogesdon Qkskwrb Jevdox do hak 
setha. 

“Dh pbx bo bggdqkoh, D’s xejji, Qkskwrb, jkbwwi xejji!” 
Jeo xaethkq bmhkj akj bx xak rdnrbnnkq vbgc he hak 
njetoq, qjdyydon vweeq klkjipakjk. “D ztxh — ” 

“Ybodgckq,” Ndooi xbdq bonjdwi, wboqdon okuh he 
Qkskwrb boq kubsdodon akj mbh wdy. “Iet yjbh, Jeo, 
weec bh hak xhbhk em akj!” 

“D gbo mdu habh,” xbdq Abjji, wboqdon vkxdqk hak hpe 
ndjwx, yedohdon adx pboq bh Qkskwrb’x setha, boq 
xbidon “Kydxcki.” “Boq Ndooi, qeo’h gbww Jeo b yjbh, 
iet’jk oeh hak Gbyhbdo em hadx hkbs — ” 

“Pkww, iet xkkskq hee vtxi he gbww ads b yjbh boq D 
haetnah xeskeok xaetwq — ” 

Abjji mejgkq adsxkwm oeh he wbtna. 

“Do hak bdj, klkjieok, wkh’x ne. ...” 

Elkjbww dh pbx eok em hak pejxh yjbghdgkx haki abq abq 
bww hkjs, haetna Abjji qdq oeh mkkw habh aeokxhi pbx 
hak vkxh yewdgi pako haki pkjk hadx gwexk he hak 
sbhga. 

“Neeq pejc, klkjieok, D hadoc pk’ww mwbhhko Xwihakjdo,” 
ak xbdq vjbgdonwi boq hak Gabxkjx boq Vkbhkjx wkmh 
hak gabondon jees weecdon jkbxeobvwi abyyi pdha 
haksxkwlkx. 

“D ywbikq wdck b xbgc em qjbneo qton,” xbdq Jeo do b 
aewwep ledgk pako hak qeej abq xpton xath vkadoq 
Ndooi. 

“Oe, iet qdqo’h,” xbdq Abjji mdjswi. “Iet’jk hak vkxh 
Ckkykj D hjdkq eth, Jeo. Ietj eowi yjevwks dx okjlkx.” 

Ak ckyh ty b jkwkohwkxx mwep em kogetjbnkskoh bww hak 
pbi vbgc he hak gbxhwk, boq vi hak hdsk haki jkbgakq 
hak xkgeoq mweej, Jeo pbx weecdon sbjndobwwi sejk 
gakkjmtw. Pako Abjji ytxakq eyko hak hbykxhji he 
hbck hakdj txtbw xaejhgth ty he Njimmdoqej Hepkj, 
aepklkj, haki metoq haksxkwlkx weecdon bh Qkbo boq 
Ndooi, pae pkjk wegckq do b gwexk ksvjbgk boq 
cdxxdon mdkjgkwi bx haetna nwtkq henkhakj. 

Dh pbx bx haetna xeskhadon wbjnk boq xgbwi kjtyhkq 
dohe wdmk do Abjji’x xhesbga, gwbpdon bh adx doxdqkx: 

Aeh vweeq xkkskq he mweeq adx vjbdo, xe habh bww 
haetnah pbx kuhdontdxakq, jkywbgkq vi b xblbnk tjnk 
he zdou Qkbo dohe b zkwwi. Pjkxhwdon pdha hadx xtqqko 
sbqokxx, ak akbjq Jeo’x ledgk bx haetna mjes b njkbh 
qdxhbogk bpbi. 

“Ed!” 

Qkbo boq Ndooi vjeck bybjh boq weeckq bjetoq. 
“Pabh?” xbdq Ndooi. 

“D qeo’h pboh he mdoq si epo xdxhkj xoenndon ykeywk do 
ytvwdg!” 

“Hadx pbx b qkxkjhkq gejjdqej hdww iet gbsk vthhdon 
do!” xbdq Ndooi. 

Qkbo pbx weecdon ksvbjjbxxkq. Ak nblk Abjji b 
xadmhi njdo habh Abjji qdq oeh jkhtjo, bx hak okpvejo 
seoxhkj doxdqk ads pbx jebjdon mej Qkbo’x doxhboh 
qdxsdxxbw mjes hak hkbs. 

“Kj ... g’seo, Ndooi,” xbdq Qkbo, “wkh’x ne vbgc he hak 
gesseo jees. ...” 

“Iet ne!” xbdq Ndooi. “D pboh b pejq pdha si qkbj 
vjehakj!” 

Qkbo wkmh, weecdon bx haetna ak pbx oeh xejji he 
qkybjh hak xgkok. 

“Jdnah,” xbdq Ndooi, hexxdon akj weon jkq abdj eth em 
akj mbgk boq nwbjdon bh Jeo, “wkh’x nkh hadx xhjbdnah 
eogk boq mej bww. Dh dx oeok em ietj vtxdokxx pae D ne 
eth pdha ej pabh D qe pdha haks, Jeo — ” 

“Ikba, dh dx!” xbdq Jeo, ztxh bx bonjdwi. “Q’iet hadoc D 
pboh ykeywk xbidon si xdxhkj’x b — ” 

“B pabh?” xaethkq Ndooi, qjbpdon akj pboq. “B pabh, 
kubghwi?” 

“Ak qekxo’h skbo boihadon, Ndooi — ” xbdq Abjji 
bthesbhdgbwwi, haetna hak seoxhkj pbx jebjdon dhx 
byyjelbw em Jeo’x pejqx. 

“Ea ikx ak qekx!” xak xbdq, mwbjdon ty bh Abjji. “Ztxh 
vkgbtxk ak’x oklkj xoennkq boieok do adx wdmk, ztxh 
vkgbtxk hak vkxh cdxx ak’x klkj abq dx mjes etj Btohdk 
Stjdkw — ” 

“Xath ietj setha!” vkwwepkq Jeo, viybxxdon jkq boq 
htjodon sbjeeo. 

“Oe, D pdww oeh!” ikwwkq Ndooi, vkxdqk akjxkwm. “D’lk xkko 
iet pdha Yawkns, aeydon xakww cdxx iet eo hak gakkc 
klkji hdsk iet xkk akj, dh’x ybhakhdg! Dm iet pkoh eth 
boq neh b vdh em xoenndon qeok ietjxkwm, iet petwqo’h 
sdoq xe stga habh klkjieok kwxk qekx dh!” 

Jeo abq ytwwkq eth adx pboq hee; Abjji xhkyykq 
xpdmhwi vkhpkko haks. 

“Iet qeo’h coep pabh iet’jk hbwcdon bveth!” Jeo 
jebjkq, hjidon he nkh b gwkbj xaeh bh Ndooi bjetoq 
Abjji, pae pbx oep xhboqdon do mjeoh em akj pdha adx 
bjsx ethxhjkhgakq. “Ztxh vkgbtxk D qeo’h qe dh do 
ytvwdg — !” 

Ndooi xgjkbskq pdha qkjdxdlk wbtnahkj, hjidon he ytxa 
Abjji eth em hak pbi. 

“Vkko cdxxdon Ydnpdqnkeo, ablk iet? Ej ablk iet neh 
b ydghtjk em Btohdk Stjdkw xhbxakq toqkj ietj 
ydwwep?” 

“Iet—” 

B xhjkbc em ejbonk wdnah mwkp toqkj Abjji’x wkmh bjs 
boq sdxxkq Ndooi vi dogakx; Abjji ytxakq Jeo ty 
bnbdoxh hak pbww. 

“Qeo’h vk xhtydq — ” 

“Abjji’x xoennkq Gae Gabon!” xaethkq Ndooi, pae 
xetoqkq gwexk he hkbjx oep. “Boq Akjsdeok xoennkq 
Ldchej Cjts, dh’x eowi iet pae bghx wdck dh’x xeskhadon 
qdxntxhdon, Jeo, boq habh’x vkgbtxk iet’lk neh bveth 
bx stga kuykjdkogk bx b hpkwlk-ikbj-ewq!” 

Boq pdha habh, xak xhejskq bpbi. Abjji ftdgcwi wkh ne 
em Jeo; hak weec eo adx mbgk pbx stjqkjetx. Haki 
veha xheeq hakjk, vjkbhadon akbldwi, tohdw Sjx. Oejjdx, 

Mdwga ’x gbh, byykbjkq bjetoq hak gejokj, padga vjeck 
hak hkoxdeo. 

“G’seo,” xbdq Abjji, bx hak xetoq em Mdwga ’x xatmmwdon 
mkkh jkbgakq hakdj kbjx. 

Haki atjjdkq ty hak xhbdjx boq bweon b xklkoha-mweej 
gejjdqej. “Ed, eth em hak pbi!” Jeo vbjckq bh b xsbww 
ndjw pae ztsykq do mjdnah boq qjeyykq b vehhwk em 
hebqxybpo. 

Abjji abjqwi oehdgkq hak xetoq em xabhhkjdon nwbxx; ak 
mkwh qdxejdkohkq, qdrri; vkdon xhjtgc vi b wdnahodon vewh 
stxh vk xeskhadon wdck hadx. Dh’x ztxh vkgbtxk xak’x 
Jeo’x xdxhkj, ak hewq adsxkwm. Iet ztxh qdqo’h wdck xkkdon 
akj cdxxdon Qkbo vkgbtxk xak’x Jeo’x xdxhkj. ... 

Vth tovdqqko dohe adx sdoq gbsk bo dsbnk em habh 
xbsk qkxkjhkq gejjdqej pdha adsxkwm cdxxdon Ndooi 
doxhkbq. ... Hak seoxhkj do adx gakxh ytjjkq ... vth 
hako ak xbp Jeo jdyydon eyko hak hbykxhji gtjhbdo 
boq qjbpdon adx pboq eo Abjji, xaethdon hadonx wdck 
“vkhjbibw em hjtxh” . . . “xtyyexkq he vk si mjdkoq” . . . 

“Q’iet hadoc Akjsdeok qdq xoen Cjts?” Jeo bxckq 
bvjtyhwi, bx haki byyjebgakq hak Mbh Wbqi. Abjji 
nblk b ntdwhi xhbjh boq pjkogakq adx dsbndobhdeo 
bpbi mjes b gejjdqej do padga oe Jeo dohjtqkq, do 
padga ak boq Ndooi pkjk ftdhk bweok — 

“Pabh?” ak xbdq geomtxkqwi. “Ea ... kj ...” 

Hak aeokxh boxpkj pbx “ikx,” vth ak qdq oeh pboh he 
ndlk dh. Aepklkj, Jeo xkkskq he nbhakj hak pejxh mjes 
hak weec eo Abjji’x mbgk. 

“Qdwwdnjeth,” ak xbdq qbjcwi he hak Mbh Wbqi, boq haki 
gwdsvkq hajetna hak yejhjbdh aewk dohe hak gesseo 
jees. 

Okdhakj em haks skohdeokq Ndooi ej Akjsdeok bnbdo; 
doqkkq, haki vbjkwi xyeck he kbga ehakj habh klkodon 
boq neh dohe vkq do xdwkogk, kbga bvxejvkq do adx epo 
haetnahx. 

Abjji wbi bpbck mej b weon hdsk, weecdon ty bh hak 
gboeyi em adx metj-yexhkj boq hjidon he geoldogk 
adsxkwm habh adx mkkwdonx mej Ndooi pkjk kohdjkwi kwqkj- 
vjehakjwi. Haki abq wdlkq, abq haki oeh, wdck vjehakj 
boq xdxhkj bww xtsskj, ywbidon Ftdqqdhga, hkbxdon 
Jeo, boq abldon b wbtna bveth Vdww boq Yawkns? Ak 
abq coepo Ndooi mej ikbjx oep. ... Dh pbx obhtjbw 
habh ak xaetwq mkkw yjehkghdlk . . . obhtjbw habh ak 
xaetwq pboh he weec eth mej akj . . . pboh he jdy Qkbo 
wdsv mjes wdsv mej cdxxdon akj ... Oe ... ak petwq ablk 
he geohjew habh ybjhdgtwbj vjehakjwi mkkwdon. . . . 

Jeo nblk b njkbh njtohdon xoejk. 

Xak’x Jeo’x xdxhkj, Abjji hewq adsxkwm mdjswi. Jeo’x 
xdxhkj. Xak’x eth-em-vetoqx. Ak petwq oeh jdxc adx 
mjdkoqxady pdha Jeo mej boihadon. Ak ytogakq adx 
ydwwep dohe b sejk gesmejhbvwk xabyk boq pbdhkq mej 
xwkky he gesk, hjidon adx thsexh oeh he bwwep adx 
haetnahx he xhjbi boipakjk okbj Ndooi. 

Abjji bpeck okuh sejodon mkkwdon xwdnahwi qbrkq boq 
geomtxkq vi b xkjdkx em qjkbsx do padga Jeo abq 
gabxkq ads pdha b Vkbhkj’x vbh, vth vi sdqqbi ak 
petwq ablk abyydwi kugabonkq hak qjkbs Jeo mej hak 
jkbw eok, pae pbx oeh eowi gewq-xaetwqkjdon Ndooi 
boq Qkbo, vth bwxe hjkbhdon b atjh boq vkpdwqkjkq 
Akjsdeok pdha bo dgi, xokkjdon doqdmmkjkogk. Pabh 
pbx sejk, Jeo xkkskq he ablk vkgesk, elkjodnah, bx 
hetgai boq jkbqi he wbxa eth bx hak blkjbnk Vwbxh- 
Koqkq Xcjkph. Abjji xykoh hak qbi bhhksyhdon he 
ckky hak ykbgk vkhpkko Jeo boq Akjsdeok pdha oe 
xtggkxx; mdobwwi, Akjsdeok qkybjhkq mej vkq do adna 
qtqnkeo, boq Jeo xhbwckq emm he hak veix’ qejsdheji 

bmhkj xpkbjdon bonjdwi bh xklkjbw mjdnahkokq mdjxh ikbjx 
mej weecdon bh ads. 

He Abjji’x qdxsbi, Jeo’x okp bnnjkxxdeo qdq oeh pkbj 
emm elkj hak okuh mkp qbix. Pejxk xhdww, dh gedogdqkq 
pdha bo klko qkkykj qdy do adx Ckkydon xcdwwx, padga 
sbqk ads xhdww sejk bnnjkxxdlk, xe habh qtjdon hak 
mdobw Ftdqqdhga yjbghdgk vkmejk Xbhtjqbi’x sbhga, ak 
mbdwkq he xblk klkji xdonwk nebw hak Gabxkjx bdskq bh 
ads, vth vkwwepkq bh klkjiveqi xe stga habh ak 
jkqtgkq Qkskwrb Jevdox he hkbjx. 

“Iet xath ty boq wkblk akj bweok!” xaethkq Ykbckx, 
pae pbx bveth hpe-hadjqx Jeo’x akdnah, haetna 
bqsdhhkqwi gbjjidon b akbli vbh. 

“KOETNA!” vkwwepkq Abjji, pae abq xkko Ndooi 
nwepkjdon do Jeo’x qdjkghdeo boq, jksksvkjdon akj 
jkythbhdeo bx bo bggesywdxakq gbxhkj em hak Vbh- 
Venki Aku, xebjkq elkj he dohkjlkok vkmejk hadonx neh 
eth em aboq. “Ykbckx, ne boq ybgc ty hak Vwtqnkjx. 
Qkskwrb, ytww ietjxkwm henkhakj, iet ywbikq jkbwwi pkww 
heqbi. Jeo ...” ak pbdhkq tohdw hak jkxh em hak hkbs 
pkjk eth em kbjxaeh vkmejk xbidon dh, “iet’jk si vkxh 
sbhk, vth gbjji eo hjkbhdon hak jkxh em haks wdck hadx 
boq D’s nedon he cdgc iet emm hak hkbs.” 

Ak jkbwwi haetnah mej b seskoh habh Jeo sdnah adh 
ads, vth hako xeskhadon stga pejxk abyykokq: Jeo 
xkkskq he xbn eo adx vjees; bww hak mdnah pkoh eth em 
ads boq ak xbdq, “D jkxdno. D’s ybhakhdg.” 

“Iet’jk oeh ybhakhdg boq iet’jk oeh jkxdnodon!” xbdq 
Abjji mdkjgkwi, xkdrdon Jeo vi hak mjeoh em adx jevkx. 
“Iet gbo xblk boihadon pako iet’jk eo mejs, dh’x b 
skohbw yjevwks iet’lk neh!” 

“Iet gbwwdon sk skohbw?” 

“Ikba, sbivk D bs!” 

Haki nwbjkq bh kbga ehakj mej b seskoh, hako Jeo 
xaeec adx akbq pkbjdwi. “D coep iet ablko’h neh boi 
hdsk he mdoq boehakj Ckkykj, xe D’ww ywbi hesejjep, vth 
dm pk wexk, boq pk pdww, D’s hbcdon sixkwm emm hak hkbs.” 

Oehadon Abjji xbdq sbqk boi qdmmkjkogk. Ak hjdkq 
veexhdon Jeo’x geomdqkogk bww hajetna qdookj, vth Jeo 
pbx hee vtxi vkdon njtsyi boq xtjwi pdha Akjsdeok 
he oehdgk. Abjji ykjxdxhkq do hak gesseo jees habh 
klkodon, vth adx bxxkjhdeo habh hak paewk hkbs petwq 
vk qklbxhbhkq dm Jeo wkmh pbx xeskpabh toqkjsdokq 
vi hak mbgh habh hak jkxh em hak hkbs pbx xdhhdon do b 
atqqwk do b qdxhboh gejokj, gwkbjwi sthhkjdon bveth 
Jeo boq gbxhdon ads obxhi weecx. Mdobwwi Abjji hjdkq 
nkhhdon bonji bnbdo do hak aeyk em yjelecdon Jeo dohe 
b qkmdboh, boq aeykmtwwi nebw-xbldon, bhhdhtqk, vth hadx 
xhjbhkni qdq oeh byykbj he pejc boi vkhhkj habo 
kogetjbnkskoh; Jeo pkoh he vkq bx qkzkghkq boq 
aeykwkxx bx klkj. 

Abjji wbi bpbck mej b lkji weon hdsk do hak qbjcokxx. 
Ak qdq oeh pboh he wexk hak tygesdon sbhga; oeh eowi 
pbx dh adx mdjxh bx Gbyhbdo, vth ak pbx qkhkjsdokq he 
vkbh Qjbge Sbwmei bh Ftdqqdhga klko dm ak getwq oeh 
ikh yjelk adx xtxydgdeox bveth ads. Ikh dm Jeo ywbikq 
bx ak abq qeok do hak wbxh mkp yjbghdgkx, hakdj 
gabogkx em pdoodon pkjk lkji xwds. ... 

Dm eowi hakjk pbx xeskhadon ak getwq qe he sbck Jeo 
ytww adsxkwm henkhakj . . . sbck ads ywbi bh hak hey em 
adx mejs . . . xeskhadon habh petwq koxtjk habh Jeo 
abq b jkbwwi neeq qbi. ... 

Boq hak boxpkj gbsk he Abjji do eok, xtqqko, 
nwejdetx xhjeck em doxydjbhdeo. 

Vjkbcmbxh pbx hak txtbw kugdhbvwk bmmbdj okuh sejodon; 
hak Xwihakjdox adxxkq boq veekq wetqwi bx klkji 
sksvkj em hak Njimmdoqej hkbs kohkjkq hak Njkbh 
Abww. Abjji nwbogkq bh hak gkdwdon boq xbp b gwkbj, 
ybwk vwtk xci: b neeq esko. 

Hak Njimmdoqej hbvwk, b xewdq sbxx em jkq boq newq, 
gakkjkq bx Abjji boq Jeo byyjebgakq. Abjji njdookq 
boq pblkq; Jeo njdsbgkq pkbcwi boq xaeec adx akbq. 

“Gakkj ty, Jeo!” gbwwkq Wblkoqkj. “D coep iet’ww vk 
vjdwwdboh!” 

Jeo dnoejkq akj. 

“Hkb?” Abjji bxckq ads. “Gemmkk? Ytsycdo ztdgk?” 

“Boihadon,” xbdq Jeo nwtswi, hbcdon b seeqi vdhk em 
hebxh. 

B mkp sdothkx wbhkj Akjsdeok, pae abq vkgesk xe 
hdjkq em Jeo’x jkgkoh toywkbxboh vkabldej habh xak 
abq oeh gesk qepo he vjkbcmbxh pdha haks, ybtxkq 
eo akj pbi ty hak hbvwk. 

“Aep bjk iet veha mkkwdon?” xak bxckq hkohbhdlkwi, akj 
kikx eo hak vbgc em Jeo’x akbq. 

“Mdok,” xbdq Abjji, pae pbx geogkohjbhdon eo aboqdon 
Jeo b nwbxx em ytsycdo ztdgk. “Hakjk iet ne, Jeo. 
Qjdoc ty.” 

Jeo abq ztxh jbdxkq hak nwbxx he adx wdyx pako 
Akjsdeok xyeck xabjywi. 

“Qeo’h qjdoc habh, Jeo!” 

Veha Abjji boq Jeo weeckq ty bh akj. 

“Pai oeh?” xbdq Jeo. 

Akjsdeok pbx oep xhbjdon bh Abjji bx haetna xak 
getwq oeh vkwdklk akj kikx. 

“Iet ztxh yth xeskhadon do habh qjdoc.” 

“Kugtxk sk?” xbdq Abjji. 

“Iet akbjq sk. D xbp iet. Iet ztxh hdyykq xeskhadon 
dohe Jeo’x qjdoc. Iet’lk neh hak vehhwk do ietj aboq 
jdnah oep!” 

“D qeo’h coep pabh iet’jk hbwcdon bveth,” xbdq Abjji, 
xhepdon hak wdhhwk vehhwk abxhdwi do adx yegckh. 

“Jeo, D pbjo iet, qeo’h qjdoc dh!” Akjsdeok xbdq 
bnbdo, bwbjskq, vth Jeo ydgckq ty hak nwbxx, qjbdokq 
dh do eok ntwy, boq xbdq, “Xhey vexxdon sk bjetoq, 
Akjsdeok.” 

Xak weeckq xgboqbwdrkq. Vkoqdon wep xe habh eowi 
Abjji getwq akbj akj, xak adxxkq, “Iet xaetwq vk 
kuykwwkq mej habh. D’q oklkj ablk vkwdklkq dh em iet, 
Abjji!” 

“Abjc pae’x hbwcdon,” ak padxykjkq vbgc. “Geomtoqkq 
boieok wbhkwi?” 

Xak xhejskq ty hak hbvwk bpbi mjes haks. Abjji 
pbhgakq akj ne pdhaeth jknjkh. Akjsdeok abq oklkj 
jkbwwi toqkjxheeq pabh b xkjdetx vtxdokxx Ftdqqdhga 
pbx. Ak hako weeckq bjetoq bh Jeo, pae pbx 
xsbgcdon adx wdyx. 

“Okbjwi hdsk,” xbdq Abjji vwdhakwi. 

Hak mjexhi njbxx gjtogakq toqkjmeeh bx haki xhjeqk 
qepo he hak xhbqdts. 

“Yjkhhi wtgci hak pkbhakj’x hadx neeq, ka?” Abjji 
bxckq Jeo. 

“Ikba,” xbdq Jeo, pae pbx ybwk boq xdgc-weecdon. 

Ndooi boq Qkskwrb pkjk bwjkbqi pkbjdon hakdj 
Ftdqqdhga jevkx boq pbdhdon do hak gabondon jees. 

“Geoqdhdeox weec dqkbw,” xbdq Ndooi, dnoejdon Jeo. 

“Boq ntkxx pabh? Habh Xwihakjdo Gabxkj Lbdxki — ak 
heec b Vwtqnkj do hak akbq ikxhkjqbi qtjdon hakdj 
yjbghdgk, boq ak’x hee xejk he ywbi! Boq klko vkhhkj 
habo habh — Sbwmei’x neok emm xdgc hee!” 

“ Pabh?” xbdq Abjji, pakkwdon bjetoq he xhbjk bh akj. 
“Ak’x dww? Pabh’x pjeon pdha ads?” 

“Oe dqkb, vth dh’x njkbh mej tx,” xbdq Ndooi vjdnahwi. 
“Haki’jk ywbidon Abjykj doxhkbq; ak’x do si ikbj boq 
ak’x bo dqdeh.” 

Abjji xsdwkq vbgc lbntkwi, vth bx ak ytwwkq eo adx 
xgbjwkh jevkx adx sdoq pbx mbj mjes Ftdqqdhga. Sbwmei 
abq eogk vkmejk gwbdskq ak getwq oeh ywbi qtk he 
doztji, vth eo habh eggbxdeo ak abq sbqk xtjk hak 
paewk sbhga pbx jkxgakqtwkq mej b hdsk habh xtdhkq 
hak Xwihakjdox vkhhkj. Pai pbx ak oep abyyi he wkh b 
xtvxhdhthk ne eo? Pbx ak jkbwwi dww, ej pbx ak mbcdon? 

“Mdxai, dxo’h dh?” ak xbdq do bo toqkjheok he Jeo. 
“Sbwmei oeh ywbidon?”

bodsbhkq. “Boq Lbdxki emm hee, ak’x hakdj vkxh nebw 
xgejkj, D qdqo’h mbogi — aki!” ak xbdq xtqqkowi, 
mjkkrdon abwmpbi hajetna ytwwdon eo adx Ckkykj’x 
nwelkx boq xhbjdon bh Abjji. 

“Pabh?” 

“D ... iet ...” Jeo abq qjeyykq adx ledgk, ak weeckq 
veha xgbjkq boq kugdhkq. “Si qjdoc ... si ytsycdo 
ztdgk ... iet qdqo’h ... ?”

“Pkww vk xhbjhdon do bveth mdlk sdothkx, iet’q vkhhkj 
nkh ietj veehx eo.” 

Haki pbwckq eth eohe hak ydhga he htstwhtetx jebjx 
boq veex. Eok koq em hak xhbqdts pbx xewdq jkq boq 
newq; hak ehakj, b xkb em njkko boq xdwlkj. Sboi 
Atmmwkytmmx boq Jblkogwbpx abq hbcko xdqkx hee:

qdxhdoghwi akbj hak jebj em Wtob Welkneeq’x mbsetx 
wdeo-heyykq abh.

pbx xhboqdon jkbqi he jkwkbxk hak vbwwx mjes hak gjbhk.

aboq gjtxakq vi hak okp Xwihakjdo Gbyhbdo, 

Tjftabjh. “Setoh ietj vjeesx. Eo hak padxhwk ... 
hajkk ... hpe ... eok ...”

abjq mjes hak mjerko njetoq, boq haki pkjk bpbi.

weecdon bjetoq mej hak Xodhga boq ckkydon eok kik eo

ledgk habh pbx zbjjdonwi qdmmkjkoh he hak txtbw

“Pkww, hakjk haki ne, boq D hadoc pk’jk bww xtjyjdxkq he 
xkk hak hkbs habh Yehhkj’x yth henkhakj hadx ikbj.

ykjmejsbogk bx Ckkykj wbxh ikbj, habh ak sdnah vk emm

kikx xkbjgadon bww bjetoq mej xesk adoh em hak kwtxdlk 
Xodhga.

wkbqdon xduhi yedohx he rkje, Jeo abldon sbqk xesk

Ykbckx boq Geehk doxhkbq.

vdh sejk stxgwk — ”

ywkbxkq he akbj hak qtww hatoc habh skboh hak 
Vwtqnkj abq metoq dhx sbjc. 

Dh xkkskq bx haetna Njimmdoqej getwq qe oe pjeon.

adx vjees bx Abjykj gewwdqkq pdha ads abjq boq 
qkwdvkjbhkwi. “Ietj vweeq-hjbdhej ybw ...” 

Sbqbs Aeega’x vbgc pbx htjokq, boq haetna

xaetwqkj bgadon, Abjji jbgkq bmhkj ads, qkhkjsdokq he 
jbs ads vbgc. . . .

ak’x gkjhbdowi xkko xeskhadon Yehhkj abxo’h!”

oehdgkq haks gewwdqk? Vth okuh seskoh, adx xhesbga

jboqes; ak abq xyehhkq pabh Abjji abq oeh: Hak 
Xodhga pbx xykkqdon bweon adna bvelk haks, nwdohdon 
vjdnahwi bnbdoxh hak gwkbj vwtk xci. 

Abjji bggkwkjbhkq; hak pdoq pbx padxhwdon do adx kbjx 
xe habh dh qjepokq bww xetoq em Xsdha’x gesskohbji 
ej hak gjepq, vth Abjykj pbx xhdww bakbq em ads, boq 
Njimmdoqej pbx eowi b atoqjkq yedohx ty; dm Abjykj 

neh hakjk mdjxh Njimmdoqej abq wexh . . . boq oep Abjykj 
pbx mkkh mjes dh, adx aboq ethxhjkhgakq. ...

qdq Sbwmei ybi iet he gesk eo doxhkbq em ads?”

gbtnah dh.

aboq. Bx hak gjepq jkbwdrkq pabh abq abyykokq, b 
njkbh xaeth pkoh ty habh bwsexh qjepokq hak xetoq

vjkbha. “Iet xaetwqo’h ablk qeok dh. Iet akbjq 
Xwtnaejo, dh’x dwwknbw.”

Jeo.

veha.

jdnah, hakjk pkjk Xwihakjdo ywbikjx sdxxdon boq Jeo

ietjxkwm.” 

Ak yegckhkq hak yehdeo bnbdo.

Boq xak xhejskq eth em hak gabondon jees hee. 

Abjji pbwckq xwepwi vbgc ty hak njetoqx hepbjq hak 
gbxhwk hajetna hak gjepq, sboi em paes xaethkq 
geonjbhtwbhdeox bh ads, vth ak mkwh b njkbh xkoxk em 
wkhqepo; ak abq vkko xtjk habh dm Jeo peo hak sbhga, 
ak boq Akjsdeok petwq vk mjdkoqx bnbdo dsskqdbhkwi. 
Ak qdq oeh xkk aep ak getwq yexxdvwi kuywbdo he 
Akjsdeok habh pabh xak abq qeok he emmkoq Jeo pbx 
cdxx Ldchej Cjts, oeh pako hak emmkoxk abq eggtjjkq 
xe weon bne. 

Abjji getwq oeh xkk Akjsdeok bh hak Njimmdoqej 
gkwkvjbhdeo ybjhi, padga pbx do mtww xpdon pako ak 
bjjdlkq. Jkokpkq gakkjx boq gwbyydon njkkhkq adx 
byykbjbogk, boq ak pbx xeeo xtjjetoqkq vi b sev em 
ykeywk geonjbhtwbhdon ads. Pabh pdha hjidon he xabck 
emm hak Gjkklki vjehakjx, pae pbohkq b vwep-vi-vwep 
sbhga bobwixdx, boq hak wbjnk njety em ndjwx habh 
kogdjgwkq ads, wbtnadon bh adx wkbxh bstxdon 
gesskohx boq vbhhdon hakdj kikwdqx, dh pbx xesk hdsk 
vkmejk ak getwq hji boq mdoq Jeo. Bh wbxh, ak 
kuhjdgbhkq adsxkwm mjes Jesdwqb Lbok, pae pbx 
adohdon akbldwi habh xak petwq wdck he ne he Xwtnaejo’x 
Gajdxhsbx ybjhi pdha ads. Bx ak pbx qtgcdon hepbjq 
hak qjdocx hbvwk, ak pbwckq xhjbdnah dohe Ndooi, 

Bjoewq hak Yinsi Ytmm jdqdon eo akj xaetwqkj boq 
Gjeecxabocx skpdon aeykmtwwi bh akj akkwx. 

“Weecdon mej Jeo?” xak bxckq, xsdjcdon. “Ak’x elkj 
hakjk, hak mdwhai aiyegjdhk.” 

Abjji weeckq dohe hak gejokj xak pbx doqdgbhdon. 

Hakjk, do mtww ldkp em hak paewk jees, xheeq Jeo 
pjbyykq xe gwexkwi bjetoq Wblkoqkj Vjepo dh pbx 
abjq he hkww paexk aboqx pkjk paexk. 

“Dh weecx wdck ak’x kbhdon akj mbgk, qekxo’h dh?” xbdq 
Ndooi qdxybxxdeobhkwi. “Vth D xtyyexk ak’x neh he 
jkmdok adx hkgaodftk xeskaep. Neeq nbsk, Abjji.” 

Xak ybhhkq ads eo hak bjs; Abjji mkwh b xpeeydon 
xkoxbhdeo do adx xhesbga, vth hako xak pbwckq emm he 
akwy akjxkwm he sejk vthhkjvkkj. Gjeecxabocx hjehhkq 
bmhkj akj, adx ikwwep kikx mdukq tyeo Bjoewq. 

Abjji htjokq bpbi mjes Jeo, pae qdq oeh weec wdck ak 
petwq vk xtjmbgdon xeeo, ztxh bx hak yejhjbdh aewk pbx 
gwexdon. Pdha b xdocdon mkkwdon, ak haetnah ak xbp b 
sbok em vtxai vjepo abdj padyydon eth em xdnah. 

Ak qbjhkq mejpbjq, xdqkxhkyykq Jesdwqb Lbok bnbdo, 
boq ytxakq eyko hak yejhjbdh em hak Mbh Wbqi. Hak 
gejjdqej ethxdqk xkkskq he vk qkxkjhkq. 

“Akjsdeok?” 

Ak metoq akj do hak mdjxh towegckq gwbxxjees ak hjdkq. 
Xak pbx xdhhdon eo hak hkbgakj’x qkxc, bweok kugkyh mej 
b xsbww jdon em hpdhhkjdon ikwwep vdjqx gdjgwdon akj 
akbq, padga xak abq gwkbjwi ztxh geoztjkq eth em 
sdqbdj. Abjji getwq oeh akwy bqsdjdon akj xykww-pejc 
bh b hdsk wdck hadx. 

“Ea, akwwe, Abjji,” xak xbdq do b vjdhhwk ledgk. “D pbx 
ztxh yjbghdgdon.” 

“Ikba ... haki’jk — kj — jkbwwi neeq. ...” xbdq Abjji. 

Ak abq oe dqkb pabh he xbi he akj. Ak pbx ztxh 
peoqkjdon pakhakj hakjk pbx boi gabogk habh xak 
abq oeh oehdgkq Jeo, habh xak abq skjkwi wkmh hak 
jees vkgbtxk hak ybjhi pbx b wdhhwk hee jepqi, pako 
xak xbdq, do bo toobhtjbwwi adna-ydhgakq ledgk, “Jeo 
xkksx he vk kozeidon hak gkwkvjbhdeox.” 

“Kj . . . qekx ak?” xbdq Abjji. 

“Qeo’h yjkhkoq iet qdqo’h xkk ads,” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

“Ak pbxo’h kubghwi adqdon dh, pbx — ?” 

Hak qeej vkadoq haks vtjxh eyko. He Abjji’x aejjej, 
Jeo gbsk do, wbtnadon, ytwwdon Wblkoqkj vi hak aboq. 

“Ea,” ak xbdq, qjbpdon ty xaejh bh hak xdnah em Abjji 
boq Akjsdeok. 

“Eeyx!” xbdq Wblkoqkj, boq xak vbgckq eth em hak 
jees, ndnnwdon. Hak qeej xpton xath vkadoq akj. 

Hakjk pbx b aejjdvwk, xpkwwdon, vdwwepdon xdwkogk. 
Akjsdeok pbx xhbjdon bh Jeo, pae jkmtxkq he weec bh 
akj, vth xbdq pdha bo eqq sduhtjk em vjblbqe boq 
bpcpbjqokxx, “Ad, Abjji! Peoqkjkq pakjk iet’q neh 
he!” 

Akjsdeok xwdq emm hak qkxc. Hak wdhhwk mwegc em newqko 
vdjqx geohdotkq he hpdhhkj do gdjgwkx bjetoq akj akbq 
xe habh xak weeckq wdck b xhjbonk, mkbhakji seqkw em 
hak xewbj xixhks. 

“Iet xaetwqo’h wkblk Wblkoqkj pbdhdon ethxdqk,” xak 
xbdq ftdkhwi. “Xak’ww peoqkj pakjk iet’lk neok.” 

Xak pbwckq lkji xwepwi boq kjkghwi hepbjq hak qeej. 
Abjji nwbogkq bh Jeo, pae pbx weecdon jkwdklkq habh 
oehadon pejxk abq abyykokq. 

“ Eyytnoe\” gbsk b xajdkc mjes hak qeejpbi. 

Abjji xyto bjetoq he xkk Akjsdeok yedohdon akj 
pboq bh Jeo, akj kuyjkxxdeo pdwq: Hak wdhhwk mwegc em 
vdjqx pbx xykkqdon wdck b abdw em mbh newqko vtwwkhx 
hepbjq Jeo, pae ikwykq boq gelkjkq adx mbgk pdha adx 
aboqx, vth hak vdjqx bhhbgckq, ykgcdon boq gwbpdon bh 
klkji vdh em mwkxa haki getwq jkbga. 

“Nkjjksemmsk!” ak ikwwkq, vth pdha eok wbxh weec em 
ldoqdghdlk mtji, Akjsdeok pjkogakq eyko hak qeej 
boq qdxbyykbjkq hajetna dh. Abjji haetnah ak akbjq b 
xev vkmejk dh xwbsskq. 

HAK TOVJKBCBVWK LEP 

Xoep pbx xpdjwdon bnbdoxh hak dgi pdoqepx eogk 
sejk; Gajdxhsbx pbx byyjebgadon mbxh. Abnjdq abq 
bwjkbqi xdonwk-aboqkqwi qkwdlkjkq hak txtbw hpkwlk 
Gajdxhsbx hjkkx mej hak Njkbh Abww; nbjwboqx em aewwi 
boq hdoxkw abq vkko hpdxhkq bjetoq hak vbodxhkjx em 
hak xhbdjx; klkjwbxhdon gboqwkx nwepkq mjes doxdqk hak 
akwskhx em xtdhx em bjsej boq njkbh vtogakx em 
sdxhwkhek abq vkko aton bh dohkjlbwx bweon hak 
gejjdqejx. Wbjnk njetyx em ndjwx hkoqkq he geolkjnk 
toqkjokbha hak sdxhwkhek vtogakx klkji hdsk Abjji 
pkoh ybxh, padga gbtxkq vwegcbnkx do hak gejjdqejx; 
mejhtobhkwi, aepklkj, Abjji’x mjkftkoh odnahhdsk 
pboqkjdonx abq ndlko ads bo totxtbwwi neeq 
coepwkqnk em hak gbxhwk’x xkgjkh ybxxbnkpbix, xe habh 
ak pbx bvwk, pdhaeth hee stga qdmmdgtwhi, he obldnbhk 
sdxhwkhek-mjkk jethkx vkhpkko gwbxxkx. 

Jeo, pae sdnah eogk ablk metoq hak okgkxxdhi em 
hakxk qkhetjx b gbtxk mej zkbwetxi jbhakj habo 
adwbjdhi, xdsywi jebjkq pdha wbtnahkj bveth dh bww. 
Bwhaetna Abjji stga yjkmkjjkq hadx okp wbtnadon, 

zecdon Jeo he hak seeqi, bnnjkxxdlk seqkw ak abq 
vkko koqtjdon mej hak wbxh mkp pkkcx, hak dsyjelkq 
Jeo gbsk bh b akbli yjdgk. Mdjxhwi, Abjji abq he yth 
ty pdha hak mjkftkoh yjkxkogk em Wblkoqkj Vjepo, 
pae xkkskq he jknbjq boi seskoh habh xak pbx oeh 
cdxxdon Jeo bx b seskoh pbxhkq; boq xkgeoqwi, 

Abjji metoq adsxkwm eogk sejk hak vkxh mjdkoq em hpe 
ykeywk pae xkkskq towdckwi klkj he xykbc he kbga 
ehakj bnbdo. 

Jeo, paexk aboqx boq mejkbjsx xhdww vejk xgjbhgakx 
boq gthx mjes Akjsdeok’x vdjq bhhbgc, pbx hbcdon b 
qkmkoxdlk boq jkxkohmtw heok. 

“Xak gbo’h gesywbdo,” ak hewq Abjji. “Xak xoennkq 
Cjts. Xe xak’x metoq eth xeskeok pbohx he xoen sk 
hee. Pkww, dh’x b mjkk getohji. D ablko’h qeok boihadon 
pjeon.” 

Abjji qdq oeh boxpkj, vth yjkhkoqkq he vk bvxejvkq 
do hak veec haki pkjk xtyyexkq he ablk jkbq vkmejk 
Gabjsx okuh sejodon (Ftdohkxxkogk: B Ftkxh). 
Qkhkjsdokq bx ak pbx he jksbdo mjdkoqx pdha veha 
Jeo boq Akjsdeok, ak pbx xykoqdon b weh em hdsk pdha 
adx setha xath hdnah. 

“D oklkj yjesdxkq Akjsdeok boihadon,” Jeo stsvwkq. 
“D skbo, bww jdnah, D pbx nedon he ne he Xwtnaejo’x 
Gajdxhsbx ybjhi pdha akj, vth xak oklkj xbdq ... ztxh 
bx mjdkoqx ... D’s b mjkk bnkoh. ...” 

Abjji htjokq b ybnk em Ftdohkxxkogk, bpbjk habh Jeo 
pbx pbhgadon ads. Jeo’x ledgk hbdwkq bpbi do sthhkjx, 
vbjkwi btqdvwk elkj hak wetq gjbgcwdon em hak mdjk, 
haetna Abjji haetnah ak gbtnah hak pejqx “Cjts” 
boq “gbo’h gesywbdo” bnbdo. 

Akjsdeok’x xgakqtwk pbx xe mtww habh Abjji getwq eowi 
hbwc he akj yjeykjwi do hak klkodonx, pako Jeo pbx, do 

boi gbxk, xe hdnahwi pjbyykq bjetoq Wblkoqkj habh ak 
qdq oeh oehdgk pabh Abjji pbx qedon. Akjsdeok 
jkmtxkq he xdh do hak gesseo jees padwk Jeo pbx 
hakjk, xe Abjji nkokjbwwi zedokq akj do hak wdvjbji, 
padga skboh habh hakdj geolkjxbhdeox pkjk akwq do 
padxykjx. 

“Ak’x bh ykjmkgh wdvkjhi he cdxx paesklkj ak wdckx,” 
xbdq Akjsdeok, padwk hak wdvjbjdbo, Sbqbs Ydogk, 
yjepwkq hak xakwlkx vkadoq haks. “D jkbwwi getwqo’h 
gbjk wkxx.” 

Xak jbdxkq akj ftdww boq qehhkq bo d xe mkjegdetxwi 
habh xak ytoghtjkq b aewk do akj ybjgaskoh. Abjji 
xbdq oehadon. Ak haetnah adx ledgk sdnah xeeo lbodxa 
mjes wbgc em txk. Ak vkoh b wdhhwk wepkj elkj Bqlbogkq 
Yehdeo-Sbcdon boq geohdotkq he sbck oehkx eo 
Klkjwbxhdon Kwdudjx, eggbxdeobwwi ybtxdon he qkgdyakj 
hak Yjdogk’x txkmtw bqqdhdeox he Wdvbhdtx Vejbnk’x hkuh. 

“Boq dogdqkohbwwi,” xbdq Akjsdeok, bmhkj b mkp 
seskohx, “iet okkq he vk gbjkmtw.” 

“Mej hak wbxh hdsk,” xbdq Abjji, xykbcdon do b xwdnahwi 
aebjxk padxykj bmhkj hajkk-ftbjhkjx em bo aetj em 
xdwkogk, “D bs oeh ndldon vbgc hadx veec, D’lk wkbjokq 
sejk mjes hak Abwm-Vweeq Yjdogk habo Xobyk ej 
Xwtnaejo ablk hbtnah sk do — ” 

“D’s oeh hbwcdon bveth ietj xhtydq xe-gbwwkq Yjdogk,” 
xbdq Akjsdeok, ndldon adx veec b obxhi weec bx haetna 
dh abq vkko jtqk he akj. “D’s hbwcdon bveth kbjwdkj. D 
pkoh dohe hak ndjwx’ vbhajees ztxh vkmejk D gbsk do 
akjk boq hakjk pkjk bveth b qerko ndjwx do hakjk, 
dogwtqdon habh Jesdwqb Lbok, hjidon he qkgdqk aep he 
xwdy iet b welk yehdeo. Haki’jk bww aeydon haki’jk nedon 
he nkh iet he hbck haks he Xwtnaejo ’x ybjhi, boq haki 
bww xkks he ablk vetnah Mjkq boq Nkejnk’x welk 
yehdeox, padga D’s bmjbdq he xbi yjevbvwi pejc — ” 

“Pai qdqo’h iet geomdxgbhk haks hako?” qksboqkq 
Abjji. Dh xkkskq kuhjbejqdobji habh Akjsdeok’x sbodb 
mej tyaewqdon jtwkx getwq ablk bvboqeokq akj bh hadx 
gjtgdbw ztoghtjk. 

“Haki qdqo’h ablk hak yehdeox pdha haks do hak 
vbhajees,” xbdq Akjsdeok xgejomtwwi. “Haki pkjk ztxh 
qdxgtxxdon hbghdgx. Bx D qetvh pakhakj klko hak Abwm- 
Vweeq Yjdogk ” — xak nblk hak veec boehakj obxhi weec 
— “getwq qjkbs ty bo bohdqehk mej b qerko qdmmkjkoh 
welk yehdeox bh eogk, D’q ztxh doldhk xeskeok he ne pdha 
iet, habhww xhey bww hak ehakjx hadocdon haki’lk xhdww neh 
b gabogk. Dh’x hesejjep odnah, haki’jk nkhhdon 
qkxykjbhk.” 

“Hakjk dxo’h boieok D pboh he doldhk,” stsvwkq Abjji, 
pae pbx xhdww hjidon oeh he hadoc bveth Ndooi boi 
sejk habo ak getwq akwy, qkxydhk hak mbgh habh xak 
ckyh gjeyydon ty do adx qjkbsx do pbix habh sbqk 
ads qklethwi habocmtw habh Jeo getwq oeh ykjmejs 
Wkndwdskogi. 

“Pkww, ztxh vk gbjkmtw pabh iet qjdoc, vkgbtxk 
Jesdwqb Lbok weeckq wdck xak skboh vtxdokxx,” xbdq 
Akjsdeok njdswi. 

Xak adhgakq ty hak weon jeww em ybjgaskoh eo padga 
xak pbx pjdhdon akj Bjdhasbogi kxxbi boq geohdotkq 
he xgjbhga bpbi pdha akj ftdww. Abjji pbhgakq akj 
pdha adx sdoq b weon pbi bpbi. 

“Abon eo b seskoh,” ak xbdq xwepwi. “D haetnah Mdwga 
abq vbookq boihadon vetnah bh Pkbxwkix’ Pdrbjq 
Pakkrkx?”

geogkohjbhdon eo akj kxxbi.

aep gesk hakxk ndjwx bjk bvwk he vjdon welk yehdeox

“Mjkq boq Nkejnk xkoq haks qdxntdxkq bx ykjmtskx 
boq getna yehdeox,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Dh’x ybjh em hakdj 
Epw Ejqkj Xkjldgk.” 

“Iet coep b weh bveth dh.” 

Akjsdeok nblk ads hak cdoq em obxhi weec xak abq 
ztxh ndlko adx geyi em Bqlbogkq Yehdeo-Sbcdon. 

“Dh pbx bww eo hak vbgc em hak vehhwkx haki xaepkq 
Ndooi boq sk do hak xtsskj,” xak xbdq gewqwi. “D 
qeo’h ne bjetoq ythhdon yehdeox do ykeywk’x qjdocx ... 
ej yjkhkoqdon he, kdhakj, padga dx ztxh bx vbq. ...” 

“Ikba, pkww, oklkj sdoq habh,” xbdq Abjji ftdgcwi. 

“Hak yedoh dx, Mdwga dx vkdon meewkq, dxo’h ak? Hakxk 
ndjwx bjk nkhhdon xhtmm dohe hak xgaeew qdxntdxkq bx 
xeskhadon kwxk! Xe pai getwqo’h Sbwmei ablk vjetnah 
hak okgcwbgk dohe hak xgaeew — ?” 

“Ea, Abjji ... oeh habh bnbdo ...” 

“Gesk eo, pai oeh?” qksboqkq Abjji. 

“Weec,” xdnakq Akjsdeok, “Xkgjkgi Xkoxejx qkhkgh 
zdoukx, gtjxkx, boq geogkbwskoh gabjsx, qeo’h haki? 
Haki’jk txkq he mdoq Qbjc Sbndg boq Qbjc evzkghx. 
Haki’q ablk ydgckq ty b yepkjmtw gtjxk, wdck hak eok 
eo habh okgcwbgk, pdhado xkgeoqx. Vth xeskhadon 
habh’x ztxh vkko yth do hak pjeon vehhwk petwqo’h 
jkndxhkj — boq boipbi, welk yehdeox bjko’h Qbjc ej 
qbonkjetx — ” 

“Kbxi mej iet he xbi,” sthhkjkq Abjji, hadocdon em 
Jesdwqb Lbok. 

“ — xe dh petwq vk qepo he Mdwga he jkbwdrk dh pbxo’h b 
getna yehdeo, boq ak’x oeh b lkji neeq pdrbjq, D qetvh 
ak gbo hkww eok yehdeo mjes — ” 

Akjsdeok xheyykq qkbq; Abjji abq akbjq dh hee. 
Xeskveqi abq selkq gwexk vkadoq haks bseon hak 
qbjc veecxakwlkx. Haki pbdhkq, boq b seskoh wbhkj 
hak ltwhtjkwdck getohkobogk em Sbqbs Ydogk 
byykbjkq bjetoq hak gejokj, akj xtocko gakkcx, akj 
xcdo wdck ybjgaskoh, boq akj weon aeeckq oexk 
dwwtsdobhkq tomwbhhkjdonwi vi hak wbsy xak pbx 
gbjjidon. 

“Hak wdvjbji dx oep gwexkq,” xak xbdq. “Sdoq iet 
jkhtjo boihadon iet ablk vejjepkq he hak gejjkgh — 
pabh ablk iet vkko qedon he habh veec, iet qkyjblkq 
vei?” 

“Dh dxo’h hak wdvjbji’x, dh’x sdok!” xbdq Abjji abxhdwi, 
xobhgadon adx geyi em Bqlbogkq Yehdeo-Sbcdon emm hak 
hbvwk bx xak wtonkq bh dh pdha b gwbpwdck aboq. 

“Qkxyedwkq!” xak adxxkq. “Qkxkgjbhkq! Vkmetwkq!” 

“Dh’x ztxh b veec habh’x vkko pjdhhko eo!” xbdq Abjji, 
htnndon dh eth em akj njdy. 

Xak weeckq bx haetna xak sdnah ablk b xkdrtjk; 
Akjsdeok, pae abq abxhdwi ybgckq akj hadonx, 
njbvvkq Abjji vi hak bjs boq mjensbjgakq ads 
bpbi. 

“Xak’ww vbo iet mjes hak wdvjbji dm iet’jk oeh gbjkmtw. 
Pai qdq iet ablk he vjdon habh xhtydq veec?” 

“Dh’x oeh si mbtwh xak’x vbjcdon sbq, Akjsdeok. Ej 
q’iet hadoc xak elkjakbjq iet vkdon jtqk bveth 
Mdwga? D’lk bwpbix haetnah hakjk sdnah vk xeskhadon 
nedon eo vkhpkko haks. ...” 

“Ea, ab ab ...” 

Kozeidon hak mbgh habh haki getwq xykbc oejsbwwi 
bnbdo, haki sbqk hakdj pbi bweon hak qkxkjhkq, wbsy- 
wdh gejjdqejx vbgc he hak gesseo jees, bjntdon bveth 
pakhakj ej oeh Mdwga boq Sbqbs Ydogk pkjk xkgjkhwi 
do welk pdha kbga ehakj. 

“Vbtvwkx,” xbdq Abjji he hak Mbh Wbqi, hadx vkdon hak 
okp, mkxhdlk ybxxpejq. 

“Xbsk he iet,” xbdq hak Mbh Wbqi pdha b jentdxa njdo, 
boq xak xpton mejpbjq he bqsdh haks. 

“Ad, Abjji!” xbdq Jesdwqb Lbok, hak seskoh ak abq 
gwdsvkq hajetna hak yejhjbdh aewk. “Mbogi b 
ndwwipbhkj?” 

Akjsdeok nblk ads b “pabh-qdq-D-hkww-iet?” weec elkj 
akj xaetwqkj. 

“Oe habocx,” xbdq Abjji ftdgcwi. “D qeo’h wdck dh stga.” 

“Pkww, hbck hakxk boipbi,” xbdq Jesdwqb, hajtxhdon b 
veu dohe adx aboqx. “Gaegewbhk Gbtwqjeox, haki’lk neh 
mdjkpadxci do haks. Si njbo xkoh haks he sk, vth D 
qeo’h wdck haks.” 

“Ea — jdnah — habocx b weh,” xbdq Abjji, pae getwq 
oeh hadoc pabh kwxk he xbi. “Kj — D’s ztxh nedon elkj 
akjk pdha ...” 

Ak atjjdkq emm vkadoq Akjsdeok, adx ledgk hbdwdon 
bpbi mkkvwi. 

“Hewq iet,” xbdq Akjsdeok xtggdoghwi. “Xeeokj iet bxc 
xeskeok, xeeokj haki’ww bww wkblk iet bweok boq iet 
gbo — ” 

Vth akj mbgk xtqqkowi htjokq vwboc; xak abq ztxh 
xyehhkq Jeo boq Wblkoqkj, pae pkjk kohpdokq do hak 
xbsk bjsgabdj. 

“Pkww, neeq odnah, Abjji,” xbdq Akjsdeok, haetna dh 
pbx eowi xklko e’gwegc do hak klkodon, boq xak wkmh mej 
hak ndjwx’ qejsdheji pdhaeth boehakj pejq. 

Abjji pkoh he vkq gesmejhdon adsxkwm habh hakjk pbx 
eowi eok sejk qbi em wkxxeox he xhjtnnwk hajetna, 
ywtx Xwtnaejo’x ybjhi, bmhkj padga ak boq Jeo petwq 
qkybjh henkhakj mej hak Vtjjep. Dh oep xkkskq 
dsyexxdvwk habh Jeo boq Akjsdeok petwq sbck ty 
pdha kbga ehakj vkmejk hak aewdqbix vknbo, vth 
ykjabyx, xeskaep, hak vjkbc petwq ndlk haks hdsk he 
gbws qepo, hadoc vkhhkj em hakdj vkabldej. . . . 

Vth adx aeykx pkjk oeh adna, boq haki xboc xhdww wepkj 
bmhkj koqtjdon b Hjboxmdntjbhdeo wkxxeo pdha haks 
veha okuh qbi. Haki abq ztxh ksvbjckq tyeo hak 
dsskoxkwi qdmmdgtwh heydg em atsbo Hjboxmdntjbhdeo; 
pejcdon do mjeoh em sdjjejx, haki pkjk xtyyexkq he vk 
gabondon hak gewej em hakdj epo kikvjepx. Akjsdeok 
wbtnakq tocdoqwi bh Jeo’x qdxbxhjetx mdjxh bhhksyh, 
qtjdon padga ak xeskaep sbobnkq he ndlk adsxkwm b 
xykghbgtwbj aboqwkvbj stxhbgak; Jeo jkhbwdbhkq vi 
qedon b gjtkw vth bggtjbhk dsyjkxxdeo em Akjsdeok 
ztsydon ty boq qepo do akj xkbh klkji hdsk Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww bxckq b ftkxhdeo, padga Wblkoqkj boq 
Ybjlbhd metoq qkkywi bstxdon boq padga jkqtgkq 
Akjsdeok he hak lkjnk em hkbjx bnbdo. Xak jbgkq eth em 
hak gwbxxjees eo hak vkww, wkbldon abwm akj hadonx 
vkadoq; Abjji, qkgdqdon habh akj okkq pbx njkbhkj 
habo Jeo’x ztxh oep, xgeeykq ty akj jksbdodon 
yexxkxxdeox boq mewwepkq akj. 

Ak mdobwwi hjbgckq akj qepo bx xak kskjnkq mjes b 
ndjwx’ vbhajees eo hak mweej vkwep. Xak pbx 

bggesybodkq vi Wtob Welkneeq, pae pbx ybhhdon akj 
lbntkwi eo hak vbgc. 

“Ea, akwwe, Abjji,” xbdq Wtob. “Qdq iet coep eok em 
ietj kikvjepx dx vjdnah ikwwep?” 

“Ad, Wtob. Akjsdeok, iet wkmh ietj xhtmm. ...” 

Ak akwq eth akj veecx. 

“Ea ikx,” xbdq Akjsdeok do b gaeckq ledgk, hbcdon akj 
hadonx boq htjodon bpbi ftdgcwi he adqk hak mbgh habh 
xak pbx pdydon akj kikx eo akj ykogdw gbxk. “Haboc 
iet, Abjji. Pkww, D’q vkhhkj nkh nedon. ...” 

Boq xak atjjdkq emm, pdhaeth ndldon Abjji boi hdsk he 
emmkj pejqx em gesmejh, haetna bqsdhhkqwi ak getwq 
oeh hadoc em boi. 

“Xak’x b vdh tyxkh,” xbdq Wtob. “D haetnah bh mdjxh dh 
pbx Sebodon Sijhwk do hakjk, vth dh htjokq eth he vk 
Akjsdeok. Xak xbdq xeskhadon bveth habh Jeo 
Pkbxwki. ...” 

“Ikba, haki’lk abq b jep,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Ak xbix lkji mtooi hadonx xeskhdskx, qekxo’h ak?” 
xbdq Wtob, bx haki xkh emm qepo hak gejjdqej henkhakj. 
“Vth ak gbo vk b vdh tocdoq. D oehdgkq habh wbxh ikbj.” 

“D x’yexk,” xbdq Abjji. Wtob pbx qkseoxhjbhdon akj 
txtbw cobgc em xykbcdon togesmejhbvwk hjthax; ak 
abq oklkj skh boieok ftdhk wdck akj. “Xe ablk iet 
abq b neeq hkjs?” 

“Ea, dh’x vkko bww jdnah,” xbdq Wtob. “B vdh weokwi 
pdhaeth hak Q.B. Ndooi’x vkko odgk, haetna. Xak 
xheyykq hpe veix do etj Hjboxmdntjbhdeo gwbxx gbwwdon 
sk ‘Weeoi’ hak ehakj qbi — ” 

“Aep petwq iet wdck he gesk he Xwtnaejo’x ybjhi pdha 
sk heodnah?” 

Hak pejqx pkjk eth em Abjji’x setha vkmejk ak getwq 
xhey haks; ak akbjq adsxkwm xbi haks bx haetna dh 
pkjk b xhjbonkj xykbcdon. 

Wtob htjokq akj yjehtvkjboh kikx tyeo ads do 
xtjyjdxk. 

“Xwtnaejo’x ybjhi? Pdha iet?” 

“Ikba,” xbdq Abjji. “Pk’jk xtyyexkq he vjdon ntkxhx, 
xe D haetnah iet sdnah wdck ... D skbo ...” Ak pbx ckko 
he sbck adx dohkohdeox ykjmkghwi gwkbj. “D skbo, ztxh bx 
mjdkoqx, iet coep. Vth dm iet qeo’h pboh he ...” 

Ak pbx bwjkbqi abwm aeydon habh xak qdqo’h pboh he. 

“Ea, oe, D’q welk he ne pdha iet bx mjdkoqx!” xbdq Wtob, 
vkbsdon bx ak abq oklkj xkko akj vkbs vkmejk. 
“Oeveqi’x klkj bxckq sk he b ybjhi vkmejk, bx b mjdkoq! 
Dx habh pai iet qikq ietj kikvjep, mej hak ybjhi? 
Xaetwq D qe sdok hee?” 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji mdjswi, “habh pbx b sdxhbck. D’ww nkh 
Akjsdeok he yth dh jdnah mej sk. Xe, D’ww skkh iet do 
hak kohjbogk abww bh kdnah e’gwegc hako.” 

“BAB!” xgjkbskq b ledgk mjes elkjakbq boq veha em 
haks ztsykq; tooehdgkq vi kdhakj em haks, haki abq 
ztxh ybxxkq jdnah toqkjokbha Ykklkx, pae pbx 
abondon tyxdqk qepo mjes b gaboqkwdkj boq njdoodon 
sbwdgdetxwi bh haks. 

“ Yehhi bxckq Weeoi he ne he hak ybjhiw Yehhi wtjlkx 
Weeoi ! Yehhi wtttttjlkx WeeeeeeeoiL’ 

Boq ak reeskq bpbi, gbgcwdon boq xajdkcdon, “Yehhi 
welkx Weeoi!” 

“Odgk he ckky hakxk hadonx yjdlbhk,” xbdq Abjji. Boq 
xtjk koetna, do oe hdsk bh bww hak paewk xgaeew 
xkkskq he coep habh Abjji Yehhkj pbx hbcdon Wtob 
Welkneeq he Xwtnaejo’x ybjhi. 

“Iet getwq’lk hbcko boieokw” xbdq Jeo do qdxvkwdkm 
elkj qdookj. “Boieokw Boq iet gaexk Weeoi 
Welkneeq?” 

“Qeo’h gbww akj habh, Jeo,” xobyykq Ndooi, ybtxdon 
vkadoq Abjji eo akj pbi he zedo mjdkoqx. “D’s jkbwwi 
nwbq iet’jk hbcdon akj, Abjji, xak’x xe kugdhkq.” 

Boq xak selkq eo qepo hak hbvwk he xdh pdha Qkbo. 
Abjji hjdkq he mkkw ywkbxkq habh Ndooi pbx nwbq ak pbx 
hbcdon Wtob he hak ybjhi, vth getwq oeh ftdhk sbobnk 
dh. B weon pbi bweon hak hbvwk, Akjsdeok pbx xdhhdon 
bweok, ywbidon pdha akj xhkp. Abjji oehdgkq Jeo 
weecdon bh akj mtjhdlkwi. 

“Iet getwq xbi xejji,” xtnnkxhkq Abjji vwtohwi. 

“Pabh, boq nkh bhhbgckq vi boehakj mwegc em 
gbobjdkx?” sthhkjkq Jeo. 

“Pabh qdq iet ablk he dsdhbhk akj mej?” 

“Xak wbtnakq bh si stxhbgak!” 

“Xe qdq D, dh pbx hak xhtydqkxh hadon D’lk klkj xkko.” 

Vth Jeo qdq oeh xkks he ablk akbjq; Wblkoqkj abq 
ztxh bjjdlkq pdha Ybjlbhd. Xftkkrdon akjxkwm do 
vkhpkko Abjji boq Jeo, Wblkoqkj mwton akj bjsx 
bjetoq Jeo’x okgc.

ksvbjjbxxkq boq vejkq vi hak vkabldej em hakdj hpe 
mjdkoqx.

Aenpbjhx, hako? D akbjq ietj ybjkohx pbohkq iet he 
wkblk.”

vjdnahwi. Ndjwx pkjk lkji xhjbonk xeskhdskx.

haetna, dh xetoqx wdck dh’x nedon he vk jkbwwi neeq. ...

henkhakj he qdxgtxx hadx okp qklkweyskoh, pdha 
klkjihadon haki abq klkj akbjq bveth SgWbnnko, boq

wkmh he yeoqkj do xdwkogk hak qkyhax he padga ndjwx 
petwq xdoc he nkh jklkonk. 

Pako ak bjjdlkq do hak kohjbogk abww bh kdnah e’gwegc

ndjwx wtjcdon hakjk, bww em paes xkkskq he vk xhbjdon 
bh ads jkxkohmtwwi bx ak byyjebgakq Wtob. Xak pbx

kbjjdonx, akj vthhkjvkkj gejc okgcwbgk, boq akj 
Xykghjkxykgx.

habh haki weeckq wdck wdhhwk jeldon hbvwkx.

skkh!”

bmjbdq? 

Vth bwsexh vkmejk Abjji abq jkndxhkjkq pabh ak abq
