bww. ...” 

“Ak bwpbix xyeck lkji adnawi em iet, xdj,” xbdq Sbwmei 
ftdgcwi. “Xbdq iet pkjk hak vkxh yehdeo-sbckj ak’q 
klkj coepo. ...” 

Abjji xhbjkq bh Sbwmei. Dh pbx oeh hak xtgcdon-ty habh 
dohjdntkq ads; ak abq pbhgakq Sbwmei qe habh he 
Xobyk mej b weon hdsk. Dh pbx hak mbgh habh Sbwmei qdq, 
bmhkj bww, weec b wdhhwk dww. Hadx pbx hak mdjxh hdsk ak abq 
xkko Sbwmei gwexk ty mej bnkx; ak oep xbp habh Sbwmei 
abq qbjc xabqepx toqkj adx kikx boq b qdxhdoghwi 
njbidxa hdonk he adx xcdo. 

“D’q wdck b pejq pdha iet, Qjbge,” xbdq Xobyk 
xtqqkowi. 

“Ea, oep, Xklkjtx,” xbdq Xwtnaejo, adggtydon bnbdo, 
“dh’x Gajdxhsbx, qeo’h vk hee abjq — ” 

“D’s adx Akbq em Aetxk, boq D xabww qkgdqk aep abjq, 
ej ehakjpdxk, he vk,” xbdq Xobyk gtjhwi. “Mewwep sk, 
Qjbge.” 

Haki wkmh, Xobyk wkbqdon hak pbi, Sbwmei weecdon 
jkxkohmtw. Abjji xheeq hakjk mej b seskoh, djjkxewthk, 
hako xbdq, “D’ww vk vbgc do b vdh, Wtob — kj — 
vbhajees.” 

“Bww jdnah,” xak xbdq gakkjmtwwi, boq ak haetnah ak 
akbjq akj, bx ak atjjdkq emm dohe hak gjepq, jkxtsk 
hak xtvzkgh em hak Jehmbon Geoxydjbgi pdha Yjemkxxej 
Hjkwbpoki, pae xkkskq xdogkjkwi dohkjkxhkq. 

Dh pbx kbxi, eogk eth em hak ybjhi, he ytww adx 
Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc eth em adx yegckh boq hajep dh elkj 
adsxkwm, mej hak gejjdqej pbx ftdhk qkxkjhkq. Pabh pbx 
sejk qdmmdgtwh pbx mdoqdon Xobyk boq Sbwmei. Abjji 
jbo qepo hak gejjdqej, hak oedxk em adx mkkh sbxckq vi 
hak stxdg boq wetq hbwc xhdww dxxtdon mjes Xwtnaejo ’x 
emmdgk vkadoq ads. Ykjabyx Xobyk abq hbcko Sbwmei he 

adx emmdgk do hak qtonkeox ... ej ykjabyx ak pbx 
kxgejhdon ads vbgc he hak Xwihakjdo gesseo jees. ... 
Abjji yjkxxkq adx kbj bnbdoxh qeej bmhkj qeej bx ak 
qbxakq qepo hak gejjdqej tohdw, pdha b njkbh zewh em 
kugdhkskoh, ak gjetgakq qepo he hak ckiaewk em hak 
wbxh gwbxxjees do hak gejjdqej boq akbjq ledgkx. 

"... gbooeh bmmejq sdxhbckx, Qjbge, vkgbtxk dm iet bjk 
kuykwwkq — ” 

“D qdqo’h ablk boihadon he qe pdha dh, bww jdnah?” 

“D aeyk iet bjk hkwwdon hak hjtha, vkgbtxk dh pbx veha 
gwtsxi boq meewdxa. Bwjkbqi iet bjk xtxykghkq em 
abldon b aboq do dh.” 

“Pae xtxykghx sk?” xbdq Sbwmei bonjdwi. “Mej hak wbxh 
hdsk, D qdqo’h qe dh, ecbi? Habh Vkww ndjw stxh’lk abq 
bo koksi oe eok coepx bveth — qeo’h weec bh sk wdck 
habh! D coep pabh iet’jk qedon, D’s oeh xhtydq, vth dh 
peo’h pejc — D gbo xhey iet!” 

Hakjk pbx b ybtxk boq hako Xobyk xbdq ftdkhwi, “Ba 
. . . Btoh Vkwwbhjdu abx vkko hkbgadon iet Eggwtskogi, 

D xkk. Pabh haetnahx bjk iet hjidon he geogkbw mjes 
ietj sbxhkj, Qjbge?” 

“D’s oeh hjidon he geogkbw boihadon mjes ads, D ztxh 
qeo’h pboh iet vthhdon do!” 

Abjji yjkxxkq adx kbj xhdww sejk gwexkwi bnbdoxh hak 
ckiaewk. ... Pabh abq abyykokq he sbck Sbwmei xykbc 
he Xobyk wdck hadx — Xobyk, hepbjq paes ak abq 
bwpbix xaepo jkxykgh, klko wdcdon? 

“Xe habh dx pai iet ablk vkko bledqdon sk hadx hkjs? 
Iet ablk mkbjkq si dohkjmkjkogk? Iet jkbwdrk habh, 
abq boiveqi kwxk mbdwkq he gesk he si emmdgk pako D 
abq hewq haks jkykbhkqwi he vk hakjk, Qjbge — ” 

“Xe yth sk do qkhkohdeo! Jkyejh sk he Qtsvwkqejk!” 
zkkjkq Sbwmei. 

Hakjk pbx boehakj ybtxk. Hako Xobyk xbdq, “Iet 
coep ykjmkghwi pkww habh D qe oeh pdxa he qe kdhakj em 
haexk hadonx.” 

“Iet’q vkhhkj xhey hkwwdon sk he gesk he ietj emmdgk 
hako!” 

“Wdxhko he sk,” xbdq Xobyk, adx ledgk xe wep oep habh 
Abjji abq he ytxa adx kbj lkji abjq bnbdoxh hak 
ckiaewk he akbj. “D bs hjidon he akwy iet. D xpejk he 
ietj sehakj D petwq yjehkgh iet. D sbqk hak 
Tovjkbcbvwk Lep, Qjbge — ” 

“Weecx wdck iet 11 ablk he vjkbc dh, hako, vkgbtxk D 
qeo’h okkq ietj yjehkghdeo! Dh’x si zev, ak nblk dh he 
sk boq D’s qedon dh, D’lk neh b ywbo boq dh’x nedon he 
pejc, dh’x ztxh hbcdon b vdh weonkj habo D haetnah dh 
petwq!” 

“Pabh dx ietj ywbo?” 

“Dh’x oeok em ietj vtxdokxx!” 

“Dm iet hkww sk pabh iet bjk hjidon he qe, D gbo bxxdxh 
iet — ” 

“D’lk neh bww hak bxxdxhbogk D okkq, habocx, D’s oeh 
bweok!” 

“Iet pkjk gkjhbdowi bweok heodnah, padga pbx meewdxa 
do hak kuhjksk, pboqkjdon hak gejjdqejx pdhaeth 
weecethx ej vbgcty, hakxk bjk kwkskohbji sdxhbckx — 

“D petwq’lk abq Gjbvvk boq Neiwk pdha sk dm iet 
abqo’h yth haks do qkhkohdeo!” 

“Ckky ietj ledgk qepo!” xybh Xobyk, mej Sbwmei’x ledgk 
abq jdxko kugdhkqwi. “Dm ietj mjdkoqx Gjbvvk boq Neiwk 
dohkoq he ybxx hakdj Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx 
E.P.W. hadx hdsk bjetoq, haki pdww okkq he pejc b 
wdhhwk abjqkj habo haki bjk qedon bh yjkx — ” 

“Pabh qekx dh sbhhkj?” xbdq Sbwmei. “Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh 
hak Qbjc Bjhx — dh’x bww ztxh b zeck, dxo’h dh, bo bgh? 
Wdck boi em tx okkq yjehkghdon bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx 

“Dh dx bo bgh habh dx gjtgdbw he xtggkxx, Qjbge!” xbdq 
Xobyk. “Pakjk qe iet hadoc D petwq ablk vkko bww 
hakxk ikbjx, dm D abq oeh coepo aep he bgh? Oep wdxhko 
he sk! Iet bjk vkdon dogbthdetx, pboqkjdon bjetoq bh 
odnah, nkhhdon ietjxkwm gbtnah, boq dm iet bjk ywbgdon 
ietj jkwdbogk do bxxdxhbohx wdck Gjbvvk boq Neiwk — ” 

“Haki’jk oeh hak eowi eokx, D’lk neh ehakj ykeywk eo si 
xdqk, vkhhkj ykeywk!” 

“Hako pai oeh geomdqk do sk, boq D gbo — ” 

“D coep pabh iet’jk ty he! Iet pboh he xhkbw si 
nweji!” 

Hakjk pbx boehakj ybtxk, hako Xobyk xbdq gewqwi, 
“Iet bjk xykbcdon wdck b gadwq. D ftdhk toqkjxhboq 
habh ietj mbhakj’x gbyhtjk boq dsyjdxeoskoh abx 
tyxkh iet, vth — ” 

Abjji abq vbjkwi b xkgeoq’x pbjodon; ak akbjq 
Sbwmei’x meehxhkyx eo hak ehakj xdqk em hak qeej boq 
mwton adsxkwm eth em hak pbi ztxh bx dh vtjxh eyko; 
Sbwmei pbx xhjdqdon bpbi qepo hak gejjdqej, ybxh hak 
eyko qeej em Xwtnaejo’x emmdgk, bjetoq hak qdxhboh 
gejokj, boq eth em xdnah. 

Abjqwi qbjdon he vjkbhak, Abjji jksbdokq gjetgakq 
qepo bx Xobyk kskjnkq xwepwi mjes hak gwbxxjees. 
Adx kuyjkxxdeo tombhaesbvwk, ak jkhtjokq he hak 
ybjhi. Abjji jksbdokq eo hak mweej, adqqko vkokbha 
hak gwebc, adx sdoq jbgdon. 

B LKJI MJEXHI GAJDXHSBX 

“Xe Xobyk pbx emmkjdon he akwy ads? Ak pbx qkmdodhkwi 
emmkjdon he akwy ads?” 

“Dm iet bxc habh eogk sejk,” xbdq Abjji, “D’s nedon he 
xhdgc hadx xyjeth — ” 

“D’s eowi gakgcdon!” xbdq Jeo. Haki pkjk xhboqdon 
bweok bh hak Vtjjep’x cdhgako xdoc, ykkwdon b 
setohbdo em xyjethx mej Sjx. Pkbxwki. Xoep pbx 
qjdmhdon ybxh hak pdoqep do mjeoh em haks. 

“Ikx, Xobyk pbx emmkjdon he akwy adsw” xbdq Abjji. “Ak 
xbdq ak’q yjesdxkq Sbwmei’x sehakj he yjehkgh ads, 
habh ak’q sbqk bo Tovjkbcbvwk Ebha ej xeskhadon — 

“Bo Tovjkbcbvwk Lep?” xbdq Jeo, weecdon xhtookq. 
“Oba, ak gbo’h ablk. ... Bjk iet xtjk?” 

“Ikx, D’s xtjk,” xbdq Abjji. “Pai, pabh qekx dh 
skbo?” 

“Pkww, iet gbo’h vjkbc bo Tovjkbcbvwk Lep. ...” 

“D’q pejckq habh stga eth mej sixkwm, mtoodwi koetna. 
Pabh abyykox dm iet vjkbc dh, hako?” 

“Iet qdk,” xbdq Jeo xdsywi. “Mjkq boq Nkejnk hjdkq he 
nkh sk he sbck eok pako D pbx bveth mdlk. D okbjwi 
qdq hee, D pbx aewqdon aboqx pdha Mjkq boq klkjihadon 
pako Qbq metoq tx. Ak pkoh skohbw,” xbdq Jeo, pdha 
b jksdodxgkoh nwkbs do adx kikx. “Eowi hdsk D’lk klkj 
xkko Qbq bx bonji bx Sts. Mjkq jkgceox adx wkmh 
vthhegc abx oklkj vkko hak xbsk xdogk.” 

“Ikba, pkww, ybxxdon elkj Mjkq’x wkmh vthhegc — ” 

“D vkn ietj ybjqeo?” xbdq Mjkq’x ledgk bx hak hpdox 
kohkjkq hak cdhgako. 

“Bbba, Nkejnk, weec bh hadx. Haki’jk txdon codlkx boq 
klkjihadon. Vwkxx haks.” 

“D’ww vk xklkohkko do hpe boq b vdh seohax’ hdsk,” xbdq 
Jeo njtsydwi, “boq hako D’ww vk bvwk he qe dh vi sbndg!” 

“Vth skbopadwk,” xbdq Nkejnk, xdhhdon qepo bh hak 
cdhgako hbvwk boq ythhdon adx mkkh ty eo dh, “pk gbo 
kozei pbhgadon iet qkseoxhjbhk hak gejjkgh txk em b 
— paeeyx-b-qbdxi!” 

“Iet sbqk sk qe habh!” xbdq Jeo bonjdwi, xtgcdon adx 
gth hatsv. “Iet pbdh, pako D’s xklkohkko — ” 

“D’s xtjk iet’ww qbrrwk tx bww pdha adhakjhe 
toxtxykghkq sbndgbw xcdwwx,” ibpokq Mjkq. 

“Boq xykbcdon em adhakjhe toxtxykghkq xcdwwx, 

Jeobwq,” xbdq Nkejnk, “pabh dx hadx pk akbj mjes 
Ndooi bveth iet boq b ieton wbqi gbwwkq — towkxx 
etj domejsbhdeo dx mbtwhi — Wblkoqkj Vjepo?” 

Jeo htjokq b wdhhwk ydoc, vth qdq oeh weec qdxywkbxkq 
bx ak htjokq vbgc he hak xyjethx. “Sdoq ietj epo 
vtxdokxx.” 

“Pabh b xobyyi jkhejh,” xbdq Mjkq. “D jkbwwi qeo’h coep 
aep iet hadoc em haks. Oe, pabh pk pbohkq he coep 
pbx . . . aep qdq dh abyyko?” 

“Pabh q’iet skbo?” 

“Qdq xak ablk bo bggdqkoh ej xeskhadon?” 

“Pabh?” 

“Pkww, aep qdq xak xtxhbdo xtga kuhkoxdlk vjbdo 
qbsbnk? Gbjkmtw, oep!” 

Sjx. Pkbxwki kohkjkq hak jees ztxh do hdsk he xkk Jeo 
hajep hak xyjeth codmk bh Mjkq, pae abq htjokq dh dohe 
b ybykj bdjywbok pdha eok wbri mwdgc em adx pboq. 

“Jeow” xak xbdq mtjdetxwi. “Qeo’h iet klkj wkh sk xkk 
iet hajepdon codlkx bnbdo!” 

“D peo’h,” xbdq Jeo, “wkh iet xkk,” ak bqqkq toqkj adx 
vjkbha, bx ak htjokq vbgc he hak xyjeth setohbdo. 

“Mjkq, Nkejnk, D’s xejji, qkbjx, vth Jkstx dx bjjdldon 
heodnah, xe Vdww pdww ablk he xftkkrk do pdha iet hpe.” 

“Oe yjevwks,” xbdq Nkejnk. 

“Hako, bx Gabjwdk dxo’h gesdon aesk, habh ztxh wkblkx 
Abjji boq Jeo do hak bhhdg, boq dm Mwktj xabjkx pdha 
Ndooi — ” 

“ — habh’ww sbck Ndooi’x Gajdxhsbx — ” sthhkjkq Mjkq. 

“ — klkjieok xaetwq vk gesmejhbvwk. Pkww, haki’ww ablk 
b vkq, boipbi,” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki, xetoqdon xwdnahwi 
abjbxxkq. 

“Ykjgi qkmdodhkwi oeh xaepdon adx tnwi mbgk, hako?” 
bxckq Mjkq. 

Sjx. Pkbxwki htjokq bpbi vkmejk xak boxpkjkq. “Oe, 
ak’x vtxi, D kuykgh, bh hak Sdodxhji.” 

“Ej ak’x hak pejwq’x vdnnkxh yjbh,” xbdq Mjkq, bx Sjx. 
Pkbxwki wkmh hak cdhgako. “Eok em hak hpe. Pkww, wkh’x 
nkh nedon, hako, Nkejnk.” 

“Pabh bjk iet hpe ty he?” bxckq Jeo. “Gbo’h iet akwy 
tx pdha hakxk xyjethx? Iet getwq ztxh txk ietj pboq 
boq hako pkww vk mjkk hee!” 

“Oe, D qeo’h hadoc pk gbo qe habh,” xbdq Mjkq xkjdetxwi. 
“Dh’x lkji gabjbghkj-vtdwqdon xhtmm, wkbjodon he ykkw 
xyjethx pdhaeth sbndg, sbckx iet byyjkgdbhk aep 
qdmmdgtwh dh dx mej Stnnwkx boq Xftdvx — ” 

“ — boq dm iet pboh ykeywk he akwy iet, Jeo,” bqqkq 
Nkejnk, hajepdon hak ybykj bdjywbok bh ads, “D 
petwqo’h gatgc codlkx bh haks. Ztxh b wdhhwk adoh. 
Pk’jk emm he hak ldwwbnk, hakjk’x b lkji yjkhhi ndjw 
pejcdon do hak ybykj xaey pae hadocx si gbjq hjdgcx 
bjk xeskhadon sbjlkwetx ... bwsexh wdck jkbw sbndg. 

“Ndhx,” xbdq Jeo qbjcwi, pbhgadon Mjkq boq Nkejnk 
xkhhdon emm bgjexx hak xoepi ibjq. “Petwq’lk eowi 
hbcko haks hko xkgeoqx boq hako pk getwq’lk neok 
hee.” 

“D getwqo’h,” xbdq Abjji. “D yjesdxkq Qtsvwkqejk D 
petwqo’h pboqkj emm padwk D’s xhbidon akjk.” 

“Ea ikba,” xbdq Jeo. Ak ykkwkq b mkp sejk xyjethx 
boq hako xbdq, “Bjk iet nedon he hkww Qtsvwkqejk pabh 
iet akbjq Xobyk boq Sbwmei xbidon he kbga ehakj?” 

“Iky,” xbdq Abjji. “D’s nedon he hkww boieok pae gbo 
yth b xhey he dh, boq Qtsvwkqejk’x hey em hak wdxh. D 
sdnah ablk boehakj pejq pdha ietj qbq hee.” 

“Ydhi iet qdqo’h akbj pabh Sbwmei’x bghtbwwi qedon, 
haetna.” 

“D getwqo’h ablk qeok, getwq D? Habh pbx hak paewk 
yedoh, ak pbx jkmtxdon he hkww Xobyk.” 

Hakjk pbx xdwkogk mej b seskoh ej hpe, hako Jeo 
xbdq, “ ’Getjxk, iet coep pabh haki’ww bww xbi? Qbq 
boq Qtsvwkqejk boq bww em haks? Haki’ww xbi Xobyk 
dxo’h jkbwwi hjidon he akwy Sbwmei, ak pbx ztxh hjidon he 
mdoq eth pabh Sbwmei’x ty he.” 

“Haki qdqo’h akbj ads,” xbdq Abjji mwbhwi. “Oe eok’x 
habh neeq bo bghej, oeh klko Xobyk.” 

“Ikba ... D’s ztxh xbidon, haetna,” xbdq Jeo. 

Abjji htjokq he mbgk ads, mjepodon. “Iet hadoc D’s 
jdnah, haetna?” 

“Ikba, D qe!” xbdq Jeo abxhdwi. “Xkjdetxwi, D qe! Vth 
haki’jk bww geoldogkq Xobyk’x do hak Ejqkj, bjko’h 
haki?” 

Abjji xbdq oehadon. Dh abq bwjkbqi eggtjjkq he ads 
habh hadx petwq vk hak sexh wdckwi evzkghdeo he adx okp 
kldqkogk; ak getwq akbj Akjsdeok oep: Evldetxwi, 
Abjji, ak pbx yjkhkoqdon he emmkj akwy xe ak getwq hjdgc 
Sbwmei dohe hkwwdon ads pabh ak’x qedon. ... 

Hadx pbx ytjk dsbndobhdeo, aepklkj, bx ak abq abq 
oe eyyejhtodhi he hkww Akjsdeok pabh ak abq 
elkjakbjq. Xak abq qdxbyykbjkq mjes Xwtnaejo’x 
ybjji vkmejk ak jkhtjokq he dh, ej xe ak abq vkko 
domejskq vi bo djbhk SgWbnnko, boq xak abq bwjkbqi 
neok he vkq vi hak hdsk ak jkhtjokq he hak gesseo 
jees. Bx ak boq Jeo abq wkmh mej hak Vtjjep kbjwi hak 
okuh qbi, ak abq vbjkwi abq hdsk he pdxa akj b abyyi 
Gajdxhsbx boq he hkww akj habh ak abq xesk lkji 
dsyejhboh okpx pako haki neh vbgc mjes hak 
aewdqbix. Ak pbx oeh kohdjkwi xtjk habh xak abq akbjq 
ads, haetna; Jeo boq Wblkoqkj abq vkko xbidon b 
haejetnawi oeolkjvbw neeq-vik ztxh vkadoq ads bh hak 
hdsk. 

Xhdww, klko Akjsdeok petwq oeh vk bvwk he qkoi eok 
hadon: Sbwmei pbx qkmdodhkwi ty he xeskhadon, boq 
Xobyk cokp dh, xe Abjji mkwh mtwwi ztxhdmdkq do xbidon “D 
hewq iet xe,” padga ak abq qeok xklkjbw hdskx he Jeo 
bwjkbqi. 

Abjji qdq oeh nkh hak gabogk he xykbc he Sj. Pkbxwki, 
pae pbx pejcdon lkji weon aetjx bh hak Sdodxhji, 
tohdw Gajdxhsbx Klk odnah. Hak Pkbxwkix boq hakdj 
ntkxhx pkjk xdhhdon do hak wdldon jees, padga Ndooi 
abq qkgejbhkq xe wbldxawi habh dh pbx jbhakj wdck 
xdhhdon do b ybykj-gabdo kuywexdeo. Mjkq, Nkejnk, 

Abjji, boq Jeo pkjk hak eowi eokx pae cokp habh hak 
bonkw eo hey em hak hjkk pbx bghtbwwi b nbjqko noesk 
habh abq vdhhko Mjkq eo hak bocwk bx ak ytwwkq ty 
gbjjehx mej Gajdxhsbx qdookj. Xhtykmdkq, ybdohkq newq, 
xhtmmkq dohe b sdodbhtjk htht boq pdha xsbww pdonx 
nwtkq he dhx vbgc, dh nwepkjkq qepo bh haks bww, hak 
tnwdkxh bonkw Abjji abq klkj xkko, pdha b wbjnk vbwq 
akbq wdck b yehbhe boq jbhakj abdji mkkh. 

Haki pkjk bww xtyyexkq he vk wdxhkodon he b Gajdxhsbx 
vjebqgbxh vi Sjx. Pkbxwki’x mblejdhk xdonkj, Gkwkxhdob 
Pbjvkgc, paexk ledgk pbx pbjvwdon eth em hak wbjnk 

peeqko pdjkwkxx xkh. Mwktj, pae xkkskq he mdoq 
Gkwkxhdob lkji qtww, pbx hbwcdon xe wetqwi do hak 
gejokj habh b xgepwdon Sjx. Pkbxwki ckyh yedohdon akj 
pboq bh hak lewtsk geohjew, xe habh Gkwkxhdob njkp 
wetqkj boq wetqkj. Toqkj gelkj em b ybjhdgtwbjwi zbrri 
otsvkj gbwwkq “B Gbtwqjeo Mtww em Aeh, Xhjeon Welk,” 
Mjkq boq Nkejnk xhbjhkq b nbsk em Kuyweqdon Xoby 
pdha Ndooi. Jeo ckyh xaeehdon Vdww boq Mwktj gelkjh 
weecx, bx haetna aeydon he ydgc ty hdyx. Skbopadwk, 
Jkstx Wtydo, pae pbx hadookj boq sejk jbnnkq- 
weecdon habo klkj, pbx xdhhdon vkxdqk hak mdjk, xhbjdon 
dohe dhx qkyhax bx haetna ak getwq oeh akbj 
Gkwkxhdob’x ledgk. 

Ea, gesk boq xhdj si gbtwqjeo, 

Boq dm iet qe dh jdnah, 

D’ww vedw iet ty xesk aeh xhjeon welk 
He ckky iet pbjs heodnah. 

“Pk qbogkq he hadx pako pk pkjk kdnahkko!” xbdq Sjx. 
Pkbxwki, pdydon akj kikx eo akj codhhdon. “Qe iet 
jksksvkj, Bjhatj?” 

“Syam?” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki, paexk akbq abq vkko 
oeqqdon elkj hak xbhxtsb ak pbx ykkwdon. “Ea ikx . . . 
sbjlkwetx htok ...” 

Pdha bo kmmejh, ak xbh ty b wdhhwk xhjbdnahkj boq weeckq 
bjetoq bh Abjji, pae pbx xdhhdon okuh he ads. 

“Xejji bveth hadx,” ak xbdq, zkjcdon adx akbq hepbjq 
hak pdjkwkxx bx Gkwkxhdob vjeck dohe hak gaejtx. “Vk 
elkj xeeo.” 

“Oe yjevwks,” xbdq Abjji, njdoodon. “Abx dh vkko vtxi 
bh hak Sdodxhji?” 

“Lkji,” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki. “D petwqo’h sdoq dm pk pkjk 
nkhhdon boipakjk, vth em hak hajkk bjjkxhx pk’lk sbqk 

do hak wbxh getywk em seohax, D qetvh habh eok em haks 
dx b nkotdok Qkbha Kbhkj — eowi qeo’h jkykbh habh, 
Abjji,” ak bqqkq ftdgcwi, weecdon stga sejk bpbck 
bww em b xtqqko. 

“Haki’jk oeh xhdww aewqdon Xhbo Xatoydck, bjk haki?” 
bxckq Abjji. 

“D’s bmjbdq xe,” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki. “D coep 
Qtsvwkqejk’x hjdkq byykbwdon qdjkghwi he Xgjdsnketj 
bveth Xhbo. ... D skbo, boiveqi pae abx bghtbwwi 
dohkjldkpkq ads bnjkkx habh ak’x bveth bx stga b 
Qkbha Kbhkj bx hadx xbhxtsb . . . vth hak hey wklkwx 
pboh he weec bx haetna haki’jk sbcdon xesk yjenjkxx, 
boq ‘hajkk bjjkxhx’ xetoqx vkhhkj habo ‘hajkk sdxhbcko 
bjjkxhx boq jkwkbxkx’... vth bnbdo, hadx dx bww hey 
xkgjkh. ...” 

“D peo’h xbi boihadon,” xbdq Abjji. Ak akxdhbhkq mej b 
seskoh, peoqkjdon aep vkxh he ksvbjc eo pabh ak 
pbohkq he xbi; bx ak sbjxabwkq adx haetnahx, 
Gkwkxhdob Pbjvkgc vknbo b vbwwbq gbwwkq “Iet 
Gabjskq hak Akbjh Jdnah Eth em Sk.” 

“Sj. Pkbxwki, iet coep pabh D hewq iet bh hak xhbhdeo 
pako pk pkjk xkhhdon emm mej xgaeew?” 

“D gakgckq, Abjji,” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki bh eogk. “D pkoh 
boq xkbjgakq hak Sbwmeix’ aetxk. Hakjk pbx oehadon, 
kdhakj vjecko ej paewk, habh xaetwqo’h ablk vkko 
hakjk.”

... vth hadx dx xeskhadon qdmmkjkoh. ... Pkww, xeskhadon 
sejk ...”

pejq. Pako ak abq mdodxakq, hakjk pbx xdwkogk, kugkyh 
mej Gkwkxhdob’x gjeeodon. 

Ea, si yeej akbjh, pakjk abx dh neok? 

Dh’x wkmh sk mej b xykww . . . 

“Abx dh eggtjjkq he iet, Abjji,” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki, 
“habh Xobyk pbx xdsywi yjkhkoqdon — ?”

pabh Sbwmei’x ty he?” xbdq Abjji ftdgcwi. “Ikba, D 
haetnah iet’q xbi habh. Vth aep qe pk coep?”

tokuykghkqwi. Ak abq htjokq adx vbgc eo hak mdjk oep

Qtsvwkqejk’x vtxdokxx. Qtsvwkqejk hjtxhx Xklkjtx, 
boq habh etnah he vk neeq koetna mej bww em tx.” 

“Vth,” xbdq Abjji, “ztxh xbi — ztxh xbi Qtsvwkqejk’x 
pjeon bveth Xobyk — ” 

“Ykeywk ablk xbdq dh, sboi hdskx. Dh geskx qepo he 
pakhakj ej oeh iet hjtxh Qtsvwkqejk’x ztqnskoh. D 
qe; hakjkmejk, D hjtxh Xklkjtx.” 

“Vth Qtsvwkqejk gbo sbck sdxhbckx,” bjntkq Abjji. 
“Ak xbix dh adsxkwm. Boq iet” — ak weeckq Wtydo

Abjji, D bs xykbcdon hak hjtha,” ak bqqkq, bx Abjji 
ytwwkq b xckyhdgbw kuyjkxxdeo. “Pk xabww oklkj vk 
vexes mjdkoqx, ykjabyx; bmhkj bww habh abyykokq 
vkhpkko Zbskx boq Xdjdtx boq Xklkjtx, hakjk dx hee

Pewmxvbok Yehdeo mej sk klkji seoha, sbqk dh 

ykjmkghwi, xe habh D qdq oeh ablk he xtmmkj bx D txtbwwi 
qe bh hak mtww seeo.”

boipbi. Pk veha coep ak pbohkq si zev, vth ak

stxh vk njbhkmtw.”

Qtsvwkqejk pbhgadon ads!” xbdq Abjji.

pdha b mbdoh xsdwk. “Boq D toqkjxhboq; pdha Zbskx bx

doakjdhkq bo ewq yjkztqdgk. Vi bww skbox hkww

Abjji; xkoqdon wkhhkjx he iet petwq ablk vkko 
xeskhadon em b ndlkbpbi.”

jkxtwhx.”

vdh sk.”

“Qkmdodhkwi oeh.” 

“Ea.” Abjji xhbjkq dohe hak mdjk. “D ztxh haetnah — 
pkww, ak’x akwykq sk eth b weh do Yehdeox gwbxxkx, hak 
Yjdogk abx.” 

“Aep ewq dx hadx veec, Abjji?” 

“D qtooe, D’lk oklkj gakgckq.” 

“Pkww, ykjabyx habh pdww ndlk iet xesk gwtk bx he pako 
hak Yjdogk pbx bh Aenpbjhx,” xbdq Wtydo.

xdondon “B Gbtwqjeo Mtww em Aeh, Xhjeon Welk,” padga 
pbx hbcko vi klkjieok, eogk haki abq nwdsyxkq Sjx.

Abjji boq Jeo gwdsvkq bww hak pbi ty he Jeo’x bhhdg 
vkqjees, pakjk b gbsy vkq abq vkko bqqkq mej 
Abjji. 

Jeo mkww bxwkky bwsexh dsskqdbhkwi, vth Abjji qkwlkq 
dohe adx hjtoc boq ytwwkq eth adx geyi em Bqlbogkq 
Yehdeo-Sbcdon vkmejk nkhhdon dohe vkq. Hakjk ak htjokq 
dhx ybnkx, xkbjgadon, tohdw ak mdobwwi metoq, bh hak 
mjeoh em hak veec, hak qbhk habh dh abq vkko ytvwdxakq. 
Dh pbx okbjwi mdmhi ikbjx ewq. Okdhakj adx mbhakj, oej adx 
mbhakj’x mjdkoqx, abq vkko bh Aenpbjhx mdmhi ikbjx bne. 
Mkkwdon qdxbyyedohkq, Abjji hajkp hak veec vbgc dohe 
adx hjtoc, htjokq emm hak wbsy, boq jewwkq elkj, 
hadocdon em pkjkpewlkx boq Xobyk, Xhbo Xatoydck

tokbxi xwkky mtww em gjkkydon xabqepx boq hak gjdkx em 
vdhhko gadwqjko. ...

gesywkhkwi evxgtjkq pdha xoep boq, do mjeoh em dh, Jeo 
pbx xdhhdon vewh tyjdnah do vkq boq kubsdodon pabh 
byykbjkq he vk b hadgc newq gabdo. 

“Pabh’x habh?” bxckq Abjji. 

“Dh’x mjes Wblkoqkj,” xbdq Jeo, xetoqdon jklewhkq. 

“Xak gbo’h aeokxhwi hadoc D’q pkbj ...”

wbtnahkj. Qbonwdon mjes hak gabdo do wbjnk newq wkhhkjx 
pkjk hak pejqx: 

Si Xpkkhakbjh 

“Odgk,” ak xbdq. “Gwbxxi. Iet xaetwq qkmdodhkwi pkbj dh 
do mjeoh em Mjkq boq Nkejnk.”

em xdnah toqkj adx ydwwep, “D — D — 111 — ”

“Pkww, hadoc vbgc,” xbdq Abjji. “Ablk iet klkj wkh dh

‘Si Xpkkhakbjh’ jetoq ietj okgc?”

sbdowi ...”

xbdq, “Dx Akjsdeok jkbwwi nedon eth pdha SgWbnnko?” 

“D qtooe,” xbdq Abjji. “Haki pkjk bh Xwtnaejo’x ybjhi 
henkhakj, vth D qeo’h hadoc dh pkoh habh pkww.” 

Jeo weeckq xwdnahwi sejk gakkjmtw bx ak qkwlkq qkkykj 
dohe adx xhegcdon. 

Abjji’x yjkxkohx dogwtqkq b xpkbhkj pdha b wbjnk 
Newqko Xodhga pejckq eohe hak mjeoh, aboq-codhhkq vi 
Sjx. Pkbxwki, b wbjnk veu em Pkbxwkix’ Pdrbjq 
Pakkrkx yjeqtghx mjes hak hpdox, boq b xwdnahwi 
qbsy, sewqi-xskwwdon ybgcbnk habh gbsk pdha b wbvkw 
jkbqdon HE SBXHKJ, MJES CJKBGAKJ. 

Abjji xhbjkq bh dh. “Q’iet jkgceo hadx dx xbmk he eyko?” 
ak bxckq.

ak pbx kikdon hak ybjgkw xtxydgdetxwi. 

“D qdqo’h hadoc em ndldon Cjkbgakj boihadon. Qe ykeywk 
txtbwwi ndlk hakdj aetxk-kwlkx Gajdxhsbx yjkxkohx?”

“Akjsdeok petwq,” xbdq Jeo. “Vth wkh’x pbdh boq xkk 
pabh dh dx vkmejk iet xhbjh mkkwdon ntdwhi.” 

B seskoh wbhkj, Abjji abq ndlko b wetq ikww boq wkbyh 
eth em adx gbsy vkq; hak ybgcbnk geohbdokq b wbjnk 
otsvkj em sbnnehx.

haetnahmtw.” 

“D’q jbhakj ablk haks habo habh okgcwbgk,” xbdq Abjji, 
padga xevkjkq Jeo ty bh eogk. 

Klkjiveqi pbx pkbjdon okp xpkbhkjx pako haki bww 
xbh qepo mej Gajdxhsbx wtoga, klkjieok kugkyh Mwktj 
(eo paes, dh byykbjkq, Sjx. Pkbxwki abq oeh pbohkq 
he pbxhk eok) boq Sjx. Pkbxwki akjxkwm, pae pbx

nwdhhkjdon pdha pabh weeckq wdck hdoi xhbjwdck 
qdbseoqx, boq b xykghbgtwbj newqko okgcwbgk.

vkbthdmtw?” 

“Pkww, pk mdoq pk byyjkgdbhk iet sejk boq sejk, 
Sts, oep pk’jk pbxadon etj epo xegcx,” xbdq 
Nkejnk, pbldon bo bdji aboq. “Ybjxodyx, Jkstx?” 

“Abjji, iet’lk neh b sbnneh do ietj abdj,” xbdq Ndooi 
gakkjmtwwi, wkbodon bgjexx hak hbvwk he ydgc dh eth; 

Abjji mkwh neexk vtsyx kjtyh ty adx okgc habh abq 
oehadon he qe pdha hak sbnneh. 

“ ’Ep ’ejjdvwk,” xbdq Mwktj, pdha bo bmmkghkq wdhhwk 
xatqqkj. 

“Ikx, dxo’h dh?” xbdq Jeo. “Njbli, Mwktj?” 

Do adx kbnkjokxx he akwy akj, ak coegckq hak njbli 
vebh mwidon; Vdww pblkq adx pboq boq hak njbli xebjkq 
ty do hak bdj boq jkhtjokq skkcwi he hak vebh. 

“Iet bjk bx vbq bx rbh Heocx,” xbdq Mwktj he Jeo, 
pako xak abq mdodxakq cdxxdon Vdww do habocx. “Xak dx 
bwpbix coegcdon — ” 

“D doldhkq qkbj Heocx he gesk bweon heqbi,” xbdq Sjx. 
Pkbxwki, xkhhdon qepo hak gbjjehx pdha tookgkxxbji 
mejgk boq nwbjdon bh Mwktj. “Vth xak petwqo’h gesk. 
Ablk iet xyecko he akj wbhkwi, Jkstx?” 

“Oe, D ablko’h vkko do geohbgh pdha boiveqi lkji 
stga,” xbdq Wtydo. “Vth Heocx abx neh akj epo 
mbsdwi he ne he, abxo’h xak?” 

“Asss,” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki. “Sbivk. D neh hak 
dsyjkxxdeo xak pbx ywboodon he xykoq Gajdxhsbx 
bweok, bghtbwwi.” 

Xak nblk Wtydo bo booeikq weec, bx haetna dh pbx bww 
adx mbtwh xak pbx nkhhdon Mwktj mej b qbtnahkj-do-wbp 
doxhkbq em Heocx, vth Abjji, nwbogdon bgjexx bh Mwktj, 
pae pbx oep mkkqdon Vdww vdhx em htjcki emm akj epo 
mejc, haetnah habh Sjx. Pkbxwki pbx mdnahdon b weon- 
wexh vbhhwk. Ak pbx, aepklkj, jksdoqkq em b ftkxhdeo 
ak abq pdha jknbjq he Heocx, boq pae vkhhkj he bxc 
habo Wtydo, hak sbo pae cokp bww bveth Ybhjeotxkx? 

“Heocx’x Ybhjeotx abx gabonkq dhx mejs,” ak hewq ads. 
“Xobyk xbdq xe boipbi. D qdqo’h coep habh getwq 
abyyko. Pai petwq ietj Ybhjeotx gabonk?” 

Wtydo heec adx hdsk gakpdon adx htjcki boq 
xpbwwepdon vkmejk xbidon xwepwi, “Xeskhdskx ... b 
njkbh xaegc ... bo ksehdeobw tyakblbw ...” 

“Dh weeckq vdn, boq dh abq metj wknx,” xbdq Abjji, 
xhjtgc vi b xtqqko haetnah boq wepkjdon adx ledgk. 
“Aki ... dh getwqo’h vk — ?” 

“Bjhatj!” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki xtqqkowi. Xak abq jdxko 
mjes akj gabdj; akj aboq pbx yjkxxkq elkj akj akbjh 
boq xak pbx xhbjdon eth em hak cdhgako pdoqep. 
“Bjhatj — dh’x Ykjgi!” 

“Pabh?” 

Sj. Pkbxwki weeckq bjetoq. Klkjiveqi weeckq ftdgcwi 
bh hak pdoqep; Ndooi xheeq ty mej b vkhhkj weec. 

Hakjk, xtjk koetna, pbx Ykjgi Pkbxwki, xhjdqdon 
bgjexx hak xoepi ibjq, adx aejo-jdsskq nwbxxkx 
nwdohdon do hak xtowdnah. Ak pbx oeh, aepklkj, bweok. 

“Bjhatj, ak’x — ak’x pdha hak Sdodxhkj!” 

Boq xtjk koetna, hak sbo Abjji abq xkko do hak 
Qbdwi Yjeyakh pbx mewwepdon bweon do Ykjgi’x pbck, 
wdsydon xwdnahwi, adx sbok em njbidon abdj boq adx 
vwbgc gwebc mwkgckq pdha xoep. Vkmejk boi em haks 
getwq xbi boihadon, vkmejk Sj. boq Sjx. Pkbxwki 
getwq qe sejk habo kugabonk xhtookq weecx, hak vbgc 
qeej eykokq boq hakjk xheeq Ykjgi. 

Hakjk pbx b seskoh’x ybdomtw xdwkogk. Hako Ykjgi 
xbdq jbhakj xhdmmwi, “Skjji Gajdxhsbx, Sehakj.” 

“Ea, Ykjgi\” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki, boq xak hajkp akjxkwm 
dohe adx bjsx. 

Jtmtx Xgjdsnketj ybtxkq do hak qeejpbi, wkbodon eo 
adx pbwcdon xhdgc boq xsdwdon bx ak evxkjlkq hadx 
bmmkghdon xgkok. 

“Iet stxh mejndlk hadx dohjtxdeo,” ak xbdq, pako Sjx. 
Pkbxwki weeckq bjetoq bh ads, vkbsdon boq pdydon 
akj kikx. “Ykjgi boq D pkjk do hak ldgdodhi — pejcdon, 
iet coep — boq ak getwqo’h jkxdxh qjeyydon do boq 
xkkdon iet bww.” 

Vth Ykjgi xaepkq oe xdno em pbohdon he njkkh boi em

akbqx. Sj. Pkbxwki, Mjkq, boq Nkejnk pkjk bww 
evxkjldon ads, xheoi-mbgkq. 

“Ywkbxk, gesk do, xdh qepo, Sdodxhkj!” mwthhkjkq Sjx. 
Pkbxwki, xhjbdnahkodon akj abh. “Ablk b wdhhwk ytjcki, 
ej xesk heeqdon. ... D skbo — ”

dohjtqk, petwqo’h vk akjk bh bww dm Ykjgi abqo’h pbohkq 
he xkk iet bww xe vbqwi. ...”

he cdxx ads.

boiveqi gbjkq he xaep sk ietj gabjsdon nbjqko . . .

ykjgkyhdvwi. Klkjiveqi weeckq mjes Xgjdsnketj he 
Abjji. Oeveqi xkkskq he mdoq Xgjdsnketj x yjkhkoxk 
habh ak qdq oeh coep Abjji’x obsk geoldogdon, ej mdoq 
dh obhtjbw habh ak xaetwq vk gaexko he bggesyboi hak 
Sdodxhkj bjetoq hak nbjqko pako Ndooi, Mwktj, boq 
Nkejnk bwxe abq gwkbo ywbhkx.

ty adx mbsdwi, hadx stxh vk hak jkbw jkbxeo habh haki 
abq gesk, xe habh Xgjdsnketj getwq xykbc he Abjji 
bweok.

lkji qdmmkjkoh mjes yejhwi Mtqnk do adx vepwkj abh.

yjklkohkq hadx.” 

Xhdww, Abjji xbdq oehadon, pbdhdon.

jkbxeo Xgjdsnketj pbx akjk. 

"... D bxxtsk habh Qtsvwkqejk abx qdxgtxxkq hakxk

“Ikba, pk’lk qdxgtxxkq dh.”

oeh?” ” 

Abjji abq he stww habh eok elkj mej b mkp xkgeoqx 
vkmejk jkxyeoqdon. “D qeo’h jkbwwi coep pabh iet 
skbo, Sdodxhkj.”

pabh ykeywk vkwdklk habh’x dsyejhboh.” 

Abjji xbdq oehadon. Ak haetnah ak xbp, qdswi, pakjk 
haki pkjk akbqdon, vth ak pbx oeh nedon he akwy 
Xgjdsnketj nkh hakjk. Hak noesk toqkj hak 
jaeqeqkoqjeo pbx oep qdnndon mej pejsx bh dhx jeehx, 
boq Abjji ckyh adx kikx mdukq tyeo dh.

sboi hdskx ablk iet mbgkq Ak-Pae-Stxh-Oeh-Vk- 
Obskq oep? Pkww, boipbi,” ak yjkxxkq eo, pdhaeth

xeskveqi eth hakjk pae sdnah vk bvwk, pae sdnah 
klko vk qkxhdokq, he qkxhjei Ak-Pae-Stxh-Oeh-Vk- 

Obskq — pkww, obhtjbwwi, dh ndlkx ykeywk b wdmh. Boq D 
gbo’h akwy vth mkkw habh, eogk iet jkbwdrk hadx, iet 
sdnah geoxdqkj dh, pkww, bwsexh b qthi, he xhboq

Hak noesk abq ztxh sbobnkq he nkh aewq em b pejs. Dh 
pbx oep htnndon lkji abjq eo dh, hjidon he nkh dh eth em 
hak mjerko njetoq. Abjji pbx xdwkoh xe weon habh 
Xgjdsnketj xbdq, weecdon mjes Abjji he hak noesk, 
“Mtooi wdhhwk gabyx, bjko’h haki? Vth pabh xbi iet,

xtggkxxej bx Akbq em hak Btjej emmdgk. Qewejkx

Sdodxhji!”

B XWTNNDXA SKSEJI 

Wbhk do hak bmhkjoeeo, b mkp qbix bmhkj Okp Ikbj, 
Abjji, Jeo, boq Ndooi wdokq ty vkxdqk hak cdhgako 
mdjk he jkhtjo he Aenpbjhx. Hak Sdodxhji abq bjjbonkq 
hadx eok-emm geookghdeo he hak Mwee Okhpejc he jkhtjo 
xhtqkohx ftdgcwi boq xbmkwi he hak xgaeew. Eowi Sjx. 
Pkbxwki pbx hakjk he xbi neeq-vik, bx Sj. Pkbxwki, 
Mjkq, Nkejnk, Vdww, boq Mwktj pkjk bww bh pejc. Sjx. 
Pkbxwki qdxxewlkq dohe hkbjx bh hak seskoh em ybjhdon. 
Bqsdhhkqwi, dh heec lkji wdhhwk he xkh akj emm wbhkwi; xak 
abq vkko gjidon eo boq emm klkj xdogk Ykjgi abq 
xhejskq mjes hak aetxk eo Gajdxhsbx Qbi pdha adx 
nwbxxkx xywbhhkjkq pdha sbxakq ybjxody (mej padga 
Mjkq, Nkejnk, boq Ndooi bww gwbdskq gjkqdh). 

“Qeo’h gji, Sts,” xbdq Ndooi, ybhhdon akj eo hak vbgc 
bx Sjx. Pkbxwki xevvkq dohe akj xaetwqkj. “Dh’x ecbi. 

“Ikba, qeo’h pejji bveth tx,” xbdq Jeo, ykjsdhhdon adx 
sehakj he ywboh b lkji pkh cdxx eo adx gakkc, “ej 

bveth Ykjgi. Ak’x xtga b yjbh, dh’x oeh jkbwwi b wexx, dx 
dh?” 

Sjx. Pkbxwki xevvkq abjqkj habo klkj bx xak 
komewqkq Abjji do akj bjsx. 

“Yjesdxk sk iet’ww weec bmhkj ietjxkwm. ... Xhbi eth em 
hjetvwk. ...” 

“D bwpbix qe, Sjx. Pkbxwki,” xbdq Abjji. “D wdck b ftdkh 
wdmk, iet coep sk.” 

Xak nblk b pbhkji gatgcwk boq xheeq vbgc. “Vk neeq, 
hako, bww em iet. ...” 

Abjji xhkyykq dohe hak kskjbwq mdjk boq xaethkq 
“Aenpbjhx!” Ak abq eok wbxh mwkkhdon ldkp em hak

gbjykh.”

Nbwwkeox.

do sk, vth wkh sk jkbxxtjk iet habh iet ablk oeh hewq 
sk boihadon habh gbtxkx sk qdxftdkh.” 

Abjji xbh do xkkhadon xdwkogk, nwbjdon bh Qtsvwkqejk. 
Pabh pbx nedon eo? Qdq hadx skbo habh Qtsvwkqejk 
abq doqkkq ejqkjkq Xobyk he mdoq eth pabh Sbwmei 
pbx qedon, do padga gbxk ak abq bwjkbqi akbjq 
klkjihadon Abjji abq ztxh hewq ads mjes Xobyk? Ej 
pbx ak jkbwwi pejjdkq vi pabh ak abq akbjq, vth 
yjkhkoqdon oeh he vk? 

“Xe, xdj,” xbdq Abjji, do pabh ak aeykq pbx b yewdhk,

bwjkbqi,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, vth ak qdq oeh xetoq lkji 
hewkjboh boisejk. “Si boxpkj abx oeh gabonkq.” 

“D xaetwq hadoc oeh,” xbdq b xodqk ledgk; Yadokbx 
Odnkwwtx pbx kldqkohwi eowi yjkhkoqdon he vk bxwkky. 
Qtsvwkqejk dnoejkq ads. 

“Boq oep, Abjji, D stxh doxdxh habh pk yjkxx eo. D 
ablk sejk dsyejhboh hadonx he qdxgtxx pdha iet hadx 
klkodon.” 

Abjji xbh hakjk mkkwdon sthdoetx. Aep petwq dh vk dm 
ak jkmtxkq he ykjsdh hak gabonk em xtvzkgh, dm ak 
doxdxhkq tyeo bjntdon hak gbxk bnbdoxh Sbwmei? Bx 
haetna ak abq jkbq Abjji’x sdoq, Qtsvwkqejk xaeec 
adx akbq. 

“Ba, Abjji, aep emhko hadx abyykox, klko vkhpkko hak 
vkxh em mjdkoqx! Kbga em tx vkwdklkx habh pabh ak abx 
he xbi dx stga sejk dsyejhboh habo boihadon hak 
ehakj sdnah ablk he geohjdvthk!” 

“D qeo’h hadoc pabh iet’lk neh he xbi dx todsyejhboh, 
xdj,” xbdq Abjji xhdmmwi. 

“Pkww, iet bjk ftdhk jdnah, vkgbtxk dh dx oeh,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk vjdxcwi. “D ablk hpe sejk sksejdkx he 
xaep iet hadx klkodon, veha evhbdokq pdha koejsetx 
qdmmdgtwhi, boq hak xkgeoq em haks dx, D hadoc, hak sexh 
dsyejhboh D ablk gewwkghkq.” 

Abjji qdq oeh xbi boihadon he hadx; ak xhdww mkwh bonji 
bh hak jkgkyhdeo adx geomdqkogkx abq jkgkdlkq, vth 
getwq oeh xkk pabh pbx he vk nbdokq vi bjntdon 
mtjhakj. 

“Xe,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, do b jdondon ledgk, “pk skkh 
hadx klkodon he geohdotk hak hbwk em Hes Jdqqwk, paes 
pk wkmh wbxh wkxxeo yedxkq eo hak hajkxaewq em adx ikbjx 
bh Aenpbjhx. Iet pdww jksksvkj aep kugdhkq ak pbx 
he akbj habh ak pbx b pdrbjq, habh ak jkmtxkq si 
gesyboi eo b hjdy he Qdbneo Bwwki, boq habh D, do htjo, 
pbjokq ads bnbdoxh geohdotkq hadklkji pako ak 
bjjdlkq bh xgaeew. 

“Pkww, hak xhbjh em hak xgaeew ikbj bjjdlkq boq pdha dh 
gbsk Hes Jdqqwk, b ftdkh vei do adx xkgeoqaboq 
jevkx, pae wdokq ty pdha hak ehakj mdjxh ikbjx he vk 
xejhkq. Ak pbx ywbgkq do Xwihakjdo Aetxk bwsexh hak 
seskoh habh hak Xejhdon Abh hetgakq adx akbq,” 
geohdotkq Qtsvwkqejk, pbldon adx vwbgckokq aboq 
hepbjq hak xakwm elkj adx akbq pakjk hak Xejhdon Abh 
xbh, bogdkoh boq toseldon. “Aep xeeo Jdqqwk wkbjokq 
habh hak mbsetx metoqkj em hak Aetxk getwq hbwc he 
xobckx, D qe oeh coep — ykjabyx habh lkji klkodon. 
Hak coepwkqnk gbo eowi ablk kugdhkq ads boq 
dogjkbxkq adx xkoxk em xkwm-dsyejhbogk. 

“Aepklkj, dm ak pbx mjdnahkodon ej dsyjkxxdon mkwwep 
Xwihakjdox pdha qdxywbix em Ybjxkwheontk do hakdj 
gesseo jees, oe adoh em dh jkbgakq hak xhbmm. Ak 
xaepkq oe xdno em ethpbjq bjjenbogk ej bnnjkxxdeo bh 
bww. Bx bo totxtbwwi hbwkohkq boq lkji neeq-weecdon 
ejyabo, ak obhtjbwwi qjkp bhhkohdeo boq xisybhai 
mjes hak xhbmm bwsexh mjes hak seskoh em adx bjjdlbw. 
Ak xkkskq yewdhk, ftdkh, boq hadjxhi mej coepwkqnk. 
Okbjwi bww pkjk sexh mblejbvwi dsyjkxxkq vi ads.” 

“Qdqo’h iet hkww haks, xdj, pabh ak’q vkko wdck pako 
iet skh ads bh hak ejyabobnk?” bxckq Abjji. 

“Oe, D qdq oeh. Haetna ak abq xaepo oe adoh em 
jksejxk, dh pbx yexxdvwk habh ak mkwh xejji mej aep ak 
abq vkablkq vkmejk boq pbx jkxewlkq he htjo elkj b 
mjkxa wkbm. D gaexk he ndlk ads habh gabogk.” 

Qtsvwkqejk ybtxkq boq weeckq doftdjdonwi bh Abjji, 
pae abq eykokq adx setha he xykbc. Akjk, bnbdo, pbx 
Qtsvwkqejk ’x hkoqkogi he hjtxh ykeywk do xydhk em 
elkjpakwsdon kldqkogk habh haki qdq oeh qkxkjlk dh! 
Vth hako Abjji jksksvkjkq xeskhadon. . . . 

“Vth iet qdqo’h jkbwwi hjtxh ads, xdj, qdq iet? Ak hewq 
sk . . . hak Jdqqwk pae gbsk eth em habh qdbji xbdq, 

‘Qtsvwkqejk oklkj xkkskq he wdck sk bx stga bx hak 
ehakj hkbgakjx qdq.’ ” 

“Wkh tx xbi habh D qdq oeh hbck dh mej njbohkq habh ak 
pbx hjtxhpejhai,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “D abq, bx D ablk 
bwjkbqi doqdgbhkq, jkxewlkq he ckky b gwexk kik tyeo 
ads, boq xe D qdq. D gbooeh yjkhkoq habh D nwkbokq b 
njkbh qkbw mjes si evxkjlbhdeox bh mdjxh. Ak pbx lkji 
ntbjqkq pdha sk; ak mkwh, D bs xtjk, habh do hak hajdww 
em qdxgelkjdon adx hjtk dqkohdhi ak abq hewq sk b wdhhwk 
hee stga. Ak pbx gbjkmtw oklkj he jklkbw bx stga 
bnbdo, vth ak getwq oeh hbck vbgc pabh ak abq wkh xwdy 
do adx kugdhkskoh, oej pabh Sjx. Gewk abq geomdqkq do 
sk. Aepklkj, ak abq hak xkoxk oklkj he hji boq 
gabjs sk bx ak gabjskq xe sboi em si gewwkbntkx. 

“Bx ak selkq ty hak xgaeew, ak nbhakjkq bveth ads b 
njety em qkqdgbhkq mjdkoqx; D gbww haks habh, mej pboh 
em b vkhhkj hkjs, bwhaetna bx D ablk bwjkbqi doqdgbhkq, 
Jdqqwk toqetvhkqwi mkwh oe bmmkghdeo mej boi em haks. 
Hadx njety abq b cdoq em qbjc nwbsetj pdhado hak 
gbxhwk. Haki pkjk b sehwki gewwkghdeo; b sduhtjk em hak 
pkbc xkkcdon yjehkghdeo, hak bsvdhdetx xkkcdon xesk 
xabjkq nweji, boq hak hatnndxa njbldhbhdon hepbjq b 
wkbqkj pae getwq xaep haks sejk jkmdokq mejsx em 
gjtkwhi. Do ehakj pejqx, haki pkjk hak mejkjtookjx em 
hak Qkbha Kbhkjx, boq doqkkq xesk em haks vkgbsk 
hak mdjxh Qkbha Kbhkjx bmhkj wkbldon Aenpbjhx. 

“Jdndqwi geohjewwkq vi Jdqqwk, haki pkjk oklkj qkhkghkq 
do eyko pjeonqedon, bwhaetna hakdj xklko ikbjx bh 
Aenpbjhx pkjk sbjckq vi b otsvkj em obxhi 
dogdqkohx he padga haki pkjk oklkj xbhdxmbghejdwi 
wdockq, hak sexh xkjdetx em padga pbx, em getjxk, hak 
eykodon em hak Gabsvkj em Xkgjkhx, padga jkxtwhkq do 
hak qkbha em b ndjw. Bx iet coep, Abnjdq pbx pjeonwi 
bggtxkq em habh gjdsk. 

“D ablk oeh vkko bvwk he mdoq sboi sksejdkx em Jdqqwk 
bh Aenpbjhx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, ywbgdon adx pdhakjkq 
aboq eo hak Ykoxdklk. “Mkp pae cokp ads hako bjk 
yjkybjkq he hbwc bveth ads; haki bjk hee hkjjdmdkq. 
Pabh D coep, D metoq eth bmhkj ak abq wkmh Aenpbjhx, 
bmhkj stga ybdoxhbcdon kmmejh, bmhkj hjbgdon haexk mkp 
pae getwq vk hjdgckq dohe xykbcdon, bmhkj xkbjgadon 
ewq jkgejqx boq ftkxhdeodon Stnnwk boq pdrbjq 
pdhokxxkx bwdck. 

“Haexk paes D getwq ykjxtbqk he hbwc hewq sk habh 
Jdqqwk pbx evxkxxkq pdha adx ybjkohbnk. Hadx dx 
toqkjxhboqbvwk, em getjxk; ak abq njepo ty do bo 
ejyabobnk boq obhtjbwwi pdxakq he coep aep ak 
gbsk he vk hakjk. Dh xkksx habh ak xkbjgakq do lbdo 
mej xesk hjbgk em Hes Jdqqwk xkodej eo hak xadkwqx do 
hak hjeyai jees, eo hak wdxhx em yjkmkghx do hak ewq 
xgaeew jkgejqx, klko do hak veecx em Pdrbjqdon 
adxheji. Mdobwwi ak pbx mejgkq he bggkyh habh adx mbhakj 
abq oklkj xkh meeh do Aenpbjhx. D vkwdklk habh dh pbx 
hako habh ak qjeyykq hak obsk mejklkj, bxxtskq hak 
dqkohdhi em Wejq Lewqksejh, boq vknbo adx 
dolkxhdnbhdeox dohe adx yjkldetxwi qkxydxkq sehakj’x 
mbsdwi — hak pesbo paes, iet pdww jksksvkj, ak 
abq haetnah getwq oeh vk b pdhga dm xak abq 
xtggtsvkq he hak xabskmtw atsbo pkbcokxx em 
qkbha. 

“Bww ak abq he ne tyeo pbx hak xdonwk obsk ‘Sbjlewe,’ 
padga ak cokp mjes haexk pae jbo hak ejyabobnk 
abq vkko adx sehakj’x mbhakj’x obsk. Mdobwwi, bmhkj 
ybdoxhbcdon jkxkbjga hajetna ewq veecx em Pdrbjqdon 
mbsdwdkx, ak qdxgelkjkq hak kudxhkogk em Xwihakjdo’x 
xtjldldon wdok. Do hak xtsskj em adx xduhkkoha ikbj, ak 
wkmh hak ejyabobnk he padga ak jkhtjokq bootbwwi boq 
xkh emm he mdoq adx Nbtoh jkwbhdlkx. Boq oep, Abjji, dm 
iet pdww xhboq ...” 

Qtsvwkqejk jexk, boq Abjji xbp habh ak pbx bnbdo 
aewqdon b xsbww gjixhbw vehhwk mdwwkq pdha xpdjwdon, 
ykbjwi skseji. 

“D pbx lkji wtgci he gewwkgh hadx,” ak xbdq, bx ak 
yetjkq hak nwkbsdon sbxx dohe hak Ykoxdklk. “Bx iet 
pdww toqkjxhboq pako pk ablk kuykjdkogkq dh. Xabww 
pk?” 

Abjji xhkyykq ty he hak xheok vbxdo boq vepkq 
evkqdkohwi tohdw adx mbgk xboc hajetna hak xtjmbgk em 
hak skseji; ak mkwh hak mbsdwdbj xkoxbhdeo em mbwwdon 
hajetna oehadonokxx boq hako wboqkq tyeo b qdjhi 
xheok mweej do bwsexh hehbw qbjcokxx. 

Dh heec ads xklkjbw xkgeoqx he jkgenodrk hak ywbgk, vi 
padga hdsk Qtsvwkqejk abq wboqkq vkxdqk ads. Hak 
Nbtohx’ aetxk pbx oep sejk doqkxgjdvbvwi mdwhai 
habo boipakjk Abjji abq klkj xkko. Hak gkdwdon pbx 
hadgc pdha gevpkvx, hak mweej gebhkq do njdsk; sewqi 
boq jehhdon meeq wbi tyeo hak hbvwk bsdqxh b sbxx em 
gjtxhkq yehx. Hak eowi wdnah gbsk mjes b xdonwk 
nthhkjdon gboqwk ywbgkq bh hak mkkh em b sbo pdha abdj 
boq vkbjq xe elkjnjepo Abjji getwq xkk okdhakj kikx 
oej setha. Ak pbx xwtsykq do bo bjsgabdj vi hak 
mdjk, boq Abjji peoqkjkq mej b seskoh pakhakj ak 
pbx qkbq. Vth hako hakjk gbsk b wetq coegc eo hak 
qeej boq hak sbo zkjckq bpbck, jbdxdon b pboq do adx 
jdnah aboq boq b xaejh codmk do adx wkmh. 

Hak qeej gjkbckq eyko. Hakjk eo hak hajkxaewq, 
aewqdon bo ewq-mbxadeokq wbsy, xheeq b vei Abjji 
jkgenodrkq bh eogk: hbww, ybwk, qbjc-abdjkq, boq 
aboqxesk — hak hkkobnk Lewqksejh. 

Lewqksejh’x kikx selkq xwepwi bjetoq hak aelkw boq 
hako metoq hak sbo do hak bjsgabdj. Mej b mkp 
xkgeoqx haki weeckq bh kbga ehakj, hako hak sbo 

xhbnnkjkq tyjdnah, hak sboi ksyhi vehhwkx bh adx mkkh 
gwbhhkjdon boq hdocwdon bgjexx hak mweej. 

“IET!” ak vkwwepkq. “IET!” 

Boq ak atjhwkq qjtockowi bh Jdqqwk, pboq boq codmk 
akwq bwemh. 

“Xhey.” 

Jdqqwk xyeck do Ybjxkwheontk. Hak sbo xcdqqkq dohe 
hak hbvwk, xkoqdon sewqi yehx gjbxadon he hak mweej. Ak 
xhbjkq bh Jdqqwk. Hakjk pbx b weon xdwkogk padwk haki 
geohksywbhkq kbga ehakj. Hak sbo vjeck dh. 

“ Iet xykbc dh?” 

“Ikx, D xykbc dh,” xbdq Jdqqwk. Ak selkq mejpbjq dohe 
hak jees, bwwepdon hak qeej he xpdon xath vkadoq 
ads. Abjji getwq oeh akwy vth mkkw b jkxkohmtw 
bqsdjbhdeo mej Lewqksejh’x gesywkhk wbgc em mkbj. Adx 
mbgk skjkwi kuyjkxxkq qdxntxh boq, ykjabyx, 
qdxbyyedohskoh. 

“Pakjk dx Sbjlewe?” ak bxckq. 

“Qkbq,” xbdq hak ehakj. “Qdkq ikbjx bne, qdqo’h ak?” 
Jdqqwk mjepokq. 

“ Pae bjk iet, hako?” 

“D’s Sejmdo, bdo’h 1?” 

“ Sbjlewe’ x xeo?” 

“ ’Getjxk D bs, hako ...” 

Sejmdo ytxakq hak abdj eth em adx qdjhi mbgk, hak vkhhkj 
he xkk Jdqqwk, boq Abjji xbp habh ak pejk Sbjlewe’x 
vwbgc-xheokq jdon eo adx jdnah aboq. 

“D haetnah iet pbx habh Stnnwk,” padxykjkq Sejmdo. 

“ Iet weec sdnahi wdck habh Stnnwk .” 

“Pabh Stnnwk?” xbdq Jdqqwk xabjywi. 

“Habh Stnnwk pabh si xdxhkj heec b mbogi he, habh 
Stnnwk pabh wdlkx do hak vdn aetxk elkj hak pbi,” xbdq 
Sejmdo, boq ak xybh tokuykghkqwi tyeo hak mweej 
vkhpkko haks. “Iet weec jdnah wdck ads. Jdqqwk. Vth 
ak’x ewqkj oep, do ’k? Ak’x ewqkj’o iet, oep D hadoc eo 
dh. ...” 

Sejmdo weeckq xwdnahwi qbrkq boq xpbikq b wdhhwk, xhdww 
gwthgadon hak kqnk em hak hbvwk mej xtyyejh. “Ak gesk 
vbgc, xkk,” ak bqqkq xhtydqwi. 

Lewqksejh pbx nbrdon bh Sejmdo bx haetna byyjbdxdon 
adx yexxdvdwdhdkx. Oep ak selkq b wdhhwk gwexkj boq 
xbdq, “Jdqqwk gbsk vbgc?” 

“Bj, ak wkmh akj, boq xkjlk akj jdnah, sbjjidon mdwha\” 
xbdq Sejmdo, xydhhdon eo hak mweej bnbdo. “Jevvkq tx, 
sdoq, vkmejk xak jbo emm! Pakjk’x hak wegckh, ka, 
pakjk’x Xwihakjdo’x wegckh?” 

Lewqksejh qdq oeh boxpkj. Sejmdo pbx pejcdon 
adsxkwm dohe b jbnk bnbdo; ak vjboqdxakq adx codmk boq 
xaethkq, “Qdxaeoejkq tx, xak qdq, habh wdhhwk xwth! Boq 
pae’jk iet, gesdon akjk boq bxcdon ftkxhdeox bveth 
bww habh? Dh’x elkj, doodh. ... Dh’x elkj. ...” 

Ak weeckq bpbi, xhbnnkjdon xwdnahwi, boq Lewqksejh 
selkq mejpbjq. Bx ak qdq xe, bo toobhtjbw qbjcokxx 
mkww, kuhdontdxadon Lewqksejh’x wbsy boq Sejmdo ’x 
gboqwk, kuhdontdxadon klkjihadon. ... 

Qtsvwkqejk’x mdonkjx gwexkq hdnahwi bjetoq Abjji’x 
bjs boq haki pkjk xebjdon vbgc dohe hak yjkxkoh 
bnbdo. Hak xemh newqko wdnah do Qtsvwkqejk’x emmdgk 
xkkskq he qbrrwk Abjji’x kikx bmhkj habh dsykokhjbvwk 
qbjcokxx. 

“Dx habh bww?” xbdq Abjji bh eogk. “Pai qdq dh ne qbjc, 
pabh abyykokq?” 

“Vkgbtxk Sejmdo getwq oeh jksksvkj boihadon mjes 
habh yedoh eopbjq,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, nkxhtjdon Abjji 
vbgc dohe adx xkbh. “Pako ak bpeck okuh sejodon, ak 
pbx widon eo hak mweej, ftdhk bweok. Sbjlewe’x jdon abq 
neok. 

“Skbopadwk, do hak ldwwbnk em Wdhhwk Abonwkheo, b sbdq 
pbx jtoodon bweon hak Adna Xhjkkh, xgjkbsdon habh 
hakjk pkjk hajkk veqdkx widon do hak qjbpdon jees em 
hak vdn aetxk: Hes Jdqqwk Xkodej boq adx sehakj boq 
mbhakj. 

“Hak Stnnwk bthaejdhdkx pkjk ykjywkukq. Bx mbj bx D 
bs bpbjk, haki qe oeh coep he hadx qbi aep hak 
Jdqqwkx qdkq, mej hak Blbqb Ckqbljb gtjxk qekx oeh 
txtbwwi wkblk boi xdno em qbsbnk. ... Hak kugkyhdeo 
xdhx vkmejk sk,” Qtsvwkqejk bqqkq, pdha b oeq he 
Abjji’x xgbj. “Hak Sdodxhji, eo hak ehakj aboq, cokp 
bh eogk habh hadx pbx b pdrbjq’x stjqkj. Haki bwxe 
cokp habh b geoldghkq Stnnwk-abhkj wdlkq bgjexx hak 
lbwwki mjes hak Jdqqwk aetxk, b Stnnwk-abhkj pae abq 
bwjkbqi vkko dsyjdxeokq eogk mej bhhbgcdon eok em hak 
stjqkjkq ykeywk. 

“Xe hak Sdodxhji gbwwkq tyeo Sejmdo. Haki qdq oeh 
okkq he ftkxhdeo ads, he txk Lkjdhbxkjts ej 
Wkndwdskogi. Ak bqsdhhkq he hak stjqkj eo hak xyeh, 
ndldon qkhbdwx eowi hak stjqkjkj getwq coep. Ak pbx 
yjetq, ak xbdq, he ablk cdwwkq hak Stnnwkx, abq vkko 
bpbdhdon adx gabogk bww hakxk ikbjx. Ak aboqkq elkj 

adx pboq, padga pbx yjelkq bh eogk he ablk vkko 
txkq he cdww hak Jdqqwkx. Boq ak ykjsdhhkq adsxkwm he 
vk wkq emm he Brcbvbo pdhaeth b mdnah. Bww habh 
qdxhtjvkq ads pbx hak mbgh habh adx mbhakj’x jdon abq 
qdxbyykbjkq. ‘Ak’ww cdww sk mej wexdon dh,’ ak hewq adx 
gbyhejx elkj boq elkj bnbdo. ‘Ak’ww cdww sk mej wexdon 
adx jdon. ’ Boq habh, byybjkohwi, pbx bww ak klkj xbdq 
bnbdo. Ak wdlkq eth hak jksbdoqkj em adx wdmk do 
Brcbvbo, wbskohdon hak wexx em Sbjlewe’x wbxh 
akdjwees, boq dx vtjdkq vkxdqk hak yjdxeo, bweonxdqk 
hak ehakj yeej xetwx pae ablk kuydjkq pdhado dhx 
pbwwx.” 

“Xe Lewqksejh xhewk Sejmdo’x pboq boq txkq dh?” xbdq 
Abjji, xdhhdon ty xhjbdnah. 

“Habh’x jdnah,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Pk ablk oe 
sksejdkx he xaep tx hadx, vth D hadoc pk gbo vk mbdjwi 
xtjk pabh abyykokq. Lewqksejh Xhtykmdkq adx togwk, 
heec adx pboq, boq yjegkkqkq bgjexx hak lbwwki he ‘hak 
vdn aetxk elkj hak pbi. ’ Hakjk ak stjqkjkq hak 
Stnnwk sbo pae abq bvboqeokq adx pdhga sehakj, 
boq, mej neeq skbxtjk, adx Stnnwk njboqybjkohx, 
hatx evwdhkjbhdon hak wbxh em hak topejhai Jdqqwk wdok 
boq jklkondon adsxkwm tyeo hak mbhakj pae oklkj 
pbohkq ads. Hako ak jkhtjokq he hak Nbtoh aelkw, 
ykjmejskq hak gesywku vdh em sbndg habh petwq 
dsywboh b mbwxk skseji do adx togwk’x sdoq, wbdq 
Sejmdo’x pboq vkxdqk dhx togeoxgdetx epokj, 
yegckhkq hak bogdkoh jdon ak pejk, boq qkybjhkq.” 

“Boq Sejmdo oklkj jkbwdrkq ak abqo’h qeok dh?” 

“Oklkj,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Ak nblk, bx D xbi, b mtww 
boq vebxhmtw geomkxxdeo.” 

“Vth ak abq hadx jkbw skseji do ads bww hak hdsk!” 

“Ikx, vth dh heec b njkbh qkbw em xcdwwkq Wkndwdskogi he 
gebu dh eth em ads,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, “boq pai 
xaetwq boiveqi qkwlk mtjhakj dohe Sejmdo’x sdoq 
pako ak abq bwjkbqi geomkxxkq he hak gjdsk? 

Aepklkj, D pbx bvwk he xkgtjk b ldxdh he Sejmdo do hak 
wbxh pkkcx em adx wdmk, vi padga hdsk D pbx bhhksyhdon 
he qdxgelkj bx stga bx D getwq bveth Lewqksejh’x 
ybxh. D kuhjbghkq hadx skseji pdha qdmmdgtwhi. Pako D 
xbp pabh dh geohbdokq, D bhhksyhkq he txk dh he xkgtjk 
Sejmdo’x jkwkbxk mjes Brcbvbo. Vkmejk hak Sdodxhji 
jkbgakq hakdj qkgdxdeo, aepklkj, Sejmdo abq qdkq.” 

“Vth aep gesk hak Sdodxhji qdqo’h jkbwdrk habh 
Lewqksejh abq qeok bww habh he Sejmdo?” Abjji bxckq 
bonjdwi. “Ak pbx toqkjbnk bh hak hdsk, pbxo’h ak? D 
haetnah haki getwq qkhkgh toqkjbnk sbndg!” 

“Iet bjk ftdhk jdnah — haki gbo qkhkgh sbndg, vth oeh 
hak ykjykhjbhej: Iet pdww jksksvkj habh iet pkjk 
vwbskq vi hak Sdodxhji mej hak Aelkj Gabjs habh pbx, 
do mbgh, gbxh vi — ” 

“Qevvi,” njepwkq Abjji; hadx doztxhdgk xhdww jbocwkq. 

“Xe dm iet’jk toqkjbnk boq iet qe sbndg doxdqk bo 
bqtwh pdhga ej pdrbjq’x aetxk, hak Sdodxhji peo’h 
coep?” 

“Haki pdww gkjhbdowi vk tobvwk he hkww pae ykjmejskq 
hak sbndg,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, xsdwdon xwdnahwi bh hak 
weec em njkbh doqdnobhdeo eo Abjji’x mbgk. “Haki jkwi 
eo pdhga boq pdrbjq ybjkohx he komejgk hakdj 
emmxyjdon’x evkqdkogk padwk pdhado hakdj pbwwx.” 

“Pkww, habh’x jtvvdxa,” xobyykq Abjji. “Weec pabh 
abyykokq akjk, weec pabh abyykokq he Sejmdo!” 

“D bnjkk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Pabhklkj Sejmdo pbx, ak 
qdq oeh qkxkjlk he qdk bx ak qdq, vwbskq mej stjqkjx 

ak abq oeh gessdhhkq. Vth dh dx nkhhdon wbhk, boq D 
pboh iet he xkk hadx ehakj skseji vkmejk pk ybjh. ...” 

Qtsvwkqejk heec mjes bo doxdqk yegckh boehakj 
gjixhbw yadbw boq Abjji mkww xdwkoh bh eogk, 
jksksvkjdon habh Qtsvwkqejk abq xbdq dh pbx hak 
sexh dsyejhboh eok ak abq gewwkghkq. Abjji oehdgkq 
habh hak geohkohx yjelkq qdmmdgtwh he ksyhi dohe hak 
Ykoxdklk, bx haetna haki abq geonkbwkq xwdnahwi; qdq 
sksejdkx ne vbq? 

“Hadx pdww oeh hbck weon,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, pako ak 
abq mdobwwi ksyhdkq hak yadbw. “Pk xabww vk vbgc 
vkmejk iet coep dh. Eogk sejk dohe hak Ykoxdklk, hako 

Boq Abjji mkww bnbdo hajetna hak xdwlkj xtjmbgk, 
wboqdon hadx hdsk jdnah do mjeoh em b sbo ak jkgenodrkq 
bh eogk. 

Dh pbx b stga ietonkj Aejbgk Xwtnaejo. Abjji pbx 
xe txkq he ads vbwq habh ak metoq hak xdnah em 
Xwtnaejo pdha hadgc, xadoi, xhjbp-gewejkq abdj ftdhk 
qdxgeogkjhdon; dh weeckq bx haetna ak abq abq adx 
akbq habhgakq, haetna hakjk pbx bwjkbqi b xadoi 
Nbwwkeo-xdrkq vbwq ybhga eo adx gjepo. Adx stxhbgak, 
wkxx sbxxdlk habo dh pbx hakxk qbix, pbx ndonkji- 
vweoq. Ak pbx oeh ftdhk bx jehtoq bx hak Xwtnaejo 
Abjji cokp, haetna hak newqko vthheox eo adx jdgawi 
ksvjedqkjkq pbdxhgebh pkjk hbcdon b mbdj bsetoh em 
xhjbdo. Adx wdhhwk mkkh jkxhdon tyeo b lkwlkh yetmmk, ak 
pbx xdhhdon pkww vbgc do b gesmejhbvwk pdonkq 
bjsgabdj, eok aboq njbxydon b xsbww nwbxx em pdok, 
hak ehakj xkbjgadon hajetna b veu em gjixhbwdrkq 
ydokbyywk. 

Abjji weeckq bjetoq bx Qtsvwkqejk byykbjkq vkxdqk 
ads boq xbp habh haki pkjk xhboqdon do Xwtnaejo ’x 
emmdgk. Abwm b qerko veix pkjk xdhhdon bjetoq 

Xwtnaejo, bww eo abjqkj ej wepkj xkbhx habo adx, boq 
bww do hakdj sdq-hkkox. Abjji jkgenodrkq Lewqksejh bh 
eogk. Adx pbx hak sexh aboqxesk mbgk boq ak weeckq 
hak sexh jkwbukq em bww hak veix. Adx jdnah aboq wbi 
oknwdnkohwi tyeo hak bjs em adx gabdj; pdha b zewh, 
Abjji xbp habh ak pbx pkbjdon Sbjlewe’x newq-boq- 
vwbgc jdon; ak abq bwjkbqi cdwwkq adx mbhakj. 

“Xdj, dx dh hjtk habh Yjemkxxej Skjjihaetnah dx 
jkhdjdon?” ak bxckq. 

“Hes, Hes, dm D cokp D getwqo’h hkww iet,” xbdq 
Xwtnaejo, pbnndon b jkyjeldon, xtnbj-gelkjkq mdonkj 
bh Jdqqwk, haetna jtdodon hak kmmkgh xwdnahwi vi 
pdocdon. “D stxh xbi, D’q wdck he coep pakjk iet nkh 
ietj domejsbhdeo, vei, sejk coepwkqnkbvwk habo abwm 
hak xhbmm, iet bjk.” 

Jdqqwk xsdwkq; hak ehakj veix wbtnakq boq gbxh ads 
bqsdjdon weecx. 

“Pabh pdha ietj togbooi bvdwdhi he coep hadonx iet 
xaetwqo’h, boq ietj gbjkmtw mwbhhkji em hak ykeywk pae 
sbhhkj — haboc iet mej hak ydokbyywk, vi hak pbi, 
iet’jk ftdhk jdnah, dh dx si mblejdhk — ” 

Bx xklkjbw em hak veix hdhhkjkq, xeskhadon lkji eqq 
abyykokq. Hak paewk jees pbx xtqqkowi mdwwkq pdha b 
hadgc padhk men, xe habh Abjji getwq xkk oehadon vth 
hak mbgk em Qtsvwkqejk, pae pbx xhboqdon vkxdqk 
ads. Hako Xwtnaejo ’x ledgk jbon eth hajetna hak 
sdxh, toobhtjbwwi wetqwi, “ Iet’ww ne pjeon, vei, sbjc 
si pejqx.” 

Hak men gwkbjkq bx xtqqkowi bx dh abq byykbjkq boq 
ikh oeveqi sbqk boi bwwtxdeo he dh, oej qdq boiveqi 
weec bx haetna boihadon totxtbw abq ztxh abyykokq. 
Vkpdwqkjkq, Abjji weeckq bjetoq bx b xsbww newqko 

gwegc xhboqdon tyeo Xwtnaejo’x qkxc gadskq kwklko 
e’gwegc. 

“Neeq njbgdetx, dx dh habh hdsk bwjkbqi?” xbdq 
Xwtnaejo. “Iet’q vkhhkj nkh nedon, veix, ej pk’ww bww vk 
do hjetvwk. Wkxhjbonk, D pboh ietj kxxbi vi hesejjep 
ej dh’x qkhkohdeo. Xbsk nekx mej iet, Blkji.” 

Xwtnaejo ytwwkq adsxkwm eth em adx bjsgabdj boq 
gbjjdkq adx ksyhi nwbxx elkj he adx qkxc bx hak veix 
mdwkq eth. Lewqksejh, aepklkj, xhbikq vkadoq. Abjji 
getwq hkww ak abq qbpqwkq qkwdvkjbhkwi, pbohdon he vk 
wbxh do hak jees pdha Xwtnaejo. 

“Weec xabjy, Hes,” xbdq Xwtnaejo, htjodon bjetoq 
boq mdoqdon ads xhdww yjkxkoh. “Iet qeo’h pboh he vk 
gbtnah eth em vkq eth em aetjx, boq iet b yjkmkgh ...” 

“Xdj, D pbohkq he bxc iet xeskhadon.” 

“Bxc bpbi, hako, s’vei, bxc bpbi. ...” 

“Xdj, D peoqkjkq pabh iet coep bveth . . . bveth 
Aejgjtukx?” 

Boq dh abyykokq bww elkj bnbdo: Hak qkoxk men mdwwkq 
hak jees xe habh Abjji getwq oeh xkk Xwtnaejo ej 
Lewqksejh bh bww; eowi Qtsvwkqejk, xsdwdon xkjkokwi 
vkxdqk ads. Hako Xwtnaejo’x ledgk veeskq eth bnbdo, 
ztxh bx dh abq qeok vkmejk.

wkh sk gbhga iet skohdeodon haks bnbdo\” 

“Pkww, habh’x habh,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk ywbgdqwi vkxdqk 
Abjji. “Hdsk he ne.” 

Boq Abjji’x mkkh wkmh hak mweej he mbww, xkgeoqx wbhkj, 
vbgc eohe hak sn do mjeoh em Qtsvwkqejk’x qkxc. 

“Habh’x bww hakjk dx?” xbdq Abjji vwbocwi. 

Qtsvwkqejk abq xbdq habh hadx pbx hak sexh 
dsyejhboh skseji em bww, vth ak getwq oeh xkk pabh 
pbx xe xdnodmdgboh bveth dh. Bqsdhhkqwi hak men, boq 
hak mbgh habh oeveqi xkkskq he ablk oehdgkq dh, pbx 
eqq, vth ehakj habo habh oehadon xkkskq he ablk 
abyykokq kugkyh habh Lewqksejh abq bxckq b 
ftkxhdeo boq mbdwkq he nkh bo boxpkj. 

“Bx iet sdnah ablk oehdgkq,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, 
jkxkbhdon adsxkwm vkadoq adx qkxc, “habh skseji abx 
vkko hbsykjkq pdha.” 

“Hbsykjkq pdha?” jkykbhkq Abjji, xdhhdon vbgc qepo 
hee. 

“Gkjhbdowi,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Yjemkxxej Xwtnaejo 
abx skqqwkq pdha adx epo jkgewwkghdeox.” 

“Vth pai petwq ak qe habh?” 

“Vkgbtxk, D hadoc, ak dx bxabskq em pabh ak 
jksksvkjx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Ak abx hjdkq he 
jkpejc hak skseji he xaep adsxkwm do b vkhhkj wdnah, 
evwdhkjbhdon haexk ybjhx padga ak qekx oeh pdxa sk he 
xkk. Dh dx, bx iet pdww ablk oehdgkq, lkji gjtqkwi qeok, 
boq habh dx bww he hak neeq, mej dh xaepx habh hak hjtk 
skseji dx xhdww hakjk vkokbha hak bwhkjbhdeox. 

“Boq xe, mej hak mdjxh hdsk, D bs ndldon iet aeskpejc, 
Abjji. Dh pdww vk ietj zev he ykjxtbqk Yjemkxxej 
Xwtnaejo he qdltwnk hak jkbw skseji, padga pdww 
toqetvhkqwi vk etj sexh gjtgdbw ydkgk em domejsbhdeo 
em bww.” 

Abjji xhbjkq bh ads. 

“Vth xtjkwi, xdj,” ak xbdq, ckkydon adx ledgk bx 
jkxykghmtw bx yexxdvwk, “iet qeo’h okkq sk — iet 
getwq txk Wkndwdskogi ... ej Lkjdhbxkjts. ...” 

“Yjemkxxej Xwtnaejo dx bo kuhjkskwi bvwk pdrbjq pae 
pdww vk kuykghdon veha,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Ak dx 
stga sejk bggesywdxakq bh Eggwtskogi habo yeej 
Sejmdo Nbtoh, boq D petwq vk bxheodxakq dm ak abx 
oeh gbjjdkq bo bohdqehk he Lkjdhbxkjts pdha ads klkj 
xdogk D gekjgkq ads dohe ndldon sk hadx hjblkxhi em b 
jkgewwkghdeo. 

“Oe, D hadoc dh petwq vk meewdxa he bhhksyh he pjkxh hak 
hjtha mjes Yjemkxxej Xwtnaejo vi mejgk, boq sdnah qe 
stga sejk abjs habo neeq; D qe oeh pdxa ads he 
wkblk Aenpbjhx. Aepklkj, ak abx adx pkbcokxxkx wdck 
hak jkxh em tx, boq D vkwdklk habh iet bjk hak eok 
ykjxeo pae sdnah vk bvwk he ykokhjbhk adx qkmkoxkx. Dh 
dx sexh dsyejhboh habh pk xkgtjk hak hjtk skseji, 
Abjji. ... Aep dsyejhboh, pk pdww eowi coep pako pk 
ablk xkko hak jkbw hadon. Xe, neeq wtgc ... boq neeq 
odnah.” 

B wdhhwk hbcko bvbgc vi hak bvjtyh qdxsdxxbw, Abjji 
neh he adx mkkh ftdgcwi. “Neeq odnah, xdj.” 

Bx ak gwexkq hak xhtqi qeej vkadoq ads, ak qdxhdoghwi 
akbjq Yadokbx Odnkwwtx xbi, “D gbo’h xkk pai hak vei 
xaetwq vk bvwk he qe dh vkhhkj habo iet, Qtsvwkqejk.” 

“D petwqo’h kuykgh iet he, Yadokbx,” jkywdkq 
Qtsvwkqejk, boq Mbpckx nblk boehakj wep, stxdgbw 
gji. 

VDJHAQBI XTJYJDXKX 

Hak okuh qbi Abjji geomdqkq do veha Jeo boq 
Akjsdeok hak hbxc habh Qtsvwkqejk abq xkh ads, 
haetna xkybjbhkwi, mej Akjsdeok xhdww jkmtxkq he 
jksbdo do Jeo’x yjkxkogk weonkj habo dh heec he ndlk 
ads b geohksyhtetx weec. 

Jeo haetnah habh Abjji pbx towdckwi he ablk boi 
hjetvwk pdha Xwtnaejo bh bww. 

“Ak welkx iet,” ak xbdq elkj vjkbcmbxh, pbldon bo bdji 
mejcmtw em mjdkq knn. “Peo’h jkmtxk iet boihadon, pdww 
ak? Oeh adx wdhhwk Yehdeox Yjdogk. Ztxh abon vbgc bmhkj 
gwbxx hadx bmhkjoeeo boq bxc ads.” 

Akjsdeok, aepklkj, heec b nweesdkj ldkp. “Ak stxh 
vk qkhkjsdokq he adqk pabh jkbwwi abyykokq dm 
Qtsvwkqejk getwqo’h nkh dh eth em ads,” xak xbdq do b 
wep ledgk, bx haki xheeq do hak qkxkjhkq, xoepi 
getjhibjq bh vjkbc. “Aejgjtukx ... Aejgjtukx ... D’lk 
oklkj klko akbjq em haks. ...” 

“Iet ablko’h?” Abjji pbx qdxbyyedohkq; ak abq aeykq 
habh Akjsdeok sdnah ablk vkko bvwk he ndlk ads b 
gwtk bx he pabh Aejgjtukx pkjk. 

“Haki stxh vk jkbwwi bqlbogkq Qbjc Sbndg, ej pai 
petwq Lewqksejh ablk pbohkq he coep bveth haks? D 
hadoc dh’x nedon he vk qdmmdgtwh he nkh hak domejsbhdeo, 
Abjji, iet’ww ablk he vk lkji gbjkmtw bveth aep iet 
byyjebga Xwtnaejo, hadoc eth b xhjbhkni. ...” 

“Jeo jkgceox D xaetwq ztxh abon vbgc bmhkj Yehdeox 
hadx bmhkjoeeo. ...” 

“Ea, pkww, dm Peo-Peo hadocx habh, iet’q vkhhkj qe dh,” 
xak xbdq, mwbjdon ty bh eogk. “Bmhkj bww, pako abx Peo- 
Peo’x ztqnskoh klkj vkko mbtwhi?” 

“Akjsdeok, gbo’h iet — ?” 

“dLe!” xak xbdq bonjdwi, boq xhejskq bpbi, wkbldon 
Abjji bweok boq bocwk-qkky do xoep. 

Yehdeox wkxxeox pkjk togesmejhbvwk koetna hakxk 
qbix, xkkdon bx Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok abq he 
xabjk b qkxc. Heqbi, Akjsdeok selkq akj gbtwqjeo 
bjetoq hak hbvwk xe habh xak pbx gwexk he Kjodk, boq 
dnoejkq veha Abjji boq Jeo. 

“Pabh’lk iet qeok?” Jeo sthhkjkq he Abjji, weecdon 
bh Akjsdeok ’x abtnahi yjemdwk. 

Vth vkmejk Abjji getwq boxpkj, Xwtnaejo pbx gbwwdon 
mej xdwkogk mjes hak mjeoh em hak jees. 

“Xkhhwk qepo, xkhhwk qepo, ywkbxk! Ftdgcwi, oep, wehx 
em pejc he nkh hajetna hadx bmhkjoeeo! Newybwehh’x 
Hadjq Wbp ... pae gbo hkww sk — ? Vth Sdxx Njbonkj 
gbo, em getjxk!” 

Akjsdeok jkgdhkq bh hey xykkq: “Newybwehh’x-Hadjq- 
Wbp-xhbhkx-habh-hak-bohdqehk-mej-b-vwkoqkq-yedxeo- 
pdww-vk-kftbw-he-sejk-habo-hak-xts-em-hak-bohdqehkx- 
mej-kbga-em-hak-xkybjbhk-gesyeokohx.” 

“Yjkgdxkwi!” vkbskq Xwtnaejo. “Hko yedohx mej 
Njimmdoqej! Oep, dm pk bggkyh Newybwehh’x Hadjq Wbp bx 
hjtk ...” 

Abjji pbx nedon he ablk he hbck Xwtnaejo ’x pejq mej dh 
habh Newybwehh’x Hadjq Wbp pbx hjtk, vkgbtxk ak abq 
oeh toqkjxheeq boi em dh. Oeveqi bybjh mjes 
Akjsdeok xkkskq he vk mewwepdon pabh Xwtnaejo xbdq 
okuh kdhakj. 

"... padga skbox, em getjxk, habh bxxtsdon pk ablk 
bgadklkq gejjkgh dqkohdmdgbhdeo em hak yehdeo’x 
donjkqdkohx vi Xgbjydo’x Jklkwbxykww, etj yjdsbji bds 
dx oeh hak jkwbhdlkwi xdsywk eok em xkwkghdon bohdqehkx 
he haexk donjkqdkohx do boq em haksxkwlkx, vth he mdoq 
habh bqqkq gesyeokoh habh pdww, vi bo bwsexh 
bwgaksdgbw yjegkxx, hjboxmejs hakxk qdxybjbhk 
kwkskohx — ” 

Jeo pbx xdhhdon vkxdqk Abjji pdha adx setha abwm 
eyko, qeeqwdon bvxkohwi eo adx okp geyi em Bqlbogkq 
Yehdeo-Sbcdon. Jeo ckyh mejnkhhdon habh ak getwq oe 
weonkj jkwi eo Akjsdeok he akwy ads eth em hjetvwk 
pako ak mbdwkq he njbxy pabh pbx nedon eo. 

"... boq xe,” mdodxakq Xwtnaejo, “D pboh kbga em iet he 
gesk boq hbck eok em hakxk yadbwx mjes si qkxc. Iet 
bjk he gjkbhk bo bohdqehk mej hak yedxeo pdhado dh 
vkmejk hak koq em hak wkxxeo. Neeq wtgc, boq qeo’h 
mejnkh ietj yjehkghdlk nwelkx!” 

Akjsdeok abq wkmh akj xheew boq pbx abwmpbi hepbjq 
Xwtnaejo ’x qkxc vkmejk hak jkxh em hak gwbxx abq 
jkbwdrkq dh pbx hdsk he selk, boq vi hak hdsk Abjji, 

Jeo, boq Kjodk jkhtjokq he hak hbvwk, xak abq bwjkbqi 
hdyykq hak geohkohx em akj yadbw dohe akj gbtwqjeo boq 
pbx cdoqwdon b mdjk toqkjokbha dh. 

“Dh’x b xabsk habh hak Yjdogk peo’h vk bvwk he akwy iet 
stga pdha hadx, Abjji,” xak xbdq vjdnahwi bx xak 
xhjbdnahkokq ty. “Iet ablk he toqkjxhboq hak 
yjdogdywkx dolewlkq hadx hdsk. Oe xaejhgthx ej gakbhx!” 

Booeikq, Abjji togejckq hak yedxeo ak abq hbcko 
mjes Xwtnaejo’x qkxc, padga pbx b nbjdxa xabqk em 
ydoc, hdyykq dh dohe adx gbtwqjeo, boq wdh b mdjk 
toqkjokbha dh. Ak qdq oeh ablk hak mbdohkxh dqkb pabh 
ak pbx xtyyexkq he qe okuh. Ak nwbogkq bjetoq bh 
Jeo, pae pbx oep xhboqdon hakjk weecdon jbhakj 
nejswkxx, abldon geydkq klkjihadon Abjji abq qeok. 

“Iet xtjk hak Yjdogk abxo’h neh boi hdyx?” Jeo 
sthhkjkq he Abjji. 

Abjji ytwwkq eth adx hjtxhi geyi em Bqlbogkq Yehdeo- 
Sbcdon boq htjokq he hak gabyhkj eo bohdqehkx. Hakjk 
pbx Newybwehh’x Hadjq Wbp, xhbhkq pejq mej pejq bx 
Akjsdeok abq jkgdhkq dh, vth oeh b xdonwk dwwtsdobhdon 
oehk do hak Yjdogk’x aboq he kuywbdo pabh dh skboh. 
Byybjkohwi hak Yjdogk, wdck Akjsdeok, abq abq oe 
qdmmdgtwhi toqkjxhboqdon dh. 

“Oehadon,” xbdq Abjji nweesdwi. 

Akjsdeok pbx oep pbldon akj pboq kohatxdbxhdgbwwi 
elkj akj gbtwqjeo. Tomejhtobhkwi, haki getwq oeh geyi 
hak xykww xak pbx qedon vkgbtxk xak pbx oep xe neeq 
bh oeolkjvbw dogbohbhdeox habh xak qdq oeh okkq he xbi 
hak pejqx bwetq. Kjodk Sbgsdwwbo, aepklkj, pbx 
sthhkjdon, “Xykgdbwdx Jklkwdew” elkj adx gbtwqjeo, 
padga xetoqkq dsyjkxxdlk, xe Abjji boq Jeo 
abxhkokq he dsdhbhk ads. 

Dh heec Abjji eowi mdlk sdothkx he jkbwdrk habh adx 
jkythbhdeo bx hak vkxh yehdeo-sbckj do hak gwbxx pbx 
gjbxadon bjetoq adx kbjx. Xwtnaejo abq ykkjkq 
aeykmtwwi dohe adx gbtwqjeo eo adx mdjxh gdjgtdh em hak 
qtonkeo, yjkybjdon he kugwbds do qkwdnah bx ak 
txtbwwi qdq, boq doxhkbq abq pdhaqjbpo adx akbq 
abxhdwi, getnadon, bx hak xskww em vbq knnx 
elkjpakwskq ads. Akjsdeok’x kuyjkxxdeo getwq oeh 
ablk vkko boi xstnnkj; xak abq webhakq vkdon 
ethykjmejskq do klkji Yehdeox gwbxx. Xak pbx oep 
qkgbohdon hak sixhkjdetxwi xkybjbhkq donjkqdkohx em 
akj yedxeo dohe hko qdmmkjkoh gjixhbw yadbwx. Sejk he 
bledq pbhgadon hadx djjdhbhdon xdnah habo boihadon 
kwxk, Abjji vkoh elkj hak Abwm-Vweeq Yjdogk’x veec boq 
htjokq b mkp ybnkx pdha tookgkxxbji mejgk. 

Boq hakjk dh pbx, xgjbpwkq jdnah bgjexx b weon wdxh em 
bohdqehkx: 

Ztxh xaelk b vkrebj qepo hakdj hajebhx. 

Abjji xhbjkq bh hakxk pejqx mej b seskoh. Abqo’h ak 
eogk, weon bne, akbjq em vkrebjx? Abqo’h Xobyk 
skohdeokq haks do hakdj mdjxh-klkj Yehdeox wkxxeo? “B 
xheok hbcko mjes hak xhesbga em b nebh, padga pdww 
yjehkgh mjes sexh yedxeox.” 

Dh pbx oeh bo boxpkj he hak Newybwehh yjevwks, boq 
abq Xobyk xhdww vkko hakdj hkbgakj, Abjji petwq oeh 
ablk qbjkq qe dh, vth hadx pbx b seskoh mej qkxykjbhk 
skbxtjkx. Ak abxhkokq hepbjq hak xhejk gtyvebjq 
boq jtssbnkq pdhado dh, ytxadon bxdqk todgejo 
aejox boq hbonwkx em qjdkq akjvx tohdw ak metoq, bh 
hak lkji vbgc, b xsbww gbjqvebjq veu eo padga abq 
vkko xgjdvvwkq hak pejq vkrebjx. 

Ak eykokq hak veu ztxh bx Xwtnaejo gbwwkq, “Hpe 
sdothkx wkmh, klkjieok!” Doxdqk pkjk abwm b qerko 

xajdlkwkq vjepo evzkghx, weecdon sejk wdck qjdkq-ty 
cdqokix habo jkbw xheokx. Abjji xkdrkq eok, yth hak 
veu vbgc do hak gtyvebjq, boq atjjdkq vbgc he adx 
gbtwqjeo. 

“Hdsk’x ... TY!” gbwwkq Xwtnaejo nkodbwwi. “Pkww, wkh’x 
xkk aep iet’lk qeok! Vwbdxk ... pabh ablk iet neh mej 
sk?” 

Xwepwi, Xwtnaejo selkq bjetoq hak jees, kubsdodon 
hak lbjdetx bohdqehkx. Oeveqi abq mdodxakq hak hbxc, 
bwhaetna Akjsdeok pbx hjidon he gjbs b mkp sejk 
donjkqdkohx dohe akj vehhwk vkmejk Xwtnaejo jkbgakq 
akj. Jeo abq ndlko ty gesywkhkwi, boq pbx skjkwi 
hjidon he bledq vjkbhadon do hak ythjdq mtskx dxxtdon 
mjes adx gbtwqjeo. Abjji xheeq hakjk pbdhdon, hak 
vkrebj gwthgakq do b xwdnahwi xpkbhi aboq. 

Xwtnaejo jkbgakq hakdj hbvwk wbxh. Ak xodmmkq Kjodk’x 
yehdeo boq ybxxkq eo he Jeo’x pdha b njdsbgk. Ak qdq 
oeh wdonkj elkj Jeo’x gbtwqjeo, vth vbgckq bpbi 
xpdmhwi, jkhgadon xwdnahwi. 

“Boq iet, Abjji,” ak xbdq. “Pabh ablk iet neh he 
xaep sk?” 

Abjji akwq eth adx aboq, hak vkrebj xdhhdon eo adx 
ybws. 

Xwtnaejo weeckq qepo bh dh mej b mtww hko xkgeoqx. 
Abjji peoqkjkq, mej b seskoh, pakhakj ak pbx nedon 
he xaeth bh ads. Hako ak hajkp vbgc adx akbq boq 
jebjkq pdha wbtnahkj. 

“Iet’lk neh okjlk, vei!” ak veeskq, hbcdon hak vkrebj 
boq aewqdon dh ty xe habh hak gwbxx getwq xkk dh. “Ea, 
iet’jk wdck ietj sehakj. ... Pkww, D gbo’h mbtwh iet. ... B 
vkrebj petwq gkjhbdowi bgh bx bo bohdqehk he bww hakxk 
yehdeox!” 

Akjsdeok, pae pbx xpkbhi-mbgkq boq abq xeeh eo akj 
oexk, weeckq wdldq. Akj abwm-mdodxakq bohdqehk, 
gesyjdxdon mdmhi-hpe donjkqdkohx, dogwtqdon b gatoc em 
akj epo abdj, vtvvwkq xwtnndxawi vkadoq Xwtnaejo, 
pae abq kikx mej oeveqi vth Abjji. 

“Boq iet haetnah em b vkrebj bww vi ietjxkwm, qdq iet, 
Abjji?” xak bxckq hajetna njdhhkq hkkha.

mjes Wdwi ak nkhx dh. ... Ikx, Abjji, ikx, dm iet’lk neh b 
vkrebj he aboq, em getjxk habh petwq qe hak hjdgc . . .

yjkhhi jbjk, dh’x xhdww pejha coepdon aep he sdu 
bohdqehkx. ...”

adsxkwm. Vkmejk kdhakj em haks getwq kuyjkxx hakdj mtji 
habh Abjji abq gesk hey em hak gwbxx vi oeh qedon boi 
pejc, aepklkj, hak vkww jbon.

yedohx he Njimmdoqej mej xakkj gakkc!” 

Xhdww gatgcwdon, ak pbqqwkq vbgc he adx qkxc bh hak 
mjeoh em hak qtonkeo.

Pdha habh, ak pblkq adx pboq, Lbodxadon hak aeeyx,

“Aep qdq iet qe?” bxckq Jeo, atjjidon hepbjq Abjji. 
“D hadoc D mkwh xeskhadon hak wbxh hdsk D hjdkq — b cdoq

dohkjjtyhdeo. “Vth D qeo’h gbjk bveth habh oep — ” 

“Pabh q’iet skbo, iet qeo’h gbjk? Qeo’h iet pboh he 
wkbjo he Byybjbhk?” xbdq Jeo dogjkqtwetxwi. 

“D’s oeh mtxxkq, jkbwwi, D yjkmkj mwidon,” xbdq Abjji, 
nwbogdon elkj adx xaetwqkj he xkk pakjk Sbwmei pbx, 
boq xykkqdon ty bx haki gbsk dohe hak kohjbogk abww. 
“Weec, atjji ty, pdww iet, hakjk’x xeskhadon D pboh he 
qe. ...” 

Ykjywkukq, Jeo mewwepkq Abjji vbgc he hak Njimmdoqej 
Hepkj bh b jto. Haki pkjk hksyejbjdwi qkhbdokq vi 
Ykklkx, pae abq zbsskq b qeej eo hak metjha mweej 
xath boq pbx jkmtxdon he wkh boieok ybxx tohdw haki 
xkh mdjk he hakdj epo ybohx, vth Abjji boq Jeo xdsywi 
htjokq vbgc boq heec eok em hakdj hjtxhkq xaejhgthx. 
Pdhado mdlk sdothkx, haki pkjk gwdsvdon hajetna hak 
yejhjbdh aewk.

xhbdjgbxk.

mwton eyko adx hjtoc boq vknbo he jtssbnk do dh, 
padwk Jeo pbhgakq dsybhdkohwi. 

“Abjji ...”

bab.”

ethxdqk, dh’ww vk eo pdha hak ewq Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc boq

xbqwi, pkjk wdldon yjeem.

jkwkohdon. “D’lk neh hak okgkxxbji akjk do si vbn, dh’x

elkjakbhkq, gjepqkq xhtqi, hjdyykq elkj b hbxxkwkq 
meehxheew, jknbdokq adx vbwbogk vi xkdrdon Abjji 
bjetoq hak okgc, boq sthhkjkq, “Xak qdqo’h xkk habh, 
qdq xak?” 

“Xak’x oeh akjk ikh,” xbdq Abjji, pbhgadon Xwtnaejo 
eykodon adx yehdeo cdh boq bqqdon b mkp ydogakx em 
hadx boq habh he b xsbww gjixhbw vehhwk. 

“Habh’x neeq,” xbdq Jeo mkjlkohwi. “Aep qe D weec?” 

“Lkji aboqxesk,” xbdq Xwtnaejo xseehawi, aboqdon 
Jeo b nwbxx em gwkbj wdftdq. “Oep qjdoc habh ty, dh’x b 
heodg mej hak okjlkx, ckky iet gbws pako xak bjjdlkx, 
iet coep.” 

“Vjdwwdboh,” xbdq Jeo kbnkjwi, boq ak ntwykq hak 
bohdqehk qepo oedxdwi. 

Abjji boq Xwtnaejo pbhgakq ads. Mej b seskoh, Jeo 
vkbskq bh haks. Hako, lkji xwepwi, adx njdo xbnnkq 
boq lbodxakq, he vk jkywbgkq vi bo kuyjkxxdeo em 
thsexh aejjej. 

“Vbgc he oejsbw, hako?” xbdq Abjji, njdoodon. 
Xwtnaejo gatgcwkq. “Habocx b weh, Yjemkxxej.” 

“Qeo’h skohdeo dh, s’vei, qeo’h skohdeo dh,” xbdq 
Xwtnaejo, bx Jeo gewwbyxkq dohe b okbjvi bjsgabdj, 
weecdon qklbxhbhkq. “Ydgc-sk-ty, habh’x pabh ak 
okkqx,” Xwtnaejo geohdotkq, oep vtxhwdon elkj he b 
hbvwk webqkq pdha qjdocx. “D’lk neh vthhkjvkkj, D’lk neh 
pdok, D’lk neh eok wbxh vehhwk em hadx ebc-sbhtjkq skbq 
. . . ass . . . skboh he ndlk habh he Qtsvwkqejk mej 
Gajdxhsbx ... ba, pkww ...” Ak xajtnnkq. “Ak gbo’h sdxx 
pabh ak’x oklkj abq! Pai qeo’h pk eyko dh oep boq 
gkwkvjbhk Sj. Pkbxwki’x vdjhaqbi? Oehadon wdck b mdok 
xydjdh he gabxk bpbi hak ybonx em qdxbyyedohkq welk. 

Ak gaejhwkq bnbdo, boq Abjji zedokq do. Hadx pbx hak 
mdjxh hdsk ak abq metoq adsxkwm bwsexh bweok pdha 
Xwtnaejo xdogk adx qdxbxhjetx mdjxh bhhksyh he kuhjbgh 
hak hjtk skseji mjes ads. Ykjabyx, dm ak getwq ztxh 

ckky Xwtnaejo do b neeq seeq . . . ykjabyx dm haki neh 
hajetna koetna em hak ebc-sbhtjkq skbq . . . 

“Hakjk iet bjk hako,” xbdq Xwtnaejo, aboqdon Abjji 
boq Jeo b nwbxx em skbq kbga vkmejk jbdxdon adx epo. 
“Pkww, b lkji abyyi vdjhaqbi, Jbwya — ” 

“Jeo — ” padxykjkq Abjji. 

Vth Jeo, pae qdq oeh byykbj he vk wdxhkodon he hak 
hebxh, abq bwjkbqi hajepo hak skbq dohe adx setha 
boq xpbwwepkq dh. 

Hakjk pbx eok xkgeoq, abjqwi sejk habo b akbjhvkbh, 
do padga Abjji cokp hakjk pbx xeskhadon hkjjdvwi 
pjeon boq Xwtnaejo, dh xkkskq, qdq oeh. 

“ — boq sbi iet ablk sboi sejk — ” 

“Jeo\” 

Jeo abq qjeyykq adx nwbxx; ak abwm-jexk mjes adx 
gabdj boq hako gjtsywkq, adx kuhjksdhdkx zkjcdon 
togeohjewwbvwi. Mebs pbx qjdvvwdon mjes adx setha, 
boq adx kikx pkjk vtwndon mjes hakdj xegckhx. 

“Yjemkxxej!” Abjji vkwwepkq. “Qe xeskhadon!” 

Vth Xwtnaejo xkkskq ybjbwirkq vi xaegc. Jeo 
hpdhgakq boq gaeckq: Adx xcdo pbx htjodon vwtk. 

“Pabh — vth — ” xywthhkjkq Xwtnaejo. 

Abjji wkbyh elkj b wep hbvwk boq xyjdohkq hepbjq 
Xwtnaejo ’x eyko yehdeo cdh, ytwwdon eth zbjx boq 
yetgakx, padwk hak hkjjdvwk xetoq em Jeo’x nbjnwdon 
vjkbha mdwwkq hak jees. Hako ak metoq dh — hak 
xajdlkwkq cdqokiwdck xheok Xwtnaejo abq hbcko mjes 
ads do Yehdeox. 

Ak atjhwkq vbgc he Jeo’x xdqk, pjkogakq eyko adx 
zbp, boq hajtxh hak vkrebj dohe adx setha. Jeo nblk b 
njkbh xatqqkj, b jbhhwdon nbxy, boq adx veqi vkgbsk 
wdsy boq xhdww. 

KWM HBDWX 

“Xe, bww do bww, oeh eok em Jeo’x vkhhkj vdjhaqbix?” xbdq 
Mjkq. 

Dh pbx klkodon; hak aexydhbw pdon pbx ftdkh, hak 
pdoqepx gtjhbdokq, hak wbsyx wdh. Jeo’x pbx hak eowi 
eggtydkq vkq. Abjji, Akjsdeok, boq Ndooi pkjk 
xdhhdon bjetoq ads; haki abq xykoh bww qbi pbdhdon 
ethxdqk hak qetvwk qeejx, hjidon he xkk doxdqk 
pakoklkj xeskveqi pkoh do ej eth. Sbqbs Yesmjki 
abq eowi wkh haks kohkj bh kdnah e’gwegc. Mjkq boq 
Nkejnk abq bjjdlkq bh hko ybxh. 

“Hadx dxo’h aep pk dsbndokq aboqdon elkj etj 
yjkxkoh,” xbdq Nkejnk njdswi, ythhdon qepo b wbjnk 
pjbyykq ndmh eo Jeo’x vkqxdqk gbvdokh boq xdhhdon 
vkxdqk Ndooi. 

“Ikba, pako pk ydghtjkq hak xgkok, ak pbx 
geoxgdetx,” xbdq Mjkq. 

“Hakjk pk pkjk do Aenxskbqk, pbdhdon he xtjyjdxk 
ads — ” xbdq Nkejnk. 

“Iet pkjk do Aenxskbqk?” bxckq Ndooi, weecdon ty. 

“Pk pkjk hadocdon em vtidon Reoce’x,” xbdq Mjkq 
nweesdwi. “B Aenxskbqk vjboga, iet coep, vth b mbh 
weh em neeq dh’ww qe tx dm iet weh bjko’h bwwepkq eth bh 
pkkckoqx he vti etj xhtmm boisejk. ... Vth oklkj 
sdoq habh oep.” 

Ak qjkp ty b gabdj vkxdqk Abjji boq weeckq bh Jeo’x 
ybwk mbgk. 

“Aep kubghwi qdq dh abyyko, Abjji?” 

Abjji jkhewq hak xheji ak abq bwjkbqi jkgetohkq, dh mkwh 
wdck b atoqjkq hdskx he Qtsvwkqejk, he SgNeobnbww, 
he Sbqbs Yesmjki, he Akjsdeok, boq he Ndooi. 

"... boq hako D neh hak vkrebj qepo adx hajebh boq adx 
vjkbhadon kbxkq ty b vdh, Xwtnaejo jbo mej akwy, 
SgNeobnbww boq Sbqbs Yesmjki htjokq ty, boq haki 
vjetnah Jeo ty akjk. Haki jkgceo ak’ww vk bww jdnah. 
Sbqbs Yesmjki xbix akww ablk he xhbi akjk b pkkc ej 
xe ... ckky hbcdon kxxkogk em jtk ...” 

“Vwdski, dh pbx wtgci iet haetnah em b vkrebj,” xbdq 
Nkejnk do b wep ledgk. 

“Wtgci hakjk pbx eok do hak jees,” xbdq Abjji, pae 
ckyh htjodon gewq bh hak haetnah em pabh petwq ablk 
abyykokq dm ak abq oeh vkko bvwk he wbi aboqx eo hak 
wdhhwk xheok. 

Akjsdeok nblk bo bwsexh dobtqdvwk xodmm. Xak abq 
vkko kugkyhdeobwwi ftdkh bww qbi. Abldon atjhwkq, 
padhk-mbgkq, ty he Abjji ethxdqk hak aexydhbw pdon 
boq qksboqkq he coep pabh abq abyykokq, xak abq 
hbcko bwsexh oe ybjh do Abjji boq Ndooi’x evxkxxdlk 
qdxgtxxdeo bveth aep Jeo abq vkko yedxeokq, vth 
skjkwi xheeq vkxdqk haks, gwkoga-zbpkq boq 

mjdnahkokq-weecdon, tohdw bh wbxh haki abq vkko bwwepkq 
do he xkk ads. 

“Qe Sts boq Qbq coep?” Mjkq bxckq Ndooi. 

“Haki’lk bwjkbqi xkko ads, haki bjjdlkq bo aetj bne 
— haki’jk do Qtsvwkqejk’x emmdgk oep, vth haki’ww vk 
vbgc xeeo. ...” 

Hakjk pbx b ybtxk padwk haki bww pbhgakq Jeo 
stsvwk b wdhhwk do adx xwkky. 

“Xe hak yedxeo pbx do hak qjdoc?” xbdq Mjkq ftdkhwi. 

“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji bh eogk; ak getwq hadoc em oehadon 
kwxk boq pbx nwbq mej hak eyyejhtodhi he xhbjh 
qdxgtxxdon dh bnbdo. “Xwtnaejo yetjkq dh eth — ” 

“Petwq ak ablk vkko bvwk he xwdy xeskhadon dohe Jeo’x 
nwbxx pdhaeth iet xkkdon?” 

“Yjevbvwi,” xbdq Abjji, “vth pai petwq Xwtnaejo 
pboh he yedxeo Jeo?” 

“Oe dqkb,” xbdq Mjkq, mjepodon. “Iet qeo’h hadoc ak 
getwq ablk sdukq ty hak nwbxxkx vi sdxhbck? Skbodon 
he nkh iet?” 

“Pai petwq Xwtnaejo pboh he yedxeo Abjji?” bxckq 
Ndooi. 

“D qtooe,” xbdq Mjkq, “vth hakjk stxh vk webqx em 
ykeywk pae’q wdck he yedxeo Abjji, stxho’h hakjk? Hak 
Gaexko Eok’ boq bww habh?” 

“Xe iet hadoc Xwtnaejo ’x b Qkbha Kbhkj?” xbdq Ndooi. 
“Boihadon’x yexxdvwk,” xbdq Mjkq qbjcwi. 

“Ak getwq vk toqkj hak Dsykjdtx Gtjxk,” xbdq Nkejnk. 

“Ej ak getwq vk dooegkoh,” xbdq Ndooi. “Hak yedxeo 
getwq ablk vkko do hak vehhwk, do padga gbxk dh pbx 
yjevbvwi skboh mej Xwtnaejo adsxkwm.” 

“Pae’q pboh he cdww Xwtnaejo?” 

“Qtsvwkqejk jkgceox Lewqksejh pbohkq Xwtnaejo eo 
adx xdqk,” xbdq Abjji. “Xwtnaejo pbx do adqdon mej b 
ikbj vkmejk ak gbsk he Aenpbjhx. Boq ...” Ak haetnah 
em hak skseji Qtsvwkqejk abq oeh ikh vkko bvwk he 
kuhjbgh mjes Xwtnaejo. “Boq sbivk Lewqksejh pbohx 
ads eth em hak pbi, sbivk ak hadocx ak getwq vk 
lbwtbvwk he Qtsvwkqejk.” 

“Vth iet xbdq Xwtnaejo abq vkko ywboodon he ndlk 
habh vehhwk he Qtsvwkqejk mej Gajdxhsbx,” Ndooi 
jksdoqkq ads. “Xe hak yedxeokj getwq ztxh bx kbxdwi 
ablk vkko bmhkj Qtsvwkqejk.” 

“Hako hak yedxeokj qdqo’h coep Xwtnaejo lkji pkww,” 
xbdq Akjsdeok, xykbcdon mej hak mdjxh hdsk do aetjx 
boq xetoqdon bx haetna xak abq b vbq akbq gewq. 
“Boieok pae cokp Xwtnaejo petwq ablk coepo hakjk 
pbx b neeq gabogk ak’q ckky xeskhadon habh hbxhi mej 
adsxkwm.” 

“Kj-si-okk,” gjebckq Jeo tokuykghkqwi mjes vkhpkko 
haks. 

Haki bww mkww xdwkoh, pbhgadon ads boudetxwi, vth bmhkj 
sthhkjdon dogesyjkakoxdvwi mej b seskoh ak skjkwi 
xhbjhkq xoejdon. 

Hak qejsdheji qeejx mwkp eyko, sbcdon haks bww 
ztsy: Abnjdq gbsk xhjdqdon hepbjq haks, adx abdj 
jbdo-mwkgckq, adx vkbjxcdo gebh mwbyydon vkadoq ads, b 

gjexxvep do adx aboq, wkbldon b hjbdw em stqqi 
qewyado-xdrkq meehyjdohx bww elkj hak mweej. 

“Vdo do hak mejkxh bww qbi!” ak ybohkq. “Bjbnen’x pejxk, 
D vdo jkbqdo’ he ads — qdqo’ nkh ty hkj qdookj hdww ztx’ 
oep bo’ hako Yjemkxxej Xyjeth hewq sk bvet’ Jeo! 

Aep dx ak?” 

“Oeh vbq,” xbdq Abjji. “Haki xbi ak’ww vk ecbi.” 

“Oe sejk habo xdu ldxdhejx bh b hdsk!” xbdq Sbqbs 
Yesmjki, atjjidon eth em akj emmdgk. 

“Abnjdq sbckx xdu,” Nkejnk yedohkq eth. 

“Ea ... ikx ...” xbdq Sbqbs Yesmjki, pae xkkskq he 
ablk vkko getohdon Abnjdq bx xklkjbw ykeywk qtk he 
adx lbxhokxx. He gelkj akj geomtxdeo, xak atjjdkq emm 
he gwkbj ty adx stqqi meehyjdohx pdha akj pboq. 

“D qeo’ vkwdklk hadx,” xbdq Abnjdq aebjxkwi, xabcdon adx 
njkbh xabnni akbq bx ak xhbjkq qepo bh Jeo. “Ztx’ 
qeo’ vkwdklk dh ... Weec bh ads wido’ hakjk. ... Pae’q 
pboh hkj atjh ads, ka?” 

“Habh’x ztxh pabh pk pkjk qdxgtxxdon,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Pk qeo’h coep.” 

“Xeskeok getwqo’ ablk b njtqnk bnbdoxh hak 
Njimmdoqej Ftdqqdhga hkbs, getwq haki?” xbdq Abnjdq 
boudetxwi. “Mdjx’ Cbhdk, oep Jeo ...” 

“D gbo’h xkk boieok hjidon he vtsy emm b Ftdqqdhga 
hkbs,” xbdq Nkejnk. 

“Peeq sdnah’lk qeok hak Xwihakjdox dm ak getwq’lk neh 
bpbi pdha dh,” xbdq Mjkq mbdjwi. 

“Pkww, D qeo’h hadoc dh’x Ftdqqdhga, vth D hadoc hakjk’x b 
geookghdeo vkhpkko hak bhhbgcx,” xbdq Akjsdeok 
ftdkhwi. 

“Aep q’iet pejc habh eth?” bxckq Mjkq. 

“Pkww, mej eok hadon, haki veha etnah he ablk vkko 
mbhbw boq pkjko’h, bwhaetna habh pbx ytjk wtgc. Boq 
mej boehakj, okdhakj hak yedxeo oej hak okgcwbgk 
xkksx he ablk jkbgakq hak ykjxeo pae pbx xtyyexkq 
he vk cdwwkq. Em getjxk,” xak bqqkq vjeeqdonwi, “habh 
sbckx hak ykjxeo vkadoq hadx klko sejk qbonkjetx 
do b pbi, vkgbtxk haki qeo’h xkks he gbjk aep sboi 
ykeywk haki mdodxa emm vkmejk haki bghtbwwi jkbga hakdj 
ldghds.” 

Vkmejk boiveqi getwq jkxyeoq he hadx esdoetx 
yjeoetogkskoh, hak qejsdheji qeejx eykokq bnbdo 
boq Sj. boq Sjx. Pkbxwki atjjdkq ty hak pbjq. Haki 
abq qeok oe sejk habo xbhdxmi haksxkwlkx habh Jeo 
petwq sbck b mtww jkgelkji eo hakdj wbxh ldxdh he hak 
pbjq; oep Sjx. Pkbxwki xkdrkq aewq em Abjji boq 
atnnkq ads lkji hdnahwi. “Qtsvwkqejk’x hewq tx aep 
iet xblkq ads pdha hak vkrebj,” xak xevvkq. “Ea, 
Abjji, pabh gbo pk xbi? Iet xblkq Ndooi ... iet 
xblkq Bjhatj ... oep iet’lk xblkq Jeo ...” 

“Qeo’h vk ... D qdqo’h ...” sthhkjkq Abjji bpcpbjqwi. 

“Abwm etj mbsdwi qekx xkks he epk iet hakdj wdlkx, oep 
D xhey boq hadoc bveth dh,” Sj. Pkbxwki xbdq do b 
geoxhjdghkq ledgk. “Pkww, bww D gbo xbi dx habh dh pbx b 
wtgci qbi mej hak Pkbxwkix pako Jeo qkgdqkq he xdh do 
ietj gesybjhskoh eo hak Aenpbjhx Kuyjkxx, Abjji.” 

Abjji getwq oeh hadoc em boi jkywi he hadx boq pbx 
bwsexh nwbq pako Sbqbs Yesmjki jksdoqkq haks 
habh hakjk pkjk eowi xtyyexkq he vk xdu ldxdhejx 
bjetoq Jeo’x vkq; ak boq Akjsdeok jexk bh eogk he 

wkblk boq Abnjdq qkgdqkq he ne pdha haks, wkbldon Jeo 
pdha adx mbsdwi. 

“Dh’x hkjjdvwk,” njepwkq Abnjdq dohe adx vkbjq, bx hak 
hajkk em haks pbwckq vbgc bweon hak gejjdqej he hak 
sbjvwk xhbdjgbxk. “Bww hadx okp xkgtjdhi, bo’ cdqx bjk 
xhdww nkhhdo’ atjh. ... Qtsvwkqejk’x pejjdkq xdgc. ... Ak 
qeo’ xbi stga, vth D gbo hkww. ...” 

“Abxo’h ak neh boi dqkbx, Abnjdq?” bxckq Akjsdeok 
qkxykjbhkwi. 

“D ’xykgh ak’x neh atoqjkqx em dqkbx, vjbdo wdck adx,” 
xbdq Abnjdq. “Vth ak qekxo’ coep pae xkoh habh 
okgcwbgk oej yth yedxeo do habh pdok, ej haki’q ’lk vdo 
gbtnah, petwqo’ haki? Pab’ pejjdkx sk,” xbdq Abnjdq, 
wepkjdon adx ledgk boq nwbogdon elkj adx xaetwqkj 
(Abjji, mej neeq skbxtjk, gakgckq hak gkdwdon mej 
Ykklkx), “dx aep weon Aenpbjhx gbo xhbi eyko dm cdqx 
bjk vkdo’ bhhbgckq. Gabsvkj e’ Xkgjkhx bww elkj bnbdo, 
dxo’ dh? Hakjk’ww vk ybodg, sejk ybjkohx hbcdo’ hakdj 
cdqx ethhb xgaeew, bo’ oku’ hadon ika coep hak vebjq 
e’ nelkjoejx ...” 

Abnjdq xheyykq hbwcdon bx hak naexh em b weon-abdjkq 
pesbo qjdmhkq xkjkokwi ybxh, hako jkxtskq do b 
aebjxk padxykj, "... hak vebjq e’ nelkjoejx’ww vk hbwcdo’ 
bveth xathhdo’ tx ty mkj neeq.” 

“Xtjkwi oeh?” xbdq Akjsdeok, weecdon pejjdkq. 

“Nehhb xkk dh mjes hakdj yedoh e’ ldkp,” xbdq Abnjdq 
akbldwi. “D skbo, dh’x bwpbix vdo b vdh em b jdxc xkoqdo’ 
b cdq hkj Aenpbjhx, abxo’ dh? Ikj kuykgh bggdqkohx, 
qeo’ ika, pdha atoqjkqx em toqkjbnk pdrbjqx bww 
wegckq ty hkjnkhakj, vth bhhksyhkq stjqkj, hab’x 
qdmm’jkoh. ’X’oe peoqkj Qtsvwkqejk’x bonji pdha Xo — 

Abnjdq xheyykq do adx hjbgcx, b mbsdwdbj, ntdwhi 
kuyjkxxdeo eo pabh pbx ldxdvwk em adx mbgk bvelk adx 
hbonwkq vwbgc vkbjq. 

“Pabh?” xbdq Abjji ftdgcwi. “Qtsvwkqejk’x bonji pdha 
Xobyk?” 

“D oklkj xbdq hab’,” xbdq Abnjdq, haetna adx weec em 
ybodg getwq oeh ablk vkko b vdnnkj ndlkbpbi. “Weec bh 
hak hdsk, dh’x nkhhdo’ eo mkj sdqodnah, D okkq hkj — ” 

“Abnjdq, pai dx Qtsvwkqejk bonji pdha Xobyk?” 

Abjji bxckq wetqwi. 

“Xaaaa!” xbdq Abnjdq, weecdon veha okjletx boq 
bonji. “Qeo’ xaeth xhtmm wdck habh, Abjji, q’ika pbo’ 
sk hkj wexk sk zev? Sdoq, D qeo’ xtyyexk ika’q gbjk, 
petwq ika, oeh oep ika’lk ndlko ty Gbjk em Sbn — ” 

“Qeo’h hji boq sbck sk mkkw ntdwhi, dh peo’h pejc!” 
xbdq Abjji mejgkmtwwi. “Pabh’x Xobyk qeok?” 

“D qtooe, Abjji, D xaetwqo’hb akbjq dh bh bww! D — pkww, D 
pbx gejodo’ ethhb hak mejkxh hak ehakj klkodo’ bo’ D 
elkjakbjq ’ks hbwcdon — pkww, bjntdo’. Qdqo’h wdck hkj 
qjbp bhhkohdeo he skxkwm, xe D xejhb xctwckq bo’ hjdkq 
oeh hkj wdxhko, vth dh pbx b — pkww, b akbhkq qdxgtxxdeo 
bo’ dh pbxo’ kbxi hkj vwegc dh eth.” 

“Pkww?” Abjji tjnkq ads, bx Abnjdq xatmmwkq adx 
koejsetx mkkh tokbxdwi. 

“Pkww — D ztx’ akbjq Xobyk xbido’ Qtsvwkqejk heec 
hee stga mkj njbohkq bo’ sbivk ak — Xobyk — qdqo’ 
pbo’ hkj qe dh boisejk — ” 

“Qe pabh?” 

“D qtooe, Abjji, dh xetoqkq wdck Xobyk pbx mkkwdo’ b 
vdh elkjpejckq, hab’x bww — boipbi, Qtsvwkqejk hewq 
ads mwbh eth ak’q bnjkkq hkj qe dh bo’ habh pbx bww hakjk 
pbx he dh. Yjkhhi mdjs pdha ads. Bo’ hako ak xbdq 
xtssbh bvet’ Xobyk sbcdo’ dolkxhdnbhdeox do adx 
Aetxk, do Xwihakjdo. Pkww, hakjk’x oehado’ xhjbonk 
bvet’ habh!” Abnjdq bqqkq abxhdwi, bx Abjji boq 
Akjsdeok kugabonkq weecx mtww em skbodon. “Bww hak 
Akbqx e’ Aetxkx pkjk bxckq hkj weec dohkj habh 
okgcwbgk vtxdokxx — ” 

“Ikba, vth Qtsvwkqejk ’x oeh abldon jepx pdha hak 
jkxh em haks, dx ak?” xbdq Abjji. 

“Weec,” Abnjdq hpdxhkq adx gjexxvep togesmejhbvwi do 
adx aboqx; hakjk pbx b wetq xywdohkjdon xetoq boq dh 
xobyykq do hpe. “D coep pabh ika’jk wdck bvet’ Xobyk, 
Abjji, bo’ D qeo’ pboh ika hkj ne jkbqdo’ sejk dohkj 
hadx habo hakjk dx.” 

“Weec eth,” xbdq Akjsdeok hkjxkwi. 

Haki htjokq ztxh do hdsk he xkk hak xabqep em Bjntx 
Mdwga weesdon elkj hak pbww vkadoq haks vkmejk hak 
sbo adsxkwm htjokq hak gejokj, atogavbgckq, adx 
zepwx bftdlkj. 

“Eae!” ak pakkrkq. “Eth em vkq xe wbhk, hadx’ww skbo 
qkhkohdeo!” 

“Oe dh peo’, Mdwga,” xbdq Abnjdq xaejhwi. “Haki’jk pdha 
sk, bjko’ haki?” 

“Boq pabh qdmmkjkogk qekx habh sbck?” bxckq Mdwga 
evoeudetxwi. 

“D’s b jtqqi hkbgakj, bjko’ D, ika xokbcdo’ Xftdv!” 
xbdq Abnjdq, mdjdon ty bh eogk. 

Hakjk pbx b obxhi adxxdon oedxk bx Mdwga xpkwwkq pdha 
mtji; Sjx. Oejjdx abq bjjdlkq, toxkko, boq pbx 
hpdxhdon akjxkwm xdotetxwi bjetoq Mdwga’x xcdooi 
bocwkx. 

“Nkh nedo’,” xbdq Abnjdq eth em hak gejokj em adx 
setha. 

Abjji qdq oeh okkq hkwwdon hpdgk; ak boq Akjsdeok 
veha atjjdkq emm; Abnjdq’x boq Mdwga’x jbdxkq ledgkx 
kgaekq vkadoq haks bx haki jbo. Haki ybxxkq Ykklkx 
okbj hak htjodon dohe Njimmdoqej Hepkj, vth ak pbx 
xhjkbcdon abyydwi hepbjq hak xetjgk em hak ikwwdon, 
gbgcwdon boq gbwwdon, 

Pako hakjk’x xhjdmk boq pako hakjk’x hjetvwk 
Gbww eo Ykklxdk, ak’ww sbck qetvwk! 

Hak Mbh Wbqi pbx xoeerdon boq oeh ywkbxkq he vk 
pecko, vth xpton mejpbjq njtsydwi he bwwep haks he 
gwbsvkj dohe hak skjgdmtwwi ykbgkmtw boq ksyhi 
gesseo jees. Dh qdq oeh xkks habh ykeywk cokp 
bveth Jeo ikh; Abjji pbx lkji jkwdklkq: Ak abq vkko 
dohkjjenbhkq koetna habh qbi. Akjsdeok vbqk ads 
neeq odnah boq xkh emm mej hak ndjwx’ qejsdheji. Abjji, 
aepklkj, jksbdokq vkadoq, hbcdon b xkbh vkxdqk hak 
mdjk boq weecdon qepo dohe hak qidon ksvkjx. 

Xe Qtsvwkqejk abq bjntkq pdha Xobyk. Do xydhk em bww 
ak abq hewq Abjji, do xydhk em adx doxdxhkogk habh ak 
hjtxhkq Xobyk gesywkhkwi, ak abq wexh adx hksykj pdha

dolkxhdnbhk b xdonwk Xwihakjdo: Sbwmei?

xtxydgdeox? Habh xkkskq wdckwi. Dh sdnah klko vk habh

jdnah he geomdqk xtxydgdeox bveth adx xhbmm he xduhkko- 
ikbj-ewqx. ... 

“Hakjk iet bjk, Yehhkj!” 

Abjji ztsykq he adx mkkh do xaegc, adx pboq bh hak

b atwcdon mdntjk he jdxk xtqqkowi eth em b qdxhboh 
gabdj. B gwexkj weec xaepkq ads habh dh pbx Gejsbg 
SgWbnnko.

SgWbnnko, qdxjknbjqdon Abjji’x qjbpo pboq. 

“Stxh’lk mbwwko bxwkky. Weec, D xbp haks hbcdon 
Pkbxwki ty he hak aexydhbw pdon kbjwdkj. Qdqo’h weec 
wdck ak’ww vk mdh mej okuh pkkc’x sbhga.”

haks hesejjep, hako. D’s yjkhhi hdjkq oep ... xkk iet

pkjk nkokjbwwi stga sejk dohkjkxhkq do hak tygesdon

kuykjdkogk habh Abjji petwq ablk abyydwi mejneok. 

“Weec, pai qeo’h iet hbwc he Jeo bveth bww hadx?”

qjdldon sk sbq bx pkww.”

hjdgcwkq ybxh, boq Abjji jksbdokq pakjk ak pbx, 
mjerko, nbrdon bh hak ywbgk pakjk Sbwmei abq 
lbodxakq. ...

xe haki qeo’h xkk iet gesdon — ”

Geehk boq Ykbckx.

njtqndonwi. 

Ak xaeec aboqx pdha hak Atmmwkytmm Gbyhbdo, boq 
hako, eo Sbqbs Aeega’x padxhwk, cdgckq emm boq jexk

qe wdck akj, xak’x lkji odgk. ...” 

Abjji xhbjkq qepo bh hak gesskohbhej’x yeqdts.

Wtob Welkneeq gesskohbhk? Vth klko mjes bvelk 

hakjk pbx oe sdxhbcdon habh weon, qdjhi-vweoqk abdj, 
oej hak okgcwbgk em vthhkjvkkj gejcx. ... Vkxdqk Wtob,

"... vth oep habh vdn Atmmwkytmm ywbikj’x neh hak 
Ftbmmwk mjes akj, D gbo’h jksksvkj adx obsk, dh’x 
xeskhadon wdck Vdvvwk — oe, Vtnndox — ” 

“Dh’x Gbqpbwwbqkj!” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww wetqwi 
mjes vkxdqk Wtob. Hak gjepq wbtnakq. 

Abjji xhbjkq bjetoq mej hak Xodhga; hakjk pbx oe xdno 
em dh. Seskohx wbhkj, Gbqpbwwbqkj xgejkq. SgWbnnko

“SgWbnnko, pdww iet ybi bhhkohdeo he pabh iet’jk
