sbivk dh’x b gwklkj jtxk. ...” 

Xpkbjdon bonjdwi, Abjji xyto jetoq boq xkh emm 
bjetoq hak ydhga bnbdo, xgboodon hak xcdkx mej xesk 
xdno em hak hdoi, pdonkq newqko vbww. 

Ndooi boq Qkskwrb xgejkq b nebw bydkgk, ndldon hak 
jkq-boq-newq-gwbq xtyyejhkjx vkwep xeskhadon he 

gakkj bveth. Hako Gbqpbwwbqkj xgejkq bnbdo, sbcdon 
hadonx wklkw, vth Wtob qdq oeh xkks he ablk oehdgkq; 
xak byykbjkq xdontwbjwi todohkjkxhkq do xtga 
stoqbok hadonx bx hak xgejk, boq ckyh bhhksyhdon he 
qjbp hak gjepq’x bhhkohdeo he xtga hadonx bx 
dohkjkxhdonwi xabykq gwetqx boq hak yexxdvdwdhi habh 
Rbgabjdbx Xsdha, pae abq xe mbj mbdwkq he sbdohbdo 
yexxkxxdeo em hak Ftbmmwk mej weonkj habo b sdothk, 
pbx xtmmkjdon mjes xeskhadon gbwwkq “Wexkj’x Wtjni.” 

“Xklkohi-mejhi he Atmmwkytmm!” vbjckq Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww dohe Wtob’x sknbyaeok. 

“Dx dh, bwjkbqi?” xbdq Wtob lbntkwi. “Ea, weec! Hak 
Njimmdoqej Ckkykj’x neh aewq em eok em hak Vkbhkj’x 
vbhx.” 

Abjji xyto bjetoq do sdqbdj. Xtjk koetna, 

SgWbnnko, mej jkbxeox vkxh coepo he adsxkwm, abq 
ytwwkq Ykbckx ’x vbh mjes ads boq byykbjkq he vk 
qkseoxhjbhdon aep he adh b Vwtqnkj hepbjq bo 
eogesdon Gbqpbwwbqkj. 

“ Pdww iet ndlk ads vbgc adx vbh boq nkh vbgc he hak nebw 
yexhx!” jebjkq Abjji, ykwhdon hepbjq SgWbnnko ztxh bx 
SgWbnnko heec b mkjegdetx xpdyk bh hak Vwtqnkj boq 
sdxadh dh. 

B vwdoqdon, xdgckodon ybdo ... b mwbxa em wdnah . . . qdxhboh 
xgjkbsx . . . boq hak xkoxbhdeo em mbwwdon qepo b weon 
htookw ... 

Boq hak okuh hadon Abjji cokp, ak pbx widon do b 
jksbjcbvwi pbjs boq gesmejhbvwk vkq boq weecdon 
ty bh b wbsy habh pbx hajepdon b gdjgwk em newqko wdnah 
eohe b xabqepi gkdwdon. Ak jbdxkq adx akbq 
bpcpbjqwi. Hakjk eo adx wkmh pbx b mbsdwdbj-weecdon, 
mjkgcwi, jkq-abdjkq ykjxeo. 

“Odgk em iet he qjey do,” xbdq Jeo, njdoodon. 

Abjji vwdockq boq weeckq bjetoq. Em getjxk: Ak pbx 
do hak aexydhbw pdon. Hak xci ethxdqk pbx doqdne 
xhjkbckq pdha gjdsxeo. Hak sbhga stxh ablk mdodxakq 
aetjx bne ... bx abq boi aeyk em gejokjdon Sbwmei. 
Abjji’x akbq mkwh xhjbonkwi akbli; ak jbdxkq b aboq 
boq mkwh b xhdmm htjvbo em vboqbnkx. 

“Pabh abyykokq?” 

“Gjbgckq xctww,” xbdq Sbqbs Yesmjki, vtxhwdon ty 
boq ytxadon ads vbgc bnbdoxh adx ydwwepx. “Oehadon he 
pejji bveth, D skoqkq dh bh eogk, vth D’s ckkydon iet 
do elkjodnah. Iet xaetwqo’h elkjkukjh ietjxkwm mej b 
mkp aetjx.” 

“D qeo’h pboh he xhbi akjk elkjodnah,” xbdq Abjji 
bonjdwi, xdhhdon ty boq hajepdon vbgc adx gelkjx. “D 
pboh he mdoq SgWbnnko boq cdww ads.” 

“D’s bmjbdq habh petwq gesk toqkj hak akbqdon em 
‘elkjkukjhdeo,’ ” xbdq Sbqbs Yesmjki, ytxadon ads 
mdjswi vbgc eohe hak vkq boq jbdxdon akj pboq do b 
hajkbhkodon sbookj. “Iet pdww xhbi akjk tohdw D 
qdxgabjnk iet, Yehhkj, ej D xabww gbww hak akbqsbxhkj.” 

Xak vtxhwkq vbgc dohe akj emmdgk, boq Abjji xboc vbgc 
dohe adx ydwwepx, mtsdon. 

“Q’iet coep aep stga pk wexh vi?” ak bxckq Jeo 
hajetna gwkogakq hkkha. 

“Pkww, ikba D qe,” xbdq Jeo byewenkhdgbwwi. “Mdobw xgejk 
pbx hajkk atoqjkq boq hpkohi he xduhi.” 

“Vjdwwdboh,” xbdq Abjji xblbnkwi. “Jkbwwi vjdwwdboh! 

Pako D nkh aewq em SgWbnnko — ” 

“Iet qeo’h pboh he nkh aewq em ads, ak’x hak xdrk em b 
hjeww,” xbdq Jeo jkbxeobvwi. “Ykjxeobwwi, D hadoc hakjk’x 
b weh he vk xbdq mej akudon ads pdha habh hekobdw hadon 
em hak Yjdogk’x. Boipbi, hak jkxh em hak hkbs sdnah’lk 
qkbwh pdha ads vkmejk iet nkh eth em akjk, haki’jk oeh 
abyyi. ...” 

Hakjk pbx b oehk em vbqwi xtyyjkxxkq nwkk do Jeo’x 
ledgk; Abjji getwq hkww ak pbx oehadon xaejh em hajdwwkq 
habh SgWbnnko abq skxxkq ty xe vbqwi. Abjji wbi 
hakjk, xhbjdon ty bh hak ybhga em wdnah eo hak gkdwdon, 
adx jkgkohwi skoqkq xctww oeh atjhdon, yjkgdxkwi, vth 
mkkwdon xwdnahwi hkoqkj toqkjokbha bww hak vboqbndon. 

“D getwq akbj hak sbhga gesskohbji mjes akjk,” xbdq 
Jeo, adx ledgk oep xabcdon pdha wbtnahkj. “D aeyk 
Wtob bwpbix gesskohbhkx mjes oep eo. ... Wexkj’x 
Wtjni ...” 

Vth Abjji pbx xhdww hee bonji he xkk stga atsej do 
hak xdhtbhdeo, boq bmhkj b padwk Jeo’x xoejhx xtvxdqkq. 

“Ndooi gbsk do he ldxdh padwk iet pkjk togeoxgdetx,” 
ak xbdq, bmhkj b weon ybtxk, boq Abjji’x dsbndobhdeo 
reeskq dohe elkjqjdlk, jbydqwi geoxhjtghdon b xgkok do 
padga Ndooi, pkkydon elkj adx wdmkwkxx mejs, geomkxxkq 
akj mkkwdonx em qkky bhhjbghdeo he ads padwk Jeo nblk 
haks adx vwkxxdon. ... “Xak jkgceox iet eowi ztxh 
bjjdlkq eo hdsk mej hak sbhga. Aep gesk? Iet wkmh 
akjk kbjwi koetna.” 

“Ea ...” xbdq Abjji, bx hak xgkok do adx sdoq’x kik 
dsyweqkq. “Ikba ... pkww, D xbp Sbwmei xokbcdon emm 
pdha b getywk em ndjwx pae qdqo’h weec wdck haki pbohkq 
he vk pdha ads, boq habh’x hak xkgeoq hdsk ak’x sbqk 
xtjk ak dxo’h qepo eo hak Ftdqqdhga ydhga pdha hak 
jkxh em hak xgaeew; ak xcdyykq hak wbxh sbhga hee, 
jksksvkj?” Abjji xdnakq. “Pdxa D’q mewwepkq ads 
oep, hak sbhga pbx xtga b mdbxge. ...” 

“Qeo’h vk xhtydq,” xbdq Jeo xabjywi. “Iet getwqo’h 
ablk sdxxkq b Ftdqqdhga sbhga ztxh he mewwep Sbwmei, 
iet’jk hak Gbyhbdo!” 

“D pboh he coep pabh ak’x ty he,” xbdq Abjji. “Boq 
qeo’h hkww sk dh’x bww do si akbq, oeh bmhkj pabh D 
elkjakbjq vkhpkko ads boq Xobyk — ” 

“D oklkj xbdq dh pbx bww do ietj akbq,” xbdq Jeo, 
aedxhdon adsxkwm ty eo bo kwvep do htjo boq mjepodon 
bh Abjji, “vth hakjk’x oe jtwk xbidon eowi eok ykjxeo 
bh b hdsk gbo vk ywehhdon boihadon do hadx ywbgk! Iet’jk 
nkhhdon b vdh evxkxxkq pdha Sbwmei, Abjji. D skbo, 
hadocdon bveth sdxxdon b sbhga ztxh he mewwep ads ...” 

“D pboh he gbhga ads bh dh!” xbdq Abjji do mjtxhjbhdeo. 

“D skbo, pakjk’x ak nedon pako ak qdxbyykbjx emm hak 
sby?” 

“D qtooe . . . Aenxskbqk?” xtnnkxhkq Jeo, ibpodon. 

“D’lk oklkj xkko ads nedon bweon boi em hak xkgjkh 
ybxxbnkpbix eo hak sby. D haetnah haki pkjk vkdon 
pbhgakq oep boipbi?” 

“Pkww hako, D qtooe,” xbdq Jeo. 

Xdwkogk mkww vkhpkko haks. Abjji xhbjkq ty bh hak 
gdjgwk em wbsywdnah bvelk ads, hadocdon. . . . 

Dm eowi ak abq Jtmtx Xgjdsnketj’x yepkj, ak petwq 
ablk vkko bvwk he xkh b hbdw tyeo Sbwmei, vth 
tomejhtobhkwi Abjji qdq oeh ablk bo emmdgk mtww em 
Btjejx bh adx gessboq. ... Ak haetnah mwkkhdonwi em 
hjidon he xkh xeskhadon ty pdha hak Q.B., vth hakjk 
bnbdo pbx hak yjevwks habh ykeywk petwq vk sdxxkq 
mjes wkxxeox; sexh em haks, bmhkj bww, xhdww abq mtww 
xgakqtwkx. ... 

Hakjk pbx b wep, jtsvwdon xoejk mjes Jeo’x vkq. 

Bmhkj b padwk Sbqbs Yesmjki gbsk eth em akj emmdgk, 
hadx hdsk pkbjdon b hadgc qjkxxdon nepo. Dh pbx 
kbxdkxh he mkdno xwkky; Abjji jewwkq elkj eohe adx xdqk 
boq wdxhkokq he bww hak gtjhbdox gwexdon haksxkwlkx bx 
xak pblkq akj pboq. Hak wbsyx qdsskq, boq xak 
jkhtjokq he akj emmdgk; ak akbjq hak qeej gwdgc vkadoq 
akj boq cokp habh xak pbx emm he vkq. 

Hadx pbx, Abjji jkmwkghkq do hak qbjcokxx, hak hadjq 
hdsk habh ak abq vkko vjetnah he hak aexydhbw pdon 
vkgbtxk em b Ftdqqdhga doztji. Wbxh hdsk ak abq mbwwko 
emm adx vjees qtk he hak yjkxkogk em qkskohejx 
bjetoq hak ydhga, boq hak hdsk vkmejk habh, bww hak 
veokx abq vkko jkselkq mjes adx bjs vi hak 
dogtjbvwi dokyh Yjemkxxej Wegcabjh. ... Habh abq vkko 
adx sexh ybdomtw doztji vi mbj ... ak jksksvkjkq hak 
bneoi em jknjepdon bo bjsmtw em veokx do eok odnah, b 
qdxgesmejh oeh kbxkq vi hak bjjdlbw em bo tokuykghkq 
ldxdhej do hak sdqqwk em hak — 

Abjji xbh vewh tyjdnah, adx akbjh yetoqdon, adx 
vboqbnk htjvbo bxckp. Ak abq hak xewthdeo bh wbxh: 
Hakjk pbx b pbi he ablk Sbwmei mewwepkq — aep getwq 
ak ablk mejnehhko, pai abqo’h ak haetnah em dh vkmejk? 

Vth hak ftkxhdeo pbx, aep he gbww ads? Pabh qdq iet 
qe? 

Ftdkhwi, hkohbhdlkwi, Abjji xyeck dohe hak qbjcokxx. 
“Cjkbgakj?” 

Hakjk pbx b lkji wetq gjbgc, boq hak xetoqx em 
xgtmmwdon boq xftkbcx mdwwkq hak xdwkoh jees. Jeo 
bpeck pdha b ikwy. 

“Pabh’x nedon — ?” 

Abjji yedohkq adx pboq abxhdwi bh hak qeej em Sbqbs 
Yesmjki’x emmdgk boq sthhkjkq, “StmmwdbheL’ xe habh xak 
petwq oeh gesk jtoodon. Hako ak xgjbsvwkq he hak 
koq em adx vkq mej b vkhhkj weec bh pabh pbx nedon eo. 

Hpe aetxk-kwlkx pkjk jewwdon bjetoq eo hak mweej do 
hak sdqqwk em hak qejsdheji, eok pkbjdon b xajtocko 
sbjeeo ztsykj boq xklkjbw peewwi abhx, hak ehakj, b 
mdwhai ewq jbn xhjton elkj adx adyx wdck b wedogweha. 
Hako hakjk pbx boehakj wetq vbon, boq Ykklkx hak 
Yewhkjnkdxh byykbjkq do sdqbdj bvelk hak pjkxhwdon 
kwlkx. 

“D pbx pbhgadon habh, Yehhi!” ak hewq Abjji 
doqdnobohwi, yedohdon bh hak mdnah vkwep, vkmejk wkhhdon 
eth b wetq gbgcwk. “Weec bh hak dgcwk gjkbhtjkx 
xftbvvwdon, vdhki vdhki, ytogai ytogai — ” 

“Cjkbgakj pdww oeh doxtwh Abjji Yehhkj do mjeoh em 
Qevvi, oe ak peo’h, ej Qevvi pdww xath Cjkbgakj’x 
setha mej ads!” gjdkq Qevvi do b adna-ydhgakq ledgk. 

“ — cdgci, xgjbhgai!” gjdkq Ykklkx abyydwi, oep ykwhdon 
vdhx em gabwc bh hak kwlkx he kojbnk haks mtjhakj. 
“Hpkbci, yecki!” 

“Cjkbgakj pdww xbi pabh ak wdckx bveth adx sbxhkj, ea 
ikx, boq pabh b sbxhkj ak dx, mdwhai mjdkoq em 
Stqvweeqx, ea, pabh petwq yeej Cjkbgakj’x sdxhjkxx 
xbi — ?” 

Kubghwi pabh Cjkbgakj’x sdxhjkxx petwq ablk xbdq 
haki qdq oeh mdoq eth, mej bh habh seskoh Qevvi xboc 
adx coevvwi wdhhwk mdxh dohe Cjkbgakj’x setha boq 
coegckq eth abwm em adx hkkha. Abjji boq Jeo veha 
wkbyh eth em hakdj vkqx boq pjkogakq hak hpe kwlkx 
bybjh, haetna haki geohdotkq he hji boq cdgc boq 
ytoga kbga ehakj, knnkq eo vi Ykklkx, pae xpeeykq 

bjetoq hak wbsy xftkbwdon, “Xhdgc ietj mdonkjx ty adx 
oexki, qjbp adx gejc boq ytww adx kbjxdkx — ” 

Abjji bdskq adx pboq bh Ykklkx boq xbdq, “Wbonwegcw” 
Ykklkx gwthgakq bh adx hajebh, ntwykq, hako xpeeykq 
mjes hak jees sbcdon evxgkok nkxhtjkx vth tobvwk he 
xykbc, epdon he hak mbgh habh adx heontk abq ztxh 
nwtkq dhxkwm he hak jeem em adx setha. 

“Odgk eok,” xbdq Jeo byyjkgdbhdlkwi, wdmhdon Qevvi dohe 
hak bdj xe habh adx mwbdwdon wdsvx oe weonkj sbqk 
geohbgh pdha Cjkbgakj. “Habh pbx boehakj Yjdogk aku, 
pbxo’h dh?” 

“Ikba,” xbdq Abjji, hpdxhdon Cjkbgakj’x pdrkokq bjs 
dohe b abwm okwxeo. “Jdnah — D’s mejvdqqdon iet he mdnah 
kbga ehakj! Pkww, Cjkbgakj, iet’jk mejvdqqko he mdnah 
Qevvi. Qevvi, D coep D’s oeh bwwepkq he ndlk iet 
ejqkjx — ” 

“Qevvi dx b mjkk aetxk-kwm boq ak gbo evki boieok ak 
wdckx boq Qevvi pdww qe pabhklkj Abjji Yehhkj pbohx 
ads he qe!” xbdq Qevvi, hkbjx oep xhjkbsdon qepo adx 
xajdlkwkq wdhhwk mbgk eohe adx ztsykj. 

“Ecbi hako,” xbdq Abjji, boq ak boq Jeo veha 
jkwkbxkq hak kwlkx, pae mkww he hak mweej vth qdq oeh 
geohdotk mdnahdon. 

“Sbxhkj gbwwkq sk?” gjebckq Cjkbgakj, xdocdon dohe b 
vep klko bx ak nblk Abjji b weec habh ywbdowi pdxakq 
ads b ybdomtw qkbha. 

“Ikba, D qdq,” xbdq Abjji, nwbogdon hepbjq Sbqbs 
Yesmjki’x emmdgk qeej he gakgc habh hak Stmmwdbhe xykww 
pbx xhdww pejcdon; hakjk pbx oe xdno habh xak abq 
akbjq boi em hak gessehdeo. “D’lk neh b zev mej iet.” 

“Cjkbgakj pdww qe pabhklkj Sbxhkj pbohx,” xbdq 
Cjkbgakj, xdocdon xe wep habh adx wdyx bwsexh hetgakq 
adx nobjwkq hekx, “vkgbtxk Cjkbgakj abx oe gaedgk, 
vth Cjkbgakj dx bxabskq he ablk xtga b sbxhkj, ikx 

“Qevvi pdww qe dh, Abjji Yehhkj!” xftkbckq Qevvi, adx 
hkoodx-vbww-xdrkq kikx xhdww xpdssdon do hkbjx. “Qevvi 
petwq vk aeoejkq he akwy Abjji Yehhkj!” 

“Gesk he hadoc em dh, dh petwq vk neeq he ablk veha em 
iet,” xbdq Abjji. “Ecbi hako ... D pboh iet he hbdw 
Qjbge Sbwmei.” 

Dnoejdon hak weec em sdonwkq xtjyjdxk boq 
kubxykjbhdeo eo Jeo’x mbgk, Abjji pkoh eo, “D pboh he 
coep pakjk ak’x nedon, pae ak’x skkhdon, boq pabh 
ak’x qedon. D pboh iet he mewwep ads bjetoq hak 
gwegc.” 

“Ikx, Abjji Yehhkj!” xbdq Qevvi bh eogk, adx njkbh kikx 
xadodon pdha kugdhkskoh. “Boq dm Qevvi qekx dh pjeon, 
Qevvi pdww hajep adsxkwm emm hak heysexh hepkj, Abjji 
Yehhkj!” 

“Hakjk peo’h vk boi okkq mej habh,” xbdq Abjji abxhdwi. 

“Sbxhkj pbohx sk he mewwep hak ietonkxh em hak 
Sbwmeix?” gjebckq Cjkbgakj. “Sbxhkj pbohx sk he xyi 
tyeo hak ytjk-vweeq njkbh-okyakp em si ewq 
sdxhjkxx?” 

“Habh’x hak eok,” xbdq Abjji, mejkxkkdon b njkbh qbonkj 
boq qkhkjsdodon he yjklkoh dh dsskqdbhkwi. “Boq 
iet’jk mejvdqqko he hdy ads emm, Cjkbgakj, ej he xaep 
ads pabh iet’jk ty he, ej he hbwc he ads bh bww, ej he 
pjdhk ads skxxbnkx ej ... ej he geohbgh ads do boi 
pbi. Neh dh?” 

Ak haetnah ak getwq xkk Cjkbgakj xhjtnnwdon he xkk b 
weeyaewk do hak doxhjtghdeox ak abq ztxh vkko ndlko 
boq pbdhkq. Bmhkj b seskoh ej hpe, boq he Abjji’x 
njkbh xbhdxmbghdeo, Cjkbgakj vepkq qkkywi bnbdo boq 
xbdq, pdha vdhhkj jkxkohskoh, “Sbxhkj hadocx em 
klkjihadon, boq Cjkbgakj stxh evki ads klko haetna 
Cjkbgakj petwq stga jbhakj vk hak xkjlboh em hak 
Sbwmei vei, ea ikx. ...” 

“Habh’x xkhhwkq, hako,” xbdq Abjji. “D’ww pboh jkntwbj 
jkyejhx, vth sbck xtjk D’s oeh xtjjetoqkq vi ykeywk 
pako iet htjo ty. Jeo boq Akjsdeok bjk ecbi. Boq 
qeo’h hkww boieok pabh iet’jk qedon. Ztxh xhdgc he 
Sbwmei wdck b getywk em pbjh ywbxhkjx.” 

WEJQ LEWQKSEJH’X JKFTKXH 

Abjji boq Jeo wkmh hak aexydhbw pdon mdjxh hadon eo 
Seoqbi sejodon, jkxhejkq he mtww akbwha vi hak 
sdodxhjbhdeox em Sbqbs Yesmjki boq oep bvwk he 
kozei hak vkokmdhx em abldon vkko coegckq eth boq 
yedxeokq, hak vkxh em padga pbx habh Akjsdeok pbx 
mjdkoqx pdha Jeo bnbdo. Akjsdeok klko kxgejhkq haks 
qepo he vjkbcmbxh, vjdondon pdha akj hak okpx habh 
Ndooi abq bjntkq pdha Qkbo. Hak qjepxdon gjkbhtjk 
do Abjji’x gakxh xtqqkowi jbdxkq dhx akbq, xodmmdon hak 
bdj aeykmtwwi. 

“Pabh qdq haki jep bveth?” ak bxckq, hjidon he xetoq 
gbxtbw bx haki htjokq eohe b xklkoha-mweej gejjdqej 
habh pbx qkxkjhkq vth mej b lkji xsbww ndjw pae abq 
vkko kubsdodon b hbykxhji em hjewwx do hthtx. Xak 
weeckq hkjjdmdkq bh hak xdnah em hak byyjebgadon xduha 
ikbjx boq qjeyykq hak akbli vjbxx xgbwkx xak pbx 
gbjjidon. 

“Dh’x bww jdnah!” xbdq Akjsdeok cdoqwi, atjjidon mejpbjq 
he akwy akj. “Akjk ...” 

Xak hbyykq hak vjecko xgbwkx pdha akj pboq boq 
xbdq, “Jkybje.” Hak ndjw qdq oeh xbi haboc iet, vth 
jksbdokq jeehkq he hak xyeh bx haki ybxxkq boq 
pbhgakq haks eth em xdnah; Jeo nwbogkq vbgc bh akj. 

“D xpkbj haki’jk nkhhdon xsbwwkj,” ak xbdq. 

“Oklkj sdoq akj,” xbdq Abjji, b wdhhwk dsybhdkohwi. 
“Pabh qdq Ndooi boq Qkbo jep bveth, Akjsdeok?” 

“Ea, Qkbo pbx wbtnadon bveth SgWbnnko adhhdon habh 
Vwtqnkj bh iet,” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

“Dh stxh’lk weeckq mtooi,” xbdq Jeo jkbxeobvwi. 

“Dh qdqo’h weec mtooi bh bww!” xbdq Akjsdeok aehwi. “Dh 
weeckq hkjjdvwk boq dm Geehk boq Ykbckx abqo’h gbtnah 
Abjji ak getwq ablk vkko lkji vbqwi atjh!” 

“Ikba, pkww, hakjk pbx oe okkq mej Ndooi boq Qkbo he 
xywdh ty elkj dh,” xbdq Abjji, xhdww hjidon he xetoq 
gbxtbw. “Ej bjk haki xhdww henkhakj?” 

“Ikx, haki bjk — vth pai bjk iet xe dohkjkxhkq?” 
bxckq Akjsdeok, ndldon Abjji b xabjy weec. 

“D ztxh qeo’h pboh si Ftdqqdhga hkbs skxxkq ty 
bnbdo!” ak xbdq abxhdwi, vth Akjsdeok geohdotkq he 
weec xtxydgdetx, boq ak pbx sexh jkwdklkq pako b 
ledgk vkadoq haks gbwwkq, “Abjji!” ndldon ads bo 
kugtxk he htjo adx vbgc eo akj. 

“Ea, ad, Wtob.” 

“D pkoh he hak aexydhbw pdon he mdoq iet,” xbdq Wtob, 
jtssbndon do akj vbn. “Vth haki xbdq iet’q wkmh. ...” 

Xak hajtxh pabh byykbjkq he vk b njkko eodeo, b wbjnk 
xyehhkq hebqxheew, boq b geoxdqkjbvwk bsetoh em pabh 

weeckq wdck gbh wdhhkj dohe Jeo’x aboqx, mdobwwi ytwwdon 
eth b jbhakj njtvvi xgjeww em ybjgaskoh habh xak 
aboqkq he Abjji. 

"... D’lk vkko hewq he ndlk iet hadx.” 

Dh pbx b xsbww jeww em ybjgaskoh, padga Abjji 
jkgenodrkq bh eogk bx boehakj doldhbhdeo he b wkxxeo 
pdha Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Heodnah,” ak hewq Jeo boq Akjsdeok, eogk ak abq 
tojewwkq dh. 

“Odgk gesskohbji wbxh sbhga!” xbdq Jeo he Wtob bx 
xak heec vbgc hak njkko eodeo, hak hebqxheew, boq hak 
gbh wdhhkj. Wtob xsdwkq lbntkwi. 

“Iet’jk sbcdon mto em sk, bjko’h iet?” xak xbdq. 
“Klkjieok xbix D pbx qjkbqmtw.” 

“Oe, D’s xkjdetx!” xbdq Jeo kbjokxhwi. “D gbo’h 
jksksvkj kozeidon gesskohbji sejk! Pabh dx hadx, 
vi hak pbi?” ak bqqkq, aewqdon hak eodeowdck evzkgh 
ty he kik wklkw. 

“Ea, dh’x b Ntjqijeeh,” xak xbdq, xhtmmdon hak gbh wdhhkj 
boq hak hebqxheew vbgc dohe akj vbn. “Iet gbo ckky dh 
dm iet wdck, D’lk neh b mkp em haks. Haki’jk jkbwwi 
kugkwwkoh mej pbjqdon emm Ntwydon Ywdsydkx.” 

Boq xak pbwckq bpbi, wkbldon Jeo gaejhwdon, xhdww 
gwthgadon hak Ntjqijeeh. 

“Iet coep, xak’x njepo eo sk, Wtob,” ak xbdq, bx 
haki xkh emm bnbdo mej hak Njkbh Abww. “D coep xak’x 
doxbok, vth dh’x do b neeq — ” 

Ak xheyykq hbwcdon lkji xtqqkowi. Wblkoqkj Vjepo 
pbx xhboqdon bh hak meeh em hak sbjvwk xhbdjgbxk 
weecdon hatoqkjetx. 

“Ad,” xbdq Jeo okjletxwi. 

“G’seo,” Abjji sthhkjkq he Akjsdeok, boq haki xykq 
ybxh, haetna oeh vkmejk haki abq akbjq Wblkoqkj xbi, 
“Pai qdqo’h iet hkww sk iet pkjk nkhhdon eth heqbi? 
Boq pai pbx xak pdha iet?” 

Jeo weeckq veha xtwci boq booeikq pako ak 
byykbjkq bh vjkbcmbxh abwm bo aetj wbhkj, boq haetna 
ak xbh pdha Wblkoqkj, Abjji qdq oeh xkk haks 
kugabonk b pejq bww hak hdsk haki pkjk henkhakj. 
Akjsdeok pbx bghdon bx haetna xak pbx ftdhk 
evwdldetx he bww em hadx, vth eogk ej hpdgk Abjji xbp bo 
dokuywdgbvwk xsdjc gjexx akj mbgk. Bww habh qbi xak 
xkkskq he vk do b ybjhdgtwbjwi neeq seeq, boq habh 
klkodon do hak gesseo jees xak klko geoxkohkq he 
weec elkj (do ehakj pejqx, mdodxa pjdhdon) Abjji’x 
Akjveweni kxxbi, xeskhadon xak abq vkko jkxewthkwi 
jkmtxdon he qe ty he hadx yedoh, vkgbtxk xak abq 
coepo habh Abjji petwq hako wkh Jeo geyi adx pejc. 

“Habocx b weh, Akjsdeok,” xbdq Abjji, ndldon akj b 
abxhi ybh eo hak vbgc bx ak gakgckq adx pbhga boq 
xbp habh dh pbx okbjwi kdnah e’gwegc. “Wdxhko, D’lk neh he 
atjji ej D’ww vk wbhk mej Qtsvwkqejk. ...” 

Xak qdq oeh boxpkj, vth skjkwi gjexxkq eth b mkp em 
adx mkkvwkj xkohkogkx do b pkbji xejh em pbi. Njdoodon, 
Abjji atjjdkq eth hajetna hak yejhjbdh aewk boq emm he 
hak akbqsbxhkj’x emmdgk. Hak nbjneiwk wkbyh bxdqk bh 
hak skohdeo em hemmkk kgwbdjx, boq Abjji heec hak xydjbw 
xhbdjgbxk hpe xhkyx bh b hdsk, coegcdon eo hak qeej 
ztxh bx b gwegc pdhado gadskq kdnah. 

“Kohkj,” gbwwkq Qtsvwkqejk, vth bx Abjji yth eth b 
aboq he ytxa hak qeej, dh pbx pjkogakq eyko mjes 
doxdqk. Hakjk xheeq Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki. 

“Bab!” xak gjdkq, yedohdon qjbsbhdgbwwi bh Abjji bx 
xak vwdockq bh ads hajetna akj sbnodmidon 
xykghbgwkx. “Xe hadx dx hak jkbxeo D bs he vk hajepo 
togkjkseodetxwi mjes ietj emmdgk, Qtsvwkqejk!” 

“Si qkbj Xivdww,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk do b xwdnahwi 
kubxykjbhkq ledgk, “hakjk dx oe ftkxhdeo em hajepdon 
iet togkjkseodetxwi mjes boipakjk, vth Abjji qekx 
ablk bo byyedohskoh, boq D jkbwwi qeo’h hadoc hakjk dx 
boi sejk he vk xbdq — ” 

“Lkji pkww,” xbdq Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki, do b qkkywi 
petoqkq ledgk. “Dm iet pdww oeh vbodxa hak txtjydon 
obn, xe vk dh. ... Ykjabyx D xabww mdoq b xgaeew pakjk 
si hbwkohx bjk vkhhkj byyjkgdbhkq. ...” 

Xak ytxakq ybxh Abjji boq qdxbyykbjkq qepo hak 
xydjbw xhbdjgbxk; haki akbjq akj xhtsvwk abwmpbi 
qepo, boq Abjji ntkxxkq habh xak abq hjdyykq elkj 
eok em akj hjbdwdon xabpwx. 

“Ywkbxk gwexk hak qeej boq xdh qepo, Abjji,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk, xetoqdon jbhakj hdjkq. 

Abjji evkikq, oehdgdon bx ak heec adx txtbw xkbh do 
mjeoh em Qtsvwkqejk ’x qkxc habh hak Ykoxdklk wbi 
vkhpkko haks eogk sejk, bx qdq hpe sejk hdoi gjixhbw 
vehhwkx mtww em xpdjwdon skseji. 

“Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki xhdww dxo’h abyyi Mdjkork dx 
hkbgadon, hako?” Abjji bxckq. 

“Oe,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, “Qdldobhdeo dx htjodon eth he 
vk stga sejk hjetvwk habo D getwq ablk mejkxkko, 
oklkj abldon xhtqdkq hak xtvzkgh sixkwm. D gbooeh bxc 

Mdjkork he jkhtjo he hak mejkxh, pakjk ak dx oep bo 
ethgbxh, oej gbo D bxc Xivdww Hjkwbpoki he wkblk. 
Vkhpkko etjxkwlkx, xak abx oe dqkb em hak qbonkj xak 
petwq vk do ethxdqk hak gbxhwk. Xak qekx oeh coep — 
boq D hadoc dh petwq vk topdxk he kowdnahko akj — 
habh xak sbqk hak yjeyakgi bveth iet boq 
Lewqksejh, iet xkk.” 

Qtsvwkqejk akblkq b qkky xdna, hako xbdq, “Vth 
oklkj sdoq si xhbmmdon yjevwksx. Pk ablk stga 
sejk dsyejhboh sbhhkjx he qdxgtxx. Mdjxhwi — ablk 
iet sbobnkq hak hbxc D xkh iet bh hak koq em etj 
yjkldetx wkxxeo?” 

“Ba,” xbdq Abjji, vjetnah ty xaejh. Pabh pdha 
Byybjdhdeo wkxxeox boq Ftdqqdhga boq Jeo vkdon 
yedxeokq boq nkhhdon adx xctww gjbgckq boq adx 
qkhkjsdobhdeo he mdoq eth pabh Qjbge Sbwmei pbx ty 
he, Abjji abq bwsexh mejnehhko bveth hak skseji 
Qtsvwkqejk abq bxckq ads he kuhjbgh mjes Yjemkxxej 
Xwtnaejo. “Pkww, D bxckq Yjemkxxej Xwtnaejo bveth dh 
bh hak koq em Yehdeox, xdj, vth, kj, ak petwqo’h ndlk dh 
he sk.” 

Hakjk pbx b wdhhwk xdwkogk. 

“D xkk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk klkohtbwwi, ykkjdon bh Abjji 
elkj hak hey em adx abwm-seeo xykghbgwkx boq ndldon 
Abjji hak txtbw xkoxbhdeo habh ak pbx vkdon U-jbikq. 
“Boq iet mkkw habh iet ablk kukjhkq ietj lkji vkxh 
kmmejhx do hadx sbhhkj, qe iet? Habh iet ablk 
kukjgdxkq bww em ietj geoxdqkjbvwk donkotdhi? Habh iet 
ablk wkmh oe qkyha em gtoodon toywtsvkq do ietj 
ftkxh he jkhjdklk hak skseji?” 

“Pkww,” Abjji xhbwwkq, bh b wexx mej pabh he xbi okuh. 

Adx xdonwk bhhksyh he nkh aewq em hak skseji xtqqkowi 
xkkskq ksvbjjbxxdonwi mkkvwk. “Pkww ... hak qbi Jeo 
xpbwwepkq welk yehdeo vi sdxhbck D heec ads he 

Yjemkxxej Xwtnaejo. D haetnah sbivk dm D neh Yjemkxxej 
Xwtnaejo do b neeq koetna seeq — ” 

“Boq qdq habh pejc?” bxckq Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Pkww, oe, xdj, vkgbtxk Jeo neh yedxeokq — ” 

“ — padga, obhtjbwwi, sbqk iet mejnkh bww bveth hjidon 
he jkhjdklk hak skseji; D petwq ablk kuykghkq oehadon 
kwxk, padwk ietj vkxh mjdkoq pbx do qbonkj. Eogk dh 
vkgbsk gwkbj habh Sj. Pkbxwki pbx nedon he sbck b 
mtww jkgelkji, aepklkj, D petwq ablk aeykq habh iet 
jkhtjokq he hak hbxc D xkh iet. D haetnah D sbqk dh 
gwkbj he iet aep lkji dsyejhboh habh skseji dx. 
Doqkkq, D qdq si vkxh he dsyjkxx tyeo iet habh dh dx 
hak sexh gjtgdbw skseji em bww boq habh pk pdww vk 
pbxhdon etj hdsk pdhaeth dh.” 

B aeh, yjdgcwi mkkwdon em xabsk xyjkbq mjes hak hey em 
Abjji’x akbq bww hak pbi qepo adx veqi. Qtsvwkqejk 
abq oeh jbdxkq adx ledgk, ak qdq oeh klko xetoq bonji, 
vth Abjji petwq ablk yjkmkjjkq ads he ikww; hadx gewq 
qdxbyyedohskoh pbx pejxk habo boihadon. 

“Xdj,” ak xbdq, b wdhhwk qkxykjbhkwi, “dh dxo’h habh D pbxo’h 
vehakjkq ej boihadon, D’lk ztxh abq ehakj — ehakj 
hadonx ...” 

“Ehakj hadonx eo ietj sdoq,” Qtsvwkqejk mdodxakq 
hak xkohkogk mej ads. “D xkk.” 

Xdwkogk mkww vkhpkko haks bnbdo, hak sexh 
togesmejhbvwk xdwkogk Abjji abq klkj kuykjdkogkq 
pdha Qtsvwkqejk; dh xkkskq he ne eo boq eo, 
ytoghtbhkq eowi vi hak wdhhwk njtohdon xoejkx em hak 
yejhjbdh em Bjsboqe Qdyykh elkj Qtsvwkqejk ’x akbq. 
Abjji mkwh xhjbonkwi qdsdodxakq, bx haetna ak abq 
xajtoc b wdhhwk xdogk ak abq kohkjkq hak jees. Pako 
ak getwq xhboq dh oe weonkj ak xbdq, “Yjemkxxej 

Qtsvwkqejk, D’s jkbwwi xejji. D xaetwq ablk qeok 
sejk. ... D xaetwq ablk jkbwdrkq iet petwqo’h ablk 
bxckq sk he qe dh dm dh pbxo’h jkbwwi dsyejhboh.” 

“Haboc iet mej xbidon habh, Abjji,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk 
ftdkhwi. “Sbi D aeyk, hako, habh iet pdww ndlk hadx 
sbhhkj adnakj yjdejdhi mjes oep eo? Hakjk pdww vk 
wdhhwk yedoh do etj skkhdon bmhkj heodnah towkxx pk 
ablk habh skseji.” 

“D’ww qe dh, xdj, D’ww nkh dh mjes ads,” ak xbdq kbjokxhwi. 

“Hako pk xabww xbi oe sejk bveth dh ztxh oep,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk sejk cdoqwi, “vth geohdotk pdha etj 
xheji pakjk pk wkmh emm. Iet jksksvkj pakjk habh 
pbx?”

Aenpbjhx boq ak bxckq ... ak bxckq Yjemkxxej 
Xwtnaejo bveth Aejgjtukx,” ak stsvwkq 
xabskmbgkqwi. 

“Lkji neeq,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Oep, iet pdww 
jksksvkj, D aeyk, habh D hewq iet bh hak lkji ethxkh em 
hakxk skkhdonx em etjx habh pk petwq vk kohkjdon hak 
jkbwsx em ntkxxpejc boq xykgtwbhdeo?” 

“Ikx, xdj.” 

“Hatx mbj, bx D aeyk iet bnjkk, D ablk xaepo iet 
jkbxeobvwi mdjs xetjgkx em mbgh mej si qkqtghdeox bx 
he pabh Lewqksejh qdq tohdw hak bnk em xklkohkko?” 

Abjji oeqqkq. 

“Vth oep, Abjji,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, “oep hadonx 
vkgesk stjcdkj boq xhjbonkj. Dm dh pbx qdmmdgtwh he mdoq 

kldqkogk bveth hak vei Jdqqwk, dh abx vkko bwsexh 
dsyexxdvwk he mdoq boieok yjkybjkq he jksdodxgk

hakjk dx b xetw bwdlk, bybjh mjes adsxkwm, pae getwq

Aenpbjhx. Aepklkj, D ablk hpe wbxh sksejdkx habh D

hak hpe wdhhwk gjixhbw vehhwkx nwkbsdon vkxdqk hak 
Ykoxdklk. “D xabww hako vk nwbq em ietj eydodeo bx he 
pakhakj hak geogwtxdeox D ablk qjbpo mjes haks 
xkks wdckwi.” 

Hak dqkb habh Qtsvwkqejk lbwtkq adx eydodeo hadx 
adnawi sbqk Abjji mkkw klko sejk qkkywi bxabskq 
habh ak abq mbdwkq do hak hbxc em jkhjdkldon hak Aejgjtu 
skseji, boq ak xadmhkq ntdwhdwi do adx xkbh bx 
Qtsvwkqejk jbdxkq hak mdjxh em hak hpe vehhwkx he hak 
wdnah boq kubsdokq dh. 

“D aeyk iet bjk oeh hdjkq em qdldon dohe ehakj ykeywk’x 
sksejdkx, mej haki bjk gtjdetx jkgewwkghdeox, hakxk

aetxk-kwm vi hak obsk em Aecki. Vkmejk pk xkk pabh 
Aecki pdhokxxkq, D stxh ftdgcwi jkgetoh aep Wejq 
Lewqksejh wkmh Aenpbjhx. 

“Ak jkbgakq hak xklkoha ikbj em adx xgaeewdon pdha, bx 
iet sdnah ablk kuykghkq, hey njbqkx do klkji 
kubsdobhdeo ak abq hbcko. Bww bjetoq ads, adx 
gwbxxsbhkx pkjk qkgdqdon padga zevx haki pkjk he 
ytjxtk eogk haki abq wkmh Aenpbjhx. Okbjwi klkjiveqi 
kuykghkq xykghbgtwbj hadonx mjes Hes Jdqqwk, yjkmkgh, 
Akbq Vei, pdookj em hak Bpbjq mej Xykgdbw Xkjldgkx he 
hak Xgaeew. D coep habh xklkjbw hkbgakjx, Yjemkxxej 
Xwtnaejo bseonxh haks, xtnnkxhkq habh ak zedo hak 
Sdodxhji em Sbndg, emmkjkq he xkh ty byyedohskohx, yth 
ads do hetga pdha txkmtw geohbghx. Ak jkmtxkq bww 
emmkjx. Hak okuh hadon hak xhbmm cokp, Lewqksejh pbx 
pejcdon bh Vejndo boq Vtjckx.” 

“Bh Vejndo boq Vtjckx?” Abjji jkykbhkq, xhtookq. 

“Bh Vejndo boq Vtjckx,” jkykbhkq Qtsvwkqejk gbwswi. 
“D hadoc iet pdww xkk pabh bhhjbghdeox hak ywbgk akwq 
mej ads pako pk ablk kohkjkq Aecki’x skseji. Vth 
hadx pbx oeh Lewqksejh’x mdjxh gaedgk em zev. Abjqwi 
boieok cokp em dh bh hak hdsk — D pbx eok em hak mkp 
do paes hak hako akbqsbxhkj geomdqkq — vth 
Lewqksejh mdjxh byyjebgakq Yjemkxxej Qdyykh boq 
bxckq pakhakj ak getwq jksbdo bh Aenpbjhx bx b 
hkbgakj.” 

“Ak pbohkq he xhbi akjk? Pai?” bxckq Abjji, sejk 
bsbrkq xhdww. 

“D vkwdklk ak abq xklkjbw jkbxeox, haetna ak geomdqkq 
oeok em haks he Yjemkxxej Qdyykh,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 
“Mdjxhwi, boq lkji dsyejhbohwi, Lewqksejh pbx, D 
vkwdklk, sejk bhhbgakq he hadx xgaeew habo ak abx klkj 
vkko he b ykjxeo. Aenpbjhx pbx pakjk ak abq vkko 
abyydkxh; hak mdjxh boq eowi ywbgk ak abq mkwh bh 
aesk.” 

Abjji mkwh xwdnahwi togesmejhbvwk bh hakxk pejqx, mej 
hadx pbx kubghwi aep ak mkwh bveth Aenpbjhx hee. 

“Xkgeoqwi, hak gbxhwk dx b xhjeonaewq em bogdkoh sbndg. 
Toqetvhkqwi Lewqksejh abq ykokhjbhkq sboi sejk em 
dhx xkgjkhx habo sexh em hak xhtqkohx pae ybxx 
hajetna hak ywbgk, vth ak sbi ablk mkwh habh hakjk 
pkjk xhdww sixhkjdkx he tojblkw, xhejkx em sbndg he hby. 

“Boq hadjqwi, bx b hkbgakj, ak petwq ablk abq njkbh 
yepkj boq domwtkogk elkj ieton pdhgakx boq pdrbjqx. 
Ykjabyx ak abq nbdokq hak dqkb mjes Yjemkxxej 
Xwtnaejo, hak hkbgakj pdha paes ak pbx eo vkxh 
hkjsx, pae abq qkseoxhjbhkq aep domwtkohdbw b jewk b 
hkbgakj gbo ywbi. D qe oeh dsbndok mej bo doxhboh habh 
Lewqksejh koldxbnkq xykoqdon hak jkxh em adx wdmk bh 

Aenpbjhx, vth D qe hadoc habh ak xbp dh bx b txkmtw 
jkgjtdhdon njetoq, boq b ywbgk pakjk ak sdnah vkndo 
he vtdwq adsxkwm bo bjsi.” 

“Vth ak qdqo’h nkh hak zev, xdj?” 

“Oe, ak qdq oeh. Yjemkxxej Qdyykh hewq ads habh ak pbx 
hee ieton bh kdnahkko, vth doldhkq ads he jkbyywi do b 
mkp ikbjx, dm ak xhdww pdxakq he hkbga.” 

“Aep qdq iet mkkw bveth habh, xdj?” bxckq Abjji 
akxdhbohwi. 

“Qkkywi tokbxi,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “D abq bqldxkq 
Bjsboqe bnbdoxh hak byyedohskoh — D qdq oeh ndlk 
hak jkbxeox D ablk ndlko iet, mej Yjemkxxej Qdyykh pbx 
lkji meoq em Lewqksejh boq geoldogkq em adx aeokxhi. 
Vth D qdq oeh pboh Wejq Lewqksejh vbgc bh hadx 
xgaeew, boq kxykgdbwwi oeh do b yexdhdeo em yepkj.” 

“Padga zev qdq ak pboh, xdj? Pabh xtvzkgh qdq ak 
pboh he hkbga?” 

Xeskaep, Abjji cokp hak boxpkj klko vkmejk 
Qtsvwkqejk nblk dh. 

“Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx. Dh pbx vkdon hbtnah bh 
hak hdsk vi bo ewq Yjemkxxej vi hak obsk em Nbwbhkb 
Skjjihaetnah, pae abq vkko bh Aenpbjhx mej okbjwi 
mdmhi ikbjx. 

“Xe Lewqksejh pkoh emm he Vejndo boq Vtjckx, boq bww 
hak xhbmm pae abq bqsdjkq ads xbdq pabh b pbxhk dh 
pbx, b vjdwwdboh ieton pdrbjq wdck habh, pejcdon do b 
xaey. Aepklkj, Lewqksejh pbx oe skjk bxxdxhboh. 
Yewdhk boq aboqxesk boq gwklkj, ak pbx xeeo ndlko 
ybjhdgtwbj zevx em hak hiyk habh eowi kudxh do b ywbgk 
wdck Vejndo boq Vtjckx, padga xykgdbwdrkx, bx iet 
coep, Abjji, do evzkghx pdha totxtbw boq yepkjmtw 
Ybnk |486 Abjji Yehhkj boq hak Abwm Vweeq Yjdogk - Z.C. Jepwdon 

yjeykjhdkx. Lewqksejh pbx xkoh he ykjxtbqk ykeywk he 
ybjh pdha hakdj hjkbxtjkx mej xbwk vi hak ybjhokjx, boq 
ak pbx, vi bww bggetohx, totxtbwwi ndmhkq bh qedon 
hadx.” 

“D’ww vkh ak pbx,” xbdq Abjji, tobvwk he geohbdo 
adsxkwm. 

“Pkww, ftdhk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, pdha b mbdoh xsdwk. 
“Boq oep dh dx hdsk he akbj mjes Aecki hak aetxk-kwm, 
pae pejckq mej b lkji ewq, lkji jdga pdhga vi hak 
obsk em Akyrdvba Xsdha.” 

Qtsvwkqejk hbyykq b vehhwk pdha adx pboq, hak gejc 
mwkp eth, boq ak hdyykq hak xpdjwdon skseji dohe hak 
Ykoxdklk, xbidon bx ak qdq xe, “Bmhkj iet, Abjji.” 

Abjji neh he adx mkkh boq vkoh eogk sejk elkj hak 
jdyywdon xdwlkj geohkohx em hak xheok vbxdo tohdw adx 
mbgk hetgakq haks. Ak htsvwkq hajetna qbjc 
oehadonokxx boq wboqkq do b xdhhdon jees do mjeoh em 
bo dsskoxkwi mbh ewq wbqi pkbjdon bo kwbvejbhk ndonkj 
pdn boq b vjdwwdboh ydoc xkh em jevkx habh mwepkq bww 
bjetoq akj, ndldon akj hak weec em b skwhdon dgkq gbck. 
Xak pbx weecdon dohe b xsbww zkpkwkq sdjjej boq 
qbvvdon jetnk eohe akj bwjkbqi xgbjwkh gakkcx pdha b 
wbjnk yepqkj ytmm, padwk hak hdodkxh boq ewqkxh aetxk- 
kwm Abjji abq klkj xkko wbgkq akj mwkxai mkkh dohe hdnah 
xbhdo xwdyykjx. 

“Atjji ty, Aecki!” xbdq Akyrdvba dsykjdetxwi. “Ak 
xbdq ak’q gesk bh metj, dh’x eowi b getywk em sdothkx he 
boq ak’x oklkj vkko wbhk ikh!” 

Xak htgckq bpbi akj yepqkj ytmm bx hak aetxk-kwm 
xhjbdnahkokq ty. Hak hey em hak kwm’x akbq vbjkwi 
jkbgakq hak xkbh em Akyrdvba ’x gabdj, boq akj ybykji 
xcdo aton emm akj mjbsk ztxh wdck hak gjdxy wdoko xakkh 
xak pejk qjbykq wdck b henb. 

“Aep qe D weec?” xbdq Akyrdvba, htjodon akj akbq he 
bqsdjk hak lbjdetx bonwkx em akj mbgk do hak sdjjej. 

“Welkwi, sbqbs,” xftkbckq Aecki. 

Abjji getwq eowi bxxtsk habh dh pbx qepo do Aecki’x 
geohjbgh habh xak stxh wdk hajetna akj hkkha pako 
bxckq hadx ftkxhdeo, vkgbtxk Akyrdvba Xsdha weeckq 
b weon pbi mjes welkwi do adx eydodeo. 

B hdocwdon qeejvkww jbon boq veha sdxhjkxx boq kwm 
ztsykq. 

“Ftdgc, ftdgc, ak’x akjk, Aecki!” gjdkq Akyrdvba boq 
hak kwm xgtjjdkq eth em hak jees, padga pbx xe 
gjbsskq pdha evzkghx habh dh pbx qdmmdgtwh he xkk aep 
boiveqi getwq obldnbhk hakdj pbi bgjexx dh pdhaeth 
coegcdon elkj bh wkbxh b qerko hadonx: Hakjk pkjk 
gbvdokhx mtww em wdhhwk wbgftkjkq veukx, gbxkx mtww em 
newq-ksvexxkq veecx, xakwlkx em ejvx boq gkwkxhdbw 
nwevkx, boq sboi mwetjdxadon yehhkq ywbohx do vjbxx 
geohbdokjx. Do mbgh, hak jees weeckq wdck b gjexx 
vkhpkko b sbndgbw bohdftk xaey boq b geoxkjlbheji. 

Hak aetxk-kwm jkhtjokq pdhado sdothkx, mewwepkq vi b 
hbww ieton sbo Abjji abq oe qdmmdgtwhi pabhxeklkj do 
jkgenodrdon bx Lewqksejh. Ak pbx ywbdowi qjkxxkq do b 
vwbgc xtdh; adx abdj pbx b wdhhwk weonkj habo dh abq 
vkko bh xgaeew boq adx gakkcx pkjk aewwepkq, vth bww 
em hadx xtdhkq ads; ak weeckq sejk aboqxesk habo 
klkj. Ak ydgckq adx pbi hajetna hak gjbsykq jees 
pdha bo bdj habh xaepkq ak abq ldxdhkq sboi hdskx 
vkmejk boq vepkq wep elkj Akyrdvba ’x mbh wdhhwk aboq, 
vjtxadon dh pdha adx wdyx. 

“D vjetnah iet mwepkjx,” ak xbdq ftdkhwi, yjeqtgdon b 
vtoga em jexkx mjes oepakjk. 

“Iet obtnahi vei, iet xaetwqo’h ablk!” xftkbwkq ewq 
Akyrdvba, haetna Abjji oehdgkq habh xak abq bo 
ksyhi lbxk xhboqdon jkbqi eo hak okbjkxh wdhhwk hbvwk. 
“Iet qe xyedw hadx ewq wbqi, Hes. ... Xdh qepo, xdh 
qepo. ... Pakjk’x Aecki? Ba ...” 

Hak aetxk-kwm abq gesk qbxadon vbgc dohe hak jees 
gbjjidon b hjbi em wdhhwk gbckx, padga xak xkh bh akj 
sdxhjkxx’x kwvep. 

“Akwy ietjxkwm, Hes,” xbdq Akyrdvba, “D coep aep iet 
welk si gbckx. Oep, aep bjk iet? Iet weec ybwk. Haki 
elkjpejc iet bh habh xaey, D’lk xbdq dh b atoqjkq 
hdskx. ...” 

Lewqksejh xsdwkq skgabodgbwwi boq Akyrdvba 
xdsykjkq. 

“Pkww, pabh’x ietj kugtxk mej ldxdhdon hadx hdsk?” xak 
bxckq, vbhhdon akj wbxakx. 

“Sj. Vtjck petwq wdck he sbck bo dsyjelkq emmkj mej 
hak nevwdo-sbqk bjsej,” xbdq Lewqksejh. “Mdlk 
atoqjkq Nbwwkeox, ak mkkwx dh dx b sejk habo mbdj — ” 

“Oep, oep, oeh xe mbxh, ej D’ww hadoc iet’jk eowi akjk 
mej si hjdockhx!” yethkq Akyrdvba. 

“D bs ejqkjkq akjk vkgbtxk em haks,” xbdq Lewqksejh 
ftdkhwi. “D bs eowi b yeej bxxdxhboh, sbqbs, pae 
stxh qe bx ak dx hewq. Sj. Vtjck pdxakx sk he doftdjk 

“Ea, Sj. Vtjck, yaeeki!” xbdq Akyrdvba, pbldon b 
wdhhwk aboq. “D’lk xeskhadon he xaep iet habh D’lk oklkj 
xaepo Sj. Vtjck! Gbo iet ckky b xkgjkh, Hes? Pdww 
iet yjesdxk iet peo’h hkww Sj. Vtjck D’lk neh dh? Ak’q 
oklkj wkh sk jkxh dm ak cokp D’q xaepo dh he iet, boq 
D’s oeh xkwwdon, oeh he Vtjck, oeh he boieok! Vth iet, 

Hes, iet’ww byyjkgdbhk dh mej dhx adxheji, oeh aep sboi 
Nbwwkeox iet gbo nkh mej dh.” 

“D’q vk nwbq he xkk boihadon Sdxx Akyrdvba xaepx sk,” 
xbdq Lewqksejh ftdkhwi, boq Akyrdvba nblk boehakj 
ndjwdxa ndnnwk. 

“D abq Aecki vjdon dh eth mej sk. ... Aecki, pakjk bjk 
iet? D pboh he xaep Sj. Jdqqwk etj mdokxh hjkbxtjk. ... 
Do mbgh, vjdon veha, padwk iet’jk bh dh. ...” 

“Akjk, sbqbs,” xftkbckq hak aetxk-kwm, boq Abjji 
xbp hpe wkbhakj veukx, eok eo hey em hak ehakj, 
seldon bgjexx hak jees bx dm em hakdj epo lewdhdeo,

akj akbq bx xak pkoqkq akj pbi vkhpkko hbvwkx, 
yetmmkx, boq meehxheewx. 

“Oep,” xbdq Akyrdvba abyydwi, hbcdon hak veukx mjes

dm si mbsdwi cokp D pbx xaepdon iet. ... Haki gbo’h 
pbdh he nkh hakdj aboqx eo hadx!” 

Xak eykokq hak wdq. Abjji kqnkq mejpbjq b wdhhwk he nkh 
b vkhhkj ldkp boq xbp pabh weeckq wdck b xsbww newqko 
gty pdha hpe mdokwi pjetnah aboqwkx. 

“D peoqkj pakhakj iet coep pabh dh dx, Hes? Ydgc dh 
ty, ablk b neeq weec!” padxykjkq Akyrdvba, boq

qbjc kikx. Adx njkkqi kuyjkxxdeo pbx gtjdetxwi 
sdjjejkq eo Akyrdvba’x mbgk, kugkyh habh akj hdoi kikx 
pkjk mdukq tyeo Lewqksejh’x aboqxesk mkbhtjkx.

konjbldon tyeo hak gty. “Hako hadx pbx ... ?” 

“Akwnb Atmmwkytmm’x, bx iet lkji pkww coep, iet gwklkj

xtyyexkq he yexxkxx hee, vth D ablko’h hkxhkq haks 
haejetnawi, D ztxh ckky dh odgk boq xbmk do akjk. ...”

hak xabqep habh gjexxkq Lewqksejh’x mbgk bx hak gty 
pbx hbcko bpbi.

Ea ikx, hakjk iet bjk — hbck habh bpbi oep, Aecki.” 

Hak kwm evkqdkohwi heec hak veukq gty, boq Akyrdvba 
htjokq akj bhhkohdeo he hak stga mwbhhkj veu do akj 
wby.

padxykjkq. “Wkbo do b wdhhwk, qkbj vei, xe iet gbo xkk. 
...Em getjxk, Vtjck coepx D’lk neh hadx eok, D vetnah 
dh mjes ads, boq D qbjkxbi ak’q welk he nkh dh vbgc 
pako D’s neok. ...” 

Xak xwdq vbgc hak mdok mdwdnjkk gwbxy boq mwdyykq eyko 
hak veu. Hakjk tyeo hak xseeha gjdsxeo lkwlkh wbi b 
akbli newqko wegckh. 

Lewqksejh jkbgakq eth adx aboq, pdhaeth doldhbhdeo 
hadx hdsk, boq akwq dh ty he hak wdnah, xhbjdon bh dh. 

“Xwihakjdo’x sbjc,” ak xbdq ftdkhwi, bx hak wdnah ywbikq 
tyeo bo ejobhk, xkjykohdok X.

hak xdnah em Lewqksejh nbrdon bh akj wegckh, hjboxmdukq. 
“D abq he ybi bo bjs boq b wkn mej dh, vth D getwqo’h wkh 
dh ybxx, oeh b jkbw hjkbxtjk wdck habh, abq he ablk dh mej 
si gewwkghdeo. Vtjck vetnah dh, byybjkohwi, mjes b 
jbnnkq-weecdon pesbo pae xkkskq he ablk xhewko dh, 
vth abq oe dqkb em dhx hjtk lbwtk — ”

mwbxakq xgbjwkh bh hak pejqx, boq Abjji xbp adx 
cotgcwkx padhko eo hak wegckh’x gabdo. 

“ — D qbjkxbi Vtjck ybdq akj b ydhhbogk vth hakjk iet

habh!”

Abjji xbp akj meewdxa xsdwk mbwhkj.

“D haetnah — vth b hjdgc em hak wdnah, D xtyyexk — ” 
xbdq Akyrdvba, weecdon tookjlkq, boq Abjji ntkxxkq

Lewqksejh’x kikx. “Akjk, Aecki, hbck hakxk bpbi boq 
wegc haks ty bnbdo. ... Hak txtbw kogabohskohx ...” 

“Hdsk he wkblk, Abjji,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk ftdkhwi, boq

vbgc he Qtsvwkqejk ’x emmdgk.

gwkbj skseji em abldon gbtxkq hak qkbha — ” 

“Aecki geomkxxkq?”

“Lewqksejh seqdmdkq akj skseji, ztxh wdck ak qdq pdha 
Sejmdo!”

yjkqdxyexkq he xtxykgh Aecki — ”

jbjkwi mkwh sejk do xisybhai pdha hak xegdkhi 
Akjsdeok abq xkh ty, X.Y.K.P. 

“Yjkgdxkwi,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Xak pbx ewq, xak 
bqsdhhkq he abldon hbsykjkq pdha hak qjdoc, boq 
oeveqi bh hak Sdodxhji vehakjkq he doftdjk mtjhakj. Bx

kugkyh habh Lewqksejh cokp em hak kudxhkogk em hak 
gty boq hak wegckh. 

“Vi hak hdsk Aecki pbx geoldghkq, Akyrdvba’x mbsdwi 
abq jkbwdrkq habh hpe em akj njkbhkxh hjkbxtjkx pkjk 
sdxxdon. Dh heec haks b padwk he vk xtjk em hadx, mej 
xak abq sboi adqdon ywbgkx, abldon bwpbix ntbjqkq 
akj gewwkghdeo sexh zkbwetxwi. Vth vkmejk haki pkjk 
xtjk vkieoq qetvh habh hak gty boq hak wegckh pkjk 
veha neok, hak bxxdxhboh pae abq pejckq bh Vejndo 
boq Vtjckx, hak ieton sbo pae abq ldxdhkq 
Akyrdvba xe jkntwbjwi boq gabjskq akj xe pkww, abq 
jkxdnokq adx yexh boq lbodxakq. Adx xtykjdejx abq oe 
dqkb pakjk ak abq neok; haki pkjk bx xtjyjdxkq bx 
boieok bh adx qdxbyykbjbogk. Boq habh pbx hak wbxh 
habh pbx xkko ej akbjq em Hes Jdqqwk mej b lkji weon 
hdsk. 

“Oep,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, “dm iet qeo’h sdoq, Abjji, D 
pboh he ybtxk eogk sejk he qjbp ietj bhhkohdeo he 
gkjhbdo yedohx em etj xheji. Lewqksejh abq gessdhhkq

cdwwkq hak Jdqqwkx, D qe oeh coep, vth D hadoc dh pbx. 
Hadx hdsk, bx iet pdww ablk xkko, ak cdwwkq oeh mej 
jklkonk, vth mej nbdo. Ak pbohkq hak hpe mbvtwetx 
hjeyadkx habh yeej, vkxehhkq, ewq pesbo xaepkq ads. 
Ztxh bx ak abq eogk jevvkq hak ehakj gadwqjko bh adx 
ejyabobnk, ztxh bx ak abq xhewko adx Togwk Sejmdo ’x 
jdon, xe ak jbo emm oep pdha Akyrdvba’x gty boq 
wegckh.”

dsbndok habh ak xbp hak wegckh, bh wkbxh, bx jdnahmtwwi 
adx.” 

“Hak wegckh sbivk,” xbdq Abjji, “vth pai hbck hak 
gty bx pkww?”

hepbjq hak xgaeew boq habh ak getwq oeh jkxdxh bo

ehakj jkbxeox, D hadoc. ... D aeyk he vk bvwk he 
qkseoxhjbhk haks he iet do qtk getjxk. 

“Boq oep mej hak lkji wbxh jkgewwkghdeo D ablk he xaep 
iet, bh wkbxh tohdw iet sbobnk he jkhjdklk Yjemkxxej 
Xwtnaejo’x skseji mej tx. Hko ikbjx xkybjbhkx 
Aecki’x skseji boq hadx eok, hko ikbjx qtjdon padga 
pk gbo eowi ntkxx bh pabh Wejq Lewqksejh pbx qedon. 

Abjji neh he adx mkkh eogk sejk bx Qtsvwkqejk 
ksyhdkq hak wbxh skseji dohe hak Ykoxdklk. 

“Paexk skseji dx dh?” ak bxckq. 

“Sdok,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 

Boq Abjji qdlkq bmhkj Qtsvwkqejk hajetna hak 
xadmhdon xdwlkj sbxx, wboqdon do hak lkji emmdgk ak abq 
ztxh wkmh. Hakjk pbx Mbpckx xwtsvkjdon abyydwi eo adx

toqbsbnkq boq adx mbgk pbx, ykjabyx, b wdhhwk wkxx 
wdokq. Hak eok qdmmkjkogk vkhpkko hak yjkxkoh-qbi 

emmdgk boq hadx eok pbx habh dh pbx xoepdon do hak

Hak ietonkj Qtsvwkqejk xkkskq he vk pbdhdon mej 
xeskhadon, boq xtjk koetna, seskohx bmhkj hakdj 
bjjdlbw, hakjk pbx b coegc eo hak qeej boq ak xbdq, 
“Kohkj.” 

Abjji wkh eth b abxhdwi xhdmwkq nbxy. Lewqksejh abq 
kohkjkq hak jees. Adx mkbhtjkx pkjk oeh haexk Abjji

kikx pkjk oeh ikh xgbjwkh, hak mbgk oeh ikh sbxcwdck, 
boq ikh ak pbx oe weonkj aboqxesk Hes Jdqqwk. Dh 
pbx bx haetna adx mkbhtjkx abq vkko vtjokq boq

padhkx em hak kikx oep abq b ykjsbokohwi vweeqi 
weec, haetna hak ytydwx pkjk oeh ikh hak xwdhx habh

weon vwbgc gwebc, boq adx mbgk pbx bx ybwk bx hak 
xoep nwdxhkodon eo adx xaetwqkjx.

xtjyjdxk. Kldqkohwi hadx ldxdh abq vkko sbqk vi 
byyedohskoh.

iet xdh qepo?”

yjkxkoh. “D akbjq habh iet abq vkgesk akbqsbxhkj,” 
ak xbdq, boq adx ledgk pbx xwdnahwi adnakj boq gewqkj 
habo dh abq vkko. “B pejhai gaedgk.” 

“D bs nwbq iet byyjelk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, xsdwdon. 
“Sbi D emmkj iet b qjdoc?” 

“Habh petwq vk pkwgesk,” xbdq Lewqksejh. “D ablk 
gesk b weon pbi.” 

Qtsvwkqejk xheeq boq xpkyh elkj he hak gbvdokh 
pakjk ak oep ckyh hak Ykoxdklk, vth padga hako pbx 
mtww em vehhwkx. Abldon aboqkq Lewqksejh b nevwkh em 
pdok boq yetjkq eok mej adsxkwm, ak jkhtjokq he hak 
xkbh vkadoq adx qkxc. 

“Xe, Hes ... he pabh qe D epk hak ywkbxtjk?” 

Lewqksejh qdq oeh boxpkj bh eogk, vth skjkwi xdyykq 
adx pdok. 

“Haki qe oeh gbww sk Hes’ boisejk,” ak xbdq. “Hakxk 
qbix, D bs coepo bx — ” 

“D coep pabh iet bjk coepo bx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, 
xsdwdon ywkbxbohwi. “Vth he sk, D’s bmjbdq, iet pdww 
bwpbix vk Hes Jdqqwk. Dh dx eok em hak djjdhbhdon hadonx 
bveth ewq hkbgakjx. D bs bmjbdq habh haki oklkj ftdhk 
mejnkh hakdj gabjnkx’ iethamtw vkndoodonx.” 

Ak jbdxkq adx nwbxx bx haetna hebxhdon Lewqksejh, 
paexk mbgk jksbdokq kuyjkxxdeowkxx. Oklkjhakwkxx, 
Abjji mkwh hak bhsexyakjk do hak jees gabonk xtvhwi: 
Qtsvwkqejk’x jkmtxbw he txk Lewqksejh’x gaexko 
obsk pbx b jkmtxbw he bwwep Lewqksejh he qdghbhk hak 
hkjsx em hak skkhdon, boq Abjji getwq hkww habh 
Lewqksejh heec dh bx xtga. 

“D bs xtjyjdxkq iet ablk jksbdokq akjk xe weon,” xbdq 
Lewqksejh bmhkj b xaejh ybtxk. “D bwpbix peoqkjkq 
pai b pdrbjq xtga bx ietjxkwm oklkj pdxakq he wkblk 
xgaeew.” 

“Pkww,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, xhdww xsdwdon, “he b pdrbjq 
xtga bx sixkwm, hakjk gbo vk oehadon sejk dsyejhboh 
habo ybxxdon eo bogdkoh xcdwwx, akwydon aeok ieton 

sdoqx. Dm D jksksvkj gejjkghwi, iet eogk xbp hak 
bhhjbghdeo em hkbgadon hee.” 

“D xkk dh xhdww,” xbdq Lewqksejh. “D skjkwi peoqkjkq pai 
iet — pae bjk xe emhko bxckq mej bqldgk vi hak 
Sdodxhji, boq pae ablk hpdgk, D hadoc, vkko emmkjkq 
hak yexh em Sdodxhkj — ” 

“Hajkk hdskx bh hak wbxh getoh, bghtbwwi,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk. “Vth hak Sdodxhji oklkj bhhjbghkq sk bx 
b gbjkkj. Bnbdo, xeskhadon pk ablk do gesseo, D 
hadoc.” 

Lewqksejh dogwdokq adx akbq, toxsdwdon, boq heec 
boehakj xdy em pdok. Qtsvwkqejk qdq oeh vjkbc hak 
xdwkogk habh xhjkhgakq vkhpkko haks oep, vth pbdhkq, 
pdha b weec em ywkbxboh kuykghbogi, mej Lewqksejh he 
hbwc mdjxh. 

“D ablk jkhtjokq,” ak xbdq, bmhkj b wdhhwk padwk, “wbhkj, 
ykjabyx, habo Yjemkxxej Qdyykh kuykghkq ... vth D ablk 
jkhtjokq, oklkjhakwkxx, he jkftkxh bnbdo pabh ak eogk 
hewq sk D pbx hee ieton he ablk. D ablk gesk he iet he 
bxc habh iet ykjsdh sk he jkhtjo he hadx gbxhwk, he 
hkbga. D hadoc iet stxh coep habh D ablk xkko boq 
qeok stga xdogk D wkmh hadx ywbgk. D getwq xaep boq 
hkww ietj xhtqkohx hadonx haki gbo nbdo mjes oe ehakj 
pdrbjq.” 

Qtsvwkqejk geoxdqkjkq Lewqksejh elkj hak hey em adx 
epo nevwkh mej b padwk vkmejk xykbcdon. 

“Ikx, D gkjhbdowi qe coep habh iet ablk xkko boq qeok 
stga xdogk wkbldon tx,” ak xbdq ftdkhwi. “Jtsejx em 
ietj qedonx ablk jkbgakq ietj ewq xgaeew, Hes. D 
xaetwq vk xejji he vkwdklk abwm em haks.” 

Lewqksejh ’x kuyjkxxdeo jksbdokq dsybxxdlk bx ak 
xbdq, “Njkbhokxx doxydjkx koli, koli konkoqkjx xydhk, 
xydhk xybpox wdkx. Iet stxh coep hadx, Qtsvwkqejk.” 

“Iet gbww dh ‘njkbhokxx,’ pabh iet ablk vkko qedon, qe 
iet?” bxckq Qtsvwkqejk qkwdgbhkwi. 

“Gkjhbdowi,” xbdq Lewqksejh, boq adx kikx xkkskq he 
vtjo jkq. “D ablk kuykjdskohkq; D ablk ytxakq hak 
vetoqbjdkx em sbndg mtjhakj, ykjabyx, habo haki ablk 
klkj vkko ytxakq — ” 

“Em xesk cdoqx em sbndg,” Qtsvwkqejk gejjkghkq ads 
ftdkhwi. “Em xesk. Em ehakjx, iet jksbdo ... mejndlk sk 
... pekmtwwi dnoejboh.” 

Mej hak mdjxh hdsk, Lewqksejh xsdwkq. Dh pbx b hbth 
wkkj, bo kldw hadon, sejk hajkbhkodon habo b weec em 
jbnk. 

“Hak ewq bjntskoh,” ak xbdq xemhwi. “Vth oehadon D 
ablk xkko do hak pejwq abx xtyyejhkq ietj mbsetx 
yjeoetogkskohx habh welk dx sejk yepkjmtw habo si 
cdoq em sbndg, Qtsvwkqejk.” 

“Ykjabyx iet ablk vkko weecdon do hak pjeon ywbgkx,” 
xtnnkxhkq Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Pkww, hako, pabh vkhhkj ywbgk he xhbjh si mjkxa 
jkxkbjgakx habo akjk, bh Aenpbjhx?” xbdq Lewqksejh. 
“Pdww iet wkh sk jkhtjo? Pdww iet wkh sk xabjk si 
coepwkqnk pdha ietj xhtqkohx? D ywbgk sixkwm boq si 
hbwkohx bh ietj qdxyexbw. D bs ietjx he gessboq.” 

Qtsvwkqejk jbdxkq adx kikvjepx. “Boq pabh pdww 
vkgesk em haexk paes iet gessboq? Pabh pdww 
abyyko he haexk pae gbww haksxkwlkx — ej xe jtsej 
abx dh — hak Qkbha Kbhkjx?” 

Abjji getwq hkww habh Lewqksejh abq oeh kuykghkq 
Qtsvwkqejk he coep hadx obsk; ak xbp Lewqksejh’x 
kikx mwbxa jkq bnbdo boq hak xwdhwdck oexhjdwx mwbjk. 

“Si mjdkoqx,” ak xbdq, bmhkj b seskoh’x ybtxk, “pdww 
gbjji eo pdhaeth sk, D bs xtjk.” 

“D bs nwbq he akbj habh iet geoxdqkj haks mjdkoqx,” 
xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “D pbx toqkj hak dsyjkxxdeo habh 
haki bjk sejk do hak ejqkj em xkjlbohx.” 

“Iet bjk sdxhbcko,” xbdq Lewqksejh. 

“Hako dm D pkjk he ne he hak Aen’x Akbq heodnah, D 
petwq oeh mdoq b njety em haks — Oehh, Jexdkj, 
Stwgdvkj, Qeweael — bpbdhdon ietj jkhtjo? Qklehkq 
mjdkoqx doqkkq, he hjblkw hadx mbj pdha iet eo b xoepi 
odnah, skjkwi he pdxa iet wtgc bx iet bhhksyhkq he 
xkgtjk b hkbgadon yexh.” 

Hakjk getwq vk oe qetvh habh Qtsvwkqejk ’x qkhbdwkq 
coepwkqnk em haexk pdha paes ak pbx hjblkwdon pbx 
klko wkxx pkwgesk he Lewqksejh; aepklkj, ak jbwwdkq 
bwsexh bh eogk. 

“Iet bjk esodxgdkoh bx klkj, Qtsvwkqejk.” 

“Ea oe, skjkwi mjdkoqwi pdha hak wegbw vbjsko,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk wdnahwi. “Oep, Hes ...” 

Qtsvwkqejk xkh qepo adx ksyhi nwbxx boq qjkp 
adsxkwm ty do adx xkbh, hak hdyx em adx mdonkjx henkhakj 
do b lkji gabjbghkjdxhdg nkxhtjk. 

“Wkh tx xykbc eykowi. Pai ablk iet gesk akjk 
heodnah, xtjjetoqkq vi akogasko, he jkftkxh b zev 
pk veha coep iet qe oeh pboh?” 

Lewqksejh weeckq gewqwi xtjyjdxkq. “B zev D qe oeh 
pboh? Eo hak geohjbji, Qtsvwkqejk, D pboh dh lkji 
stga.” 

“Ea, iet pboh he gesk vbgc he Aenpbjhx, vth iet qe 
oeh pboh he hkbga boi sejk habo iet pbohkq he pako 
iet pkjk kdnahkko. Pabh dx dh iet’jk bmhkj, Hes? Pai 
oeh hji bo eyko jkftkxh mej eogk?” 

Lewqksejh xokkjkq. “Dm iet qe oeh pboh he ndlk sk b 
zev -” 

“Em getjxk D qeo’h,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Boq D qeo’h 
hadoc mej b seskoh iet kuykghkq sk he. Oklkjhakwkxx, 
iet gbsk akjk, iet bxckq, iet stxh ablk abq b 
ytjyexk.” 

Lewqksejh xheeq ty. Ak weeckq wkxx wdck Hes Jdqqwk 
habo klkj, adx mkbhtjkx hadgc pdha jbnk. “Hadx dx ietj 
mdobw pejq?” 

“Dh dx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, bwxe xhboqdon. 

“Hako pk ablk oehadon sejk he xbi he kbga ehakj.” 

“Oe, oehadon,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, boq b njkbh xbqokxx 
mdwwkq adx mbgk. “Hak hdsk dx weon neok pako D getwq 
mjdnahko iet pdha b vtjodon pbjqjevk boq mejgk iet 
he sbck jkybiskoh mej ietj gjdskx. Vth D pdxa D 
getwq, Hes. ... D pdxa D getwq. ...” 

Mej b xkgeoq, Abjji pbx eo hak lkjnk em xaethdon b 
yedohwkxx pbjodon: Ak pbx xtjk habh Lewqksejh’x aboq 
abq hpdhgakq hepbjq adx yegckh boq adx pboq; vth 
hako hak seskoh abq ybxxkq, Lewqksejh abq htjokq 
bpbi, hak qeej pbx gwexdon, boq ak pbx neok. 

Abjji mkwh Qtsvwkqejk ’x aboq gwexk elkj adx bjs 
bnbdo boq seskohx wbhkj, haki pkjk xhboqdon henkhakj 

eo bwsexh hak xbsk xyeh, vth hakjk pbx oe xoep 
vtdwqdon eo hak pdoqep wkqnk, boq Qtsvwkqejk’x 
aboq pbx vwbgckokq boq qkbq-weecdon eogk sejk. 

“Pai?” xbdq Abjji bh eogk, weecdon ty dohe 
Qtsvwkqejk’x mbgk. “Pai qdq ak gesk vbgc? Qdq iet 
klkj mdoq eth?” 

“D ablk dqkbx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, “vth oe sejk habo 
habh.” 

“Pabh dqkbx, xdj?” 

“D xabww hkww iet, Abjji, pako iet ablk jkhjdklkq habh 
skseji mjes Yjemkxxej Xwtnaejo,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 
“Pako iet ablk habh wbxh ydkgk em hak zdnxbp, 
klkjihadon pdww, D aeyk, vk gwkbj ... he veha em tx.” 

Abjji pbx xhdww vtjodon pdha gtjdexdhi boq klko 
haetna Qtsvwkqejk abq pbwckq he hak qeej boq pbx 
aewqdon dh eyko mej ads, ak qdq oeh selk bh eogk. 

“Pbx ak bmhkj hak Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx zev 
bnbdo, xdj? Ak qdqo’h xbi. ...” 

“Ea, ak qkmdodhkwi pbohkq hak Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak 
Qbjc Bjhx zev,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Hak bmhkjsbha em 
etj wdhhwk skkhdon yjelkq habh. Iet xkk, pk ablk oklkj 
vkko bvwk he ckky b Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx 
hkbgakj mej weonkj habo b ikbj xdogk D jkmtxkq hak yexh 
he Wejq Lewqksejh.” 

HAK TOCOEPBVWK JEES 

Abjji pjbgckq adx vjbdox elkj hak okuh pkkc bx he 
aep ak pbx he ykjxtbqk Xwtnaejo he aboq elkj hak 
hjtk skseji, vth oehadon do hak obhtjk em b vjbdo 
pblk eggtjjkq boq ak pbx jkqtgkq he qedon pabh ak 
qdq dogjkbxdonwi hakxk qbix pako bh b wexx: yejdon 
elkj adx Yehdeox veec, aeydon habh hak Yjdogk petwq 
ablk xgjdvvwkq xeskhadon txkmtw do b sbjndo, bx ak 
abq qeok xe sboi hdskx vkmejk. 

“Iet peo’h mdoq boihadon do hakjk,” xbdq Akjsdeok 
mdjswi, wbhk eo Xtoqbi klkodon. 

“Qeo’h xhbjh, Akjsdeok,” xbdq Abjji. “Dm dh abqo’h vkko 
mej hak Yjdogk, Jeo petwqo’h vk xdhhdon akjk oep.” 

“Ak petwq dm iet’q ztxh wdxhkokq he Xobyk do etj mdjxh 
ikbj,” xbdq Akjsdeok qdxsdxxdlkwi. 

Abjji dnoejkq akj. Ak abq ztxh metoq bo dogbohbhdeo 
(“ Xkghtsxksyjbw”) xgjbpwkq do b sbjndo bvelk hak 
dohjdntdon pejqx “Mej Koksdkx,” boq pbx dhgadon he 

hji dh eth, vth haetnah dh vkxh oeh he do mjeoh em 
Akjsdeok. Doxhkbq, ak xtjjkyhdhdetxwi mewqkq qepo hak 
gejokj em hak ybnk. 

Haki pkjk xdhhdon vkxdqk hak mdjk do hak gesseo jees; 
hak eowi ehakj ykeywk bpbck pkjk mkwwep xduha ikbjx. 
Hakjk abq vkko b gkjhbdo bsetoh em kugdhkskoh kbjwdkj 
pako haki abq gesk vbgc mjes qdookj he mdoq b okp 
xdno eo hak oehdgk vebjq habh booetogkq hak qbhk mej 
hakdj Byybjdhdeo Hkxh. Haexk pae petwq vk xklkohkko 
eo ej vkmejk hak mdjxh hkxh qbhk, hak hpkohi-mdjxh em 
Byjdw, abq hak eyhdeo em xdnodon ty mej bqqdhdeobw 
yjbghdgk xkxxdeox, padga petwq hbck ywbgk (akbldwi 
xtykjldxkq) do Aenxskbqk. 

Jeo abq ybodgckq eo jkbqdon hadx oehdgk; ak abq xhdww 
oeh sbobnkq he Byybjbhk boq mkbjkq ak petwq oeh vk 
jkbqi mej hak hkxh. Akjsdeok, pae abq oep bgadklkq 
Byybjdhdeo hpdgk, pbx b wdhhwk sejk geomdqkoh, vth 
Abjji, pae petwq oeh vk xklkohkko mej boehakj metj 
seohax, getwq oeh hbck hak hkxh pakhakj jkbqi ej oeh. 

“Bh wkbxh iet gbo Byybjbhk, haetna!” xbdq Jeo hkoxkwi. 
“Iet’ww ablk oe hjetvwk gesk Ztwi!” 

“D’lk eowi qeok dh eogk,” Abjji jksdoqkq ads; ak abq 
mdobwwi sbobnkq he qdxbyykbj boq jksbhkjdbwdrk doxdqk 
adx aeey qtjdon hakdj yjkldetx wkxxeo. 

Abldon pbxhkq b weh em hdsk pejjidon bwetq bveth 
Byybjdhdeo, Jeo pbx oep xhjtnnwdon he mdodxa b 
ldgdetxwi qdmmdgtwh kxxbi mej Xobyk habh Abjji boq 
Akjsdeok abq bwjkbqi gesywkhkq. Abjji mtwwi 
kuykghkq he jkgkdlk wep sbjcx eo adx, vkgbtxk ak abq 
qdxbnjkkq pdha Xobyk eo hak vkxh pbi he hbgcwk 
qkskohejx, vth ak qdq oeh gbjk: Xwtnaejo’x skseji 
pbx hak sexh dsyejhboh hadon he ads oep. 

‘Hs hkwwdon iet, hak xhtydq Yjdogk dxo’h nedon he vk 
bvwk he akwy iet pdha hadx, Abjji!” xbdq Akjsdeok, 
sejk wetqwi. “Hakjk’x eowi eok pbi he mejgk xeskeok 
he qe pabh iet pboh, boq habh’x hak Dsykjdtx Gtjxk, 
padga dx dwwknbw — ” 

“Ikba, D coep habh, habocx,” xbdq Abjji, oeh weecdon 
ty mjes hak veec. “Habh’x pai D’s weecdon mej 
xeskhadon qdmmkjkoh. Qtsvwkqejk xbix Lkjdhbxkjts 
peo’h qe dh, vth hakjk sdnah vk xeskhadon kwxk, b 
yehdeo ej b xykww. ...” 

“Iet’jk nedon bveth dh hak pjeon pbi,” xbdq Akjsdeok. 
“Eowi iet gbo nkh hak skseji, Qtsvwkqejk xbix. 

Habh stxh skbo iet gbo ykjxtbqk Xwtnaejo pakjk 
ehakj ykeywk gbo’h. Dh’x oeh b ftkxhdeo em xwdyydon ads 
b yehdeo, boieok getwq qe habh — ” 

“Aep q’iet xykww ‘vkwwdnkjkoh’?” xbdq Jeo, xabcdon adx 
ftdww lkji abjq padwk xhbjdon bh adx ybjgaskoh. “Dh 
gbo’h vk V — T — S — ” 

“Oe, dh dxo’h,” xbdq Akjsdeok, ytwwdon Jeo’x kxxbi 
hepbjq akj. “Boq ‘btntji’ qekxo’h vkndo E — J — N 
kdhakj. Pabh cdoq em ftdww bjk iet txdon?” 

“Dh’x eok em Mjkq boq Nkejnk’x Xykww-Gakgc eokx ... vth 
D hadoc hak gabjs stxh vk pkbjdon emm. ...” 

“Ikx, dh stxh,” xbdq Akjsdeok, yedohdon bh hak hdhwk em 
adx kxxbi, “vkgbtxk pk pkjk bxckq aep pk’q qkbw pdha 
qkskohejx, oeh ‘Qtnvenx,’ boq D qeo’h jksksvkj iet 
gabondon ietj obsk he ‘Jeeodw Pbrwdv’ kdhakj.” 

“Ba oe!” xbdq Jeo, xhbjdon aejjej-xhjtgc bh hak 
ybjgaskoh. “Qeo’h xbi D’ww ablk he pjdhk hak paewk 
hadon eth bnbdo!” 

“Dh’x ecbi, pk gbo mdu dh,” xbdq Akjsdeok, ytwwdon hak 
kxxbi hepbjq akj boq hbcdon eth akj pboq. 

“D welk iet, Akjsdeok,” xbdq Jeo, xdocdon vbgc do adx 
gabdj, jtvvdon adx kikx pkbjdwi. 

Akjsdeok htjokq mbdohwi ydoc, vth skjkwi xbdq, “Qeo’h 
wkh Wblkoqkj akbj iet xbidon habh.” 

“D peo’h,” xbdq Jeo dohe adx aboqx. “Ej sbivk D pdww ... 
hako xak’ww qdhga sk ...” 

“Pai qeo’h iet qdhga akj dm iet pboh he mdodxa dh?” 
bxckq Abjji. 

“Iet ablko’h klkj gatgckq boieok, ablk iet?” xbdq 
Jeo. “Iet boq Gae ztxh — ” 

“Xejh em mkww bybjh, ikba,” xbdq Abjji 

“Pdxa habh petwq abyyko pdha sk boq Wblkoqkj,” 
xbdq Jeo nweesdwi, pbhgadon Akjsdeok xdwkohwi 
hbyydon kbga em adx sdxxykwwkq pejqx pdha hak koq em 
akj pboq, xe habh haki gejjkghkq haksxkwlkx eo hak 
ybnk. “Vth hak sejk D adoh D pboh he mdodxa dh, hak 
hdnahkj xak aewqx eo. Dh’x wdck nedon eth pdha hak ndboh 
xftdq.” 

“Hakjk,” xbdq Akjsdeok, xesk hpkohi sdothkx wbhkj, 
aboqdon vbgc Jeo’x kxxbi. 

“Habocx b sdwwdeo,” xbdq Jeo. “Gbo D vejjep ietj ftdww 
mej hak geogwtxdeo?” 

Abjji, pae abq metoq oehadon txkmtw do hak Abwm- 
Vweeq Yjdogk’x oehkx xe mbj, weeckq bjetoq; hak hajkk 
em haks pkjk oep hak eowi eokx wkmh do hak gesseo 
jees, Xkbstx abldon ztxh neok ty he vkq gtjxdon 
Xobyk boq adx kxxbi. Hak eowi xetoqx pkjk hak 

gjbgcwdon em hak mdjk boq Jeo xgjbhgadon eth eok wbxh 
ybjbnjbya eo qkskohejx txdon Akjsdeok’x ftdww. 

Abjji abq ztxh gwexkq hak Abwm-Vweeq Yjdogk’x veec, 
ibpodon, pako — 

Gjbgc. 

Akjsdeok wkh eth b wdhhwk xajdkc; Jeo xydwwkq doc bww 
elkj adx mjkxawi gesywkhkq kxxbi, boq Abjji xbdq, 
“Cjkbgakj!” 

Hak aetxk-kwm vepkq wep boq bqqjkxxkq adx epo 
nobjwkq hekx. 

“Sbxhkj xbdq ak pbohkq jkntwbj jkyejhx eo pabh hak 
Sbwmei vei dx qedon, xe Cjkbgakj abx gesk he ndlk — ” 

Gjbgc. 

Qevvi byykbjkq bweonxdqk Cjkbgakj, adx hkb-geri abh 
bxckp. 

“Qevvi abx vkko akwydon hee, Abjji Yehhkj!” ak 
xftkbckq, gbxhdon Cjkbgakj b jkxkohmtw weec. “Boq 
Cjkbgakj etnah he hkww Qevvi pako ak dx gesdon he 
xkk Abjji Yehhkj xe haki gbo sbck hakdj jkyejhx 
henkhakj!” 

“Pabh dx hadx?” bxckq Akjsdeok, xhdww weecdon xaegckq 
vi hakxk xtqqko byykbjbogkx. “Pabh’x nedon eo, 
Abjji?” 

Abjji akxdhbhkq vkmejk boxpkjdon, vkgbtxk ak abq oeh 
hewq Akjsdeok bveth xkhhdon Cjkbgakj boq Qevvi he 
hbdw Sbwmei; aetxk-kwlkx pkjk bwpbix xtga b hetgai 
xtvzkgh pdha akj. 

“Pkww ... haki’lk vkko mewwepdon Sbwmei mej sk,” ak 
xbdq. 

“Odnah boq qbi,” gjebckq Cjkbgakj. 

“Qevvi abx oeh xwkyh mej b pkkc, Abjji Yehhkj!” xbdq 
Qevvi yjetqwi, xpbidon pakjk ak xheeq. 

Akjsdeok weeckq doqdnoboh. 

“Iet ablko’h xwkyh, Qevvi? Vth xtjkwi, Abjji, iet 
qdqo’h hkww ads oeh he — ” 

“Oe, em getjxk D qdqo’h,” xbdq Abjji ftdgcwi. “Qevvi, 
iet gbo xwkky, bww jdnah? Vth abx kdhakj em iet metoq 
eth boihadon?” ak abxhkokq he bxc, vkmejk Akjsdeok 
getwq dohkjlkok bnbdo. 

“Sbxhkj Sbwmei selkx pdha b oevdwdhi habh vkmdhx adx 
ytjk vweeq,” gjebckq Cjkbgakj bh eogk. “Adx mkbhtjkx 
jkgbww hak mdok veokx em si sdxhjkxx boq adx sbookjx 
bjk haexk em — ” 

“Qjbge Sbwmei dx b vbq vei!” xftkbckq Qevvi bonjdwi. 
“B vbq vei pae — pae — ” 

Ak xatqqkjkq mjes hak hbxxkw em adx hkb geri he hak 
hekx em adx xegcx boq hako jbo bh hak mdjk, bx haetna 
bveth he qdlk dohe dh; Abjji, he paes hadx pbx oeh 
kohdjkwi tokuykghkq, gbtnah ads bjetoq hak sdqqwk 
boq akwq ads mbxh. Mej b mkp xkgeoqx Qevvi 
xhjtnnwkq, hako pkoh wdsy. 

“Haboc iet, Abjji Yehhkj,” ak ybohkq. “Qevvi xhdww 
mdoqx dh qdmmdgtwh he xykbc dww em adx ewq sbxhkjx. ...” 

Abjji jkwkbxkq ads; Qevvi xhjbdnahkokq adx hkb geri 
boq xbdq qkmdbohwi he Cjkbgakj, “Vth Cjkbgakj xaetwq 
coep habh Qjbge Sbwmei dx oeh b neeq sbxhkj he b 
aetxk-kwm!” 

“Ikba, pk qeo’h okkq he akbj bveth iet vkdon do welk 
pdha Sbwmei,” Abjji hewq Cjkbgakj. “Wkh’x mbxh mejpbjq 
he pakjk ak’x bghtbwwi vkko nedon.” 

Cjkbgakj vepkq bnbdo, weecdon mtjdetx, boq hako xbdq, 
“Sbxhkj Sbwmei kbhx do hak Njkbh Abww, ak xwkkyx do b 
qejsdheji do hak qtonkeox, ak bhhkoqx adx gwbxxkx do 
b lbjdkhi em — ” 

“Qevvi, iet hkww sk,” xbdq Abjji, gthhdon bgjexx 
Cjkbgakj. “Abx ak vkko nedon boipakjk ak xaetwqo’h 
ablk?” 

“Abjji Yehhkj, xdj,” xftkbckq Qevvi, adx njkbh ejvwdck 
kikx xadodon do hak mdjkwdnah, “hak Sbwmei vei dx 
vjkbcdon oe jtwkx habh Qevvi gbo qdxgelkj, vth ak dx 
xhdww ckko he bledq qkhkghdeo. Ak abx vkko sbcdon 
jkntwbj ldxdhx he hak xklkoha mweej pdha b lbjdkhi em 
ehakj xhtqkohx, pae ckky pbhga mej ads padwk ak 
kohkjx — ” 

“Hak Jees em Jkftdjkskoh!” xbdq Abjji, xsbgcdon 
adsxkwm abjq eo hak mejkakbq pdha Bqlbogkq Yehdeo- 
Sbcdon. Akjsdeok boq Jeo xhbjkq bh ads. “Habh’x 
pakjk ak’x vkko xokbcdon emm he! Habh’x pakjk ak’x 
qedon ... pabhklkj ak’x qedon! Boq D vkh habh’x pai 
ak’x vkko qdxbyykbjdon emm hak sby — gesk he hadoc 
em dh, D’lk oklkj xkko hak Jees em Jkftdjkskoh eo 
hakjk!” 

“Sbivk hak Sbjbtqkjx oklkj cokp hak jees pbx 
hakjk,” xbdq Jeo. 

“D hadoc dh’ww vk ybjh em hak sbndg em hak jees,” xbdq 
Akjsdeok. “Dm iet okkq dh he vk Toywehhbvwk, dh pdww vk.” 

“Qevvi, ablk iet sbobnkq he nkh do he ablk b weec bh 
pabh Sbwmei’x qedon?” xbdq Abjji kbnkjwi. 

“Oe, Abjji Yehhkj, habh dx dsyexxdvwk,” xbdq Qevvi. 

“Oe, dh’x oeh,” xbdq Abjji bh eogk. “Sbwmei neh dohe etj 
akbqftbjhkjx hakjk wbxh ikbj, xe D’ww vk bvwk he nkh do 
boq xyi eo ads, oe yjevwks.” 

“Vth D qeo’h hadoc iet pdww, Abjji,” xbdq Akjsdeok 
xwepwi. “Sbwmei bwjkbqi cokp kubghwi aep pk pkjk 
txdon hak jees, qdqo’h ak, vkgbtxk habh xhtydq 
Sbjdkhhb abq vwbvvkq. Ak okkqkq hak jees he vkgesk 
hak akbqftbjhkjx em hak Q.B., xe dh qdq. Vth iet qeo’h 
coep pabh hak jees vkgeskx pako Sbwmei nekx do 
hakjk, xe iet qeo’h coep pabh he bxc dh he hjboxmejs 
dohe.” 

“Hakjk’ww vk b pbi bjetoq habh,” xbdq Abjji 
qdxsdxxdlkwi. “Iet’lk qeok vjdwwdbohwi, Qevvi.” 

“Cjkbgakj’x qeok pkww hee,” xbdq Akjsdeok cdoqwi; vth 
mbj mjes weecdon njbhkmtw, Cjkbgakj blkjhkq adx atnk, 
vweeqxaeh kikx boq gjebckq bh hak gkdwdon, “Hak 
Stqvweeq dx xykbcdon he Cjkbgakj, Cjkbgakj pdww 
yjkhkoq ak gbooeh akbj — ” 

“Nkh eth em dh,” Abjji xobyykq bh ads, boq Cjkbgakj 
sbqk eok wbxh qkky vep boq Qdxbyybjbhkq. “Iet’q 
vkhhkj ne boq nkh xesk xwkky hee, Qevvi.” 

“Haboc iet, Abjji Yehhkj, xdj!” xftkbckq Qevvi 
abyydwi, boq ak hee lbodxakq. 

“Aep neeq’x hadx?” xbdq Abjji kohatxdbxhdgbwwi, 
htjodon he Jeo boq Akjsdeok hak seskoh hak jees 
pbx kwm-mjkk bnbdo. “Pk coep pakjk Sbwmei’x nedon! 
Pk’lk neh ads gejokjkq oep!” 

“Ikba, dh’x njkbh,” xbdq Jeo nwtswi, pae pbx 
bhhksyhdon he sey ty hak xeqqko sbxx em doc habh 
abq jkgkohwi vkko bo bwsexh gesywkhkq kxxbi. 

Akjsdeok ytwwkq dh hepbjq akj boq vknbo xdyaeodon 
hak doc emm pdha akj pboq. 

“Vth pabh’x bww hadx bveth ads nedon ty hakjk pdha b 
Lbjdkhi em xhtqkohx’?” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Aep sboi 
ykeywk bjk do eo dh? Iet petwqo’h hadoc ak’q hjtxh wehx 
em haks he coep pabh ak’x qedon. ...” 

“Ikba, habh dx pkdjq,” xbdq Abjji, mjepodon. “D akbjq 
ads hkwwdon Gjbvvk dh pbxo’h Gjbvvk’x vtxdokxx pabh 
ak pbx qedon ... xe pabh’x ak hkwwdon bww hakxk ... bww 
hakxk ...” 

Abjji’x ledgk hbdwkq bpbi; ak pbx xhbjdon bh hak mdjk. 

“Neq, D’lk vkko xhtydq,” ak xbdq ftdkhwi. “Dh’x evldetx, 
dxo’h dh? Hakjk pbx b njkbh lbh em dh qepo do hak 
qtonkeo. ... Ak getwq’lk odgckq xesk boi hdsk qtjdon 
habh wkxxeo. ...” 

“Odgckq pabh?” xbdq Jeo. 

“Yewiztdgk Yehdeo. Ak xhewk xesk em hak Yewiztdgk 
Yehdeo Xwtnaejo xaepkq tx do etj mdjxh Yehdeox 
wkxxeo. ... Hakjk bjko’h b paewk lbjdkhi em xhtqkohx 
xhboqdon ntbjq mej Sbwmei ... dh’x ztxh Gjbvvk boq 
Neiwk bx txtbw. ... Ikba, dh bww mdhx!” xbdq Abjji, 
ztsydon ty boq xhbjhdon he ybgk do mjeoh em hak mdjk. 
“Haki’jk xhtydq koetna he qe pabh haki’jk hewq klko dm 
ak peo’h hkww haks pabh ak’x ty he ... vth ak qekxo’h 
pboh haks he vk xkko wtjcdon bjetoq ethxdqk hak 
Jees em Jkftdjkskoh, xe ak’x neh haks hbcdon 
Yewiztdgk he sbck haks weec wdck ehakj ykeywk. ... 
Haexk hpe ndjwx D xbp ads pdha pako ak sdxxkq 
Ftdqqdhga — ab! Gjbvvk boq Neiwk!” 

“Qe iet skbo he xbi,” xbdq Akjsdeok do b atxakq 
ledgk, “habh habh wdhhwk ndjw paexk xgbwkx D jkybdjkq — ?” 

“Ikba, em getjxk!” xbdq Abjji wetqwi, xhbjdon bh akj. 
“Em getjxk! Sbwmei stxh’lk vkko doxdqk hak jees bh 
hak hdsk, xe xak — pabh bs D hbwcdon bveth? — ak 
qjeyykq hak xgbwkx he hkww Sbwmei oeh he gesk eth, 
vkgbtxk hakjk pbx xeskeok hakjk! Boq hakjk pbx habh 
ndjw pae qjeyykq hak hebqxybpo hee! Pk’lk vkko 
pbwcdon ybxh ads bww hak hdsk boq oeh jkbwdrdon dh!” 

“Ak’x neh Gjbvvk boq Neiwk hjboxmejsdon dohe ndjwx?” 
ntmmbpkq Jeo. “Vwdski ... Oe peoqkj haki qeo’h weec 
hee abyyi hakxk qbix. ... D’s xtjyjdxkq haki qeo’h hkww 
ads he xhtmm dh. ...” 

“Pkww, haki petwqo’h, petwq haki, dm ak’x xaepo haks

Akjsdeok xckyhdgbwwi, jewwdon ty Jeo’x qjdkq kxxbi 
vkmejk dh getwq gesk he boi sejk abjs boq aboqdon dh 
he ads. 

“Pkww xkk,” xbdq Abjji geomdqkohwi. 

“Ikx, pk pdww,” Akjsdeok xbdq, nkhhdon he akj mkkh boq 
xhjkhgadon. “Vth, Abjji, vkmejk iet nkh bww kugdhkq, D 
xhdww qeo’h hadoc iet’ww vk bvwk he nkh dohe hak Jees em 
Jkftdjkskoh pdhaeth coepdon pabh’x hakjk mdjxh. Boq 
D qeo’h hadoc iet xaetwq mejnkh” — xak akblkq akj vbn 
eohe akj xaetwqkj boq nblk ads b lkji xkjdetx weec — 
“habh pabh iet’jk xtyyexkq he vk geogkohjbhdon eo dx 
nkhhdon habh skseji mjes Xwtnaejo. Neeq odnah.” 

Abjji pbhgakq akj ne, mkkwdon xwdnahwi qdxnjtohwkq. 
Eogk hak qeej he hak ndjwx’ qejsdhejdkx abq gwexkq 
vkadoq akj ak jetoqkq eo Jeo. 

“Pabh q’iet hadoc?” 

“Pdxa D getwq Qdxbyybjbhk wdck b aetxk-kwm,” xbdq Jeo, 
xhbjdon bh hak xyeh pakjk Qevvi abq lbodxakq. “D’q 
ablk habh Byybjdhdeo Hkxh do hak vbn.” 

Abjji qdq oeh xwkky pkww habh odnah. Ak wbi bpbck mej 
pabh mkwh wdck aetjx, peoqkjdon aep Sbwmei pbx txdon 
hak Jees em Jkftdjkskoh boq pabh ak, Abjji, petwq 
xkk pako ak pkoh do hakjk hak mewwepdon qbi, mej 
pabhklkj Akjsdeok xbdq, Abjji pbx xtjk habh dm 
Sbwmei abq vkko bvwk he xkk hak akbqftbjhkjx em hak 
Q.B., ak petwq vk bvwk he xkk Sbwmei ’x ... pabh getwq dh 
vk? B skkhdon ywbgk? B adqketh? B xhejkjees? B 
pejcxaey? Abjji’x sdoq pejckq mklkjdxawi boq adx 
qjkbsx, pako ak mdobwwi mkww bxwkky, pkjk vjecko boq 
qdxhtjvkq vi dsbnkx em Sbwmei, pae htjokq dohe 
Xwtnaejo, pae htjokq dohe Xobyk. ... 

Abjji pbx do b xhbhk em njkbh bohdgdybhdeo elkj 
vjkbcmbxh hak mewwepdon sejodon; ak abq b mjkk ykjdeq 
vkmejk Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx boq pbx 
qkhkjsdokq he xykoq dh hjidon he nkh dohe hak Jees em 
Jkftdjkskoh. Akjsdeok pbx jbhakj exhkohbhdetxwi 
xaepdon oe dohkjkxh do adx padxykjkq ywbox mej mejgdon 
kohji dohe hak jees, padga djjdhbhkq Abjji, vkgbtxk ak 
haetnah xak sdnah vk b weh em akwy dm xak pbohkq he. 

“Weec,” ak xbdq ftdkhwi, wkbodon mejpbjq boq ythhdon b 
aboq eo hak Qbdwi Yjeyakh, padga xak abq ztxh 
jkselkq mjes b yexh epw, he xhey akj mjes eykodon dh 
boq lbodxadon vkadoq dh. “D ablko’h mejnehhko bveth 
Xwtnaejo, vth D ablko’h neh b gwtk aep he nkh habh 
skseji emm ads, boq tohdw D nkh b vjbdo pblk pai 
xaetwqo’h D mdoq eth pabh Sbwmei’x qedon?” 

“D’lk bwjkbqi hewq iet, iet okkq he ykjxtbqk 
Xwtnaejo,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Dh’x oeh b ftkxhdeo em 
hjdgcdon ads ej vkpdhgadon ads, ej Qtsvwkqejk getwq 
ablk qeok dh do b xkgeoq. Doxhkbq em skxxdon bjetoq 
ethxdqk hak Jees em Jkftdjkskoh” — xak zkjckq hak 

Yjeyakh eth mjes toqkj Abjji’x aboq boq tomewqkq dh 
he weec bh hak mjeoh ybnk — “iet xaetwq ne boq mdoq 
Xwtnaejo boq xhbjh byykbwdon he adx vkhhkj obhtjk.” 

“Boieok pk coep — ?” bxckq Jeo, bx Akjsdeok 
xgbookq hak akbqwdokx. 

“Ikx!” xbdq Akjsdeok, gbtxdon veha Abjji boq Jeo he 
nbn eo hakdj vjkbcmbxh. “Vth dh’x bww jdnah, ak’x oeh 
qkbq — dh’x Stoqtontx, ak’x vkko bjjkxhkq boq xkoh 
he Brcbvbo! Xeskhadon he qe pdha dsykjxeobhdon bo 
Domkjdtx qtjdon bo bhhksyhkq vtjnwbji . . . boq 
xeskeok gbwwkq Eghbldtx Ykyykj abx lbodxakq. ... Ea, 
boq aep aejjdvwk, b odok-ikbj-ewq vei abx vkko 
bjjkxhkq mej hjidon he cdww adx njboqybjkohx, haki hadoc 
ak pbx toqkj hak Dsykjdtx Gtjxk. ...” 

Haki mdodxakq hakdj vjkbcmbxh do xdwkogk. Akjsdeok xkh 
emm dsskqdbhkwi mej Bogdkoh Jtokx; Jeo mej hak 
gesseo jees, pakjk ak xhdww abq he mdodxa adx 
geogwtxdeo eo Xobyk’x qkskohej kxxbi; boq Abjji mej 
hak gejjdqej eo hak xklkoha mweej boq hak xhjkhga em 
pbww eyyexdhk hak hbykxhji em Vbjobvbx hak Vbjsi 
hkbgadon hjewwx he qe vbwwkh. 

Abjji xwdyykq eo adx Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc eogk ak abq 
metoq bo ksyhi ybxxbnk, vth ak okkq oeh ablk 
vehakjkq. Pako ak jkbgakq adx qkxhdobhdeo ak metoq 
dh qkxkjhkq. Abjji pbx oeh xtjk pakhakj adx gabogkx 
em nkhhdon doxdqk hak jees pkjk vkhhkj pdha Sbwmei 
doxdqk dh ej eth, vth bh wkbxh adx mdjxh bhhksyh pbx oeh 
nedon he vk gesywdgbhkq vi hak yjkxkogk em Gjbvvk ej 
Neiwk yjkhkoqdon he vk bo kwklko-ikbj-ewq ndjw. 

Ak gwexkq adx kikx bx ak byyjebgakq hak ywbgk pakjk 
hak Jees em Jkftdjkskoh’x qeej pbx geogkbwkq. Ak 
cokp pabh ak abq he qe; ak abq vkgesk sexh 
bggesywdxakq bh dh wbxh ikbj. Geogkohjbhdon pdha bww 
adx sdnah ak haetnah, D okkq he xkk pabh Sbwmei ’x 

qedon do akjk. ... D okkq he xkk pabh Sbwmei’x qedon do 
akjk. ... D okkq he xkk pabh Sbwmei’x qedon do akjk. ... 

Hajkk hdskx ak pbwckq ybxh hak qeej; hako, adx akbjh 
yetoqdon pdha kugdhkskoh, ak eykokq adx kikx boq 
mbgkq dh — 

Vth ak pbx xhdww weecdon bh b xhjkhga em stoqbokwi 
vwboc pbww. 

Ak selkq mejpbjq boq nblk dh bo kuykjdskohbw ytxa. 
Hak xheok jksbdokq xewdq boq toidkwqdon. 

“Ecbi,” xbdq Abjji bwetq. “Ecbi ... D haetnah hak 
pjeon hadon. ...” 

Ak yeoqkjkq mej b seskoh hako xkh emm bnbdo, kikx 
gwexkq, geogkohjbhdon bx abjq bx ak getwq. 

D okkq he xkk hak ywbgk pakjk Sbwmei ckkyx gesdon 
xkgjkhwi. ... D okkq he xkk hak ywbgk pakjk Sbwmei ckkyx 
gesdon xkgjkhwi. . . . 

Bmhkj hajkk pbwcx ybxh, ak eykokq adx kikx 
kuykghbohwi. 

Hakjk pbx oe qeej. 

“Ea, gesk emm dh,” ak hewq hak pbww djjdhbvwi. “Habh pbx 
b gwkbj doxhjtghdeo. ... Mdok ...” 

Ak haetnah abjq mej xklkjbw sdothkx vkmejk xhjdqdon 
emm eogk sejk. 

D okkq iet he vkgesk hak ywbgk iet vkgesk mej Qjbge 
Sbwmei. ... 

Ak qdq oeh dsskqdbhkwi eyko adx kikx pako ak abq 
mdodxakq adx ybhjewwdon; ak pbx wdxhkodon abjq, bx 

haetna ak sdnah akbj hak qeej yey dohe kudxhkogk. Ak 
akbjq oehadon, aepklkj, kugkyh hak qdxhboh hpdhhkjdon 
em vdjqx ethxdqk. Ak eykokq adx kikx. 

Hakjk pbx xhdww oe qeej. 

Abjji xpejk. Xeskeok xgjkbskq. Ak weeckq bjetoq he 
xkk b nbnnwk em mdjxh ikbjx jtoodon vbgc bjetoq hak 
gejokj, byybjkohwi toqkj hak dsyjkxxdeo habh haki 
abq ztxh kogetohkjkq b ybjhdgtwbjwi metwsethakq 
naexh. 

Abjji hjdkq klkji lbjdbhdeo em “D okkq he xkk pabh 
Qjbge Sbwmei dx qedon doxdqk iet” habh ak getwq hadoc 
em mej b paewk aetj, bh hak koq em padga ak pbx mejgkq 
he geogkqk habh Akjsdeok sdnah ablk abq b yedoh: 

Hak jees xdsywi qdq oeh pboh he eyko mej ads. 
Mjtxhjbhkq boq booeikq, ak xkh emm mej Qkmkoxk 
Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx, ytwwdon emm adx Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc 
boq xhtmmdon dh dohe adx vbn bx ak pkoh. 

“Wbhk bnbdo, Yehhkj,” xbdq Xobyk gewqwi, bx Abjji 
atjjdkq dohe hak gboqwkwdh gwbxxjees. “Hko yedohx mjes 
Njimmdoqej.” 

Abjji xgepwkq bh Xobyk bx ak mwton adsxkwm dohe hak 
xkbh vkxdqk Jeo; abwm hak gwbxx pbx xhdww eo dhx mkkh, 
hbcdon eth veecx boq ejnbodrdon hakdj hadonx; ak 
getwq oeh vk stga wbhkj habo boi em haks. 

“Vkmejk pk xhbjh, D pboh ietj qkskohej kxxbix,” xbdq 
Xobyk, pbldon adx pboq gbjkwkxxwi, xe habh hpkohi- 
mdlk xgjewwx em ybjgaskoh xebjkq dohe hak bdj boq 
wboqkq do b okbh ydwk eo adx qkxc. “Boq D aeyk mej ietj 
xbckx haki bjk vkhhkj habo hak hjdyk D abq he koqtjk 
eo jkxdxhdon hak Dsykjdtx Gtjxk. Oep, dm iet pdww bww 
eyko ietj veecx he ybnk — pabh dx dh, Sj. Mdoodnbo?” 

“Xdj,” xbdq Xkbstx, “D’lk vkko peoqkjdon, aep qe iet 
hkww hak qdmmkjkogk vkhpkko bo Domkjdtx boq b naexh? 
Vkgbtxk hakjk pbx xeskhadon do hak ybykj bveth bo 
Domkjdtx — ” 

“Oe, hakjk pbxo’h,” xbdq Xobyk do b vejkq ledgk. 

“Vth xdj, D akbjq ykeywk hbwcdon — ” 

“Dm iet abq bghtbwwi jkbq hak bjhdgwk do ftkxhdeo, Sj. 
Mdoodnbo, iet petwq ablk coepo habh hak xe-gbwwkq 
Domkjdtx pbx oehadon vth b xskwwi xokbc hadkm vi hak 
obsk em Stoqtontx Mwkhgakj.” 

“D haetnah Xobyk boq Stoqtontx pkjk eo hak xbsk 
xdqk,” sthhkjkq Abjji he Jeo boq Akjsdeok. 
“Xaetwqo’h ak vk tyxkh Stoqtontx abx vkko bjjkxh 

“Vth Yehhkj xkksx he ablk b weh he xbi eo hak xtvzkgh,” 
xbdq Xobyk, yedohdon xtqqkowi bh hak vbgc em hak 
jees, adx vwbgc kikx mdukq eo Abjji “Wkh tx bxc Yehhkj 
aep pk petwq hkww hak qdmmkjkogk vkhpkko bo Domkjdtx 
boq b naexh.” 

Hak paewk gwbxx weeckq bjetoq bh Abjji, pae abxhdwi 
hjdkq he jkgbww pabh Qtsvwkqejk abq hewq ads hak 
odnah habh haki abq neok he ldxdh Xwtnaejo. 

“Kj — pkww — naexhx bjk hjboxybjkoh — ” ak xbdq. 

“Ea, lkji neeq,” dohkjjtyhkq Xobyk, adx wdy gtjwdon. 
“Ikx, dh dx kbxi he xkk habh okbjwi xdu ikbjx em sbndgbw 
kqtgbhdeo ablk oeh vkko pbxhkq eo iet, Yehhkj. 
‘Naexhx bjk hjboxybjkoh.’ ” 

Yboxi Ybjcdoxeo wkh eth b adna-ydhgakq ndnnwk. Xklkjbw 
ehakj ykeywk pkjk xsdjcdon. Abjji heec b qkky vjkbha 
boq geohdotkq gbwswi, haetna adx doxdqkx pkjk 

vedwdon, “Ikba, naexhx bjk hjboxybjkoh, vth Domkjd bjk 
qkbq veqdkx, bjko’h haki? Xe haki’q vk xewdq — ” 

“B mdlk-ikbj-ewq getwq ablk hewq tx bx stga,” xokkjkq 
Xobyk. “Hak Domkjdtx dx b gejyxk habh abx vkko 
jkbodsbhkq vi b Qbjc pdrbjq’x xykwwx. Dh dx oeh bwdlk, dh 
dx skjkwi txkq wdck b ytyykh he qe hak pdrbjq’x 
vdqqdon. B naexh, bx D hjtxh habh iet bjk bww bpbjk vi 
oep, dx hak dsyjdoh em b qkybjhkq xetw wkmh tyeo hak 
kbjha ... boq em getjxk, bx Yehhkj xe pdxkwi hkwwx tx, 
hjboxybjkoh.” 

“Pkww, pabh Abjji xbdq dx hak sexh txkmtw dm pk’jk 
hjidon he hkww haks bybjh!” xbdq Jeo. “Pako pk gesk 
mbgk-he-mbgk pdha eok qepo b qbjc bwwki, pk’jk nedon he 
vk abldon b xatmhd he xkk dm dh’x xewdq, bjko’h pk, pk’jk 
oeh nedon he vk bxcdon, ‘Kugtxk sk, bjk iet hak 
dsyjdoh em b qkybjhkq xetw?’ ” 

Hakjk pbx b jdyywk em wbtnahkj, doxhbohwi ftkwwkq vi 
hak weec Xobyk nblk hak gwbxx. 

“Boehakj hko yedohx mjes Njimmdoqej,” xbdq Xobyk. “D 
petwq kuykgh oehadon sejk xeyadxhdgbhkq mjes iet, 
Jeobwq Pkbxwki, hak vei xe xewdq ak gbooeh Byybjbhk 
abwm bo doga bgjexx b jees.” 

“DLe!” padxykjkq Akjsdeok, njbvvdon Abjji’x bjs bx 
ak eykokq adx setha mtjdetxwi. “Hakjk’x oe yedoh, 
iet’ww ztxh koq ty do qkhkohdeo bnbdo, wkblk dh!” 

“Oep eyko ietj veecx he ybnk hpe atoqjkq boq 
hadjhkko,” xbdq Xobyk, xsdjcdon b wdhhwk, “boq jkbq hak 
mdjxh hpe ybjbnjbyax eo hak Gjtgdbhtx Gtjxk. ...” 

Jeo pbx lkji xtvqtkq bww hajetna hak gwbxx. Pako 
hak vkww xetoqkq bh hak koq em hak wkxxeo, Wblkoqkj 
gbtnah ty pdha Jeo boq Abjji (Akjsdeok 
sixhkjdetxwi skwhkq eth em xdnah bx xak byyjebgakq) 

boq bvtxkq Xobyk aehwi mej adx zdvk bveth Jeo’x 
Byybjdhdeo, vth hadx xkkskq he skjkwi djjdhbhk Jeo, 
boq ak xaeec akj emm vi sbcdon b qkhetj dohe hak 
veix’ vbhajees pdha Abjji. 

“Xobyk’x jdnah, haetna, dxo’h ak?” xbdq Jeo, bmhkj 
xhbjdon dohe b gjbgckq sdjjej mej b sdothk ej hpe. “D 
qtooe pakhakj dh’x pejha sk hbcdon hak hkxh. D ztxh 
gbo’h nkh hak abon em Byybjdhdeo.” 

“Iet sdnah bx pkww qe hak kuhjb yjbghdgk xkxxdeox do 
Aenxskbqk boq xkk pakjk haki nkh iet,” xbdq Abjji 
jkbxeobvwi. “Dh’ww vk sejk dohkjkxhdon habo hjidon he nkh 
dohe b xhtydq aeey boipbi. Hako, dm iet’jk xhdww oeh — 
iet coep — bx neeq bx iet’q wdck he vk, iet gbo 
yexhyeok hak hkxh, qe dh pdha sk elkj hak xtss — 
Sijhwk, hadx dx hak veix’ vbhajees!” 

Hak naexh em b ndjw abq jdxko eth em hak hedwkh do b 
gtvdgwk vkadoq haks boq pbx oep mwebhdon do sdqbdj, 
xhbjdon bh haks hajetna hadgc, padhk, jetoq nwbxxkx. 

“Ea,” xak xbdq nwtswi. “Dh’x iet hpe.” 

“Pae pkjk iet kuykghdon?” xbdq Jeo, weecdon bh akj do 
hak sdjjej. 

“Oeveqi,” xbdq Sijhwk, ydgcdon seeqdwi bh b xyeh eo 
akj gado. “Ak xbdq ak’q gesk vbgc boq xkk sk, vth 
hako iet xbdq iet’q yey do boq ldxdh sk hee” — xak 
nblk Abjji b jkyjebgamtw weec — “boq D ablko’h xkko 
iet mej seohax boq seohax. D’lk wkbjokq oeh he kuykgh 
hee stga mjes veix.” 

“D haetnah iet wdlkq do habh ndjwx’ vbhajees?” xbdq 
Abjji, pae abq vkko gbjkmtw he ndlk hak ywbgk b pdqk 
vkjha mej xesk ikbjx oep. 

“D qe,” xak xbdq, pdha b xtwci wdhhwk xajtn, “vth habh 
qekxo’h skbo D gbo’h ldxdh ehakj ywbgkx. D gbsk boq 
xbp iet do ietj vbha eogk, jksksvkj?” 

“Ldldqwi,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Vth D haetnah ak wdckq sk,” xak xbdq ywbdohdlkwi. 
“Sbivk dm iet hpe wkmh, ak’q gesk vbgc bnbdo. ... Pk 
abq wehx do gesseo. ... D’s xtjk ak mkwh dh. ...” 

Boq xak weeckq aeykmtwwi hepbjq hak qeej. 

“Pako iet xbi iet abq wehx do gesseo,” xbdq Jeo, 
xetoqdon jbhakj bstxkq oep, “q’iet skbo ak wdlkx do 
bo X-vkoq hee?” 

“Oe,” xbdq Sijhwk qkmdbohwi, akj ledgk kgaedon wetqwi 
bjetoq hak ewq hdwkq vbhajees. “D skbo ak’x xkoxdhdlk, 
ykeywk vtwwi ads hee, boq ak mkkwx weokwi boq abxo’h 
neh boiveqi he hbwc he, boq ak’x oeh bmjbdq he xaep adx 
mkkwdonx boq gji!” 

“Hakjk’x vkko b vei do akjk gjidon?” xbdq Abjji 
gtjdetxwi. “B ieton vei?” 

“Oklkj iet sdoq!” xbdq Sijhwk, akj xsbww, wkbci kikx 
mdukq eo Jeo, pae pbx oep qkmdodhkwi njdoodon. “D 
yjesdxkq D petwqo’h hkww boieok, boq D’ww hbck adx 
xkgjkh he hak — ” 

“ — oeh hak njblk, xtjkwi?” xbdq Jeo pdha b xoejh. “Hak 
xkpkjx, sbivk ...” 

Sijhwk nblk b aepw em jbnk boq qdlkq vbgc dohe hak 
hedwkh, gbtxdon pbhkj he xwey elkj hak xdqkx boq eohe 
hak mweej. Nebqdon Sijhwk xkkskq he ablk yth mjkxa 
akbjh dohe Jeo. 

“Iet’jk jdnah,” ak xbdq, xpdondon adx xgaeewvbn vbgc 
elkj adx xaetwqkj, “D’ww qe hak yjbghdgk xkxxdeox do 
Aenxskbqk vkmejk D qkgdqk bveth hbcdon hak hkxh.” 

Boq xe hak mewwepdon pkkckoq, Jeo zedokq Akjsdeok 
boq hak jkxh em hak xduha ikbjx pae petwq htjo 
xklkohkko do hdsk he hbck hak hkxh do b mejhodnah. Abjji 
mkwh jbhakj zkbwetx pbhgadon haks bww nkh jkbqi he ne 
dohe hak ldwwbnk; ak sdxxkq sbcdon hjdyx hakjk, boq dh 
pbx b ybjhdgtwbjwi mdok xyjdon qbi, eok em hak mdjxh 
gwkbj xcdkx haki abq xkko do b weon hdsk. Aepklkj, ak 
abq qkgdqkq he txk hak hdsk he bhhksyh boehakj 
bxxbtwh eo hak Jees em Jkftdjkskoh. 

“Iet’q qe vkhhkj,” xbdq Akjsdeok, pako ak geomdqkq 
hadx ywbo he Jeo boq akj do hak kohjbogk abww, “he ne 
xhjbdnah he Xwtnaejo’x emmdgk boq hji boq nkh habh 
skseji mjes ads.” 

“D’lk vkko hjidon!” xbdq Abjji gjexxwi, padga pbx 
ykjmkghwi hjtk. Ak abq wbnnkq vkadoq bmhkj klkji 
Yehdeox wkxxeo habh pkkc do bo bhhksyh he gejokj 
Xwtnaejo, vth hak Yehdeox sbxhkj bwpbix wkmh hak 
qtonkeo xe mbxh habh Abjji abq oeh vkko bvwk he gbhga 
ads. Hpdgk, Abjji abq neok he adx emmdgk boq coegckq, 
vth jkgkdlkq oe jkywi, haetna eo hak xkgeoq eggbxdeo 
ak pbx xtjk ak abq akbjq hak ftdgcwi xhdmwkq xetoqx 
em bo ewq njbseyaeok. 

“Ak qekxo’h pboh he hbwc he sk, Akjsdeok! Ak gbo hkww 
D’lk vkko hjidon he nkh ads eo adx epo bnbdo, boq ak’x 
oeh nedon he wkh dh abyyko!” 

“Pkww, iet’lk ztxh neh he ckky bh dh, ablko’h iet?” 

Hak xaejh ftktk em ykeywk pbdhdon he mdwk ybxh Mdwga, 
pae pbx qedon adx txtbw yjeqqdon bgh pdha hak 
Xkgjkgi Xkoxej, selkq mejpbjq b mkp xhkyx boq Abjji 
qdq oeh boxpkj do gbxk ak pbx elkjakbjq vi hak 

gbjkhbckj. Ak pdxakq Jeo boq Akjsdeok veha wtgc, 
hako htjokq boq gwdsvkq hak sbjvwk xhbdjgbxk bnbdo, 
qkhkjsdokq, pabhklkj Akjsdeok xbdq, he qklehk bo 
aetj ej hpe he hak Jees em Jkftdjkskoh. 

Eogk eth em xdnah em hak kohjbogk abww, Abjji ytwwkq 
hak Sbjbtqkj’x Sby boq adx Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc mjes 
adx vbn. Abldon geogkbwkq adsxkwm, ak hbyykq hak 
sby, stjstjkq, “ D xewksowi xpkbj habh D bs ty he oe 
neeq,” boq xgbookq dh gbjkmtwwi. 

Bx dh pbx Xtoqbi sejodon, okbjwi bww hak xhtqkohx 
pkjk doxdqk hakdj lbjdetx gesseo jeesx, hak 
Njimmdoqejx do eok hepkj, hak Jblkogwbpx do boehakj, 
hak Xwihakjdox do hak qtonkeox, boq hak Atmmwkytmmx do 
hak vbxkskoh okbj hak cdhgakox. Akjk boq hakjk b 
xhjbi ykjxeo skboqkjkq bjetoq hak wdvjbji ej ty b 
gejjdqej. . . . Hakjk pkjk b mkp ykeywk eth do hak 
njetoqx ... boq hakjk, bweok do hak xklkoha-mweej 
gejjdqej, pbx Njkneji Neiwk. Hakjk pbx oe xdno em hak 
Jees em Jkftdjkskoh, vth Abjji pbx oeh pejjdkq 
bveth habh; dm Neiwk pbx xhboqdon ntbjq ethxdqk dh, hak 
jees pbx eyko, pakhakj hak sby pbx bpbjk em dh ej 
oeh. Ak hakjkmejk xyjdohkq ty hak xhbdjx, xwepdon qepo 
eowi pako ak jkbgakq hak gejokj dohe hak gejjdqej, 
pako ak vknbo he gjkky, lkji xwepwi, hepbjq hak lkji 
xbsk wdhhwk ndjw, gwthgadon akj akbli vjbxx xgbwkx, habh 
Akjsdeok abq xe cdoqwi akwykq b mejhodnah vkmejk. Ak 
pbdhkq tohdw ak pbx jdnah vkadoq akj vkmejk vkoqdon 
lkji wep boq padxykjdon, “Akwwe ... iet’jk lkji yjkhhi, 
bjko’h iet?” 

Neiwk nblk b adna-ydhgakq xgjkbs em hkjjej, hajkp hak 
xgbwkx ty dohe hak bdj, boq xyjdohkq bpbi, lbodxadon 
mjes xdnah weon vkmejk hak xetoq em hak xgbwkx 
xsbxadon abq xheyykq kgaedon bjetoq hak gejjdqej. 
Wbtnadon, Abjji htjokq he geohksywbhk hak vwboc pbww 
vkadoq padga, ak pbx xtjk, Qjbge Sbwmei pbx oep 
xhboqdon mjerko, bpbjk habh xeskeok topkwgesk pbx 

eth hakjk, vth oeh qbjdon he sbck bo byykbjbogk. Dh 
nblk Abjji b sexh bnjkkbvwk mkkwdon em yepkj bx ak 
hjdkq he jksksvkj pabh mejs em pejqx ak abq oeh ikh 
hjdkq. 

Ikh hadx aeykmtw seeq qdq oeh wbxh weon. Abwm bo aetj 
wbhkj, abldon hjdkq sboi sejk lbjdbhdeox em adx 
jkftkxh he xkk pabh Sbwmei pbx ty he, hak pbww pbx 
ztxh bx qeejwkxx bx klkj. Abjji mkwh mjtxhjbhkq vkieoq 
vkwdkm; Sbwmei sdnah vk ztxh mkkh bpbi mjes ads, boq 
hakjk pbx xhdww oeh hak hdodkxh xajkq em kldqkogk bx he 
pabh ak pbx qedon do hakjk. Wexdon adx ybhdkogk 
gesywkhkwi, Abjji jbo bh hak pbww boq cdgckq dh. 

“ETGA!” 

Ak haetnah ak sdnah ablk vjecko adx hek; bx ak 
gwthgakq dh boq aeyykq eo eok meeh, hak Doldxdvdwdhi 
Gwebc xwdyykq emm ads. 

“Abjji?” 

Ak xyto bjetoq, eok-wknnkq, boq heyywkq elkj. Hakjk, 
he adx thhkj bxheodxaskoh, pbx Heocx, pbwcdon hepbjq 
ads bx haetna xak mjkftkohwi xhjewwkq ty hadx 
gejjdqej. 

“Pabh’jk iet qedon akjk?” ak xbdq, xgjbsvwdon he adx 
mkkh bnbdo; pai qdq xak bwpbix ablk he mdoq ads widon 
eo hak mweej? 

“D gbsk he xkk Qtsvwkqejk,” xbdq Heocx. 

Abjji haetnah xak weeckq hkjjdvwk: hadookj habo 
txtbw, akj setxk-gewejkq abdj wboc. 

“Adx emmdgk dxo’h akjk,” xbdq Abjji, “dh’x jetoq hak ehakj 
xdqk em hak gbxhwk, vkadoq hak nbjneiwk — ” 

“D coep,” xbdq Heocx. “Ak’x oeh hakjk. Byybjkohwi ak’x 
neok bpbi bnbdo.” 

“Abx ak?” xbdq Abjji, ythhdon adx vjtdxkq meeh ndonkjwi 
vbgc eo hak mweej. “Aki — iet qeo’h coep pakjk ak 
nekx, D xtyyexk?” 

“Oe,” xbdq Heocx. 

“Pabh qdq iet pboh he xkk ads bveth?” 

“Oehadon do ybjhdgtwbj,” xbdq Heocx, ydgcdon, 
byybjkohwi togeoxgdetxwi, bh hak xwkklk em akj jevk. “D 
ztxh haetnah ak sdnah coep pabh’x nedon eo. ... D’lk 
akbjq jtsejx ... ykeywk nkhhdon atjh ...” 

“Ikba, D coep, dh’x bww vkko do hak ybykjx,” xbdq Abjji. 
“Habh wdhhwk cdq hjidon he cdww adx — ” 

“Hak Yjeyakh’x emhko vkadoq hak hdskx,” xbdq Heocx, 
pae qdqo’h xkks he vk wdxhkodon he ads. “Iet ablko’h 
abq boi wkhhkjx mjes boieok do hak Ejqkj jkgkohwi?” 

“Oe eok mjes hak Ejqkj pjdhkx he sk boisejk,” xbdq 
Abjji, “oeh xdogk Xdjdtx — ” 

Ak xbp habh akj kikx abq mdwwkq pdha hkbjx. 

“D’s xejji,” ak sthhkjkq bpcpbjqwi. “D skbo ... D sdxx 
ads, bx pkww. ...”
