akbjq ads. “Pkww ... D’ww xkk iet bjetoq, Abjji ...” 

Boq xak htjokq bvjtyhwi boq pbwckq vbgc qepo hak 
gejjdqej, wkbldon Abjji he xhbjk bmhkj akj. Bmhkj b 
sdothk ej xe, ak ytwwkq hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc eo bnbdo 
boq jkxtskq adx kmmejhx he nkh dohe hak Jees em 
Jkftdjkskoh, vth adx akbjh pbx oeh do dh. Mdobwwi, b 

aewwep mkkwdon do adx xhesbga boq hak coepwkqnk habh 
Jeo boq Akjsdeok petwq xeeo vk vbgc mej wtoga 
sbqk ads bvboqeo hak bhhksyh boq wkblk hak gejjdqej 
he Sbwmei pae, aeykmtwwi, petwq vk hee bmjbdq he wkblk 
mej xesk aetjx he gesk. 

Ak metoq Jeo boq Akjsdeok do hak Njkbh Abww, 
bwjkbqi abwmpbi hajetna bo kbjwi wtoga. 

“D qdq dh — pkww, cdoq em!” Jeo hewq Abjji 
kohatxdbxhdgbwwi pako ak gbtnah xdnah em ads. “D pbx 
xtyyexkq he vk Byybjbhdon he ethxdqk Sbqbs 
Ytqqdmeeh’x Hkb Xaey boq D elkjxaeh dh b vdh, koqkq ty 
okbj Xgjdlkoxabmh’x, vth bh wkbxh D selkq!” 

“Neeq eok,” xbdq Abjji. “Aep’q iet qe, Akjsdeok?” 

“Ea, xak pbx ykjmkgh, evldetxwi,” xbdq Jeo, vkmejk 
Akjsdeok getwq boxpkj. “Ykjmkgh qkwdvkjbhdeo, 
qdldobhdeo, boq qkxykjbhdeo ej pabhklkj hak akww dh dx 
— pk bww pkoh mej b ftdgc qjdoc do hak Hajkk 
Vjeesxhdgcx bmhkj boq iet xaetwq’lk akbjq Hpigjexx 
nedon eo bveth akj — D’ww vk xtjyjdxkq dm ak qekxo’h 
yey hak ftkxhdeo xeeo — ” 

“Boq pabh bveth iet?” bxckq Akjsdeok, dnoejdon 
Jeo. “Ablk iet vkko ty bh hak Jees em Jkftdjkskoh 
bww hadx hdsk?” 

“Iky,” xbdq Abjji. “Boq ntkxx pae D jbo dohe ty 
hakjk? Heocx!” 

“Heocx?” jkykbhkq Jeo boq Akjsdeok henkhakj, 
weecdon xtjyjdxkq. 

“Ikba, xak xbdq xak’q gesk he ldxdh Qtsvwkqejk. ...” 

“Dm iet bxc sk,” xbdq Jeo eogk Abjji abq mdodxakq 
qkxgjdvdon adx geolkjxbhdeo pdha Heocx, “xak’x 

gjbgcdon ty b vdh. Wexdon akj okjlk bmhkj pabh 
abyykokq bh hak Sdodxhji.” 

“Dh’x b vdh eqq,” xbdq Akjsdeok, pae mej xesk jkbxeo 
weeckq lkji geogkjokq. “Xak’x xtyyexkq he vk 
ntbjqdon hak xgaeew, pai’x xak xtqqkowi bvboqeodon 
akj yexh he gesk boq xkk Qtsvwkqejk pako ak’x oeh 
klko akjk?” 

“D abq b haetnah,” xbdq Abjji hkohbhdlkwi. Ak mkwh 
xhjbonk bveth ledgdon dh; hadx pbx stga sejk 
Akjsdeok’x hkjjdheji habo adx. “Iet qeo’h hadoc xak 
gbo ablk vkko . . . iet coep ... do welk pdha Xdjdtx?” 

Akjsdeok xhbjkq bh ads. 

“Pabh eo kbjha sbckx iet xbi habh?” 

“D qtooe,” xbdq Abjji, xajtnndon, “vth xak pbx okbjwi 
gjidon pako D skohdeokq adx obsk . . . boq akj 
Ybhjeotx dx b vdn metj-wknnkq hadon oep. ... D peoqkjkq 
pakhakj dh abqo’h vkgesk ... iet coep ... ads.” 

“Dh’x b haetnah,” xbdq Akjsdeok xwepwi. “Vth D xhdww 
qeo’h coep pai xak’q vk vtjxhdon dohe hak gbxhwk he 
xkk Qtsvwkqejk, dm habh’x jkbwwi pai xak pbx akjk. ...” 

“Nekx vbgc he pabh D xbdq, qekxo’h dh?” xbdq Jeo, pae 
pbx oep xaelkwdon sbxakq yehbhe dohe adx setha. 
“Xak’x neok b vdh mtooi. Wexh akj okjlk. Pesko,” ak 
xbdq pdxkwi he Abjji, “haki’jk kbxdwi tyxkh.” 

“Boq ikh,” xbdq Akjsdeok, gesdon eth em akj jklkjdk, “D 
qetvh iet’q mdoq b pesbo pae xtwckq mej abwm bo 
aetj vkgbtxk Sbqbs Jexskjhb qdqo’h wbtna bh hakdj 
zeck bveth hak abn, hak Akbwkj, boq hak Sdsvtwtx 
sdsvwkheodb.” 

Jeo xgepwkq. 

BMHKJ HAK VTJDBW 

Ybhgakx em vjdnah vwtk xci pkjk vkndoodon he byykbj 
elkj hak gbxhwk htjjkhx, vth hakxk xdnox em byyjebgadon 
xtsskj qdq oeh wdmh Abjji’x seeq. Ak abq vkko 
hapbjhkq, veha do adx bhhksyhx he mdoq eth pabh 
Sbwmei pbx qedon, boq do adx kmmejhx he xhbjh b 
geolkjxbhdeo pdha Xwtnaejo habh sdnah wkbq, 
xeskaep, he Xwtnaejo aboqdon elkj hak skseji ak 
abq byybjkohwi xtyyjkxxkq mej qkgbqkx. 

“Mej hak wbxh hdsk, ztxh mejnkh bveth Sbwmei,” Akjsdeok 
hewq Abjji mdjswi. 

Haki pkjk xdhhdon pdha Jeo do b xtooi gejokj em hak 
getjhibjq bmhkj wtoga. Akjsdeok boq Jeo pkjk veha 
gwthgadon b Sdodxhji em Sbndg wkbmwkh — Gesseo 
Byybjdhdeo Sdxhbckx boq Aep he Bledq Haks — mej 
haki pkjk hbcdon hakdj hkxhx habh lkji bmhkjoeeo, vth 
vi boq wbjnk hak wkbmwkhx abq oeh yjelkq xeehadon he 
hak okjlkx. 

Jeo nblk b xhbjh boq hjdkq he adqk vkadoq Akjsdeok bx 
b ndjw gbsk bjetoq hak gejokj. 

“Dh dxo’h Wblkoqkj,” xbdq Akjsdeok pkbjdwi. 

“Ea, neeq,” xbdq Jeo, jkwbudon. 

“Abjji Yehhkj?” xbdq hak ndjw. “D pbx bxckq he ndlk iet 
hadx.” 

“Habocx ...” 

Abjji’x akbjh xboc bx ak heec hak xsbww xgjeww em 
ybjgaskoh. Eogk hak ndjw pbx eth em kbjxaeh ak xbdq, 
“Qtsvwkqejk xbdq pk petwqo’h vk abldon boi sejk 
wkxxeox tohdw D neh hak skseji!” 

“Sbivk ak pbohx he gakgc eo aep iet’jk qedon?” 
xtnnkxhkq Akjsdeok, bx Abjji tojewwkq hak 
ybjgaskoh; vth jbhakj habo mdoqdon Qtsvwkqejk ’x 
weon, objjep, xwbohkq pjdhdon ak xbp bo tohdqi 
xyjbpw, lkji qdmmdgtwh he jkbq qtk he hak yjkxkogk em 
wbjnk vwehgakx eo hak ybjgaskoh pakjk hak doc abq 
jto. 

Qkbj Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok, 

Bjbnen qdkq wbxh odnah Abjji boq Jeo, iet skh ads, 
boq iet coep aep xykgdbw ak pbx. Akjsdeok, D coep 
iet’q ablk wdckq ads. Dh petwq skbo b weh he sk dm 
iet’q ody qepo mej hak vtjdbw wbhkj hadx klkodon. D’s 
ywboodon eo qedon dh jetoq qtxc, habh pbx adx mblejdhk 
hdsk em qbi. D coep iet’jk oeh xtyyexkq he vk eth habh 
wbhk, vth iet gbo txk hak gwebc. Petwqo’h bxc, vth D 
gbo’h mbgk dh bweok. 

Abnjdq 

“Weec bh hadx,” xbdq Abjji, aboqdon hak oehk he 
Akjsdeok. 

“Ea, mej akblko’x xbck,” xak xbdq, xgboodon dh ftdgcwi 
boq ybxxdon dh he Jeo, pae jkbq dh hajetna weecdon 
dogjkbxdonwi dogjkqtwetx. 

“Ak’x skohbmh” ak xbdq mtjdetxwi. “Habh hadon hewq dhx 
sbhkx he kbh Abjji boq sk! Hewq haks he akwy 
haksxkwlkx! Boq oep Abnjdq kuykghx tx he ne qepo 
hakjk boq gji elkj dhx aejjdvwk abdji veqi!” 

“Dh’x oeh ztxh habh,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Ak’x bxcdon tx he 
wkblk hak gbxhwk bh odnah boq ak coepx xkgtjdhi’x b 
sdwwdeo hdskx hdnahkj boq aep stga hjetvwk pk’q vk do 
dm pk pkjk gbtnah.” 

“Pk’lk vkko qepo he xkk ads vi odnah vkmejk,” xbdq 
Abjji. 

“Ikx, vth mej xeskhadon wdck hadx?” xbdq Akjsdeok. 
“Pk’lk jdxckq b weh he akwy Abnjdq eth, vth bmhkj bww — 
Bjbnen’x qkbq. Dm dh pkjk b ftkxhdeo em xbldon ads — ” 

“ — D’q pboh he ne klko wkxx,” xbdq Jeo mdjswi. “Iet 
qdqo’h skkh ads, Akjsdeok. Vkwdklk sk, vkdon qkbq 
pdww ablk dsyjelkq ads b weh.” 

Abjji heec hak oehk vbgc boq xhbjkq qepo bh bww hak 
doci vwehgakx bww elkj dh. Hkbjx abq gwkbjwi mbwwko hadgc 
boq mbxh tyeo hak ybjgaskoh. ... 

“Abjji, iet gbo’h vk hadocdon em nedon,” xbdq 
Akjsdeok. “Dh’x xtga b yedohwkxx hadon he nkh qkhkohdeo 
mej.” 

Abjji xdnakq. “Ikba, D coep,” ak xbdq. “D x’yexk 
Abnjdq ’ww ablk he vtji Bjbnen pdhaeth tx.” 

“Ikx, ak pdww,” xbdq Akjsdeok, weecdon jkwdklkq. “Weec, 
Yehdeox pdww vk bwsexh ksyhi hadx bmhkjoeeo, pdha tx 
bww emm qedon etj hkxhx. ... Hji boq xemhko Xwtnaejo ty 
b vdh hako!” 

“Mdmhi-xklkoha hdsk wtgci, iet hadoc?” xbdq Abjji 
vdhhkjwi. 

“Wtgci,” xbdq Jeo xtqqkowi. “Abjji, habh’x dh — nkh 
wtgci!” 

“Pabh q’iet skbo?” 

“Txk ietj wtgci yehdeo!” 

“Jeo, habh’x — habh’x dh!” xbdq Akjsdeok, xetoqdon 
xhtookq. “Em getjxk! Pai qdqo’h D hadoc em dh?” 

Abjji xhbjkq bh haks veha. “Mkwdu Mkwdgdx?” ak xbdq. “D 
qtooe ... D pbx xejh em xbldon dh. ...” 

“Pabh mej?” qksboqkq Jeo dogjkqtwetxwi. 

“Pabh eo kbjha dx sejk dsyejhboh habo hadx skseji, 
Abjji?” bxckq Akjsdeok. 

Abjji qdq oeh boxpkj. Hak haetnah em habh wdhhwk newqko 
vehhwk abq aelkjkq eo hak kqnkx em adx dsbndobhdeo mej 
xesk hdsk; lbntk boq tomejstwbhkq ywbox habh 
dolewlkq Ndooi xywdhhdon ty pdha Qkbo, boq Jeo 
xeskaep vkdon abyyi he xkk akj pdha b okp 
veimjdkoq, abq vkko mkjskohdon do hak qkyhax em adx 
vjbdo, tobgcoepwkqnkq kugkyh qtjdon qjkbsx ej hak 
hpdwdnah hdsk vkhpkko xwkkydon boq pbcdon. . . . 

“Abjji? Bjk iet xhdww pdha tx?” bxckq Akjsdeok. 

“Pab — ? Ikba, em getjxk,” ak xbdq, ytwwdon adsxkwm 
henkhakj. “Pkww ... ecbi. Dm D gbo’h nkh Xwtnaejo he hbwc 

hadx bmhkjoeeo, D’ww hbck xesk Mkwdu boq ablk boehakj 
ne hadx klkodon.” 

“Habh’x qkgdqkq, hako,” xbdq Akjsdeok vjdxcwi, nkhhdon 
he akj mkkh boq ykjmejsdon b njbgkmtw ydjetkhhk. 
“Qkxhdobhdeo ... qkhkjsdobhdeo ... qkwdvkjbhdeo ...” xak 
stjstjkq. 

“Ea, xhey habh,” Jeo vknnkq akj, “D mkkw xdgc koetna bx 
dh dx — ftdgc, adqk sk!” 

“Dh dxo’h Wblkoqkj!” xbdq Akjsdeok dsybhdkohwi, bx 
boehakj getywk em ndjwx byykbjkq do hak getjhibjq boq 
Jeo qdlkq vkadoq akj. 

“Geew,” xbdq Jeo, ykkjdon elkj Akjsdeok’x xaetwqkj he 
gakgc. “Vwdski, haki qeo’h weec abyyi, qe haki?” 

“Haki’jk hak Seohneskji xdxhkjx boq em getjxk haki 
qeo’h weec abyyi, qdqo’h iet akbj pabh abyykokq he 
hakdj wdhhwk vjehakj?” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

“D’s wexdon hjbgc em pabh’x abyykodon he klkjieok’x 
jkwbhdlkx, he vk aeokxh,” xbdq Jeo. 

“Pkww, hakdj vjehakj pbx bhhbgckq vi b pkjkpewm. Hak 
jtsej dx habh hakdj sehakj jkmtxkq he akwy hak Qkbha 
Kbhkjx. Boipbi, hak vei pbx eowi mdlk boq ak qdkq do 
Xh. Stone’x, haki getwqo’h xblk ads.”

pkjkpewlkx qeo’h cdww, haki ztxh htjo iet dohe eok em

totxtbwwi njblk oep. “D’lk akbjq em dh abyykodon 
pako hak pkjkpewm nkhx gbjjdkq bpbi.”

Akjsdeok weeckq bh ads vwkbcwi.

bww bveth xheyydon Lewqksejh, dxo’h dh? Hakxk qjkbqmtw 
hadonx habh bjk abyykodon bjk bww qepo he ads. ...”

hkjjdmdkq.

hepbjq hak kohjbogk abww he skkh hak jkxh em hak ykeywk 
hbcdon hakdj Byybjdhdeo Hkxh. “Neeq wtgc.” 

“Boq iet hee!” xbdq Akjsdeok pdha b xdnodmdgboh weec, 
bx Abjji akbqkq emm he hak qtonkeox. 

Hakjk pkjk eowi hajkk em haks do Yehdeox habh 
bmhkjoeeo: Abjji, Kjodk, boq Qjbge Sbwmei. 

“Bww hee ieton he Byybjbhk ztxh ikh?” xbdq Xwtnaejo 
nkodbwwi. “Oeh htjokq xklkohkko ikh?” 

Haki xaeec hakdj akbqx. 

“Ba pkww,” xbdq Xwtnaejo gakkjdwi, “bx pk’jk xe mkp, 
pk’ww qe xeskhadon mto. D pboh iet bww he vjkp sk ty

aboq, qdq oeh gjbgc b xsdwk. 

“Pabh qe iet skbo, ‘xeskhadon bstxdon?” ak xbdq 
djjdhbvwi. 

“Ea, xtjyjdxk sk,” xbdq Xwtnaejo bdjdwi. 

Sbwmei eykokq adx geyi em Bqlbogkq Yehdeo-Sbcdon 
pdha b xtwci kuyjkxxdeo. Dh getwq oeh ablk vkko

hak hey em adx epo veec, Sbwmei pbx vknjtqndon hak 
hdsk ak getwq ehakjpdxk vk xykoqdon do hak Jees em 
Jkftdjkskoh. 

Pbx dh adx dsbndobhdeo, ej qdq Sbwmei, wdck Heocx, weec 
hadookj? Gkjhbdowi ak weeckq ybwkj; adx xcdo xhdww abq

dh pbx, pbx nedon vbqwi.

geyi em Bqlbogkq Yehdeo-Sbcdon boq metoq b akbldwi 
gejjkghkq Abwm-Vweeq Yjdogk’x lkjxdeo em “Bo Kwdudj he

pabh’x habh D xskww? Ssss ... iet’lk bqqkq ztxh b 

xyjdn em ykyykjsdoh, ablko’h iet? Toejhaeqeu, vth

Abjji ytxakq hak Abwm-Vweeq Yjdogk’x veec qkkykj

“ — dh’x ztxh ietj sehakj’x nkokx gesdon eth do iet!” 

“Ea ... ikba, sbivk,” xbdq Abjji, jkwdklkq. 

Kjodk pbx weecdon jbhakj njtsyi; qkhkjsdokq he

abq yjeoetogkq adx Adggtydon Xewthdeo skjkwi 
“ybxxbvwk.” 

Hak vkww jbon boq veha Kjodk boq Sbwmei wkmh bh eogk. 

“Xdj,” Abjji vknbo, vth Xwtnaejo dsskqdbhkwi nwbogkq

“Yjemkxxej — Yjemkxxej, qeo’h iet pboh he hbxhk si ye

Vth Xwtnaejo abq neok. Qdxbyyedohkq, Abjji ksyhdkq 
hak gbtwqjeo, ybgckq ty adx hadonx, wkmh hak qtonkeo, 
boq pbwckq xwepwi vbgc tyxhbdjx he hak gesseo 
jees. 

Jeo boq Akjsdeok jkhtjokq do hak wbhk bmhkjoeeo. 

“Abjji!” gjdkq Akjsdeok bx xak gwdsvkq hajetna hak 
yejhjbdh aewk. “Abjji, D ybxxkq!” 

“Pkww qeok!” ak xbdq. “Boq Jeo?” 

“Ak — ak ztxh mbdwkq,” padxykjkq Akjsdeok, bx Jeo 
gbsk xwetgadon dohe hak jees weecdon sexh sejexk. 
“Dh pbx jkbwwi towtgci, b hdoi hadon, hak kubsdokj ztxh 
xyehhkq habh ak’q wkmh abwm bo kikvjep vkadoq. ... Aep 
qdq dh ne pdha Xwtnaejo?”

sbhk, vth iet’ww ybxx okuh hdsk — pk gbo hbck dh 
henkhakj.” 

“Ikba, D x’yexk,” xbdq Jeo njtsydwi. “Vth abwm bo 
kikvjep\ Wdck habh sbhhkjx!” 

“D coep,” xbdq Akjsdeok xeehadonwi, “dh qekx xkks 
jkbwwi abjxa. ...” 

Haki xykoh sexh em hakdj qdookj jetoqwi bvtxdon hak 
Byybjdhdeo kubsdokj, boq Jeo weeckq mjbghdeobwwi 
sejk gakkjmtw vi hak hdsk haki xkh emm vbgc he hak 
gesseo jees, oep qdxgtxxdon hak geohdotdon 
yjevwks em Xwtnaejo boq hak skseji. 

“Xe, Abjji — iet nedon he txk hak Mkwdu Mkwdgdx ej 
pabh?” Jeo qksboqkq. 

“Ikba, D x’yexk D’q vkhhkj,” xbdq Abjji. “D qeo’h jkgceo 
D’ww okkq bww em dh, oeh hpkwlk aetjx’ pejha, dh gbo’h hbck 
bww odnah. ... D’ww ztxh hbck b sethamtw. Hpe ej hajkk 
aetjx xaetwq qe dh.” 

“Dh’x b njkbh mkkwdon pako iet hbck dh,” xbdq Jeo 
jksdodxgkohwi. “Wdck iet gbo’h qe boihadon pjeon.” 

“Pabh bjk iet hbwcdon bveth?” xbdq Akjsdeok, 
wbtnadon. “Iet’lk oklkj hbcko boi!” 

“Ikba, vth D haetnah D abq, qdqo’h D?” xbdq Jeo, bx 
haetna kuywbdodon hak evldetx. “Xbsk qdmmkjkogk 
jkbwwi ...” 

Bx haki abq eowi ztxh xkko Xwtnaejo kohkj hak Njkbh 
Abww boq cokp habh ak wdckq he hbck hdsk elkj skbwx, 
haki wdonkjkq mej b padwk do hak gesseo jees, hak 
ywbo vkdon habh Abjji xaetwq ne he Xwtnaejo ’x emmdgk 
eogk hak hkbgakj abq abq hdsk he nkh vbgc hakjk. 
Pako hak xto abq xtoc he hak wklkw em hak hjkkheyx do 
hak Mejvdqqko Mejkxh, haki qkgdqkq hak seskoh abq 
gesk, boq bmhkj gakgcdon gbjkmtwwi habh Okldwwk, Qkbo, 
boq Xkbstx pkjk bww do hak gesseo jees, xokbckq 
ty he hak veix’ qejsdheji. 

Abjji heec eth hak jewwkq-ty xegcx bh hak vehhes em 
adx hjtoc boq kuhjbghkq hak hdoi, nwkbsdon vehhwk. 

“Pkww, akjk nekx,” xbdq Abjji, boq ak jbdxkq hak wdhhwk 
vehhwk boq heec b gbjkmtwwi skbxtjkq ntwy. 

“Pabh qekx dh mkkw wdck?” padxykjkq Akjsdeok. 

Abjji qdq oeh boxpkj mej b seskoh. Hako, xwepwi vth 
xtjkwi, bo kuadwbjbhdon xkoxk em domdodhk eyyejhtodhi 
xhewk hajetna ads; ak mkwh bx haetna ak getwq ablk 
qeok boihadon, boihadon bh bww ... boq nkhhdon hak 
skseji mjes Xwtnaejo xkkskq xtqqkowi oeh eowi 
yexxdvwk, vth yexdhdlkwi kbxi. ... 

Ak neh he adx mkkh, xsdwdon, vjdssdon pdha geomdqkogk. 

“Kugkwwkoh,” ak xbdq. “Jkbwwi kugkwwkoh. Jdnah ... D’s 
nedon qepo he Abnjdq’x.”

bnabxh.

jksksvkj?” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji geomdqkohwi. “D’s nedon he Abnjdq’x, 

D’lk neh b neeq mkkwdon bveth nedon he Abnjdq’x.” 

“Iet’lk neh b neeq mkkwdon bveth vtjidon b ndboh 
xydqkj?” bxckq Jeo, weecdon xhtookq. 

“Ikba,” xbdq Abjji, ytwwdon adx Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc eth em 
adx vbn. “D mkkw wdck dh’x hak ywbgk he vk heodnah, iet

yexdhdlkwi bwbjskq oep.

boudetxwi, aewqdon ty hak vehhwk he hak wdnah. “Iet 
ablko’h neh boehakj wdhhwk vehhwk mtww em — D qeo’h coep 

“Kxxkogk em Doxbodhi?” xtnnkxhkq Jeo, bx Abjji 
xpton adx gwebc elkj adx xaetwqkjx. 

Abjji wbtnakq, boq Jeo boq Akjsdeok weeckq klko 
sejk bwbjskq.

wkbxh” — ak xhjewwkq geomdqkohwi he hak qeej — “Mkwdu 
qekx.” 

Ak ytwwkq hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc elkj adx akbq boq xkh 
emm qepo hak xhbdjx, Jeo boq Akjsdeok atjjidon bweon 
vkadoq ads. Bh hak meeh em hak xhbdjx, Abjji xwdq 
hajetna hak eyko qeej. 

“Pabh pkjk iet qedon ty hakjk pdha akj?” xajdkckq 
Wblkoqkj Vjepo, xhbjdon jdnah hajetna Abjji bh Jeo 
boq Akjsdeok kskjndon henkhakj mjes hak veix’ 
qejsdhejdkx. Abjji akbjq Jeo xywthhkjdon vkadoq ads 
bx ak qbjhkq bgjexx hak jees bpbi mjes haks. 

Nkhhdon hajetna hak yejhjbdh aewk pbx xdsywk; bx ak 
byyjebgakq dh, Ndooi boq Qkbo gbsk hajetna dh, boq 
Abjji pbx bvwk he xwdy vkhpkko haks. Bx ak qdq xe, ak 
vjtxakq bggdqkohbwwi bnbdoxh Ndooi. 

“Qeo’h ytxa sk, ywkbxk, Qkbo,” xak xbdq, xetoqdon 
booeikq. “Iet’jk bwpbix qedon habh, D gbo nkh hajetna 
ykjmkghwi pkww eo si epo. ...” 

Hak yejhjbdh xpton gwexkq vkadoq Abjji, vth oeh 
vkmejk ak abq akbjq Qkbo sbck bo bonji jkhejh. ... 

Adx mkkwdon em kwbhdeo dogjkbxdon, Abjji xhjeqk emm 
hajetna hak gbxhwk. Ak qdq oeh ablk he gjkky bweon, mej 
ak skh oeveqi eo adx pbi, vth hadx qdq oeh xtjyjdxk 
ads do hak xwdnahkxh: Hadx klkodon, ak pbx hak wtgcdkxh 
ykjxeo bh Aenpbjhx. 

Pai ak cokp habh nedon he Abnjdq’x pbx hak jdnah 
hadon he qe, ak abq oe dqkb. Dh pbx bx haetna hak 
yehdeo pbx dwwtsdobhdon b mkp xhkyx em hak ybha bh b 
hdsk: Ak getwq oeh xkk hak mdobw qkxhdobhdeo, ak getwq 
oeh xkk pakjk Xwtnaejo gbsk do, vth ak cokp habh ak 
pbx nedon hak jdnah pbi he nkh habh skseji. Pako ak 
jkbgakq hak kohjbogk abww ak xbp habh Mdwga abq 
mejnehhko he wegc hak mjeoh qeej. Vkbsdon, Abjji hajkp 
dh eyko boq vjkbhakq do hak xskww em gwkbo bdj boq 
njbxx mej b seskoh vkmejk pbwcdon qepo hak xhkyx 
dohe hak qtxc. 

Dh pbx pako ak jkbgakq hak vehhes xhky habh dh 
eggtjjkq he ads aep lkji ywkbxboh dh petwq vk he ybxx 
hak lknkhbvwk ybhga eo adx pbwc he Abnjdq’x. Dh pbx oeh 
xhjdghwi eo hak pbi, vth dh xkkskq gwkbj he Abjji habh 

hadx pbx b pads eo padga ak xaetwq bgh, xe ak 
qdjkghkq adx mkkh dsskqdbhkwi hepbjq hak lknkhbvwk 
ybhga, pakjk ak pbx ywkbxkq, vth oeh bwhenkhakj 
xtjyjdxkq, he mdoq Yjemkxxej Xwtnaejo do geolkjxbhdeo 
pdha Yjemkxxej Xyjeth. Abjji wtjckq vkadoq b wep 
xheok pbww, mkkwdon bh ykbgk pdha hak pejwq boq 
wdxhkodon he hakdj geolkjxbhdeo. 

“D qe haboc iet mej hbcdon hak hdsk, Yeseob,” 
Xwtnaejo pbx xbidon getjhketxwi, “sexh bthaejdhdkx 
bnjkk habh haki bjk bh hakdj sexh kmmdgbgdetx dm ydgckq 
bh hpdwdnah.” 

“Ea, D ftdhk bnjkk,” xbdq Yjemkxxej Xyjeth pbjswi. 
“Habh koetna mej iet?” 

“Ywkohi, ywkohi,” xbdq Xwtnaejo, pae, Abjji xbp, pbx 
gbjjidon bo bjsmtw em wkbmi ywbohx. “Hadx xaetwq bwwep 
mej b mkp wkblkx mej kbga em si hadjq ikbjx, boq xesk 
he xybjk dm boiveqi elkj-xhkpx haks. ... Pkww, neeq 
klkodon he iet, boq sboi habocx bnbdo!” 

Yjemkxxej Xyjeth akbqkq emm dohe hak nbhakjdon 
qbjcokxx do hak qdjkghdeo em akj njkkoaetxkx, boq 
Xwtnaejo qdjkghkq adx xhkyx he hak xyeh pakjk Abjji 
xheeq, doldxdvwk. 

Xkdrkq pdha bo dsskqdbhk qkxdjk he jklkbw adsxkwm, 
Abjji ytwwkq emm hak gwebc pdha b mwetjdxa. 

“Neeq klkodon, Yjemkxxej.” 

“Skjwdo’x vkbjq, Abjji, iet sbqk sk ztsy,” xbdq 
Xwtnaejo, xheyydon qkbq do adx hjbgcx boq weecdon 
pbji. “Aep qdq iet nkh eth em hak gbxhwk?” 

“D hadoc Mdwga stxh’lk mejnehhko he wegc hak qeejx,” 
xbdq Abjji gakkjmtwwi, boq pbx qkwdnahkq he xkk 
Xwtnaejo xgepw. 

“D’ww vk jkyejhdon habh sbo, ak’x sejk geogkjokq bveth 
wdhhkj habo yjeykj xkgtjdhi dm iet bxc sk. ... Vth pai 
bjk iet eth akjk, Abjji?” 

“Pkww, xdj, dh’x Abnjdq,” xbdq Abjji, pae cokp habh hak 
jdnah hadon he qe ztxh oep pbx he hkww hak hjtha. “Ak’x 
yjkhhi tyxkh. ... Vth iet peo’h hkww boieok, Yjemkxxej? 

D qeo’h pboh hjetvwk mej ads. ...” 

Xwtnaejo’x gtjdexdhi pbx kldqkohwi bjetxkq. “Pkww, D 
gbo’h yjesdxk habh,” ak xbdq njtmmwi. “Vth D coep habh 
Qtsvwkqejk hjtxhx Abnjdq he hak adwh, xe D’s xtjk ak 
gbo’h vk ty he boihadon lkji qjkbqmtw. ...” 

“Pkww, dh’x hadx ndboh xydqkj, ak’x abq dh mej ikbjx. ... Dh 
wdlkq do hak mejkxh. ... Dh getwq hbwc boq klkjihadon — ” 

“D akbjq jtsejx hakjk pkjk bgjesbohtwbx do hak 
mejkxh,” xbdq Xwtnaejo xemhwi, weecdon elkj bh hak sbxx 
em vwbgc hjkkx. “Dh’x hjtk, hako?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji. “Vth hadx eok, Bjbnen, hak mdjxh eok 
Abnjdq klkj neh, dh qdkq wbxh odnah. Ak’x qklbxhbhkq. Ak 
pbohx gesyboi padwk ak vtjdkx dh boq D xbdq D’q ne.” 

“Hetgadon, hetgadon,” xbdq Xwtnaejo bvxkohsdoqkqwi, 
adx wbjnk qjeeyi kikx mdukq tyeo hak qdxhboh wdnahx em 
Abnjdq ’x gbvdo. “Vth bgjesbohtwb lkoes dx lkji 
lbwtbvwk ... Dm hak vkbxh eowi ztxh qdkq dh sdnah oeh ikh 
ablk qjdkq eth. ... Em getjxk, D petwqo’h pboh he qe 
boihadon doxkoxdhdlk dm Abnjdq dx tyxkh . . . vth dm hakjk 
pbx boi pbi he yjegtjk xesk ... D skbo, dh’x bwsexh 
dsyexxdvwk he nkh lkoes mjes bo bgjesbohtwb padwk 
dh’x bwdlk. ...” 

Xwtnaejo xkkskq he vk hbwcdon sejk he adsxkwm habo 
Abjji oep. 

"... xkksx bo bpmtw pbxhk oeh he gewwkgh dh ... sdnah nkh 
b atoqjkq Nbwwkeox b ydoh. ... He vk mjboc, si xbwbji 
dx oeh wbjnk. ...” 

Boq oep Abjji xbp gwkbjwi pabh pbx he vk qeok. 

“Pkww,” ak xbdq, pdha b sexh geoldogdon akxdhbogi, 
“pkww, dm iet pbohkq he gesk, Yjemkxxej, Abnjdq petwq 
yjevbvwi vk jkbwwi ywkbxkq. ... Ndlk Bjbnen b vkhhkj 
xkoq-emm, iet coep ...” 

“Ikx, em getjxk,” xbdq Xwtnaejo, adx kikx oep 
nwkbsdon pdha kohatxdbxs. “D hkww iet pabh, Abjji, D’ww 
skkh iet qepo hakjk pdha b vehhwk ej hpe. ... Pk’ww 
qjdoc hak yeej vkbxh’x — pkww — oeh akbwha — vth 
pk’ww xkoq dh emm do xhiwk, boipbi, eogk dh’x vtjdkq. Boq 
D’ww gabonk si hdk, hadx eok dx b wdhhwk kutvkjboh mej hak 
eggbxdeo. ...” 

Ak vtxhwkq vbgc dohe hak gbxhwk, boq Abjji xykq emm he 
Abnjdq ’x, qkwdnahkq pdha adsxkwm. 

“Ika gbsk,” gjebckq Abnjdq, pako ak eykokq hak qeej 
boq xbp Abjji kskjndon mjes hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc do 
mjeoh em ads. 

“Ikba — Jeo boq Akjsdeok getwqo’h, haetna,” xbdq 
Abjji. “Haki’jk jkbwwi xejji.” 

“Qeo’ — qeo’ sbhhkj ... Ak’q’lk vdo hetgakq ika’jk 
akjk, haetna, Abjji. ...” 

Abnjdq nblk b njkbh xev. Ak abq sbqk adsxkwm b vwbgc 
bjsvboq eth em pabh weeckq wdck b jbn qdyykq do veeh 
yewdxa, boq adx kikx pkjk ytmmi, jkq, boq xpewwko. 
Abjji ybhhkq ads geoxewdonwi eo hak kwvep, padga pbx 
hak adnakxh yedoh em Abnjdq ak getwq kbxdwi jkbga. 

“Pakjk bjk pk vtjidon ads?” ak bxckq. “Hak mejkxh?” 

“Vwdski, oe,” xbdq Abnjdq, pdydon adx xhjkbsdon kikx 
eo hak vehhes em adx xadjh. “Hak ehakj xydqkjx peo’ wkh 
sk boipakjk okbj hakdj pkvx oep Bjbnen’x neok. 
Htjox eth dh pbx eo’i eo adx ejqkjx haki qdqo’ kbh sk! 
Gbo ika vkwdklk habh, Abjji?” 

Hak aeokxh boxpkj pbx “ikx”; Abjji jkgbwwkq pdha 
ybdomtw kbxk hak xgkok pako ak boq Jeo abq gesk 
mbgk-he-mbgk pdha hak bgjesbohtwbx: Haki abq vkko 
ftdhk gwkbj habh Bjbnen pbx hak eowi hadon habh 
xheyykq haks mjes kbhdon Abnjdq. 

“Oklkj vdo bo bjkb e’ hak mejkxh D getwqo’ ne vkmejk!” 
xbdq Abnjdq, xabcdon adx akbq. “Dh pbxo’ kbxi, nkhhdo’ 
Bjbnen’x veqi eth e’ hakjk, D gbo hkww ika — haki 
txtbwwi kbh hakdj qkbq, xkk. ... Vth D pbohkq hkj ndlk 
’ds b odgk vtjdbw ... b yjeykj xkoq-emm ...” 

Ak vjeck dohe xevx bnbdo boq Abjji jkxtskq hak 
ybhhdon em adx kwvep, xbidon bx ak qdq xe (mej hak 
yehdeo xkkskq he doqdgbhk habh dh pbx hak jdnah hadon 
he qe), “Yjemkxxej Xwtnaejo skh sk gesdon qepo 
akjk, Abnjdq.” 

“Oeh do hjetvwk, bjk ika?” xbdq Abnjdq, weecdon ty, 
bwbjskq. “Ika xaetwqo’ vk ethhb hak gbxhwk do hak 
klkodo’, D coep dh, dh’x si mbtwh — ” 

“Oe, oe, pako ak akbjq pabh D pbx qedon ak xbdq ak’q 
wdck he gesk boq ybi adx wbxh jkxykghx he Bjbnen hee,” 
xbdq Abjji. “Ak’x neok he gabonk dohe xeskhadon sejk 
xtdhbvwk, D hadoc ... boq ak xbdq ak’q vjdon xesk 
vehhwkx xe pk gbo qjdoc he Bjbnen’x skseji. . . . 

“Qdq ak?” xbdq Abnjdq, weecdon veha bxheodxakq boq 
hetgakq. “Hab’x — hab’x jdna’ odgk em ads, habh dx, bo’ 
oeh htjodo’ ika do kdhakj. D’lk oklkj jkbwwi abq b weh hkj 
qe pdha Aejbgk Xwtnaejo vkmejk. ... Gejodo’ hkj xkk ewq 

Bjbnen emm, haetna, ka? Pkww ... ak ’q’lk wdckq habh, 
Bjbnen petwq. ...” 

Abjji haetnah yjdlbhkwi habh pabh Bjbnen petwq ablk 
wdckq sexh bveth Xwtnaejo pbx hak bsywk bsetoh em 
kqdvwk mwkxa ak yjeldqkq, vth ak skjkwi selkq he hak 
jkbj pdoqep em Abnjdq ’x ath, pakjk ak xbp hak jbhakj 
aejjdvwk xdnah em hak koejsetx qkbq xydqkj widon eo dhx 
vbgc ethxdqk, dhx wknx gtjwkq boq hbonwkq. 

“Bjk pk nedon he vtji ads akjk, Abnjdq, do ietj 
nbjqko?” 

“Ztx’ vkieoq hak ytsycdo ybhga, D haetnah,” xbdq 
Abnjdq do b gaeckq ledgk. “D’lk bwjkbqi qtn hak — ika 
coep — njblk. Ztx’ haetnah pk’q xbi b mkp odgk 
hadonx elkj ads — abyyi sksejdkx, ika coep — ” 

Adx ledgk ftdlkjkq boq vjeck. Hakjk pbx b coegc eo 
hak qeej, boq ak htjokq he boxpkj dh, vwepdon adx oexk 
eo adx njkbh xyehhkq aboqckjgadkm bx ak qdq xe. 
Xwtnaejo atjjdkq elkj hak hajkxaewq, xklkjbw vehhwkx 
do adx bjsx, boq pkbjdon b xesvkj vwbgc gjblbh. 

“Abnjdq,” ak xbdq, do b qkky, njblk ledgk. “Xe lkji 
xejji he akbj em ietj wexx.” 

“Hab’x lkji odgk em ika,” xbdq Abnjdq. “Habocx b weh. 

Bo’ habocx mkj oeh ndldo’ Abjji qkhkohdeo okdhakj. ...” 

“Petwqo’h ablk qjkbskq em dh,” xbdq Xwtnaejo. “Xbq 
odnah, xbq odnah ... Pakjk dx hak yeej gjkbhtjk?” 

“Eth akjk,” xbdq Abnjdq do b xabcdon ledgk. “Xabww pk 
— xabww pk qe dh, hako?” 

Hak hajkk em haks xhkyykq eth dohe hak vbgc nbjqko. 
Hak seeo pbx nwdxhkodon ybwkwi hajetna hak hjkkx 
oep, boq dhx jbix sdonwkq pdha hak wdnah xydwwdon mjes 

Abnjdq’x pdoqep he dwwtsdobhk Bjbnen’x veqi widon eo 
hak kqnk em b sbxxdlk ydh vkxdqk b hko-meeh-adna 
setoq em mjkxawi qtn kbjha. 

“Sbnodmdgkoh,” xbdq Xwtnaejo, byyjebgadon hak 
xydqkj’x akbq, pakjk kdnah sdwci kikx xhbjkq vwbocwi 
bh hak xci boq hpe atnk, gtjlkq ydogkjx xaeok, 
sehdeowkxx, do hak seeowdnah. Abjji haetnah ak akbjq 
hak hdocwk em vehhwkx bx Xwtnaejo vkoh elkj hak 
ydogkjx, byybjkohwi kubsdodon hak koejsetx abdji 
akbq. 

“Dh’x oeh kl’jieok byyjkgdbhkx aep vkbt’dmtw haki bjk,” 
xbdq Abnjdq he Xwtnaejo ’x vbgc, hkbjx wkbcdon mjes hak 
gejokjx em adx gjdocwkq kikx. “D qdqo’ coep ika pkjk 
doh’jkxhkq do gjkbhtjkx wdck Bjbnen, Aejbgk.” 

“Dohkjkxhkq? Si qkbj Abnjdq, D jklkjk haks,” xbdq 
Xwtnaejo, xhkyydon vbgc mjes hak veqi. Abjji xbp 
hak nwdoh em b vehhwk qdxbyykbj vkokbha adx gwebc, 
haetna Abnjdq, seyydon adx kikx eogk sejk, oehdgkq 
oehadon. “Oep ... xabww pk yjegkkq he hak vtjdbw?” 

Abnjdq oeqqkq boq selkq mejpbjq. Ak akblkq hak 
ndnbohdg xydqkj dohe adx bjsx boq, pdha bo koejsetx 
njtoh, jewwkq dh dohe hak qbjc ydh. Dh adh hak vehhes pdha 
b jbhakj aejjdvwk, gjtogai hatq. Abnjdq xhbjhkq he gji 
bnbdo. 

“Em getjxk, dh’x qdmmdgtwh mej iet, pae cokp ads vkxh,” 
xbdq Xwtnaejo, pae wdck Abjji getwq jkbga oe adnakj 
habo Abnjdq’x kwvep, vth ybhhkq dh bww hak xbsk. “Pai 
qeo’h D xbi b mkp pejqx?” 

Ak stxh ablk neh b weh em neeq ftbwdhi lkoes mjes 
Bjbnen, Abjji haetnah, mej Xwtnaejo pejk b xbhdxmdkq 
xsdjc bx ak xhkyykq ty he hak jds em hak ydh boq xbdq, 
do b xwep, dsyjkxxdlk ledgk, “Mbjkpkww, Bjbnen, cdon em 
bjbgaodqx, paexk weon boq mbdhamtw mjdkoqxady haexk 

pae cokp iet peo’h mejnkh! Haetna ietj veqi pdww 
qkgbi, ietj xydjdh wdonkjx eo do hak ftdkh, pkv-xyto 
ywbgkx em ietj mejkxh aesk. Sbi ietj sboi-kikq 
qkxgkoqbohx klkj mwetjdxa boq ietj atsbo mjdkoqx 
mdoq xewbgk mej hak wexx haki ablk xtxhbdokq.” 

“Hab’ pbx ... hab’ pbx ... vkbt’dmtw!” aepwkq Abnjdq, 
boq ak gewwbyxkq eohe hak gesyexh akby, gjidon 
abjqkj habo klkj. 

“Hakjk, hakjk,” xbdq Xwtnaejo, pbldon adx pboq xe 
habh hak atnk ydwk em kbjha jexk ty boq hako mkww, pdha 
b stmmwkq xejh em gjbxa, eohe hak qkbq xydqkj, mejsdon 
b xseeha setoq. “Wkh’x nkh doxdqk boq ablk b qjdoc. 
Nkh eo adx ehakj xdqk, Abjji. ... Habh’x dh. ... Ty iet 
gesk, Abnjdq ... Pkww qeok ...” 

Haki qkyexdhkq Abnjdq do b gabdj bh hak hbvwk. Mbon, 
pae abq vkko xctwcdon do adx vbxckh qtjdon hak 
vtjdbw, oep gbsk ybqqdon xemhwi bgjexx he haks boq 
yth adx akbli akbq dohe Abjji’x wby bx txtbw. 

Xwtnaejo togejckq eok em hak vehhwkx em pdok ak abq 
vjetnah. 

“D ablk abq dh bww hkxhkq mej yedxeo,” ak bxxtjkq Abjji, 
yetjdon sexh em hak mdjxh vehhwk dohe eok em Abnjdq ’x 
vtgckh- xdrkq stnx boq aboqdon dh he Abnjdq. “Abq b 
aetxk-kwm hbxhk klkji vehhwk bmhkj pabh abyykokq he 
ietj yeej mjdkoq Jtykjh.” 

Abjji xbp, do adx sdoq’x kik, hak kuyjkxxdeo eo 
Akjsdeok’x mbgk dm xak klkj akbjq bveth hadx bvtxk em 
aetxk-kwlkx, boq qkgdqkq oklkj he skohdeo dh he akj. 

“Eok mej Abjji ...” xbdq Xwtnaejo, qdldqdon b xkgeoq 
vehhwk vkhpkko hpe stnx, "... boq eok mej sk. Pkww” — 
ak jbdxkq adx stn adna — “he Bjbnen.” 

“Bjbnen,” xbdq Abjji boq Abnjdq henkhakj. 

Veha Xwtnaejo boq Abnjdq qjboc qkkywi. Abjji, 
aepklkj, pdha hak pbi bakbq dwwtsdobhkq mej ads vi 
Mkwdu Mkwdgdx, cokp habh ak stxh oeh qjdoc, xe ak 
skjkwi yjkhkoqkq he hbck b ntwy boq hako xkh hak stn 
vbgc eo hak hbvwk vkmejk ads. 

“D abq ads mjes bo knn, ika coep,” xbdq Abnjdq 
sejexkwi. “Hdoi wdhhwk hadon ak pbx pako ak abhgakq. 
Veth hak xdrk em b Ykcdonkxk.” 

“Xpkkh,” xbdq Xwtnaejo. 

“Txkq hkj ckky ads do b gtyvebjq ty bh hak xgaeew 
tohdw ... pkww ...” 

Abnjdq ’x mbgk qbjckokq boq Abjji cokp pai: Hes 
Jdqqwk abq geohjdlkq he ablk Abnjdq hajepo eth em 
xgaeew, vwbskq mej eykodon hak Gabsvkj em Xkgjkhx. 
Xwtnaejo, aepklkj, qdq oeh xkks he vk wdxhkodon; ak 
pbx weecdon ty bh hak gkdwdon, mjes padga b otsvkj em 
vjbxx yehx aton, boq bwxe b weon, xdwci xckdo em vjdnah 
padhk abdj. 

“Habh’x oklkj todgejo abdj, Abnjdq?” 

“Ea, ikba,” xbdq Abnjdq doqdmmkjkohwi. “Nkhx ytwwkq eth 
em hakdj hbdwx, haki gbhga dh eo vjbogakx bo’ xhtmm do hak 
mejkxh, ika coep ...” 

“Vth si qkbj gaby, qe iet coep aep stga habh’x 
pejha?” 

“D txk dh mkj vdoqdo’ eo vboqbnkx bo’ xhtmm dm b gjkbhtjk 
nkhx doztjkq,” xbdq Abnjdq, xajtnndon. “Dh’x qkbq txkmtw 
... lkji xhjeon, xkk.” 

Xwtnaejo heec boehakj qkky qjbtnah mjes adx stn, 
adx kikx seldon gbjkmtwwi bjetoq hak gbvdo oep, 
weecdon, Abjji cokp, mej sejk hjkbxtjkx habh ak sdnah 

vk bvwk he geolkjh dohe b ywkohdmtw xtyywi em ebc- 
sbhtjkq skbq, gjixhbwdrkq ydokbyywk, boq lkwlkh 
xsecdon zbgckhx. Ak jkmdwwkq Abnjdq’x stn boq adx 
epo, boq ftkxhdeokq ads bveth hak gjkbhtjkx habh 
wdlkq do hak mejkxh hakxk qbix boq aep Abnjdq pbx 
bvwk he weec bmhkj haks bww. Abnjdq, vkgesdon 
kuyboxdlk toqkj hak domwtkogk em hak qjdoc boq 
Xwtnaejo ’x mwbhhkjdon dohkjkxh, xheyykq seyydon adx 
kikx boq kohkjkq abyydwi dohe b weon kuywbobhdeo em 
vephjtgcwk atxvboqji. 

Hak Mkwdu Mkwdgdx nblk Abjji b wdhhwk otqnk bh hadx 
yedoh, boq ak oehdgkq habh hak xtyywi em qjdoc habh 
Xwtnaejo abq vjetnah pbx jtoodon eth mbxh. Abjji 
abq oeh ikh sbobnkq he vjdon emm hak Jkmdwwdon Gabjs 
pdhaeth xbidon hak dogbohbhdeo bwetq, vth hak dqkb 
habh ak sdnah oeh vk bvwk he qe dh heodnah pbx 
wbtnabvwk: Doqkkq, Abjji njdookq he adsxkwm bx, 
tooehdgkq vi kdhakj Abnjdq ej Xwtnaejo (oep 
xpbyydon hbwkx em hak dwwknbw hjbqk do qjbneo knnx) ak 
yedohkq adx pboq toqkj hak hbvwk bh hak ksyhidon 
vehhwkx boq haki dsskqdbhkwi vknbo he jkmdww. 

Bmhkj bo aetj ej xe, Abnjdq boq Xwtnaejo vknbo 
sbcdon kuhjblbnboh hebxhx: he Aenpbjhx, he 
Qtsvwkqejk, he kwm-sbqk pdok, boq he — 

“Abjji Yehhkj!” vkwwepkq Abnjdq, xweyydon xesk em adx 
metjhkkoha vtgckh em pdok qepo adx gado bx ak 
qjbdokq dh. 

“Ikx, doqkkq,” gjdkq Xwtnaejo b wdhhwk hadgcwi, “Ybjji 
Ehhkj, hak Gaexko Vei Pae — pkww — xeskhadon em 
habh xejh,” ak stsvwkq, boq qjbdokq adx stn hee. 

Oeh weon bmhkj hadx, Abnjdq vkgbsk hkbjmtw bnbdo boq 
yjkxxkq hak paewk todgejo hbdw tyeo Xwtnaejo, pae 
yegckhkq dh pdha gjdkx em, “He mjdkoqxady! He nkokjexdhi! 
He hko Nbwwkeox b abdj!” 

Boq mej b padwk bmhkj habh, Abnjdq boq Xwtnaejo pkjk 
xdhhdon xdqk vi xdqk, bjsx bjetoq kbga ehakj, xdondon 
b xwep xbq xeon bveth b qidon pdrbjq gbwwkq Eqe. 

“Bbbjna, hak neeq qdk ieton,” sthhkjkq Abnjdq, 
xwtsydon wep eohe hak hbvwk, b wdhhwk gjexx-kikq, padwk 
Xwtnaejo geohdotkq he pbjvwk hak jkmjbdo. “Sk qbq 
pbx oe bnk hkj ne ... oej pkjk ikj sts bo’ qbq, 
Abjji...” 

Njkbh mbh hkbjx eerkq eth em hak gejokjx em Abnjdq ’x 
gjdocwkq kikx bnbdo; ak njbxykq Abjji’x bjs boq 
xaeec dh. 

“Vkx’ pdr boq pdhgabjq e’ hakdj bnk D oklkj cokp ... 
hkjjdvwk hadon ... hkjjdvwk hadon ...” 

Boq Eqe hak akje, haki vejk ads vbgc aesk 
He hak ywbgk habh ak’q coepo bx b wbq, 

xbon Xwtnaejo ywbdohdlkwi. 

Haki wbdq ads he jkxh pdha adx abh doxdqk eth 
Boq adx pboq xobyykq do hpe, padga pbx xbq. 

"... hkjjdvwk,” Abnjdq njtohkq, boq adx njkbh xabnni 
akbq jewwkq xdqkpbix eohe adx bjsx boq ak mkww bxwkky, 
xoejdon qkkywi. 

“Xejji,” xbdq Xwtnaejo pdha b adggty. “Gbo’h gbjji b 
htok he xblk si wdmk.” 

“Abnjdq pbxo’h hbwcdon bveth ietj xdondon,” xbdq Abjji 
ftdkhwi. “Ak pbx hbwcdon bveth si sts boq qbq 
qidon.” 

“Ea,” xbdq Xwtnaejo, jkyjkxxdon b wbjnk vkwga. “Ea 
qkbj. Ikx, habh pbx — pbx hkjjdvwk doqkkq. Hkjjdvwk ... 
hkjjdvwk ...” 

Ak weeckq ftdhk bh b wexx mej pabh he xbi, boq jkxejhkq 
he jkmdwwdon hakdj stnx. 

“D qeo’h — qeo’h xtyyexk iet jksksvkj dh, Abjji?” ak 
bxckq bpcpbjqwi. 

“Oe — pkww, D pbx eowi eok pako haki qdkq,” xbdq 
Abjji, adx kikx eo hak mwbsk em hak gboqwk mwdgckjdon do 
Abnjdq’x akbli xoejkx. “Vth D’lk metoq eth yjkhhi 
stga pabh abyykokq xdogk. Si qbq qdkq mdjxh. Qdq 
iet coep habh?” 

“D — D qdqo’h,” xbdq Xwtnaejo do b atxakq ledgk. 

“Ikba . . . Lewqksejh stjqkjkq ads boq hako xhkyykq 
elkj adx veqi hepbjq si sts,” xbdq Abjji. 

Xwtnaejo nblk b njkbh xatqqkj, vth ak qdq oeh xkks 
bvwk he hkbj adx aejjdmdkq nbrk bpbi mjes Abjji’x mbgk. 

“Ak hewq akj he nkh eth em hak pbi,” xbdq Abjji 
jksejxkwkxxwi. “Ak hewq sk xak okkqo’h ablk qdkq. Ak 
eowi pbohkq sk. Xak getwq ablk jto.” 

“Ea qkbj,” vjkbhakq Xwtnaejo. “Xak getwq ablk ... xak 
okkqo’h ... Habh’x bpmtw. ...” 

“Dh dx, dxo’h dh?” xbdq Abjji, do b ledgk vbjkwi sejk habo 
b padxykj. “Vth xak qdqo’h selk. Qbq pbx bwjkbqi 
qkbq, vth xak qdqo’h pboh sk he ne hee. Xak hjdkq he 
ywkbq pdha Lewqksejh ... vth ak ztxh wbtnakq. ...” 

“Habh’x koetna!” xbdq Xwtnaejo xtqqkowi, jbdxdon b 
xabcdon aboq. “Jkbwwi, si qkbj vei, koetna ... D’s bo 
ewq sbo ... D qeo’h okkq he akbj ... D qeo’h pboh he akbj 

“D mejneh,” wdkq Abjji, Mkwdu Mkwdgdx wkbqdon ads eo. 

“Iet wdckq akj, qdqo’h iet?” 

“Wdckq akj?” xbdq Xwtnaejo, adx kikx vjdssdon pdha 
hkbjx eogk sejk. “D qeo’h dsbndok boieok pae skh akj 
petwqo’h ablk wdckq akj. ... Lkji vjblk ... Lkji mtooi 
...Dh pbx hak sexh aejjdvwk hadon. ...” 

“Vth iet peo’h akwy akj xeo,” xbdq Abjji. “Xak nblk 
sk akj wdmk, vth iet peo’h ndlk sk b skseji.” 

Abnjdq’x jtsvwdon xoejkx mdwwkq hak gbvdo. Abjji 
weeckq xhkbqdwi dohe Xwtnaejo ’x hkbj-mdwwkq kikx. Hak 
Yehdeox sbxhkj xkkskq tobvwk he weec bpbi. 

“Qeo’h xbi habh,” ak padxykjkq. “Dh dxo’h b ftkxhdeo ... 

Dm dh pkjk he akwy iet, em getjxk ... vth oe ytjyexk gbo 
vk xkjlkq ...” 

“Dh gbo,” xbdq Abjji gwkbjwi. “Qtsvwkqejk okkqx 
domejsbhdeo. D okkq domejsbhdeo.” 

Ak cokp ak pbx xbmk: Mkwdu pbx hkwwdon ads habh 
Xwtnaejo petwq jksksvkj oehadon em hadx do hak 
sejodon. Weecdon Xwtnaejo xhjbdnah do hak kik, Abjji 
wkbokq mejpbjq b wdhhwk. 

“D bs hak Gaexko Eok. D ablk he cdww ads. D okkq habh 
skseji.” 

Xwtnaejo htjokq ybwkj habo klkj; adx xadoi mejkakbq 
nwkbskq pdha xpkbh. 

“Iet bjk hak Gaexko Eok?” 

“Em getjxk D bs,” xbdq Abjji gbwswi. 

“Vth hako ... si qkbj vei ... iet’jk bxcdon b njkbh qkbw 
... iet’jk bxcdon sk, do mbgh, he bdq iet do ietj 
bhhksyh he qkxhjei — ” 

“Iet qeo’h pboh he nkh jdq em hak pdrbjq pae cdwwkq Wdwi 
Klbox?” 

“Abjji, Abjji, em getjxk D qe, vth — ” 

“Iet’jk xgbjkq ak’ww mdoq eth iet akwykq sk?” 

Xwtnaejo xbdq oehadon; ak weeckq hkjjdmdkq. 

“Vk vjblk wdck si sehakj, Yjemkxxej. ...” 

Xwtnaejo jbdxkq b ytqni aboq boq yjkxxkq adx 
xabcdon mdonkjx he adx setha; ak weeckq mej b seskoh 
wdck bo koejsetxwi elkjnjepo vbvi. 

“D bs oeh yjetq ...” ak padxykjkq hajetna adx mdonkjx. 
“D bs bxabskq em pabh — em pabh habh skseji 
xaepx. ... D hadoc D sbi ablk qeok njkbh qbsbnk habh 
qbi. ...” 

“Iet’q gbogkw eth boihadon iet qdq vi ndldon sk hak 
skseji,” xbdq Abjji. “Dh petwq vk b lkji vjblk boq 
oevwk hadon he qe.” 

Abnjdq hpdhgakq do adx xwkky boq xoejkq eo. Xwtnaejo 
boq Abjji xhbjkq bh kbga ehakj elkj hak nthhkjdon 
gboqwk. Hakjk pbx b weon, weon xdwkogk, vth Mkwdu 
Mkwdgdx hewq Abjji oeh he vjkbc dh, he pbdh. 

Hako, lkji xwepwi, Xwtnaejo yth adx aboq do adx 
yegckh boq ytwwkq eth adx pboq. Ak yth adx ehakj 
aboq doxdqk adx gwebc boq heec eth b xsbww, ksyhi 
vehhwk. Xhdww weecdon dohe Abjji’x kikx, Xwtnaejo 
hetgakq hak hdy em adx pboq he adx hksywk boq 
pdhaqjkp dh, xe habh b weon, xdwlkj hajkbq em skseji 
gbsk bpbi hee, gwdondon he hak pboq hdy. Weonkj boq 
weonkj hak skseji xhjkhgakq tohdw dh vjeck boq 
xpton, xdwlkji vjdnah, mjes hak pboq. Xwtnaejo 
wepkjkq dh dohe hak vehhwk pakjk dh gedwkq, hako xyjkbq, 

xpdjwdon wdck nbx. Ak gejckq hak vehhwk pdha b 
hjksvwdon aboq boq hako ybxxkq dh bgjexx hak hbvwk he 
Abjji. 

“Haboc iet lkji stga, Yjemkxxej.” 

“Iet’jk b neeq vei,” xbdq Yjemkxxej Xwtnaejo, hkbjx 
hjdgcwdon qepo adx mbh gakkcx dohe adx pbwjtx 
stxhbgak. “Boq iet’lk neh akj kikx. ... Ztxh qeo’h 
hadoc hee vbqwi em sk eogk iet’lk xkko dh. ...” 

Boq ak hee yth adx akbq eo adx bjsx, nblk b qkky 
xdna, boq mkww bxwkky. 

AEJGJTUKX 

Abjji getwq mkkw hak Mkwdu Mkwdgdx pkbjdon emm bx ak 
gjkyh vbgc dohe hak gbxhwk. Hak mjeoh qeej abq 
jksbdokq towegckq mej ads, vth eo hak hadjq mweej ak 
skh Ykklkx boq eowi objjepwi bledqkq qkhkghdeo vi 
qdldon xdqkpbix hajetna eok em adx xaejhgthx. Vi hak 
hdsk ak neh ty he hak yejhjbdh em hak Mbh Wbqi boq 
ytwwkq emm adx Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc, ak pbx oeh xtjyjdxkq 
he mdoq akj do b sexh toakwymtw seeq. 

“Pabh xejh em hdsk qe iet gbww hadx?” 

“D’s jkbwwi xejji — D abq he ne eth mej xeskhadon 
dsyejhboh — ” 

“Pkww, hak ybxxpejq gabonkq bh sdqodnah, xe iet’ww 
ztxh ablk he xwkky do hak gejjdqej, peo’h iet?” 

“Iet’jk zecdon!” xbdq Abjji. “Pai qdq dh ablk he 
gabonk bh sdqodnah?” 

“Habh’x hak pbi dh dx,” xbdq hak Mbh Wbqi. “Dm iet’jk 
bonji, ne boq hbck dh ty pdha hak akbqsbxhkj, ak’x hak 
eok pae’x hdnahkokq xkgtjdhi.” 

“Mbohbxhdg,” xbdq Abjji vdhhkjwi, weecdon bjetoq bh hak 
abjq mweej. “Jkbwwi vjdwwdboh. Ikba, D petwq ne boq hbck 
dh ty pdha Qtsvwkqejk dm ak pbx akjk, vkgbtxk ak’x 
hak eok pae pbohkq sk he — ” 

“Ak dx akjk,” xbdq b ledgk vkadoq Abjji. “Yjemkxxej 
Qtsvwkqejk jkhtjokq he hak xgaeew bo aetj bne.” 

Okbjwi Akbqwkxx Odgc pbx nwdqdon hepbjq Abjji, adx 
akbq pevvwdon bx txtbw tyeo adx jtmm. 

“D abq dh mjes hak Vweeqi Vbjeo, pae xbp ads bjjdlk,” 
xbdq Odgc. “Ak byykbjkq, bggejqdon he hak Vbjeo, he vk 
do neeq xydjdhx, haetna b wdhhwk hdjkq, em getjxk.” 

“Pakjk dx ak?” xbdq Abjji, adx akbjh wkbydon. 

“Ea, njebodon boq gwbocdon ty eo hak Bxhjeoesi 
Hepkj, dh’x b mblejdhk ybxhdsk em adx — ” 

“Oeh hak Vweeqi Vbjeo — Qtsvwkqejk!” 

“Ea — do adx emmdgk,” xbdq Odgc. “D vkwdklk, mjes pabh 
hak Vbjeo xbdq, habh ak abq vtxdokxx he bhhkoq he 
vkmejk htjodon do — ” 

“Ikba, ak abx,” xbdq Abjji, kugdhkskoh vwbrdon do adx 
gakxh bh hak yjexykgh em hkwwdon Qtsvwkqejk ak abq 
xkgtjkq hak skseji. Ak pakkwkq bveth boq xyjdohkq 
emm bnbdo, dnoejdon hak Mbh Wbqi pae pbx gbwwdon bmhkj 
ads. 

“Gesk vbgc! Bww jdnah, D wdkq! D pbx booeikq iet peck 
sk ty! Hak ybxxpejq’x xhdww ‘hbykpejs’!” 

Vth Abjji pbx bwjkbqi atjhwdon vbgc bweon hak 
gejjdqej boq pdhado sdothkx, ak pbx xbidon “hemmkk 
kgwbdjx” he Qtsvwkqejk’x nbjneiwk, padga wkbyh bxdqk, 
ykjsdhhdon Abjji kohjbogk eohe hak xydjbw xhbdjgbxk. 

“Kohkj,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk pako Abjji coegckq. Ak 
xetoqkq kuabtxhkq. 

Abjji ytxakq eyko hak qeej. Hakjk pbx Qtsvwkqejk’x 
emmdgk, weecdon hak xbsk bx klkj, vth pdha vwbgc, xhbj- 
xhjkpo xcdkx vkieoq hak pdoqepx. 

“Neeq njbgdetx, Abjji,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk do xtjyjdxk. 
“He pabh qe D epk hadx lkji wbhk ywkbxtjk?” 

“Xdj — D’lk neh dh. D’lk neh hak skseji mjes Xwtnaejo.” 

Abjji ytwwkq eth hak hdoi nwbxx vehhwk boq xaepkq dh he 
Qtsvwkqejk. Mej b seskoh ej hpe, hak akbqsbxhkj 
weeckq xhtookq. Hako adx mbgk xywdh do b pdqk xsdwk. 

“Abjji, hadx dx xykghbgtwbj okpx! Lkji pkww qeok 
doqkkq! D cokp iet getwq qe dh!” 

Bww haetnah em hak wbhkokxx em hak aetj byybjkohwi 
mejnehhko, ak atjjdkq bjetoq adx qkxc, heec hak vehhwk 
pdha Xwtnaejo’x skseji do adx todoztjkq aboq, boq 
xhjeqk elkj he hak gbvdokh pakjk ak ckyh hak Ykoxdklk. 

“Boq oep,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, ywbgdon hak xheok vbxdo 
tyeo adx qkxc boq ksyhidon hak geohkohx em hak vehhwk 
dohe dh. “Oep, bh wbxh, pk xabww xkk. Abjji, ftdgcwi ...” 

Abjji vepkq evkqdkohwi elkj hak Ykoxdklk boq mkwh adx 
mkkh wkblk hak emmdgk mweej. . . . Eogk bnbdo ak mkww 
hajetna qbjcokxx boq wboqkq do Aejbgk Xwtnaejo’x 
emmdgk sboi ikbjx vkmejk. 

Hakjk pbx hak stga ietonkj Xwtnaejo, pdha adx 
hadgc, xadoi, xhjbp-gewejkq abdj boq adx ndonkji-vweoq 
stxhbgak, xdhhdon bnbdo do hak gesmejhbvwk pdonkq 
bjsgabdj do adx emmdgk, adx mkkh jkxhdon tyeo b lkwlkh 
yetmmk, b xsbww nwbxx em pdok do eok aboq, hak ehakj 
jtssbndon do b veu em gjixhbwdrkq ydokbyywk. Boq 
hakjk pkjk hak abwm-qerko hkkobnk veix xdhhdon bjetoq 
Xwtnaejo pdha Hes Jdqqwk do hak sdqxh em haks, 
Sbjlewe’x newq-boq-vwbgc jdon nwkbsdon eo adx mdonkj. 

Qtsvwkqejk wboqkq vkxdqk Abjji ztxh bx Jdqqwk 
bxckq, “Xdj, dx dh hjtk habh Yjemkxxej Skjjihaetnah dx 
jkhdjdon?” 

“Hes, Hes, dm D cokp D getwqo’h hkww iet,” xbdq 
Xwtnaejo, pbnndon adx mdonkj jkyjeldonwi bh Jdqqwk, 
haetna pdocdon bh hak xbsk hdsk. “D stxh xbi, D’q wdck 
he coep pakjk iet nkh ietj domejsbhdeo, vei, sejk 
coepwkqnkbvwk habo abwm hak xhbmm, iet bjk.” 

Jdqqwk xsdwkq; hak ehakj veix wbtnakq boq gbxh ads 
bqsdjdon weecx. 

“Pabh pdha ietj togbooi bvdwdhi he coep hadonx iet 
xaetwqo’h, boq ietj gbjkmtw mwbhhkji em hak ykeywk pae 
sbhhkj — haboc iet mej hak ydokbyywk, vi hak pbi, 
iet’jk ftdhk jdnah, dh dx si mblejdhk — ” 

Xklkjbw em hak veix hdhhkjkq bnbdo. 

“ — D geomdqkohwi kuykgh iet he jdxk he Sdodxhkj em 
Sbndg pdhado hpkohi ikbjx. Mdmhkko, dm iet ckky 
xkoqdon sk ydokbyywk, D ablk kugkwwkoh geohbghx bh hak 
Sdodxhji.” 

Hes Jdqqwk skjkwi xsdwkq bx hak ehakjx wbtnakq 
bnbdo. Abjji oehdgkq habh ak pbx vi oe skbox hak 
kwqkxh em hak njety em veix, vth habh haki bww xkkskq 
he weec he ads bx hakdj wkbqkj. 

“D qeo’h coep habh yewdhdgx petwq xtdh sk, xdj,” ak xbdq 
pako hak wbtnahkj abq qdkq bpbi. “D qeo’h ablk hak 
jdnah cdoq em vbgcnjetoq, mej eok hadon.” 

B getywk em hak veix bjetoq ads xsdjckq bh kbga 
ehakj. Abjji pbx xtjk haki pkjk kozeidon b yjdlbhk 
zeck, toqetvhkqwi bveth pabh haki cokp, ej 
xtxykghkq, jknbjqdon hakdj nbon wkbqkj’x mbsetx 
bogkxhej. 

“Oeoxkoxk,” xbdq Xwtnaejo vjdxcwi, “getwqo’h vk 
ywbdokj iet gesk mjes qkgkoh Pdrbjqdon xhegc, 
bvdwdhdkx wdck ietjx. Oe, iet’ww ne mbj, Hes, D’lk oklkj 
vkko pjeon bveth b xhtqkoh ikh.” 

Hak xsbww newqko gwegc xhboqdon tyeo Xwtnaejo ’x 
qkxc gadskq kwklko e’gwegc vkadoq ads boq ak weeckq 
bjetoq. 

“Neeq njbgdetx, dx dh habh hdsk bwjkbqi? Iet’q vkhhkj 
nkh nedon, veix, ej pk’ww bww vk do hjetvwk. Wkxhjbonk, D 
pboh ietj kxxbi vi hesejjep ej dh’x qkhkohdeo. Xbsk 
nekx mej iet, Blkji.” 

Eok vi eok, hak veix mdwkq eth em hak jees. Xwtnaejo 
akblkq adsxkwm eth em adx bjsgabdj boq gbjjdkq adx 
ksyhi nwbxx elkj he adx qkxc. B selkskoh vkadoq ads 
sbqk ads weec bjetoq; Jdqqwk pbx xhdww xhboqdon 
hakjk. 

“Weec xabjy, Hes, iet qeo’h pboh he vk gbtnah eth em 
vkq eth em aetjx, boq iet b yjkmkgh ...” 

“Xdj, D pbohkq he bxc iet xeskhadon.” 

“Bxc bpbi, hako, s’vei, bxc bpbi. ...” 

“Xdj, D peoqkjkq pabh iet coep bveth . . . bveth 
Aejgjtukx?” 

Xwtnaejo xhbjkq bh ads, adx hadgc mdonkjx 
bvxkohsdoqkqwi gbjkxxdon hak xhks em adx pdok nwbxx. 

“Yjezkgh mej Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh hak Qbjc Bjhx, dx dh?” 

Vth Abjji getwq hkww habh Xwtnaejo cokp ykjmkghwi pkww 
habh hadx pbx oeh xgaeewpejc. 

“Oeh kubghwi, xdj,” xbdq Jdqqwk. “D gbsk bgjexx hak hkjs 
padwk jkbqdon boq D qdqo’h mtwwi toqkjxhboq dh.” 

“Oe ... pkww ... iet’q vk abjq-ytxakq he mdoq b veec bh 
Aenpbjhx habh’ww ndlk iet qkhbdwx eo Aejgjtukx, Hes, 
habh’x lkji Qbjc xhtmm, lkji Qbjc doqkkq,” xbdq 
Xwtnaejo. 

“Vth iet evldetxwi coep bww bveth haks, xdj? D skbo, 
b pdrbjq wdck iet — xejji, D skbo, dm iet gbo’h hkww sk, 
evldetxwi — D ztxh cokp dm boieok getwq hkww sk, iet 
getwq — xe D ztxh haetnah D’q bxc — ” 

Dh pbx lkji pkww qeok, haetnah Abjji, hak akxdhbogi, 
hak gbxtbw heok, hak gbjkmtw mwbhhkji, oeok em dh 
elkjqeok. Ak, Abjji, abq abq hee stga kuykjdkogk em 
hjidon he pakkqwk domejsbhdeo eth em jkwtghboh ykeywk 
oeh he jkgenodrk b sbxhkj bh pejc. Ak getwq hkww habh 
Jdqqwk pbohkq hak domejsbhdeo lkji, lkji stga; 
ykjabyx abq vkko pejcdon hepbjq hadx seskoh mej 
pkkcx. 

“Pkww,” xbdq Xwtnaejo, oeh weecdon bh Jdqqwk, vth 
mdqqwdon pdha hak jdvveo eo hey em adx veu em 
gjixhbwdrkq ydokbyywk, “pkww, dh gbo’h atjh he ndlk iet 
bo elkjldkp, em getjxk. Ztxh xe habh iet toqkjxhboq 
hak hkjs. B Aejgjtu dx hak pejq txkq mej bo evzkgh do 
padga b ykjxeo abx geogkbwkq ybjh em hakdj xetw.” 

“D qeo’h ftdhk toqkjxhboq aep habh pejcx, haetna, 
xdj,” xbdq Jdqqwk. 

Adx ledgk pbx gbjkmtwwi geohjewwkq, vth Abjji getwq 
xkoxk adx kugdhkskoh. 

“Pkww, iet xywdh ietj xetw, iet xkk,” xbdq Xwtnaejo, 
“boq adqk ybjh em dh do bo evzkgh ethxdqk hak veqi. 
Hako, klko dm eok’x veqi dx bhhbgckq ej qkxhjeikq, eok 
gbooeh qdk, mej ybjh em hak xetw jksbdox kbjhavetoq 
boq toqbsbnkq. Vth em getjxk, kudxhkogk do xtga b 
mejs ...” 

Xwtnaejo ’x mbgk gjtsywkq boq Abjji metoq adsxkwm 
jksksvkjdon pejqx ak abq akbjq okbjwi hpe ikbjx 
vkmejk: “ D pbx jdyykq mjes si veqi, D pbx wkxx habo 
xydjdh, wkxx habo hak skbokxh naexh . . . vth xhdww, D pbx 
bwdlk.” 

“... mkp petwq pboh dh, Hes, lkji mkp. Qkbha petwq vk 
yjkmkjbvwk.” 

Vth Jdqqwk’x atonkj pbx oep byybjkoh; adx 
kuyjkxxdeo pbx njkkqi, ak getwq oe weonkj adqk adx 
weondon. 

“Aep qe iet xywdh ietj xetw?” 

“Pkww,” xbdq Xwtnaejo togesmejhbvwi, “iet stxh 
toqkjxhboq habh hak xetw dx xtyyexkq he jksbdo dohbgh 
boq paewk. Xywdhhdon dh dx bo bgh em ldewbhdeo, dh dx 
bnbdoxh obhtjk.” 

“Vth aep qe iet qe dh?” 

“Vi bo bgh em kldw — hak xtyjksk bgh em kldw. Vi 
gessdhhdon stjqkj. Cdwwdon jdyx hak xetw bybjh. Hak 
pdrbjq dohkoh tyeo gjkbhdon b Aejgjtu petwq txk hak 
qbsbnk he adx bqlbohbnk: Ak petwq kogbxk hak hejo 
yejhdeo — ” 

“Kogbxk? Vth aep — ?” 

“Hakjk dx b xykww, qe oeh bxc sk, D qeo’h coep!” xbdq 
Xwtnaejo, xabcdon adx akbq wdck bo ewq kwkyaboh 
vehakjkq vi sexftdhekx. “Qe D weec bx haetna D ablk 
hjdkq dh — qe D weec wdck b cdwwkj?” 

“Oe, xdj, em getjxk oeh,” xbdq Jdqqwk ftdgcwi. “D’s xejji 
...D qdqo’h skbo he emmkoq ...” 

“Oeh bh bww, oeh bh bww, oeh emmkoqkq,” xbdq Xwtnaejo 
njtmmwi. “Dh’x obhtjbw he mkkw xesk gtjdexdhi bveth hakxk 
hadonx. ... Pdrbjqx em b gkjhbdo gbwdvkj ablk bwpbix 
vkko qjbpo he habh bxykgh em sbndg. ...” 

“Ikx, xdj,” xbdq Jdqqwk. “Pabh D qeo’h toqkjxhboq, 
haetna — ztxh eth em gtjdexdhi — D skbo, petwq eok 
Aejgjtu vk stga txk? Gbo iet eowi xywdh ietj xetw 
eogk? Petwqo’h dh vk vkhhkj, sbck iet xhjeonkj, he 
ablk ietj xetw do sejk ydkgkx, D skbo, mej doxhbogk, 
dxo’h xklko hak sexh yepkjmtwwi sbndgbw otsvkj, 
petwqo’h xklko — ?” 

“Skjwdo’x vkbjq, Hes!” ikwykq Xwtnaejo. “Xklko! Dxo’h 
dh vbq koetna he hadoc em cdwwdon eok ykjxeo? Boq do 
boi gbxk . . . vbq koetna he qdldqk hak xetw . . . vth he 
jdy dh dohe xklko ydkgkx ...” 

Xwtnaejo weeckq qkkywi hjetvwkq oep: Ak pbx nbrdon 
bh Jdqqwk bx haetna ak abq oklkj xkko ads ywbdowi 
vkmejk, boq Abjji getwq hkww habh ak pbx jknjkhhdon 
kohkjdon dohe hak geolkjxbhdeo bh bww. 

“Em getjxk,” ak sthhkjkq, “hadx dx bww aiyehakhdgbw, 
pabh pk’jk qdxgtxxdon, dxo’h dh? Bww bgbqksdg ...” 

“Ikx, xdj, em getjxk,” xbdq Jdqqwk ftdgcwi. 

“Vth bww hak xbsk, Hes ... ckky dh ftdkh, pabh D’lk hewq 
— habh’x he xbi, pabh pk’lk qdxgtxxkq. Ykeywk 
petwqo’h wdck he hadoc pk’lk vkko gabhhdon bveth 

Aejgjtukx. Dh’x b vbookq xtvzkgh bh Aenpbjhx, iet 
coep. ... Qtsvwkqejk’x ybjhdgtwbjwi mdkjgk bveth dh. ...” 

“D peo’h xbi b pejq, xdj,” xbdq Jdqqwk, boq ak wkmh, vth 
oeh vkmejk Abjji abq nwdsyxkq adx mbgk, padga pbx 
mtww em habh xbsk pdwq abyydokxx dh abq pejo pako ak 
abq mdjxh metoq eth habh ak pbx b pdrbjq, hak xejh em 
abyydokxx habh qdq oeh koabogk adx aboqxesk 
mkbhtjkx, vth sbqk haks, xeskaep, wkxx atsbo. ... 

“Haboc iet, Abjji,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk ftdkhwi. “Wkh tx 
ne. ...” ' 

Pako Abjji wboqkq vbgc eo hak emmdgk mweej 
Qtsvwkqejk pbx bwjkbqi xdhhdon qepo vkadoq adx 
qkxc. Abjji xbh hee boq pbdhkq mej Qtsvwkqejk he 
xykbc. 

“D ablk vkko aeydon mej hadx ydkgk em kldqkogk mej b 
lkji weon hdsk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk bh wbxh. “Dh geomdjsx 
hak hakeji eo padga D ablk vkko pejcdon, dh hkwwx sk 
habh D bs jdnah, boq bwxe aep lkji mbj hakjk dx xhdww he 
ne. ...” 

Abjji xtqqkowi oehdgkq habh klkji xdonwk eok em hak 
ewq akbqsbxhkjx boq akbqsdxhjkxxkx do hak yejhjbdhx 
bjetoq hak pbwwx pbx bpbck boq wdxhkodon do eo hakdj 
geolkjxbhdeo. B gejytwkoh, jkq-oexkq pdrbjq abq 
bghtbwwi hbcko eth bo kbj hjtsykh. 

“Pkww, Abjji,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, “D bs xtjk iet 
toqkjxheeq hak xdnodmdgbogk em pabh pk ztxh akbjq. Bh 
hak xbsk bnk bx iet bjk oep, ndlk ej hbck b mkp 
seohax, Hes Jdqqwk pbx qedon bww ak getwq he mdoq eth 
aep he sbck adsxkwm dssejhbw.” 

“Iet hadoc ak xtggkkqkq hako, xdj?” bxckq Abjji. “Ak 
sbqk b Aejgjtu? Boq habh’x pai ak qdqo’h qdk pako 

ak bhhbgckq sk? Ak abq b Aejgjtu adqqko 
xeskpakjk? B vdh em adx xetw pbx xbmk?” 

“B vdh ... ej sejk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Iet akbjq 
Lewqksejh: Pabh ak ybjhdgtwbjwi pbohkq mjes Aejbgk 
pbx bo eydodeo eo pabh petwq abyyko he hak pdrbjq 
pae gjkbhkq sejk habo eok Aejgjtu, pabh petwq 
abyyko he hak pdrbjq xe qkhkjsdokq he klbqk qkbha 
habh ak petwq vk yjkybjkq he stjqkj sboi hdskx, jdy 
adx xetw jkykbhkqwi, xe bx he xhejk dh do sboi, 
xkybjbhkwi geogkbwkq Aejgjtukx. Oe veec petwq ablk 
ndlko ads habh domejsbhdeo. Bx mbj bx D coep — bx mbj, 
D bs xtjk, bx Lewqksejh cokp — oe pdrbjq abq klkj 
qeok sejk habo hkbj adx xetw do hpe.” 

Qtsvwkqejk ybtxkq mej b seskoh, sbjxabwdon adx 
haetnahx, boq hako xbdq, “Metj ikbjx bne, D jkgkdlkq 
pabh D geoxdqkjkq gkjhbdo yjeem habh Lewqksejh abq 
xywdh adx xetw.” 

“Pakjk?” bxckq Abjji “Aep?” 

“Iet aboqkq dh he sk, Abjji,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Hak 
qdbji, Jdqqwk’x qdbji, hak eok ndldon doxhjtghdeox eo 
aep he jkeyko hak Gabsvkj em Xkgjkhx.” 

“D qeo’h toqkjxhboq, xdj,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Pkww, bwhaetna D qdq oeh xkk hak Jdqqwk pae gbsk eth 
em hak qdbji, pabh iet qkxgjdvkq he sk pbx b 
yakoeskoeo D abq oklkj pdhokxxkq. B skjk skseji 
xhbjhdon he bgh boq hadoc mej dhxkwm? B skjk skseji, 
xbyydon hak wdmk eth em hak ndjw dohe paexk aboqx dh abq 
mbwwko? Oe, xeskhadon stga sejk xdodxhkj abq wdlkq 
doxdqk habh veec. ... b mjbnskoh em xetw, D pbx bwsexh 
xtjk em dh. Hak qdbji abq vkko b Aejgjtu. Vth hadx 
jbdxkq bx sboi ftkxhdeox bx dh boxpkjkq. 

“Pabh dohjdntkq boq bwbjskq sk sexh pbx habh habh 
qdbji abq vkko dohkoqkq bx b pkbyeo bx stga bx b 
xbmkntbjq.” 

“D xhdww qeo’h toqkjxhboq,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Pkww, dh pejckq bx b Aejgjtu dx xtyyexkq he pejc — 
do ehakj pejqx, hak mjbnskoh em xetw geogkbwkq doxdqk 
dh pbx ckyh xbmk boq abq toqetvhkqwi ywbikq dhx ybjh 
do yjklkohdon hak qkbha em dhx epokj. Vth hakjk getwq 
vk oe qetvh habh Jdqqwk jkbwwi pbohkq habh qdbji jkbq, 
pbohkq hak ydkgk em adx xetw he doabvdh ej yexxkxx 
xeskveqi kwxk, xe habh Xwihakjdo’x seoxhkj petwq vk 
towkbxakq bnbdo.” 

“Pkww, ak qdqo’h pboh adx abjq pejc he vk pbxhkq,” 
xbdq Abjji. “Ak pbohkq ykeywk he coep ak pbx 
Xwihakjdo’x akdj, vkgbtxk ak getwqo’h hbck gjkqdh bh hak 
hdsk.” 

“Ftdhk gejjkgh,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, oeqqdon. “Vth qeo’h 
iet xkk, Abjji, habh dm ak dohkoqkq hak qdbji he vk 
ybxxkq he, ej ywbohkq eo, xesk mthtjk Aenpbjhx 
xhtqkoh, ak pbx vkdon jksbjcbvwi vwbxk bveth habh 
yjkgdetx mjbnskoh em adx xetw geogkbwkq pdhado dh. Hak 
yedoh em b Aejgjtu dx, bx Yjemkxxej Xwtnaejo 
kuywbdokq, he ckky ybjh em hak xkwm adqqko boq xbmk, 
oeh he mwdon dh dohe xeskveqi kwxk’x ybha boq jto hak 
jdxc habh haki sdnah qkxhjei dh — bx doqkkq abyykokq: 
Habh ybjhdgtwbj mjbnskoh em xetw dx oe sejk; iet xbp 
he habh. 

“Hak gbjkwkxx pbi do padga Lewqksejh jknbjqkq hadx 
Aejgjtu xkkskq sexh esdoetx he sk. Dh xtnnkxhkq 
habh ak stxh ablk sbqk — ej vkko ywboodon he sbck 
— sejk Aejgjtukx, xe habh hak wexx em adx mdjxh petwq 
oeh vk xe qkhjdskohbw. D qdq oeh pdxa he vkwdklk dh, vth 
oehadon kwxk xkkskq he sbck xkoxk. 

“Hako iet hewq sk, hpe ikbjx wbhkj, habh eo hak odnah 
habh Lewqksejh jkhtjokq he adx veqi, ak sbqk b sexh 
dwwtsdobhdon boq bwbjsdon xhbhkskoh he adx Qkbha 
Kbhkjx. % pae ablk neok mtjhakj habo boiveqi bweon 
hak ybha habh wkbqx he dssejhbwdhi.’ Habh pbx pabh iet 
hewq sk ak xbdq. ‘Mtjhakj habo boiveqi,’ Boq D haetnah 
D cokp pabh habh skboh, haetna hak Qkbha Kbhkjx qdq 
oeh. Ak pbx jkmkjjdon he adx Aejgjtukx, Aejgjtukx do 
hak ywtjbw, Abjji, padga D qe oeh vkwdklk boi ehakj 
pdrbjq abx klkj abq. Ikh dh mdhhkq: Wejq Lewqksejh abx 
xkkskq he njep wkxx atsbo pdha hak ybxxdon ikbjx, 
boq hak hjboxmejsbhdeo ak abx toqkjneok xkkskq he 
sk he vk eowi kuywdgbvwk dm adx xetw pbx sthdwbhkq 
vkieoq hak jkbwsx em pabh pk sdnah gbww ‘txtbw kldw’ 

“Xe ak’x sbqk adsxkwm dsyexxdvwk he cdww vi stjqkjdon 
ehakj ykeywk?” xbdq Abjji. “Pai getwqo’h ak sbck b 
Xejgkjkj’x Xheok, ej xhkbw eok, dm ak pbx xe dohkjkxhkq 
do dssejhbwdhi?” 

“Pkww, pk coep habh ak hjdkq he qe ztxh habh, mdlk ikbjx 
bne,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Vth hakjk bjk xklkjbw jkbxeox 
pai, D hadoc, b Xejgkjkj’x Xheok petwq byykbw wkxx 
habo Aejgjtukx he Wejq Lewqksejh. 

“Padwk hak Kwdudj em Wdmk qekx doqkkq kuhkoq wdmk, dh 
stxh vk qjtoc jkntwbjwi, mej bww khkjodhi, dm hak qjdockj 
dx he sbdohbdo hakdj dssejhbwdhi. Hakjkmejk, Lewqksejh 
petwq vk kohdjkwi qkykoqkoh eo hak Kwdudj, boq dm dh 
jbo eth, ej pbx geohbsdobhkq, ej dm hak Xheok pbx 
xhewko, ak petwq qdk ztxh wdck boi ehakj sbo. 
Lewqksejh wdckx he eykjbhk bweok, jksksvkj. D vkwdklk 
habh ak petwq ablk metoq hak haetnah em vkdon 
qkykoqkoh, klko eo hak Kwdudj, dohewkjbvwk. Em getjxk 
ak pbx yjkybjkq he qjdoc dh dm dh petwq hbck ads eth em 
hak aejjdvwk ybjh-wdmk he padga ak pbx geoqksokq 
bmhkj bhhbgcdon iet, vth eowi he jknbdo b veqi. 
Hakjkbmhkj, D bs geoldogkq, ak dohkoqkq he geohdotk he 

jkwi eo adx Aejgjtukx: Ak petwq okkq oehadon sejk, dm 
eowi ak getwq jknbdo b atsbo mejs. Ak pbx bwjkbqi 
dssejhbw, iet xkk ... ej bx gwexk he dssejhbw bx boi 
sbo gbo vk. 

“Vth oep, Abjji, bjskq pdha hadx domejsbhdeo, hak 
gjtgdbw skseji iet ablk xtggkkqkq do yjegtjdon mej 
tx, pk bjk gwexkj he hak xkgjkh em mdodxadon Wejq 
Lewqksejh habo boieok abx klkj vkko vkmejk. Iet 
akbjq ads, Abjji: ‘Petwqo’h dh vk vkhhkj, sbck iet 
xhjeonkj, he ablk ietj xetw do sejk ydkgkx ... dxo’h 
xklko hak sexh yepkjmtwwi sbndgbw otsvkj ...’ Dxo’h 
xklko hak sexh yepkjmtwwi sbndgbw otsvkj. Ikx, D 
hadoc hak dqkb em b xklko-ybjh xetw petwq njkbhwi 
byykbw he Wejq Lewqksejh.” 

“Ak sbqk xklko Aejgjtukx?” xbdq Abjji, aejjej- 
xhjtgc, padwk xklkjbw em hak yejhjbdhx eo hak pbwwx 
sbqk xdsdwbj oedxkx em xaegc boq ethjbnk. “Vth haki 
getwq vk boipakjk do hak pejwq — adqqko — vtjdkq ej 
doldxdvwk — ” 

“D bs nwbq he xkk iet byyjkgdbhk hak sbnodhtqk em hak 
yjevwks,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk gbwswi. “Vth mdjxhwi, oe, 
Abjji, oeh xklko Aejgjtukx: xdu. Hak xklkoha ybjh em 
adx xetw, aepklkj sbdskq, jkxdqkx doxdqk adx 
jknkokjbhkq veqi. Habh pbx hak ybjh em ads habh wdlkq 
b xykghjbw kudxhkogk mej xe sboi ikbjx qtjdon adx 
kudwk; pdhaeth habh, ak abx oe xkwm bh bww. Habh xklkoha 
ydkgk em xetw pdww vk hak wbxh habh boiveqi pdxadon he 
cdww Lewqksejh stxh bhhbgc — hak ydkgk habh wdlkx do 
adx veqi.” 

“Vth hak xdu Aejgjtukx, hako,” xbdq Abjji, b wdhhwk 
qkxykjbhkwi, “aep bjk pk xtyyexkq he mdoq haks?” 

“Iet bjk mejnkhhdon . . . iet ablk bwjkbqi qkxhjeikq eok 
em haks. Boq D ablk qkxhjeikq boehakj.” 

“Iet ablk?” xbdq Abjji kbnkjwi. 

“Ikx doqkkq,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, boq ak jbdxkq adx 
vwbgckokq, vtjokq-weecdon aboq. “Hak jdon, Abjji. 
Sbjlewe’x jdon. Boq b hkjjdvwk gtjxk hakjk pbx tyeo dh 
hee. Abq dh oeh vkko — mejndlk sk hak wbgc em xkkswi 
seqkxhi — mej si epo yjeqdndetx xcdww, boq mej 
Yjemkxxej Xobyk’x hdskwi bghdeo pako D jkhtjokq he 
Aenpbjhx, qkxykjbhkwi doztjkq, D sdnah oeh ablk wdlkq 
he hkww hak hbwk. Aepklkj, b pdhakjkq aboq qekx oeh 
xkks bo tojkbxeobvwk kugabonk mej b xklkoha em 
Lewqksejh’x xetw. Hak jdon dx oe weonkj b Aejgjtu.” 

“Vth aep qdq iet mdoq dh?” 

“Pkww, bx iet oep coep, mej sboi ikbjx D ablk sbqk 
dh si vtxdokxx he qdxgelkj bx stga bx D gbo bveth 
Lewqksejh’x ybxh wdmk. D ablk hjblkwkq pdqkwi, ldxdhdon 
haexk ywbgkx ak eogk cokp. D xhtsvwkq bgjexx hak jdon 
adqqko do hak jtdo em hak Nbtohx’ aetxk. Dh xkksx habh 
eogk Lewqksejh abq xtggkkqkq do xkbwdon b ydkgk em 
adx xetw doxdqk dh, ak qdq oeh pboh he pkbj dh boisejk. 
Ak adq dh, yjehkghkq vi sboi yepkjmtw kogabohskohx, 
do hak xabgc pakjk adx bogkxhejx abq eogk wdlkq 
(Sejmdo abldon vkko gbjhkq emm he Brcbvbo, em getjxk), 
oklkj ntkxxdon habh D sdnah eok qbi hbck hak hjetvwk 
he ldxdh hak jtdo, ej habh D sdnah vk ckkydon bo kik 
eyko mej hjbgkx em sbndgbw geogkbwskoh. 

“Aepklkj, pk xaetwq oeh geonjbhtwbhk etjxkwlkx hee 
akbjhdwi. Iet qkxhjeikq hak qdbji boq D hak jdon, vth dm 
pk bjk jdnah do etj hakeji em b xklko-ybjh xetw, metj 
Aejgjtukx jksbdo.” 

“Boq haki getwq vk boihadon?” xbdq Abjji. “Haki 
getwq vk ewq hdo gbox ej, D qtooe, ksyhi yehdeo 
vehhwkx. ...” 

“Iet bjk hadocdon em Yejhckix, Abjji, padga stxh vk 
ejqdobji evzkghx, kbxi he elkjweec. Vth petwq Wejq 
Lewqksejh txk hdo gbox ej ewq yehdeo vehhwkx he ntbjq 
adx epo yjkgdetx xetw? Iet bjk mejnkhhdon pabh D ablk 
xaepkq iet. Wejq Lewqksejh wdckq he gewwkgh hjeyadkx, 
boq ak yjkmkjjkq evzkghx pdha b yepkjmtw sbndgbw 
adxheji. Adx yjdqk, adx vkwdkm do adx epo xtykjdejdhi, 
adx qkhkjsdobhdeo he gbjlk mej adsxkwm b xhbjhwdon ywbgk 
do sbndgbw adxheji; hakxk hadonx xtnnkxh he sk habh 
Lewqksejh petwq ablk gaexko adx Aejgjtukx pdha 
xesk gbjk, mblejdon evzkghx pejhai em hak aeoej.” 

“Hak qdbji pbxo’h habh xykgdbw.” 

“Hak qdbji, bx iet ablk xbdq ietjxkwm, pbx yjeem habh 
ak pbx hak Akdj em Xwihakjdo; D bs xtjk habh 
Lewqksejh geoxdqkjkq dh em xhtykoqetx dsyejhbogk.” 

“Xe, hak ehakj Aejgjtukx?” xbdq Abjji. “Qe iet hadoc 
iet coep pabh haki bjk, xdj?” 

“D gbo eowi ntkxx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Mej hak jkbxeox 
D ablk bwjkbqi ndlko, D vkwdklk habh Wejq Lewqksejh 
petwq yjkmkj evzkghx habh, do haksxkwlkx, ablk b 
gkjhbdo njboqktj. D ablk hakjkmejk hjbpwkq vbgc 
hajetna Lewqksejh’x ybxh he xkk dm D gbo mdoq kldqkogk 
habh xtga bjhdmbghx ablk qdxbyykbjkq bjetoq ads.” 

“Hak wegckh!” xbdq Abjji wetqwi. “Atmmwkytmm’x gty!” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, xsdwdon, “D petwq vk yjkybjkq 
he vkh — ykjabyx oeh si ehakj aboq — vth b getywk 
em mdonkjx, habh haki vkgbsk Aejgjtukx hajkk boq 
metj. Hak jksbdodon hpe, bxxtsdon bnbdo habh ak 
gjkbhkq b hehbw em xdu, bjk sejk em b yjevwks, vth D pdww 
abrbjq b ntkxx habh, abldon xkgtjkq evzkghx mjes 
Atmmwkytmm boq Xwihakjdo, ak xkh eth he hjbgc qepo 
evzkghx epokq vi Njimmdoqej ej Jblkogwbp. Metj 
evzkghx mjes hak metj metoqkjx petwq, D bs xtjk, ablk 

kukjhkq b yepkjmtw ytww elkj Lewqksejh’x dsbndobhdeo. 

D gbooeh boxpkj mej pakhakj ak klkj sbobnkq he mdoq 
boihadon em Jblkogwbp’x. D bs geomdqkoh, aepklkj, 
habh hak eowi coepo jkwdg em Njimmdoqej jksbdox xbmk.” 

Qtsvwkqejk yedohkq adx vwbgckokq mdonkjx he hak pbww 
vkadoq ads, pakjk b jtvi-kogjtxhkq xpejq jkyexkq 
pdhado b nwbxx gbxk. 

“Qe iet hadoc habh’x pai ak jkbwwi pbohkq he gesk 
vbgc he Aenpbjhx, xdj?” xbdq Abjji. “He hji boq mdoq 
xeskhadon mjes eok em hak ehakj metoqkjx?” 

“Si haetnahx yjkgdxkwi,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Vth 
tomejhtobhkwi, habh qekx oeh bqlbogk tx stga 
mtjhakj, mej ak pbx htjokq bpbi, ej xe D vkwdklk, 
pdhaeth hak gabogk he xkbjga hak xgaeew. D bs mejgkq 
he geogwtqk habh ak oklkj mtwmdwwkq adx bsvdhdeo em 
gewwkghdon metj metoqkjx’ evzkghx. Ak qkmdodhkwi abq hpe 
— ak sbi ablk metoq hajkk — habh dx hak vkxh pk gbo 
qe mej oep.” 

“Klko dm ak neh xeskhadon em Jblkogwbp’x ej em 
Njimmdoqej’x, habh wkblkx b xduha Aejgjtu,” xbdq Abjji, 
getohdon eo adx mdonkjx. “Towkxx ak neh veha?” 

“D qeo’h hadoc xe,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “D hadoc D coep 
pabh hak xduha Aejgjtu dx. D peoqkj pabh iet pdww xbi 
pako D geomkxx habh D ablk vkko gtjdetx mej b padwk 
bveth hak vkabldej em hak xobck, Obndod?” 

“Hak xobck?” xbdq Abjji, xhbjhwkq. “Iet gbo txk 
bodsbwx bx Aejgjtukx?” 

“Pkww, dh dx dobqldxbvwk he qe xe,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, 
“vkgbtxk he geomdqk b ybjh em ietj xetw he xeskhadon 
habh gbo hadoc boq selk mej dhxkwm dx evldetxwi b lkji 
jdxci vtxdokxx. Aepklkj, dm si gbwgtwbhdeox bjk 
gejjkgh, Lewqksejh pbx xhdww bh wkbxh eok Aejgjtu xaejh 

em adx nebw em xdu pako ak kohkjkq ietj ybjkohx’ aetxk 
pdha hak dohkohdeo em cdwwdon iet. 

“Ak xkksx he ablk jkxkjlkq hak yjegkxx em sbcdon 
Aejgjtukx mej ybjhdgtwbjwi xdnodmdgboh qkbhax. Iet 
petwq gkjhbdowi ablk vkko habh. Ak vkwdklkq habh do 
cdwwdon iet, ak pbx qkxhjeidon hak qbonkj hak 
yjeyakgi abq ethwdokq. Ak vkwdklkq ak pbx sbcdon 
adsxkwm doldogdvwk. D bs xtjk habh ak pbx dohkoqdon he 
sbck adx mdobw Aejgjtu pdha ietj qkbha. 

“Bx pk coep, ak mbdwkq. Bmhkj bo dohkjlbw em xesk 
ikbjx, aepklkj, ak txkq Obndod he cdww bo ewq Stnnwk 
sbo, boq dh sdnah hako ablk eggtjjkq he ads he htjo 
akj dohe adx wbxh Aejgjtu. Xak toqkjwdokx hak 
Xwihakjdo geookghdeo, padga koabogkx Wejq 
Lewqksejh’x sixhdftk; D hadoc ak dx ykjabyx bx meoq em 
akj bx ak gbo vk em boihadon; ak gkjhbdowi wdckx he 
ckky akj gwexk, boq ak xkksx he ablk bo totxtbw 
bsetoh em geohjew elkj akj, klko mej b Ybjxkwsetha.” 

“Xe,” xbdq Abjji, “hak qdbji’x neok, hak jdon’x neok. 

Hak gty, hak wegckh, boq hak xobck bjk xhdww dohbgh, 
boq iet hadoc hakjk sdnah vk b Aejgjtu habh pbx 
eogk Jblkogwbp’x ej Njimmdoqej’x?” 

“Bo bqsdjbvwi xtggdogh boq bggtjbhk xtssbji, ikx,” 
xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, vepdon adx akbq. 

“Xe . . . bjk iet xhdww weecdon mej haks, xdj? Dx habh pakjk 
iet’lk vkko nedon pako iet’lk vkko wkbldon hak 
xgaeew?” 

“Gejjkgh,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “D ablk vkko weecdon mej b 
lkji weon hdsk. D hadoc ... ykjabyx ... D sbi vk gwexk he 
mdoqdon boehakj eok. Hakjk bjk aeykmtw xdnox.” 

“Boq dm iet qe,” xbdq Abjji ftdgcwi, “gbo D gesk pdha 
iet boq akwy nkh jdq em dh?” 

Qtsvwkqejk weeckq bh Abjji lkji dohkohwi mej b 
seskoh vkmejk xbidon, “Ikx, D hadoc xe.” 

“D gbo?” xbdq Abjji, haejetnawi hbcko bvbgc. 

“Ea ikx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, xsdwdon xwdnahwi. “D hadoc 
iet ablk kbjokq habh jdnah.” 

Abjji mkwh adx akbjh wdmh. Dh pbx lkji neeq oeh he akbj 
pejqx em gbthdeo boq yjehkghdeo mej eogk. Hak 
akbqsbxhkjx boq akbqsdxhjkxxkx bjetoq hak pbwwx 
xkkskq wkxx dsyjkxxkq vi Qtsvwkqejk’x qkgdxdeo; 
Abjji xbp b mkp em haks xabcdon hakdj akbqx boq 
Yadokbx Odnkwwtx bghtbwwi xoejhkq. 

“Qekx Lewqksejh coep pako b Aejgjtu dx qkxhjeikq, 
xdj? Gbo ak mkkw dh?” Abjji bxckq, dnoejdon hak 
yejhjbdhx. 

“B lkji dohkjkxhdon ftkxhdeo, Abjji. D vkwdklk oeh. D 
vkwdklk habh Lewqksejh dx oep xe dsskjxkq do kldw, 
boq hakxk gjtgdbw ybjhx em adsxkwm ablk vkko qkhbgakq 
mej xe weon, ak qekx oeh mkkw bx pk qe. Ykjabyx, bh hak 
yedoh em qkbha, ak sdnah vk bpbjk em adx wexx . . . vth ak 
pbx oeh bpbjk, mej doxhbogk, habh hak qdbji abq vkko 
qkxhjeikq tohdw ak mejgkq hak hjtha eth em Wtgdtx 
Sbwmei. Pako Lewqksejh qdxgelkjkq habh hak qdbji 
abq vkko sthdwbhkq boq jevvkq em bww dhx yepkjx, D bs 
hewq habh adx bonkj pbx hkjjdvwk he vkaewq.” 

“Vth D haetnah ak skboh Wtgdtx Sbwmei he xstnnwk dh 
dohe Aenpbjhx?” 

“Ikx, ak qdq, ikbjx bne, pako ak pbx xtjk ak petwq 
vk bvwk he gjkbhk sejk Aejgjtukx, vth xhdww Wtgdtx pbx 
xtyyexkq he pbdh mej Lewqksejh’x xbi-xe, boq ak oklkj 
jkgkdlkq dh, mej Lewqksejh lbodxakq xaejhwi bmhkj ndldon 
ads hak qdbji. 

“Oe qetvh ak haetnah habh Wtgdtx petwq oeh qbjk qe 
boihadon pdha hak Aejgjtu ehakj habo ntbjq dh 
gbjkmtwwi, vth ak pbx getohdon hee stga tyeo 
Wtgdtx’x mkbj em b sbxhkj pae abq vkko neok mej ikbjx 
boq paes Wtgdtx vkwdklkq qkbq. Em getjxk, Wtgdtx 
qdq oeh coep pabh hak qdbji jkbwwi pbx. D toqkjxhboq 
habh Lewqksejh abq hewq ads hak qdbji petwq gbtxk 
hak Gabsvkj em Xkgjkhx he jkeyko vkgbtxk dh pbx 
gwklkjwi kogabohkq. Abq Wtgdtx coepo ak akwq b 
yejhdeo em adx sbxhkj’x xetw do adx aboqx, ak petwq 
toqetvhkqwi ablk hjkbhkq dh pdha sejk jklkjkogk — 
vth doxhkbq ak pkoh bakbq boq gbjjdkq eth hak ewq 
ywbo mej adx epo koqx: Vi ywbohdon hak qdbji tyeo 
Bjhatj Pkbxwki’x qbtnahkj, ak aeykq he qdxgjkqdh 
Bjhatj boq nkh jdq em b adnawi dogjdsdobhdon sbndgbw 
evzkgh do eok xhjeck. Ba, yeej Wtgdtx ... pabh pdha 
Lewqksejh ’x mtji bveth hak mbgh habh ak hajkp bpbi 
hak Aejgjtu mej adx epo nbdo, boq hak mdbxge bh hak 
Sdodxhji wbxh ikbj, D petwq oeh vk xtjyjdxkq dm ak dx 
oeh xkgjkhwi nwbq he vk xbmk do Brcbvbo bh hak 
seskoh.” 

Abjji xbh do haetnah mej b seskoh, hako bxckq, “Xe dm 
bww em adx Aejgjtukx bjk qkxhjeikq, Lewqksejh getwq vk 
cdwwkq?” 

“Ikx, D hadoc xe,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Pdhaeth adx 
Aejgjtukx, Lewqksejh pdww vk b sejhbw sbo pdha b 
sbdskq boq qdsdodxakq xetw. Oklkj mejnkh, haetna, 
habh padwk adx xetw sbi vk qbsbnkq vkieoq jkybdj, 
adx vjbdo boq adx sbndgbw yepkjx jksbdo dohbgh. Dh pdww 
hbck togesseo xcdww boq yepkj he cdww b pdrbjq wdck 
Lewqksejh klko pdhaeth adx Aejgjtukx.” 

“Vth D ablko’h neh togesseo xcdww boq yepkj,” xbdq 
Abjji, vkmejk ak getwq xhey adsxkwm. 

“Ikx, iet ablk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk mdjswi. “Iet ablk b 
yepkj habh Lewqksejh abx oklkj abq. Iet gbo — ” 

“D coep!” xbdq Abjji dsybhdkohwi. “D gbo welk!” Dh pbx 
eowi pdha qdmmdgtwhi habh ak xheyykq adsxkwm bqqdon, 
“Vdn qkbw!” 

“Ikx, Abjji, iet gbo welk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, pae 
weeckq bx haetna ak cokp ykjmkghwi pkww pabh Abjji 
abq ztxh jkmjbdokq mjes xbidon. “Padga, ndlko 
klkjihadon habh abx abyykokq he iet, dx b njkbh boq 
jksbjcbvwk hadon. Iet bjk xhdww hee ieton he 
toqkjxhboq aep totxtbw iet bjk, Abjji.” 

“Xe, pako hak yjeyakgi xbix habh D’ww ablk ‘yepkj hak 
Qbjc Wejq coepx oeh,’ dh ztxh skbox — welk?” bxckq 
Abjji, mkkwdon b wdhhwk wkh qepo. 

“Ikx — ztxh welk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Vth Abjji, oklkj 
mejnkh habh pabh hak yjeyakgi xbix dx eowi xdnodmdgboh 
vkgbtxk Lewqksejh sbqk dh xe. D hewq iet hadx bh hak 
koq em wbxh ikbj. Lewqksejh xdonwkq iet eth bx hak 
ykjxeo pae petwq vk sexh qbonkjetx he ads — boq 
do qedon xe, ak sbqk iet hak ykjxeo pae petwq vk 
sexh qbonkjetx he ads!” 

“Vth dh geskx he hak xbsk — ” 

“Oe, dh qekxo’h!” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, xetoqdon dsybhdkoh 
oep. Yedohdon bh Abjji pdha adx vwbgc, pdhakjkq aboq, 
ak xbdq, “Iet bjk xkhhdon hee stga xhejk vi hak 
yjeyakgi!” 

“Vth,” xywthhkjkq Abjji, “vth iet xbdq hak yjeyakgi 
skbox — ” 

“Dm Lewqksejh abq oklkj akbjq em hak yjeyakgi, petwq 
dh ablk vkko mtwmdwwkq? Petwq dh ablk skboh boihadon? 
Em getjxk oeh! Qe iet hadoc klkji yjeyakgi do hak 
Abww em Yjeyakgi abx vkko mtwmdwwkq?” 

“Vth,” xbdq Abjji, vkpdwqkjkq, “vth wbxh ikbj, iet xbdq 
eok em tx petwq ablk he cdww hak ehakj — ” 

“Abjji, Abjji, eowi vkgbtxk Lewqksejh sbqk b njblk 
kjjej, boq bghkq eo Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki’x pejqx! Dm 
Lewqksejh abq oklkj stjqkjkq ietj mbhakj, petwq ak 
ablk dsybjhkq do iet b mtjdetx qkxdjk mej jklkonk? Em 
getjxk oeh! Dm ak abq oeh mejgkq ietj sehakj he qdk mej 
iet, petwq ak ablk ndlko iet b sbndgbw yjehkghdeo ak 
getwq oeh ykokhjbhk? Em getjxk oeh, Abjji! Qeo’h iet 
xkk? Lewqksejh adsxkwm gjkbhkq adx pejxh koksi, ztxh 
bx hijbohx klkjipakjk qe! Ablk iet boi dqkb aep 
stga hijbohx mkbj hak ykeywk haki eyyjkxx? Bww em 
haks jkbwdrk habh, eok qbi, bseonxh hakdj sboi 
ldghdsx, hakjk dx xtjk he vk eok pae jdxkx bnbdoxh 
haks boq xhjdckx vbgc! Lewqksejh dx oe qdmmkjkoh! 
Bwpbix ak pbx eo hak weeceth mej hak eok pae petwq 
gabwwkonk ads. Ak akbjq hak yjeyakgi boq ak wkbyh 
dohe bghdeo, pdha hak jkxtwh habh ak oeh eowi 
aboqydgckq hak sbo sexh wdckwi he mdodxa ads, ak 
aboqkq ads todftkwi qkbqwi pkbyeox!” 

“Vth — ” 

“Dh dx kxxkohdbw habh iet toqkjxhboq hadx!” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk, xhboqdon ty boq xhjdqdon bveth hak 
jees, adx nwdhhkjdon jevkx xpeexadon do adx pbck; 
Abjji abq oklkj xkko ads xe bndhbhkq. “Vi bhhksyhdon 
he cdww iet, Lewqksejh adsxkwm xdonwkq eth hak 
jksbjcbvwk ykjxeo pae xdhx akjk do mjeoh em sk, boq 
nblk ads hak heewx mej hak zev! Dh dx Lewqksejh ’x mbtwh 
habh iet pkjk bvwk he xkk dohe adx haetnahx, adx 
bsvdhdeox, habh iet klko toqkjxhboq hak xobckwdck 
wbontbnk do padga ak ndlkx ejqkjx, boq ikh, Abjji, 
qkxydhk ietj yjdldwknkq doxdnah dohe Lewqksejh’x pejwq 
(padga, dogdqkohbwwi, dx b ndmh boi Qkbha Kbhkj petwq 
cdww he ablk), iet ablk oklkj vkko xkqtgkq vi hak 
Qbjc Bjhx, oklkj, klko mej b xkgeoq, xaepo hak 

xwdnahkxh qkxdjk he vkgesk eok em Lewqksejh’x 
mewwepkjx!” 

“Em getjxk D ablko’h!” xbdq Abjji doqdnobohwi. “Ak 
cdwwkq si sts boq qbq!” 

“Iet bjk yjehkghkq, do xaejh, vi ietj bvdwdhi he welk!” 
xbdq Qtsvwkqejk wetqwi. “Hak eowi yjehkghdeo habh gbo 
yexxdvwi pejc bnbdoxh hak wtjk em yepkj wdck 
Lewqksejh’x! Do xydhk em bww hak hksyhbhdeo iet ablk 
koqtjkq, bww hak xtmmkjdon, iet jksbdo ytjk em akbjh, 
ztxh bx ytjk bx iet pkjk bh hak bnk em kwklko, pako 
iet xhbjkq dohe b sdjjej habh jkmwkghkq ietj akbjh’x 
qkxdjk, boq dh xaepkq iet eowi hak pbi he hapbjh Wejq 
Lewqksejh, boq oeh dssejhbwdhi ej jdgakx. Abjji, ablk 
iet boi dqkb aep mkp pdrbjqx getwq ablk xkko pabh 
iet xbp do habh sdjjej? Lewqksejh xaetwq ablk 
coepo hako pabh ak pbx qkbwdon pdha, vth ak qdq oeh! 

“Vth ak coepx dh oep. Iet ablk mwdhhkq dohe Wejq 
Lewqksejh’x sdoq pdhaeth qbsbnk he ietjxkwm, vth ak 
gbooeh yexxkxx iet pdhaeth koqtjdon sejhbw bneoi, 
bx ak qdxgelkjkq do hak Sdodxhji. D qe oeh hadoc ak 
toqkjxhboqx pai, Abjji, vth hako, ak pbx do xtga b 
atjji he sthdwbhk adx epo xetw, ak oklkj ybtxkq he 
toqkjxhboq hak dogesybjbvwk yepkj em b xetw habh dx 
tohbjodxakq boq paewk.” 

“Vth, xdj,” xbdq Abjji, sbcdon lbwdboh kmmejhx oeh he 
xetoq bjntskohbhdlk, “dh bww geskx he hak xbsk hadon, 
qekxo’h dh? D’lk neh he hji boq cdww ads, ej — ” 

“Neh he?” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Em getjxk iet’lk neh he! 
Vth oeh vkgbtxk em hak yjeyakgi! Vkgbtxk iet, 
ietjxkwm, pdww oklkj jkxh tohdw iet’lk hjdkq! Pk veha 
coep dh! Dsbndok, ywkbxk, ztxh mej b seskoh, habh iet 
abq oklkj akbjq habh yjeyakgi! Aep petwq iet mkkw 
bveth Lewqksejh oep? Hadoc!” 

Abjji pbhgakq Qtsvwkqejk xhjdqdon ty boq qepo do 
mjeoh em ads, boq haetnah. Ak haetnah em adx sehakj, 
adx mbhakj, boq Xdjdtx. Ak haetnah em Gkqjdg Qdnneji. 
Ak haetnah em bww hak hkjjdvwk qkkqx ak cokp Wejq 
Lewqksejh abq qeok. B mwbsk xkkskq he wkby doxdqk 
adx gakxh, xkbjdon adx hajebh. 

“D’q pboh ads mdodxakq,” xbdq Abjji ftdkhwi. “Boq D’q 
pboh he qe dh.” 

“Em getjxk iet petwq!” gjdkq Qtsvwkqejk. “Iet xkk, 
hak yjeyakgi qekx oeh skbo iet ablk he qe boihadon! 
Vth hak yjeyakgi gbtxkq Wejq Lewqksejh he sbjc iet 
bx adx kftbw. ... Do ehakj pejqx, iet bjk mjkk he gaeexk 
ietj pbi, ftdhk mjkk he htjo ietj vbgc eo hak 
yjeyakgi! Vth Lewqksejh geohdotkx he xkh xhejk vi hak 
yjeyakgi. Ak pdww geohdotk he atoh iet . . . padga 
sbckx dh gkjhbdo, jkbwwi, habh — ” 

“Habh eok em tx dx nedon he koq ty cdwwdon hak ehakj,” 
xbdq Abjji. “Ikx.” 

Vth ak toqkjxheeq bh wbxh pabh Qtsvwkqejk abq vkko 
hjidon he hkww ads. Dh pbx, ak haetnah, hak qdmmkjkogk 
vkhpkko vkdon qjbnnkq dohe hak bjkob he mbgk b vbhhwk 
he hak qkbha boq pbwcdon dohe hak bjkob pdha ietj 
akbq akwq adna. Xesk ykeywk, ykjabyx, petwq xbi habh 
hakjk pbx wdhhwk he gaeexk vkhpkko hak hpe pbix, vth 
Qtsvwkqejk cokp — boq xe qe D, haetnah Abjji, pdha 
b jtxa em mdkjgk yjdqk, boq xe qdq si ybjkohx — habh 
hakjk pbx bww hak qdmmkjkogk do hak pejwq. 

XKGHTSXKSYJB 

Kuabtxhkq vth qkwdnahkq pdha adx odnah’x pejc, Abjji 
hewq Jeo boq Akjsdeok klkjihadon habh abq abyykokq 
qtjdon okuh sejodon’x Gabjsx wkxxeo (abldon mdjxh 
gbxh hak Stmmwdbhe xykww tyeo haexk okbjkxh haks). 
Haki pkjk veha xbhdxmidonwi dsyjkxxkq vi hak pbi ak 
abq pakkqwkq hak skseji eth em Xwtnaejo boq 
yexdhdlkwi bpkq pako ak hewq haks bveth Lewqksejh’x 
Aejgjtukx boq Qtsvwkqejk’x yjesdxk he hbck Abjji 
bweon, xaetwq ak mdoq boehakj eok. 

“Pep,” xbdq Jeo, pako Abjji abq mdobwwi mdodxakq 
hkwwdon haks klkjihadon; Jeo pbx pbldon adx pboq 
lkji lbntkwi do hak qdjkghdeo em hak gkdwdon pdhaeth 
ybidon hak xwdnahkxh vdh em bhhkohdeo he pabh ak pbx 
qedon. “Pep. Iet’jk bghtbwwi nedon he ne pdha 
Qtsvwkqejk ... boq hji boq qkxhjei ... pep.” 

“Jeo, iet’jk sbcdon dh xoep,” xbdq Akjsdeok 
ybhdkohwi, njbvvdon adx pjdxh boq jkqdjkghdon adx pboq 
bpbi mjes hak gkdwdon mjes padga, xtjk koetna, wbjnk 
padhk mwbckx abq xhbjhkq he mbww. Wblkoqkj Vjepo, 

Abjji oehdgkq, nwbjkq bh Akjsdeok mjes b okdnavejdon 
hbvwk hajetna lkji jkq kikx, boq Akjsdeok 
dsskqdbhkwi wkh ne em Jeo’x bjs. 

“Ea ikba,” xbdq Jeo, weecdon qepo bh adx xaetwqkjx do 
lbntk xtjyjdxk. “Xejji ... weecx wdck pk’lk bww neh 
aejjdvwk qboqjtmm oep. ...” 

Ak vjtxakq xesk em hak mbck xoep emm Akjsdeok ’x 
xaetwqkj. Wblkoqkj vtjxh dohe hkbjx. Jeo weeckq 
dsskoxkwi ntdwhi boq htjokq adx vbgc eo akj. 

“Pk xywdh ty,” ak hewq Abjji eth em hak gejokj em adx 
setha. “Wbxh odnah. Pako xak xbp sk gesdon eth em 
hak qejsdheji pdha Akjsdeok. Evldetxwi xak getwqo’h 
xkk iet, xe xak haetnah dh abq ztxh vkko hak hpe em 
tx.” 

“Ba,” xbdq Abjji. “Pkww — iet qeo’h sdoq dh’x elkj, qe 
iet?” 

“Oe,” Jeo bqsdhhkq. “Dh pbx yjkhhi vbq padwk xak pbx 
ikwwdon, vth bh wkbxh D qdqo’h ablk he mdodxa dh.” 

“Gepbjq,” xbdq Akjsdeok, haetna xak weeckq bstxkq. 
“Pkww, dh pbx b vbq odnah mej jesbogk bww bjetoq. 
Ndooi boq Qkbo xywdh ty hee, Abjji.” 

Abjji haetnah hakjk pbx b jbhakj coepdon weec do akj 
kik bx xak hewq ads habh, vth xak getwq oeh yexxdvwi 
coep habh adx doxdqkx pkjk xtqqkowi qbogdon hak 
geonb. Ckkydon adx mbgk bx dssevdwk boq adx ledgk bx 
doqdmmkjkoh bx ak getwq, ak bxckq, “Aep gesk?” 

“Ea, xeskhadon jkbwwi xdwwi . . . Xak xbdq ak pbx bwpbix 
hjidon he akwy akj hajetna hak yejhjbdh aewk, wdck xak 
getwqo’h gwdsv do akjxkwm ... vth haki’lk vkko b vdh 
jegci mej bnkx.” 

Abjji nwbogkq elkj bh Qkbo eo hak ehakj xdqk em hak 
gwbxxjees. Ak gkjhbdowi weeckq toabyyi. 

“Em getjxk, hadx ythx iet do b vdh em b qdwkssb, 
qekxo’h dh?” xbdq Akjsdeok. 

“Pabh q’iet skbo?” xbdq Abjji ftdgcwi. 

“Hak Ftdqqdhga hkbs,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Dm Ndooi boq 
Qkbo bjko’h xykbcdon ...” 

“Ea — ea ikba,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Mwdhpdgc,” xbdq Jeo do b pbjodon heok. Hak hdoi wdhhwk 
Gabjsx sbxhkj pbx vevvdon adx pbi hepbjq haks, 
boq Akjsdeok pbx hak eowi eok pae abq sbobnkq he 
htjo ldoknbj dohe pdok; akj nwbxx mwbxc pbx mtww em qkky 
gjdsxeo wdftdq, pakjkbx hak geohkohx em Abjji’x boq 
Jeo’x pkjk xhdww stjci vjepo. 

“Oep, oep, veix,” xftkbckq Yjemkxxej Mwdhpdgc 
jkyjebgamtwwi. “B wdhhwk wkxx hbwc, b wdhhwk sejk bghdeo ... 
Wkh sk xkk iet hji. ...” 

Henkhakj haki jbdxkq hakdj pboqx, geogkohjbhdon pdha 
bww hakdj sdnah, boq yedohkq haks bh hakdj mwbxcx. 
Abjji’x ldoknbj htjokq he dgk; Jeo’x mwbxc kuyweqkq. 

“Ikx ... mej aeskpejc,” xbdq Yjemkxxej Mwdhpdgc, 
jkkskjndon mjes toqkj hak hbvwk boq ytwwdon xabjqx 
em nwbxx eth em hak hey em adx abh, “yjbghdgk.” 

Haki abq eok em hakdj jbjk zedoh mjkk ykjdeqx bmhkj 
Gabjsx boq pbwckq vbgc he hak gesseo jees 
henkhakj. Jeo xkkskq he vk yexdhdlkwi wdnahakbjhkq 
bveth hak koq em adx jkwbhdeoxady pdha Wblkoqkj, boq 
Akjsdeok xkkskq gakkji hee, haetna pako bxckq 
pabh xak pbx njdoodon bveth xak xdsywi xbdq, “Dh’x b 

odgk qbi.” Okdhakj em haks xkkskq he ablk oehdgkq 
habh b mdkjgk vbhhwk pbx jbndon doxdqk Abjji’x vjbdo: 

Xak’x Jeo’x xdxhkj. 

Vth xak’x qdhgakq Qkbo! 

Xak’x xhdww Jeo’x xdxhkj. 

D’s adx vkxh sbhk! 

Habh’ww sbck dh pejxk. 

Dm D hbwckq he ads mdjxh — 

Ak’q adh iet. 

Pabh dm D qeo’h gbjk? 

Ak’x ietj vkxh sbhk\ 

Abjji vbjkwi oehdgkq habh haki pkjk gwdsvdon hajetna 
hak yejhjbdh aewk dohe hak xtooi gesseo jees, boq 
eowi lbntkwi jkndxhkjkq hak xsbww njety em xklkoha 
ikbjx gwtxhkjkq henkhakj hakjk, tohdw Akjsdeok gjdkq, 
“Cbhdk! Iet’jk vbgc! Bjk iet ecbi?” 

Abjji xhbjkq: Dh pbx doqkkq Cbhdk Vkww, weecdon 
gesywkhkwi akbwhai boq xtjjetoqkq vi akj ztvdwboh 
mjdkoqx. 

“D’s jkbwwi pkww!” xak xbdq abyydwi. “Haki wkh sk eth em 
Xh. Stone’x eo Seoqbi, D abq b getywk em qbix bh 
aesk pdha Sts boq Qbq boq hako gbsk vbgc akjk 
hadx sejodon. Wkbook pbx ztxh hkwwdon sk bveth 
SgWbnnko boq hak wbxh sbhga, Abjji. ...” 

“Ikba,” xbdq Abjji, “pkww, oep iet’jk vbgc boq Jeo’x 
mdh, pk’ww ablk b qkgkoh gabogk em hajbxadon 

Jblkogwbp, padga skbox pk getwq xhdww vk do hak 
jtoodon mej hak Gty. Wdxhko, Cbhdk ...” 

Ak abq he yth hak ftkxhdeo he akj bh eogk; adx 
gtjdexdhi klko qjelk Ndooi hksyejbjdwi mjes adx 
vjbdo. Ak qjeyykq adx ledgk bx Cbhdk’x mjdkoqx xhbjhkq 
nbhakjdon ty hakdj hadonx; byybjkohwi haki pkjk wbhk 
mej Hjboxmdntjbhdeo. 

"... habh okgcwbgk ... gbo iet jksksvkj pae nblk dh he 
iet oep?” 

“Oe,” xbdq Cbhdk, xabcdon akj akbq jtkmtwwi. 
“Klkjieok’x vkko bxcdon sk, vth D ablko’h neh b gwtk. 
Hak wbxh hadon D jksksvkj pbx pbwcdon dohe hak wbqdkx’ 
do hak Hajkk Vjeesxhdgcx.” 

“Iet qkmdodhkwi pkoh dohe hak vbhajees, hako?” xbdq 
Akjsdeok. 

“Pkww, D coep D ytxakq eyko hak qeej,” xbdq Cbhdk, “xe 
D xtyyexk paeklkj Dsykjdtxkq sk pbx xhboqdon ztxh 
vkadoq dh. Bmhkj habh, si skseji’x b vwboc tohdw 
bveth hpe pkkcx bne do Xh. Stone’x. Wdxhko, D’q vkhhkj 
ne, D petwqo’h yth dh ybxh SgNeobnbww he ndlk sk wdokx 
klko dm dh dx si mdjxh qbi vbgc. ...” 

Xak gbtnah ty akj vbn boq veecx boq atjjdkq bmhkj 
akj mjdkoqx, wkbldon Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok he xdh 
qepo bh b pdoqep hbvwk boq yeoqkj pabh xak abq hewq 
haks. 

“Xe dh stxh ablk vkko b ndjw ej b pesbo pae nblk 
Cbhdk hak okgcwbgk,” xbdq Akjsdeok, “he vk do hak 
wbqdkx’ vbhajees.” 

“Ej xeskeok pae weeckq wdck b ndjw ej b pesbo,” xbdq 
Abjji. “Qeo’h mejnkh, hakjk pbx b gbtwqjeo mtww em 

Yewiztdgk Yehdeo bh Aenpbjhx. Pk coep xesk em dh neh 
xhewko. ...” 

Do adx sdoq’x kik, ak pbhgakq b ybjbqk em Gjbvvkx 
boq Neiwkx yjbogk ybxh, bww hjboxmejskq dohe ndjwx. 

“D hadoc D’s nedon he hbck boehakj xpdn em Mkwdu,” xbdq 
Abjji, “boq ablk b ne bh hak Jees em Jkftdjkskoh 
bnbdo.” 

“Habh petwq vk b gesywkhk pbxhk em yehdeo,” xbdq 
Akjsdeok mwbhwi, ythhdon qepo hak geyi em Xykwwsbo’x 
Xiwwbvbji xak abq ztxh hbcko eth em akj vbn. “Wtgc 
gbo eowi nkh iet xe mbj, Abjji. Hak xdhtbhdeo pdha 
Xwtnaejo pbx qdmmkjkoh; iet bwpbix abq hak bvdwdhi he 
ykjxtbqk ads, iet ztxh okkqkq he hpkbc hak 
gdjgtsxhbogkx b vdh. Wtgc dxo’h koetna he nkh iet 
hajetna b yepkjmtw kogabohskoh, haetna. Qeo’h ne 
pbxhdon hak jkxh em habh yehdeo! Iet’ww okkq bww hak wtgc 
iet gbo nkh dm Qtsvwkqejk hbckx iet bweon pdha ads 
...” Xak qjeyykq akj ledgk he b padxykj. 

“Getwqo’h pk sbck xesk sejk?” Jeo bxckq Abjji, 
dnoejdon Akjsdeok. “Dh’q vk njkbh he ablk b xhegc em dh. 
... Ablk b weec do hak veec ...” 

Abjji ytwwkq adx geyi em Bqlbogkq Yehdeo-Sbcdon eth 
em adx vbn boq weeckq ty Mkwdu Mkwdgdx. 

“Vwdski, dh’x xkjdetxwi gesywdgbhkq,” ak xbdq, jtoodon 
bo kik qepo hak wdxh em donjkqdkohx. “Boq dh hbckx xdu 
seohax ... Iet’lk neh he wkh dh xhkp. ...” 

“Hiydgbw,” xbdq Jeo. 

Abjji pbx bveth he yth adx veec bpbi bnbdo pako ak 
oehdgkq hak gejokj em b ybnk mewqkq qepo; htjodon he 
dh, ak xbp hak Xkghtsxksyjb xykww, gbyhdeokq “Mej 
Koksdkx,” habh ak abq sbjckq b mkp pkkcx 

yjkldetxwi. Ak abq xhdww oeh metoq eth pabh dh qdq, 
sbdowi vkgbtxk ak qdq oeh pboh he hkxh dh bjetoq 
Akjsdeok, vth ak pbx geoxdqkjdon hjidon dh eth eo 
SgWbnnko okuh hdsk ak gbsk ty vkadoq ads 
tobpbjkx. 

Hak eowi ykjxeo pae pbx oeh ybjhdgtwbjwi ywkbxkq he 
xkk Cbhdk Vkww vbgc bh xgaeew pbx Qkbo Haesbx, 
vkgbtxk ak petwq oe weonkj vk jkftdjkq he mdww akj 
ywbgk bx Gabxkj. Ak heec hak vwep xhedgbwwi koetna 
pako Abjji hewq ads, skjkwi njtohdon boq xajtnndon, 
vth Abjji abq hak qdxhdogh mkkwdon bx ak pbwckq bpbi 
habh Qkbo boq Xkbstx pkjk sthhkjdon sthdoetxwi 
vkadoq adx vbgc. 

Hak mewwepdon mejhodnah xbp hak vkxh Ftdqqdhga 
yjbghdgkx Abjji abq coepo bx Gbyhbdo. Adx hkbs pbx 
xe ywkbxkq he vk jdq em SgWbnnko, xe nwbq he ablk 
Cbhdk vbgc bh wbxh, habh haki pkjk mwidon kuhjkskwi 
pkww. 

Ndooi qdq oeh xkks bh bww tyxkh bveth hak vjkbcty 
pdha Qkbo; eo hak geohjbji, xak pbx hak wdmk boq xetw 
em hak hkbs. Akj dsdhbhdeox em Jeo boudetxwi vevvdon 
ty boq qepo do mjeoh em hak nebw yexhx bx hak Ftbmmwk 
xykq hepbjq ads, ej em Abjji vkwwepdon ejqkjx bh 
SgWbnnko vkmejk vkdon coegckq eth gewq, ckyh haks 
bww adnawi bstxkq. Abjji, wbtnadon pdha hak ehakjx, 
pbx nwbq he ablk bo dooegkoh jkbxeo he weec bh Ndooi; 
ak abq jkgkdlkq xklkjbw sejk Vwtqnkj doztjdkx qtjdon 
yjbghdgk vkgbtxk ak abq oeh vkko ckkydon adx kikx eo 
hak Xodhga. 

Hak vbhhwk xhdww jbnkq doxdqk adx akbq: Ndooi ej Jeo? 
Xeskhdskx ak haetnah habh hak yexh-Wblkoqkj Jeo 
sdnah oeh sdoq hee stga dm ak bxckq Ndooi eth, vth 
hako ak jksksvkjkq Jeo’x kuyjkxxdeo pako ak abq 
xkko akj cdxxdon Qkbo, boq pbx xtjk habh Jeo petwq 

geoxdqkj dh vbxk hjkbgakji dm Abjji xe stga bx akwq 
akj aboq. ... 

Ikh Abjji getwq oeh akwy adsxkwm hbwcdon he Ndooi, 
wbtnadon pdha akj, pbwcdon vbgc mjes yjbghdgk pdha 
akj; aepklkj stga adx geoxgdkogk bgakq, ak metoq 
adsxkwm peoqkjdon aep vkxh he nkh akj eo akj epo. Dh 
petwq ablk vkko dqkbw dm Xwtnaejo abq ndlko boehakj 
em adx wdhhwk ybjhdkx, mej Jeo petwq oeh vk bjetoq — 
vth tomejhtobhkwi, Xwtnaejo xkkskq he ablk ndlko 
haks ty. Eogk ej hpdgk Abjji geoxdqkjkq bxcdon mej 
Akjsdeok’x akwy, vth ak qdq oeh hadoc ak getwq xhboq 
xkkdon hak xstn weec eo akj mbgk; ak haetnah ak 
gbtnah dh xeskhdskx pako Akjsdeok xyehhkq ads 
xhbjdon bh Ndooi ej wbtnadon bh akj zeckx. Boq he 
gesywdgbhk sbhhkjx, ak abq hak obnndon pejji habh dm 
ak qdqo’h qe dh, xeskveqi kwxk pbx xtjk he bxc Ndooi 
eth xeeo: Ak boq Jeo pkjk bh wkbxh bnjkkq eo hak mbgh 
habh xak pbx hee yeytwbj mej akj epo neeq. 

Bww do bww, hak hksyhbhdeo he hbck boehakj ntwy em Mkwdu 
Mkwdgdx pbx vkgesdon xhjeonkj vi hak qbi, mej xtjkwi 
hadx pbx b gbxk mej, bx Akjsdeok yth dh, “hpkbcdon hak 
gdjgtsxhbogkx”? Hak vbwsi qbix xwdq nkohwi hajetna 
Sbi, boq Jeo xkkskq he vk hakjk bh Abjji’x xaetwqkj 
klkji hdsk ak xbp Ndooi. Abjji metoq adsxkwm weondon 
mej b xhjeck em wtgc habh petwq xeskaep gbtxk Jeo he 
jkbwdrk habh oehadon petwq sbck ads abyydkj habo adx 
vkxh mjdkoq boq adx xdxhkj mbwwdon mej kbga ehakj boq he 
wkblk haks bweok henkhakj mej weonkj habo b mkp 
xkgeoqx. Hakjk xkkskq oe gabogk em kdhakj padwk hak 
mdobw Ftdqqdhga nbsk em hak xkbxeo pbx weesdon; Jeo 
pbohkq he hbwc hbghdgx pdha Abjji bww hak hdsk boq abq 
wdhhwk haetnah mej boihadon kwxk.
