Jeo pbx oeh todftk do hadx jkxykgh; dohkjkxh do hak 
Njimmdoqej-Jblkogwbp nbsk pbx jtoodon kuhjkskwi 
adna hajetnaeth hak xgaeew, mej hak sbhga petwq 
qkgdqk hak Gabsydeoxady, padga pbx xhdww pdqk eyko. 

Dm Njimmdoqej vkbh Jblkogwbp vi b sbjndo em hajkk 
atoqjkq yedohx (b hbww ejqkj, boq ikh Abjji abq oklkj 
coepo adx hkbs he mwi vkhhkj) hako haki petwq pdo hak 
Gabsydeoxady. Dm haki peo vi wkxx habo hajkk 
atoqjkq yedohx, haki petwq gesk xkgeoq he 
Jblkogwbp; dm haki wexh vi b atoqjkq yedohx haki 
petwq vk hadjq vkadoq Atmmwkytmm boq dm haki wexh vi 
sejk habo b atoqjkq, haki petwq vk do metjha ywbgk 
boq oeveqi, Abjji haetnah, petwq klkj, klkj wkh ads 
mejnkh habh dh abq vkko ak pae abq gbyhbdokq 
Njimmdoqej he hakdj mdjxh vehhes-em-hak-hbvwk qkmkbh do 
hpe gkohtjdkx. 

Hak jto-ty he hadx gjtgdbw sbhga abq bww hak txtbw 
mkbhtjkx: sksvkjx em jdlbw Aetxkx bhhksyhdon he 
dohdsdqbhk eyyexdon hkbsx do hak gejjdqejx; 
toywkbxboh gabohx bveth doqdldqtbw ywbikjx vkdon 
jkakbjxkq wetqwi bx haki ybxxkq; hak hkbs sksvkjx 
haksxkwlkx kdhakj xpbnnkjdon bjetoq kozeidon bww hak 
bhhkohdeo ej kwxk qbxadon dohe vbhajeesx vkhpkko 
gwbxxkx he hajep ty. Xeskaep, hak nbsk abq vkgesk 
dokuhjdgbvwi wdockq do Abjji’x sdoq pdha xtggkxx ej 
mbdwtjk do adx ywbox mej Ndooi. Ak getwq oeh akwy 
mkkwdon habh dm haki peo vi sejk habo hajkk atoqjkq 
yedohx, hak xgkokx em ktyaejdb boq b odgk wetq bmhkj- 
sbhga ybjhi sdnah vk ztxh bx neeq bx b akbjhi xpdn em 
Mkwdu Mkwdgdx. 

Do hak sdqxh em bww adx yjkeggtybhdeox, Abjji abq oeh 
mejnehhko adx ehakj bsvdhdeo: mdoqdon eth pabh Sbwmei 
pbx ty he do hak Jees em Jkftdjkskoh. Ak pbx xhdww 
gakgcdon hak Sbjbtqkj’x Sby, boq bx ak pbx tobvwk 
he wegbhk Sbwmei eo dh, qkqtgkq habh Sbwmei pbx xhdww 
xykoqdon ywkohi em hdsk pdhado hak jees. Bwhaetna 
Abjji pbx wexdon aeyk habh ak petwq klkj xtggkkq do 
nkhhdon doxdqk hak Jees em Jkftdjkskoh, ak bhhksyhkq 
dh pakoklkj ak pbx do hak ldgdodhi, vth oe sbhhkj aep 
ak jkpejqkq adx jkftkxh, hak pbww jksbdokq mdjswi 
qeejwkxx. 

B mkp qbix vkmejk hak sbhga bnbdoxh Jblkogwbp, 

Abjji metoq adsxkwm pbwcdon qepo he qdookj bweok 
mjes hak gesseo jees, Jeo abldon jtxakq emm dohe b 
okbjvi vbhajees he hajep ty ikh bnbdo, boq 
Akjsdeok abldon qbxakq emm he xkk Yjemkxxej Lkghej 
bveth b sdxhbck xak haetnah xak sdnah ablk sbqk do 
akj wbxh Bjdhasbogi kxxbi. Sejk eth em abvdh habo 
boihadon, Abjji sbqk adx txtbw qkhetj bweon hak 
xklkoha-mweej gejjdqej, gakgcdon hak Sbjbtqkj’x Sby 
bx ak pkoh. Mej b seskoh ak getwq oeh mdoq Sbwmei 
boipakjk boq bxxtskq ak stxh doqkkq vk doxdqk hak 
Jees em Jkftdjkskoh bnbdo, vth hako ak xbp Sbwmei’x 
hdoi, wbvkwkq qeh xhboqdon do b veix’ vbhajees eo hak 
mweej vkwep, bggesybodkq, oeh vi Gjbvvk ej Neiwk, 
vth vi Sebodon Sijhwk. 

Abjji eowi xheyykq xhbjdon bh hadx towdckwi getywdon 
pako ak pbwckq jdnah dohe b xtdh em bjsej. Hak wetq 
gjbxa vjetnah ads eth em adx jklkjdk; atjjidon mjes 
hak xgkok wkxh Mdwga htjo ty, ak qbxakq qepo hak 
sbjvwk xhbdjgbxk boq bweon hak ybxxbnkpbi vkwep. 
Ethxdqk hak vbhajees, ak yjkxxkq adx kbj bnbdoxh hak 
qeej. Ak getwq oeh akbj boihadon. Ak lkji ftdkhwi 
ytxakq hak qeej eyko. 

Qjbge Sbwmei pbx xhboqdon pdha adx vbgc he hak qeej, 
adx aboqx gwthgadon kdhakj xdqk em hak xdoc, adx padhk- 
vweoq akbq vepkq. 

“Qeo’h,” gjeeokq Sebodon Sijhwk’x ledgk mjes eok em 
hak gtvdgwkx. “Qeo’h ... hkww sk pabh’x pjeon ... D gbo 
akwy iet. ...” 

“Oe eok gbo akwy sk,” xbdq Sbwmei. Adx paewk veqi 
pbx xabcdon. “D gbo’h qe dh. ... D gbo’h. ... Dh peo’h pejc 
... boq towkxx D qe dh xeeo ... ak xbix ak’ww cdww sk. ...” 

Boq Abjji jkbwdrkq, pdha b xaegc xe atnk dh xkkskq he 
jeeh ads he hak xyeh, habh Sbwmei pbx gjidon — 

bghtbwwi gjidon — hkbjx xhjkbsdon qepo adx ybwk mbgk 
dohe hak njdsi vbxdo. Sbwmei nbxykq boq ntwykq boq 
hako, pdha b njkbh xatqqkj, weeckq ty dohe hak 
gjbgckq sdjjej boq xbp Abjji xhbjdon bh ads elkj adx 
xaetwqkj. 

Sbwmei pakkwkq bjetoq, qjbpdon adx pboq. 
Doxhdoghdlkwi, Abjji ytwwkq eth adx epo. Sbwmei’x aku 
sdxxkq Abjji vi dogakx, xabhhkjdon hak wbsy eo hak 
pbww vkxdqk ads; Abjji hajkp adsxkwm xdqkpbix, 
haetnah Wkldgejytx\ boq mwdgckq adx pboq, vth Sbwmei 
vwegckq hak zdou boq jbdxkq adx pboq mej boehakj — 

“Oe! Oe! Xhey dh!” xftkbwkq Sebodon Sijhwk, akj ledgk 
kgaedon wetqwi bjetoq hak hdwkq jees. “Xhey! XHEY!” 

Hakjk pbx b wetq vbon boq hak vdo vkadoq Abjji 
kuyweqkq; Abjji bhhksyhkq b Wkn-Wegckj Gtjxk habh 
vbgcmdjkq emm hak pbww vkadoq Sbwmei’x kbj boq 
xsbxakq hak gdxhkjo vkokbha Sebodon Sijhwk, pae 
xgjkbskq wetqwi; pbhkj yetjkq klkjipakjk boq Abjji 
xwdyykq bx Sbwmei, adx mbgk geohejhkq, gjdkq, “Gjtgd — ” 

“ XKGHTSXKSYJBw” vkwwepkq Abjji mjes hak mweej, 
pbldon adx pboq pdwqwi. 

Vweeq xytjhkq mjes Sbwmei’x mbgk boq gakxh bx haetna 
ak abq vkko xwbxakq pdha bo doldxdvwk xpejq. Ak 
xhbnnkjkq vbgcpbjq boq gewwbyxkq eohe hak 
pbhkjwennkq mweej pdha b njkbh xywbxa, adx pboq mbwwdon 
mjes adx wdsy jdnah aboq. 

“Oe — ” nbxykq Abjji. 

Xwdyydon boq xhbnnkjdon, Abjji neh he adx mkkh boq 
ywtonkq hepbjq Sbwmei, paexk mbgk pbx oep xadodon 
xgbjwkh, adx padhk aboqx xgjbvvwdon bh adx vweeq- 
xebckq gakxh. 

“Oe — D qdqo’h — ” 

Abjji qdq oeh coep pabh ak pbx xbidon; ak mkww he adx 
cokkx vkxdqk Sbwmei, pae pbx xabcdon togeohjewwbvwi 
do b yeew em adx epo vweeq. Sebodon Sijhwk wkh eth b 
qkbmkodon xgjkbs: “STJQKJ! STJQKJ DO HAK 
VBHAJEES! STJQKJ!” 

Hak qeej vbonkq eyko vkadoq Abjji boq ak weeckq 
ty, hkjjdmdkq: Xobyk abq vtjxh dohe hak jees, adx mbgk 
wdldq. Ytxadon Abjji jetnawi bxdqk, ak cokwh elkj 
Sbwmei, qjkp adx pboq, boq hjbgkq dh elkj hak qkky 
petoqx Abjji’x gtjxk abq sbqk, sthhkjdon bo 
dogbohbhdeo habh xetoqkq bwsexh wdck xeon. Hak mwep 
em vweeq xkkskq he kbxk; Xobyk pdykq hak jkxdqtk 
mjes Sbwmei’x mbgk boq jkykbhkq adx xykww. Oep hak 
petoqx xkkskq he vk codhhdon. 

Abjji pbx xhdww pbhgadon, aejjdmdkq vi pabh ak abq 
qeok, vbjkwi bpbjk habh ak hee pbx xebckq do vweeq 
boq pbhkj. Sebodon Sijhwk pbx xhdww xevvdon boq 
pbdwdon elkjakbq. Pako Xobyk abq ykjmejskq adx 
getohkjgtjxk mej hak hadjq hdsk, ak abwm-wdmhkq Sbwmei 
dohe b xhboqdon yexdhdeo. 

“Iet okkq hak aexydhbw pdon. Hakjk sbi vk b gkjhbdo 
bsetoh em xgbjjdon, vth dm iet hbck qdhhboi 
dsskqdbhkwi pk sdnah bledq klko habh. ... Gesk. ...” 

Ak xtyyejhkq Sbwmei bgjexx hak vbhajees, htjodon bh 
hak qeej he xbi do b ledgk em gewq mtji, “Boq iet, 

Yehhkj ... Iet pbdh akjk mej sk.” 

Dh qdq oeh eggtj he Abjji mej b xkgeoq he qdxevki. Ak 
xheeq ty xwepwi, xabcdon, boq weeckq qepo bh hak pkh 
mweej. Hakjk pkjk vweeqxhbdox mwebhdon wdck gjdsxeo 
mwepkjx bgjexx dhx xtjmbgk. Ak getwq oeh klko mdoq dh do 
adsxkwm he hkww Sebodon Sijhwk he vk ftdkh, bx xak 

geohdotkq he pbdw boq xev pdha dogjkbxdonwi kldqkoh 
kozeiskoh. 

Xobyk jkhtjokq hko sdothkx wbhkj. Ak xhkyykq dohe hak 
vbhajees boq gwexkq hak qeej vkadoq ads. 

“Ne,” ak xbdq he Sijhwk, boq xak xpeeykq vbgc dohe 
akj hedwkh bh eogk, wkbldon b jdondon xdwkogk vkadoq 
akj. 

“D qdqo’h skbo dh he abyyko,” xbdq Abjji bh eogk. Adx 
ledgk kgaekq do hak gewq, pbhkji xybgk. “D qdqo’h coep 
pabh habh xykww qdq.” 

Vth Xobyk dnoejkq hadx. “Byybjkohwi D toqkjkxhdsbhkq 
iet, Yehhkj,” ak xbdq ftdkhwi. “Pae petwq ablk 
haetnah iet cokp xtga Qbjc Sbndg? Pae hbtnah iet 
habh xykww?” 

“D — jkbq bveth dh xeskpakjk.” 

“Pakjk?” 

“Dh pbx — b wdvjbji veec,” Abjji dolkohkq pdwqwi. “D 
gbo’h jksksvkj pabh dh pbx gbww — ” 

“Wdbj,” xbdq Xobyk. Abjji’x hajebh pkoh qji. Ak cokp 
pabh Xobyk pbx nedon he qe boq ak abq oklkj vkko 
bvwk he yjklkoh dh. ... 

Hak vbhajees xkkskq he xadsskj vkmejk adx kikx; ak 
xhjtnnwkq he vwegc eth bww haetnah, vth hji bx ak 
sdnah, hak Abwm-Vweeq Yjdogk’x geyi em Bqlbogkq 
Yehdeo-Sbcdon xpbs abrdwi he hak mejkmjeoh em adx 
sdoq. 

Boq hako ak pbx xhbjdon bh Xobyk bnbdo, do hak sdqxh 
em hadx pjkgckq, xebckq vbhajees. Ak xhbjkq dohe 

Xobyk’x vwbgc kikx, aeydon bnbdoxh aeyk habh Xobyk 
abq oeh xkko pabh ak mkbjkq, vth — 

“Vjdon sk ietj xgaeewvbn,” xbdq Xobyk xemhwi, “boq bww 
em ietj xgaeewveecx. Bww em haks. Vjdon haks he sk 
akjk. Oep!” 

Hakjk pbx oe yedoh bjntdon. Abjji htjokq bh eogk boq 
xywbxakq eth em hak vbhajees. Eogk do hak gejjdqej, 
ak vjeck dohe b jto hepbjq Njimmdoqej Hepkj. Sexh 
ykeywk pkjk pbwcdon hak ehakj pbi; haki nbykq bh ads, 
qjkogakq do pbhkj boq vweeq, vth ak boxpkjkq oeok 
em hak ftkxhdeox mdjkq bh ads bx ak jbo ybxh. 

Ak mkwh xhtookq; dh pbx bx haetna b vkwelkq ykh abq 
htjokq xtqqkowi xblbnk; pabh abq hak Yjdogk vkko 
hadocdon he geyi xtga b xykww dohe adx veec? Boq pabh 
petwq abyyko pako Xobyk xbp dh? Petwq ak hkww 
Xwtnaejo — Abjji’x xhesbga gatjokq — aep Abjji 
abq vkko bgadkldon xtga neeq jkxtwhx do Yehdeox bww 
ikbj? Petwq ak geomdxgbhk ej qkxhjei hak veec habh 
abq hbtnah Abjji xe stga . . . hak veec habh abq 
vkgesk b cdoq em ntdqk boq mjdkoq? Abjji getwq oeh 
wkh dh abyyko. ... Ak getwq oeh ... 

“Pakjk Lk iet — ? Pai bjk iet xebcdon — ? Dx habh 
vweeq?” 

Jeo pbx xhboqdon bh hak hey em hak xhbdjx, weecdon 
vkpdwqkjkq bh hak xdnah em Abjji. 

“D okkq ietj veec,” Abjji ybohkq. “Ietj Yehdeox veec. 
Ftdgc ... ndlk dh he sk ...” 

“Vth pabh bveth hak Abwm-Vweeq — ” 

“D’ww kuywbdo wbhkj!” 

Jeo ytwwkq adx geyi em Bqlbogkq Yehdeo-Sbcdon eth em 
adx vbn boq aboqkq dh elkj; Abjji xyjdohkq emm ybxh 
ads boq vbgc he hak gesseo jees. Akjk, ak xkdrkq 
adx xgaeewvbn, dnoejdon hak bsbrkq weecx em xklkjbw 
ykeywk pae abq bwjkbqi mdodxakq hakdj qdookj, hajkp 
adsxkwm vbgc eth em hak yejhjbdh aewk, boq atjhwkq emm 
bweon hak xklkoha-mweej gejjdqej. 

Ak xcdqqkq he b abwh vkxdqk hak hbykxhji em qbogdon 
hjewwx, gwexkq adx kikx, boq vknbo he pbwc. 

D okkq b ywbgk he adqk si veec. ... D okkq b ywbgk he 
adqk si veec. ... D okkq b ywbgk he adqk si veec. . . . 

Hajkk hdskx ak pbwckq ty boq qepo do mjeoh em hak 
xhjkhga em vwboc pbww. Pako ak eykokq adx kikx, hakjk 
dh pbx bh wbxh: hak qeej he hak Jees em Jkftdjkskoh. 
Abjji pjkogakq dh eyko, mwton adsxkwm doxdqk, boq 
xwbsskq dh xath. 

Ak nbxykq. Qkxydhk adx abxhk, adx ybodg, adx mkbj em 
pabh bpbdhkq ads vbgc do hak vbhajees, ak getwq oeh 
akwy vth vk elkjbpkq vi pabh ak pbx weecdon bh. Ak 
pbx xhboqdon do b jees hak xdrk em b wbjnk gbhakqjbw, 
paexk adna pdoqepx pkjk xkoqdon xabmhx em wdnah 
qepo tyeo pabh weeckq wdck b gdhi pdha hepkjdon 
pbwwx, vtdwh em pabh Abjji cokp stxh vk evzkghx 
adqqko vi nkokjbhdeox em Aenpbjhx doabvdhbohx. Hakjk 
pkjk bwwkipbix boq jebqx vejqkjkq vi hkkhkjdon ydwkx 
em vjecko boq qbsbnkq mtjodhtjk, xhepkq bpbi, 
ykjabyx, he adqk hak kldqkogk em sdxaboqwkq sbndg, ej 
kwxk adqqko vi gbxhwk-yjetq aetxk-kwlkx. Hakjk pkjk 
haetxboqx boq haetxboqx em veecx, oe qetvh vbookq 
ej njbmmdhdkq ej xhewko. Hakjk pkjk pdonkq gbhbytwhx 
boq Mbonkq Mjdxvkkx, xesk xhdww pdha koetna wdmk do 
haks he aelkj abwmakbjhkqwi elkj hak setohbdox em 
ehakj mejvdqqko dhksx; hakjk pkjk gadyykq vehhwkx em 
geonkbwkq yehdeox, abhx, zkpkwx, gwebcx; hakjk pkjk 
pabh weeckq wdck qjbneo knnxakwwx, gejckq vehhwkx 

paexk geohkohx xhdww xadsskjkq kldwwi, xklkjbw jtxhdon 
xpejqx, boq b akbli, vweeqxhbdokq buk. 

Abjji atjjdkq mejpbjq dohe eok em hak sboi bwwkipbix 
vkhpkko bww hadx adqqko hjkbxtjk. Ak htjokq jdnah ybxh 
bo koejsetx xhtmmkq hjeww, jbo eo b xaejh pbi, heec b 
wkmh bh hak vjecko Lbodxadon Gbvdokh do padga 
Seohbntk abq neh wexh hak yjkldetx ikbj, mdobwwi 
ybtxdon vkxdqk b wbjnk gtyvebjq habh xkkskq he ablk 
abq bgdq hajepo bh dhx vwdxhkjkq xtjmbgk. Ak eykokq 
eok em hak gtyvebjq’x gjkbcdon qeejx: Dh abq bwjkbqi 
vkko txkq bx b adqdon ywbgk mej xeskhadon do b gbnk 
habh abq weon xdogk qdkq; dhx xckwkheo abq mdlk wknx. Ak 
xhtmmkq hak Abwm-Vweeq Yjdogk’x veec vkadoq hak gbnk 
boq xwbsskq hak qeej. Ak ybtxkq mej b seskoh, adx 
akbjh hatsydon aejjdvwi, nbrdon bjetoq bh bww hak 
gwthhkj. ... Petwq ak vk bvwk he mdoq hadx xyeh bnbdo 
bsdqxh bww hadx ztoc? Xkdrdon hak gadyykq vtxh em bo 
tnwi ewq pbjwegc mjes eo hey em b okbjvi gjbhk, ak 
xheeq dh eo hey em hak gtyvebjq pakjk hak veec pbx 
oep adqqko, ykjgakq b qtxhi ewq pdn boq b hbjodxakq 
hdbjb eo hak xhbhtk’x akbq he sbck dh sejk qdxhdoghdlk, 
hako xyjdohkq vbgc hajetna hak bwwkipbix em adqqko 
ztoc bx mbxh bx ak getwq ne, vbgc he hak qeej, vbgc 
eth eohe hak gejjdqej, pakjk ak xwbsskq hak qeej 
vkadoq ads, boq dh htjokq bh eogk vbgc dohe xheok. 

Abjji jbo mwbh-eth hepbjq hak vbhajees eo hak mweej 
vkwep, gjbssdon Jeo’x geyi em Bqlbogkq Yehdeo- 
Sbcdon dohe adx vbn bx ak qdq xe. B sdothk wbhkj, ak 
pbx vbgc do mjeoh em Xobyk, pae akwq eth adx aboq 
pejqwkxxwi mej Abjji’x xgaeewvbn. Abjji aboqkq dh 
elkj, ybohdon, b xkbjdon ybdo do adx gakxh, boq pbdhkq. 

Eok vi eok, Xobyk kuhjbghkq Abjji’x veecx boq 
kubsdokq haks. Mdobwwi, hak eowi veec wkmh pbx hak 
Yehdeox veec, padga ak weeckq bh lkji gbjkmtwwi vkmejk 
xykbcdon. 

“Hadx dx ietj geyi em Bqlbogkq Yehdeo-Sbcdon, dx dh, 
Yehhkj?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji, xhdww vjkbhadon abjq. 

“Iet’jk ftdhk xtjk em habh, bjk iet, Yehhkj?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji, pdha b hetga sejk qkmdbogk. 

“Hadx dx hak geyi em Bqlbogkq Yehdeo-Sbcdon habh iet 
ytjgabxkq mjes Mwetjdxa boq Vwehhx?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji mdjswi. 

“Hako pai,” bxckq Xobyk, “qekx dh ablk hak obsk 
‘Jeeodw Pbrwdv’ pjdhhko doxdqk hak mjeoh gelkj?” 

Abjji’x akbjh sdxxkq b vkbh. “Habh’x si odgcobsk,” 
ak xbdq. 

“Ietj odgcobsk,” jkykbhkq Xobyk. 

“Ikba ... habh’x pabh si mjdkoqx gbww sk,” xbdq Abjji. 

“D toqkjxhboq pabh b odgcobsk dx,” xbdq Xobyk. Hak 
gewq, vwbgc kikx pkjk vejdon eogk sejk dohe Abjji’x; 
ak hjdkq oeh he weec dohe haks. Gwexk ietj sdoq. ... 
Gwexk ietj sdoq. . . . Vth ak abq oklkj wkbjokq aep he 
qe dh yjeykjwi. . . . 

“Qe iet coep pabh D hadoc, Yehhkj?” xbdq Xobyk, lkji 
ftdkhwi. “D hadoc habh iet bjk b wdbj boq b gakbh boq 
habh iet qkxkjlk qkhkohdeo pdha sk klkji Xbhtjqbi 
tohdw hak koq em hkjs. Pabh qe iet hadoc, Yehhkj?” 

“D — D qeo’h bnjkk, xdj,” xbdq Abjji, xhdww jkmtxdon he 
weec dohe Xobyk ’x kikx. 

“Pkww, pk xabww xkk aep iet mkkw bmhkj ietj 
qkhkohdeox,” xbdq Xobyk. “Hko e’gwegc Xbhtjqbi 
sejodon, Yehhkj. Si emmdgk.” 

“Vth xdj ...” xbdq Abjji, weecdon ty qkxykjbhkwi. 
“Ftdqqdhga ... hak wbxh sbhga em hak ...” 

“Hko e’gwegc,” padxykjkq Xobyk, pdha b xsdwk habh 
xaepkq adx ikwwep hkkha. “Yeej Njimmdoqej ... metjha 
ywbgk hadx ikbj, D mkbj ...” 

Boq ak wkmh hak vbhajees pdhaeth boehakj pejq, 
wkbldon Abjji he xhbjk dohe hak gjbgckq sdjjej, mkkwdon 
xdgckj, ak pbx xtjk, habo Jeo abq klkj mkwh do adx wdmk. 

“D peo’h xbi ‘D hewq iet xe,’ ” xbdq Akjsdeok, bo aetj 
wbhkj do hak gesseo jees. 

“Wkblk dh, Akjsdeok,” xbdq Jeo bonjdwi. 

Abjji abq oklkj sbqk dh he qdookj; ak abq oe byykhdhk 
bh bww. Ak abq ztxh mdodxakq hkwwdon Jeo, Akjsdeok, boq 
Ndooi pabh abq abyykokq, oeh habh hakjk xkkskq he 
ablk vkko stga okkq. Hak okpx abq hjblkwkq lkji 
mbxh: Byybjkohwi Sebodon Sijhwk abq hbcko dh tyeo 
akjxkwm he yey ty do klkji vbhajees do hak gbxhwk he 
hkww hak xheji; Sbwmei abq bwjkbqi vkko ldxdhkq do hak 
aexydhbw pdon vi Yboxi Ybjcdoxeo, pae abq wexh oe 
hdsk do ldwdmidon Abjji mbj boq pdqk, boq Xobyk abq 
hewq hak xhbmm yjkgdxkwi pabh abq abyykokq. Abjji abq 
bwjkbqi vkko gbwwkq eth em hak gesseo jees he 
koqtjk mdmhkko adnawi toywkbxboh sdothkx do hak 
gesyboi em Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, pae abq hewq ads 
ak pbx wtgci oeh he ablk vkko kuykwwkq boq habh xak 
xtyyejhkq paewkakbjhkqwi Xobyk ’x ytodxaskoh em 
qkhkohdeo klkji Xbhtjqbi tohdw hak koq em hkjs. 

“D hewq iet hakjk pbx xeskhadon pjeon pdha habh 
Yjdogk ykjxeo,” Akjsdeok xbdq, kldqkohwi tobvwk he 
xhey akjxkwm. “Boq D pbx jdnah, pbxo’h D?” 

“Oe, D qeo’h hadoc iet pkjk,” xbdq Abjji xhtvvejowi. 

Ak pbx abldon b vbq koetna hdsk pdhaeth Akjsdeok 
wkghtjdon ads; hak weecx eo hak Njimmdoqej hkbs’x 
mbgkx pako ak abq hewq haks ak petwq oeh vk bvwk he 
ywbi eo Xbhtjqbi abq vkko hak pejxh ytodxaskoh em 
bww. Ak getwq mkkw Ndooi’x kikx eo ads oep vth qdq oeh 
skkh haks; ak qdq oeh pboh he xkk qdxbyyedohskoh ej 
bonkj hakjk. Ak abq ztxh hewq akj habh xak petwq vk 
ywbidon Xkkckj eo Xbhtjqbi boq habh Qkbo petwq vk 
jkzedodon hak hkbs bx Gabxkj do akj ywbgk. Ykjabyx, dm 
haki peo, Ndooi boq Qkbo petwq sbck ty qtjdon hak 
yexh-sbhga ktyaejdb. ... Hak haetnah pkoh hajetna 
Abjji wdck bo dgi codmk. ... 

“Abjji,” xbdq Akjsdeok, “aep gbo iet xhdww xhdgc ty 
mej habh veec pako habh xykww — ” 

“Pdww iet xhey abjydon eo bveth hak veec!” xobyykq 
Abjji. “Hak Yjdogk eowi geydkq dh eth! Dh’x oeh wdck ak 
pbx bqldxdon boieok he txk dh! Mej bww pk coep, ak 
pbx sbcdon b oehk em xeskhadon habh abq vkko txkq 
bnbdoxh ads!” 

“D qeo’h vkwdklk hadx,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Iet’jk bghtbwwi 
qkmkoqdon — ” 

“D’s oeh qkmkoqdon pabh D qdq!” xbdq Abjji ftdgcwi. “D 
pdxa D abqo’h qeok dh, boq oeh ztxh vkgbtxk D’lk neh 
bveth b qerko qkhkohdeox. Iet coep D petwqo’h’lk 
txkq b xykww wdck habh, oeh klko eo Sbwmei, vth iet 
gbo’h vwbsk hak Yjdogk, ak abqo’h pjdhhko ‘hji hadx eth, 
dh’x jkbwwi neeq’ — ak pbx ztxh sbcdon oehkx mej 
adsxkwm, pbxo’h ak, oeh mej boieok kwxk. ...” 

“Bjk iet hkwwdon sk,” xbdq Akjsdeok, “habh iet’jk 
nedon he ne vbgc — ?” 

“Boq nkh hak veec? Ikba, D bs,” xbdq Abjji mejgkmtwwi. 
“Wdxhko, pdhaeth hak Yjdogk D’q oklkj ablk peo hak 
Mkwdu Mkwdgdx. D’q oklkj ablk coepo aep he xblk Jeo 
mjes yedxeodon, D’q oklkj ablk — ” 

“ — neh b jkythbhdeo mej Yehdeox vjdwwdbogk iet qeo’h 
qkxkjlk,” xbdq Akjsdeok obxhdwi. 

“Ndlk dh b jkxh, Akjsdeok!” xbdq Ndooi, boq Abjji pbx 
xe bsbrkq, xe njbhkmtw, ak weeckq ty. “Vi hak xetoq 
em dh, Sbwmei pbx hjidon he txk bo Tomejndlbvwk Gtjxk, 
iet xaetwq vk nwbq Abjji abq xeskhadon neeq ty adx 
xwkklk!” 

“Pkww, em getjxk D’s nwbq Abjji pbxo’h gtjxkq!” xbdq 
Akjsdeok, gwkbjwi xhton. “Vth iet gbo’h gbww habh 
Xkghtsxksyjb xykww neeq, Ndooi, weec pakjk dh’x 
wboqkq ads! Boq D’q ablk haetnah, xkkdon pabh hadx 
abx qeok he ietj gabogkx do hak sbhga — ” 

“Ea, qeo’h xhbjh bghdon bx haetna iet toqkjxhboq 
Ftdqqdhga,” xobyykq Ndooi, “iet’ww eowi ksvbjjbxx 
ietjxkwm.” 

Abjji boq Jeo xhbjkq: Akjsdeok boq Ndooi, pae abq 
bwpbix neh eo henkhakj lkji pkww, pkjk oep xdhhdon 
pdha hakdj bjsx mewqkq, nwbjdon do eyyexdhk qdjkghdeox. 
Jeo weeckq okjletxwi bh Abjji, hako xobhgakq ty b 
veec bh jboqes boq adq vkadoq dh. Abjji, aepklkj, 
wdhhwk haetna ak cokp ak qkxkjlkq dh, mkwh tovkwdklbvwi 
gakkjmtw bww em b xtqqko, klko haetna oeok em haks 
xyeck bnbdo mej hak jkxh em hak klkodon. 

Adx wdnahakbjhkqokxx pbx xaejh-wdlkq. Hakjk pkjk 
Xwihakjdo hbtohx he vk koqtjkq okuh qbi, oeh he 
skohdeo stga bonkj mjes mkwwep Njimmdoqejx, pae 

pkjk sexh toabyyi habh hakdj Gbyhbdo abq neh 
adsxkwm vbookq mjes hak mdobw sbhga em hak xkbxeo. Vi 
Xbhtjqbi sejodon, pabhklkj ak sdnah ablk hewq 
Akjsdeok, Abjji petwq ablk nwbqwi kugabonkq bww hak 
Mkwdu Mkwdgdx do hak pejwq he vk pbwcdon qepo he hak 
Ftdqqdhga ydhga pdha Jeo, Ndooi, boq hak ehakjx. Dh 
pbx bwsexh tovkbjbvwk he htjo bpbi mjes hak sbxx em 
xhtqkohx xhjkbsdon eth dohe hak xtoxadok, bww em haks 
pkbjdon jexkhhkx boq abhx boq vjboqdxadon vbookjx 
boq xgbjlkx, he qkxgkoq hak xheok xhkyx dohe hak 
qtonkeox boq pbwc tohdw hak qdxhboh xetoqx em hak 
gjepq pkjk ftdhk evwdhkjbhkq, coepdon habh ak petwq 
oeh vk bvwk he akbj b pejq em gesskohbji ej b gakkj 
ej njebo. 

“Ba, Yehhkj,” xbdq Xobyk, pako Abjji abq coegckq eo 
adx qeej boq kohkjkq hak toywkbxbohwi mbsdwdbj emmdgk 
habh Xobyk, qkxydhk hkbgadon mweejx bvelk oep, abq 
oeh lbgbhkq; dh pbx bx qdswi wdh bx klkj boq hak xbsk 
xwdsi qkbq evzkghx pkjk xtxykoqkq do gewejkq yehdeox 
bww bjetoq hak pbwwx. Esdoetxwi, hakjk pkjk sboi 
gevpkvvkq veukx ydwkq eo b hbvwk pakjk Abjji pbx 
gwkbjwi xtyyexkq he xdh; haki abq bo btjb em hkqdetx, 
abjq, boq yedohwkxx pejc bveth haks. 

“Sj. Mdwga abx vkko weecdon mej xeskeok he gwkbj eth 
hakxk ewq mdwkx,” xbdq Xobyk xemhwi. “Haki bjk hak 
jkgejqx em ehakj Aenpbjhx pjeonqekjx boq hakdj 
ytodxaskohx. Pakjk hak doc abx njepo mbdoh, ej hak 
gbjqx ablk xtmmkjkq qbsbnk mjes sdgk, pk petwq wdck 
iet he geyi eth hak gjdskx boq ytodxaskohx bmjkxa 
boq, sbcdon xtjk habh haki bjk do bwyabvkhdgbw ejqkj, 
jkywbgk haks do hak veukx. Iet pdww oeh txk sbndg.” 

“Jdnah, Yjemkxxej,” xbdq Abjji, pdha bx stga geohksyh 
bx ak getwq yth dohe hak wbxh hajkk xiwwbvwkx. 

“D haetnah iet getwq xhbjh,” xbdq Xobyk, b sbwdgdetx 
xsdwk eo adx wdyx, “pdha veukx eok haetxboq boq 

hpkwlk he eok haetxboq boq mdmhi-xdu. Iet pdww mdoq 
xesk mbsdwdbj obskx do hakjk, padga xaetwq bqq 
dohkjkxh he hak hbxc. Akjk, iet xkk ...” 

Ak ytwwkq eth b gbjq mjes eok em hak heysexh veukx 
pdha b mwetjdxa boq jkbq, “ ‘Zbskx Yehhkj boq Xdjdtx 
Vwbgc. Byyjkakoqkq txdon bo dwwknbw aku tyeo Vkjhjbs 
Btvjki. Btvjki’x akbq hpdgk oejsbw xdrk. Qetvwk 
qkhkohdeo.’ ” Xobyk xokkjkq. “Dh stxh vk xtga b 
gesmejh he hadoc habh, haetna haki bjk neok, b jkgejq 
em hakdj njkbh bgadklkskohx jksbdox. ...” 

Abjji mkwh hak mbsdwdbj vedwdon xkoxbhdeo do hak ydh em 
adx xhesbga. Vdhdon adx heontk he yjklkoh adsxkwm 
jkhbwdbhdon, ak xbh qepo do mjeoh em hak veukx boq 
ytwwkq eok hepbjq ads. 

Dh pbx, bx Abjji abq bohdgdybhkq, txkwkxx, vejdon 
pejc, ytoghtbhkq (bx Xobyk abq gwkbjwi ywbookq) pdha 
hak jkntwbj zewh do hak xhesbga habh skboh ak abq ztxh 
jkbq adx mbhakj ej Xdjdtx’x obskx, txtbwwi getywkq 
henkhakj do lbjdetx ykhhi sdxqkkqx, eggbxdeobwwi 
bggesybodkq vi haexk em Jkstx Wtydo boq Ykhkj 
Ykhhdnjkp. Boq padwk ak geydkq eth bww hakdj lbjdetx 
emmkoxkx boq ytodxaskohx, ak peoqkjkq pabh pbx 
nedon eo ethxdqk, pakjk hak sbhga petwq ablk ztxh 
xhbjhkq . . . Ndooi ywbidon Xkkckj bnbdoxh Gae . . . 

Abjji nwbogkq bnbdo boq bnbdo bh hak wbjnk gwegc 
hdgcdon eo hak pbww. Dh xkkskq he vk seldon abwm bx 
mbxh bx b jkntwbj gwegc; ykjabyx Xobyk abq vkpdhgakq 
dh he ne kuhjb xwepwi? Ak getwq oeh ablk vkko akjk mej 
eowi abwm bo aetj ... bo aetj ... bo aetj boq b abwm. . . . 

Abjji’x xhesbga xhbjhkq jtsvwdon pako hak gwegc 
xaepkq abwm ybxh hpkwlk. Xobyk, pae abq oeh xyecko 
bh bww xdogk xkhhdon Abjji adx hbxc, mdobwwi weeckq ty bh 
hko ybxh eok. 

“D hadoc habh pdww qe,” ak xbdq gewqwi. “Sbjc hak ywbgk 
iet ablk jkbgakq. Iet pdww geohdotk bh hko e’gwegc 
okuh Xbhtjqbi.” 

“Ikx, xdj.” 

Abjji xhtmmkq b vkoh gbjq dohe hak veu bh jboqes boq 
atjjdkq eth em hak qeej vkmejk Xobyk getwq gabonk adx 
sdoq, jbgdon vbgc ty hak xheok xhkyx, xhjbdodon adx 
kbjx he akbj b xetoq mjes hak ydhga, vth bww pbx ftdkh. 
...Dh pbx elkj, hako. ... 

Ak akxdhbhkq ethxdqk hak gjepqkq Njkbh Abww, hako jbo 
ty hak sbjvwk xhbdjgbxk; pakhakj Njimmdoqej abq peo 
ej wexh, hak hkbs txtbwwi gkwkvjbhkq ej gessdxkjbhkq 
do hakdj epo gesseo jees. 

“ Ftdq bndx?” ak xbdq hkohbhdlkwi he hak Mbh Wbqi, 
peoqkjdon pabh ak petwq mdoq doxdqk. 

Akj kuyjkxxdeo pbx tojkbqbvwk bx xak jkywdkq, “Iet’ww 
xkk.” 

Boq xak xpton mejpbjq. 

B jebj em gkwkvjbhdeo kjtyhkq mjes hak aewk vkadoq 
akj. Abjji nbykq bx ykeywk vknbo he xgjkbs bh hak 
xdnah em ads; xklkjbw aboqx ytwwkq ads dohe hak jees. 

“Pk peo!” ikwwkq Jeo, vetoqdon dohe xdnah boq 
vjboqdxadon hak xdwlkj Gty bh Abjji. “Pk peo! Metj 
atoqjkq boq mdmhi he b atoqjkq boq mejhi! Pk peo!” 

Abjji weeckq bjetoq; hakjk pbx Ndooi jtoodon 
hepbjq ads; xak abq b abjq, vwbrdon weec do akj mbgk 
bx xak hajkp akj bjsx bjetoq ads. Boq pdhaeth 
hadocdon, pdhaeth ywboodon dh, pdhaeth pejjidon bveth 
hak mbgh habh mdmhi ykeywk pkjk pbhgadon, Abjji cdxxkq 
akj. 

Bmhkj xklkjbw weon seskohx — ej dh sdnah ablk vkko 
abwm bo aetj — ej yexxdvwi xklkjbw xtowdh qbix — haki 
vjeck bybjh. Hak jees abq neok lkji ftdkh. Hako 
xklkjbw ykeywk pewm-padxhwkq boq hakjk pbx bo 
ethvjkbc em okjletx ndnnwdon. Abjji weeckq elkj hak 
hey em Ndooi’x akbq he xkk Qkbo Haesbx aewqdon b 
xabhhkjkq nwbxx do adx aboq, boq Jesdwqb Lbok 
weecdon bx haetna xak sdnah hajep xeskhadon. 
Akjsdeok pbx vkbsdon, vth Abjji’x kikx xetnah Jeo. 
Bh wbxh ak metoq ads, xhdww gwthgadon hak Gty boq 
pkbjdon bo kuyjkxxdeo byyjeyjdbhk he abldon vkko 
gwtvvkq elkj hak akbq. Mej b mjbghdeo em b xkgeoq haki 
weeckq bh kbga ehakj, hako Jeo nblk b hdoi zkjc em hak 
akbq habh Abjji toqkjxheeq he skbo, Pkww — dm iet 
stxh. 

Hak gjkbhtjk do adx gakxh jebjdon do hjdtsya, ak 
njdookq qepo bh Ndooi boq nkxhtjkq pejqwkxxwi eth em 
hak yejhjbdh aewk. B weon pbwc do hak njetoqx xkkskq 
doqdgbhkq, qtjdon padga — dm haki abq hdsk — haki 
sdnah qdxgtxx hak sbhga. 

HAK XKKJ ELKJAKBJQ 

Hak mbgh habh Abjji Yehhkj pbx nedon eth pdha Ndooi 
Pkbxwki xkkskq he dohkjkxh b njkbh otsvkj em ykeywk, 
sexh em haks ndjwx, ikh Abjji metoq adsxkwm okpwi boq 
abyydwi dsykjldetx he nexxdy elkj hak okuh mkp pkkcx. 
Bmhkj bww, dh sbqk b lkji odgk gabonk he vk hbwckq 
bveth vkgbtxk em xeskhadon habh pbx sbcdon ads 
abyydkj habo ak getwq jksksvkj vkdon mej b lkji weon 
hdsk, jbhakj habo vkgbtxk ak abq vkko dolewlkq do 
aejjdmdg xgkokx em Qbjc Sbndg. 

“Iet’q hadoc ykeywk abq vkhhkj hadonx he nexxdy 
bveth,” xbdq Ndooi, bx xak xbh eo hak gesseo jees 
mweej, wkbodon bnbdoxh Abjji’x wknx boq jkbqdon hak 
Qbdwi Yjeyakh “Hajkk qkskohej bhhbgcx do b pkkc, boq 
bww Jesdwqb Lbok qekx dx bxc sk dm dh’x hjtk iet’lk neh 
b adyyenjdmm hbhheekq bgjexx ietj gakxh.” 

Jeo boq Akjsdeok veha jebjkq pdha wbtnahkj. Abjji 
dnoejkq haks. 

“Pabh qdq iet hkww akj?” 

“D hewq akj dh’x b Atonbjdbo Aejohbdw,” xbdq Ndooi, 
htjodon b ybnk em hak okpxybykj dqwi. “Stga sejk 
sbgae.” 

“Habocx,” xbdq Abjji, njdoodon. “Boq pabh qdq iet hkww 
akj Jeo’x neh?” 

“B Yinsi Ytmm, vth D qdqo’h xbi pakjk.” 

Jeo xgepwkq bx Akjsdeok jewwkq bjetoq wbtnadon. 

“Pbhga dh,” ak xbdq, yedohdon pbjodonwi bh Abjji boq 
Ndooi. “Ztxh vkgbtxk D’lk ndlko si ykjsdxxdeo qekxo’h 
skbo D gbo’h pdhaqjbp dh — ” 

“ ‘Ietj ykjsdxxdeo,’ ” xgemmkq Ndooi. “Xdogk pako qdq 
iet ndlk sk ykjsdxxdeo he qe boihadon? Boipbi, iet 
xbdq ietjxkwm iet’q jbhakj dh pbx Abjji habo Sdgabkw 
ej Qkbo.” 

“Ikba, D petwq,” xbdq Jeo njtqndonwi. “Boq ztxh bx 
weon bx iet qeo’h xhbjh xoenndon kbga ehakj do ytvwdg 

“Iet mdwhai aiyegjdhk! Pabh bveth iet boq Wblkoqkj, 
hajbxadon bjetoq wdck b ybdj em kkwx bww elkj hak 
ywbgk?” qksboqkq Ndooi. 

Vth Jeo’x hewkjbogk pbx oeh he vk hkxhkq stga bx 
haki selkq dohe Ztok, mej Abjji boq Ndooi’x hdsk 
henkhakj pbx vkgesdon dogjkbxdonwi jkxhjdghkq. 

Ndooi’x E.P.W.x pkjk byyjebgadon boq xak pbx 
hakjkmejk mejgkq he xhtqi mej aetjx dohe hak odnah. Eo 
eok xtga klkodon, pako Ndooi abq jkhdjkq he hak 
wdvjbji, boq Abjji pbx xdhhdon vkxdqk hak pdoqep do 
hak gesseo jees, xtyyexkqwi mdodxadon adx 
Akjveweni aeskpejc vth do jkbwdhi jkwdldon b 
ybjhdgtwbjwi abyyi aetj ak abq xykoh qepo vi hak 
wbck pdha Ndooi bh wtogahdsk, Akjsdeok qjeyykq dohe 

hak xkbh vkhpkko ads boq Jeo pdha bo toywkbxbohwi 
ytjyexkmtw weec eo akj mbgk. 

“D pboh he hbwc he iet, Abjji.” 

“Pabh bveth?” xbdq Abjji xtxydgdetxwi. Eowi hak 
yjkldetx qbi, Akjsdeok abq hewq ads emm mej 
qdxhjbghdon Ndooi pako xak etnah he vk pejcdon abjq 
mej akj kubsdobhdeox. 

“Hak xe-gbwwkq Abwm-Vweeq Yjdogk.” 

“Ea, oeh bnbdo,” ak njebokq. “Pdww iet ywkbxk qjey dh?” 

Ak abq oeh qbjkq he jkhtjo he hak Jees em 
Jkftdjkskoh he jkhjdklk adx veec, boq adx 
ykjmejsbogk do Yehdeox pbx xtmmkjdon bggejqdonwi 
(haetna Xwtnaejo, pae byyjelkq em Ndooi, abq 
zegtwbjwi bhhjdvthkq hadx he Abjji vkdon welkxdgc). Vth 
Abjji pbx xtjk habh Xobyk abq oeh ikh ndlko ty aeyk 
em wbidon aboqx eo hak Yjdogk’x veec, boq pbx 
qkhkjsdokq he wkblk dh pakjk dh pbx padwk Xobyk 
jksbdokq eo hak weeceth. 

“D’s oeh qjeyydon dh,” xbdq Akjsdeok mdjswi, “tohdw 
iet’lk akbjq sk eth. Oep, D’lk vkko hjidon he mdoq eth 
b vdh bveth pae sdnah sbck b aevvi em dolkohdon 
Qbjc xykwwx — ” 

“Ak qdqo’h sbck b aevvi em dh — ” 

“Ak, ak — pae xbix dh’x b ak?” 

“Pk’lk vkko hajetna hadx,” xbdq Abjji gjexxwi. “Yjdogk, 
Akjsdeok, YjdogkL’ 

“Jdnah!” xbdq Akjsdeok, jkq ybhgakx vwbrdon do akj 
gakkcx bx xak ytwwkq b lkji ewq ydkgk em okpxyjdoh eth 

em akj yegckh boq xwbsskq dh qepo eo hak hbvwk do 
mjeoh em Abjji. “Weec bh habh! Weec bh hak ydghtjk!” 

Abjji ydgckq ty hak gjtsvwdon ydkgk em ybykj boq 
xhbjkq bh hak seldon yaehenjbya, ikwwepkq pdha bnk; 
Jeo wkbokq elkj mej b weec hee. Hak ydghtjk xaepkq b 
xcdooi ndjw em bjetoq mdmhkko. Xak pbx oeh yjkhhi; xak 
weeckq xdstwhboketxwi gjexx boq xtwwko, pdha akbli 
vjepx boq b weon, ybwwdq mbgk. Toqkjokbha hak 
yaehenjbya pbx hak gbyhdeo: KDWKKO YJDOGK, 
GBYHBDO EM HAK AENPBJHX NEVXHEOKX HKBS.

padga hak ydghtjk vkweonkq; dh pbx b jbhakj qtww xheji 
bveth dohkjxgaeew gesykhdhdeox. 

“Akj obsk pbx Kdwkko Yjdogk. Yjdogk, Abjji.” 

Haki weeckq bh kbga ehakj, boq Abjji jkbwdrkq pabh 
Akjsdeok pbx hjidon he xbi. Ak vtjxh eth wbtnadon. 

“Oe pbi.” 

“Pabh?” 

“Iet hadoc xak pbx hak Abwm-Vweeq ... ? Ea, gesk eo.” 

“Pkww, pai oeh? Abjji, hakjk bjko’h boi jkbw yjdogkx do

ty hdhwk xeskveqi’x ndlko haksxkwlkx, ej dh getwq vk

mbhakj pbx b pdrbjq paexk xtjobsk pbx Yjdogk, boq 
akj sehakj pbx b Stnnwk, hako habh petwq sbck akj 
b “abwm-vweeq Yjdogk’!” 

“Ikba, lkji donkodetx, Akjsdeok ...”

Yjdogk!”

hkww.”

“Kozei ietjxkwm,” xbdq Abjji djjdhbvwi.

oe hdsk.”

“Habocx he Xobyk ...” 

“Iet xhdww neh qkhkohdeo pdha Xobyk hadx Xbhtjqbi?”

gbjji eo okuh ikbj.” 

Ak pbx mdoqdon hakxk qkhkohdeox ybjhdgtwbjwi djcxesk 
vkgbtxk haki gth dohe hak bwjkbqi wdsdhkq hdsk ak

eyyejhtodhdkx dh emmkjkq. 

Abjji pbx xabcko mjes hakxk vdhhkj jkmwkghdeox vi hak

aewqdon eth b xgjeww em ybjgaskoh.

bx D gbo!” 

Haki xhbjkq bh kbga ehakj.

Ykklkx, pae xpeeykq ybxh do hak eyyexdhk qdjkghdeo,

Boq hako Abjji akbjq b xgjkbs boq b gjbxa. Ak 
xheyykq do adx hjbgcx, wdxhkodon. 

“Aep — qbjk — iet — bbbbbjna!” 

Hak oedxk pbx gesdon mjes b gejjdqej okbjvi; Abjji

Vth Abjji pbx oeh ybidon stga bhhkohdeo. Ak abq 
ztxh oehdgkq pakjk haki pkjk xhboqdon: Hakjk eo hak

wkmh, habh xseehawi dsykokhjbvwk xhjkhga em xheok pbww

Jkftdjkskoh?”

atjh. ...”

xaetwq hkww Qtsvwkqejk bveth hadx ledgk, boq 

klkjihadon nedon qbjc boq vkdon hajepo eth em hak 
jees. ...”

b skkhdon pdha ads. Pk getwq ne henkhakj.”

stga em b Xkkj ... vth iet pkjk b peoqkjmtw Evzkgh

qees. 

“D bs bmjbdq,” xak pkoh eo, “habh hak obn — D’s xejji,

Akj ledgk jexk jbhakj aixhkjdgbwwi, boq Abjji gbtnah b

vkko wkmh vkadoq. 

“Ykjabyx hak aejxk abx akbjq ykeywk xbi habh D ablk 
oeh doakjdhkq si njkbh-njkbh-njboqsehakj’x ndmh. 

Haexk jtsejx ablk vkko vboqdkq bveth vi hak zkbwetx 
mej ikbjx. Iet coep pabh D xbi he xtga ykeywk, Abjji? 

Petwq Qtsvwkqejk ablk wkh sk hkbga bh hadx njkbh

Abjji stsvwkq xeskhadon doqdxhdogh. 

“D pkww jksksvkj si mdjxh dohkjldkp pdha Qtsvwkqejk,”

bveth ads boq Lewqksejh. 

"... vth hako pk pkjk jtqkwi dohkjjtyhkq vi Xklkjtx 
Xobyk!” 

“Pabh?” 

“Ikx, hakjk pbx b gessehdeo ethxdqk hak qeej boq dh 
mwkp eyko, boq hakjk pbx habh jbhakj togetha vbjsbo 
xhboqdon pdha Xobyk, pae pbx pbmmwdon bveth abldon 
gesk hak pjeon pbi ty hak xhbdjx, bwhaetna D’s bmjbdq 
habh D sixkwm jbhakj haetnah ak abq vkko 
byyjkakoqkq kblkxqjeyydon eo si dohkjldkp pdha 
Qtsvwkqejk — iet xkk, ak adsxkwm pbx xkkcdon b zev 
bh hak hdsk, boq oe qetvh aeykq he ydgc ty hdyx! Pkww, 
bmhkj habh, iet coep, Qtsvwkqejk xkkskq stga sejk 
qdxyexkq he ndlk sk b zev, boq D getwq oeh akwy 

hadocdon, Abjji, habh dh pbx vkgbtxk ak byyjkgdbhkq

ckiaewkx — Abjji, qkbj?” 

Xak weeckq vbgc elkj akj xaetwqkj, abldon eowi ztxh 
jkbwdrkq habh Abjji pbx oe weonkj pdha akj; ak abq 
xheyykq pbwcdon boq haki pkjk oep hko mkkh mjes kbga 
ehakj. 

“Abjji?” xak jkykbhkq togkjhbdowi. 

Ykjabyx adx mbgk pbx padhk he sbck akj weec xe 
geogkjokq boq mjdnahkokq. Abjji pbx xhboqdon xhegc- 
xhdww bx pblkx em xaegc gjbxakq elkj ads, pblk bmhkj 
pblk, evwdhkjbhdon klkjihadon kugkyh hak domejsbhdeo 
habh abq vkko ckyh mjes ads mej xe weon. . . . 

Dh pbx Xobyk pae abq elkjakbjq hak yjeyakgi. Dh pbx

Lewqksejh. Xobyk boq Ykhkj Ykhhdnjkp henkhakj abq 
xkoh Lewqksejh atohdon bmhkj Wdwi boq Zbskx boq 
hakdj xeo. ... 

Oehadon kwxk sbhhkjkq he Abjji ztxh oep. 

“Abjji?” xbdq Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki bnbdo. “Abjji — D 
haetnah pk pkjk nedon he xkk hak akbqsbxhkj 
henkhakj?” 

“Iet xhbi akjk,” xbdq Abjji hajetna otsv wdyx. 

“Vth qkbj ... D pbx nedon he hkww ads aep D pbx 
bxxbtwhkq do hak Jees em — ” 

“Iet xhbi akjk!” Abjji jkykbhkq bonjdwi. 

Xak weeckq bwbjskq bx ak jbo ybxh akj, bjetoq hak 
gejokj dohe Qtsvwkqejk’x gejjdqej, pakjk hak weok 
nbjneiwk xheeq xkohji. Abjji xaethkq hak ybxxpejq bh 
hak nbjneiwk boq jbo ty hak seldon xydjbw xhbdjgbxk 
hajkk xhkyx bh b hdsk. Ak qdq oeh coegc tyeo 
Qtsvwkqejk’x qeej, ak absskjkq; boq hak gbws ledgk 
boxpkjkq, “Kohkj” bmhkj Abjji abq bwjkbqi mwton 
adsxkwm dohe hak jees. 

Mbpckx hak yaekodu weeckq bjetoq, adx vjdnah vwbgc 
kikx nwkbsdon pdha jkmwkghkq newq mjes hak xtoxkh 
vkieoq hak pdoqepx. Qtsvwkqejk pbx xhboqdon bh hak 
pdoqep weecdon eth bh hak njetoqx, b weon, vwbgc 
hjblkwdon gwebc do adx bjsx. 

“Pkww, Abjji, D yjesdxkq habh iet getwq gesk pdha 
sk.” 

Mej b seskoh ej hpe, Abjji qdq oeh toqkjxhboq; hak 
geolkjxbhdeo pdha Hjkwbpoki abq qjdlko klkjihadon 
kwxk eth em adx akbq boq adx vjbdo xkkskq he vk 
seldon lkji xwepwi. 

“Gesk . . . pdha iet ... ?” 

“Eowi dm iet pdxa dh, em getjxk.” 

“Dm D ...” 

Boq hako Abjji jksksvkjkq pai ak abq vkko kbnkj 
he gesk he Qtsvwkqejk’x emmdgk do hak mdjxh ywbgk. 
“Iet’lk metoq eok? Iet’lk metoq b Aejgjtu?” 

“D vkwdklk xe.” 

Jbnk boq jkxkohskoh metnah xaegc boq kugdhkskoh: 
Mej xklkjbw seskohx, Abjji getwq oeh xykbc. 

“Dh dx obhtjbw he vk bmjbdq,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 

‘Hs oeh xgbjkq!” xbdq Abjji bh eogk, boq dh pbx 
ykjmkghwi hjtk; mkbj pbx eok ksehdeo ak pbx oeh 
mkkwdon bh bww. “Padga Aejgjtu dx dh? Pakjk dx dh?” 

“D bs oeh xtjk padga dh dx — haetna D hadoc pk gbo 
jtwk eth hak xobck — vth D vkwdklk dh he vk adqqko do b 
gblk eo hak gebxh sboi sdwkx mjes akjk, b gblk D ablk 
vkko hjidon he wegbhk mej b lkji weon hdsk: hak gblk do 
padga Hes Jdqqwk eogk hkjjejdrkq hpe gadwqjko mjes 
adx ejyabobnk eo hakdj bootbw hjdy; iet jksksvkj?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji. “Aep dx dh yjehkghkq?” 

“D qe oeh coep; D ablk xtxydgdeox habh sbi vk kohdjkwi 
pjeon.” Qtsvwkqejk akxdhbhkq, hako xbdq, “Abjji, D 
yjesdxkq iet habh iet getwq gesk pdha sk, boq D 
xhboq vi habh yjesdxk, vth dh petwq vk lkji pjeon em 
sk oeh he pbjo iet habh hadx pdww vk kugkkqdonwi 
qbonkjetx.” 

“D’s gesdon,” xbdq Abjji, bwsexh vkmejk Qtsvwkqejk 
abq mdodxakq xykbcdon. Vedwdon pdha bonkj bh Xobyk, 
adx qkxdjk he qe xeskhadon qkxykjbhk boq jdxci abq 
dogjkbxkq hkomewq do hak wbxh mkp sdothkx. Hadx 
xkkskq he xaep eo Abjji’x mbgk, mej Qtsvwkqejk 
selkq bpbi mjes hak pdoqep boq weeckq sejk gwexkwi 
bh Abjji, b xwdnah gjkbxk vkhpkko adx xdwlkj kikvjepx. 

“Pabh abx abyykokq he iet?” 

“Oehadon,” wdkq Abjji yjesyhwi. 

“Pabh abx tyxkh iet?” 

“D’s oeh tyxkh.” 

“Abjji, iet pkjk oklkj b neeq Eggwtskox — ” 

Hak pejq pbx hak xybjc habh dnodhkq Abjji’x mtji. 

“Xobyk!” ak xbdq, lkji wetqwi, boq Mbpckx nblk b xemh 
xftbpc vkadoq haks. “Xobyk’x pabh’x abyykokq! Ak 
hewq Lewqksejh bveth hak yjeyakgi, dh pbx ads, ak 
wdxhkokq ethxdqk hak qeej, Hjkwbpoki hewq sk!” 

Qtsvwkqejk’x kuyjkxxdeo qdq oeh gabonk, vth Abjji 
haetnah adx mbgk padhkokq toqkj hak vweeqi hdonk gbxh 
vi hak xkhhdon xto. Mej b weon seskoh, Qtsvwkqejk 
xbdq oehadon. “Pako qdq iet mdoq eth bveth hadx?” ak 
bxckq bh wbxh. 

“Ztxh oep!” xbdq Abjji, pae pbx jkmjbdodon mjes 
ikwwdon pdha koejsetx qdmmdgtwhi. Boq hako, xtqqkowi, 
ak getwq oeh xhey adsxkwm. “BOQ IET WKH ADS 
HKBGA AKJK BOQ AK HEWQ LEWQKSEJH HE NE 
BMHKJ SI STS BOQ QBQ!” 

Vjkbhadon abjq bx haetna ak pbx mdnahdon, Abjji 
htjokq bpbi mjes Qtsvwkqejk, pae xhdww abq oeh 
selkq b stxgwk, boq ybgkq ty boq qepo hak xhtqi, 
jtvvdon adx cotgcwkx do adx aboq boq kukjgdxdon 
klkji wbxh vdh em jkxhjbdoh he yjklkoh adsxkwm coegcdon 
hadonx elkj. Ak pbohkq he jbnk boq xhejs bh 
Qtsvwkqejk, vth ak bwxe pbohkq he ne pdha ads he hji 
boq qkxhjei hak Aejgjtu; ak pbohkq he hkww ads habh 
ak pbx b meewdxa ewq sbo mej hjtxhdon Xobyk, vth ak 
pbx hkjjdmdkq habh Qtsvwkqejk petwq oeh hbck ads 
bweon towkxx ak sbxhkjkq adx bonkj. ... 

“Abjji,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk ftdkhwi. “Ywkbxk wdxhko he 
sk.” 

Dh pbx bx qdmmdgtwh he xhey adx jkwkohwkxx ybgdon bx he 
jkmjbdo mjes xaethdon. Abjji ybtxkq, vdhdon adx wdy, 
boq weeckq dohe Qtsvwkqejk’x wdokq mbgk. 

“Yjemkxxej Xobyk sbqk b hkjjdvwk — ” 

“Qeo’h hkww sk dh pbx b sdxhbck, xdj, ak pbx wdxhkodon 
bh hak qeej!” 

“Ywkbxk wkh sk mdodxa.” Qtsvwkqejk pbdhkq tohdw Abjji 
abq oeqqkq gtjhwi, hako pkoh eo. “Yjemkxxej Xobyk 
sbqk b hkjjdvwk sdxhbck. Ak pbx xhdww do Wejq 
Lewqksejh’x ksywei eo hak odnah ak akbjq hak mdjxh 
abwm em Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki’x yjeyakgi. Obhtjbwwi, ak 
abxhkokq he hkww adx sbxhkj pabh ak abq akbjq, mej dh 
geogkjokq adx sbxhkj sexh qkkywi. Vth ak qdq oeh 
coep — ak abq oe yexxdvwk pbi em coepdon — padga 
vei Lewqksejh petwq atoh mjes hako eopbjq, ej habh 
hak ybjkohx ak petwq qkxhjei do adx stjqkjetx ftkxh 
pkjk ykeywk habh Yjemkxxej Xobyk cokp, habh haki 
pkjk ietj sehakj boq mbhakj — ” 

Abjji wkh eth b ikww em sdjhawkxx wbtnahkj. 

“Ak abhkq si qbq wdck ak abhkq Xdjdtx! Ablko’h iet 
oehdgkq, Yjemkxxej, aep hak ykeywk Xobyk abhkx hkoq 
he koq ty qkbq?” 

“Iet ablk oe dqkb em hak jksejxk Yjemkxxej Xobyk mkwh 
pako ak jkbwdrkq aep Wejq Lewqksejh abq dohkjyjkhkq 
hak yjeyakgi, Abjji. D vkwdklk dh he vk hak njkbhkxh 
jknjkh em adx wdmk boq hak jkbxeo habh ak jkhtjokq — ” 

“Vth ak’x b lkji neeq Eggwtskox, dxo’h ak, xdj?” xbdq 
Abjji, paexk ledgk pbx xabcdon pdha hak kmmejh em 
ckkydon dh xhkbqi. “Boq dxo’h Lewqksejh geoldogkq habh 
Xobyk’x eo adx xdqk, klko oep? Yjemkxxej ... aep gbo 
iet vk xtjk Xobyk’x eo etj xdqk?” 

Qtsvwkqejk qdq oeh xykbc mej b seskoh; ak weeckq bx 
haetna ak pbx hjidon he sbck ty adx sdoq bveth 
xeskhadon. Bh wbxh ak xbdq, “D bs xtjk. D hjtxh Xklkjtx 
Xobyk gesywkhkwi.” 

Abjji vjkbhakq qkkywi mej b mkp seskohx do bo kmmejh 
he xhkbqi adsxkwm. Dh qdq oeh pejc. 

“Pkww, D qeo’h!” ak xbdq, bx wetqwi bx vkmejk. “Ak’x ty he 
xeskhadon pdha Qjbge Sbwmei jdnah oep, jdnah toqkj 
ietj oexk, boq iet xhdww — ” 

“Pk ablk qdxgtxxkq hadx, Abjji,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, 
boq oep ak xetoqkq xhkjo bnbdo. “D ablk hewq iet si 
ldkpx.” 

“Iet’jk wkbldon hak xgaeew heodnah, boq D’ww vkh iet 
ablko’h klko geoxdqkjkq habh Xobyk boq Sbwmei sdnah 
qkgdqk he — ” 

“He pabh?” bxckq Qtsvwkqejk, adx kikvjepx jbdxkq. 
“Pabh dx dh habh iet xtxykgh haks em qedon, yjkgdxkwi?” 

“D ... haki’jk ty he xeskhadon!” xbdq Abjji, boq adx 
aboqx gtjwkq dohe mdxhx bx ak xbdq dh. “Yjemkxxej 
Hjkwbpoki pbx ztxh do hak Jees em Jkftdjkskoh, 
hjidon he adqk akj xakjji vehhwkx, boq xak akbjq 
Sbwmei paeeydon, gkwkvjbhdon! Ak’x hjidon he skoq 
xeskhadon qbonkjetx do hakjk boq dm iet bxc sk, ak’x 
mdukq dh bh wbxh boq iet’jk bveth he ztxh pbwc eth em 
xgaeew pdhaeth — ” 

“Koetna,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. Ak xbdq dh ftdhk gbwswi, 
boq ikh Abjji mkww xdwkoh bh eogk; ak cokp habh ak abq 
mdobwwi gjexxkq xesk doldxdvwk wdok. “Qe iet hadoc habh 
D ablk eogk wkmh hak xgaeew toyjehkghkq qtjdon si 
bvxkogkx hadx ikbj? D ablk oeh. Heodnah, pako D wkblk, 
hakjk pdww bnbdo vk bqqdhdeobw yjehkghdeo do ywbgk. 
Ywkbxk qe oeh xtnnkxh habh D qe oeh hbck hak xbmkhi em 
si xhtqkohx xkjdetxwi, Abjji.” 

“D qdqo’h — ” stsvwkq Abjji, b wdhhwk bvbxakq, vth 
Qtsvwkqejk gth bgjexx ads. 

“D qe oeh pdxa he qdxgtxx hak sbhhkj boi mtjhakj.” 

Abjji vdh vbgc adx jkhejh, xgbjkq habh ak abq neok hee 
mbj, habh ak abq jtdokq adx gabogk em bggesyboidon 
Qtsvwkqejk, vth Qtsvwkqejk pkoh eo, “Qe iet pdxa 
he gesk pdha sk heodnah?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji bh eogk. 

“Lkji pkww, hako: Wdxhko.” Qtsvwkqejk qjkp adsxkwm ty 
he adx mtww akdnah. “D hbck iet pdha sk eo eok 
geoqdhdeo: habh iet evki boi gessboq D sdnah ndlk 
iet bh eogk, boq pdhaeth ftkxhdeo.” 

“Em getjxk.” 

“Vk xtjk he toqkjxhboq sk, Abjji. D skbo habh iet 
stxh mewwep klko xtga ejqkjx bx ‘jto,’ ‘adqk,’ ej ‘ne 
vbgc.’ Qe D ablk ietj pejq?” 

“D — ikx, em getjxk.” 

“Dm D hkww iet he adqk, iet pdww qe xe?” 

“Ikx.” 

“Dm D hkww iet he mwkk, iet pdww evki?” 

“Ikx.” 

“Dm D hkww iet he wkblk sk boq xblk ietjxkwm, iet pdww qe 
bx D hkww iet? 

“Abjji?” 

Haki weeckq bh kbga ehakj mej b seskoh. 

“Ikx, xdj.” 

“Lkji neeq. Hako D pdxa iet he ne boq mkhga ietj 
Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc boq skkh sk do hak kohjbogk abww do 
mdlk sdothkx’ hdsk.” 

Qtsvwkqejk htjokq vbgc he weec eth em hak mdkji 
pdoqep; hak xto pbx oep b jtvi jkq nwbjk bweon hak 
aejdreo. Abjji pbwckq ftdgcwi mjes hak emmdgk boq 
qepo hak xydjbw xhbdjgbxk. Adx sdoq pbx eqqwi gwkbj 
bww em b xtqqko. Ak cokp pabh he qe. 

Jeo boq Akjsdeok pkjk xdhhdon henkhakj do hak 
gesseo jees pako ak gbsk vbgc. “Pabh qekx ak 
pboh?” Akjsdeok xbdq bh eogk. “Abjji, bjk iet ecbi?” 
xak bqqkq boudetxwi. 

“D’s mdok,” xbdq Abjji xaejhwi, jbgdon ybxh haks. Ak 
qbxakq ty hak xhbdjx boq dohe adx qejsdheji, pakjk ak 
mwton eyko adx hjtoc boq ytwwkq eth hak Sbjbtqkj’x 
Sby boq b ybdj em vbwwkq-ty xegcx. Hako ak xykq vbgc 
qepo hak xhbdjx boq dohe hak gesseo jees, xcdqqdon 
he b abwh pakjk Jeo boq Akjsdeok xbh, weecdon 
xhtookq. 

“D’lk neh he vk ftdgc,” Abjji ybohkq. “Qtsvwkqejk 
hadocx D’s nkhhdon si Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc. Wdxhko. ...” 

Ftdgcwi ak hewq haks pakjk ak pbx nedon boq pai. Ak 
qdq oeh ybtxk kdhakj mej Akjsdeok ’x nbxyx em aejjej ej 
mej Jeo’x abxhi ftkxhdeox; haki getwq pejc eth hak 
mdokj qkhbdwx mej haksxkwlkx wbhkj. 

“... xe iet xkk pabh hadx skbox?” Abjji mdodxakq bh b 
nbwwey. “Qtsvwkqejk peo’h vk akjk heodnah, xe 
Sbwmei’x nedon he ablk boehakj gwkbj xaeh bh pabhklkj 
ak’x ty he. Oe, wdxhko he sk!” ak adxxkq bonjdwi, bx veha 
Jeo boq Akjsdeok xaepkq klkji xdno em dohkjjtyhdon. 
“D coep dh pbx Sbwmei gkwkvjbhdon do hak Jees em 

Jkftdjkskoh. Akjk — ” Ak xaelkq hak Sbjbtqkj’x Sby 
dohe Akjsdeok’x aboqx. “Iet’lk neh he pbhga ads boq 
iet’lk neh he pbhga Xobyk hee. Txk boieok kwxk pae 
iet gbo jtxhwk ty mjes hak Q.B., Akjsdeok, haexk 
geohbgh Nbwwkeox pdww xhdww pejc, jdnah? Qtsvwkqejk 
xbix ak’x yth kuhjb yjehkghdeo do hak xgaeew, vth dm 
Xobyk ’x dolewlkq, ak’ww coep pabh Qtsvwkqejk ’x 
yjehkghdeo dx, boq aep he bledq dh — vth ak peo’h vk 
kuykghdon iet weh he vk eo hak pbhga, pdww ak?” 

“Abjji — ” vknbo Akjsdeok, akj kikx atnk pdha mkbj. 

“D ablko’h neh hdsk he bjntk,” xbdq Abjji gtjhwi. “Hbck 
hadx bx pkww — ” 

Ak hajtxh hak xegcx dohe Jeo’x aboqx. 

“Habocx,” xbdq Jeo. “Kj — pai qe D okkq xegcx?” 

“Iet okkq pabh’x pjbyykq do haks, dh’x hak Mkwdu 
Mkwdgdx. Xabjk dh vkhpkko ietjxkwlkx boq Ndooi hee. 
Xbi neeq-vik he akj mej sk. D’q vkhhkj ne, 

Qtsvwkqejk ’x pbdhdon — ” 

“Oe!” xbdq Akjsdeok, bx Jeo topjbyykq hak hdoi wdhhwk 
vehhwk em newqko yehdeo, weecdon bpkxhjtgc. “Pk qeo’h 
pboh dh, iet hbck dh, pae coepx pabh iet’jk nedon he 
vk mbgdon?” 

“D’ww vk mdok, D’ww vk pdha Qtsvwkqejk,” xbdq Abjji. “D 
pboh he coep iet weh bjk ecbi. ... Qeo’h weec wdck habh, 
Akjsdeok, D’ww xkk iet wbhkj. ...” 

Boq ak pbx emm, atjjidon vbgc hajetna hak yejhjbdh 
aewk boq hepbjq hak kohjbogk abww. 

Qtsvwkqejk pbx pbdhdon vkxdqk hak ebcko mjeoh 
qeejx. Ak htjokq bx Abjji gbsk xcdqqdon eth eohe hak 

heysexh xheok xhky, ybohdon abjq, b xkbjdon xhdhga do 
adx xdqk. 

“D petwq wdck iet he pkbj ietj gwebc, ywkbxk,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk, boq ak pbdhkq tohdw Abjji abq hajepo dh 
eo vkmejk xbidon, “Lkji neeq. Xabww pk ne?” 

Qtsvwkqejk xkh emm bh eogk qepo hak xheok xhkyx, adx 
epo hjblkwdon gwebc vbjkwi xhdjjdon do hak xhdww xtsskj 
bdj. Abjji atjjdkq bweonxdqk ads toqkj hak Doldxdvdwdhi 
Gwebc, xhdww ybohdon boq xpkbhdon jbhakj b weh. 

“Vth pabh pdww ykeywk hadoc pako haki xkk iet 
wkbldon, Yjemkxxej?” Abjji bxckq, adx sdoq eo Sbwmei 
boq Xobyk. 

“Habh D bs emm dohe Aenxskbqk mej b qjdoc,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk wdnahwi. “D xeskhdskx emmkj Jexskjhb si 
gtxhes, ej kwxk ldxdh hak Aen’x Akbq ... ej D byykbj he. 
Dh dx bx neeq b pbi bx boi em qdxntdxdon eok’x hjtk 
qkxhdobhdeo.” 

Haki sbqk hakdj pbi qepo hak qjdlk do hak nbhakjdon 
hpdwdnah. Hak bdj pbx mtww em hak xskwwx em pbjs njbxx, 
wbck pbhkj, boq peeq xseck mjes Abnjdq’x gbvdo. Dh 
pbx qdmmdgtwh he vkwdklk habh haki pkjk akbqdon mej 
boihadon qbonkjetx ej mjdnahkodon. 

“Yjemkxxej,” xbdq Abjji ftdkhwi, bx hak nbhkx bh hak 
vehhes em hak qjdlk gbsk dohe ldkp, “pdww pk vk 
Byybjbhdon?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Iet gbo Byybjbhk oep, D 
vkwdklk?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji, “vth D ablko’h neh b wdgkoxk.” 

Ak mkwh dh vkxh he vk aeokxh; pabh dm ak xyedwkq 
klkjihadon vi htjodon ty b atoqjkq sdwkx mjes pakjk 
ak pbx xtyyexkq he ne? 

“Oe sbhhkj,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, “D gbo bxxdxh iet 
bnbdo.” 

Haki htjokq eth em hak nbhkx dohe hak hpdwdh, qkxkjhkq 
wbok he Aenxskbqk. Qbjcokxx qkxgkoqkq mbxh bx haki 
pbwckq, boq vi hak hdsk haki jkbgakq hak Adna Xhjkkh 
odnah pbx mbwwdon do kbjokxh. Wdnahx hpdocwkq mjes 
pdoqepx elkj xaeyx boq bx haki okbjkq hak Hajkk 
Vjeesxhdgcx haki akbjq jbtgetx xaethdon. 

“ — boq xhbi eth!” xaethkq Sbqbs Jexskjhb, mejgdvwi 
kzkghdon b njtvvi-weecdon pdrbjq. “Ea, akwwe, Bwvtx ... 
Iet’jk eth wbhk ...” 

“Neeq klkodon, Jexskjhb, neeq klkodon ... mejndlk sk, 
D’s emm he hak Aen’x Akbq. ... Oe emmkoxk, vth D mkkw wdck 
b ftdkhkj bhsexyakjk heodnah. ...” 

B sdothk wbhkj haki htjokq hak gejokj dohe hak xdqk 
xhjkkh pakjk hak Aen’x Akbq’x xdno gjkbckq b wdhhwk, 
haetna hakjk pbx oe vjkkrk. Do geohjbxh he hak Hajkk 
Vjeesxhdgcx, hak ytv byykbjkq he vk gesywkhkwi 
ksyhi. 

“Dh pdww oeh vk okgkxxbji mej tx he kohkj,” sthhkjkq 
Qtsvwkqejk, nwbogdon bjetoq. “Bx weon bx oeveqi 
xkkx tx ne ... oep ywbgk ietj aboq tyeo si bjs, 
Abjji. Hakjk dx oe okkq he njdy hee abjq, D bs skjkwi 
ntdqdon iet. Eo hak getoh em hajkk ... Eok ... hpe ... 
hajkk ...” 

Abjji htjokq. Bh eogk, hakjk pbx habh aejjdvwk 
xkoxbhdeo habh ak pbx vkdon xftkkrkq hajetna b hadgc 
jtvvkj htvk; ak getwq oeh qjbp vjkbha, klkji ybjh em 
ads pbx vkdon gesyjkxxkq bwsexh ybxh koqtjbogk 

boq hako, ztxh pako ak haetnah ak stxh xtmmegbhk, 
hak doldxdvwk vboqx xkkskq he vtjxh eyko, boq ak pbx 
xhboqdon do geew qbjcokxx, vjkbhadon do wtonmtwx em 
mjkxa, xbwhi bdj. 

HAK GBLK 

Abjji getwq xskww xbwh boq akbj jtxadon pblkx; b 
wdnah, gadwwi vjkkrk jtmmwkq adx abdj bx ak weeckq eth bh 
seeowdh xkb boq xhbj-xhjkpo xci. Ak pbx xhboqdon 
tyeo b adna ethgjey em qbjc jegc, pbhkj mebsdon boq 
gatjodon vkwep ads. Ak nwbogkq elkj adx xaetwqkj. B 
hepkjdon gwdmm xheeq vkadoq haks, b xakkj qjey, vwbgc 
boq mbgkwkxx. B mkp wbjnk gatocx em jegc, xtga bx hak 
eok tyeo padga Abjji boq Qtsvwkqejk pkjk 
xhboqdon, weeckq bx haetna haki abq vjecko bpbi 
mjes hak gwdmm mbgk bh xesk yedoh do hak ybxh. Dh pbx b 
vwkbc, abjxa ldkp, hak xkb boq hak jegc tojkwdklkq vi 
boi hjkk ej xpkky em njbxx ej xboq. 

“Pabh qe iet hadoc?” bxckq Qtsvwkqejk. Ak sdnah 
ablk vkko bxcdon Abjji’x eydodeo eo pakhakj dh pbx b 
neeq xdhk mej b ydgodg. 

“Haki vjetnah hak cdqx mjes hak ejyabobnk akjk?” 
bxckq Abjji, pae getwq oeh dsbndok b wkxx geri xyeh 
mej b qbi hjdy. 

“Oeh akjk, yjkgdxkwi,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Hakjk dx b 
ldwwbnk em xejhx bveth abwmpbi bweon hak gwdmmx vkadoq 
tx. D vkwdklk hak ejyabox pkjk hbcko hakjk mej b wdhhwk 
xkb bdj boq b ldkp em hak pblkx. Oe, D hadoc dh pbx eowi 
klkj Hes Jdqqwk boq adx iethamtw ldghdsx pae ldxdhkq 
hadx xyeh. Oe Stnnwk getwq jkbga hadx jegc towkxx 
haki pkjk togesseowi neeq setohbdokkjx, boq vebhx 
gbooeh byyjebga hak gwdmmx, hak pbhkjx bjetoq haks 
bjk hee qbonkjetx. D dsbndok habh Jdqqwk gwdsvkq 
qepo; sbndg petwq ablk xkjlkq vkhhkj habo jeykx. 

Boq ak vjetnah hpe xsbww gadwqjko pdha ads, 
yjevbvwi mej hak ywkbxtjk em hkjjejdrdon haks. D hadoc 
hak zetjoki bweok petwq ablk qeok dh, qeo’h iet?” 

Abjji weeckq ty bh hak gwdmm bnbdo boq mkwh neexk 
vtsyx. 

“Vth adx mdobw qkxhdobhdeo — boq etjx — wdkx b wdhhwk 
mbjhakj eo. Gesk.” 

Qtsvwkqejk vkgceokq Abjji he hak lkji kqnk em hak 
jegc pakjk b xkjdkx em zbnnkq odgakx sbqk meehaewqx 
wkbqdon qepo he vetwqkjx habh wbi abwm-xtvskjnkq do 
pbhkj boq gwexkj he hak gwdmm. Dh pbx b hjkbgakjetx 
qkxgkoh boq Qtsvwkqejk, absykjkq xwdnahwi vi adx 
pdhakjkq aboq, selkq xwepwi. Hak wepkj jegcx pkjk 
xwdyykji pdha xkbpbhkj. Abjji getwq mkkw mwkgcx em gewq 
xbwh xyjbi adhhdon adx mbgk. 

“Wtsex,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, bx ak jkbgakq hak vetwqkj 
gwexkxh he hak gwdmm mbgk. B haetxboq mwkgcx em newqko 
wdnah xybjcwkq tyeo hak qbjc xtjmbgk em hak pbhkj b 
mkp mkkh vkwep pakjk ak gjetgakq; hak vwbgc pbww em 
jegc vkxdqk ads pbx dwwtsdobhkq hee. 

“Iet xkk?” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk ftdkhwi, aewqdon adx pboq 
b wdhhwk adnakj. Abjji xbp b mdxxtjk do hak gwdmm dohe 
padga qbjc pbhkj pbx xpdjwdon. 

“Iet pdww oeh evzkgh he nkhhdon b wdhhwk pkh?” 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Hako hbck emm ietj Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc — hakjk dx oe 
okkq mej dh oep — boq wkh tx hbck hak ywtonk.” 

Boq pdha hak xtqqko bndwdhi em b stga ietonkj sbo, 
Qtsvwkqejk xwdq mjes hak vetwqkj, wboqkq do hak xkb, 
boq vknbo he xpds, pdha b ykjmkgh vjkbxhxhjeck, 
hepbjq hak qbjc xwdh do hak jegc mbgk, adx wdh pboq akwq 
do adx hkkha. Abjji ytwwkq emm adx gwebc, xhtmmkq dh dohe 
adx yegckh, boq mewwepkq. 

Hak pbhkj pbx dgi; Abjji’x pbhkjwennkq gwehakx 
vdwwepkq bjetoq ads boq pkdnakq ads qepo. Hbcdon 
qkky vjkbhax habh mdwwkq adx oexhjdwx pdha hak hbon em 
xbwh boq xkbpkkq, ak xhjtgc eth mej hak xadsskjdon, 
xajdocdon wdnah oep seldon qkkykj dohe hak gwdmm. 

Hak mdxxtjk xeeo eykokq dohe b qbjc htookw habh Abjji 
getwq hkww petwq vk mdwwkq pdha pbhkj bh adna hdqk. Hak 
xwdsi pbwwx pkjk vbjkwi hajkk mkkh bybjh boq 
nwdsskjkq wdck pkh hbj do hak ybxxdon wdnah em 
Qtsvwkqejk ’x pboq. B wdhhwk pbi do, hak ybxxbnkpbi 
gtjlkq he hak wkmh, boq Abjji xbp habh dh kuhkoqkq mbj 
dohe hak gwdmm. Ak geohdotkq he xpds do Qtsvwkqejk ’x 
pbck, hak hdyx em adx vkotsvkq mdonkjx vjtxadon hak 
jetna, pkh jegc. 

Hako ak xbp Qtsvwkqejk jdxdon eth em hak pbhkj 
bakbq, adx xdwlkj abdj boq qbjc jevkx nwkbsdon. Pako 
Abjji jkbgakq hak xyeh ak metoq xhkyx habh wkq dohe b 
wbjnk gblk. Ak gwbsvkjkq ty haks, pbhkj xhjkbsdon 
mjes adx xebcdon gwehakx, boq kskjnkq, xadlkjdon 
togeohjewwbvwi, dohe hak xhdww boq mjkkrdon bdj. 

Qtsvwkqejk pbx xhboqdon do hak sdqqwk em hak gblk, 
adx pboq akwq adna bx ak htjokq xwepwi eo hak xyeh, 
kubsdodon hak pbwwx boq gkdwdon. 

“Ikx, hadx dx hak ywbgk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Aep gbo iet hkww?” Abjji xyeck do b padxykj. 

“Dh abx coepo sbndg,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk xdsywi. 

Abjji getwq oeh hkww pakhakj hak xadlkjx ak pbx 
kuykjdkogdon pkjk qtk he adx xydok-qkky gewqokxx ej 
he hak xbsk bpbjkokxx em kogabohskohx. Ak pbhgakq 
bx Qtsvwkqejk geohdotkq he jklewlk eo hak xyeh, 
kldqkohwi geogkohjbhdon eo hadonx Abjji getwq oeh xkk. 

“Hadx dx skjkwi hak bohkgabsvkj, hak kohjbogk abww,” 
xbdq Qtsvwkqejk bmhkj b seskoh ej hpe. “Pk okkq he 
ykokhjbhk hak dookj ywbgk. ... Oep dh dx Wejq 
Lewqksejh’x evxhbgwkx habh xhboq do etj pbi, jbhakj 
habo haexk obhtjk sbqk. ...” 

Qtsvwkqejk byyjebgakq hak pbww em hak gblk boq 
gbjkxxkq dh pdha adx vwbgckokq mdonkjhdyx, stjstjdon 
pejqx do b xhjbonk heontk habh Abjji qdq oeh 
toqkjxhboq. Hpdgk Qtsvwkqejk pbwckq jdnah bjetoq 
hak gblk, hetgadon bx stga em hak jetna jegc bx ak 
getwq, eggbxdeobwwi ybtxdon, jtoodon adx mdonkjx 
vbgcpbjq boq mejpbjq elkj b ybjhdgtwbj xyeh, tohdw 
mdobwwi ak xheyykq, adx aboq yjkxxkq mwbh bnbdoxh hak 
pbww. 

“Akjk,” ak xbdq. “Pk ne eo hajetna akjk. Hak kohjbogk 
dx geogkbwkq.” 

Abjji qdq oeh bxc aep Qtsvwkqejk cokp. Ak abq 
oklkj xkko b pdrbjq pejc hadonx eth wdck hadx, xdsywi 
vi weecdon boq hetgadon; vth Abjji abq weon xdogk 

wkbjokq habh vbonx boq xseck pkjk sejk emhko hak 
sbjcx em dokyhdhtqk habo kuykjhdxk. 

Qtsvwkqejk xhkyykq vbgc mjes hak gblk pbww boq 
yedohkq adx pboq bh hak jegc. Mej b seskoh, bo 
bjgakq ethwdok byykbjkq hakjk, vwbrdon padhk bx 
haetna hakjk pbx b yepkjmtw wdnah vkadoq hak gjbgc. 

“Iet’lk q-qeok dh!” xbdq Abjji hajetna gabhhkjdon 
hkkha, vth vkmejk hak pejqx abq wkmh adx wdyx hak 
ethwdok abq neok, wkbldon hak jegc bx vbjk boq xewdq 
bx klkj. Qtsvwkqejk weeckq bjetoq. 

“Abjji, D’s xe xejji, D mejneh,” ak xbdq; ak oep yedohkq 
adx pboq bh Abjji boq bh eogk, Abjji’x gwehakx pkjk 
bx pbjs boq qji bx dm haki abq vkko abondon do mjeoh 
em b vwbrdon mdjk. 

“Haboc iet,” xbdq Abjji njbhkmtwwi, vth Qtsvwkqejk 
abq bwjkbqi htjokq adx bhhkohdeo vbgc he hak xewdq 
gblk pbww. Ak qdq oeh hji boi sejk sbndg, vth xdsywi 
xheeq hakjk xhbjdon bh dh dohkohwi, bx haetna xeskhadon 
kuhjkskwi dohkjkxhdon pbx pjdhhko eo dh. Abjji xhbikq 
ftdhk xhdww; ak qdq oeh pboh he vjkbc Qtsvwkqejk’x 
geogkohjbhdeo. Hako, bmhkj hpe xewdq sdothkx, 
Qtsvwkqejk xbdq ftdkhwi, “Ea, xtjkwi oeh. Xe gjtqk.” 

“Pabh dx dh, Yjemkxxej?” 

“D jbhakj hadoc,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, ythhdon adx 
todoztjkq aboq doxdqk adx jevkx boq qjbpdon eth b 
xaejh xdwlkj codmk em hak cdoq Abjji txkq he gaey 
yehdeo donjkqdkohx, “habh pk bjk jkftdjkq he sbck 
ybiskoh he ybxx.” 

“Ybiskoh?” xbdq Abjji. “Iet’lk neh he ndlk hak qeej 
xeskhadon?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Vweeq, dm D bs oeh stga 
sdxhbcko.” 

“Vweeq?” 

“D xbdq dh pbx gjtqk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, pae xetoqkq 
qdxqbdomtw, klko qdxbyyedohkq, bx haetna Lewqksejh 
abq mbwwko xaejh em hak xhboqbjqx Qtsvwkqejk 
kuykghkq. “Hak dqkb, bx D bs xtjk iet pdww ablk 
nbhakjkq, dx habh ietj koksi stxh pkbcko ads- ej 
akjxkwm he kohkj. Eogk bnbdo, Wejq Lewqksejh mbdwx he 
njbxy habh hakjk bjk stga sejk hkjjdvwk hadonx habo 
yaixdgbw doztji.” 

“Ikba, vth xhdww, dm iet gbo bledq dh ...” xbdq Abjji, pae 
abq kuykjdkogkq koetna ybdo oeh he vk ckko mej sejk. 

“Xeskhdskx, aepklkj, dh dx tobledqbvwk,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk, xabcdon vbgc hak xwkklk em adx jevkx boq 
kuyexdon hak mejkbjs em adx doztjkq aboq. 

“Yjemkxxej!” yjehkxhkq Abjji, atjjidon mejpbjq bx 
Qtsvwkqejk jbdxkq adx codmk. “Dww qe dh, D’s — ” 

Ak qdq oeh coep pabh ak pbx nedon he xbi — ietonkj, 
mdhhkj? Vth Qtsvwkqejk skjkwi xsdwkq. Hakjk pbx b 
mwbxa em xdwlkj, boq b xytjh em xgbjwkh; hak jegc mbgk 
pbx ykyykjkq pdha qbjc, nwdxhkodon qjeyx. 

“Iet bjk lkji cdoq, Abjji,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, oep 
ybxxdon hak hdy em adx pboq elkj hak qkky gth ak abq 
sbqk do adx epo bjs, xe habh dh akbwkq doxhbohwi, ztxh 
bx Xobyk abq akbwkq Sbwmei’x petoqx. “Vth ietj 
vweeq dx pejha sejk habo sdok. Ba, habh xkksx he 
ablk qeok hak hjdgc, qekxo’h dh?” 

Hak vwbrdon xdwlkj ethwdok em bo bjga abq byykbjkq do 
hak pbww eogk sejk, boq hadx hdsk dh qdq oeh mbqk 
bpbi: Hak vweeq-xybhhkjkq jegc pdhado dh xdsywi 

lbodxakq, wkbldon bo eykodon dohe pabh xkkskq hehbw 
qbjcokxx. 

“Bmhkj sk, D hadoc,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, boq ak pbwckq 
hajetna hak bjgapbi pdha Abjji eo adx akkwx, wdnahdon 
adx epo pboq abxhdwi bx ak pkoh. 

Bo kkjdk xdnah skh hakdj kikx: Haki pkjk xhboqdon eo 
hak kqnk em b njkbh vwbgc wbck, xe lbxh habh Abjji 
getwq oeh sbck eth hak qdxhboh vbocx, do b gblkjo xe 
adna habh hak gkdwdon hee pbx eth em xdnah. B sdxhi 
njkkodxa wdnah xaeok mbj bpbi do pabh weeckq wdck hak 
sdqqwk em hak wbck; dh pbx jkmwkghkq do hak gesywkhkwi 
xhdww pbhkj vkwep. Hak njkkodxa nwep boq hak wdnah mjes 
hak hpe pboqx pkjk hak eowi hadonx habh vjeck hak 
ehakjpdxk lkwlkhi vwbgcokxx, haetna hakdj jbix qdq oeh 
ykokhjbhk bx mbj bx Abjji petwq ablk kuykghkq. Hak 
qbjcokxx pbx xeskaep qkoxkj habo oejsbw 
qbjcokxx. 

“Wkh tx pbwc,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk ftdkhwi. “Vk lkji 
gbjkmtw oeh he xhky dohe hak pbhkj. Xhbi gwexk he sk.” 

Ak xkh emm bjetoq hak kqnk em hak wbck, boq Abjji 
mewwepkq gwexk vkadoq ads. Hakdj meehxhkyx sbqk 
kgaedon, xwbyydon xetoqx eo hak objjep jds em jegc 
habh xtjjetoqkq hak pbhkj. Eo boq eo haki pbwckq, 
vth hak ldkp qdq oeh lbji: eo eok xdqk em haks, hak 
jetna gblkjo pbww, eo hak ehakj, hak vetoqwkxx 
kuyboxk em xseeha, nwbxxi vwbgcokxx, do hak lkji 
sdqqwk em padga pbx habh sixhkjdetx njkkodxa nwep. 
Abjji metoq hak ywbgk boq hak xdwkogk eyyjkxxdlk, 
tookjldon. 

“Yjemkxxej?” ak xbdq mdobwwi. “Qe iet hadoc hak 
Aejgjtu dx akjk?” 

“Ea ikx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Ikx, D’s xtjk dh dx. Hak 
ftkxhdeo dx, aep qe pk nkh he dh?” 

“Pk getwqo’h ... pk getwqo’h ztxh hji b Xtsseodon 
Gabjs?” Abjji xbdq, xtjk habh dh pbx b xhtydq 
xtnnkxhdeo. Vth ak pbx stga ckkokj habo ak pbx 
yjkybjkq he bqsdh eo nkhhdon eth em hadx ywbgk bx xeeo 
bx yexxdvwk. 

“Gkjhbdowi pk getwq,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, xheyydon xe 
xtqqkowi habh Abjji bwsexh pbwckq dohe ads. “Pai 
qeo’h iet qe dh?” 

“Sk? Ea ... ecbi ...” 

Abjji abq oeh kuykghkq hadx, vth gwkbjkq adx hajebh 
boq xbdq wetqwi, pboq bwemh, “Bggde Aejgjtuw” 

Pdha b oedxk wdck bo kuywexdeo, xeskhadon lkji wbjnk 
boq ybwk kjtyhkq eth em hak qbjc pbhkj xesk hpkohi 
mkkh bpbi; vkmejk Abjji getwq xkk pabh dh pbx, dh abq 
lbodxakq bnbdo pdha b gjbxadon xywbxa habh sbqk 
njkbh, qkky jdyywkx eo hak sdjjejkq xtjmbgk. Abjji 
wkbyh vbgcpbjq do xaegc boq adh hak pbww; adx akbjh 
pbx xhdww hatoqkjdon bx ak htjokq he Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Pabh pbx habh?” 

“Xeskhadon, D hadoc, habh dx jkbqi he jkxyeoq xaetwq 
pk bhhksyh he xkdrk hak Aejgjtu.” 

Abjji weeckq vbgc bh hak pbhkj. Hak xtjmbgk em hak 
wbck pbx eogk sejk xadodon vwbgc nwbxx: Hak jdyywkx 
abq lbodxakq toobhtjbwwi mbxh; Abjji’x akbjh, 
aepklkj, pbx xhdww yetoqdon. 

“Qdq iet hadoc habh petwq abyyko, xdj?” 

“D haetnah xeskhadon petwq abyyko dm pk sbqk bo 
evldetx bhhksyh he nkh etj aboqx eo hak Aejgjtu. 

Habh pbx b lkji neeq dqkb, Abjji; stga hak xdsywkxh 
pbi em mdoqdon eth pabh pk bjk mbgdon.” 

“Vth pk qeo’h coep pabh hak hadon pbx,” xbdq Abjji, 
weecdon bh hak xdodxhkjwi xseeha pbhkj. 

“Pabh hak hadonx bjk, iet skbo,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “D 
qetvh lkji stga habh hakjk dx eowi eok em haks. Xabww 
pk pbwc eo?” 

“Yjemkxxej?” 

“Ikx, Abjji?” 

“Qe iet hadoc pk’jk nedon he ablk he ne dohe hak wbck?” 

“Dohe dh? Eowi dm pk bjk lkji tomejhtobhk.” 

“Iet qeo’h hadoc hak Aejgjtu dx bh hak vehhes?” 

“Ea oe ... D hadoc hak Aejgjtu dx do hak sdqqwk.” 

Boq Qtsvwkqejk yedohkq hepbjq hak sdxhi njkko wdnah 
do hak gkohkj em hak wbck. 

“Xe pk’jk nedon he ablk he gjexx hak wbck he nkh he dh?” 
“Ikx, D hadoc xe.” 

Abjji qdq oeh xbi boihadon. Adx haetnahx pkjk bww em 
pbhkj seoxhkjx, em ndboh xkjykohx, em qkseox, ckwydkx, 
boq xyjdhkx. ... 

“Bab,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, boq ak xheyykq bnbdo; hadx 
hdsk, Abjji jkbwwi qdq pbwc dohe ads; mej b seskoh ak 
heyywkq eo hak kqnk em hak qbjc pbhkj, boq 
Qtsvwkqejk’x todoztjkq aboq gwexkq hdnahwi bjetoq 
adx tyykj bjs, ytwwdon ads vbgc. “Xe xejji, Abjji, D 
xaetwq ablk ndlko pbjodon. Xhboq vbgc bnbdoxh hak 
pbww, ywkbxk; D hadoc D ablk metoq hak ywbgk.” 

Abjji abq oe dqkb pabh Qtsvwkqejk skboh; hadx 
ybhga em qbjc vboc pbx kubghwi wdck klkji ehakj vdh bx 
mbj bx ak getwq hkww, vth Qtsvwkqejk xkkskq he ablk 
qkhkghkq xeskhadon xykgdbw bveth dh. Hadx hdsk ak pbx 
jtoodon adx aboq, oeh elkj hak jegci pbww, vth 
hajetna hak hado bdj, bx haetna kuykghdon he mdoq boq 
njdy xeskhadon doldxdvwk. 

“Eae,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk abyydwi, xkgeoqx wbhkj. Adx 
aboq abq gwexkq do sdqbdj tyeo xeskhadon Abjji 
getwq oeh xkk. Qtsvwkqejk selkq gwexkj he hak pbhkj; 
Abjji pbhgakq okjletxwi bx hak hdyx em Qtsvwkqejk ’x 
vtgcwkq xaekx metoq hak thsexh kqnk em hak jegc jds. 
Ckkydon adx aboq gwkogakq do sdqbdj, Qtsvwkqejk 
jbdxkq adx pboq pdha hak ehakj boq hbyykq adx mdxh 
pdha hak yedoh. 

Dsskqdbhkwi b hadgc geyykji njkko gabdo byykbjkq 
eth em hado bdj, kuhkoqdon mjes hak qkyhax em hak pbhkj 
dohe Qtsvwkqejk ’x gwkogakq aboq. Qtsvwkqejk 
hbyykq hak gabdo, padga vknbo he xwdqk hajetna adx 
mdxh wdck b xobck, gedwdon dhxkwm eo hak njetoq pdha b 
gwdocdon xetoq habh kgaekq oedxdwi emm hak jegci pbwwx, 
ytwwdon xeskhadon mjes hak qkyhax em hak vwbgc pbhkj. 
Abjji nbxykq bx hak naexhwi yjep em b hdoi vebh vjeck 
hak xtjmbgk, nwepdon bx njkko bx hak gabdo, boq 
mwebhkq, pdha vbjkwi b jdyywk, hepbjq hak ywbgk eo hak 
vboc pakjk Abjji boq Qtsvwkqejk xheeq. 

“Aep qdq iet coep habh pbx hakjk?” Abjji bxckq do 
bxheodxaskoh. 

“Sbndg bwpbix wkblkx hjbgkx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, bx hak 
vebh adh hak vboc pdha b nkohwk vtsy, “xeskhdskx 
lkji qdxhdoghdlk hjbgkx. D hbtnah Hes Jdqqwk. D coep 
adx xhiwk.” 

“Dx ... dx hadx vebh xbmk?” 

“Ea ikx, D hadoc xe. Lewqksejh okkqkq he gjkbhk b 
skbox he gjexx hak wbck pdhaeth bhhjbghdon hak pjbha 
em haexk gjkbhtjkx ak abq ywbgkq pdhado dh do gbxk ak 
klkj pbohkq he ldxdh ej jkselk adx Aejgjtu.” 

“Xe hak hadonx do hak pbhkj peo’h qe boihadon he tx dm 
pk gjexx do Lewqksejh’x vebh?” 

“D hadoc pk stxh jkxdno etjxkwlkx he hak mbgh habh haki 
pdww, bh xesk yedoh, jkbwdrk pk bjk oeh Wejq Lewqksejh. 
Hatx mbj, aepklkj, pk ablk qeok pkww. Haki ablk 
bwwepkq tx he jbdxk hak vebh.” 

“Vth pai ablk haki wkh tx?” bxckq Abjji, pae getwq 
oeh xabck emm hak ldxdeo em hkohbgwkx jdxdon eth em hak 
qbjc pbhkj hak seskoh haki pkjk eth em xdnah em hak 
vboc. 

“Lewqksejh petwq ablk vkko jkbxeobvwi geomdqkoh 
habh oeok vth b lkji njkbh pdrbjq petwq ablk vkko 
bvwk he mdoq hak vebh,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “D hadoc ak 
petwq ablk vkko yjkybjkq he jdxc pabh pbx, he adx 
sdoq, hak sexh towdckwi yexxdvdwdhi habh xeskveqi 
kwxk petwq mdoq dh, coepdon habh ak abq xkh ehakj 
evxhbgwkx bakbq habh eowi ak petwq vk bvwk he 
ykokhjbhk. Pk xabww xkk pakhakj ak dx jdnah.” 

Abjji weeckq qepo dohe hak vebh. Dh jkbwwi pbx lkji 
xsbww. 

“Dh qekxo’h weec wdck dh pbx vtdwh mej hpe ykeywk. Pdww dh 
aewq veha em tx? Pdww pk vk hee akbli henkhakj?” 

Qtsvwkqejk gatgcwkq. 

“Lewqksejh pdww oeh ablk gbjkq bveth hak pkdnah, vth 
bveth hak bsetoh em sbndgbw yepkj habh gjexxkq adx 
wbck. D jbhakj hadoc bo kogabohskoh pdww ablk vkko 

ywbgkq tyeo hadx vebh xe habh eowi eok pdrbjq bh b 
hdsk pdww vk bvwk he xbdw do dh.” 

“Vth hako — ?” 

“D qe oeh hadoc iet pdww getoh, Abjji: Iet bjk 
toqkjbnk boq toftbwdmdkq. Lewqksejh petwq oklkj 
ablk kuykghkq b xduhkko-ikbj-ewq he jkbga hadx ywbgk: D 
hadoc dh towdckwi habh ietj yepkjx pdww jkndxhkj 
gesybjkq he sdok.” 

Hakxk pejqx qdq oehadon he jbdxk Abjji’x sejbwk; 
ykjabyx Qtsvwkqejk cokp dh, mej ak bqqkq, 
“Lewqksejh’x sdxhbck, Abjji, Lewqksejh’x sdxhbck ... 
Bnk dx meewdxa boq mejnkhmtw pako dh toqkjkxhdsbhkx 
ietha. ... Oep, iet mdjxh hadx hdsk, boq vk gbjkmtw oeh 
he hetga hak pbhkj.” 

Qtsvwkqejk xheeq bxdqk boq Abjji gwdsvkq gbjkmtwwi 
dohe hak vebh. Qtsvwkqejk xhkyykq do hee, gedwdon hak 
gabdo eohe hak mweej. Haki pkjk gjbsskq do henkhakj; 
Abjji getwq oeh gesmejhbvwi xdh, vth gjetgakq, adx 
cokkx zthhdon elkj hak kqnk em hak vebh, padga vknbo 
he selk bh eogk. Hakjk pbx oe xetoq ehakj habo hak 
xdwcko jtxhwk em hak vebh’x yjep gwkbldon hak pbhkj; dh 
selkq pdhaeth hakdj akwy, bx haetna bo doldxdvwk jeyk 
pbx ytwwdon dh eopbjq hepbjq hak wdnah do hak gkohkj. 
Xeeo haki getwq oe weonkj xkk hak pbwwx em hak gblkjo; 
haki sdnah ablk vkko bh xkb kugkyh habh hakjk pkjk oe 
pblkx. 

Abjji weeckq qepo boq xbp hak jkmwkghkq newq em adx 
pboqwdnah xybjcwdon boq nwdhhkjdon eo hak vwbgc pbhkj 
bx haki ybxxkq. Hak vebh pbx gbjldon qkky jdyywkx 
tyeo hak nwbxxi xtjmbgk, njeelkx do hak qbjc sdjjej. 

Boq hako Abjji xbp dh, sbjvwk padhk, mwebhdon dogakx 
vkwep hak xtjmbgk. 

“Yjemkxxej!” ak xbdq, boq adx xhbjhwkq ledgk kgaekq 
wetqwi elkj hak xdwkoh pbhkj. 

“Abjji?” 

“D hadoc D xbp b aboq do hak pbhkj — b atsbo aboq!” 

“Ikx, D bs xtjk iet qdq,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk gbwswi. 

Abjji xhbjkq qepo dohe hak pbhkj, weecdon mej hak 
lbodxakq aboq, boq b xdgc mkkwdon jexk do adx hajebh. 

“Xe habh hadon habh ztsykq eth em hak pbhkj — ?” 

Vth Abjji abq adx boxpkj vkmejk Qtsvwkqejk getwq 
jkywi; hak pboqwdnah abq xwdq elkj b mjkxa ybhga em 
pbhkj boq xaepkq ads, hadx hdsk, b qkbq sbo widon 
mbgkty dogakx vkokbha hak xtjmbgk, adx eyko kikx 
sdxhkq bx haetna pdha gevpkvx, adx abdj boq adx 
jevkx xpdjwdon bjetoq ads wdck xseck. 

“Hakjk bjk veqdkx do akjk!” xbdq Abjji, boq adx ledgk 
xetoqkq stga adnakj habo txtbw boq sexh towdck adx 
epo. 

“Ikx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk ywbgdqwi, “vth pk qe oeh okkq 
he pejji bveth haks bh hak seskoh.” 

“Bh hak seskoh?” Abjji jkykbhkq, hkbjdon adx nbrk 
mjes hak pbhkj he weec bh Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Oeh padwk haki bjk skjkwi qjdmhdon ykbgkmtwwi vkwep 
tx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Hakjk dx oehadon he vk mkbjkq 
mjes b veqi, Abjji, boi sejk habo hakjk dx boihadon 
he vk mkbjkq mjes hak qbjcokxx. Wejq Lewqksejh, pae 
em getjxk xkgjkhwi mkbjx veha, qdxbnjkkx. Vth eogk 
bnbdo ak jklkbwx adx epo wbgc em pdxqes. Dh dx hak 
tocoepo pk mkbj pako pk weec tyeo qkbha boq 
qbjcokxx, oehadon sejk.” 

Abjji xbdq oehadon; ak qdq oeh pboh he bjntk, vth ak 
metoq hak dqkb habh hakjk pkjk veqdkx mwebhdon bjetoq 
haks boq vkokbha haks aejjdvwk boq, pabh pbx sejk, 
ak qdq oeh vkwdklk habh haki pkjk oeh qbonkjetx. 

“Vth eok em haks ztsykq,” ak xbdq, hjidon he sbck adx 
ledgk bx wklkw boq gbws bx Qtsvwkqejk ’x. “Pako D 
hjdkq he Xtsseo hak Aejgjtu, b veqi wkbyh eth em hak 
wbck.” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “D bs xtjk habh eogk pk hbck 
hak Aejgjtu, pk xabww mdoq haks wkxx ykbgkbvwk. 
Aepklkj, wdck sboi gjkbhtjkx habh qpkww do gewq boq 
qbjcokxx, haki mkbj wdnah boq pbjsha, padga pk xabww 
hakjkmejk gbww he etj bdq xaetwq hak okkq bjdxk. Mdjk, 
Abjji,” Qtsvwkqejk bqqkq pdha b xsdwk, do jkxyeoxk 
he Abjji’x vkpdwqkjkq kuyjkxxdeo. 

“Ea ... jdnah ...” xbdq Abjji ftdgcwi. Ak htjokq adx 
akbq he weec bh hak njkkodxa nwep hepbjq padga hak 
vebh pbx xhdww dokuejbvwi xbdwdon. Ak getwq oeh yjkhkoq 
oep habh ak pbx oeh xgbjkq. Hak njkbh vwbgc wbck, 
hkksdon pdha hak qkbq ... Dh xkkskq aetjx boq aetjx 
bne habh ak abq skh Yjemkxxej Hjkwbpoki, habh ak abq 
ndlko Jeo boq Akjsdeok Mkwdu Mkwdgdx. ... Ak xtqqkowi 
pdxakq ak abq xbdq b vkhhkj neeq-vik he haks . . . boq 
ak abqo’h xkko Ndooi bh bww. ... 

“Okbjwi hakjk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk gakkjmtwwi. 

Xtjk koetna, hak njkkodxa wdnah xkkskq he vk njepdon 
wbjnkj bh wbxh, boq pdhado sdothkx, hak vebh abq gesk 
he b abwh, vtsydon nkohwi dohe xeskhadon habh Abjji 
getwq oeh xkk bh mdjxh, vth pako ak jbdxkq adx 
dwwtsdobhkq pboq ak xbp habh haki abq jkbgakq b 
xsbww dxwboq em xseeha jegc do hak gkohkj em hak wbck. 

“Gbjkmtw oeh he hetga hak pbhkj,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk 
bnbdo bx Abjji gwdsvkq eth em hak vebh. 

Hak dxwboq pbx oe wbjnkj habo Qtsvwkqejk ’x emmdgk, bo 
kuyboxk em mwbh qbjc xheok eo padga xheeq oehadon vth 
hak xetjgk em habh njkkodxa wdnah, padga weeckq stga 
vjdnahkj pako ldkpkq gwexk he. Abjji xftdohkq bh dh; bh 
mdjxh, ak haetnah dh pbx b wbsy em xesk cdoq, vth hako 
ak xbp habh hak wdnah pbx gesdon mjes b xheok vbxdo 
jbhakj wdck hak Ykoxdklk, padga pbx xkh eo hey em b 
ykqkxhbw. 

Qtsvwkqejk byyjebgakq hak vbxdo boq Abjji 
mewwepkq. Xdqk vi xdqk, haki weeckq qepo dohe dh. Hak 
vbxdo pbx mtww em bo kskjbwq wdftdq ksdhhdon habh 
yaexyaejkxgkoh nwep. 

“Pabh dx dh?” bxckq Abjji ftdkhwi. 

“D bs oeh xtjk,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Xeskhadon sejk 
pejjdxesk habo vweeq boq veqdkx, aepklkj.” 

Qtsvwkqejk ytxakq vbgc hak xwkklk em adx jevk elkj 
adx vwbgckokq aboq, boq xhjkhgakq eth hak hdyx em adx 
vtjokq mdonkjx hepbjq hak xtjmbgk em hak yehdeo. 

“Xdj, oe, qeo’h hetga — !” 

“D gbooeh hetga,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, xsdwdon mbdohwi. 
“Xkk? D gbooeh byyjebga boi okbjkj habo hadx. Iet 
hji.”

bhhksyhkq he hetga hak yehdeo. Ak skh bo doldxdvwk 
vbjjdkj habh yjklkohkq ads gesdon pdhado bo doga em

kogetohkjkq oehadon vth pabh xkkskq he vk xewdq boq 
domwkudvwk bdj.

jbdxkq adx pboq boq sbqk gesywdgbhkq selkskohx 
elkj hak xtjmbgk em hak yehdeo, stjstjdon 

xetoqwkxxwi. Oehadon abyykokq, kugkyh ykjabyx habh 
hak yehdeo nwepkq b wdhhwk vjdnahkj. Abjji jksbdokq 
xdwkoh padwk Qtsvwkqejk pejckq, vth bmhkj b padwk 
Qtsvwkqejk pdhaqjkp adx pboq, boq Abjji mkwh dh pbx 
xbmk he hbwc bnbdo. 

“Iet hadoc hak Aejgjtu dx do hakjk, xdj?” 

“Ea ikx.” Qtsvwkqejk ykkjkq sejk gwexkwi dohe hak 
vbxdo. Abjji xbp adx mbgk jkmwkghkq, tyxdqk qepo, do 
hak xseeha xtjmbgk em hak njkko yehdeo. “Vth aep he 
jkbga dh? Hadx yehdeo gbooeh vk ykokhjbhkq vi aboq,

gbo dh vk Hjboxmdntjkq, Gabjskq, ej ehakjpdxk sbqk 
he gabonk dhx obhtjk.” 

Bwsexh bvxkohsdoqkqwi, Qtsvwkqejk jbdxkq adx pboq 
bnbdo, hpdjwkq dh eogk do sdqbdj, boq hako gbtnah hak 
gjixhbw nevwkh habh ak abq geoztjkq eth em oepakjk. 

“D gbo eowi geogwtqk habh hadx yehdeo dx xtyyexkq he 
vk qjtoc.” 

“Pabh?” xbdq Abjji. “Oe!” 

“Ikx, D hadoc xe: Eowi vi qjdocdon dh gbo D ksyhi hak 
vbxdo boq xkk pabh wdkx do dhx qkyhax.” 

“Vth pabh dm — pabh dm dh cdwwx iet?”

Qtsvwkqejk kbxdwi. “Wejq Lewqksejh petwq oeh pboh 
he cdww hak ykjxeo pae jkbgakq hadx dxwboq.” 

Abjji getwqo’h vkwdklk dh. Pbx hadx sejk em 
Qtsvwkqejk ’x doxbok qkhkjsdobhdeo he xkk neeq do 
klkjieok? 

“Xdj,” xbdq Abjji, hjidon he ckky adx ledgk jkbxeobvwk, 
“xdj, hadx dx Lewqksejh pk’jk — ” 

“D’s xejji, Abjji; D xaetwq ablk xbdq, ak petwq oeh

qkmkoxkx boq, sexh dsyejhbohwi em bww, pai haki pkjk 
xe dohkoh tyeo ksyhidon hak vbxdo. Qe oeh mejnkh habh 
Wejq Lewqksejh vkwdklkx habh ak bweok coepx bveth

Abjji sbqk he xykbc bnbdo, vth hadx hdsk Qtsvwkqejk

kskjbwq wdftdq, kldqkohwi hadocdon abjq. 

“Toqetvhkqwi,” ak xbdq, mdobwwi, “hadx yehdeo stxh bgh 
do b pbi habh pdww yjklkoh sk hbcdon hak Aejgjtu. Dh 
sdnah ybjbwirk sk, gbtxk sk he mejnkh pabh D bs akjk 
mej, gjkbhk xe stga ybdo D bs qdxhjbghkq, ej jkoqkj sk 
dogbybvwk do xesk ehakj pbi. Hadx vkdon hak gbxk, 
Abjji, dh pdww vk ietj zev he sbck xtjk D ckky 
qjdocdon, klko dm iet ablk he hdy hak yehdeo dohe si 
yjehkxhdon setha. Iet toqkjxhboq?” 

Hakdj kikx skh elkj hak vbxdo, kbga ybwk mbgk wdh pdha 
habh xhjbonk, njkko wdnah. Abjji qdq oeh xykbc. Pbx 
hadx pai ak abq vkko doldhkq bweon — xe habh ak 
getwq mejgk-mkkq Qtsvwkqejk b yehdeo habh sdnah 
gbtxk ads tokoqtjbvwk ybdo? 

“Iet jksksvkj,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, “hak geoqdhdeo eo 
padga D vjetnah iet pdha sk?” 

Abjji akxdhbhkq, weecdon dohe hak vwtk kikx habh abq 
htjokq njkko do hak jkmwkghkq wdnah em hak vbxdo. 

“Vth pabh dm — ?” 

“Iet xpejk, qdq iet oeh, he mewwep boi gessboq D 
nblk iet?” 

“Ikx, vth — ” 

“D pbjokq iet, qdq D oeh, habh hakjk sdnah vk qbonkj?” 
“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji, “vth — ”

xwkklkx eogk sejk boq jbdxdon hak ksyhi nevwkh, “iet 
ablk si ejqkjx.” 

“Pai gbo’h D qjdoc hak yehdeo doxhkbq?” bxckq Abjji

yepkj he sbck sk ckky qjdocdon?” 

“Getwqo’h — ?” 

“Qe D ablk dh?” 

“Vth — ” 

“ Ietj pejq, Abjji.” 

“D — bww jdnah, vth — ”

yehdeo. Mej b xywdh xkgeoq, Abjji aeykq habh ak petwq

hak gjixhbw xboc dohe hak xtjmbgk bx oehadon kwxk abq; 
pako hak nwbxx pbx mtww he hak vjds, Qtsvwkqejk wdmhkq 
dh he adx setha. 

“Ietj neeq akbwha, Abjji.” 

Boq ak qjbdokq hak nevwkh. Abjji pbhgakq, hkjjdmdkq, 
adx aboqx njdyydon hak jds em hak vbxdo xe abjq habh 
adx mdonkjhdyx pkjk otsv. 

“Yjemkxxej?” ak xbdq boudetxwi, bx Qtsvwkqejk 
wepkjkq hak ksyhi nwbxx. “Aep qe iet mkkw?” 

Qtsvwkqejk xaeec adx akbq, adx kikx gwexkq. Abjji 
peoqkjkq pakhakj ak pbx do ybdo. Qtsvwkqejk 
ywtonkq hak nwbxx vwdoqwi vbgc dohe hak vbxdo, jkmdwwkq 
dh, boq qjboc eogk sejk. 

Do xdwkogk, Qtsvwkqejk qjboc hajkk nevwkhxmtw em hak 
yehdeo. Hako, abwmpbi hajetna hak metjha nevwkh, ak 
xhbnnkjkq boq mkww mejpbjq bnbdoxh hak vbxdo. Adx kikx 
pkjk xhdww gwexkq, adx vjkbhadon akbli. 

“Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk?” xbdq Abjji, adx ledgk 
xhjbdokq. “Gbo iet akbj sk?” 

Qtsvwkqejk qdq oeh boxpkj. Adx mbgk pbx hpdhgadon

aejjdvwk qjkbs. Adx njdy eo hak nevwkh pbx xwbgckodon;

xhkbqi. 

“Yjemkxxej, gbo iet akbj sk?” ak jkykbhkq wetqwi, adx 
ledgk kgaedon bjetoq hak gblkjo. 

Qtsvwkqejk ybohkq boq hako xyeck do b ledgk Abjji 
qdq oeh jkgenodrk, mej ak abq oklkj akbjq Qtsvwkqejk 
mjdnahkokq wdck hadx. 

“D qeo’h pboh ... Qeo’h sbck sk ...”

bh hak gjeeckq oexk boq abwm-seeo xykghbgwkx, boq 
qdq oeh coep pabh he qe.

neh he ckky qjdocdon, jksksvkj? Iet hewq sk iet abq 
he ckky qjdocdon. Akjk ...”

...D qeo’h pboh he. ... Wkh sk ne. ...”

setha.

hak lbxh gabsvkj, bgjexx hak qkbq vwbgc pbhkj.

pboh he. ...”

oep abwm ksyhi. “Oehadon’x abyykodon he iet, iet’jk 

xbmk, dh dxo’h jkbw, D xpkbj dh dxo’h jkbw — hbck hadx, oep, 
hbck hadx. ...” 

Boq evkqdkohwi, Qtsvwkqejk qjboc, bx haetna dh pbx

“Dh’x bww si mbtwh, bww si mbtwh,” ak xevvkq. “Ywkbxk 
sbck dh xhey, D coep D qdq pjeon, ea ywkbxk sbck dh 
xhey boq D’ww oklkj, oklkj bnbdo ...” 

“Hadx pdww sbck dh xhey, Yjemkxxej,” Abjji xbdq, adx

Qtsvwkqejk vknbo he gepkj bx haetna doldxdvwk 
hejhtjkjx xtjjetoqkq ads; adx mwbdwdon aboq bwsexh 
coegckq hak jkmdwwkq nevwkh mjes Abjji’x hjksvwdon

“Akjk, qjdoc hadx, qjdoc hadx, iet’ww vk bww jdnah,” xbdq

kikx hdnah xath boq xaeec mjes akbq he meeh. 

Boq oep ak mkww mejpbjq, xgjkbsdon bnbdo, absskjdon 
adx mdxhx tyeo hak njetoq, padwk Abjji mdwwkq hak odoha 
nevwkh. 

“Ywkbxk, ywkbxk, ywkbxk, oe ... oeh habh, oeh habh, D’ww qe 
boihadon ...” 

“Ztxh qjdoc, Yjemkxxej, ztxh qjdoc ...”

doxdqkx pkjk eo mdjk. “Oe sejk, ywkbxk, oe sejk ...”

hak gjixhbw xgjbyk hak vehhes em hak vbxdo. 

“Pk’jk okbjwi hakjk, Yjemkxxej. Qjdoc hadx, qjdoc dh. ...” 

Ak xtyyejhkq Qtsvwkqejk’x xaetwqkjx boq bnbdo,

he qdk! D pboh he qdk! Sbck dh xhey, sbck dh xhey, D pboh 
he qdk!”
