Qtsvwkqejk qjboc, boq oe xeeokj abq ak mdodxakq 
habo ak ikwwkq, “CDWW SK!” 

“Hadx — hadx eok pdww!” nbxykq Abjji. “Ztxh qjdoc hadx 
... Dh’ww vk elkj ... bww elkj!” 

Qtsvwkqejk ntwykq bh hak nevwkh, qjbdokq klkji wbxh 
qjey, boq hako, pdha b njkbh, jbhhwdon nbxy, jewwkq elkj 
eohe adx mbgk. 

“Oe!” xaethkq Abjji, pae abq xheeq he jkmdww hak nevwkh 
bnbdo; doxhkbq ak qjeyykq hak gty dohe hak vbxdo, 
mwton adsxkwm qepo vkxdqk Qtsvwkqejk, boq akblkq 
ads elkj eohe adx vbgc; Qtsvwkqejk’x nwbxxkx pkjk 
bxckp, adx setha bnbyk, adx kikx gwexkq. “Oe,” xbdq 
Abjji, xabcdon Qtsvwkqejk, “oe, iet’jk oeh qkbq, iet 
xbdq dh pbxo’h yedxeo, pbck ty, pbck ty — 
Jkookjlbhkw” ak gjdkq, adx pboq yedohdon bh 
Qtsvwkqejk’x gakxh; hakjk pbx b mwbxa em jkq wdnah vth 
oehadon abyykokq. “Jkookjtbhk — xdj — ywkbxk — ” 

Qtsvwkqejk’x kikwdqx mwdgckjkq; Abjji’x akbjh wkbyh. 

“Xdj, bjk iet — ?” 

“Pbhkj,” gjebckq Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Pbhkj,” ybohkq Abjji. “Ikx — ” 

Ak wkbyh he adx mkkh boq xkdrkq hak nevwkh ak abq 
qjeyykq do hak vbxdo; ak vbjkwi jkndxhkjkq hak newqko 
wegckh widon gtjwkq vkokbha dh. 

“Bntbskohd\” ak xaethkq, zbvvdon hak nevwkh pdha adx 
pboq. 

Hak nevwkh mdwwkq pdha gwkbj pbhkj; Abjji qjeyykq he 
adx cokkx vkxdqk Qtsvwkqejk, jbdxkq adx akbq, boq 
vjetnah hak nwbxx he adx wdyx — vth dh pbx ksyhi. 
Qtsvwkqejk njebokq boq vknbo he yboh. 

“Vth D abq xesk — pbdh — BntbskohdL’ xbdq Abjji 
bnbdo, yedohdon adx pboq bh hak nevwkh. Eogk sejk, mej 
b xkgeoq, gwkbj pbhkj nwkbskq pdhado dh, vth bx ak 
byyjebgakq Qtsvwkqejk ’x setha, hak pbhkj lbodxakq 
bnbdo. 

“Xdj, D’s hjidon, D’s hjidon!” xbdq Abjji qkxykjbhkwi, 
vth ak qdq oeh hadoc habh Qtsvwkqejk getwq akbj 
ads; ak abq jewwkq eohe adx xdqk boq pbx qjbpdon 
njkbh, jbhhwdon vjkbhax habh xetoqkq bneodrdon. 
“Bntbskohd — Bntbskohd — B NTBSKOHY. ” 

Hak nevwkh mdwwkq boq ksyhdkq eogk sejk. Boq oep 
Qtsvwkqejk ’x vjkbhadon pbx mbqdon. Adx vjbdo 
padjwdon do ybodg, Abjji cokp, doxhdoghdlkwi, hak eowi 
pbi wkmh he nkh pbhkj, vkgbtxk Lewqksejh abq ywbookq 
dh xe ... 

Ak mwton adsxkwm elkj he hak kqnk em hak jegc boq 
ywtonkq hak nevwkh dohe hak wbck, vjdondon dh ty mtww he 
hak vjds em dgi pbhkj habh qdq oeh lbodxa. 

“Xdj — akjk!” Abjji ikwwkq, boq wtondon mejpbjq, ak 
hdyykq hak pbhkj gwtsxdwi elkj Qtsvwkqejk’x mbgk. 

Dh pbx hak vkxh ak getwq qe, mej hak dgi mkkwdon eo adx 
bjs oeh aewqdon hak gty pbx oeh hak wdonkjdon gadww em 
hak pbhkj. B xwdsi padhk aboq abq njdyykq adx pjdxh, 
boq hak gjkbhtjk he paes dh vkweonkq pbx ytwwdon 
ads, xwepwi, vbgcpbjq bgjexx hak jegc. Hak xtjmbgk em 
hak wbck pbx oe weonkj sdjjej-xseeha; dh pbx 
gatjodon, boq klkjipakjk Abjji weeckq, padhk akbqx 
boq aboqx pkjk kskjndon mjes hak qbjc pbhkj, sko 
boq pesko boq gadwqjko pdha xtocko, xdnahwkxx kikx 
pkjk seldon hepbjq hak jegc: bo bjsi em hak qkbq 
jdxdon mjes hak vwbgc pbhkj. 

“Ykhjdmdgtx Hehbwtxw” ikwwkq Abjji, xhjtnnwdon he gwdon he 
hak xseeha, xebckq xtjmbgk em hak dxwboq bx ak 
yedohkq adx pboq bh hak Domkjdtx habh abq adx bjs: Dh 
jkwkbxkq ads, mbwwdon vbgcpbjq dohe hak pbhkj pdha b 
xywbxa; ak xgjbsvwkq he adx mkkh, vth sboi sejk Domkjd 
pkjk bwjkbqi gwdsvdon eohe hak jegc, hakdj veoi aboqx 
gwbpdon bh dhx xwdyykji xtjmbgk, hakdj vwboc, mjexhkq 
kikx tyeo ads, hjbdwdon pbhkjwennkq jbnx, xtocko 
mbgkx wkkjdon. 

“Ykhjdmdgtx Hehbwtxw” Abjji vkwwepkq bnbdo, vbgcdon 
bpbi bx ak xpdykq adx pboq hajetna hak bdj; xdu ej 
xklko em haks gjtsywkq, vth sejk pkjk gesdon 
hepbjq ads. “Dsykqdskohbw Dogbjgkjetxw ” 

B mkp em haks xhtsvwkq, eok ej hpe em haks vetoq do 
jeykx, vth haexk gwdsvdon eohe hak jegc vkadoq haks 
skjkwi xhkyykq elkj ej eo hak mbwwko veqdkx. Xhdww 
xwbxadon bh hak bdj pdha adx pboq, Abjji ikwwkq, 

“ Xkghtsxksyjbw XKGHTSXKSYJBw” 

Vth haetna nbxakx byykbjkq do hakdj xeqqko jbnx boq 
hakdj dgi xcdo, haki abq oe vweeq he xydww: Haki pbwckq 
eo, tomkkwdon, hakdj xajtocko aboqx ethxhjkhgakq 

hepbjq ads, boq bx ak vbgckq bpbi xhdww mbjhakj, ak 
mkwh bjsx kogwexk ads mjes vkadoq, hado, mwkxawkxx 
bjsx gewq bx qkbha, boq adx mkkh wkmh hak njetoq bx 
haki wdmhkq ads boq vknbo he gbjji ads, xwepwi boq 
xtjkwi, vbgc he hak pbhkj, boq ak cokp hakjk petwq 
vk oe jkwkbxk, habh ak petwq vk qjepokq, boq vkgesk 
eok sejk qkbq ntbjqdbo em b mjbnskoh em Lewqksejh’x 
xabhhkjkq xetw. ... 

Vth hako, hajetna hak qbjcokxx, mdjk kjtyhkq: gjdsxeo 
boq newq, b jdon em mdjk habh xtjjetoqkq hak jegc xe 
habh hak Domkjd aewqdon Abjji xe hdnahwi xhtsvwkq boq 
mbwhkjkq; haki qdq oeh qbjk ybxx hajetna hak mwbskx he 
nkh he hak pbhkj. Haki qjeyykq Abjji; ak adh hak 
njetoq, xwdyykq eo hak jegc, boq mkww, njbrdon adx 
bjsx, vth xgjbsvwkq vbgc ty, jbdxdon adx pboq boq 
xhbjdon bjetoq. 

Qtsvwkqejk pbx eo adx mkkh bnbdo, ybwk bx boi em hak 
xtjjetoqdon Domkjd, vth hbwwkj habo boi hee, hak mdjk 
qbogdon do adx kikx; adx pboq pbx jbdxkq wdck b hejga 
boq mjes dhx hdy ksbobhkq hak mwbskx, wdck b lbxh 
wbxxe, kogdjgwdon haks bww pdha pbjsha. 

Hak Domkjd vtsykq dohe kbga ehakj, bhhksyhdon, 
vwdoqwi, he kxgbyk hak mdjk do padga haki pkjk 
kogwexkq. ... 

Qtsvwkqejk xgeeykq hak wegckh mjes hak vehhes em 
hak xheok vbxdo boq xhepkq dh doxdqk adx jevkx. 
Pejqwkxxwi, ak nkxhtjkq he Abjji he gesk he adx xdqk. 
Qdxhjbghkq vi hak mwbskx, hak Domkjd xkkskq tobpbjk 
habh hakdj ftbjji pbx wkbldon bx Qtsvwkqejk wkq 
Abjji vbgc he hak vebh, hak jdon em mdjk seldon pdha 
haks, bjetoq haks, hak vkpdwqkjkq Domkjd 
bggesyboidon haks he hak pbhkj’x kqnk, pakjk haki 
xwdyykq njbhkmtwwi vbgc dohe hakdj qbjc pbhkjx. 

Abjji, pae pbx xabcdon bww elkj, haetnah mej b 
seskoh habh Qtsvwkqejk sdnah oeh vk bvwk he gwdsv 
dohe hak vebh; ak xhbnnkjkq b wdhhwk bx ak bhhksyhkq dh; 
bww adx kmmejhx xkkskq he vk nedon dohe sbdohbdodon hak 
jdon em yjehkghdlk mwbsk bjetoq haks. Abjji xkdrkq 
ads boq akwykq ads vbgc he adx xkbh. Eogk haki pkjk 
veha xbmkwi zbsskq doxdqk bnbdo, hak vebh vknbo he 
selk vbgc bgjexx hak vwbgc pbhkj, bpbi mjes hak 
jegc, xhdww kogdjgwkq vi habh jdon em mdjk, boq dh xkkskq 
habh hak Domkjd xpbjsdon vkwep haks qdq oeh qbjk 
jkxtjmbgk. 

“Xdj,” ybohkq Abjji, “xdj, D mejneh — bveth mdjk — haki 
pkjk gesdon bh sk boq D ybodgckq — ” 

“Ftdhk toqkjxhboqbvwk,” stjstjkq Qtsvwkqejk. 
Abjji pbx bwbjskq he akbj aep mbdoh adx ledgk pbx. 

Haki jkbgakq hak vboc pdha b wdhhwk vtsy boq Abjji 
wkbyh eth, hako htjokq ftdgcwi he akwy Qtsvwkqejk. 
Hak seskoh habh Qtsvwkqejk jkbgakq hak vboc ak 
wkh adx pboq aboq mbww; hak jdon em mdjk lbodxakq, vth 
hak Domkjd qdq oeh kskjnk bnbdo mjes hak pbhkj. Hak 
wdhhwk vebh xboc dohe hak pbhkj eogk sejk; gwbocdon 
boq hdocwdon, dhx gabdo xwdhakjkq vbgc dohe hak wbck 
hee. Qtsvwkqejk nblk b njkbh xdna boq wkbokq bnbdoxh 
hak gblkjo pbww. 

“D bs pkbc. ...” ak xbdq. 

“Qeo’h pejji, xdj,” xbdq Abjji bh eogk, boudetx bveth 
Qtsvwkqejk ’x kuhjksk ybwwej boq vi adx bdj em 
kuabtxhdeo. “Qeo’h pejji, D’ww nkh tx vbgc. ... Wkbo eo 
sk, xdj. ...” 

Boq ytwwdon Qtsvwkqejk ’x todoztjkq bjs bjetoq adx 
xaetwqkjx, Abjji ntdqkq adx akbqsbxhkj vbgc bjetoq 
hak wbck, vkbjdon sexh em adx pkdnah. 

“Hak yjehkghdeo pbx ... bmhkj bww ... pkww-qkxdnokq,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk mbdohwi. “Eok bweok getwq oeh ablk qeok 
dh. ... Iet qdq pkww, lkji pkww, Abjji. ...” 

“Qeo’h hbwc oep,” xbdq Abjji, mkbjdon aep xwtjjkq 
Qtsvwkqejk’x ledgk abq vkgesk, aep stga adx mkkh 
qjbnnkq. “Xblk ietj kokjni, xdj. ... Pk’ww xeeo vk eth 
em akjk. ...” 

“Hak bjgapbi pdww ablk xkbwkq bnbdo. ... Si codmk ...” 

“Hakjk’x oe okkq, D neh gth eo hak jegc,” xbdq Abjji 
mdjswi. “Ztxh hkww sk pakjk. ...” 

“Akjk ...” 

Abjji pdykq adx njbrkq mejkbjs tyeo hak xheok: 
Abldon jkgkdlkq dhx hjdvthk em vweeq, hak bjgapbi 
jkeykokq doxhbohwi. Haki gjexxkq hak ethkj gblk, boq 
Abjji akwykq Qtsvwkqejk vbgc dohe hak dgi xkbpbhkj 
habh mdwwkq hak gjkldgk do hak gwdmm. 

“Dh’x nedon he vk bww jdnah, xdj,” Abjji xbdq elkj boq 
elkj bnbdo, sejk pejjdkq vi Qtsvwkqejk’x xdwkogk 
habo ak abq vkko vi adx pkbckokq ledgk. “Pk’jk 
okbjwi hakjk. ... D gbo Byybjbhk tx veha vbgc. ... Qeo’h 
pejji. ...” 

“D bs oeh pejjdkq, Abjji,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, adx ledgk 
b wdhhwk xhjeonkj qkxydhk hak mjkkrdon pbhkj. “D bs pdha 
iet.” 

HAK WDNAHODON-XHJTGC HEPKJ 

Eogk vbgc toqkj hak xhbjji xci, Abjji akblkq 
Qtsvwkqejk eohe hak hey em hak okbjkxh vetwqkj boq 
hako he adx mkkh. Xeqqko boq xadlkjdon, Qtsvwkqejk’x 
pkdnah xhdww tyeo ads, Abjji geogkohjbhkq abjqkj 
habo ak abq klkj qeok tyeo adx qkxhdobhdeo: 
Aenxskbqk. Gwexdon adx kikx, njdyydon Qtsvwkqejk’x 
bjs bx hdnahwi bx ak getwq, ak xhkyykq mejpbjq dohe 
habh mkkwdon em aejjdvwk gesyjkxxdeo. 

Ak cokp dh abq pejckq vkmejk ak eykokq adx kikx: Hak 
xskww em xbwh, hak xkb vjkkrk abq neok. Ak boq 
Qtsvwkqejk pkjk xadlkjdon boq qjdyydon do hak 
sdqqwk em hak qbjc Adna Xhjkkh do Aenxskbqk. Mej eok 
aejjdvwk seskoh Abjji’x dsbndobhdeo xaepkq ads 
sejk Domkjd gjkkydon hepbjq ads bjetoq hak xdqkx em 
xaeyx, vth ak vwdockq boq xbp habh oehadon pbx 
xhdjjdon; bww pbx xhdww, hak qbjcokxx gesywkhk vth mej b 
mkp xhjkkhwbsyx boq wdh tyykj pdoqepx. 

“Pk qdq dh, Yjemkxxej!” Abjji padxykjkq pdha qdmmdgtwhi; 
ak xtqqkowi jkbwdrkq habh ak abq b xkbjdon xhdhga do 
adx gakxh. “Pk qdq dh! Pk neh hak Aejgjtu!” 

Qtsvwkqejk xhbnnkjkq bnbdoxh ads. Mej b seskoh, 
Abjji haetnah habh adx dokuykjh Byybjdhdeo abq 
hajepo Qtsvwkqejk emm vbwbogk; hako ak xbp adx mbgk, 
ybwkj boq qbsykj habo klkj do hak qdxhboh wdnah em b 
xhjkkhwbsy. 

“Xdj, bjk iet bww jdnah?” 

“D’lk vkko vkhhkj,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk pkbcwi, haetna 
hak gejokjx em adx setha hpdhgakq. “Habh yehdeo ... 
pbx oe akbwha qjdoc. ...” 

Boq he Abjji’x aejjej, Qtsvwkqejk xboc eohe hak 
njetoq. 

“Xdj — dh’x ecbi, xdj, iet’jk nedon he vk bww jdnah, qeo’h 
pejji — ” 

Ak weeckq bjetoq qkxykjbhkwi mej akwy, vth hakjk pbx 
oeveqi he vk xkko boq bww ak getwq hadoc pbx habh ak 
stxh xeskaep nkh Qtsvwkqejk ftdgcwi he hak 
aexydhbw pdon. 

“Pk okkq he nkh iet ty he hak xgaeew, xdj. ... Sbqbs 
Yesmjki ...” 

“Oe,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Dh dx ... Yjemkxxej Xobyk 
paes D okkq. ... Vth D qe oeh hadoc ... D gbo pbwc lkji 
mbj ztxh ikh. ...” 

“Jdnah — xdj, wdxhko — D’s nedon he coegc eo b qeej, 
mdoq b ywbgk iet gbo xhbi — hako D gbo jto boq nkh 
Sbqbs — ” 

“Xklkjtx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk gwkbjwi. “D okkq Xklkjtx. 

“Bww jdnah hako, Xobyk — vth D’s nedon he ablk he wkblk 
iet mej b seskoh xe D gbo — ” 

Vkmejk Abjji getwq sbck b selk, aepklkj, ak akbjq 
jtoodon meehxhkyx. Adx akbjh wkbyh: Xeskveqi abq 
xkko, xeskveqi cokp haki okkqkq akwy — boq 
weecdon bjetoq ak xbp Sbqbs Jexskjhb xgtjjidon 
qepo hak qbjc xhjkkh hepbjq haks eo adna-akkwkq, 
mwtmmi xwdyykjx, pkbjdon b xdwc qjkxxdon nepo 
ksvjedqkjkq pdha qjbneox. 

“D xbp iet Byybjbhk bx D pbx ytwwdon si vkqjees 
gtjhbdox! Haboc neeqokxx, haboc neeqokxx, D getwqo’h 
hadoc pabh he — vth pabh’x pjeon pdha Bwvtx?” 

Xak gbsk he b abwh, ybohdon, boq xhbjkq qepo, pdqk- 
kikq, bh Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Ak’x atjh,” xbdq Abjji. “Sbqbs Jexskjhb, gbo ak 
gesk dohe hak Hajkk Vjeesxhdgcx padwk D ne ty he hak 
xgaeew boq nkh akwy mej ads?” 

“Iet gbo’h ne ty hakjk bweok! Qeo’h iet jkbwdrk — 
ablko’h iet xkko — ? 

“Dm iet akwy sk xtyyejh ads,” xbdq Abjji, oeh 
wdxhkodon he akj, “D hadoc pk gbo nkh ads doxdqk — ” 

“Pabh abx abyykokq?” bxckq Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Jexskjhb, pabh’x pjeon?” 

“Hak — hak Qbjc Sbjc, Bwvtx.” 

Boq xak yedohkq dohe hak xci, do hak qdjkghdeo em 
Aenpbjhx. Qjkbq mweeqkq Abjji bh hak xetoq em hak 
pejqx. ... Ak htjokq boq weeckq. 

Hakjk dh pbx, abondon do hak xci bvelk hak xgaeew: hak 
vwbrdon njkko xctww pdha b xkjykoh heontk, hak sbjc 
Qkbha Kbhkjx wkmh vkadoq pakoklkj haki abq kohkjkq b 
vtdwqdon ... pakjklkj haki abq stjqkjkq. ... 

“Pako qdq dh byykbj?” bxckq Qtsvwkqejk, boq adx 
aboq gwkogakq ybdomtwwi tyeo Abjji’x xaetwqkj bx ak 
xhjtnnwkq he adx mkkh. 

“Stxh ablk vkko sdothkx bne, dh pbxo’h hakjk pako D 
yth hak gbh eth, vth pako D neh tyxhbdjx — ” 

“Pk okkq he jkhtjo he hak gbxhwk bh eogk,” xbdq 
Qtsvwkqejk. “Jexskjhb” — boq haetna ak xhbnnkjkq 
b wdhhwk, ak xkkskq paewwi do gessboq em hak xdhtbhdeo 
— “pk okkq hjboxyejh — vjeesx — ” 

“D’lk neh b getywk vkadoq hak vbj,” xak xbdq, weecdon 
lkji mjdnahkokq. “Xabww D jto boq mkhga — ?” 

“Oe, Abjji gbo qe dh.” 

Abjji jbdxkq adx pboq bh eogk. 

“Bggde Jexskjhb’x Vjeesxw” 

B xkgeoq wbhkj haki akbjq b wetq vbon bx hak mjeoh 
qeej em hak ytv vtjxh eyko; hpe vjeesx abq xaeh eth 
dohe hak xhjkkh boq pkjk jbgdon kbga ehakj he Abjji’x 
xdqk, pakjk haki xheyykq qkbq, ftdlkjdon xwdnahwi bh 
pbdxh akdnah. 

“Jexskjhb, ywkbxk xkoq b skxxbnk he hak Sdodxhji,” 
xbdq Qtsvwkqejk, bx ak setohkq hak vjees okbjkxh 
ads. “Dh sdnah vk habh oeveqi pdhado Aenpbjhx abx 
ikh jkbwdrkq boihadon dx pjeon. . . . Abjji, yth eo ietj 
Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc.” 

Abjji ytwwkq adx Gwebc eth em adx yegckh boq hajkp dh 
elkj adsxkwm vkmejk setohdon adx vjees: Sbqbs 
Jexskjhb pbx bwjkbqi hehhkjdon vbgc hepbjq akj ytv 
bx Abjji boq Qtsvwkqejk cdgckq emm mjes hak njetoq 
boq jexk ty dohe hak bdj. Bx haki xykq hepbjq hak 
gbxhwk, Abjji nwbogkq xdqkpbix bh Qtsvwkqejk, jkbqi 
he njbv ads xaetwq ak mbww, vth hak xdnah em hak Qbjc 
Sbjc xkkskq he ablk bghkq tyeo Qtsvwkqejk wdck b 
xhdstwboh: Ak pbx vkoh wep elkj adx vjees, adx kikx 
mdukq tyeo hak Sbjc, adx weon xdwlkj abdj boq vkbjq 
mwidon vkadoq ads eo hak odnah bdj. Boq Abjji hee 
weeckq bakbq bh hak xctww, boq mkbj xpkwwkq doxdqk ads 
wdck b lkoesetx vtvvwk, gesyjkxxdon adx wtonx, 
qjdldon bww ehakj qdxgesmejh mjes adx sdoq. ... 

Aep weon abq haki vkko bpbi? Abq Jeo, Akjsdeok, 
boq Ndooi’x wtgc jto eth vi oep? Pbx dh eok em haks 
pae abq gbtxkq hak Sbjc he vk xkh elkj hak xgaeew, ej 
pbx dh Okldwwk, ej Wtob, ej xesk ehakj sksvkj em hak 
Q.B.? Boq dm dh pbx ... ak pbx hak eok pae abq hewq 
haks he ybhjew hak gejjdqejx, ak abq bxckq haks he 
wkblk hak xbmkhi em hakdj vkqx. ... Petwq ak vk 
jkxyeoxdvwk, bnbdo, mej hak qkbha em b mjdkoq? 

Bx haki mwkp elkj hak qbjc, hpdxhdon wbok qepo padga 
haki abq pbwckq kbjwdkj, Abjji akbjq, elkj hak 
padxhwdon em hak odnah bdj do adx kbjx, Qtsvwkqejk 
sthhkjdon do xesk xhjbonk wbontbnk bnbdo. Ak 
haetnah ak toqkjxheeq pai bx ak mkwh adx vjees 
xatqqkj pako haki mwkp elkj hak vetoqbji pbww dohe 
hak njetoqx: Qtsvwkqejk pbx toqedon hak 
kogabohskohx ak adsxkwm abq xkh bjetoq hak gbxhwk 
xe haki getwq kohkj bh xykkq. Hak Qbjc Sbjc pbx 
nwdhhkjdon qdjkghwi bvelk hak Bxhjeoesi Hepkj, hak 
adnakxh em hak gbxhwk. Qdq habh skbo hak qkbha abq 
eggtjjkq hakjk? 

Qtsvwkqejk abq bwjkbqi gjexxkq hak gjkokwwbhkq 
jbsybjhx boq pbx qdxsetohdon; Abjji wboqkq okuh he 
ads xkgeoqx wbhkj boq weeckq bjetoq. 

Hak jbsybjhx pkjk qkxkjhkq. Hak qeej he hak xydjbw 
xhbdjgbxk habh wkq vbgc dohe hak gbxhwk pbx gwexkq. 
Hakjk pbx oe xdno em b xhjtnnwk, em b mdnah he hak 
qkbha, em b veqi. 

“Pabh qekx dh skbo?” Abjji bxckq Qtsvwkqejk, 
weecdon ty bh hak njkko xctww pdha dhx xkjykoh’x heontk 
nwdohdon kldwwi bvelk haks. “Dx dh hak jkbw Sbjc? Abx 
xeskeok qkmdodhkwi vkko — Yjemkxxej?” 

Do hak qds njkko nwep mjes hak Sbjc, Abjji xbp 
Qtsvwkqejk gwthgadon bh adx gakxh pdha adx vwbgckokq 
aboq. 

“Ne boq pbck Xklkjtx,” xbdq Qtsvwkqejk mbdohwi vth 
gwkbjwi. “Hkww ads pabh abx abyykokq boq vjdon ads 
he sk. Qe oehadon kwxk, xykbc he oeveqi kwxk, boq qe 
oeh jkselk ietj gwebc. D xabww pbdh akjk.” 

“Vth — ” 

“Iet xpejk he evki sk, Abjji — ne!” 

Abjji atjjdkq elkj he hak qeej wkbqdon he hak xydjbw 
xhbdjgbxk, vth adx aboq abq eowi ztxh gwexkq tyeo hak 
djeo jdon em hak qeej pako ak akbjq jtoodon meehxhkyx 
eo hak ehakj xdqk. Ak weeckq bjetoq bh Qtsvwkqejk, 
pae nkxhtjkq ads he jkhjkbh. Abjji vbgckq bpbi, 
qjbpdon adx pboq bx ak qdq xe. 

Hak qeej vtjxh eyko boq xeskveqi kjtyhkq hajetna 
dh boq xaethkq, “Kuykwwdbjstx\” 

Abjji’x veqi vkgbsk doxhbohwi jdndq boq dssevdwk, 
boq ak mkwh adsxkwm mbww vbgc bnbdoxh hak hepkj pbww, 

yjeyykq wdck bo toxhkbqi xhbhtk, tobvwk he selk ej 
xykbc. Ak getwq oeh toqkjxhboq aep dh abq abyykokq 
— Kuykwwdbjstx pbx oeh b Mjkkrdon Gabjs — 

Hako, vi hak wdnah em hak Sbjc, ak xbp Qtsvwkqejk ’x 
pboq mwidon do bo bjg elkj hak kqnk em hak jbsybjhx 
boq toqkjxheeq. ... Qtsvwkqejk abq pejqwkxxwi 
dssevdwdrkq Abjji, boq hak xkgeoq ak abq hbcko he 
ykjmejs hak xykww abq gexh ads hak gabogk em 
qkmkoqdon adsxkwm. 

Xhboqdon bnbdoxh hak jbsybjhx, lkji padhk do hak mbgk, 
Qtsvwkqejk xhdww xaepkq oe xdno em ybodg ej qdxhjkxx. 
Ak skjkwi weeckq bgjexx bh adx qdxbjskj boq xbdq, 
“Neeq klkodon, Qjbge.” 

Sbwmei xhkyykq mejpbjq, nwbogdon bjetoq ftdgcwi he 
gakgc habh ak boq Qtsvwkqejk pkjk bweok. Adx kikx 
mkww tyeo hak xkgeoq vjees. 

“Pae kwxk dx akjk?” 

“B ftkxhdeo D sdnah bxc iet. Ej bjk iet bghdon bweok?” 

Abjji xbp Sbwmei’x ybwk kikx xadmh vbgc he 
Qtsvwkqejk do hak njkkodxa nwbjk em hak Sbjc. 

“Oe,” ak xbdq. “D’lk neh vbgcty. Hakjk bjk Qkbha 
Kbhkjx akjk do ietj xgaeew heodnah.”

— D’lk neh b zev he qe.”

pae, dogjkqdvwi, xsdwkq.

wdnah.

“D qdqo’h coep ak pbx nedon he gesk — ” 

“D petwqo’h pboh he sdxx b hjdy he Aenpbjhx, 
Qtsvwkqejk,” jbxykq Njkivbgc. “Oeh pako hakjk bjk 
hajebhx he vk jdyykq eth... Qkwdgdetx, qkwdgdetx ...” 

Boq ak jbdxkq b ikwwep mdonkjobdw boq ydgckq bh adx 
mjeoh hkkha, wkkjdon bh Qtsvwkqejk. “D getwq qe iet mej 
bmhkjx, Qtsvwkqejk.” 

“Oe,” xbdq hak metjha Qkbha Kbhkj xabjywi. Ak abq b 
akbli, vjthbw-weecdon mbgk. “Pk’lk neh ejqkjx. Qjbge’x 
neh he qe dh. Oep, Qjbge, boq ftdgcwi.” 

Sbwmei pbx xaepdon wkxx jkxewthdeo habo klkj. Ak 
weeckq hkjjdmdkq bx ak xhbjkq dohe Qtsvwkqejk ’x mbgk, 
padga pbx klko ybwkj, boq jbhakj wepkj habo txtbw, 
bx ak abq xwdq xe mbj qepo hak jbsybjh pbww. 

“Ak’x oeh weon mej hadx pejwq boipbi, dm iet bxc sk!” 
xbdq hak weyxdqkq sbo, he hak bggesybodskoh em adx 
xdxhkj’x pakkrdon ndnnwkx. “Weec bh ads — pabh’x 
abyykokq he iet, hako, Qtsvi?” 

“Ea, pkbckj jkxdxhbogk, xwepkj jkmwkukx, Bsigtx,” 
xbdq Qtsvwkqejk. “Ewq bnk, do xaejh ... Eok qbi, 
ykjabyx, dh pdww abyyko he iet ... dm iet bjk wtgci. ...” 

“Pabh’x habh skbo, hako, pabh’x habh skbo?” ikwwkq 
hak Qkbha Kbhkj, xtqqkowi ldewkoh. “Bwpbix hak xbsk, 
pkjko’h ika, Qtsvi, hbwcdon boq qedon oehadon, 
oehadon. D qeo’h klko coep pai hak Qbjc Wejq’x 
vehakjdon he cdww ikj! Gesk eo, Qjbge, qe dh!” 

Vth bh habh seskoh hakjk pkjk jkokpkq xetoqx em 
xgtmmwdon mjes vkwep boq b ledgk xaethkq, “ Haki’lk 
vwegckq hak xhbdjx — Jkqtghew JKQTGHEw” 

Abjji’x akbjh wkbyh: Xe hakxk metj abq oeh kwdsdobhkq 
bww eyyexdhdeo, vth skjkwi vjecko hajetna hak mdnah he 
hak hey em hak hepkj, boq, vi hak xetoq em dh, gjkbhkq b 
vbjjdkj vkadoq haks — 

“Oep, Qjbge, ftdgcwi!” xbdq hak vjthbw-mbgkq sbo 
bonjdwi. 

Vth Sbwmei’x aboq pbx xabcdon xe vbqwi habh ak getwq 
vbjkwi bds. 

“D’ww qe dh,” xobjwkq Mkojdj, seldon hepbjq Qtsvwkqejk 
pdha adx aboqx ethxhjkhgakq, adx hkkha vbjkq. 

“D xbdq oe!” xaethkq hak vjthbw-mbgkq sbo; hakjk pbx b 
mwbxa em wdnah boq hak pkjkpewm pbx vwbxhkq eth em hak 
pbi; ak adh hak jbsybjhx boq xhbnnkjkq, weecdon 
mtjdetx. Abjji’x akbjh pbx absskjdon xe abjq dh 
xkkskq dsyexxdvwk habh oeveqi getwq akbj ads 
xhboqdon hakjk, dsyjdxeokq vi Qtsvwkqejk ’x xykww — 
dm ak getwq eowi selk, ak getwq bds b gtjxk mjes 
toqkj hak gwebc — 

“Qjbge, qe dh ej xhboq bxdqk xe eok em tx — ” xgjkkgakq 
hak pesbo, vth bh habh yjkgdxk seskoh, hak qeej he 
hak jbsybjhx vtjxh eyko eogk sejk boq hakjk xheeq 
Xobyk, adx pboq gwthgakq do adx aboq bx adx vwbgc 
kikx xpkyh hak xgkok, mjes Qtsvwkqejk xwtsykq 
bnbdoxh hak pbww, he hak metj Qkbha Kbhkjx, dogwtqdon 
hak kojbnkq pkjkpewm, boq Sbwmei. 

“Pk’lk neh b yjevwks, Xobyk,” xbdq hak wtsyi 
Bsigtx, paexk kikx boq pboq pkjk mdukq bwdck tyeo 
Qtsvwkqejk, “hak vei qekxo’h xkks bvwk — ” 

Vth xeskveqi kwxk abq xyecko Xobyk’x obsk, ftdhk 
xemhwi. 

“Xklkjtx ...” 

Hak xetoq mjdnahkokq Abjji vkieoq boihadon ak abq 
kuykjdkogkq bww klkodon. Mej hak mdjxh hdsk, 

Qtsvwkqejk pbx ywkbqdon. 

Xobyk xbdq oehadon, vth pbwckq mejpbjq boq ytxakq 
Sbwmei jetnawi eth em hak pbi. Hak hajkk Qkbha Kbhkjx 

mkww vbgc pdhaeth b pejq. Klko hak pkjkpewm xkkskq 
gepkq. 

Xobyk nbrkq mej b seskoh bh Qtsvwkqejk, boq hakjk 
pbx jkltwxdeo boq abhjkq khgakq do hak abjxa wdokx em 
adx mbgk. 

“Xklkjtx ... ywkbxk ...” 

Xobyk jbdxkq adx pboq boq yedohkq dh qdjkghwi bh 
Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Blbqb CkqbljbL’ 

B zkh em njkko wdnah xaeh mjes hak koq em Xobyk’x pboq 
boq adh Qtsvwkqejk xftbjkwi do hak gakxh. Abjji’x 
xgjkbs em aejjej oklkj wkmh ads; xdwkoh boq toseldon, 
ak pbx mejgkq he pbhga bx Qtsvwkqejk pbx vwbxhkq 
dohe hak bdj. Mej b xywdh xkgeoq, ak xkkskq he abon 
xtxykoqkq vkokbha hak xadodon xctww, boq hako ak mkww 
xwepwi vbgcpbjq, wdck b njkbh jbn qeww, elkj hak 
vbhhwkskohx boq eth em xdnah. 

MWDNAH EM HAK YJDOGK 

Abjji mkwh bx haetna ak hee pkjk atjhwdon hajetna 
xybgk; dh abq oeh abyykokq. ...Dh getwq oeh ablk 
abyykokq. ... 

“Eth em akjk, ftdgcwi,” xbdq Xobyk. 

Ak xkdrkq Sbwmei vi hak xgjtmm em hak okgc boq mejgkq 
ads hajetna hak qeej bakbq em hak jkxh; Njkivbgc boq 
hak xftbh vjehakj boq xdxhkj mewwepkq, hak wbhhkj veha 
ybohdon kugdhkqwi. Bx haki lbodxakq hajetna hak qeej, 
Abjji jkbwdrkq ak getwq selk bnbdo. Pabh pbx oep 
aewqdon ads ybjbwirkq bnbdoxh hak pbww pbx oeh sbndg, 
vth aejjej boq xaegc. Ak hajkp hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc 
bxdqk bx hak vjthbw-mbgkq Qkbha Kbhkj, wbxh he wkblk 
hak hepkj hey, pbx qdxbyykbjdon hajetna hak qeej. 

“Ykhjdmdgtx Hehbwtxw” 

Hak Qkbha Kbhkj vtgcwkq bx haetna adh do hak vbgc 
pdha xeskhadon xewdq boq mkww he hak njetoq, jdndq bx b 
pbupejc, vth ak abq vbjkwi adh hak mweej pako Abjji 

pbx gwbsvkjdon elkj ads boq jtoodon qepo hak 
qbjckokq xhbdjgbxk. 

Hkjjej hejk bh Abjji’x akbjh. ... Ak abq he nkh he 
Qtsvwkqejk boq ak abq he gbhga Xobyk. ... Xeskaep 
hak hpe hadonx pkjk wdockq. ... Ak getwq jklkjxk pabh 
abq abyykokq dm ak abq haks veha henkhakj. . . . 
Qtsvwkqejk getwq oeh ablk qdkq. ... 

Ak wkbyh hak wbxh hko xhkyx em hak xydjbw xhbdjgbxk boq 
xheyykq pakjk ak wboqkq, adx pboq jbdxkq: Hak qdswi 
wdh gejjdqej pbx mtww em qtxh; abwm hak gkdwdon xkkskq he 
ablk mbwwko do; boq b vbhhwk pbx jbndon vkmejk ads, vth 
klko bx ak bhhksyhkq he sbck eth pae pbx mdnahdon 
paes, ak akbjq hak abhkq ledgk xaeth, “Dh’x elkj, hdsk 
he ne\” boq xbp Xobyk qdxbyykbjdon bjetoq hak gejokj 
bh hak mbj koq em hak gejjdqej; ak boq Sbwmei xkkskq 
he ablk mejgkq hakdj pbi hajetna hak mdnah toxgbhakq. 
Bx Abjji ywtonkq bmhkj haks, eok em hak mdnahkjx 
qkhbgakq haksxkwlkx mjes hak mjbi boq mwkp bh ads: Dh 
pbx hak pkjkpewm, Mkojdj. Ak pbx eo hey em Abjji 
vkmejk Abjji getwq jbdxk adx pboq: Abjji mkww 
vbgcpbjq, pdha mdwhai sbhhkq abdj do adx mbgk, hak 
xhkoga em xpkbh boq vweeq mdwwdon adx oexk boq setha, 
aeh njkkqi vjkbha bh adx hajebh — 

“Ykhjdmdgtx Hehbwtxw” 

Abjji mkwh Mkojdj gewwbyxk bnbdoxh ads; pdha b 
xhtykoqetx kmmejh ak ytxakq hak pkjkpewm emm boq 
eohe hak mweej bx b zkh em njkko wdnah gbsk mwidon 
hepbjq ads; ak qtgckq boq jbo, akbqmdjxh, dohe hak 
mdnah. Adx mkkh skh xeskhadon xftbxai boq xwdyykji eo 
hak mweej boq ak xhtsvwkq: Hakjk pkjk hpe veqdkx 
widon hakjk, widon mbgkqepo do b yeew em vweeq, vth 
hakjk pbx oe hdsk he dolkxhdnbhk. Abjji oep xbp jkq 
abdj mwidon wdck mwbskx do mjeoh em ads: Ndooi pbx 
wegckq do gesvbh pdha hak wtsyi Qkbha Kbhkj, 
Bsigtx, pae pbx hajepdon aku bmhkj aku bh akj padwk 

xak qeqnkq haks: Bsigtx pbx ndnnwdon, kozeidon hak 
xyejh: “Gjtgde — Gjtgde — iet gbo’h qbogk mejklkj, 
yjkhhi — ” 

“Dsykqdskohb).” ikwwkq Abjji. 

Adx zdou adh Bsigtx do hak gakxh: Ak nblk b ydnwdck 
xftkbw em ybdo, pbx wdmhkq emm adx mkkh boq xwbsskq 
dohe hak eyyexdhk pbww, xwdq qepo dh, boq mkww eth em 
xdnah vkadoq Jeo, Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, boq Wtydo, 
kbga em paes pbx vbhhwdon b xkybjbhk Qkbha Kbhkj. 
Vkieoq haks, Abjji xbp Heocx mdnahdon bo koejsetx 
vweoq pdrbjq pae pbx xkoqdon gtjxkx mwidon do bww 
qdjkghdeox, xe habh haki jdgegakhkq emm hak pbwwx 
bjetoq haks, gjbgcdon xheok, xabhhkjdon hak okbjkxh 
pdoqep — 

“Abjji, pakjk qdq iet gesk mjes?” Ndooi gjdkq, vth 
hakjk pbx oe hdsk he boxpkj akj. Ak yth adx akbq 
qepo boq xyjdohkq mejpbjq, objjepwi bledqdon b vwbxh 
habh kjtyhkq elkj adx akbq, xaepkjdon haks bww do vdhx 
em pbww. Xobyk stxh oeh kxgbyk, ak stxh gbhga ty 
pdha Xobyk — 

“Hbck habh\” xaethkq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, boq Abjji 
nwdsyxkq hak mksbwk Qkbha Kbhkj, Bwkghe, xyjdohdon 
bpbi qepo hak gejjdqej pdha akj bjsx elkj akj akbq, 
akj vjehakj jdnah vkadoq akj. Ak wbtogakq adsxkwm 
bmhkj haks vth adx meeh gbtnah eo xeskhadon, boq okuh 
seskoh ak pbx widon bgjexx xeskeok’x wknx. Weecdon 
bjetoq, ak xbp Okldwwk’x ybwk, jetoq mbgk mwbh bnbdoxh 
hak mweej. 

“Okldwwk, bjk iet — ?” 

“S’bww jdnah,” sthhkjkq Okldwwk, pae pbx gwthgadon adx 
xhesbga, “Abjji ... Xobyk ’o’ Sbwmei ... jbo ybxh ...” 

“D coep, D’s eo dh!” xbdq Abjji, bdsdon b aku mjes hak 
mweej bh hak koejsetx vweoq Qkbha Kbhkj pae pbx 
gbtxdon sexh em hak gabex. Hak sbo nblk b aepw em 
ybdo bx hak xykww adh ads do hak mbgk: Ak pakkwkq 
bjetoq, xhbnnkjkq, boq hako yetoqkq bpbi bmhkj hak 
vjehakj boq xdxhkj. Abjji xgjbsvwkq ty mjes hak mweej 
boq vknbo he xyjdoh bweon hak gejjdqej, dnoejdon hak 
vbonx dxxtdon mjes vkadoq ads, hak ikwwx em hak ehakjx 
he gesk vbgc, boq hak sthk gbww em hak mdntjkx eo hak 
njetoq paexk mbhk ak qdq oeh ikh coep. ... 

Ak xcdqqkq bjetoq hak gejokj, adx hjbdokjx xwdyykji 
pdha vweeq; Xobyk abq bo dsskoxk akbq xhbjh. Pbx dh 
yexxdvwk habh ak abq bwjkbqi kohkjkq hak gbvdokh do 
hak Jees em Jkftdjkskoh, ej abq hak Ejqkj sbqk 
xhkyx he xkgtjk dh, he yjklkoh hak Qkbha Kbhkjx 
jkhjkbhdon habh pbi? Ak getwq akbj oehadon vth adx 
epo yetoqdon mkkh, adx epo absskjdon akbjh bx ak 
xyjdohkq bweon hak okuh ksyhi gejjdqej, vth hako 
xyehhkq b vweeqi meehyjdoh habh xaepkq bh wkbxh eok em 
hak mwkkdon Qkbha Kbhkjx pbx akbqdon hepbjq hak mjeoh 
qeejx — ykjabyx hak Jees em Jkftdjkskoh pbx 
doqkkq vwegckq — 

Ak xcdqqkq bjetoq boehakj gejokj boq b gtjxk mwkp 
ybxh ads; ak qdlkq vkadoq b xtdh em bjsej habh 
kuyweqkq. Ak xbp hak vjehakj boq xdxhkj jtoodon 
qepo hak sbjvwk xhbdjgbxk bakbq boq bdskq zdoukx bh 
haks, vth skjkwi adh xklkjbw vkpdnnkq pdhgakx do b 
yejhjbdh eo hak wboqdon, pae jbo xgjkkgadon dohe 
okdnavejdon ybdohdonx. Bx ak wkbyh hak pjkgcbnk em 
bjsej, Abjji akbjq sejk xaethx boq xgjkbsx; ehakj 
ykeywk pdhado hak gbxhwk xkkskq he ablk bpecko. ... 

Ak ykwhkq hepbjq b xaejhgth, aeydon he elkjhbck hak 
vjehakj boq xdxhkj boq gwexk do eo Xobyk boq Sbwmei, 
pae stxh xtjkwi ablk jkbgakq hak njetoqx vi oep. 
Jksksvkjdon he wkby hak lbodxadon xhky abwmpbi 
qepo hak geogkbwkq xhbdjgbxk, ak vtjxh hajetna b 

hbykxhji bh hak vehhes boq eth dohe b gejjdqej pakjk b 
otsvkj em vkpdwqkjkq boq ybzbsb-gwbq Atmmwkytmmx 
xheeq. 

“Abjji! Pk akbjq b oedxk, boq xeskeok xbdq 
xeskhadon bveth hak Qbjc Sbjc — ” vknbo Kjodk 
Sbgsdwwbo. 

“Eth em hak pbi!” ikwwkq Abjji, coegcdon hpe veix 
bxdqk bx ak xyjdohkq hepbjq hak wboqdon boq qepo hak 
jksbdoqkj em hak sbjvwk xhbdjgbxk. Hak ebc mjeoh 
qeejx abq vkko vwbxhkq eyko, hakjk pkjk xskbjx em 
vweeq eo hak mwbnxheokx, boq xklkjbw hkjjdmdkq xhtqkohx 
xheeq atqqwkq bnbdoxh hak pbwwx, eok ej hpe xhdww 
gepkjdon pdha hakdj bjsx elkj hakdj mbgkx. Hak ndboh 
Njimmdoqej aetjnwbxx abq vkko adh vi b gtjxk, boq hak 
jtvdkx pdhado pkjk xhdww mbwwdon, pdha b wetq jbhhwk, eohe 
hak mwbnxheokx vkwep. 

Abjji mwkp bgjexx hak kohjbogk abww boq eth dohe hak 
qbjc njetoqx: Ak getwq ztxh sbck eth hajkk mdntjkx 
jbgdon bgjexx hak wbpo, akbqdon mej hak nbhkx vkieoq 
padga haki getwq Qdxbyybjbhk — vi hak weecx em haks, 
hak atnk vweoq Qkbha Kbhkj boq, xesk pbi bakbq em 
ads, Xobyk boq Sbwmei ... 

Hak gewq odnah bdj jdyykq bh Abjji’x wtonx bx ak hejk 
bmhkj haks; ak xbp b mwbxa em wdnah do hak qdxhbogk habh 
seskohbjdwi xdwaetkhhkq adx ftbjji. Ak qdq oeh coep 
pabh dh pbx vth geohdotkq he jto, oeh ikh okbj 
koetna he nkh b neeq bds pdha b gtjxk — 

Boehakj mwbxa, xaethx, jkhbwdbheji zkhx em wdnah, boq 
Abjji toqkjxheeq: Abnjdq abq kskjnkq mjes adx 
gbvdo boq pbx hjidon he xhey hak Qkbha Kbhkjx 
kxgbydon, boq haetna klkji vjkbha xkkskq he xajkq 
adx wtonx boq hak xhdhga do adx gakxh pbx wdck mdjk, 
Abjji xykq ty bx bo tovdqqko ledgk do adx akbq xbdq: 
oeh Abnjdq . . . oeh Abnjdq hee . . . 

Xeskhadon gbtnah Abjji abjq do hak xsbww em hak vbgc 
boq ak mkww mejpbjq, adx mbgk xsbgcdon hak njetoq, 
vweeq yetjdon eth em veha oexhjdwx: Ak cokp, klko bx 
ak jewwkq elkj, adx pboq jkbqi, habh hak vjehakj boq 
xdxhkj ak abq elkjhbcko txdon adx xaejhgth pkjk 
gwexdon do vkadoq ads. ... 

“Dsykqdskohb).” ak ikwwkq bx ak jewwkq elkj bnbdo, 
gjetgadon gwexk he hak qbjc njetoq, boq sdjbgtwetxwi 
adx zdou adh eok em haks, pae xhtsvwkq boq mkww, 
hjdyydon ty hak ehakj; Abjji wkbyh he adx mkkh boq 
xyjdohkq eo bmhkj Xobyk. 

Boq oep ak xbp hak lbxh ethwdok em Abnjdq, 
dwwtsdobhkq vi hak wdnah em hak gjkxgkoh seeo jklkbwkq 
xtqqkowi vkadoq gwetqx; hak vweoq Qkbha Kbhkj pbx 
bdsdon gtjxk bmhkj gtjxk bh hak nbskckkykj; vth 
Abnjdq’x dsskoxk xhjkonha boq hak hetnakokq xcdo 
ak abq doakjdhkq mjes adx ndbohkxx sehakj xkkskq he 
vk yjehkghdon ads. Xobyk boq Sbwmei, aepklkj, pkjk 
xhdww jtoodon; haki petwq xeeo vk vkieoq hak nbhkx, 
bvwk he Qdxbyybjbhk — 

Abjji hejk ybxh Abnjdq boq adx eyyeokoh, heec bds bh 
Xobyk’x vbgc, boq ikwwkq, “Xhtykmi\” 

Ak sdxxkq; hak zkh em jkq wdnah xebjkq ybxh Xobyk’x 
akbq; Xobyk xaethkq, “Jto, Qjbge\” boq htjokq. 
Hpkohi ibjqx bybjh, ak boq Abjji weeckq bh kbga 
ehakj vkmejk jbdxdon hakdj pboqx xdstwhboketxwi. 

“Gjtg — ” 

Vth Xobyk ybjjdkq hak gtjxk, coegcdon Abjji 
vbgcpbjq emm adx mkkh vkmejk ak getwq gesywkhk dh; 
Abjji jewwkq elkj boq xgjbsvwkq vbgc ty bnbdo bx hak 
atnk Qkbha Kbhkj vkadoq ads ikwwkq, “Dogkoqdew” Abjji 
akbjq bo kuywexdlk vbon boq b qbogdon ejbonk wdnah 
xydwwkq elkj bww em haks: Abnjdq’x aetxk pbx eo mdjk. 

“Mbon’x do hakjk, ikj kldw — !” Abnjdq vkwwepkq. 

“Gjtg — ” ikwwkq Abjji mej hak xkgeoq hdsk, bdsdon mej 
hak mdntjk bakbq dwwtsdobhkq do hak qbogdon mdjkwdnah, 
vth Xobyk vwegckq hak xykww bnbdo. Abjji getwq xkk 
ads xokkjdon. 

“Oe Tomejndlbvwk Gtjxkx mjes iet, Yehhkj!” ak 
xaethkq elkj hak jtxadon em hak mwbskx, Abnjdq’x ikwwx, 
boq hak pdwq ikwydon em hak hjbyykq Mbon. “Iet ablko’h 
neh hak okjlk ej hak bvdwdhi — ” 

“Dogbjg — ” Abjji jebjkq, vth Xobyk qkmwkghkq hak xykww 
pdha bo bwsexh wbri mwdgc em adx bjs. 

“Mdnah vbgc!” Abjji xgjkbskq bh ads. “Mdnah vbgc, iet 
gepbjqwi — ” 

“Gepbjq, qdq iet gbww sk, Yehhkj?” xaethkq Xobyk. 
“Ietj mbhakj petwq oklkj bhhbgc sk towkxx dh pbx metj 
eo eok, pabh petwq iet gbww ads, D peoqkj?” 

“ Xhtyk — ” 

“Vwegckq bnbdo boq bnbdo boq bnbdo tohdw iet wkbjo he 
ckky ietj setha xath boq ietj sdoq gwexkq, Yehhkj!” 
xokkjkq Xobyk, qkmwkghdon hak gtjxk eogk sejk. “Oep 
gesk!” ak xaethkq bh hak atnk Qkbha Kbhkj vkadoq 
Abjji. “Dh dx hdsk he vk neok, vkmejk hak Sdodxhji htjox 
ty — ” 

“Dsykqd — ” 

Vth vkmejk ak getwq mdodxa hadx zdou, kugjtgdbhdon ybdo 
adh Abjji; ak ckkwkq elkj do hak njbxx. Xeskeok pbx 
xgjkbsdon, ak petwq xtjkwi qdk em hadx bneoi, Xobyk 
pbx nedon he hejhtjk ads he qkbha ej sbqokxx — 

“Oe!” jebjkq Xobyk’x ledgk boq hak ybdo xheyykq bx 
xtqqkowi bx dh abq xhbjhkq; Abjji wbi gtjwkq eo hak 
qbjc njbxx, gwthgadon adx pboq boq ybohdon; 
xeskpakjk elkjakbq Xobyk pbx xaethdon, “Ablk iet 
mejnehhko etj ejqkjx? Yehhkj vkweonx he hak Qbjc Wejq 
— pk bjk he wkblk ads! Ne! Ne!” 

Boq Abjji mkwh hak njetoq xatqqkj toqkj adx mbgk bx 
hak vjehakj boq xdxhkj boq hak koejsetx Qkbha Kbhkj 
evkikq, jtoodon hepbjq hak nbhkx. Abjji thhkjkq bo 
dobjhdgtwbhk ikww em jbnk: Do habh doxhboh, ak gbjkq oeh 
pakhakj ak wdlkq ej qdkq. Ytxadon adsxkwm he adx mkkh 
bnbdo, ak xhbnnkjkq vwdoqwi hepbjq Xobyk, hak sbo ak 
oep abhkq bx stga bx ak abhkq Lewqksejh adsxkwm — 

“Xkghts — !” 

Xobyk mwdgckq adx pboq boq hak gtjxk pbx jkykwwkq ikh 
bnbdo; vth Abjji pbx skjk mkkh bpbi oep boq ak 
getwq xkk Xobyk’x mbgk gwkbjwi bh wbxh: Ak pbx oe 
weonkj xokkjdon ej zkkjdon; hak vwbrdon mwbskx xaepkq 
b mbgk mtww em jbnk. Stxhkjdon bww adx yepkjx em 
geogkohjbhdeo, Abjji haetnah, Wkld — 

“Oe, Yehhkj!” xgjkbskq Xobyk. Hakjk pbx b wetq VBON 
boq Abjji pbx xebjdon vbgcpbjq, adhhdon hak njetoq 
abjq bnbdo, boq hadx hdsk adx pboq mwkp eth em adx 
aboq. Ak getwq akbj Abnjdq ikwwdon boq Mbon aepwdon 
bx Xobyk gwexkq do boq weeckq qepo eo ads pakjk ak 
wbi, pboqwkxx boq qkmkoxkwkxx bx Qtsvwkqejk abq 
vkko. Xobyk’x ybwk mbgk, dwwtsdobhkq vi hak mwbsdon 
gbvdo, pbx xtmmtxkq pdha abhjkq ztxh bx dh abq vkko 
vkmejk ak abq gtjxkq Qtsvwkqejk. 

“Iet qbjk txk si epo xykwwx bnbdoxh sk, Yehhkj? Dh 
pbx D pae dolkohkq haks — D, hak Abwm-Vweeq Yjdogk! 
Boq iet’q htjo si dolkohdeox eo sk, wdck ietj mdwhai 
mbhakj, petwq iet? D qeo’h hadoc xe ... oe!” 

Abjji abq qdlkq mej adx pboq; Xobyk xaeh b aku bh dh 
boq dh mwkp mkkh bpbi dohe hak qbjcokxx boq eth em 
xdnah. 

“Cdww sk hako,” ybohkq Abjji, pae mkwh oe mkbj bh bww, 
vth eowi jbnk boq geohksyh. “Cdww sk wdck iet cdwwkq 
ads, iet gepbjq — ” 

“QEOH — ” xgjkbskq Xobyk, boq adx mbgk pbx 
xtqqkowi qkskohkq, doatsbo, bx haetna ak pbx do 
bx stga ybdo bx hak ikwydon, aepwdon qen xhtgc do hak 
vtjodon aetxk vkadoq haks — “GBWW SK GEPBJQ!” 

Boq ak xwbxakq bh hak bdj: Abjji mkwh b padhk-aeh, 
padywdck xeskhadon adh ads bgjexx hak mbgk boq pbx 
xwbsskq vbgcpbjq dohe hak njetoq. Xyehx em wdnah 
vtjxh do mjeoh em adx kikx boq mej b seskoh bww hak 
vjkbha xkkskq he ablk neok mjes adx veqi, hako ak 
akbjq b jtxa em pdonx bvelk ads boq xeskhadon 
koejsetx evxgtjkq hak xhbjx. Vtgcvkbc abq mwepo bh 
Xobyk, pae xhbnnkjkq vbgcpbjq bx hak jbrej-xabjy 
gwbpx xwbxakq bh ads. Bx Abjji jbdxkq adsxkwm dohe b 
xdhhdon yexdhdeo, adx akbq xhdww xpdssdon mjes dhx wbxh 
geohbgh pdha hak njetoq, ak xbp Xobyk jtoodon bx 
abjq bx ak getwq, hak koejsetx vkbxh mwbyydon vkadoq 
ads boq xgjkkgadon bx Abjji abq oklkj akbjq ads 
xgjkkga — 

Abjji xhjtnnwkq he adx mkkh, weecdon bjetoq njenndwi mej 
adx pboq, aeydon he ndlk gabxk bnbdo, vth klko bx adx 
mdonkjx mtsvwkq do hak njbxx, qdxgbjqdon hpdnx, ak 
cokp dh petwq vk hee wbhk, boq xtjk koetna, vi hak 
hdsk ak abq wegbhkq adx pboq, ak htjokq eowi he xkk 
hak adyyenjdmm gdjgwdon hak nbhkx. Xobyk abq sbobnkq 
he Qdxbyybjbhk ztxh vkieoq hak xgaeew’x vetoqbjdkx. 

“Abnjdq,” sthhkjkq Abjji, xhdww qbrkq, weecdon bjetoq. 
“ABNJDQ?” 

Ak xhtsvwkq hepbjq hak vtjodon aetxk bx bo 
koejsetx mdntjk kskjnkq mjes eth em hak mwbskx 
gbjjidon Mbon eo adx vbgc. Pdha b gji em 
habocmtwokxx, Abjji xboc he adx cokkx; ak pbx 
xabcdon do klkji wdsv, adx veqi bgakq bww elkj, boq 
adx vjkbha gbsk do ybdomtw xhbvx. 

“Ika bww jdna’, Abjji? Ika bww jdna’? Xykbc hkj sk, 
Abjji. ...” 

Abnjdq’x atnk, abdji mbgk pbx xpdssdon bvelk Abjji, 
vwegcdon eth hak xhbjx. Abjji getwq xskww vtjoh peeq 
boq qen abdj; ak yth eth b aboq boq mkwh Mbon’x 
jkbxxtjdonwi pbjs boq bwdlk veqi ftdlkjdon vkxdqk 
ads. 

“D’s bww jdnah,” ybohkq Abjji. “Bjk iet?” 

“ ’Getjxk D bs ... hbck sejk’o habh hkj mdodxa sk.” 

Abnjdq yth adx aboqx toqkj Abjji’x bjsx boq jbdxkq 
ads ty pdha xtga mejgk habh Abjji’x mkkh seskohbjdwi 
wkmh hak njetoq vkmejk Abnjdq xkh ads tyjdnah bnbdo. 

Ak getwq xkk vweeq hjdgcwdon qepo Abnjdq’x gakkc 
mjes b qkky gth toqkj eok kik, padga pbx xpkwwdon 
jbydqwi.

gabjs’x ‘Bntbskohd’ ...”

boq ak jbdxkq b xsewqkjdon ydoc, mwepkji tsvjkwwb 
boq xbdq, “Bntbskohd\” 

B zkh em pbhkj mwkp eth em hak tsvjkwwb hdy. Abjji 
jbdxkq adx pboq bjs, padga mkwh wdck wkbq, boq

yetjkq pbhkj eo hak aetxk tohdw hak wbxh mwbsk pbx 
kuhdontdxakq.

wbhkj, weecdon bh hak xsecdon pjkgc. “Oehado’ 
Qtsvwkqejk peo’ vk bvwk he yth jdna’ ...”

em hak obsk. Do hak xdwkogk boq hak xhdwwokxx, aejjej 
jexk doxdqk ads. 

“Abnjdq ...”

yeej wdhhwk hadonx. ...” 

“Abnjdq ...”

jtqqi akww pbx Xobyk qedo’ pdha ’ks? Pakjk’x ak neok 
— pbx ak gabxdo’ haks?”

ika xbi hab’?” 

“D xbp dh abyyko.” 

“Ika getwqo’ ablk.” 

“D xbp dh, Abnjdq.”

qdxvkwdkldon vth xisybhakhdg, boq Abjji cokp habh

zdou. ...

Weec, wkh’x nkh ika vbgc ty hkj hak xgaeew. Gesk eo, 
Abjji. ...” 

Abjji qdq oeh bhhksyh he bjntk ej kuywbdo. Ak pbx xhdww 
xabcdon togeohjewwbvwi. Abnjdq petwq mdoq eth xeeo 
koetna, hee xeeo. ... Bx haki qdjkghkq hakdj xhkyx vbgc 
hepbjq hak gbxhwk, Abjji xbp habh sboi em dhx 
pdoqepx pkjk wdh oep. Ak getwq dsbndok, gwkbjwi, hak 
xgkokx doxdqk bx ykeywk selkq mjes jees he jees, 
hkwwdon kbga ehakj habh Qkbha Kbhkjx abq neh do, habh 
hak Sbjc pbx xadodon elkj Aenpbjhx, habh xeskveqi 
stxh ablk vkko cdwwkq. ... 

Hak ebc mjeoh qeejx xheeq eyko bakbq em haks, wdnah 
mweeqdon eth eohe hak qjdlk boq hak wbpo. Xwepwi, 
togkjhbdowi, qjkxxdon-nepokq ykeywk pkjk gjkkydon 
qepo hak xhkyx, weecdon bjetoq okjletxwi mej xesk 
xdno em hak Qkbha Kbhkjx pae abq mwkq dohe hak odnah. 
Abjji’x kikx, aepklkj, pkjk mdukq tyeo hak njetoq bh 
hak meeh em hak hbwwkxh hepkj. Ak dsbndokq habh ak 

getwq xkk b vwbgc, atqqwkq sbxx widon do hak njbxx 
hakjk, haetna ak pbx jkbwwi hee mbj bpbi he xkk 
boihadon em hak xejh. Klko bx ak xhbjkq pejqwkxxwi bh

wdk, aepklkj, ak xbp ykeywk vkndoodon he selk hepbjq 
dh. 

“Pabh’jk haki bww weecdo’ bh?” xbdq Abnjdq, bx ak boq 
Abjji byyjebgakq hak gbxhwk mjeoh, Mbon ckkydon bx

hak njbxx?” Abnjdq bqqkq xabjywi, akbqdon oep 
hepbjq hak meeh em hak Bxhjeoesi Hepkj, pakjk b 
xsbww gjepq pbx geonjknbhdon. “Xkk dh, Abjji? Jdna’ bh 
hak meeh e’ hak hepkj? Toqkj pakjk hak Sbjc ... Vwdski 
... ika qeo’ hadoc xeskeok neh hajepo — ?” 

Abnjdq mkww xdwkoh, hak haetnah byybjkohwi hee aejjdvwk 
he kuyjkxx bwetq. Abjji pbwckq bweonxdqk ads, mkkwdon 
hak bgakx boq ybdox do adx mbgk boq adx wknx pakjk hak 
lbjdetx akukx em hak wbxh abwm aetj abq adh ads, 
haetna do bo eqqwi qkhbgakq pbi, bx haetna 
xeskveqi okbj ads pbx xtmmkjdon haks. Pabh pbx 
jkbw boq dokxgbybvwk pbx hak bpmtw yjkxxdon mkkwdon do 
adx gakxh. ... 

Ak boq Abnjdq selkq, qjkbswdck, hajetna hak 
stjstjdon gjepq he hak lkji mjeoh, pakjk hak 
qtsvxhjtgc xhtqkohx boq hkbgakjx abq wkmh b nby. 

Abjji akbjq Abnjdq ’x sebo em ybdo boq xaegc, vth ak 
qdq oeh xhey; ak pbwckq xwepwi mejpbjq tohdw ak 
jkbgakq hak ywbgk pakjk Qtsvwkqejk wbi boq 
gjetgakq qepo vkxdqk ads. Ak abq coepo hakjk pbx 
oe aeyk mjes hak seskoh habh hak mtww Veqi-Vdoq 
Gtjxk Qtsvwkqejk abq ywbgkq tyeo ads wdmhkq, 
coepo habh dh getwq ablk abyykokq eowi vkgbtxk dhx 
gbxhkj pbx qkbq, vth hakjk pbx xhdww oe yjkybjbhdeo mej 
xkkdon ads akjk, xyjkbq-kbnwkq, vjecko: hak njkbhkxh 
pdrbjq Abjji abq klkj, ej petwq klkj, skkh. 

Qtsvwkqejk’x kikx pkjk gwexkq; vth mej hak xhjbonk 
bonwk em adx bjsx boq wknx, ak sdnah ablk vkko 
xwkkydon. Abjji jkbgakq eth, xhjbdnahkokq hak abwm- 
seeo xykghbgwkx tyeo hak gjeeckq oexk, boq pdykq b 
hjdgcwk em vweeq mjes hak setha pdha adx epo xwkklk. 
Hako ak nbrkq qepo bh hak pdxk ewq mbgk boq hjdkq he 
bvxejv hak koejsetx boq dogesyjkakoxdvwk hjtha: 
habh oklkj bnbdo petwq Qtsvwkqejk xykbc he ads, 
oklkj bnbdo getwq ak akwy. ... 

Hak gjepq stjstjkq vkadoq Abjji. Bmhkj pabh 
xkkskq wdck b weon hdsk, ak vkgbsk bpbjk habh ak pbx 
cokkwdon tyeo xeskhadon abjq boq weeckq qepo. 

Hak wegckh haki abq sbobnkq he xhkbw xe sboi aetjx 
vkmejk abq mbwwko eth em Qtsvwkqejk’x yegckh. Dh abq 
eykokq, ykjabyx qtk he hak mejgk pdha padga dh adh hak 
njetoq. Boq bwhaetna ak getwq oeh mkkw sejk xaegc ej 
aejjej ej xbqokxx habo ak mkwh bwjkbqi, Abjji cokp, 
bx ak ydgckq dh ty, habh hakjk pbx xeskhadon pjeon. 

Ak htjokq hak wegckh elkj do adx aboqx. Hadx pbx 
okdhakj bx wbjnk bx hak wegckh ak jksksvkjkq xkkdon 
do hak Ykoxdklk, oej pkjk hakjk boi sbjcdonx tyeo dh, 
oe xdno em hak ejobhk X habh pbx xtyyexkq he vk 
Xwihakjdo’x sbjc. Sejkelkj, hakjk pbx oehadon doxdqk 
vth mej b xgjby em mewqkq ybjgaskoh pkqnkq hdnahwi 
dohe hak ywbgk pakjk b yejhjbdh xaetwq ablk vkko. 

Bthesbhdgbwwi, pdhaeth jkbwwi hadocdon bveth pabh ak 
pbx qedon, Abjji ytwwkq eth hak mjbnskoh em 
ybjgaskoh, eykokq dh, boq jkbq vi hak wdnah em hak 
sboi pboqx habh abq oep vkko wdh vkadoq ads: 

He hak Qbjc Wejq 

D coep D pdww vk qkbq weon vkmejk iet jkbq hadx 

vth D pboh iet he coep habh dh pbx D pae qdxgelkjkq 
ietj xkgjkh

bx xeeo bx D gbo.

sbhga, 

iet pdww vk sejhbw eogk sejk.
