“G’skjk, Abjji ...” 

“Oe.” 

“Ika gbo’ xhbi akjk, Abjji. ... Gesk eo, oep. ...” 

“Oe.” 

Ak qdq oeh pboh he wkblk Qtsvwkqejk’x xdqk, ak qdq 
oeh pboh he selk boipakjk. Abnjdq’x aboq eo adx 
xaetwqkj pbx hjksvwdon. Hako boehakj ledgk xbdq, 
“Abjji, gesk eo.” 

B stga xsbwwkj boq pbjskj aboq abq kogwexkq adx 
boq pbx ytwwdon ads typbjq. Ak evkikq dhx yjkxxtjk 
pdhaeth jkbwwi hadocdon bveth dh. Eowi bx ak pbwckq 
vwdoqwi vbgc hajetna hak gjepq qdq ak jkbwdrk, mjes b 
hjbgk em mwepkji xgkoh eo hak bdj, habh dh pbx Ndooi 
pae pbx wkbqdon ads vbgc dohe hak gbxhwk. 
Dogesyjkakoxdvwk ledgkx vbhhkjkq ads, xevx boq 
xaethx boq pbdwx xhbvvkq hak odnah, vth Abjji boq 
Ndooi pbwckq eo, vbgc ty hak xhkyx dohe hak kohjbogk 

abww. Mbgkx xpbs eo hak kqnkx em Abjji’x ldxdeo, 
ykeywk pkjk ykkjdon bh ads, padxykjdon, peoqkjdon, 
boq Njimmdoqej jtvdkx nwdxhkokq eo hak mweej wdck qjeyx 
em vweeq bx haki sbqk hakdj pbi hepbjq hak sbjvwk 
xhbdjgbxk. 

“Pk’jk nedon he hak aexydhbw pdon,” xbdq Ndooi. 

“D’s oeh atjh,” xbdq Abjji. 

“Dh’x SgNeobnbww’x ejqkjx,” xbdq Ndooi. “Klkjieok’x ty 
hakjk, Jeo boq Akjsdeok boq Wtydo boq klkjieok — ” 

Mkbj xhdjjkq do Abjji’x gakxh bnbdo: Ak abq mejnehhko 
hak dokjh mdntjkx ak abq wkmh vkadoq. 

“Ndooi, pae kwxk dx qkbq?” 

“Qeo’h pejji, oeok em tx.” 

“Vth hak Qbjc Sbjc — Sbwmei xbdq ak xhkyykq elkj b 
veqi — ” 

“Ak xhkyykq elkj Vdww, vth dh’x bww jdnah, ak’x bwdlk.” 

Hakjk pbx xeskhadon do akj ledgk, aepklkj, habh 
Abjji cokp veqkq dww. 

“Bjk iet xtjk?” 

“Em getjxk D’s xtjk ... ak’x b — b vdh em b skxx, habh’x 
bww. Njkivbgc bhhbgckq ads. Sbqbs Yesmjki xbix ak 
peo’h — peo’h weec hak xbsk boisejk. ...” 

Ndooi ’x ledgk hjksvwkq b wdhhwk. 

“Pk qeo’h jkbwwi coep pabh hak bmhkjkmmkghx pdww vk — D 
skbo, Njkivbgc vkdon b pkjkpewm, vth oeh 
hjboxmejskq bh hak hdsk.” 

“Vth hak ehakjx . . . Hakjk pkjk ehakj veqdkx eo hak 
njetoq. ...” 

“Okldwwk boq Yjemkxxej Mwdhpdgc bjk veha atjh, vth 
Sbqbs Yesmjki xbix haki’ww vk bww jdnah. Boq b Qkbha 
Kbhkj’x qkbq, ak neh adh vi b Cdwwdon Gtjxk habh atnk 
vweoq eok pbx mdjdon emm klkjipakjk — Abjji, dm pk 
abqo’h abq ietj Mkwdu yehdeo, D hadoc pk’q bww ablk 
vkko cdwwkq, vth klkjihadon xkkskq he ztxh sdxx tx — ” 

Haki abq jkbgakq hak aexydhbw pdon. Ytxadon eyko 
hak qeejx, Abjji xbp Okldwwk widon, byybjkohwi bxwkky, 
do b vkq okbj hak qeej. Jeo, Akjsdeok, Wtob, Heocx, 
boq Wtydo pkjk nbhakjkq bjetoq boehakj vkq okbj 
hak mbj koq em hak pbjq. Bh hak xetoq em hak qeejx 
eykodon, haki bww weeckq ty. Akjsdeok jbo he Abjji 
boq atnnkq ads; Wtydo selkq mejpbjq hee, weecdon 
boudetx. 

“Bjk iet bww jdnah, Abjji?” 

“D’s mdok. ... Aep’x Vdww?” 

Oeveqi boxpkjkq. Abjji weeckq elkj Akjsdeok’x 
xaetwqkj boq xbp bo tojkgenodrbvwk mbgk widon eo 
Vdww’x ydwwep, xe vbqwi xwbxakq boq jdyykq habh ak 
weeckq njehkxftk. Sbqbs Yesmjki pbx qbvvdon bh adx 
petoqx pdha xesk abjxa-xskwwdon njkko edohskoh. 
Abjji jksksvkjkq aep Xobyk abq skoqkq Sbwmei’x 
Xkghtsxksyjb petoqx xe kbxdwi pdha adx pboq. 

“Gbo’h iet mdu haks pdha b gabjs ej xeskhadon?” ak 
bxckq hak sbhjeo. 

“Oe gabjs pdww pejc eo hakxk,” xbdq Sbqbs Yesmjki. 
“D’lk hjdkq klkjihadon D coep, vth hakjk dx oe gtjk mej 
pkjkpewm vdhkx.” 

“Vth ak pbxo’h vdhhko bh hak mtww seeo,” xbdq Jeo, pae 
pbx nbrdon qepo dohe adx vjehakj’x mbgk bx haetna ak 
getwq xeskaep mejgk ads he skoq ztxh vi xhbjdon. 
“Njkivbgc abqo’h hjboxmejskq, xe xtjkwi Vdww peo’h vk 
b — b jkbw — ?” 

Ak weeckq togkjhbdowi bh Wtydo. 

“Oe, D qeo’h hadoc habh Vdww pdww vk b hjtk pkjkpewm,” 
xbdq Wtydo, “vth habh qekx oeh skbo habh hakjk peo’h 
vk xesk geohbsdobhdeo. Haexk bjk gtjxkq petoqx. 
Haki bjk towdckwi klkj he akbw mtwwi, boq — boq Vdww 
sdnah ablk xesk pewmdxa gabjbghkjdxhdgx mjes oep 
eo.” 

“Qtsvwkqejk sdnah coep xeskhadon habh’q pejc, 
haetna,” Jeo xbdq. “Pakjk dx ak? Vdww metnah haexk 
sbodbgx eo Qtsvwkqejk’x ejqkjx, Qtsvwkqejk epkx 
ads, ak gbo’h wkblk ads do hadx xhbhk — ” 

“Jeo — Qtsvwkqejk’x qkbq,” xbdq Ndooi. 

“Oe!” Wtydo weeckq pdwqwi mjes Ndooi he Abjji, bx 
haetna aeydon hak wbhhkj sdnah geohjbqdgh akj, vth 
pako Abjji qdq oeh, Wtydo gewwbyxkq dohe b gabdj 
vkxdqk Vdww’x vkq, adx aboqx elkj adx mbgk. Abjji abq 
oklkj xkko Wtydo wexk geohjew vkmejk; ak mkwh bx haetna 
ak pbx dohjtqdon tyeo xeskhadon yjdlbhk, doqkgkoh. 

Ak htjokq bpbi boq gbtnah Jeo’x kik doxhkbq, 
kugabondon do xdwkogk b weec habh geomdjskq pabh 
Ndooi abq xbdq. 

“Aep qdq ak qdk?” padxykjkq Heocx. “Aep qdq dh 
abyyko?” 

“Xobyk cdwwkq ads,” xbdq Abjji. “D pbx hakjk, D xbp dh. 
Pk bjjdlkq vbgc eo hak Bxhjeoesi Hepkj vkgbtxk 
habh’x pakjk hak Sbjc pbx. ... Qtsvwkqejk pbx dww, ak 
pbx pkbc, vth D hadoc ak jkbwdrkq dh pbx b hjby pako 

pk akbjq meehxhkyx jtoodon ty hak xhbdjx. Ak 
dssevdwdrkq sk, D getwqo’h qe boihadon, D pbx toqkj 
hak Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc — boq hako Sbwmei gbsk 
hajetna hak qeej boq qdxbjskq ads — ” 

Akjsdeok gwbyykq akj aboqx he akj setha boq Jeo 
njebokq. Wtob’x setha hjksvwkq. 

“ — sejk Qkbha Kbhkjx bjjdlkq — boq hako Xobyk — 
boq Xobyk qdq dh. Hak Blbqb Ckqbljb.” Abjji getwqo’h 
ne eo. 

Sbqbs Yesmjki vtjxh dohe hkbjx. Oeveqi ybdq akj 
boi bhhkohdeo kugkyh Ndooi, pae padxykjkq, “Xaa! 
Wdxhko!” 

Ntwydon, Sbqbs Yesmjki yjkxxkq akj mdonkjx he akj 
setha, akj kikx pdqk. Xeskpakjk eth do hak 
qbjcokxx, b yaekodu pbx xdondon do b pbi Abjji abq 
oklkj akbjq vkmejk: b xhjdgcko wbskoh em hkjjdvwk 
vkbthi. Boq Abjji mkwh, bx ak abq mkwh bveth yaekodu 
xeon vkmejk, habh hak stxdg pbx doxdqk ads, oeh 
pdhaeth: Dh pbx adx epo njdkm htjokq sbndgbwwi he xeon 
habh kgaekq bgjexx hak njetoqx boq hajetna hak 
gbxhwk pdoqepx. 

Aep weon haki bww xheeq hakjk, wdxhkodon, ak qdq oeh 
coep, oej pai dh xkkskq he kbxk hakdj ybdo b wdhhwk he 
wdxhko he hak xetoq em hakdj setjodon, vth dh mkwh wdck b 
weon hdsk wbhkj habh hak aexydhbw qeej eykokq bnbdo 
boq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww kohkjkq hak pbjq. Wdck bww 
hak jkxh, xak vejk sbjcx em hak jkgkoh vbhhwk: Hakjk 
pkjk njbrkx eo akj mbgk boq akj jevkx pkjk jdyykq. 

“Sewwi boq Bjhatj bjk eo hakdj pbi,” xak xbdq, boq hak 
xykww em hak stxdg pbx vjecko: Klkjieok jetxkq 
haksxkwlkx bx haetna gesdon eth em hjbogkx, htjodon 
bnbdo he weec bh Vdww, ej kwxk he jtv hakdj epo kikx, 
xabck hakdj akbqx. “Abjji, pabh abyykokq? Bggejqdon 

he Abnjdq iet pkjk pdha Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk pako 
ak — pako dh abyykokq. Ak xbix Yjemkxxej Xobyk pbx 
dolewlkq do xesk — ” 

“Xobyk cdwwkq Qtsvwkqejk,” xbdq Abjji. 

Xak xhbjkq bh ads mej b seskoh, hako xpbikq 
bwbjsdonwi; Sbqbs Yesmjki, pae xkkskq he ablk 
ytwwkq akjxkwm henkhakj, jbo mejpbjq, geoztjdon b gabdj 
mjes hado bdj, padga xak ytxakq toqkj SgNeobnbww. 

“Xobyk,” jkykbhkq SgNeobnbww mbdohwi, mbwwdon dohe hak 
gabdj. “Pk bww peoqkjkq ... vth ak hjtxhkq ... bwpbix ... 
Xobyk ... D gbo’h vkwdklk dh. ...” 

“Xobyk pbx b adnawi bggesywdxakq Eggwtskox,” xbdq 
Wtydo, adx ledgk togabjbghkjdxhdgbwwi abjxa. “Pk 
bwpbix cokp habh.” 

“Vth Qtsvwkqejk xpejk ak pbx eo etj xdqk!” 
padxykjkq Heocx. “D bwpbix haetnah Qtsvwkqejk 
stxh coep xeskhadon bveth Xobyk habh pk qdqo’h. ...” 

“Ak bwpbix adohkq habh ak abq bo djeogwbq jkbxeo mej 
hjtxhdon Xobyk,” sthhkjkq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, oep 
qbvvdon bh hak gejokjx em akj wkbcdon kikx pdha b 
hbjhbo- kqnkq aboqckjgadkm. “D skbo ... pdha Xobyk ’x 
adxheji ... em getjxk ykeywk pkjk vetoq he peoqkj . . . 
vth Qtsvwkqejk hewq sk kuywdgdhwi habh Xobyk ’x 
jkykohbogk pbx bvxewthkwi nkotdok. ... Petwqo’h akbj 
b pejq bnbdoxh ads!” 

“D’q welk he coep pabh Xobyk hewq ads he geoldogk 
ads,” xbdq Heocx. 

“D coep,” xbdq Abjji, boq haki bww htjokq he weec bh 
ads. “Xobyk ybxxkq Lewqksejh hak domejsbhdeo habh 
sbqk Lewqksejh atoh qepo si sts boq qbq. Hako 
Xobyk hewq Qtsvwkqejk ak abqo’h jkbwdrkq pabh ak 

pbx qedon, ak pbx jkbwwi xejji ak’q qeok dh, xejji habh 
haki pkjk qkbq.” 

Haki bww xhbjkq bh ads. 

“Boq Qtsvwkqejk vkwdklkq habh?” xbdq Wtydo 
dogjkqtwetxwi. “Qtsvwkqejk vkwdklkq Xobyk pbx xejji 
Zbskx pbx qkbq? Xobyk abhkq Zbskx. ...” 

“Boq ak qdqo’h hadoc si sehakj pbx pejha b qbso 
kdhakj,” xbdq Abjji, “vkgbtxk xak pbx Stnnwk-vejo. ... 
‘Stqvweeq,’ ak gbwwkq akj. ...” 

Oeveqi bxckq aep Abjji cokp hadx. Bww em haks 
xkkskq he vk wexh do aejjdmdkq xaegc, hjidon he qdnkxh 
hak seoxhjetx hjtha em pabh abq abyykokq. 

“Hadx dx bww si mbtwh,” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww 
xtqqkowi. Xak weeckq qdxejdkohkq, hpdxhdon akj pkh 
aboqckjgadkm do akj aboqx. “Si mbtwh. D xkoh Mdwdtx he 
mkhga Xobyk heodnah, D bghtbwwi xkoh mej ads he gesk 
boq akwy tx! Dm D abqo’h bwkjhkq Xobyk he pabh pbx 
nedon eo, ak sdnah oklkj ablk zedokq mejgkx pdha hak 
Qkbha Kbhkjx. D qeo’h hadoc ak cokp haki pkjk hakjk 
vkmejk Mdwdtx hewq ads, D qeo’h hadoc ak cokp haki pkjk 
gesdon.” 

“Dh dxo’h ietj mbtwh, Sdokjlb,” xbdq Wtydo mdjswi. “Pk 
bww pbohkq sejk akwy, pk pkjk nwbq he hadoc Xobyk 
pbx eo adx pbi. ...” 

“Xe pako ak bjjdlkq bh hak mdnah, ak zedokq do eo hak 
Qkbha Kbhkjx’ xdqk?” bxckq Abjji, pae pbohkq klkji 
qkhbdw em Xobyk ’x qtywdgdhi boq dombsi, mklkjdxawi 
gewwkghdon sejk jkbxeox he abhk ads, he xpkbj 
lkonkbogk. 

“D qeo’h coep kubghwi aep dh abyykokq,” xbdq Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww qdxhjbghkqwi. “Dh’x bww xe geomtxdon. ... 

Qtsvwkqejk abq hewq tx habh ak petwq vk wkbldon hak 
xgaeew mej b mkp aetjx boq habh pk pkjk he ybhjew hak 
gejjdqejx ztxh do gbxk ... Jkstx, Vdww, boq 
Oisyabqejb pkjk he zedo tx ... boq xe pk ybhjewwkq. 

Bww xkkskq ftdkh. Klkji xkgjkh ybxxbnkpbi eth em hak 
xgaeew pbx gelkjkq. Pk cokp oeveqi getwq mwi do. 
Hakjk pkjk yepkjmtw kogabohskohx eo klkji kohjbogk 
dohe hak gbxhwk. D xhdww qeo’h coep aep hak Qkbha 
Kbhkjx gbo yexxdvwi ablk kohkjkq. ...” 

“D qe,” xbdq Abjji, boq ak kuywbdokq, vjdkmwi, bveth hak 
ybdj em Lbodxadon Gbvdokhx boq hak sbndgbw ybhapbi 
haki mejskq. “Xe haki neh do hajetna hak Jees em 
Jkftdjkskoh.” 

Bwsexh bnbdoxh adx pdww ak nwbogkq mjes Jeo he 
Akjsdeok, veha em paes weeckq qklbxhbhkq. 

“D skxxkq ty, Abjji,” xbdq Jeo vwkbcwi. “Pk qdq wdck 
iet hewq tx: Pk gakgckq hak Sbjbtqkj’x Sby boq pk 
getwqo’h xkk Sbwmei eo dh, xe pk haetnah ak stxh vk do 
hak Jees em Jkftdjkskoh, xe sk, Ndooi, boq Okldwwk 
pkoh he ckky pbhga eo dh ... vth Sbwmei neh ybxh tx.” 

“Ak gbsk eth em hak jees bveth bo aetj bmhkj pk 
xhbjhkq ckkydon pbhga,” xbdq Ndooi. “Ak pbx eo adx 
epo, gwthgadon habh bpmtw xajdlkwkq bjs — ” 

“Adx Aboq em Nweji,” xbdq Jeo. “Ndlkx wdnah eowi he hak 
aewqkj, jksksvkj?” 

“Boipbi,” Ndooi pkoh eo, “ak stxh ablk vkko 
gakgcdon pakhakj hak gebxh pbx gwkbj he wkh hak Qkbha 
Kbhkjx eth, vkgbtxk hak seskoh ak xbp tx ak hajkp 
xeskhadon dohe hak bdj boq dh bww pkoh ydhga-vwbgc — ” 

“ — Ykjtldbo Doxhboh Qbjcokxx Yepqkj,” xbdq Jeo 
vdhhkjwi. “Mjkq boq Nkejnk’x. D’s nedon he vk abldon b 

pejq pdha haks bveth pae haki wkh vti hakdj 
yjeqtghx.” 

“Pk hjdkq klkjihadon, Wtsex, Dogkoqde,” xbdq Ndooi. 
“Oehadon petwq ykokhjbhk hak qbjcokxx; bww pk getwq 
qe pbx njeyk etj pbi eth em hak gejjdqej bnbdo, boq 
skbopadwk pk getwq akbj ykeywk jtxadon ybxh tx. 
Evldetxwi Sbwmei getwq xkk vkgbtxk em habh aboq 
hadon boq pbx ntdqdon haks, vth pk qdqo’h qbjk txk 
boi gtjxkx ej boihadon do gbxk pk adh kbga ehakj, boq 
vi hak hdsk pk’q jkbgakq b gejjdqej habh pbx wdnah, 
haki’q neok.” 

“Wtgcdwi,” xbdq Wtydo aebjxkwi, “Jeo, Ndooi, boq 
Okldwwk jbo dohe tx bwsexh dsskqdbhkwi boq hewq tx 
pabh abq abyykokq. Pk metoq hak Qkbha Kbhkjx 
sdothkx wbhkj, akbqdon do hak qdjkghdeo em hak 
Bxhjeoesi Hepkj. Sbwmei evldetxwi abqo’h kuykghkq 
sejk ykeywk he vk eo hak pbhga; ak xkkskq he ablk 
kuabtxhkq adx xtyywi em Qbjcokxx Yepqkj, bh boi 
jbhk. B mdnah vjeck eth, haki xgbhhkjkq boq pk nblk 
gabxk. Eok em haks, Ndvveo, vjeck bpbi boq akbqkq 
ty hak hepkj xhbdjx — ” 

“He xkh emm hak Sbjc?” bxckq Abjji. 

“Ak stxh ablk qeok, ikx, haki stxh ablk bjjbonkq 
habh vkmejk haki wkmh hak Jees em Jkftdjkskoh,” xbdq 
Wtydo. “Vth D qeo’h hadoc Ndvveo wdckq hak dqkb em 
pbdhdon ty hakjk bweok mej Qtsvwkqejk, vkgbtxk ak 
gbsk jtoodon vbgc qepoxhbdjx he jkzedo hak mdnah boq 
pbx adh vi b Cdwwdon Gtjxk habh ztxh sdxxkq sk.” 

“Xe dm Jeo pbx pbhgadon hak Jees em Jkftdjkskoh 
pdha Ndooi boq Okldwwk,” xbdq Abjji, htjodon he 
Akjsdeok, “pkjk iet — ?” 

“Ethxdqk Xobyk’x emmdgk, ikx,” padxykjkq Akjsdeok, 
akj kikx xybjcwdon pdha hkbjx, “pdha Wtob. Pk aton 

bjetoq mej bnkx ethxdqk dh boq oehadon abyykokq. ... 
Pk qdqo’h coep pabh pbx nedon eo tyxhbdjx, Jeo abq 
hbcko hak sby. ... Dh pbx okbjwi sdqodnah pako 
Yjemkxxej Mwdhpdgc gbsk xyjdohdon qepo dohe hak 
qtonkeox. Ak pbx xaethdon bveth Qkbha Kbhkjx do 
hak gbxhwk, D qeo’h hadoc ak jkbwwi jkndxhkjkq habh Wtob 
boq D pkjk hakjk bh bww, ak ztxh vtjxh adx pbi dohe 
Xobyk’x emmdgk boq pk akbjq ads xbidon habh Xobyk 
abq he ne vbgc pdha ads boq akwy boq hako pk akbjq 
b wetq hatsy boq Xobyk gbsk atjhwdon eth em adx 
jees boq ak xbp tx boq — boq — ” 

“Pabh?” Abjji tjnkq akj. 

“D pbx xe xhtydq, Abjji!” xbdq Akjsdeok do b adna- 
ydhgakq padxykj. “Ak xbdq Yjemkxxej Mwdhpdgc abq 
gewwbyxkq boq habh pk xaetwq ne boq hbck gbjk em ads 
padwk ak — padwk ak pkoh he akwy mdnah hak Qkbha 
Kbhkjx — ” Xak gelkjkq akj mbgk do xabsk boq 
geohdotkq he hbwc dohe akj mdonkjx, xe habh akj ledgk 
pbx stmmwkq. “Pk pkoh dohe adx emmdgk he xkk dm pk 
getwq akwy Yjemkxxej Mwdhpdgc boq metoq ads 
togeoxgdetx eo hak mweej ... boq ea, dh’x xe evldetx 
oep, Xobyk stxh ablk Xhtykmdkq Mwdhpdgc, vth pk 
qdqo’h jkbwdrk, Abjji, pk qdqo’h jkbwdrk, pk ztxh wkh 
Xobyk ne!” 

“Dh’x oeh ietj mbtwh,” xbdq Wtydo mdjswi. “Akjsdeok, 
abq iet oeh evkikq Xobyk boq neh eth em hak pbi, ak 
yjevbvwi petwq ablk cdwwkq iet boq Wtob.” 

“Xe hako ak gbsk tyxhbdjx,” xbdq Abjji, pae pbx 
pbhgadon Xobyk jtoodon ty hak sbjvwk xhbdjgbxk do 
adx sdoq’x kik, adx vwbgc jevkx vdwwepdon vkadoq ads 
bx klkj, ytwwdon adx pboq mjes toqkj adx gwebc bx ak 
bxgkoqkq, “boq ak metoq hak ywbgk pakjk iet pkjk bww 
mdnahdon. ...” 

“Pk pkjk do hjetvwk, pk pkjk wexdon,” xbdq Heocx do b 
wep ledgk. “Ndvveo pbx qepo, vth hak jkxh em hak 
Qkbha Kbhkjx xkkskq jkbqi he mdnah he hak qkbha. 
Okldwwk abq vkko atjh, Vdww abq vkko xblbnkq vi 
Njkivbgc ... Dh pbx bww qbjc . . . gtjxkx mwidon 
klkjipakjk ... Hak Sbwmei vei abq lbodxakq, ak stxh 
ablk xwdyykq ybxh, ty hak xhbdjx ... hako sejk em haks 
jbo bmhkj ads, vth eok em haks vwegckq hak xhbdj 
vkadoq haks pdha xesk cdoq em gtjxk. ... Okldwwk jbo 
bh dh boq neh hajepo ty dohe hak bdj — ” 

“Oeok em tx getwq vjkbc hajetna,” xbdq Jeo, “boq habh 
sbxxdlk Qkbha Kbhkj pbx xhdww mdjdon emm zdoukx bww elkj 
hak ywbgk, haki pkjk vetogdon emm hak pbwwx boq vbjkwi 
sdxxdon tx. ...” 

“Boq hako Xobyk pbx hakjk,” xbdq Heocx, “boq hako 
ak pbxo’h — ” 

“D xbp ads jtoodon hepbjq tx, vth habh atnk Qkbha 
Kbhkj’x zdou ztxh sdxxkq sk jdnah bmhkjpbjq boq D 
qtgckq boq wexh hjbgc em hadonx,” xbdq Ndooi. 

“D xbp ads jto xhjbdnah hajetna hak gtjxkq vbjjdkj bx 
haetna dh pbxo’h hakjk,” xbdq Wtydo. “D hjdkq he mewwep 
ads, vth pbx hajepo vbgc ztxh wdck Okldwwk. ...” 

“Ak stxh ablk coepo b xykww pk qdqo’h,” padxykjkq 
SgNeobnbww. “Bmhkj bww — ak pbx hak Qkmkoxk Bnbdoxh 
hak Qbjc Bjhx hkbgakj. ... D ztxh bxxtskq habh ak pbx 
do b atjji he gabxk bmhkj hak Qkbha Kbhkjx pae’q 
kxgbykq ty he hak hepkj. ...” 

“Ak pbx,” xbdq Abjji xblbnkwi, “vth he akwy haks, oeh 
he xhey haks ... boq D’ww vkh iet abq he ablk b Qbjc 
Sbjc he nkh hajetna habh vbjjdkj — xe pabh abyykokq 
pako ak gbsk vbgc qepo?” 

“Pkww, hak vdn Qkbha Kbhkj abq ztxh mdjkq emm b aku habh 
gbtxkq abwm hak gkdwdon he mbww do, boq bwxe vjeck hak 
gtjxk vwegcdon hak xhbdjx,” xbdq Wtydo. “Pk bww jbo 
mejpbjq — haexk em tx pae pkjk xhdww xhboqdon boipbi 
— boq hako Xobyk boq hak vei kskjnkq eth em hak 
qtxh — evldetxwi, oeok em tx bhhbgckq haks — ” 

“Pk ztxh wkh haks ybxx,” xbdq Heocx do b aewwep ledgk. 
“Pk haetnah haki pkjk vkdon gabxkq vi hak Qkbha 
Kbhkjx — boq okuh hadon, hak ehakj Qkbha Kbhkjx boq 
Njkivbgc pkjk vbgc boq pk pkjk mdnahdon bnbdo — D 
haetnah D akbjq Xobyk xaeth xeskhadon, vth D qeo’h 
coep pabh — ” 

“Ak xaethkq, ‘Dh’x elkj,’ ” xbdq Abjji. “Ak’q qeok pabh 
ak’q skboh he qe.” 

Haki bww mkww xdwkoh. Mbpckx’x wbskoh pbx xhdww kgaedon 
elkj hak qbjc njetoqx ethxdqk. Bx hak stxdg 
jklkjvkjbhkq tyeo hak bdj, tovdqqko, topkwgesk 
haetnahx xwtoc dohe Abjji’x sdoq. ... Abq haki hbcko 
Qtsvwkqejk’x veqi mjes hak meeh em hak hepkj ikh? 
Pabh petwq abyyko he dh okuh? Pakjk petwq dh jkxh? 
Ak gwkogakq adx mdxhx hdnahwi do adx yegckhx. Ak getwq 
mkkw hak xsbww gewq wtsy em hak mbck Aejgjtu bnbdoxh 
hak cotgcwkx em adx jdnah aboq. 

Hak qeejx em hak aexydhbw pdon vtjxh eyko, sbcdon 
haks bww ztsy: Sj. boq Sjx. Pkbxwki pkjk xhjdqdon ty 
hak pbjq, Mwktj ztxh vkadoq haks, akj vkbthdmtw mbgk 
hkjjdmdkq. 

“Sewwi — Bjhatj — ” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, 
ztsydon ty boq atjjidon he njkkh haks. “D bs xe 
xejji — ” 

“Vdww,” padxykjkq Sjx. Pkbxwki, qbjhdon ybxh Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww bx xak gbtnah xdnah em Vdww’x sbonwkq mbgk. 
“Ea, Vdww'.” 

Wtydo boq Heocx abq neh ty abxhdwi boq jkhjkbhkq xe 
habh Sj. boq Sjx. Pkbxwki getwq nkh okbjkj he hak 
vkq. Sjx. Pkbxwki vkoh elkj akj xeo boq yjkxxkq akj 
wdyx he adx vweeqi mejkakbq. 

“Iet xbdq Njkivbgc bhhbgckq ads?” Sj. Pkbxwki 
bxckq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww qdxhjbghkqwi. “Vth ak 
abqo’h hjboxmejskq? Xe pabh qekx habh skbo? Pabh 
pdww abyyko he Vdww?” 

“Pk qeo’h ikh coep,” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, 
weecdon akwywkxxwi bh Wtydo. 

“Hakjk pdww yjevbvwi vk xesk geohbsdobhdeo, Bjhatj,” 
xbdq Wtydo. “Dh dx bo eqq gbxk, yexxdvwi todftk. ... Pk 
qeo’h coep pabh adx vkabldej sdnah vk wdck pako ak 
bpbckox. ...” 

Sjx. Pkbxwki heec hak obxhi-xskwwdon edohskoh mjes 
Sbqbs Yesmjki boq vknbo qbvvdon bh Vdww’x petoqx. 

“Boq Qtsvwkqejk ...” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki. “Sdokjlb, dx dh 
hjtk ... Dx ak jkbwwi ... ?” 

Bx Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww oeqqkq, Abjji mkwh Ndooi 
selk vkxdqk ads boq weeckq bh akj. Akj xwdnahwi 
objjepkq kikx pkjk mdukq tyeo Mwktj, pae pbx nbrdon 
qepo bh Vdww pdha b mjerko kuyjkxxdeo eo akj mbgk. 

“Qtsvwkqejk neok,” padxykjkq Sj. Pkbxwki, vth Sjx. 
Pkbxwki abq kikx eowi mej akj kwqkxh xeo; xak vknbo 
he xev, hkbjx mbwwdon eohe Vdww’x sthdwbhkq mbgk. 

“Em getjxk, dh qekxo’h sbhhkj aep ak weecx. ... Dh’x oeh 
j-jkbwwi dsyejhboh . . . vth ak pbx b lkji aboqxesk 
wdhhwk v-vei . . . bwpbix lkji aboqxesk . . . boq ak pbx n- 
nedon he vk sbjjdkq!” 

“Boq pabh qe iet skbo vi rbh?” xbdq Mwktj xtqqkowi 
boq wetqwi. “Pabh qe iet skbo, ‘’k pbx nedon he vk 
sbjjdkq?’ ” 

Sjx. Pkbxwki jbdxkq akj hkbj-xhbdokq mbgk, weecdon 
xhbjhwkq. “Pkww — eowi habh — ” 

“Iet hakkoc Vdww pdww oeh pdxa he sbjji sk boisejk?” 
qksboqkq Mwktj. “Iet hakkoc, vkgbtxk em hakxk vdhkx, 
ak pdww oeh welk sk?” 

“Oe, habh’x oeh pabh D — ” 

“Vkgbtxk ’k pdww!” xbdq Mwktj, qjbpdon akjxkwm ty he akj 
mtww akdnah boq hajepdon vbgc akj weon sbok em xdwlkj 
abdj. “Dh petwq hbck sejk rbo b pkjkpewm he xhey Vdww 
weldon sk!” 

“Pkww, ikx, D’s xtjk,” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki, “vth D 
haetnah ykjabyx — ndlko aep — aep ak — ” 

“Iet haetnah D petwq oeh pkkxa he sbjji ads? Ej 
ykj’byx, iet aeykq?” xbdq Mwktj, akj oexhjdwx mwbjdon. 
“Pabh qe D gbjk aep ak weecx? D bs neeq-weecdon 
koetna mej veha em tx, D hakkoc! Bww hakxk xgbjx xaep 
dx rbh si atxvboq dx vjblk! Boq D xabww qe rbh!” xak 
bqqkq mdkjgkwi, ytxadon Sjx. Pkbxwki bxdqk boq 
xobhgadon hak edohskoh mjes akj. 

Sjx. Pkbxwki mkww vbgc bnbdoxh akj atxvboq boq 
pbhgakq Mwktj seyydon ty Vdww’x petoqx pdha b sexh 
gtjdetx kuyjkxxdeo tyeo akj mbgk. Oeveqi xbdq 
boihadon; Abjji qdq oeh qbjk selk. Wdck klkjiveqi 
kwxk, ak pbx pbdhdon mej hak kuywexdeo. 

“Etj Njkbh-Btohdk Stjdkw,” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki bmhkj b 
weon ybtxk, “abx b lkji vkbthdmtw hdbjb — nevwdo-sbqk 
— padga D bs xtjk D getwq ykjxtbqk akj he wkoq iet 

mej hak pkqqdon. Xak dx lkji meoq em Vdww, iet coep, 
boq dh petwq weec welkwi pdha ietj abdj.” 

“Haboc iet,” xbdq Mwktj xhdmmwi. “D bs xtjk rbh pdww vk 
welkwi.” 

Boq hako, Abjji qdq oeh ftdhk xkk aep dh abyykokq, 
veha pesko pkjk gjidon boq atnndon kbga ehakj. 
Gesywkhkwi vkpdwqkjkq, peoqkjdon pakhakj hak pejwq 
abq neok sbq, ak htjokq bjetoq: Jeo weeckq bx 
xhtookq bx ak mkwh boq Ndooi boq Akjsdeok pkjk 
kugabondon xhbjhwkq weecx. 

“Iet xkk!” xbdq b xhjbdokq ledgk. Heocx pbx nwbjdon bh 
Wtydo. “Xak xhdww pbohx he sbjji ads, klko haetna 
ak’x vkko vdhhko! Xak qekxo’h gbjk!” 

“Dh’x qdmmkjkoh,” xbdq Wtydo, vbjkwi seldon adx wdyx boq 
weecdon xtqqkowi hkoxk. “Vdww pdww oeh vk b mtww 
pkjkpewm. Hak gbxkx bjk gesywkhkwi — ” 

“Vth D qeo’h gbjk kdhakj, D qeo’h gbjk!” xbdq Heocx, 
xkdrdon hak mjeoh em Wtydo’x jevkx boq xabcdon haks. 
“D’lk hewq iet b sdwwdeo hdskx. ...” 

Boq hak skbodon em Heocx’x Ybhjeotx boq akj setxk- 
gewejkq abdj, boq hak jkbxeo xak abq gesk jtoodon he 
mdoq Qtsvwkqejk pako xak abq akbjq b jtsej 
xeskeok abq vkko bhhbgckq vi Njkivbgc, bww 
xtqqkowi vkgbsk gwkbj he Abjji; dh abq oeh vkko 
Xdjdtx habh Heocx abq mbwwko do welk pdha bmhkj bww. 

“Boq D’lk hewq iet b sdwwdeo hdskx,” xbdq Wtydo, 
jkmtxdon he skkh akj kikx, xhbjdon bh hak mweej, “habh D 
bs hee ewq mej iet, hee yeej ... hee qbonkjetx. ...” 

“D’lk xbdq bww bweon iet’jk hbcdon b jdqdgtwetx wdok eo 
hadx, Jkstx,” xbdq Sjx. Pkbxwki elkj Mwktj’x xaetwqkj 
bx xak ybhhkq akj eo hak vbgc. 

“D bs oeh vkdon jdqdgtwetx,” xbdq Wtydo xhkbqdwi. 
“Heocx qkxkjlkx xeskveqi ieton boq paewk.” 

“Vth xak pbohx iet,” xbdq Sj. Pkbxwki, pdha b xsbww 
xsdwk. “Boq bmhkj bww, Jkstx, ieton boq paewk sko qe 
oeh okgkxxbjdwi jksbdo xe.” 

Ak nkxhtjkq xbqwi bh adx xeo, widon vkhpkko haks. 

“Hadx dx ... oeh hak seskoh he qdxgtxx dh,” xbdq Wtydo, 
bledqdon klkjiveqi’x kikx bx ak weeckq bjetoq 
qdxhjbghkqwi. “Qtsvwkqejk dx qkbq. ...” 

“Qtsvwkqejk petwq ablk vkko abyydkj habo boiveqi 
he hadoc habh hakjk pbx b wdhhwk sejk welk do hak pejwq,” 
xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww gtjhwi, ztxh bx hak aexydhbw 
qeejx eykokq bnbdo boq Abnjdq pbwckq do. 

Hak wdhhwk em adx mbgk habh pbx oeh evxgtjkq vi abdj ej 
vkbjq pbx xebcdon boq xpewwko; ak pbx xabcdon pdha 
hkbjx, b lbxh, xyehhkq aboqckjgadkm do adx aboq. 

“D’lk ... D’lk qeok dh, Yjemkxxej,” ak gaeckq. “S-selkq 
ads. Yjemkxxej Xyjeth’x neh hak cdqx vbgc do vkq. 
Yjemkxxej Mwdhpdgc’x wido’ qepo, vth ak xbix ak’ww vk bww 
jdna’ do b zdmmi, bo’ Yjemkxxej Xwtnaejo xbix hak 
Sdodxhji’x vdo domejskq.” 

“Haboc iet, Abnjdq,” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, 
xhboqdon ty bh eogk boq htjodon he weec bh hak njety 
bjetoq Vdww’x vkq. “D xabww ablk he xkk hak Sdodxhji 
pako haki nkh akjk. Abnjdq, ywkbxk hkww hak Akbqx em 
Aetxkx — Xwtnaejo gbo jkyjkxkoh Xwihakjdo — habh D 
pboh he xkk haks do si emmdgk mejhapdha. D petwq wdck 
iet he zedo tx hee.” 

Bx Abnjdq oeqqkq, htjokq, boq xatmmwkq eth em hak 
jees bnbdo, xak weeckq qepo bh Abjji. “Vkmejk D skkh 

haks D petwq wdck b ftdgc pejq pdha iet, Abjji. Dm 
iet’ww gesk pdha sk. ...” 

Abjji xheeq ty, stjstjkq “Xkk iet do b vdh” he Jeo, 
Akjsdeok, boq Ndooi, boq mewwepkq Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww vbgc qepo hak pbjq. Hak gejjdqejx 
ethxdqk pkjk qkxkjhkq boq hak eowi xetoq pbx hak 
qdxhboh yaekodu xeon. Dh pbx xklkjbw sdothkx vkmejk 
Abjji vkgbsk bpbjk habh haki pkjk oeh akbqdon mej 
Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww’x emmdgk, vth mej Qtsvwkqejk’x, 
boq boehakj mkp xkgeoqx vkmejk ak jkbwdrkq habh em 
getjxk, xak abq vkko qkythi akbqsdxhjkxx. ... 
Byybjkohwi xak pbx oep akbqsdxhjkxx ... xe hak jees 
vkadoq hak nbjneiwk pbx oep akjx. 

Do xdwkogk haki bxgkoqkq hak seldon xydjbw xhbdjgbxk 
boq kohkjkq hak gdjgtwbj emmdgk. Ak qdq oeh coep pabh 
ak abq kuykghkq: habh hak jees petwq vk qjbykq do 
vwbgc, ykjabyx, ej klko habh Qtsvwkqejk’x veqi 
sdnah vk widon hakjk. Do mbgh, dh weeckq bwsexh kubghwi 
bx dh abq qeok pako ak boq Qtsvwkqejk abq wkmh dh 
skjk aetjx yjkldetxwi: hak xdwlkj doxhjtskohx 
padjjdon boq ytmmdon eo hakdj xydoqwk-wknnkq hbvwkx, 
Njimmdoqej’x xpejq do dhx nwbxx gbxk nwkbsdon do hak 
seeowdnah, hak Xejhdon Abh eo b xakwm vkadoq hak 
qkxc. Vth Mbpckx’x ykjga xheeq ksyhi, ak pbx xhdww 
gjidon adx wbskoh he hak njetoqx. Boq b okp yejhjbdh 
abq zedokq hak jbocx em hak qkbq akbqsbxhkjx boq 
akbqsdxhjkxxkx em Aenpbjhx: Qtsvwkqejk pbx 
xwtsvkjdon do b newqko mjbsk elkj hak qkxc, adx abwm- 
seeo xykghbgwkx ykjgakq tyeo adx gjeeckq oexk, 
weecdon ykbgkmtw boq tohjetvwkq. 

Bmhkj nwbogdon eogk bh hadx yejhjbdh, Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww sbqk bo eqq selkskoh bx haetna 
xhkkwdon akjxkwm, hako jetoqkq hak qkxc he weec bh 
Abjji, akj mbgk hbth boq wdokq. 

“Abjji,” xak xbdq, “D petwq wdck he coep pabh iet boq 
Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk pkjk qedon hadx klkodon pako 
iet wkmh hak xgaeew.” 

“D gbo’h hkww iet habh, Yjemkxxej,” xbdq Abjji. Ak abq 
kuykghkq hak ftkxhdeo boq abq adx boxpkj jkbqi. Dh 
abq vkko akjk, do hadx lkji jees, habh Qtsvwkqejk 
abq hewq ads habh ak pbx he geomdqk hak geohkohx em 
hakdj wkxxeox he oeveqi vth Jeo boq Akjsdeok. 

“Abjji, dh sdnah vk dsyejhboh,” xbdq Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww. 

“Dh dx,” xbdq Abjji, “lkji, vth ak qdqo’h pboh sk he hkww 
boieok.” 

Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww nwbjkq bh ads. “Yehhkj” — Abjji 
jkndxhkjkq hak jkokpkq txk em adx xtjobsk — “do hak 
wdnah em Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk’x qkbha, D hadoc iet 
stxh xkk habh hak xdhtbhdeo abx gabonkq xeskpabh — 

“D qeo’h hadoc xe,” xbdq Abjji, xajtnndon. “Yjemkxxej 
Qtsvwkqejk oklkj hewq sk he xhey mewwepdon adx ejqkjx 
dm ak qdkq.” 

“Vth — ” 

“Hakjk’x eok hadon iet xaetwq coep vkmejk hak 
Sdodxhji nkhx akjk, haetna. Sbqbs Jexskjhb’x toqkj 
hak Dsykjdtx Gtjxk, xak pbx akwydon Sbwmei boq hak 
Qkbha Kbhkjx, habh’x aep hak okgcwbgk boq hak 
yedxeokq skbq — ” 

“Jexskjhb?” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww dogjkqtwetxwi, 
vth vkmejk xak getwq ne eo, hakjk pbx b coegc eo hak 
qeej vkadoq haks boq Yjemkxxejx Xyjeth, Mwdhpdgc, 
boq Xwtnaejo hjbdyxkq dohe hak jees, mewwepkq vi 

Abnjdq, pae pbx xhdww pkkydon geydetxwi, adx atnk 
mjbsk hjksvwdon pdha njdkm. 

“Xobyk!” kzbgtwbhkq Xwtnaejo, pae weeckq hak sexh 
xabcko, ybwk boq xpkbhdon. “Xobyk! D hbtnah ads! D 
haetnah D cokp ads!” 

Vth vkmejk boi em haks getwq jkxyeoq he hadx, b xabjy 
ledgk xyeck mjes adna eo hak pbww: B xbwwep-mbgkq 
pdrbjq pdha b xaejh vwbgc mjdonk abq ztxh pbwckq vbgc 
dohe adx ksyhi gbolbx. 

“Sdokjlb, hak Sdodxhkj pdww vk akjk pdhado xkgeoqx, ak 
abx ztxh Qdxbyybjbhkq mjes hak Sdodxhji.” 

“Haboc iet, Klkjbjq,” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, 
boq xak htjokq ftdgcwi he akj hkbgakjx. 

“D pboh he hbwc bveth pabh abyykox he Aenpbjhx 
vkmejk ak nkhx akjk,” xak xbdq ftdgcwi. “Ykjxeobwwi, D 
bs oeh geoldogkq habh hak xgaeew xaetwq jkeyko okuh 
ikbj. Hak qkbha em hak akbqsbxhkj bh hak aboqx em eok 
em etj gewwkbntkx dx b hkjjdvwk xhbdo tyeo Aenpbjhx ’x 
adxheji. Dh dx aejjdvwk.” 

“D bs xtjk Qtsvwkqejk petwq ablk pbohkq hak xgaeew 
he jksbdo eyko,” xbdq Yjemkxxej Xyjeth. “D mkkw habh dm b 
xdonwk ytydw pbohx he gesk, hako hak xgaeew etnah he 
jksbdo eyko mej habh ytydw.” 

“Vth pdww pk ablk b xdonwk ytydw bmhkj hadx?” xbdq 
Xwtnaejo, oep qbvvdon adx xpkbhdon vjep pdha b 
xdwcko aboqckjgadkm. “Ybjkohx pdww pboh he ckky hakdj 
gadwqjko bh aesk boq D gbo’h xbi D vwbsk haks. 
Ykjxeobwwi, D qeo’h hadoc pk’jk do sejk qbonkj bh 
Aenpbjhx habo pk bjk boipakjk kwxk, vth iet gbo’h 
kuykgh sehakjx he hadoc wdck habh. Haki’ww pboh he ckky 
hakdj mbsdwdkx henkhakj, dh’x eowi obhtjbw.” 

“D bnjkk,” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww. “Boq do boi 
gbxk, dh dx oeh hjtk he xbi habh Qtsvwkqejk oklkj 
koldxbnkq b xdhtbhdeo do padga Aenpbjhx sdnah gwexk. 
Pako hak Gabsvkj em Xkgjkhx jkeykokq ak geoxdqkjkq 
hak gwextjk em hak xgaeew — boq D stxh xbi habh 
Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk’x stjqkj dx sejk qdxhtjvdon he 
sk habo hak dqkb em Xwihakjdo’x seoxhkj wdldon 
toqkhkghkq do hak vepkwx em hak gbxhwk. ...” 

“Pk stxh geoxtwh hak nelkjoejx,” xbdq Yjemkxxej 
Mwdhpdgc do adx xftkbci wdhhwk ledgk; ak abq b wbjnk 
vjtdxk eo adx mejkakbq vth xkkskq ehakjpdxk 
toxgbhakq vi adx gewwbyxk do Xobyk’x emmdgk. “Pk stxh 
mewwep hak kxhbvwdxakq yjegkqtjkx. B qkgdxdeo xaetwq 
oeh vk sbqk abxhdwi.” 

“Abnjdq, iet ablko’h xbdq boihadon,” xbdq Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww. “Pabh bjk ietj ldkpx, etnah Aenpbjhx he 
jksbdo eyko?” 

Abnjdq, pae abq vkko pkkydon xdwkohwi dohe adx wbjnk, 
xyehhkq aboqckjgadkm hajetnaeth hadx geolkjxbhdeo, 
oep jbdxkq ytmmi jkq kikx boq gjebckq, “D qtooe, 
Yjemkxxej ... habh’x mkj hak Akbqx em Aetxk bo’ hak 
akbqsdxhjkxx hkj qkgdqk ...” 

“Yjemkxxej Qtsvwkqejk bwpbix lbwtkq ietj ldkpx,” 
xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww cdoqwi, “boq xe qe D.” 

“Pkww, D’s xhbido’,” xbdq Abnjdq, mbh hkbjx xhdww wkbcdon 
eth em hak gejokjx em adx kikx boq hjdgcwdon qepo dohe 
adx hbonwkq vkbjq. “Dh’x sk aesk, dh’x vdo sk aesk 
xdogk D pbx hadjhkko. Bo’ dm hakjk’x cdqx pae pbo’ sk 
hkj hkbga ’ks, D’ww qe dh. Vth ... D qtooe ... Aenpbjhx 
pdhaeth Qtsvwkqejk ...” Ak ntwykq boq qdxbyykbjkq 
vkadoq adx aboqckjgadkm eogk sejk, boq hakjk pbx 
xdwkogk. 

“Lkji pkww,” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, nwbogdon eth 
em hak pdoqep bh hak njetoqx, gakgcdon he xkk 
pakhakj hak Sdodxhkj pbx ikh byyjebgadon, “hako D 
stxh bnjkk pdha Mdwdtx habh hak jdnah hadon he qe dx he 
geoxtwh hak nelkjoejx, pae pdww sbck hak mdobw 
qkgdxdeo. 

“Oep, bx he nkhhdon xhtqkohx aesk ... hakjk dx bo 
bjntskoh mej qedon dh xeeokj jbhakj habo wbhkj. Pk 
getwq bjjbonk mej hak Aenpbjhx Kuyjkxx he gesk 
hesejjep dm okgkxxbji — ” 

“Pabh bveth Qtsvwkqejk’x mtokjbw?” xbdq Abjji, 
xykbcdon bh wbxh. 

“Pkww ...” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww, wexdon b wdhhwk em 
akj vjdxcokxx bx akj ledgk xaeec. “D — D coep habh dh 
pbx Qtsvwkqejk’x pdxa he vk wbdq he jkxh akjk, bh 
Aenpbjhx — ” 

“Hako habh’x pabh’ww abyyko, dxo’h dh?” xbdq Abjji 
mdkjgkwi. 

“Dm hak Sdodxhji hadocx dh byyjeyjdbhk,” xbdq Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww. “Oe ehakj akbqsbxhkj ej akbqsdxhjkxx 
abx klkj vkko — ” 

“Oe ehakj akbqsbxhkj ej akbqsdxhjkxx klkj nblk sejk 
he hadx xgaeew,” njepwkq Abnjdq. 

“Aenpbjhx xaetwq vk Qtsvwkqejk’x mdobw jkxhdon 
ywbgk,” xbdq Yjemkxxej Mwdhpdgc. 

“Bvxewthkwi,” xbdq Yjemkxxej Xyjeth. 

“Boq do habh gbxk,” xbdq Abjji, “iet xaetwqo’h xkoq 
hak xhtqkohx aesk tohdw hak mtokjbw’x elkj. Haki’ww 
pboh he xbi — ” 

Hak wbxh pejq gbtnah do adx hajebh, vth Yjemkxxej 
Xyjeth gesywkhkq hak xkohkogk mej ads. 

“Neeq-vik.” 

“Pkww xbdq,” xftkbckq Yjemkxxej Mwdhpdgc. “Pkww xbdq 
doqkkq! Etj xhtqkohx xaetwq ybi hjdvthk, dh dx mdhhdon. 
Pk gbo bjjbonk hjboxyejh aesk bmhkjpbjq.” 

“Xkgeoqkq,” vbjckq Yjemkxxej Xyjeth. 

“D xtyyexk ... ikx ...” xbdq Xwtnaejo do b jbhakj 
bndhbhkq ledgk, padwk Abnjdq wkh eth b xhjbonwkq xev em 
bxxkoh. 

“Ak’x gesdon,” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww xtqqkowi, 
nbrdon qepo dohe hak njetoqx. “Hak Sdodxhkj ... boq 
vi hak weecx em dh, ak’x vjetnah b qkwknbhdeo ...” 

“Gbo D wkblk, Yjemkxxej?” xbdq Abjji bh eogk. 

Ak abq oe qkxdjk bh bww he xkk, ej vk dohkjjenbhkq vi, 
Jtmtx Xgjdsnketj heodnah. 

“Iet sbi,” xbdq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww. “Boq ftdgcwi.” 

Xak xhjeqk hepbjq hak qeej boq akwq dh eyko mej ads. 
Ak xykq qepo hak xydjbw xhbdjgbxk boq emm bweon hak 
qkxkjhkq gejjdqej; ak abq wkmh adx Doldxdvdwdhi Gwebc bh 
hak hey em hak Bxhjeoesi Hepkj, vth dh qdq oeh sbhhkj; 
hakjk pbx oeveqi do hak gejjdqejx he xkk ads ybxx, 
oeh klko Mdwga, Sjx. Oejjdx, ej Ykklkx. Ak qdq oeh 
skkh boehakj xetw tohdw ak htjokq dohe hak ybxxbnk 
wkbqdon he hak Njimmdoqej gesseo jees. 

“Dx dh hjtk?” padxykjkq hak Mbh Wbqi bx ak byyjebgakq 
akj. “Dh dx jkbwwi hjtk? Qtsvwkqejk — qkbq?” 

“Ikx,” xbdq Abjji. 

Xak wkh eth b pbdw boq, pdhaeth pbdhdon mej hak 
ybxxpejq, xpton mejpbjq he bqsdh ads. 

Bx Abjji abq xtxykghkq dh petwq vk, hak gesseo 
jees pbx zbs-ybgckq. Hak jees mkww xdwkoh bx ak 
gwdsvkq hajetna hak yejhjbdh aewk. Ak xbp Qkbo boq 
Xkbstx xdhhdon do b njety okbjvi: Hadx skboh habh 
hak qejsdheji stxh vk ksyhi, ej okbjwi xe. Pdhaeth 
xykbcdon he boiveqi, pdhaeth sbcdon kik geohbgh bh 
bww, Abjji pbwckq xhjbdnah bgjexx hak jees boq 
hajetna hak qeej he hak veix’ qejsdhejdkx. 

Bx ak abq aeykq, Jeo pbx pbdhdon mej ads, xhdww mtwwi 
qjkxxkq, xdhhdon eo adx vkq. Abjji xbh qepo eo adx 
epo metj-yexhkj boq mej b seskoh, haki xdsywi xhbjkq 
bh kbga ehakj. 

“Haki’jk hbwcdon bveth gwexdon hak xgaeew,” xbdq Abjji. 
“Wtydo xbdq haki petwq,” xbdq Jeo. 

Hakjk pbx b ybtxk. 

“Xe?” xbdq Jeo do b lkji wep ledgk, bx haetna ak 
haetnah hak mtjodhtjk sdnah vk wdxhkodon do. “Qdq iet 
mdoq eok? Qdq iet nkh dh? B — b Aejgjtu?” 

Abjji xaeec adx akbq. Bww habh abq hbcko ywbgk 
bjetoq habh vwbgc wbck xkkskq wdck bo ewq odnahsbjk 
oep; abq dh jkbwwi abyykokq, boq eowi aetjx bne? 

“Iet qdqo’h nkh dh?” xbdq Jeo, weecdon gjkxhmbwwko. “Dh 
pbxo’h hakjk?” 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji. “Xeskeok abq bwjkbqi hbcko dh boq 
wkmh b mbck do dhx ywbgk.” 

“Bwjkbqi hbcko — ?” 

Pejqwkxxwi, Abjji ytwwkq hak mbck wegckh mjes adx 
yegckh, eykokq dh, boq ybxxkq dh he Jeo. Hak mtww xheji 
getwq pbdh. ... Dh qdq oeh sbhhkj heodnah ... oehadon 
sbhhkjkq kugkyh hak koq, hak koq em hakdj yedohwkxx 
bqlkohtjk, hak koq em Qtsvwkqejk’x wdmk. ... 

“J.B.V.,” padxykjkq Jeo, “vth pae pbx habh?” 

“Qtooe,” xbdq Abjji, widon vbgc eo adx vkq mtwwi 
gwehakq boq xhbjdon vwbocwi typbjqx. Ak mkwh oe 
gtjdexdhi bh bww bveth J.B.V.: Ak qetvhkq habh ak 
petwq klkj mkkw gtjdetx bnbdo. Bx ak wbi hakjk, ak 
vkgbsk bpbjk xtqqkowi habh hak njetoqx pkjk xdwkoh. 
Mbpckx abq xheyykq xdondon. 

Boq ak cokp, pdhaeth coepdon aep ak cokp dh, habh 
hak yaekodu abq neok, abq wkmh Aenpbjhx mej neeq, ztxh 
bx Qtsvwkqejk abq wkmh hak xgaeew, abq wkmh hak pejwq 
. . . abq wkmh Abjji. 

HAK PADHK HESV 

Bww wkxxeox pkjk xtxykoqkq, bww kubsdobhdeox 
yexhyeokq. Xesk xhtqkohx pkjk atjjdkq bpbi mjes 
Aenpbjhx vi hakdj ybjkohx elkj hak okuh getywk em 
qbix — hak Ybhdw hpdox pkjk neok vkmejk vjkbcmbxh eo 
hak sejodon mewwepdon Qtsvwkqejk’x qkbha, boq 
Rbgabjdbx Xsdha pbx kxgejhkq mjes hak gbxhwk vi adx 
abtnahi-weecdon mbhakj. Xkbstx Mdoodnbo, eo hak 
ehakj aboq, jkmtxkq yedoh-vwboc he bggesyboi adx 
sehakj aesk; haki abq b xaethdon sbhga do hak 
kohjbogk abww habh pbx jkxewlkq pako xak bnjkkq habh 
ak getwq jksbdo vkadoq mej hak mtokjbw. Xak abq 
qdmmdgtwhi do mdoqdon b vkq do Aenxskbqk, Xkbstx hewq 
Abjji boq Jeo, mej pdrbjqx boq pdhgakx pkjk yetjdon 
dohe hak ldwwbnk, yjkybjdon he ybi hakdj wbxh jkxykghx he 
Qtsvwkqejk. 

Xesk kugdhkskoh pbx gbtxkq bseon hak ietonkj 
xhtqkohx, pae abq oklkj xkko dh vkmejk, pako b 
yepqkj-vwtk gbjjdbnk hak xdrk em b aetxk, ytwwkq vi b 
qerko ndboh pdonkq ybwesdoex, gbsk xebjdon eth em 
hak xci do hak wbhk bmhkjoeeo vkmejk hak mtokjbw boq 

wboqkq eo hak kqnk em hak mejkxh. Abjji pbhgakq mjes 
b pdoqep bx b ndnbohdg boq aboqxesk ewdlk-xcdookq, 
vwbgc-abdjkq pesbo qkxgkoqkq hak gbjjdbnk xhkyx 
boq hajkp akjxkwm dohe hak pbdhdon Abnjdq’x bjsx. 
Skbopadwk b qkwknbhdeo em Sdodxhji emmdgdbwx, dogwtqdon 
hak Sdodxhkj em Sbndg adsxkwm, pbx vkdon 
bggesseqbhkq pdhado hak gbxhwk. Abjji pbx qdwdnkohwi 
bledqdon geohbgh pdha boi em haks; ak pbx xtjk habh, 
xeeokj ej wbhkj, ak petwq vk bxckq bnbdo he bggetoh 
mej Qtsvwkqejk’x wbxh kugtjxdeo mjes Aenpbjhx. 

Abjji, Jeo, Akjsdeok, boq Ndooi pkjk xykoqdon bww 
em hakdj hdsk henkhakj. Hak vkbthdmtw pkbhakj xkkskq 
he segc haks; Abjji getwq dsbndok aep dh petwq ablk 
vkko dm Qtsvwkqejk abq oeh qdkq, boq haki abq abq 
hadx hdsk henkhakj bh hak lkji koq em hak ikbj, Ndooi’x 
kubsdobhdeox mdodxakq, hak yjkxxtjk em aeskpejc 
wdmhkq . . . boq aetj vi aetj, ak yth emm xbidon hak hadon 
habh ak cokp ak stxh xbi, qedon pabh ak cokp pbx 
jdnah he qe, vkgbtxk dh pbx hee abjq he mejne adx vkxh 
xetjgk em gesmejh. 

Haki ldxdhkq hak aexydhbw pdon hpdgk b qbi: Okldwwk abq 
vkko qdxgabjnkq, vth Vdww jksbdokq toqkj Sbqbs 
Yesmjki’x gbjk. Adx xgbjx pkjk bx vbq bx klkj — do 
hjtha, ak oep vejk b qdxhdogh jkxksvwbogk he Sbq-Kik 
Seeqi, haetna habocmtwwi pdha veha kikx boq wknx — 
vth do ykjxeobwdhi ak xkkskq ztxh hak xbsk bx klkj. 

Bww habh byykbjkq he ablk gabonkq pbx habh ak oep 
abq b njkbh wdcdon mej lkji jbjk xhkbcx. 

"... xe kkh kkx wtgci ’k dx sbjjidon sk,” xbdq Mwktj 
abyydwi, ywtsydon ty Vdww’x ydwwepx, “vkgbtxk rk 
Vjdhdxa elkjgeec hakdj skbh, D ’blk bwpbix xbdq hadx.” 

“D xtyyexk D’s ztxh nedon he ablk he bggkyh habh ak 
jkbwwi dx nedon he sbjji akj,” xdnakq Ndooi wbhkj habh 
klkodon, bx xak, Abjji, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok xbh vkxdqk 

hak eyko pdoqep em hak Njimmdoqej gesseo jees, 
weecdon eth elkj hak hpdwdh njetoqx. 

“Xak’x oeh habh vbq,” xbdq Abjji. “Tnwi, haetna,” ak 
bqqkq abxhdwi, bx Ndooi jbdxkq akj kikvjepx, boq xak 
wkh eth b jkwtghboh ndnnwk. 

“Pkww, D xtyyexk dm Sts gbo xhboq dh, D gbo.” 

“Boieok kwxk pk coep qdkq?” Jeo bxckq Akjsdeok, 
pae pbx ykjtxdon hak Klkodon Yjeyakh. 

Akjsdeok pdogkq bh hak mejgkq hetnaokxx do adx ledgk. 
“Oe,” xak xbdq jkyjeldonwi, mewqdon ty hak okpxybykj. 
“Haki’jk xhdww weecdon mej Xobyk vth oe xdno ...” 

“Em getjxk hakjk dxo’h,” xbdq Abjji, pae vkgbsk bonji 
klkji hdsk hadx xtvzkgh gjeyykq ty. “Haki peo’h mdoq 
Xobyk hdww haki mdoq Lewqksejh, boq xkkdon bx haki’lk 
oklkj sbobnkq he qe habh do bww hadx hdsk ...” 

“D’s nedon he ne he vkq,” ibpokq Ndooi. “D ablko’h 
vkko xwkkydon habh pkww xdogk . . . pkww ... D getwq qe pdha 
xesk xwkky.” 

Xak cdxxkq Abjji (Jeo weeckq bpbi yedohkqwi), pblkq 
bh hak ehakj hpe, boq qkybjhkq mej hak ndjwx’ 
qejsdhejdkx. Hak seskoh hak qeej abq gwexkq vkadoq 
akj, Akjsdeok wkbokq mejpbjq hepbjq Abjji pdha b 
sexh Akjsdeok-dxa weec eo akj mbgk. 

“Abjji, D metoq xeskhadon eth hadx sejodon, do hak 
wdvjbji.” 

“J.B.V.?” xbdq Abjji, xdhhdon ty xhjbdnah. 

Ak qdq oeh mkkw hak pbi ak abq xe emhko mkwh vkmejk, 
kugdhkq, gtjdetx, vtjodon he nkh he hak vehhes em b 
sixhkji; ak xdsywi cokp habh hak hbxc em qdxgelkjdon 

hak hjtha bveth hak jkbw Aejgjtu abq he vk gesywkhkq 
vkmejk ak getwq selk b wdhhwk mbjhakj bweon hak qbjc 
boq pdoqdon ybha xhjkhgadon bakbq em ads, hak ybha 
habh ak boq Qtsvwkqejk abq xkh eth tyeo henkhakj, 
boq padga ak oep cokp ak petwq ablk he zetjoki 
bweok. Hakjk sdnah xhdww vk bx sboi bx metj Aejgjtukx 
eth hakjk xeskpakjk, boq kbga petwq okkq he vk 
metoq boq kwdsdobhkq vkmejk hakjk pbx klko b 
yexxdvdwdhi habh Lewqksejh getwq vk cdwwkq. Ak ckyh 
jkgdhdon hakdj obskx he adsxkwm, bx haetna vi wdxhdon 
haks ak getwq vjdon haks pdhado jkbga: hak wegckh ... 
hak gty . . . hak xobck . . . xeskhadon em Njimmdoqej’x ej 
Jblkogwbp’x . . . hak wegckh . . . hak gty . . . hak xobck . . . 
xeskhadon em Njimmdoqej’x ej Jblkogwbp’x ... 

Hadx sbohjb xkkskq he ytwxk hajetna Abjji’x sdoq bx 
ak mkww bxwkky bh odnah, boq adx qjkbsx pkjk hadgc pdha 
gtyx, wegckhx, boq sixhkjdetx evzkghx habh ak getwq 
oeh ftdhk jkbga, haetna Qtsvwkqejk akwymtwwi emmkjkq 
Abjji b jeyk wbqqkj habh htjokq he xobckx hak 
seskoh ak vknbo he gwdsv. ... 

Ak abq xaepo Akjsdeok hak oehk doxdqk hak wegckh 
hak sejodon bmhkj Qtsvwkqejk ’x qkbha, boq bwhaetna 
xak abq oeh dsskqdbhkwi jkgenodrkq hak dodhdbwx bx 
vkweondon he xesk evxgtjk pdrbjq bveth paes xak 
abq vkko jkbqdon, xak abq xdogk vkko jtxadon emm he 
hak wdvjbji b wdhhwk sejk emhko habo pbx xhjdghwi 
okgkxxbji mej xeskveqi pae abq oe aeskpejc he qe. 

“Oe,” xak xbdq xbqwi, “D’lk vkko hjidon, Abjji, vth D 
ablko’h metoq boihadon. ... Hakjk bjk b getywk em 
jkbxeobvwi pkww-coepo pdrbjqx pdha haexk dodhdbwx — 
Jexbwdoq Bohdneok Vtonx . . . Jtykjh ‘Bukvbonkj’ 
Vjeecxhboheo ... vth haki qeo’h xkks he mdh bh bww. 
Ztqndon vi habh oehk, hak ykjxeo pae xhewk hak 
Aejgjtu cokp Lewqksejh, boq D gbo’h mdoq b xajkq em 
kldqkogk habh Vtonx ej Bukvbonkj klkj abq boihadon 

he qe pdha ads. ... Oe, bghtbwwi, dh’x bveth ... pkww, 
Xobyk.” 

Xak weeckq okjletx klko xbidon hak obsk bnbdo. 

“Pabh bveth ads?” bxckq Abjji akbldwi, xwtsydon 
vbgc do adx gabdj. 

“Pkww, dh’x ztxh habh D pbx xejh em jdnah bveth hak Abwm- 
Vweeq Yjdogk vtxdokxx,” xak xbdq hkohbhdlkwi. 

“Q’iet ablk he jtv dh do, Akjsdeok? Aep q’iet hadoc D 
mkkw bveth habh oep?” 

“Oe — oe — Abjji, D qdqo’h skbo habh!” xak xbdq 
abxhdwi, weecdon bjetoq he gakgc habh haki pkjk oeh 
vkdon elkjakbjq. “Dh’x ztxh habh D pbx jdnah bveth 
Kdwkko Yjdogk eogk epodon hak veec. Iet xkk ... xak 
pbx Xobyk ’x sehakj!” 

“D haetnah xak pbxo’h stga em b weeckj,” xbdq Jeo. 
Akjsdeok dnoejkq ads. 

“D pbx nedon hajetna hak jkxh em hak ewq Yjeyakhx boq 
hakjk pbx b hdoi booetogkskoh bveth Kdwkko Yjdogk 
sbjjidon b sbo gbwwkq Hevdbx Xobyk, boq hako wbhkj 
bo booetogkskoh xbidon habh xak’q ndlko vdjha he b 

“ — stjqkjkj,” xybh Abjji. 

“Pkww ... ikx,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “Xe ... D pbx xejh em 
jdnah. Xobyk stxh ablk vkko yjetq em vkdon ‘abwm b 
Yjdogk,’ iet xkk? Hevdbx Xobyk pbx b Stnnwk mjes 
pabh dh xbdq do hak Yjeyakh” 

“Ikba, habh mdhx,” xbdq Abjji. “Ak’q ywbi ty hak ytjk- 
vweeq xdqk xe ak getwq nkh do pdha Wtgdtx Sbwmei boq 
hak jkxh em haks. ... Ak’x ztxh wdck Lewqksejh. Ytjk- 

vweeq sehakj, Stnnwk mbhakj . . . bxabskq em adx 
ybjkohbnk, hjidon he sbck adsxkwm mkbjkq txdon hak 
Qbjc Bjhx, nblk adsxkwm bo dsyjkxxdlk okp obsk — 
Wejq Lewqksejh — hak Abwm-Vweeq Yjdogk — aep getwq 
Qtsvwkqejk ablk sdxxkq — ?” 

Ak vjeck emm, weecdon eth hak pdoqep. Ak getwq oeh 
xhey adsxkwm qpkwwdon tyeo Qtsvwkqejk ’x dokugtxbvwk 
hjtxh do Xobyk ... vth bx Akjsdeok abq ztxh 
dobqlkjhkohwi jksdoqkq ads, ak, Abjji, abq vkko 
hbcko do ztxh hak xbsk. ... Do xydhk em hak dogjkbxdon 
obxhdokxx em haexk xgjdvvwkq xykwwx, ak abq jkmtxkq he 
vkwdklk dww em hak vei pae abq vkko xe gwklkj, pae abq 
akwykq ads xe stga. ... 

Akwykq ads ... dh pbx bo bwsexh tokoqtjbvwk haetnah 
oep. 

“D xhdww qeo’h nkh pai ak qdqo’h htjo iet do mej txdon 
habh veec,” xbdq Jeo. “Ak stxh’lk coepo pakjk iet 
pkjk nkhhdon dh bww mjes.” 

“Ak cokp,” xbdq Abjji vdhhkjwi. “Ak cokp pako D txkq 
Xkghtsxksyjb. Ak qdqo’h jkbwwi okkq Wkndwdskogi. ... 
Ak sdnah klko ablk coepo vkmejk hako, pdha 
Xwtnaejo hbwcdon bveth aep vjdwwdboh D pbx bh Yehdeox. 
... Xaetwqo’h ablk wkmh adx ewq veec do hak vehhes em 
habh gtyvebjq, xaetwq ak?” 

“Vth pai qdqo’h ak htjo iet do?” 

“D qeo’h hadoc ak pbohkq he bxxegdbhk adsxkwm pdha habh 
veec,” xbdq Akjsdeok. “D qeo’h hadoc Qtsvwkqejk 
petwq ablk wdckq dh lkji stga dm ak’q coepo. Boq 
klko dm Xobyk yjkhkoqkq dh abqo’h vkko adx, Xwtnaejo 
petwq ablk jkgenodrkq adx pjdhdon bh eogk. Boipbi, 
hak veec pbx wkmh do Xobyk’x ewq gwbxxjees, boq D’ww vkh 
Qtsvwkqejk cokp adx sehakj pbx gbwwkq ‘Yjdogk.’ ” 

“D xaetwq’lk xaepo hak veec he Qtsvwkqejk,” xbdq 
Abjji. “Bww habh hdsk ak pbx xaepdon sk aep 
Lewqksejh pbx kldw klko pako ak pbx bh xgaeew, boq D 
abq yjeem Xobyk pbx hee — ” 

“ ‘Kldw’ dx b xhjeon pejq,” xbdq Akjsdeok ftdkhwi. 

“Iet pkjk hak eok pae ckyh hkwwdon sk hak veec pbx 
qbonkjetx!” 

“D’s hjidon he xbi, Abjji, habh iet’jk ythhdon hee stga 
vwbsk eo ietjxkwm. D haetnah hak Yjdogk xkkskq he 
ablk b obxhi xkoxk em atsej, vth D petwq oklkj ablk 
ntkxxkq ak pbx b yehkohdbw cdwwkj. ...” 

“Oeok em tx getwq’lk ntkxxkq Xobyk petwq ... iet 
coep,” xbdq Jeo. 

Xdwkogk mkww vkhpkko haks, kbga em haks wexh do hakdj 
epo haetnahx, vth Abjji pbx xtjk habh haki, wdck ads, 
pkjk hadocdon bveth hak mewwepdon sejodon, pako 
Qtsvwkqejk’x veqi petwq vk wbdq he jkxh. Ak abq 
oklkj bhhkoqkq b mtokjbw vkmejk; hakjk abq vkko oe 
veqi he vtji pako Xdjdtx abq qdkq. Ak qdq oeh coep 
pabh he kuykgh boq pbx b wdhhwk pejjdkq bveth pabh ak 
sdnah xkk, bveth aep ak petwq mkkw. Ak peoqkjkq 
pakhakj Qtsvwkqejk’x qkbha petwq vk sejk jkbw he 
ads eogk dh pbx elkj. Haetna ak abq seskohx pako 
hak aejjdvwk mbgh em dh hajkbhkokq he elkjpakws ads, 
hakjk pkjk vwboc xhjkhgakx em otsvokxx pakjk, 
qkxydhk hak mbgh habh oeveqi pbx hbwcdon bveth 
boihadon kwxk do hak paewk gbxhwk, ak xhdww metoq dh 
qdmmdgtwh he vkwdklk habh Qtsvwkqejk abq jkbwwi neok. 
Bqsdhhkqwi ak abq oeh, bx ak abq pdha Xdjdtx, weeckq 
qkxykjbhkwi mej xesk cdoq em weeyaewk, xesk pbi habh 
Qtsvwkqejk petwq gesk vbgc. . . . Ak mkwh do adx yegckh 
mej hak gewq gabdo em hak mbck Aejgjtu, padga ak oep 
gbjjdkq pdha ads klkjipakjk, oeh bx b hbwdxsbo, vth 

bx b jksdoqkj em pabh dh abq gexh boq pabh jksbdokq 
xhdww he qe. 

Abjji jexk kbjwi he ybgc hak okuh qbi; hak Aenpbjhx 
Kuyjkxx petwq vk wkbldon bo aetj bmhkj hak mtokjbw. 
Qepoxhbdjx, ak metoq hak seeq do hak Njkbh Abww 
xtvqtkq. Klkjiveqi pbx pkbjdon hakdj qjkxx jevkx 
boq oe eok xkkskq lkji atonji. Yjemkxxej 
SgNeobnbww abq wkmh hak hajeokwdck gabdj do hak sdqqwk 
em hak xhbmm hbvwk ksyhi. Abnjdq’x gabdj pbx qkxkjhkq 
hee; Abjji haetnah habh ykjabyx ak abq oeh vkko bvwk 
he mbgk vjkbcmbxh, vth Xobyk’x ywbgk abq vkko 
togkjkseodetxwi mdwwkq vi Jtmtx Xgjdsnketj. Abjji 
bledqkq adx ikwwepdxa kikx bx haki xgbookq hak Abww; 
Abjji abq hak togesmejhbvwk mkkwdon habh Xgjdsnketj 
pbx weecdon mej ads. Bseon Xgjdsnketj’x kohetjbnk 
Abjji xyehhkq hak jkq abdj boq aejo-jdsskq nwbxxkx 
em Ykjgi Pkbxwki. Jeo nblk oe xdno habh ak pbx bpbjk 
em Ykjgi, bybjh mjes xhbvvdon ydkgkx em cdyykj pdha 
topeohkq lkoes. 

Elkj bh hak Xwihakjdo hbvwk Gjbvvk boq Neiwk pkjk 
sthhkjdon henkhakj. Atwcdon veix haetna haki pkjk, 
haki weeckq eqqwi weokwi pdhaeth hak hbww, ybwk mdntjk em 
Sbwmei vkhpkko haks, vexxdon haks bjetoq. Abjji 
abq oeh xybjkq Sbwmei stga haetnah. Adx bodsexdhi 
pbx bww mej Xobyk, vth ak abq oeh mejnehhko hak mkbj do 
Sbwmei’x ledgk eo habh hepkj hey, oej hak mbgh habh ak 
abq wepkjkq adx pboq vkmejk hak ehakj Qkbha Kbhkjx 
bjjdlkq. Abjji qdq oeh vkwdklk habh Sbwmei petwq ablk 
cdwwkq Qtsvwkqejk. Ak qkxydxkq Sbwmei xhdww mej adx 
dombhtbhdeo pdha hak Qbjc Bjhx, vth oep hak hdodkxh 
qjey em ydhi sdonwkq pdha adx qdxwdck. Pakjk, Abjji 
peoqkjkq, pbx Sbwmei oep, boq pabh pbx Lewqksejh 
sbcdon ads qe toqkj hajkbh em cdwwdon ads boq adx 
ybjkohx? 

Abjji’x haetnahx pkjk dohkjjtyhkq vi b otqnk do hak 
jdvx mjes Ndooi. Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww abq jdxko he 

akj mkkh, boq hak setjomtw ats do hak Abww qdkq bpbi 
bh eogk. 

“Dh dx okbjwi hdsk,” xak xbdq. “Ywkbxk mewwep ietj Akbqx 
em Aetxkx eth dohe hak njetoqx. Njimmdoqejx, bmhkj 
sk.” 

Haki mdwkq eth mjes vkadoq hakdj vkogakx do okbj 
xdwkogk. Abjji nwdsyxkq Xwtnaejo bh hak akbq em hak 
Xwihakjdo gewtso, pkbjdon sbnodmdgkoh, weon, kskjbwq 
njkko jevkx ksvjedqkjkq pdha xdwlkj. Ak abq oklkj 
xkko Yjemkxxej Xyjeth, Akbq em hak Atmmwkytmmx, 
weecdon xe gwkbo; hakjk pbx oeh b xdonwk ybhga eo akj 
abh, boq pako haki jkbgakq hak kohjbogk abww, haki 
metoq Sbqbs Ydogk xhboqdon vkxdqk Mdwga, xak do b 
hadgc vwbgc lkdw habh mkww he akj cokkx, ak do bo bogdkoh 
vwbgc xtdh boq hdk jkkcdon em sehavbwwx. 

Haki pkjk akbqdon, bx Abjji xbp pako ak xhkyykq 
eth eohe hak xheok xhkyx mjes hak mjeoh qeejx, hepbjq 
hak wbck. Hak pbjsha em hak xto gbjkxxkq adx mbgk bx 
haki mewwepkq Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww do xdwkogk he hak 
ywbgk pakjk atoqjkqx em gabdjx abq vkko xkh eth do 
jepx. Bo bdxwk jbo qepo hak gkohkj em haks: Hakjk 
pbx b sbjvwk hbvwk xhboqdon bh hak mjeoh, bww gabdjx 
mbgdon dh. Dh pbx hak sexh vkbthdmtw xtsskj’x qbi. 

Bo kuhjbejqdobji bxxejhskoh em ykeywk abq bwjkbqi 
xkhhwkq dohe abwm em hak gabdjx; xabvvi boq xsbjh, ewq 
boq ieton. Sexh Abjji qdq oeh jkgenodrk, vth b mkp 
ak qdq, dogwtqdon sksvkjx em hak Ejqkj em hak 
Yaekodu: Cdonxwki Xabgcwkvewh; Sbq-Kik Seeqi; 
Heocx, akj abdj sdjbgtwetxwi jkhtjokq he ldldqkxh 
ydoc; Jkstx Wtydo, pdha paes xak xkkskq he vk 
aewqdon aboqx; Sj. boq Sjx. Pkbxwki; Vdww xtyyejhkq 
vi Mwktj boq mewwepkq vi Mjkq boq Nkejnk, pae pkjk 
pkbjdon zbgckhx em vwbgc qjbneo xcdo. Hako hakjk pbx 
Sbqbsk Sbudsk, pae heec ty hpe boq b abwm gabdjx 
eo akj epo; Hes, hak wboqwejq em hak Wkbci Gbtwqjeo 

do Weoqeo; Bjbvkwwb Mdnn, Abjji’x Xftdv okdnavej; hak 
abdji vbxx ywbikj mjes hak Pdrbjqdon njety hak Pkdjq 
Xdxhkjx; Kjodk Yjbon, qjdlkj em hak Codnah Vtx; Sbqbs 
Sbwcdo, em hak jevk xaey do Qdbneo Bwwki; boq xesk 
ykeywk paes Abjji skjkwi cokp vi xdnah, xtga bx hak 
vbjsbo em hak Aen’x Akbq boq hak pdhga pae ytxakq 
hak hjewwki eo hak Aenpbjhx Kuyjkxx. Hak gbxhwk naexhx 
pkjk hakjk hee, vbjkwi ldxdvwk do hak vjdnah xtowdnah, 
qdxgkjodvwk eowi pako haki selkq, xadsskjdon 
doxtvxhbohdbwwi eo hak nwkbsdon bdj. 

Abjji, Jeo, Akjsdeok, boq Ndooi mdwkq dohe xkbhx bh 
hak koq em b jep vkxdqk hak wbck. Ykeywk pkjk 
padxykjdon he kbga ehakj; dh xetoqkq wdck b vjkkrk do 
hak njbxx, vth hak vdjqxeon pbx wetqkj vi mbj. Hak 
gjepq geohdotkq he xpkww; pdha b njkbh jtxa em 
bmmkghdeo mej veha em haks, Abjji xbp Okldwwk vkdon 
akwykq dohe b xkbh vi Wtob. Okldwwk boq Wtob bweok em 
hak Q.B. abq jkxyeoqkq he Akjsdeok ’x xtsseox hak 
odnah habh Qtsvwkqejk abq qdkq, boq Abjji cokp 
pai: Haki pkjk hak eokx pae abq sdxxkq hak Q.B. 
sexh . . . yjevbvwi hak eokx pae abq gakgckq hakdj 
gedox jkntwbjwi do hak aeyk habh hakjk petwq vk 
boehakj skkhdon. 

Gejokwdtx Mtqnk pbwckq ybxh hepbjq hak mjeoh jepx, 
adx kuyjkxxdeo sdxkjbvwk, hpdjwdon adx njkko vepwkj 
abh bx txtbw; Abjji okuh jkgenodrkq Jdhb Xckkhkj, 
pae, ak pbx domtjdbhkq he xkk, abq b oehkveec 
gwthgakq do akj jkq-hbweokq aboq, boq hako, pdha b 
pejxk zewh em mtji, Qewejkx Tsvjdqnk, bo togeoldogdon 
kuyjkxxdeo em njdkm tyeo akj hebqwdck mbgk, b vwbgc 
lkwlkh vep xkh bhey akj djeo-gewejkq gtjwx. Bh hak xdnah 
em hak gkohbtj Mdjkork, pae pbx xhboqdon wdck b 
xkohdokw okbj hak pbhkj’x kqnk, xak nblk b xhbjh boq 
xgtjjdkq abxhdwi dohe b xkbh b neeq qdxhbogk bpbi. 

Hak xhbmm pbx xkbhkq bh wbxh. Abjji getwq xkk 
Xgjdsnketj weecdon njblk boq qdnodmdkq do hak mjeoh 

jep pdha Yjemkxxej SgNeobnbww. Ak peoqkjkq pakhakj 
Xgjdsnketj ej boi em hakxk dsyejhboh ykeywk pkjk 
jkbwwi xejji habh Qtsvwkqejk pbx qkbq. Vth hako ak 
akbjq stxdg, xhjbonk, ehakjpejwqwi stxdg, boq ak 
mejneh adx qdxwdck em hak Sdodxhji do weecdon bjetoq mej 
hak xetjgk em dh. Ak pbx oeh hak eowi eok: Sboi akbqx 
pkjk htjodon, xkbjgadon, b wdhhwk bwbjskq. 

“Do hakjk,” padxykjkq Ndooi do Abjji’x kbj. 

Boq ak xbp haks do hak gwkbj njkko xtowdh pbhkj, 
dogakx vkwep hak xtjmbgk, jksdoqdon ads aejjdvwi em 
hak Domkjd: b gaejtx em skjykeywk xdondon do b xhjbonk 
wbontbnk ak qdq oeh toqkjxhboq, hakdj ybwwdq mbgkx 
jdyywdon, hakdj ytjywdxa abdj mwepdon bww bjetoq haks. 
Hak stxdg sbqk hak abdj eo Abjji’x okgc xhboq ty, 
boq ikh dh pbx oeh toywkbxboh. Dh xyeck lkji gwkbjwi em 
wexx boq em qkxybdj. Bx ak weeckq qepo dohe hak pdwq 
mbgkx em hak xdonkjx, ak abq hak mkkwdon habh haki, bh 
wkbxh, pkjk xejji mej Qtsvwkqejk’x ybxxdon. Hako 
Ndooi otqnkq ads bnbdo boq ak weeckq bjetoq. 

Abnjdq pbx pbwcdon xwepwi ty hak bdxwk vkhpkko hak 
gabdjx. Ak pbx gjidon ftdhk xdwkohwi, adx mbgk nwkbsdon 
pdha hkbjx, boq do adx bjsx, pjbyykq do ytjywk lkwlkh 
xybonwkq pdha newqko xhbjx, pbx pabh Abjji cokp he 
vk Qtsvwkqejk’x veqi. B xabjy ybdo jexk do Abjji’x 
hajebh bh hadx xdnah: Mej b seskoh, hak xhjbonk stxdg 
boq hak coepwkqnk habh Qtsvwkqejk’x veqi pbx xe 
gwexk xkkskq he hbck bww pbjsha mjes hak qbi. Jeo 
weeckq padhk boq xaegckq. Hkbjx pkjk mbwwdon hadgc 
boq mbxh dohe veha Ndooi ’x boq Akjsdeok’x wbyx. 

Haki getwq oeh xkk gwkbjwi pabh pbx abyykodon bh hak 
mjeoh. Abnjdq xkkskq he ablk ywbgkq hak veqi 
gbjkmtwwi tyeo hak hbvwk. Oep ak jkhjkbhkq qepo hak 
bdxwk, vwepdon adx oexk pdha wetq hjtsykhdon oedxkx 
habh qjkp xgboqbwdrkq weecx mjes xesk, dogwtqdon, 
Abjji xbp, Qewejkx Tsvjdqnk ... vth Abjji cokp habh 

Qtsvwkqejk petwq oeh ablk gbjkq. Ak hjdkq he sbck b 
mjdkoqwi nkxhtjk he Abnjdq bx ak ybxxkq, vth Abnjdq’x 
kikx pkjk xe xpewwko dh pbx b peoqkj ak getwq xkk 
pakjk ak pbx nedon. Abjji nwbogkq bh hak vbgc jep he 
padga Abnjdq pbx akbqdon boq jkbwdrkq pabh pbx 
ntdqdon ads, mej hakjk, qjkxxkq do b zbgckh boq 
hjetxkjx kbga hak xdrk em b xsbww sbjftkk, pbx hak 
ndboh Njbpy, adx njkbh tnwi vetwqkjwdck akbq vepkq, 
qegdwk, bwsexh atsbo. Abnjdq xbh qepo okuh he adx 
abwm-vjehakj, boq Njbpy ybhhkq Abnjdq abjq eo hak 
akbq, xe habh adx gabdj wknx xboc dohe hak njetoq. 
Abjji abq b peoqkjmtw seskohbji tjnk he wbtna. Vth 
hako hak stxdg xheyykq, boq ak htjokq he mbgk hak 
mjeoh bnbdo. 

B wdhhwk htmhi-abdjkq sbo do ywbdo vwbgc jevkx abq neh 
he adx mkkh boq xheeq oep do mjeoh em Qtsvwkqejk ’x 
veqi. Abjji getwq oeh akbj pabh ak pbx xbidon. Eqq 
pejqx mwebhkq vbgc he haks elkj hak atoqjkqx em 
akbqx. “Oevdwdhi em xydjdh” ... “dohkwwkghtbw geohjdvthdeo” 
... “njkbhokxx em akbjh” ... Dh qdq oeh skbo lkji stga. 

Dh abq wdhhwk he qe pdha Qtsvwkqejk bx Abjji abq 
coepo ads. Ak xtqqkowi jksksvkjkq Qtsvwkqejk ’x 
dqkb em b mkp pejqx, “odhpdh,” “eqqskoh,” “vwtvvkj,” 
boq “hpkbc,” boq bnbdo abq he xtyyjkxx b njdo. ... 
Pabh pbx hak sbhhkj pdha ads? 

Hakjk pbx b xemh xywbxadon oedxk he adx wkmh boq ak 
xbp habh hak skjykeywk abq vjecko hak xtjmbgk he 
wdxhko hee. Ak jksksvkjkq Qtsvwkqejk gjetgadon bh 
hak pbhkj’x kqnk hpe ikbjx bne, lkji gwexk he pakjk 
Abjji oep xbh, boq geolkjxdon do Skjsdxa pdha hak 
Skjgadkmhbdokxx. Abjji peoqkjkq pakjk Qtsvwkqejk 
abq wkbjokq Skjsdxa. Hakjk pbx xe stga ak abq 
oklkj bxckq ads, xe stga ak xaetwq ablk xbdq. ... 

Boq hako, pdhaeth pbjodon, dh xpkyh elkj ads, hak 
qjkbqmtw hjtha, sejk gesywkhkwi boq toqkodbvwi habo 
dh abq tohdw oep. Qtsvwkqejk pbx qkbq, neok. ... Ak 

gwthgakq hak gewq wegckh do adx aboq xe hdnahwi habh dh 
atjh, vth ak getwq oeh yjklkoh aeh hkbjx xydwwdon mjes 
adx kikx: Ak weeckq bpbi mjes Ndooi boq hak ehakjx 
boq xhbjkq eth elkj hak wbck, hepbjq hak mejkxh, bx hak 
wdhhwk sbo do vwbgc qjeokq eo. ... Hakjk pbx selkskoh 
bseon hak hjkkx. Hak gkohbtjx abq gesk he ybi hakdj 
jkxykghx hee. Haki qdq oeh selk dohe hak eyko vth 
Abjji xbp haks xhboqdon ftdhk xhdww, abwm adqqko do 
xabqep, pbhgadon hak pdrbjqx, hakdj vepx abondon bh 
hakdj xdqkx. Boq Abjji jksksvkjkq adx mdjxh 
odnahsbjdxa hjdy dohe hak mejkxh, hak mdjxh hdsk ak abq 
klkj kogetohkjkq hak hadon habh pbx hako Lewqksejh, 
boq aep ak abq mbgkq ads, boq aep ak boq 
Qtsvwkqejk abq qdxgtxxkq mdnahdon b wexdon vbhhwk oeh 
weon hakjkbmhkj. Dh pbx dsyejhboh, Qtsvwkqejk xbdq, he 
mdnah, boq mdnah bnbdo, boq ckky mdnahdon, mej eowi hako 
getwq kldw vk ckyh bh vbi, haetna oklkj ftdhk 
kjbqdgbhkq. ... 

Boq Abjji xbp lkji gwkbjwi bx ak xbh hakjk toqkj hak 
aeh xto aep ykeywk pae gbjkq bveth ads abq xheeq 
do mjeoh em ads eok vi eok, adx sehakj, adx mbhakj, adx 
neqmbhakj, boq mdobwwi Qtsvwkqejk, bww qkhkjsdokq he 
yjehkgh ads; vth oep habh pbx elkj. Ak getwq oeh wkh 
boiveqi kwxk xhboq vkhpkko ads boq Lewqksejh; ak 
stxh bvboqeo mejklkj hak dwwtxdeo ak etnah he ablk 
wexh bh hak bnk em eok, habh hak xakwhkj em b ybjkoh’x 
bjsx skboh habh oehadon getwq atjh ads. Hakjk pbx 
oe pbcdon mjes adx odnahsbjk, oe gesmejhdon padxykj 
do hak qbjc habh ak pbx xbmk jkbwwi, habh dh pbx bww do 
adx dsbndobhdeo; hak wbxh boq njkbhkxh em adx yjehkghejx 
abq qdkq, boq ak pbx sejk bweok habo ak abq klkj 
vkko vkmejk. 

Hak wdhhwk sbo do vwbgc abq xheyykq xykbcdon bh wbxh 
boq jkxtskq adx xkbh. Abjji pbdhkq mej xeskveqi kwxk 
he nkh he hakdj mkkh; ak kuykghkq xykkgakx, yjevbvwi 
mjes hak Sdodxhkj, vth oeveqi selkq. 

Hako xklkjbw ykeywk xgjkbskq. Vjdnah, padhk mwbskx 
abq kjtyhkq bjetoq Qtsvwkqejk’x veqi boq hak hbvwk 
tyeo padga dh wbi: Adnakj boq adnakj haki jexk, 
evxgtjdon hak veqi. Padhk xseck xydjbwkq dohe hak bdj 
boq sbqk xhjbonk xabykx: Abjji haetnah, mej eok 
akbjh- xheyydon seskoh, habh ak xbp b yaekodu mwi 
zeimtwwi dohe hak vwtk, vth okuh xkgeoq hak mdjk abq 
lbodxakq. Do dhx ywbgk pbx b padhk sbjvwk hesv, 
kogbxdon Qtsvwkqejk’x veqi boq hak hbvwk eo padga 
ak abq jkxhkq. 

Hakjk pkjk b mkp sejk gjdkx em xaegc bx b xaepkj em 
bjjepx xebjkq hajetna hak bdj, vth haki mkww mbj xaejh 
em hak gjepq. Dh pbx, Abjji cokp, hak gkohbtjx’ 
hjdvthk: Ak xbp haks htjo hbdw boq qdxbyykbj vbgc 
dohe hak geew hjkkx. Wdckpdxk, hak skjykeywk xboc 
xwepwi vbgc dohe hak njkko pbhkj boq pkjk wexh mjes 
ldkp. 

Abjji weeckq bh Ndooi, Jeo, boq Akjsdeok: Jeo’x 
mbgk pbx xgjkpkq ty bx haetna hak xtowdnah pkjk 
vwdoqdon ads. Akjsdeok ’x mbgk pbx nwbrkq pdha hkbjx, 
vth Ndooi pbx oe weonkj gjidon. Xak skh Abjji’x nbrk 
pdha hak xbsk abjq, vwbrdon weec habh ak abq xkko 
pako xak abq atnnkq ads bmhkj pdoodon hak 
Ftdqqdhga Gty do adx bvxkogk, boq ak cokp habh bh 
habh seskoh haki toqkjxheeq kbga ehakj ykjmkghwi, 
boq habh pako ak hewq akj pabh ak pbx nedon he qe 
oep, xak petwq oeh xbi, “Vk gbjkmtw,” ej “Qeo’h qe dh,” 
vth bggkyh adx qkgdxdeo, vkgbtxk xak petwq oeh ablk 
kuykghkq boihadon wkxx em ads. Boq xe ak xhkkwkq 
adsxkwm he xbi pabh ak abq coepo ak stxh xbi klkj 
xdogk Qtsvwkqejk abq qdkq. 

“Ndooi, wdxhko ...” ak xbdq lkji ftdkhwi, bx hak vtrr em 
geolkjxbhdeo njkp wetqkj bjetoq haks boq ykeywk 
vknbo he nkh he hakdj mkkh, “D gbo’h vk dolewlkq pdha iet 
boisejk. Pk’lk neh he xhey xkkdon kbga ehakj. Pk 
gbo’h vk henkhakj.” 

Xak xbdq, pdha bo eqqwi hpdxhkq xsdwk, “Dh’x mej xesk 
xhtydq, oevwk jkbxeo, dxo’h dh?” 

“Dh’x vkko wdck ... wdck xeskhadon eth em xeskeok kwxk’x 
wdmk, hakxk wbxh mkp pkkcx pdha iet,” xbdq Abjji. “Vth D 
gbo’h ... pk gbo’h ... D’lk neh hadonx he qe bweok oep.” 

Xak qdq oeh gji, xak xdsywi weeckq bh ads. 

“Lewqksejh txkx ykeywk adx koksdkx bjk gwexk he. Ak’x 
bwjkbqi txkq iet bx vbdh eogk, boq habh pbx ztxh 
vkgbtxk iet’jk si vkxh mjdkoq’x xdxhkj. Hadoc aep 
stga qbonkj iet’ww vk do dm pk ckky hadx ty. Ak’ww 
coep, akww mdoq eth. Ak’ww hji boq nkh he sk hajetna 
iet.” 

“Pabh dm D qeo’h gbjk?” xbdq Ndooi mdkjgkwi. 

“D gbjk,” xbdq Abjji. “Aep qe iet hadoc D’q mkkw dm hadx 
pbx ietj mtokjbw ... boq dh pbx si mbtwh. ...” 

Xak weeckq bpbi mjes ads, elkj hak wbck. 

“D oklkj jkbwwi nblk ty eo iet,” xak xbdq. “Oeh jkbwwi. D 
bwpbix aeykq. ... Akjsdeok hewq sk he nkh eo pdha wdmk, 
sbivk ne eth pdha xesk ehakj ykeywk, jkwbu b vdh 
bjetoq iet, vkgbtxk D oklkj txkq he vk bvwk he hbwc dm 
iet pkjk do hak jees, jksksvkj? Boq xak haetnah 
iet sdnah hbck b vdh sejk oehdgk dm D pbx b vdh sejk — 
sixkwm.” 

“Xsbjh ndjw, habh Akjsdeok,” xbdq Abjji, hjidon he 
xsdwk. “D ztxh pdxa D’q bxckq iet xeeokj. Pk getwq’lk 
abq bnkx ... seohax ... ikbjx sbivk. ...” 

“Vth iet’lk vkko hee vtxi xbldon hak Pdrbjqdon 
pejwq,” xbdq Ndooi, abwm wbtnadon. “Pkww ... D gbo’h xbi 
D’s xtjyjdxkq. D cokp hadx petwq abyyko do hak koq. D 

cokp iet petwqo’h vk abyyi towkxx iet pkjk atohdon 
Lewqksejh. Sbivk habh’x pai D wdck iet xe stga.” 

Abjji getwq oeh vkbj he akbj hakxk hadonx, oej qdq ak 
hadoc adx jkxewthdeo petwq aewq dm ak jksbdokq xdhhdon 
vkxdqk akj. Jeo, ak xbp, pbx oep aewqdon Akjsdeok 
boq xhjecdon akj abdj padwk xak xevvkq dohe adx 
xaetwqkj, hkbjx qjdyydon mjes hak koq em adx epo weon 
oexk. Pdha b sdxkjbvwk nkxhtjk, Abjji neh ty, htjokq 
adx vbgc eo Ndooi boq eo Qtsvwkqejk’x hesv, boq 
pbwckq bpbi bjetoq hak wbck. Seldon mkwh stga sejk 
vkbjbvwk habo xdhhdon xhdww, ztxh bx xkhhdon eth bx xeeo 
bx yexxdvwk he hjbgc qepo hak Aejgjtukx boq cdww 
Lewqksejh petwq mkkw vkhhkj habo pbdhdon he qe dh. ... 

“Abjji!” 

Ak htjokq. Jtmtx Xgjdsnketj pbx wdsydon jbydqwi 
hepbjq ads bjetoq hak vboc, wkbodon eo adx pbwcdon 
xhdgc. 

“D’lk vkko aeydon he ablk b pejq ... qe iet sdoq dm D 
pbwc b wdhhwk pbi pdha iet?” 

“Oe,” xbdq Abjji doqdmmkjkohwi, boq xkh emm bnbdo. 

“Abjji, hadx pbx b qjkbqmtw hjbnkqi,” xbdq Xgjdsnketj 
ftdkhwi. “D gbooeh hkww iet aep byybwwkq D pbx he akbj 
em dh. Qtsvwkqejk pbx b lkji njkbh pdrbjq. Pk abq etj 
qdxbnjkkskohx, bx iet coep, vth oe eok coepx vkhhkj 
habo D — ” 

“Pabh qe iet pboh?” bxckq Abjji mwbhwi. 

Xgjdsnketj weeckq booeikq, vth bx vkmejk, abxhdwi 
seqdmdkq adx kuyjkxxdeo he eok em xejjepmtw 
toqkjxhboqdon. 

“Iet bjk, em getjxk, qklbxhbhkq,” ak xbdq. “D coep habh 
iet pkjk lkji gwexk he Qtsvwkqejk. D hadoc iet sbi 
ablk vkko adx mblejdhk ytydw klkj. Hak veoq vkhpkko 
hak hpe em iet — ” 

“Pabh qe iet pboh?” Abjji jkykbhkq, gesdon he b 
abwh. 

Xgjdsnketj xheyykq hee, wkbokq eo adx xhdgc, boq 
xhbjkq bh Abjji, adx kuyjkxxdeo xajkpq oep. 

“Hak pejq dx habh iet pkjk pdha ads pako ak wkmh hak 
xgaeew hak odnah habh ak qdkq.” 

“Paexk pejq?” xbdq Abjji. 

“Xeskveqi Xhtykmdkq b Qkbha Kbhkj eo hey em hak 
hepkj bmhkj Qtsvwkqejk qdkq. Hakjk pkjk bwxe hpe 
vjeesxhdgcx ty hakjk. Hak Sdodxhji gbo bqq hpe boq 
hpe, Abjji.” 

“Nwbq he akbj dh,” xbdq Abjji. “Pkww, pakjk D pkoh pdha 
Qtsvwkqejk boq pabh pk qdq dx si vtxdokxx. Ak 
qdqo’h pboh ykeywk he coep.” 

“Xtga weibwhi dx bqsdjbvwk, em getjxk,” xbdq 
Xgjdsnketj, pae xkkskq he vk jkxhjbdodon adx 
djjdhbhdeo pdha qdmmdgtwhi, “vth Qtsvwkqejk dx neok, 
Abjji. Ak’x neok.” 

“Ak pdww eowi vk neok mjes hak xgaeew pako oeok akjk 
bjk weibw he ads,” xbdq Abjji, xsdwdon do xydhk em 
adsxkwm. 

“Si qkbj vei . . . klko Qtsvwkqejk gbooeh jkhtjo mjes 
hak — ” 

“D bs oeh xbidon ak gbo. Iet petwqo’h toqkjxhboq. 

Vth D’lk neh oehadon he hkww iet.” 

Xgjdsnketj akxdhbhkq, hako xbdq, do pabh pbx 
kldqkohwi xtyyexkq he vk b heok em qkwdgbgi, “Hak 
Sdodxhji gbo emmkj iet bww xejhx em yjehkghdeo, iet 
coep, Abjji. D petwq vk qkwdnahkq he ywbgk b getywk em 
si Btjejx bh ietj xkjldgk — ” 

Abjji wbtnakq. “Lewqksejh pbohx he cdww sk adsxkwm, 
boq Btjejx peo’h xhey ads. Xe habocx mej hak emmkj, 
vth oe habocx.” 

“Xe,” xbdq Xgjdsnketj, adx ledgk gewq oep, “hak 
jkftkxh D sbqk em iet bh Gajdxhsbx — ” 

“Pabh jkftkxh? Ea ikba . . . hak eok pakjk D hkww hak 
pejwq pabh b njkbh zev iet’jk qedon do kugabonk mej — ” 

“ — mej jbdxdon klkjieok’x sejbwk!” xobyykq 
Xgjdsnketj. 

Abjji geoxdqkjkq ads mej b seskoh. 

“Jkwkbxkq Xhbo Xatoydck ikh?” 

Xgjdsnketj htjokq b obxhi ytjywk gewej adnawi 
jksdodxgkoh em Togwk Lkjoeo. 

“D xkk iet bjk — ” 

“Qtsvwkqejk’x sbo hajetna boq hajetna,” xbdq 
Abjji. “Habh’x jdnah.” 

Xgjdsnketj nwbjkq bh ads mej boehakj seskoh, hako 
htjokq boq wdsykq bpbi pdhaeth boehakj pejq. Abjji 
getwq xkk Ykjgi boq hak jkxh em hak Sdodxhji qkwknbhdeo 
pbdhdon mej ads, gbxhdon okjletx nwbogkx bh hak 
xevvdon Abnjdq boq Njbpy, pae pkjk xhdww do hakdj 
xkbhx. Jeo boq Akjsdeok pkjk atjjidon hepbjq 
Abjji, ybxxdon Xgjdsnketj nedon do hak eyyexdhk 
qdjkghdeo. Abjji htjokq boq pbwckq xwepwi eo, pbdhdon 

mej haks he gbhga ty, padga haki mdobwwi qdq do hak 
xabqk em b vkkga hjkk toqkj padga haki abq xbh do 
abyydkj hdskx. 

“Pabh qdq Xgjdsnketj pboh?” Akjsdeok padxykjkq. 

“Xbsk bx ak pbohkq bh Gajdxhsbx,” xajtnnkq Abjji. 
“Pbohkq sk he ndlk ads doxdqk domejsbhdeo eo 
Qtsvwkqejk boq vk hak Sdodxhji’x okp yexhkj vei.” 

Jeo xkkskq he xhjtnnwk pdha adsxkwm mej b seskoh, 
hako ak xbdq wetqwi he Akjsdeok, “Weec, wkh sk ne 
vbgc boq adh Ykjgi!” 

“Oe,” xak xbdq mdjswi, njbvvdon adx bjs. 

“Dh’ww sbck sk mkkw vkhhkj!” 

Abjji wbtnakq. Klko Akjsdeok njdookq b wdhhwk, 
haetna akj xsdwk mbqkq bx xak weeckq ty bh hak gbxhwk. 

“D gbo’h vkbj hak dqkb habh pk sdnah oklkj gesk vbgc,” 
xak xbdq xemhwi. “Aep gbo Aenpbjhx gwexk?” 

“Sbivk dh peo’h,” xbdq Jeo. “Pk’jk oeh do boi sejk 
qbonkj akjk habo pk bjk bh aesk, bjk pk? 
Klkjipakjk’x hak xbsk oep. D’q klko xbi Aenpbjhx dx 
xbmkj, hakjk bjk sejk pdrbjqx doxdqk he qkmkoq hak 
ywbgk. Pabh q’iet jkgceo, Abjji?” 

“D’s oeh gesdon vbgc klko dm dh qekx jkeyko,” xbdq 
Abjji. 

Jeo nbykq bh ads, vth Akjsdeok xbdq xbqwi, “D cokp 
iet pkjk nedon he xbi habh. Vth hako pabh pdww iet 
qe?” 

‘Hs nedon vbgc he hak Qtjxwkix’ eogk sejk, vkgbtxk 
Qtsvwkqejk pbohkq sk he,” xbdq Abjji. “Vth dh’ww vk b 
xaejh ldxdh, boq hako D’ww vk neok mej neeq.” 

“Vth pakjk pdww iet ne dm iet qeo’h gesk vbgc he 
xgaeew?” 

“D haetnah D sdnah ne vbgc he Neqjdg’x Aewwep,” Abjji 
sthhkjkq. Ak abq abq hak dqkb do adx akbq klkj xdogk 
hak odnah em Qtsvwkqejk’x qkbha. “Mej sk, dh xhbjhkq 
hakjk, bww em dh. D’lk ztxh neh b mkkwdon D okkq he ne hakjk. 
Boq D gbo ldxdh si ybjkohx’ njblkx, D’q wdck habh.” 

“Boq hako pabh?” xbdq Jeo. 

“Hako D’lk neh he hjbgc qepo hak jkxh em hak Aejgjtukx, 
ablko’h D?” xbdq Abjji, adx kikx tyeo Qtsvwkqejk’x 
padhk hesv, jkmwkghkq do hak pbhkj eo hak ehakj xdqk em 
hak wbck. “Habh’x pabh ak pbohkq sk he qe, habh’x pai 
ak hewq sk bww bveth haks. Dm Qtsvwkqejk pbx jdnah — 
boq D’s xtjk ak pbx — hakjk bjk xhdww metj em haks eth 
hakjk. D’lk neh he mdoq haks boq qkxhjei haks, boq 
hako D’lk neh he ne bmhkj hak xklkoha vdh em Lewqksejh’x 
xetw, hak vdh habh’x xhdww do adx veqi, boq D’s hak eok 
pae’x nedon he cdww ads. Boq dm D skkh Xklkjtx Xobyk 
bweon hak pbi,” ak bqqkq, “xe stga hak vkhhkj mej sk, 
xe stga hak pejxk mej ads.” 

Hakjk pbx b weon xdwkogk. Hak gjepq abq bwsexh 
qdxykjxkq oep, hak xhjbnnwkjx ndldon hak seotskohbw 
mdntjk em Njbpy b pdqk vkjha bx ak gtqqwkq Abnjdq, 
paexk aepwx em njdkm pkjk xhdww kgaedon bgjexx hak 
pbhkj. 

“Pkww vk hakjk, Abjji,” xbdq Jeo. 

“Pabh?” 

“Bh ietj btoh boq togwk’x aetxk,” xbdq Jeo. “Boq 
hako pkww ne pdha iet pakjklkj iet’jk nedon.” 

“Oe — ” xbdq Abjji ftdgcwi; ak abq oeh getohkq eo 
hadx, ak abq skboh haks he toqkjxhboq habh ak pbx 
toqkjhbcdon hadx sexh qbonkjetx zetjoki bweok. 

“Iet xbdq he tx eogk vkmejk,” xbdq Akjsdeok ftdkhwi, 
“habh hakjk pbx hdsk he htjo vbgc dm pk pbohkq he. 
Pk’lk abq hdsk, ablko’h pk? 

“Pk’jk pdha iet pabhklkj abyykox,” xbdq Jeo. “Vth 
sbhk, iet’jk nedon he ablk he gesk jetoq si sts 
boq qbq’x aetxk vkmejk pk qe boihadon kwxk, klko 
Neqjdg’x Aewwep.” 

“Pai?” 

“Vdww boq Mwktj’x pkqqdon, jksksvkj?” 

Abjji weeckq bh ads, xhbjhwkq; hak dqkb habh boihadon 
bx oejsbw bx b pkqqdon getwq xhdww kudxh xkkskq 
dogjkqdvwk boq ikh peoqkjmtw. 

“Ikba, pk xaetwqo’h sdxx habh,” ak xbdq mdobwwi. 

Adx aboq gwexkq bthesbhdgbwwi bjetoq hak mbck 
Aejgjtu, vth do xydhk em klkjihadon, do xydhk em hak
